I should seek out and kill enemy soldiers.
I have slain 20 enemies of the Pact. I should return to the bounty mission board at the Northern Morrowind gate to claim my reward.

I found Bethany LeBlanc and set her free. She overheard the cultists talking about a contract with a hag coven. I should search the camps for the document. It might provide a clue as to where the other women have been taken.
The stones of ancient magic are free of Angof's corruption. Now I need to capture a lurcher. I have the amulet <<1>> gave me. I need to weaken a lurcher and then use the amulet to capture it.
Shaza and I cleared a path through the werewolves to the western gate. I should go inside and report to General Mandin.
I should find <<1>> and let him know that I fought through to <<2>>. She still has almost a full contingent of soldiers to lend to the cause.
The push to retake the courtyard has started. I need to reach the gate control in the northwest watch tower to lock the gate and cut off any werewolf reinforcements.
I captured a lurcher with Ileana's amulet. I should take it to the ritual site before my control over the creature fades.
I should speak with Magistrate Sulma in the Hall of Judgment to see how I can be of assistance.
Now that I've collected the <<1>> as a wedding present, I should return to <<2>> and see the young couple get married.
The bride's father asked me to speak with Casnar's brother, Enneh, at his stall in the market. If Enneh doesn't know where Casnar is, Tiela has agreed to call off the wedding.
I'm inside the city of Camlorn. I should look for Darien Gautier and any of his remaining guards.

Now that I recovered the innkeeper's key, I should enter the inn and light a signal fire. A candle shining in the window should do the trick. Once I do that, Darien can gather the civilians and bring them here.
I collected weapons and armor so the Camlorn citizens can defend themselves. I should return to Darien so we can finally open the gates for the Lion Guard soldiers.
Though he doesn't support the wedding, Casnar's brother is concerned. He asked me to look for Casnar at his cousin's house. It's the last house on the left before the west gate out of Bergama.
I've found Casnar in his cousin's house. I should ask why he's not at the wedding.
Casnar says that Tiela's father hired thugs to break his knees if he tries to attend the wedding. I should speak with the thugs' leader, <<1>>, and convince him to let Casnar attend.
I should speak to <<1>> again. Perhaps he'll be more willing to listen now.
<<1>> has agreed to let Casnar attend the wedding. In fact, if I collect <<2>> as a wedding present from <<1>>, his thugs will escort Casnar to the altar.
Guy advised me to seek out the Reach witch Sibellec. She's staying at the northern wyress enclave. She may know a way to stop Mother Murk.

I found Ildani's wares and a guard watching over them. I should speak to the guard and try to distract him or resolve this some other way.
I informed the guard of Ildani's plot and he asked me to help him catch her and her buyers. I'm first to grab the goods and take them back to Ildani.
I've delivered all the Baandari goods. I should return to Ildani on the bridge at the center of town and let her know.
Now that I've delivered all the Baandari goods, I should meet Ildani on the bridge. The guards could close in at any time now.
Now that I've reached Farragut Keep, I need to take notes on what I see.

The Imperials are entering Satakalaam through an old smuggling tunnel. To stop reinforcements from coming through, I gathered kindlepitch and now I just need to ignite it at the weak support beams to collapse the tunnel.

I need to collect blood from the werewolves roaming Camlorn. It's the final ingredient Alinon needs to complete his cure.

With Faolchu dead and the Lion Guard in Camlorn, my job here is mostly done. I should talk to Captain Darien Gautier before I leave.
This is a dangerous task. I should go there with a group.

I entered the Wyrd Tree. Now I need to destroy the <<1>>.
Alinon's antidote is complete. I need to use it on weakened werewolves to cure them.
I used the antidote to cure the civilians. I should speak to Alinon again.
I decided to spare the Duke. Gloria has taken him prisoner. I should speak with her about my decision.
I need to escort the Camlorn Volunteer to the three towers. Each time we reach a tower, I need to protect the volunteer while she lights the signal fire.
The signal fires are lit and the gates are open. Now I need to confront Faolchu and finally destroy him. He has taken over a holding in the northern part of the city.
Faolchu is dead. I should tell General Gautier that Camlorn's nightmare is over.
Gabrielle wants to use the ancient wyrd site on the beach near here to perform the ritual of recharging. I'll meet her there.

The talisman has been recharged, but it isn't safe to use. It's been corrupted by some sort of Daedric entity. I need to take the talisman to the wyrd circle, where I can purge the Daedric corruption.
Gabrielle followed me to the wyrd circle. Now that the talisman has been purged, I should speak with her.
I should speak with Gabrielle Benele back at the Lion Guard redoubt.
A spriggan spirit appeared where the lurcher died. Its spirit was released when it entered the ritual circle.

The queen's handmaiden asked me to conduct discreet inquiries to assess the city's defenses. I agreed to speak with the former guard captain, examine the defenses at the east gate and to find out why a Redguard refugee was put in the stocks.
A Beldama initiate asked me to find <<1>> and help her search for the elemental guardians.
Something must have gone wrong with the ritual. I should speak with Gabrielle.
The queen asked me to find Glarikha and Sir Jarnot and then to ferret out the Imperial spies in the city without causing a panic.

It seems the crows in the city are representatives of Uela, the leader of the invading Reachmen army. Uela wants to stop the Imperials as badly as I do, so we struck a bargain. I will find and mark the Imperial spies. Her crows will attack them.
With the help of Uela's crows, the Imperial spies have been dealt with. I should now investigate the weapons stash in the south alley that I heard Captain Hjurrun talking about.
With the help of Uela's crows, the Imperial spies have been dealt with. I must deal with Captain Hjurrun and then I should meet the queen back in the castle to help her confont Duke Renchant.

It appears the Direnni captured a messenger, but not before he passed on orders to one of the Alessian soldiers. I need to search the soldiers and their camp to find the orders so that the Direnni aren't surprised before they attack Faolchu.
I should go to <<1>> and speak with <<2>> about the werewolves in <<3>>.
I need to find Bernard Redain near Deleyn's Mill. He should be able to tell me more about what's going on there.

Lady Laurent told me about the Jeweled Crown of Anton, a relic she wants to retrieve from the tomb. To get the crown, I need four keys that unlock the vault. She provided one key. I can find the others somewhere in the tomb.
I recovered the keys to the vault. I should place them in their correct sconces. Then the vault should open.
I placed the keys. Something seems to be happening. I should watch and see what happens.
I can enter the vault now. Lady Laurent wants me to retrieve the Jeweled Crown of Anton, but the Seneschal wants me to take the cursed crown instead.
I entered the vault. I need to defeat the vault's guardian before I decide which crown to take.
I retrieved the Jeweled Crown of Anton. Now I need to find my way out of the Tomb of Lost Kings.
I escaped the Tomb of Lost Kings with the Jeweled Crown of Anton. I should give it to Lady Laurent at her camp.

A Bloodthorn cultist attacked me and chased Glutton away. The cultist seemed angry that I was near the strange vine. I should check with Swineherd Wickton and make sure that Glutton returned to his pen.
The Forgotten Seneschal is eternally bound to the Tomb of Lost Kings. He offered to help me if I agree to help him. In the meantime, I should speak with Lady Laurent, who's deeper inside the tomb.
Heloise has led me to the Hinault Farmhouse. She wants me to knock on the door and see if the family is inside.

The Hinaults refuse to leave the safety of their farmhouse without any weapons to defend themselves with. Gennove Hinault gave me a list of specific weapons he wants me to gather. Heloise suggested I can find the weapons in the barn.
I collected all the weapons <<1>> asked for. I should return to the farmhouse so I can give them to him.
I should look for the king in his palace.
Heloise asked me to accompany her to check on the Hinault family. She wants me to wait for her outside while she finishes tending to the wounded soldiers.
I shattered the Ward and disrupted Alasan's ritual. I am not sure what happened to Alasan, but I worry about the consequences of shattering the Ward. I should gather the pieces.

The Hinault family is barricaded inside their farmhouse. They refuse to open the door until I bring them weapons they can use to defend themselves. Heloise seems to have an idea. I should talk to her.
I spoke to the four legendary spirits of HoonDing's Watch. I should return to Farvad atop the monument.
I must speak to the four legendary spirits of HoonDing's Watch and answer their questions.

Bloodthorn cultists have commandeered the wyrd portal stones. I need to reclaim the portal caves and open portals under the four huts around the Wyrd Tree. Then the wyrd sisters can travel through the portals and arrive without being seen.
I opened the portals for the wyrd sisters. They're performing their purification rituals around the Wyrd Tree. Now I need to open a portal for <<1>> at the tree's entrance.
I opened a portal for Wyress Gwen. I should ask her what else she needs me to do to help save the Wyrd Tree.

Darien wants to move the hidden civilians to a more defensible position: the Camlorn Inn. But the inn is locked tight. I need to find the dead innkeeper somewhere near the cathedral and recover his key.
I have the necessary ingredients for the lycanthropy cure. Now I just need to find Alinon the Alchemist.
Now that we're in the inn, I should talk to Alinon and see how the cure is coming along.
I entered the tomb and saw a spirit standing before me. I should talk to it and see if it knows where I can find Lady Laurent.

Tamien Sellan asked me to free a few prominent Crosswych citizens from the forced-labor camp in the mines. I need to find Councilor Lia, the Innkeeper, and the Blacksmith. I should also aid any miners I can.
I freed the prominent citizens from the mine and have come to the inn to rejoin Tamien Sellan. I should speak to Tamien about what we should do next.
I need to search Lady Laurent's camp for an Ayleid tome that we need to activate the pillars in the ruins and then to close the portal.
I activated the switch to unseal the portal chamber. I should find Lady Laurent inside so we can begin the ritual to close the portal.
Lady Laurent has begun the ritual to close the portal. Aldmeri troops may rush through and try to stop us. It'll be my job to keep her safe.
The portal is closed and the Aldmeri troops should no longer be a problem. I should talk to Lady Laurent and make sure there's nothing else that needs to be done.
I have destroyed the prison that held Gurlak. The Orc is free. I should speak with him now.
I answered the questions of the Redguard legends atop HoonDing's Watch. I should speak with Farvad.

A soldier told me that the wizard Gabrielle Benele is searching for a relic to help defeat Angof. He thinks she's in a crypt near Merovec's Folly, but he isn't sure of the exact location. I need to search the campsite to the west to find her journal.
I found Wizard Benele's journal at the campsite. It mentioned that the camp was attacked by zombies and that she wanted to investigate a crypt to the north. I'll search for her there.
I hear shouting inside the crypt. That's probably Wizard Benele. I should go inside and talk to her.
I need to sanctify the bodies of Lion Guard soldiers who died within Merovec's Folly before the Bloodthorn cultists can raise them as zombies.
I completed the task given to me by Sir Malik. I should return to the Lion Guard Redoubt and let him know.
The fire worked and Faolchu has been slain. The spirit of the knight whose place I took appeared before me and told me to use the nearby portal to return to the present.
Fire was the answer and Faolchu has been slain. The spirit of the knight whose place I took appeared before me and told me to use the nearby portal to return to the present.
I promised to free an Orc named Gurlak from his prison beneath Salas En. I'll have to find some way to dispel the enchantment that holds him in time.
I need to collect Richard Dusant's torn backpack from beside his corpse. It contains the objects I need to present to the three Heralds.
I must make the proper offerings to the three Heralds in the ruins of Dresan Keep. Engravings on the statues may give some clue as to the best offering to select from Dusant's pack.
I made the offerings. Now I need to find the old well. The secret passage at the bottom of the well should now be open.
I found my way into a secret underground chamber at the base of the old well. I see a passage leading out. I should investigate.
I returned from the underground vault beneath Dresan Keep. I should find Richard Dusant and let him know what I found there.
I lit the signal. Now I should go downstairs and talk to Darien.
Darien wants to arm the civilians so they can defend themselves. He asked me to find the Camlorn Guard supply caches and bring back any weapons and armor to the inn.

Prince Azah told me that the Withered Hand leader, Alasan, is planning to turn himself into a lich. He has killed everyone in the town and is using Necromantic Focuses to channel the energy necessary for this ritual. I must destroy the Focuses.
As I searched the hidden underground vault beneath Dresan Keep, I encountered the spirit of the Keeper of Knowledge. I should speak to the spirit.
Richard Dusant suggested bringing the Dresan Index to his friend in Aldcroft, a mage named Valinwe.
I locked Camlorn's main gate. I should let General Gautier know I was successful.
I need to catch up with the Lion Guard force that's north of the Glenumbra Moors and find an officer to give my report to.

Watchman Maujad explained that he and the other guards can't fight the undead because they consider the dead sacred. He asked me to find and rescue his fellow guards and then meet him in the warehouse.

The Throne Keeper says that when we activate the temple's defenses, Tu'whacca will send his "Breath" to help cleanse the temple. I must light the sacred braziers at the cardinal points on the temple grounds.

The Throne Keeper says that when we activate the temple's defenses, Tu'whacca will send his "Breath" to help cleanse the temple. I must light the sacred braziers at the cardinal points on the temple grounds.

The Throne Keeper says that when we activate the temple's defenses, Tu'whacca will send his "Breath" to help cleanse the temple. I must light the sacred braziers at the cardinal points on the temple grounds.
Now that I've convinced the town councilors to support the resistance, I should return to Tamien Sellan at the inn.

A group of Dragon Knights and Camlorn Guard soldiers succumbed to the poison mist. I should enter the graveyard of Cath Bedraud and try to save them. Wizard Benele thinks that I may be immune to the mist. I hope she's right.
Gabrielle's ritual was a success. I should meet her inside the crypts of Cath Bedraud.

Farvad tells me that great wisdom can be gleaned from slaying the spirits of the Redguards' ancient foes in HoonDing's Watch. I should travel to the first tier of the monument, slay the Nedic ghosts, and collect their essence.
I vanquished the Nedic ghosts of HoonDing's Watch. I should travel to the monument's second tier, slay the Goblin ghosts, and collect their essence.
I defeated the Goblin ghosts of HoonDing's Watch. I should travel to the third tier, slay the Orcish ghosts, and collect their essence.
I defeated the Orcish ghosts of HoonDing's Watch. I should travel to the fourth tier, slay the Breton ghosts, and collect their essence.
I've lost sight of Heloise. She's probably returned to the safety of the tower. I should look for her there.
<<1>> asked me to speak to some of the remaining town councilors. He believes we need their support to free Crosswych from the Red Rooks. I should seek out Councilors Virgile, Donella and Theodore.
To ensure the Crosswych mine is liberated from the Red Rooks, I must find and kill the foreman.
I need to enter the mayor's house, find <<1>>, and kill him.
Now that <<1>> is dead, I should find <<2>> and tell him the Red Rooks' hold on Crosswych has been shattered.

To get the knights out safely, I need to gather amulets from the Bloodthorn necromancers. Darien thinks the amulets protect them from the poisonous mist. I'll collect one for each surviving knight and a couple of extras. Just in case.
I gathered amulets from the Bloodthorn necromancers. I should return to Darien and the surviving knights and pass these out.
Gabrielle Benele from the Mages Guild arrived to help. She believes she can clear the mists away long enough for the soldiers to make their way here. I should meet her at the center of Cath Bedraud.
I need to defend Gabrielle as she attempts to clear the mist. When I'm ready to begin, I should let her know.
The serpent of the oasis fed well on the goat I brought it. I should return the whistle to <<1>> and tell him what I've done.

The wanderer told me to use the Call, a goatherd's whistle with chimes, to attract a goat. I should lead the goat to a nearby plateau overlooking the oasis. Supposedly, a serpent will come and eat the goat.
A Crosswych citizen said that if I wanted to help them get rid of the Red Rooks, I should talk to Tamien Sellan at the Crosswych Inn. He's organizing the resistance.
I need to help Crosswych citizens drive off the Red Rook enforcers that are threatening them.
I rescued the citizens who were being harassed and sent a message to the Red Rooks: extortion won't be tolerated. I should let <<1>> know what I've done.
I should find General Gautier. He commands the forces fighting to retake Camlorn. He's in the siege camp to the east.
I freed the prominent citizens from the mine and now I should meet Tamien Sellan at the Inn.
Heloise is ready to go check on the Hinault family. I should talk to her and let her know we're good to go.
The undead attack at the docks was the work of the Withered Hand, a group of dangerous necromancers. It seems the Hand has also kidnapped Prince Azah. I should search for witnesses.
I must reach the next fire, so I can beat the storm to the last fire!
I beat the storm to the last fire! I must now speak to Anjan.
I need to find a switch to unseal the portal chamber. Lady Laurent says she'll meet me inside.
I found Darien and Sir Lanis, but there are still knights that are unaccounted for. I should continue to look for them.
Once I locate a tomb protected by wards, I can use the binding stone that Gabrielle provided. Then Gabrielle and the soldiers can teleport in and meet me.

To prove his beliefs, Anjan threw bones onto the sand and prophesied I would win a race against a storm. I must run across the desert, following the trail of blue flames, so I can reach the end before the storm does.
Stibbons, Lady Laurent's servant, is concerned that her ladyship hasn't returned from the tomb yet. He asked me to look for her.
I retrieved the Cursed Crown of Anton. Now I need to find my way out of the Tomb of Lost Kings.
I escaped the Tomb of Lost Kings with the Cursed Crown of Anton. I should give it to Lady Laurent at her camp.
Gabrielle and a Dragon Knight teleported safely into the crypts. I should speak to Gabrielle and determine our next step.
The storm beat me to the last fire. I should return to Anjan.
Gabrielle and one knight managed to teleport into the safe area, but the rest of her team was lost in the process. I should look for the missing knights as I explore the crypts and search for Angof.
I found Darien and Sir Lanis, but there are still knights that are unaccounted for. I should continue to look for them.
I found Darien and Sir Lanis, but there are still knights that are unaccounted for. I should continue to look for them.
I found Darien and Sir Lanis, but there are still knights that are unaccounted for. I should continue to look for them.

I found Darien and Sir Lanis, but there are still knights that are unaccounted for. I should continue to look for them.
I found Darien and Sir Lanis, but there are still knights that are unaccounted for. I should continue to look for them.

After consulting a set of bones, Hadoon informed me that I am fated to die in the jaws of a terrible duneripper named Istraga. Istraga roams the desert south of Leki's Blade. Hadoon wants me to bring him one of its scales as proof.
I have slain Istraga and taken her scale. I must give the scale to Hadoon.
Gabrielle and I have both arrived at the ancient wyrd site. I should speak to Gabrielle when I'm ready to start the ritual.
A Lion Guard soldier requested my help. He wants me to travel to the Lion Guard Redoubt and offer my services to Commander Marone Ales.
Now that I've reached Warden Mine, I need to take notes on what I see.
Sir Lanis has requested to speak with me before I leave. I should find him in by the commander's tent.
The three shard-keys are well-guarded. I need to defeat the guardians to acquire the shard-keys.
I'm inside Angof's inner sanctum. It's time for Angof to die.
Angof is dead. I should use the portal and follow the others back to the redoubt. Wizard Gabrielle will want to know what happened.
Now that my lizard has won the race, I should return to <<1>>.
I've placed my lizard at the race track outside Bergama. My lizard will run in the next race as soon as it starts.
Now that I've obtained a racing lizard, I should put it in its starting cage at the race track outside Bergama.
I activated the switch to unseal the portal chamber. Lady Laurent will meet me inside.
I've activated the pillars so the back door into the lower ruins should be open. I should meet Lady Laurent inside.
I should search the mine for signs of Samsi's partner.
I agreed to avenge Haidar's murder and give Samsi the cursed gemstones.
Haidar wants revenge for his murder. He's cursed the gemstones that he and Samsi found at the bottom of the mine. He wants me to give them to Samsi.
Haidar wanted me to avenge his death and give Samsi the cursed gemstones, but I refused. I'll give her the supply pack, as she requested.
Haidar's spirit was angry at me for not helping, but I decided not to give the cursed gemstones to Samsi. I am bringing back the supply pack, though, as she requested.
I found the remains of Samsi's partner, and his ghost appeared. I should speak to the ghost.
I found a bone buried in the sand. The dog then ran off to what appears to be another mound of sand. I should follow the dog and unearth the next mound of sand.
I found another bone buried in the sand. The dog then ran off to what appears to be another mound of sand. I should follow the dog and unearth the next mound of sand.
I found another bone buried in the sand. The dog then ran off to what appears to be another mound of sand. I should follow the dog and unearth the next mound of sand.
I found another bone buried in the sand. The dog then ran off to what appears to be another mound of sand. I should follow the dog and unearth the next mound of sand.
I assembled the bones, and the skeleton has risen to stand before me. I should speak to it.

I have slain ten enemies of the Dominion. I should speak to the Skirmisher.
The Skirmisher has ordered me to kill twenty enemy guards.
I have slain twenty enemy guards. It is time to inform the Skirmisher of my success.
I've now gathered all the bones and the dog is looking at me expectantly. I should try to reassemble the skeleton.
The dog was pawing on a pile of sand nearby. I should dig into the sand to see what she's looking for.
After I freed him from the spell, <<1>> ran off down the road. I should speak with him again when I reach Koeglin Village.
I should search the ruins on the high road toward Koeglin Village and try to rescue the Lion Guard captain.
I've found the Lion Guard captain struggling between a pair of mystical braziers. I should find a way to break him free of the nightmare spell.
I must restore the Ansei Wards to the shrine inside the Impervious Vault. Many people have gathered to witness this historic moment.
I must restore the Ansei Wards to the shrine inside the Impervious Vault. Many people have gathered to witness this historic moment.
The Ansei have appeared before their shrine. I should speak with Ansei Halelah.
Though the manifestations of the ancient Ansei have faded, their power remains to ward the Alik'r. <<1>> has arrived and is making a speech. I should listen to what he has to say.
Athel Baelborne's dead. I should talk to Claudie.
<<1>> asked me to search the ruins of the estate and see what I can find concerning the apparent ghost that haunts the place.
I need to intercept Dominion messages from their commander. They have a command camp across from the tower.
I doused the signal fires atop Farwatch Tower. I should find Captain Gilame at the base of the tower and find out if that prevented the Dominion's attack.
I managed to intercept the Dominion's messages. I should find Captain Gilame near the tower and give them to her.
Captain Gilame asked me to put out the signal fires on Farwatch Tower. That should prevent the Dominion from signaling their ships to attack. She gave me a storm rune to do the job.
Scout Shent has ordered me to kill ten members of the Aldmeri Dominion or Ebonheart Pact.
I have slain ten enemies of the Daggerfall Covenant. I should speak to Scout Shent again.
The Commander has ordered me to capture the farm in Balfiera.
I have captured a Farm and should inform Commander Grepgory.
The Commander has ordered me to capture the farm in Balfiera.
I have captured a Farm and should inform Commander Stone.
Ansei Halelah has created a portal through which I can return to Sentinel.

I spoke to the ghost of Claudie Themond and heard her story. I can either go to the waterfall near the tower and break the curse, or tell Athel Baelborne to forget his inheritance and leave. I need to decide what to do.
I defeated the Daedra and broke the curse. I should tell Athel Baelborne what happened.
I should join with other warriors to launch an attack. Capturing a single keep multiple times will not impress Grand Warlord Zimmeron.
<<1>> is enraged at the death of her husband. She plans to swear her own oath of vengeance to Malacath. To do that, she needs the heads of <<2>>'s siblings, <<3>> and <<4>>.
<<1>> is dead. I should speak to <<2>>.
When I opened the ancient coffer, a ghost appeared before me. I should speak with this spirit and see what it wants.
The ghost speaks a language I don't understand. I should see if I can find anything in the underground chamber that will help me communicate with it.
The Ayleid spirit asked me to destroy three artifacts here in the vault that bind him and keep him trapped.
I destroyed the artifacts used to bind the Ayleid spirit. I should return to him and let him know I was successful.
I convinced the Ayleid spirit to pass on to Aetherius and leave this world behind.\n\nI should talk to him a final time and urge him on his way.
I convinced the Ayleid spirit to explore modern Tamriel. Now he can see what Glenumbra has become after the defeat of the Alessians. I should talk to him a final time and see him on his way.
The Forgotten Seneschal's ritual is complete and the Vault of Lost Kings is unlocked. I should speak with the seneschal by the vault entrance.
Scout Warden Farm
The ancient sword could be anywhere in the ruins, so I'll need to search carefully. The scholar's guide, <<1>>, may have additional information to help direct me toward the most likely locations.
I should look for the missing scouts around Farwatch Tower.
I sent the recruits to the base of Farwatch Tower. I should check on them and make sure they all made it back safely.

One of the recruits asked me to look for Recruit Cecile. She was captured by the Dominion and taken to their camp on the beach.

I found a pendant shaped like a golden tongue. It disintegrated when I touched it, but not before I heard magical whispers all around me. I should return and see if I can communicate with the ghost now.

I should look for <<1>> in the oasis near Bergama. <<2>> suggested I look for him on the nearby cliffs.
I've helped <<1>> escape the bluffs over the oasis. I should return to <<2>> and make sure he made it back to his family.
Now that I have the Dresan Index, I can leave this ancient vault.
I can return the cursed sword to <<1>>, or take it to <<2>>, the man who asked for it in the first place.

After defeating the Nereid, an intimidating being appeared behind the ancient altar. It appears to be a representative of the Daedric Prince Hermaeus Mora. I should speak to this being and hear what it has to say.

Herald Kixathi believes the Nereid is storing memory essences in stolen relics that she will use to create a Water Stone. Kixathi has asked me to cause a distraction by burning the disciples' food supplies, so she can find the Nereid's lair.

I've burned the disciples' food supplies to create a distraction so that Herald Kixathi could sneak up to the Nereid's private chambers. I should meet her by the chamber door on the upper level of the Nereid's cavern.
Herald Kixathi is going to keep watch while I search the Nereid's chambers to recover the relics the Nereid plans to use to create the Water Stone.
The relics I was looking for in the Nereid's lair have been shattered, and Lorelia, the Nereid herself, has appeared. I should speak with her.

The Nereid has bound herself to the Water Stone and is going to the shrine in the eastern portion of the ruins where she plans to flood the ruins. I need to get there and help Herald Kixathi stop her.
I need to ensure the safety of the Camlorn Volunteer.
Lorelia activated some magic that seems to have merged her being with the Water Stone and renewed her strength. I should speak to her to make sure everything is all right.
Lorelia has asked me to venture into the section of the ruins under the Primeval Seekers' control and steal Ayleid Relics which she needs to create the Water Stone.
I've collected the Ayleid Relics we need to create the Water Stone. I should bring them back to Lorelia.
Lorelia cannot touch the Water Stone, so she has asked me to deposit the Ayleid relics into the crystal well and create the stone myself.
I've successfully created the Water Stone, and Lorelia asked me to bring it to Apostle Marian.

I created the Water Stone but then found Apostle Marian had been attacked by Herald Kixathi, who's now going to attack Lorelia in her sanctum. I should hurry there and try to protect Lorelia from harm.

Though the Nereid's apostle claims she is just trying to save the lake, the herald who leads the Hermaeus Mora cult insists she is stealing memories from her followers and committing crimes against nature. I must choose who to side with.
Herald Kixathi asked me to kill one of the entity's wisps and take the essence it carries to the essence troughs in the ruins. She hopes this might reveal something of the entity's intentions.

A watery voice spoke when I took the essence to the essence troughs. The voice spoke of having nearly enough essences for some purpose. The voice also mentioned a woman named Apostle Marian. I should speak to her.
I should search soldiers, dead or alive, for important documents. Once I find them I can bring them to <<1>>.

The documents reveal the Seventh Legion is on the verge of looting Volenfell. I need to find an <<z:1>> on one of the Seventh Legion's officers. Then I can seal forged letters to lure the legion back towards Cyrodiil.
I distracted the guard. Now I can grab Ildani's goods and go.
I collected some documents from the Imperial soldiers. I should meet <<1>> at the ruins below the gate to Craglorn.
Despite the cultist's pleas, I've chosen to help the Nereid save Lake Halcyon from eventually drying up. Lorelia, the Nereid herself, now wishes to speak with me.
I've chosen to assist the Primeval Seekers in preventing the Nereid's plans from coming to fruition. I should speak with Herald Kixathi about what to do next.
I must gather heartwood from the lurchers to prevent the transformation and ease the spriggan's passing.
I must bring this heartwood to <<1>> so she can prevent the transformation and ease the spriggan's passing.
To avenge all the spriggans who have died, I've destroyed the transformation altar, and I now must kill the witchman who's been turning the spriggans into lurchers.
To avenge all the spriggans who have died, <<1>> asked me to destroy the transformation altar and kill the witchman who has been turning the spriggans into lurchers.

The Nereid says she's already created the Water Stone and somehow bound it to herself. She says she's now going to the shrine where she will flood the ruins and kill us all. I should warn Herald Kixathi about this.
I killed Herald Kixathi to protect Lorelia, and I should now give her the Water Stone.
I need to find Camp Tamrith and talk to Captain Janeve. She needs to know that the villainous <<1>> is nearby and that the refugees are in danger.
I found Darien and the others outside the cave. Now I should talk to <<1>>.
The Bloodthorn envoy is dead, and the cult will undoubtedly blame the Red Rooks for the assassination. I should return to the Lion Guard camp and let Provost Piper know what happened.
I should question the Red Rook messenger and see what I can find out about a secret meeting between the Red Rooks and Bloodthorns here.
I agreed to search for Kip's family. He believes the Red Rooks are holding them in an abandoned house south of the Lion Guard camp.

The Bloodthorn cult and Red Rooks are joining forces. If I wear this Red Rook Disguise into the Bloodrthorn camp and kill their envoy, that should drive a wedge between the two factions and prevent them from forging an alliance.

The Bloodthorn cult and Red Rooks are joining forces. If I wear this Red Rook Disguise into the Bloodrthorn camp and kill their envoy, that should drive a wedge between the two factions and prevent them from forging an alliance.
The Bloodthorn envoy is dead, and the cult will undoubtedly blame the Red Rooks for the assassination. I should return to the Lion Guard camp and let Provost Piper know what happened.
I rescued Kip's family. I should return to the Lion Guard camp and speak to him.
Now that the tower is safe, I should go inside and speak to Jonah Marose. I need  to convince him to return to Camp Tamrith. I think he ran to the top of the tower.

I returned to Camp Tamrith to find the place in disarry. It appears the camp was attacked. I don't see Captain Janeve or Darien, but I see Countess Tamrith tending to the wounded. I should talk to her.
I must apply Shannia's heartwood poultice to the spriggan to prevent the transformation and ease her passing.
Now that I've completed my escort, I should return to my quest giver.
I should offer to escort.
I should escort.
I should look for one of the wyresses in Jackdaw Cove.
Any knights loyal to <<1>> will duel me to the death. I must be prepared.
I applied the heartwood poultice and the last spriggan seems to have died peacefully. I should speak to <<1>> to see if there's anything else I can do.
I found Heloise inside the Hinault Farmhouse, examining the corpse of <<1>>. The rest of the family is nowhere to be seen. I should talk to her and find out what happened.
Four members of the Hinault family are unaccounted for: the mother, two sons, and a daughter. Heloise has asked me to find them and, if necessary, burn their dead bodies and collect their ashes.
Strange creatures overrun Crestshade, and it looks like part of the mountain came down upon the town. I should find Crestshade's mayor. She may be taking refuge in one of the houses.
Lieutenant Fairfax asked me to go into the tower and reassure Jowan Hinault and his sister. He said they were pretty shaken up when they arrived here and could probably benefit from a friendly face.
I should speak with Ramza at the stables.
General Pasha ordered me to enter Cyrodiil or a Battle ground and kill twenty Daggerfall Covenant guards.
I have slain twenty enemy guards. I should speak to General Pasha at Nibenay Gate.
The man has decided to leave his wife for the girl.
I must place the forged reports in the <<z:1>> within the command tent, so the soldiers will believe they are official orders.
The forged reports have been placed in the command tent. The Seventh Legion will now think their orders are to return to Cyrodiil instead of continuing on to Volenfell. I should let <<1>> know.
I should go to the mayor's house, where Gelves has established his headquarters.
Priestess Brela gave me sacred oil and asked me to anoint the bones of any Dark Elf soldiers I find around Vivec's Antlers. She believes that will allow them to rest in peace.
I've anointed many bones among the dead of Vivec's Antlers. I must return to Priestess Brela and let her know the task is done. She has likely returned to the Pact camp in Vivec's Antlers.
I agreed to obtain the Covenant's orders from their camp to the north of Fort Arand.
Captain Hjolm is dead! I should speak to the soldier crouching over him.
Assassins killed Captain Hjolm. I must bring the Covenant plans to Captain Llaari and inform her of Captain Hjolm's death. Sergeant Eila will prepare the troops throughout the fort.

Sings-With-Reed believes she can contact the coral and turn it on the Covenant. She needs my help. While she enters the chamber and contacts the coral, I must place her eggs in three coral clusters around Vivec's Antlers.
<<1>> and <<2>> said they would meet me in the Coral Heart chamber. I must find <<1>> and stop <<3>>.

I've placed Sings-With-Reed's eggs in the coral reef. Projections of the Breton mage Alexandra Conele taunted me at every step. I must hurry to the Coral Heart chamber, so I can find Lieutenant Galyn and Sings-With-Reed.
I must work alongside <<1>> and <<2>> to kill <<3>> and retrieve the <<4>>.
I have the Heart. I should bring it to <<1>> at the forward camp for safekeeping.
I've retrieved the <<1>>. I should speak to <<2>> at the manse in Davon's Watch.
I delayed the Covenant. Now I should return to Davon's Watch and meet Holgunn.
Now that I witnessed the power of Balreth, I should return to <<1>>.
I should head west of Davon's Watch to Ash Mountain. There I should be able to find Tanval's son Garyn, who is already working to return the creature to the depths of the volcano.
I should speak to <<1>> at the docks in Davon's Watch.
I should escort <<1>> to the manse in the center of Davon's Watch.
I should speak to Holgunn at the manse in Davon's Watch.

I've chosen Furon's plan. He suggests harnessing the spirits and binding them in service to Davon's Watch. I must gather the skulls of the spectral general and his former captains. Then Furon can perform the ritual.
I've chosen Reesa's plan. She hopes to let the spirits pass peacefully to Aetherius. To perform the ritual, I must find a trio of relics formerly owned by the spectral general and his captains.
We performed the ritual and confronted the spirit of <<1>>. I should speak to <<2>> once again.
I need to decide which plan to adopt. Reesa's plan is to release the spirits, allowing them to pass into lands beyond. Furon's plan is to bind the spirits, so they can guard the battlefield.
I need to talk to <<1>> and see if our attempt worked.

I've slain a number of assassins within the walls of Fort Arand. Llaari asked me to speak with Strikes-from-Shadows about the next step for repelling the Covenant. Strikes-from-Shadows should be waiting at the tower on the eastern side of the fort.

Covenant soldiers plan to attack the fort from below. I must seal them down here by activating several floor plates. That will create a magical barrier. Strikes-from-Shadows asked me to activate three plates before meeting him in the last chamber.

I've found some dead troops inside the tower on the fort's eastern side. There was a fight between Pact and Covenant forces. Strikes-from-Shadows might have used the trapdoor in the room to escape. I should climb down and look for him.

An Argonian named <<1>> knows of a salve that will soothe the burns of injured Dunmer. He needs the proper ingredients to make it. The key ingredient is chitin from the lavawalker shalks infesting Senie.
I've recovered the chitin required for the cure. I should deliver it to an Argonian named <<1>>. He's in the temple on the north side of Senie.

<<1>> has ground the shalk chitin I collected into medicinal poultices. Injured Dunmer are suffering throughout Senie. I need to use the medicine on them. <<1>> also instructed me to speak with <<2>>.
I've used the Argonian poultice to heal a number of Dunmer injured by the eruption and the shalk invasion. I should seek out <<1>> and tell him of the aid the Argonians provided.

I told <<1>> of the aid the Argonians provided, but he's paranoid and suspicious. He fears an Argonian shaman named <<2>> has taken his daughter. If I can reassure him, he'll talk to the Argonian leaders in Senie.
<<1>> thought she saw <<2>> walking out of town before the volcano erupted. I should go west to the base of Ash Mountain to see if I can find her.
Girvas and his daughter have been re-united. I should speak to him again.
I must meet <<1>> at the Daedric tower. We'll perform a ritual there and confront the spirit of <<2>>.
I'm to meet <<1>> at the Daedric ruins. We must perform a ritual and confront the spirit of <<2>>.
The Dark Elf scout Vartis asked me to acquire a copy of the orders the Orcs are following. I need to find out who they are, what they want, and who sent them to Deshaan.
I learned a great deal about the Oathbound Orcs and the reasons they were sent to Deshaan. I should report to Vartis Dareel.

To disrupt the siege of Davon's Watch, I need to destroy Covenant siege weapons on the western beach. Holgunn also wants me to start a fire at the construction site where they're building siege ladders.
I should speak to Ix-Utha once again to bid her farewell.
Now that the enslaved dead are free to move on, I should seek out the spirit of Ix-Utha.
I discovered that <<1>> has joined the Worm Cult. These cultists have captured wounded Pact soldiers for their experiments. I should speak with Furon right away.
<<1>> asked me to infiltrate the mage's circle. I need to find something that could explain what they're doing.
I noticed a tome lying out in the circle's meeting place in a cave. I should grab it so Furon can understand what this cult is doing.
I've activated the plates. I should report to Strikes-from-Shadows and tell him.
I must tell Captain Llaari of Ahknara's demise.

There is one last plate to activate. Strikes-from-Shadows asked me to slay Ahknara. He'll activate the last plate as he exits behind me. Ahknara is waiting outside the door behind Strikes-from-Shadows.
I found the kwama nest. Now I need to obtain the <<z:1>>.
I need to bring the <<z:1>> back to <<2>>.
I should fight my way through Covenant forces to the tombs north of Davon's Watch and save <<1>>.
I have the orders. I must return to Captain Hjolm. He'll be waiting at the gates of Fort Arand.
Captain Noris has asked me to help free his men. They've been taken by the dreugh. I need to save the Pact soldiers by digging out dreugh mud mounds.
One of the rescued soldiers told me the Covenant is holding Lieutenant Galyn inside their ship. It's on the north side of Vivec's Antlers. I need to rescue her.

I've rescued Lieutenant Galyn. While she rallies her soldiers, she asked me to find her aide, Sings-With-Reed. She has a plan to turn the coral against the Covenant. Sings-With-Reed is probably watching over the Covenant camp.
Svanhildr wants me to burn down the Orc supply shacks. I need to collect kindlepitch from the Covenant in the area. The stuff is highly flammable.
I gathered kindlepitch as Svanhildr suggested. If I throw some of the material at a flame, I can set each supply shack on fire.
I set fire to the Orc supply shacks. I should find Svanhildr by the large gate and let her know.
I must place the ritual items into the braziers.
I've found the attic room and used the key to get inside. I should search the room and see what Frodibert Fontbonne left behind.
I found a note written by Frodibert to his son. It seems he was not disappointed in his son after all. The key I found under the note should unlock the chest containing Donel's inheritance.
Inside the chest is Donel's inheritance money. I need to decide if I want to keep the money for myself or try to find Donel Fontbonne.
Tanval asked me to enter the tomb complex that begins across the square from the manse, and collect the <<1>>.
I've joined Holgunn at the manse in Davon's Watch. He's introduced me to Tanval Indoril. I should speak to him.
I've found <<1>>. I should use the signal near Morvani's location so <<2>> can find us.
I need to talk to Svanhildr and listen to her plan.
Drelden's kwama must be "persuaded" to return home. A sufficiently convincing beating should stun one and briefly make it friendlier. After that, I can use <<1>>  to order it home.
I've "convinced" several of Drelden's errant kwama to return to his mine. I should meet him there to claim my reward.
I've found the missing <<1>>. Both her father Girvas and the Argonian shaman <<2>> arrived when I used the signal. I should speak to the Spellwright.
I need to find the entrance to the cave. Furon mentioned it should be near the camp south of the ritual site.
I need to find the Nord named Svanhildr.
I need to burn three Covenant war banners atop the towers in the cliffs to rattle the Oathbound.
With the banners burning, I should challenge Gruznak the Impatient and slay him.
Gruznak the Impatient is dead and his Oathbound raiders are scattered and disorganized. I should find Svanhildr at the mouth of the pass and see if the reinforcements have arrived.
<<1>> asked me to seek out a mushroom at a kwama nest nearby. First, I must travel to a cave.
I've spoken with both Furon Rii and Reesa, and I've tried their methods. I should speak to <<1>>.
I need to collect Dark Elf skulls so I can disrupt the spell of domination over Idrasa's spirit. Skulls are boiling in cauldrons throughout Malak's Maw. I can collect them from these iron pots.
I should head to the west gate of Davon's Watch and speak with <<1>>.
<<1>> told me to deliver some of the <<2>> to her assistants, <<3>> and <<4>>.

Sergeant Eila asked me to report to Captain Hjolm. The sergeant found no evidence of a flanking attack to the west. She suspects they're coming from Hjolm's direction. Captain Hjolm is along the road to the east.
I should defend <<1>> from Covenant troops while he performs the ritual.
I gathered information about the disappearances, including evidence linked to the Llodos plague. I should return to the kinhouse and talk to Councilor Ralden about this.
A House Hlaalu guard informed me that if I want to offer my help, I need to speak to a councilor at the kinhouse.
Narsis villagers might have information, as well.
Now that the Vereansu supplies are burning, I need to find <<1>>. He's on the road north of Muth Gnaar. I should tell him what happened.
I need to locate the witch Norgred claims he was escorting. He said they were camped east of where I met him.
The axe has been found. Evigna and Norgred are reunited â€¦ more or less.
The Argonian spirit has asked me to free the spirits of the dead from their undead masters. I'll need to destroy the Chimer spirits keeping them trapped on Nirn.
The recruiter in Wayrest should be able to help me locate Donel Frontbonne and pass along the note and his inheritance.
Donel Fontbonne's note to his father indicated he was joining the army. I should speak with the recruitment officer in Wayrest's marketplace so I can locate the new soldier.
I collected the <<1>>. I must find Reesa and speak with her.
Captain Llaari thinks the Covenant assassins will be lurking near the walls of the fort. I should use the flasks of blinding light until I uncover the infiltrators. Then I must kill them.
Captain Llaari's plan revolves around some alchemical weapons. I should get some flasks of blinding light from the second floor of the command post.
Strikes-from-Shadows mentioned a trap door in the command post. It leads to the bluff above Fort Arand. I should use that door to reach Ahknara and slay her.

I didn't find a witch, but I met Norgred's wife. <<1>> saw her husband run off toward some plague husks. They were near an abandoned house southeast of their camp by the river. I'll look for the <<2>> there.
Onuja has told me Mavos is buried in the large tomb in the southern part of Othrenis. I should be able to speak to Mavos there.
After speaking with Eanen, I must tell Bala something.
I must travel to Ash Mountain and find <<1>>. I need to tell him what I've learned about the methods used to imprison the Brothers of Strife.
I agreed to help Onuja contact Mavos. I must chant at the shrines on the eastern and western rises of Othrenis.
The dead of Othrenis have awakened, and they thirst for my blood! If I'm to speak with Mavos, I must defeat them.
Mavos' ritual requires two items: a skull and a candle. These items are locked in chests to the east and west. I need to solve a puzzle at each chest to obtain them.
I closed the portals. Now I must speak to Magister Enuse. In Ash Mountain's past, he was studying to the north.
Magister Enuse wants me to summon ritual guardians at a pair of flame wells. These magical anchorheads are located southeast and southwest of Mavos's altar.
There was a large explosion before I was sent back to the present. This must be how Mavos died.\n\nI must talk to him.
I agreed to help Bala find Eanen's tomb. I should listen to what she needs to awaken him, so I can assist her.
Eanen's feelings for Bala were a lie. He and his wife found the story about her feelings to be quite amusing. I must tell Bala â€¦ something.
After speaking with Eanen, I'll have to tell Bala something.
After speaking with Eanen, I must tell Bala something.
Vara-Zeen is concerned for his mate, Leel-Vata, as she did not escape before the Khajiiti pirates attacked. I must find her in the village.
I need to speak to Vara-Zeen, the elder of Silent Mire.

Leel-Vata was injured while attempting to protect the village's sacred relics. She asked me to retrieve the sacred stones from the Khajiiti pirates and the Hist branch from the sorceress in the tent along the shore.
I recovered the sacred stones and the Hist branch. I should find Leel-Vata by the large rocks north of the village and return them to her.
Dedras and Mevis are somewhere in the sulfur pools. They could be in danger from the caustic environment and wild shalk.
I think I've found the right cave, but I heard the sounds of a struggle as I approached. I should seek out Saalu and Drathyra as soon as possible.

The commander of the Covenant soldiers wielded the poisoned blade that injured Saalu. The commander taunted Drathyra with an herbal antidote, then walked off with it. The invaders went south of Saalu's cave to burn the Othrys' barns.
I recovered the antidote. I must bring it back to the cave before Saalu's poison spreads too far.
I've found everyone in the Othrys clan. I should return to the stead on the southern side of the <<1>>.
To learn the lessons of the past, I must speak to the spirits of Balreth and Sadal in the ruins to the south. I must also gather the <<1>>s Vunal requested.
I've spoken with the spirits and gathered Heartstones. I should return to <<1>> to see what comes next. He's usually studying at the base of the monument.
<<1>> said he would catch up with me after his headache subsided, but he isn't here. I need to find him and let him know I found the axe.
I've returned from my vision of the past. I should talk to <<1>> about what I've experienced.
I have the candle and the skull. I must return to Mavos to enter the vision.
<<1>> wants me to cut out the hearts of Nedic warriors. They'll be used to power the upcoming ritual. Then I must kill their general, Ornskar.
<<1>> asked me to kill two powerful Daedra, so I can harvest <<a:2>> and <<3>> from their corpses. I must speak with her acolytes at the nearby ruins to proceed.

<<1>> of House Hlaalu hired me to investigate the truth behind the disappearances. I should search around town and speak to anyone who might know what's going on. Perhaps I can discover something the guards missed.
Onuja has instructed me to chant once more at the central Othrenis brazier. This will rouse the dead, who will try to kill me for disturbing the rest of a highborn Dark Elf.
I spoke with the Othrys brothers. Neither of them are sure where their mother and sister have gone. One thought they might have taken refuge in a cave near the sulfur pools. I should head there next.
I've prepared the site for the ritual. Turoni instructed me to talk to <<1>> when I was done with my task. She should be at the altar in the center of the ruin.
<<1>>  has given me the honor of beginning the transformation ritual. I should pray at the <<2>> to begin.
Now that I have the key, I need to set the Argonian captives free.
Seeks-the-Night is dead. I should speak to Vara-Zeen outside of the village and inform him of all that occurred.
The captured villagers are locked in chains. Leel-Vata suggested that I search the large tent for a key to unlock the prisoners.
I found Eanen. I must tell him of Bala's search.
When I came back outside, I found that Fafnyr and the other guards had been attacked. I don't see Gar anywhere. I should talk to Fafnyr and discover what's happened.
Now that I've saved <<1>>, killed the Goblin Warlord and the spider queen, I should return to <<2>> at the manor house and report the good news.
A field worker at <<1>> said I should speak to his master, Hrogar, if I wanted to help in the fight against the Goblins.
I should speak with <<1>>. He stands vigil east of the main house in <<2>>.
I need to use the Hist branch to mark the door to Seeks-the-Night's home in Silent Mire.
Seeks-the-Night can now be summoned back to Silent Mire. I must do so within the walls of his home. When he appears, I must kill him.
I freed the captured villagers and talked to Seeks-the-Night. Now I need to find Leel-Vata at the meditation mound and let her know what happened.
I should speak with <<1>> at his house in <<2>>.
I've honored the memory of Mavos at the two shrines in Othrenis. I must find and speak to Onuja the scholar, who waits for me at the center of the burial ground.
I should find out what became of <<1>>. I must look east of the house in <<2>>.
<<1>> told me he saw the Goblins dragging <<2>> to the cave on the beach. I may find him there, if he still lives.
<<1>> asked me to search for signs of <<2>> and <<3>>. He suggested that I look in spider cocoons east of the manor house.
When I found <<1>>, he asked me to slay the <<2>>. It's inside a cave at the bottom of a waterfall east of <<3>>.
The spirits of Othrenis have been satisfied. I should be able to find Mavos now. I should speak to Onuja and find Mavos' grave.
Mavos needs me to make contact with the altar to complete the ritual. He's confident the spell will work, but he isn't confident that we'll survive.
I must defend the hall from attacking Goblins.
I summoned the guardians, just as Magister Enuse instructed. Now I should speak with Mavos.
Guar have stampeded and scattered throughout the sulfur pools. They're peaceful creatures, but I'll still need to persuade them to return to their stables.
I've sent a number of guar back to the stables. I should check to make sure they've made it there safely.
<<1>> told me to find the shrine entrance to the base of the monument. It's just a little way north up the road.
Talk to <<1>>.
Now that we've entered the fort, I should speak to <<1>>.
I should report to <<1>>.
I should speak to <<1>>.
I should make my way to Kragenmoor and find someone that can direct me to the House Dres' grandmaster.
I should talk to <<1>>.
A perimeter guard instructed me to speak with <<1>> at the Pact's siege camp.
Garyn doesn't believe <<1>> has the soldiers he needs to hold <<2>>, yet the Covenant is still holding the fort. He's asked me to look for anything odd.
I should enter the ruins to meet <<1>>.
I must collect Graven Caps from around the tombs of Othrenis.
I've collected enough Graven Caps. I must seek out Bala near Mavos' tomb in Othrenis.
Once I find Eanen's tomb, I must use the bit of dust she gave me to raise Eanen's spirit.
To get a guar to return to the stable, I'll need a harness to place on it. Guar harnesses are scattered around the sulfur pools.
I've collected all the harnesses I'll need to secure the guar.
I need to remove the bars keeping the gates closed. That should allow Tanval and Holgunn to lead the Dark Elves and Nords into the fort.

Each of the races in the Pactâ€”Nords, Dark Elves, and Argoniansâ€”have a reason to avoid working with the others. I must seek out a representative of each one, so I can figure out how to unite the factions.
<<1>>, the architect of the racial strife in Ebonheart, has been killed. <<2>> will want to know his town is now free of Covenant agents.
<<1>> might be able to provide me with more details on problems in <<2>>.
I've spoken to <<1>>  about Ebonheart's problems.
I should speak to <<1>> inside the ruins.
I stepped between worlds. <<1>> has instructed me to enter the ruin corridors beneath the fort.
I'm in position. I should open the door for <<1>> and her troops by pulling a nearby lever.
The Orc orders implied some kind of agreement made between the Orcs and their instigators. I should search for this contract.
I should speak to <<1>> once more.
The spellplague has been dispelled, and Keeper Vildras bade me fairwell. I should speak with <<1>> before I leave Heimlyn.

Mudcrabs are common around the shores of the Argonian quarter north of Ebonheart. Their meat is a convenient fertilizer. Ashreed grows in the shallow waters. It would work well as a wrapper for crab meat.
I've collected crab meat and ashreeds. I'm ready to fertilize the Hist sapling. It stands on an island near the center of the Argonian quarter north of Ebonheart.

<<1>> was half-crazed from imbibing Hist sap, but he clearly identified a Dunmer named Rhavil. He was the one who told him about the mind-altering qualities of tree sap. <<2>> appeared angry at this revelation.
Telvanni mages want to soothe those affected by the curse in Heimlyn. <<1>> asked me to collect <<zm:2>> from the <<zm:3>> and <<zm:4>> from the <<zm:5>>.
Field assistants are guarding a few residents of the keep huddled in living quarters. I should talk to them and let the totem's aura affect them. I must convince them to leave.
When the curse was unleashed, a Covenant captain fled to the top of the keep's tower. I should see if she's still there.
I've collected the ingredients needed by the Telvanni. I need to deliver them to <<1>> in the southern part of the keep.
<<1>> has come up with a more effective counter to the curse: a <<2>>. She wants me to create the totem using an artifact called a Daedric Urn.
<<1>> believes the way to cleanse the curse is by summoning and defeating its creators,  <<2>> and <<3>>. I need to open their soul cages to summon and disrupt them.
I must destroy whatever creature or power is fueling the spellplague curse.
I need to disrupt the remaining ritual components to summon the power behind the spellplague.
I must find Ruvali and see if the creature has copied her.
I've fertilized the Hist sapling as best I can. <<1>> asked me to meet her back at her lodge.
While I was gathering the fertilizer for the Hist sapling, the Argonians caught a Dunmer of House Dres trying to reach the tree. <<1>> agreed to let me speak to the mer and find out why he did this.
I've made my way into the cellar. Ulov said the creature, however it looks now, should be here.
I must find Ulov Stormwall to learn why he massacred his troops. Feldsii said he was just up the road from where I met her.
After slaying the soldier's double, a gruesome shape rose from the corpse and fled into the stables. I should chase after it before it finds a new body.
There's a woman standing in the entryway of the stables. I should speak to her. If she can't speak, I'll know the creature has found a new body.
The Khajiiti idol Ruvali used to frighten the creature is in the bedroom of her house. The only house is on the plantation is to the west. I need to fetch that totem.
I found the totem. I must return to Ruvali. I also found her husband's corpse.
Tiril's double is standing in the foyer of Ruvali's house. I must find and warn Ruvali.
I must prove to Ruvali that the creature before us is the monster, not her husband.
I must kill Tiril's double.
<<1>> believes the key to unraveling this magical corruption lies with Keeper Vildras, the guardian of the reliquary. I need to seek him out and find out if he will help us.
Azeenus wants me to burn boats and kill the pirate captain. Captain Sa'dir sleeps in the rigging of his ship, but he will come running if he hears the storm warning bell.
Silent Mire has been avenged. I should find Azeenus by the meditation mound in the village.
A simulacrum of Seeks-the-Night has appeared in front of me. I should speak to it and see what it has to say.
The Ghost Snake doesn't care what the Mabrigash decide, so long as they continue to honor and care for the Vale. I should return to the Farseer now.
I decided that the Mabrigash and the Hlaalu should trade with each other.

I need to use the snake totem to determine Raston's fate. If I give the totem to Raston, he'll be welcome in the Vale. If I burn the totem in the fire, he'll become a servant of the Ghost Snake. Or I can suggest a third option to Bodani.
I decided that the Mabrigash will remain isolated. The merchant will serve Ghost Snake.
Farseer Bodani crafted a totem. She thinks it will help in some way. I need to retrieve it from her tent.
This snake totem has some role in deciding the merchant's fate. I'll give it to the Farseer.
Slips-Through-Fingers dropped her pack and suggested there was something inside that would lead me to a secret meeting place.
Madras doesn't trust me yet, but I've decided to help him. I should speak to him again to find out what our next move is.
Slips-Through-Fingers claims to know where the missing villagers are. A note in her pack suggests that to find her, I need to follow the Star. I should keep my eyes open.
Keeper Vildras and the mages who created the curse are in position. I need to speak with <<1>>.
I can use the <<1>> to travel to the hidden vault.
A cat named Star is supposed to lead me to the secret meeting place. I need to follow the cat and see where she takes me.
I discovered a group of villagers meeting in secret on the lower level of a locked building. One of them is <<1>>. I should speak to her and find out what's going on.
I've been asked to help Slips-Through-Fingers and her friends. They want to rescue the abducted villagers, but they aren't soldiers. They have no idea what they're in for.
I've decided not to aid Madras. He's just going to get his people killed. I should tell one of the guards about this before Madras and his group do something foolish.
I found a guard right outside. I explained what was going on. She doesn't want to see anyone get hurt, so she's devised a plan to disrupt the meeting.
I need to catch rats to disrupt Madras's meeting. I should be able to find rats running around Narsis.
I need to bring these rats to the secret meeting and drop them at the door. Hopefully, that will slow Madras down.
The rats did their job. They disrupted the meeting and caused people to flee the building. I should speak to <<1>> again.
Guard Rila knows where the missing people are being held. She wants me to report back to the kinhouse and meet her there.
I need to seal the vials spewing fumes into the middle and lower chambers. I should also give the potion to any miners I find.
I told <<1>> that his wife was behind the sabotage in the mine.
I can bring any cuttle I collect back to Orona, but I made no promises.
I collected kwama cuttle. I should bring it to Orona.
The blacksmith named <<1>> is waiting for me. I should go speak to him.
I need to find the armory key upstairs, so I can open the weapon crates on the lower level.
I found out all I could. I should return to Varon Davel.
I was unable to grab the weapons for the villagers in time. I need to report back to <<1>> and see what our next step is.
I need to blow the whistle in front of the kinhouse. That will signal the others to distract the guards.
I returned to the kinhouse, but Ralden isn't around. One of his advisors, Varon Davel, wants to speak to me.
Ralden asked me to speak to Giron Sadri, upstairs in the kinhouse. Ralden wants me to do whatever he asks.

Giron believes the Maulborn camped by the lake have something to do with the troubles in Narsis. He asked me to reduce their numbers while searching for anything that links them to the missing villagers or the Llodos Plague.
I found orders that suggest some vile substance was poured into the lake at the waterfall. I should go to the waterfall and look around.
The strange woman named Naryu has appeared again. She wants to speak to me. I should be ready for anything.
I've tried the plan proposed by the Rii brothers. An Argonian named <<1>> tried to get my attention as I finished talking to Furon. I should see what she has to say.
I've bound one of the dead soldiers. I need to lead the soldier's spirit to <<1>>.
<<1>> wants to force the spirits into the great beyond. She's asked me to use the <<2>> on one of the spirits of the battlefield.
I need to tell <<1>> that the <<2>> was able to release the spirit.
I returned to the kinhouse, but Ralden isn't around. One of his advisors, Varon Davel, wants to speak to me.
Naryu says Giron is connected to the Maulborn. Apparently, he's responsible for shipping the Llodos Plague into Narsis. She suggested I return to the kinhouse as soon as possible.
I learned about ruins to the west of Narsis where Giron and the missing villagers might be. I've got a key and just need to find the entrance.
I should tell Varon what I discovered.
I found the entrance to the ruins. Now I need to use the key and get inside.
I'm inside the ruins and the place is crawling with Maulborn. I need to find Giron and put an end to this.
Councilor Ralden and the missing villagers should be here somewhere. I need to make sure they're all right.
Varon and the guards are waiting for me. I should speak to Varon.
The person I helped should be waiting outside. I need to find her so she can tell me where the villagers are being held.
I should investigate what happened here. I'll follow the path of debris that leads to the northeast, away from the main road.
<<1>> said they'd captured a raider wearing the insignia of House Dres. The lieutenant is concerned about Dark Elf house politics and asked me to speak to the captive.
Defender Maera saw a well-dressed Dark Elf head into the Mzithumz ruins with the Dwarven control rod. It has to be Ithis Omalor, scion of House Dres. She asked me to enter the ruins and find him.
I found Ithis Omalor. I should confront him about his complicity in the caravan attack.

I interrogated Ithis Omalor and learned that Magistrix Vox sent him to attack the Hlaalu caravan. I refused to grant him leniency for his crimes and sent him running to his death in the depths of Mzithumz.
I accompanied Ithis Omalor out of the Dwarven ruins of Mzithumz. I should speak with Guard Maera.
To prove the rest of the Pact can fight, <<1>>, the leader of the sawyers, expects me to defeat three of his men in single combat â€¦ while drunk on Nord mead.
<<1>> still has more to say.
The Nords won't accept my challenge unless I'm obviously drunk with mead. There's a keg of mead near <<1>>.
I pummeled several Nords. I should return to <<1>> to see if he's suitably impressed.

Caravan Master Girano is concerned about his employer's cargo. He wants me to recover the stolen cargo and its manifest from the raiders. The cargo is in crates and a Dres leader should have the manifest. I should find both to the north.
I recovered Girano's cargo and manifest. I should return both to him.
<<1>> has a plan to bind the spirits in service. I need to use the <<z:2>> on a weakened spirit, so I can test the method out.
I should kill any Goblins or spiders I encounter around <<1>>.
The Nords won't accept my challenge unless I'm obviously drunk on mead. Fortunately, I have a <<z:1>>.
<<1>> plans to kill the Goblin Warlord. I should find him deeper in the cave and offer my help.
The General claims Ragna Stormcrag is a Nord spy. There's something strange going on here, but I'll find Ragna and see what she has to say.
I should present myself to House General Gavryn Redoran. He should be in the main keep.
Ragna Stormcrag doesn't look like a spy to me. I should talk to her.
The General's bodyguard, Ragna Stormcrag, believes the General is behaving strangely. She wants me to go to the lower level of the keep and convince the guard to let me search the General's quarters.
I should tell Ragna about this new retainer and the meeting at the ruins by the river.

<<1>> needs someone to pray at three shrines surrounding Ebonheart, one for each leader of the Tribunal. He's hoping for a message from the gods, but expects only silence, and he's unwilling to face that himself.
I've told <<1>> about the messages the Tribunal gave me. He found that encouraging.
If Ulov is correct, the monster killed the soldier whose body it copied. I should look in the cellar for the original body.
I must travel to Fort Virak. I need to help Pact soldiers retake it.

As I was warned, all three shrines were troubled by ravenous alits. However, that had nothing to do with disapproval by the Tribunal. They were drawn by piles of offal left near each shrine. I should return to <<1>> with this news.
I'm giving this thing to Markiel!
I located the cave. Now I need to find the captured Hlaalu scouts.

One document in the General's quarters indicates that he intends to execute Captain Valec Doronil. A second mentions that he has appointed an unnamed personal retainer to the mess tent. I should look into both of these leads.
The guard agreed to let me look around. I need to check the General's quarters for anything suspicious.
It seems <<1>> made a deal with the Thalmor, the military force of the Dominion in Shadowfen. <<2>> should hear about this immediately.
I should find out what the Dark Elf was doing in this dangerous town. Perhaps I could find out how he ended up in the stocks.
I need to get this "leader's" attention by roughing up some of her pirates. <<1>> said I could find them drinking in the town's bar, in the hold of a beached ship.
I won the right to speak to <<1>>, the leader of <<2>>. Her thugs said she would be in the captain's quarters of the beached ship, on the main deck.
I need to speak to the contact One-Eye found. I should see what he knows about the new Khajiit pirate in <<1>>. He should be waiting on the main deck of the beached ship.

I learned the name of this Khajiit pirate leader: it's <<1>>. <<2>> told me one of her pirates would be meeting with a Dominion contact in the warehouse very soon. I should hurry there and find a suitable hiding place.
<<1>> has made a deal with the Thalmor, the military force of the Dominion in Shadowfen. <<2>> should hear about this immediately.
The person I'm looking for is called "One-Eye." I won't be able to gain an audience with her without some violence.
The warehouse probably has some crates I could hide in while listening to the meeting.
I defeated my opponent and completed the Trial of the Fang. I should speak to <<1>>.
I awakened Hissmir's Zaht stones. I should inform <<1>> that Hissmir doesn't need to fear Dominion reprisals.
I recovered the stolen relics. I should return them to <<1>>.
I slew the killers of the missing pilgrims. I should tell <<1>> of their fate.
To complete the Trial of the Fang, I need to defeat a Hissmir warrior while under the influence of <<1>>.
To complete the Trial of the Mind, I must understand which elements of Argonian history match up. Three Argonian texts should provide clues.
I need to speak with <<1>> to discuss my performance in the Trial of the Heart. I can find him southeast of the pyramid.
I've completed the Trial of the Mind. I should speak with <<1>> about the next trial.

The Maulborn plan to ship crates of Llodos Plague into Mournhold and infect the whole city. Scout Mamyne suggested I kill Maulborn cultists in the camp to get forged manifests. That should slow them down.
I volunteered to locate the Hlaalu scouting party and find out what's going on in the gorge.

I persuaded the races in Ebonheart to work together and defend the town. It seems each had some contact with a manipulative Dark Elf named <<1>>. <<2>> will certainly want to hear about his activities.

<<1>> asked me to investigate <<2>>. He has a house in town. He'd like me to wait outside and follow Rhavil when he leaves. Drathus cast a spell that will allow him to see what I see and communicate instructions to me.
Rhavil has left his house. I should follow him, but I must be careful not to get too close.
Rhavil entered a shack by the docks. Drathus asked me to wait until he leaves so we can investigate.
Rhavil has left. Drathus asked me to enter the shack and investigate.
Drathus wants me to return to Rhavil Urano's house look for more evidence. His house is in the southwest quarter of the city, near the Tribunal Temple. He probably won't come quietly.
I could also just buy the items from Donkey

Neposh is the only slave at the mine who managed to stay out of the Daedra's clutches. He has a plan to free people taken to Oblivion. He suggested I recovered firesap gel, an Argonian mixture confiscated by the Dark Elves.
Last-to-Water has escaped from Oblivion. I should speak again with Neposh.
The entrance to the ruins is down by the river, beyond the north gate of the fortress. I need to head there and enter the crypts.
Now that I'm inside the ruins, I should see if I can find Durel Gilveni, the General's retainer. The Maulborn have infiltrated this area, so I need to be careful.
The retainer turned out to be a Maulborn agent. He claims General Gavryn has been killed. I need to find proof of the General's death in the crypts below.
I informed Captain Valec about what I found in the ruins beneath Tal'Deic Fortress. I should see if he needs anything else from me.
I'm giving Markiel the sleezle.
I challenged members of the corrupt Redoran Sentinels and defeated them in combat. I should tell Commander Taldyn what happened.
I recovered the <<z:1>>. I should return it to <<2>>.
I gathered the shipping manifests. That should delay the shipment. I need to return to <<1>> to discuss our next move.
I recovered the firesap from a slaver's sack. Neposh hopes that pouring the firesap onto Oblivion's crystals should cause them to crack. That might return his people home.
I should check in with <<1>>. He's probably in the area where the Fighters and Mages Guilds are in Stormhold.
<<1>> asked me to speak to the families of the murder victims. I have to find out about Arilin Maralvel, Eroni Omobar, and Naldyn Indalor. If I need help, I should ask <<1>> for more information.

Now that I've spoken to the people on <<1>>'s list, I should enter the mortuary so I can examine the bodies. <<2>> gave me a key to get inside. He said I can find the mortuary on the outskirts of Stormhold.
After examining the bodies, I heard a woman say she has a message for me in the mortuary. I should find out what she wants.

<<1>> approached me in the mortuary. She asked me to meet <<2>> at his home. <<2>> swears he saw his wife, Eroni.\n\n<<1>> said I can find <<2>> on the east side of Stormhold, and she urged me to hurry. She believes Gethis may be in danger.
<<1>> told me the woman who attacked him may still be in his home. I should go inside and see what I can find.
I returned to <<1>>, but he wasn't there. I should speak to <<2>>. She seems eager to speak to me.

I discovered a dead Shadowscale scout inside <<1>>'s home. The scout had a journal claiming the Shadowscales aren't responsible for Eroni's death.\n\nI should bring the journal to <<2>>. He's probably still by the guildhall in Stormhold.

I'm in the ruined corridors beneath Fort Virak. I must avoid ghosts prowling the "otherworld" while making my way to the area exit. I should be able to leave the ghost-infested corridors through the far broken wall.
Scout Mamyne asked me to head to the cave and look for the rest of the scouting party. She plans to report to Captain Diiril. I should see what's going on in that cave.
The Trial of the Heart requires that I travel quickly to several points on my map. I must travel to the first waypoint.
The Trial of the Heart requires that I travel quickly to several points on my map. I must travel to the second waypoint.
The Trial of the Heart requires that I travel quickly to several points on my map. I must travel to the third waypoint.
<<1>> revealed they have a spy named <<2>> investigating recent crimes. She asked me to go to his home on the west side of Stormhold, so I can find out what sort of information he's gathered.
I entered Listens-to-Water's home and found him dead. I should search the room for any sign of the reports he was keeping for <<1>>.
I should go to the Ayleid entrance described in Listens-to-Water's report, so I can investigate. The report said the entrance is on the west side of the ruins in Stormhold.
Now that I've entered the ruins, I should investigate them to see what I can find.
While I was investigating the ruins, I heard the voice of <<1>> calling out to me. I should rescue him.
Now that I've released all the prisoners, I should find <<1>> outside the ruins.
After I rescued <<1>>, he asked me to continue through the ruins. He asked me to release people who have been kidnapped.
<<1>> said cultists raided the village last night, but guards tricked three of their lieutenants within their cellars. I agreed to convince the Worm Cultists to surrender.
He asked me to convince some of the mercenaries around Stormhold to leave. <<1>> said he didn't care how I did it.
Not as many mercenaries patrol Stormhold. I should return to <<1>> and deliver the news.
<<1>> wasn't at his stall, but there's a Nord standing nearby. Perhaps she knows where he went.

I met an injured Pact soldier on the road from Vivec's Antlers. The Covenant has invaded the area, and the Pact is heavily outnumbered. The soldier asked me to speak to his superior, Captain Noris, in a camp by the north sea.
None of the Worm Cult lieutenants would surrender. I should inform <<1>>.

<<1>> said that an Argonian named <<2>> may know more about the Brother of Strife, the Coral Heart, and Alexandra Conele's plans to acquire it. She may also be able to tell me more about what's happening in Vivec's Antlers.
I need to find <<1>> and tell her what I've learned.
I should talk to <<1>> about the Vanguard.
I should return to <<1>>.
