I have a book of Skald's drinking songs. I should check to see if it's autographed.

To prove Thorulf is a traitor, I must retrieve Thane Unvald's ancient sword, Bonebane, from the battle memorial southeast of Fullhelm Fort.\n\nThorulf claimed the blade was destroyed. Returning it intact will prove him a liar.
When I mentioned that Mininque wanted more than a book of drinking songs, Skullsplitter started talking suspiciously about a "darker" book of sonnets. I should investigate and read it.
I've delivered the altered letter to the Gold Coast captain. I should see what the Baandari's plans are next.
I've entered a strange cavern full of mushrooms and monsters. I should try to find <<1>> as soon as I can.
It seems I need to find mushroom spores in order to make the potion needed to return <<1>> to sanity. I should search the cavern for those mushrooms and collect them.
<<1>> seems to be more lucid. I should speak to him.
I should be able to dispel <<1>> using the <<2>>. Time to make use of it.
I've met <<1>> at Fallowstone Hall. Time to give her the <<2>>.
I freed the members of Queen Ayrenn's entourage. All that's left now is to find and confront the mad Mage <<1>>.
I need to find the cave where the Daedra is hiding.
Outside the cave, I found a wounded woman near the body of a dead mage. I should speak to her.
<<1>> teleported to me once I finished with the monoliths. I should speak to him.
I made my way into the cave and caught sight of Hendil running down a corridor. I should follow him to see what he can tell me.
I have an autographed book for Mininque. She said she wanted a second one. I might as well ask.
I came across Nelulin, Velatosse's son. I should talk to him to see if he's all right.
Nelulin is weak, but not sick. He asked me to follow Hendil and Amuur further down the corridor to see why they put him in quarantine.
Hendil has sent Amuur to stop me. I need to take him down.
Hendil is still somewhere out there in the mine. I have to find him.
Hendil's son is a vampire! The alchemist has been feeding his fellow villagers to the beast as he worked to find a cure. There's only one choice: Tancano has to die.
I must confront Hendil.
Hendil has surrendered, but can't face the villagers outside. I left him tied up in the mine for the time being. I should return to the surface.
There's a woman here, dressed in finery. A member of the Queen's entourage? I should speak with her.
Eminelya's directed me through a cave and into a hidden Vale. She believes the mage has taken her companions there.
I need to talk to Captain Viveka now.

<<1>> is afraid to return to the village. She said she was bitten, but wouldn't say by what. She blames a nearby spring for what happened to the Tanglehaven militia. I should follow her there and see what she means.

A spirit at Hircine's shrine said <<1>> "took the gift willingly." It said she was lost, but that she could save <<2>> from the same fate with her "sire's heartblood."\n\nI should speak to <<1>> and find out exactly what it meant.

<<1>> turned into a werewolf! Just before her transformation, she confessed that her father's plan for revenge against the Drublog led her to agree to accept Hircine's gift. She fears <<2>> is in danger and asked me to find her.

<<1>> is unwell. As <<2>> feared, her mother was bitten by <<3>>. If nothing is done, the treethane will become a werewolf as well.\n\nNow that <<2>> has regained control of herself, I should speak with her and see what must be done.

In order to save her mother from becoming a werewolf, <<1>> must recover the "heartblood" of her own father. This can only end in <<2>>'s death.\n\n<<1>> asked me to help defeat him, as she fears she won't be able to do it alone.
<<1>> brought her father's heartblood to <<2>>. I should speak with her and see if we arrived in time.
<<1>> brought her father's heartblood to <<2>>. I should speak with her and see if we arrived in time.
Another forest spirit has appeared nearby. I should follow it.
When Anenwen spoke to <<1>>, he claimed his intentions were noble. I should speak to <<2>>. Perhaps I can influence what will happen to the misguided mage.
I spoke to <<1>> and told her that <<2>> was just trying to help. I should speak to him for my reward.
<<1>>'s sent me to meet his assistant, and finish the plan we're set in motion.
I agreed to head to Pinepeak and help the researchers.
Now that the Daedric leader is dead, the animals should return to normal. I need to confront <<1>> back in town about <<2>>'s accusations.
I have to protect the scout so he can lead me to the cultists.
I should talk to <<1>> to let her know that we've stopped the cultists.
Talking to <<1>> was singularly unhelpful, but he seemed to say I could create a potion that would snap him out of his enthrallment. I should search <<2>>'s to see if I can find anything useful.
I tipped off Bronorr to Bar-Neeus's contraband. Now to watch him get arrested.
The guard suggested <<1>> might have been kidnapped by the Houndsmen. I should talk to <<2>> and see what she can tell me.
I need to search Hendil's home for some evidence of foul play.
I need to search Hendil's home for some evidence of foul play.
I've slain <<1>>. I have the sad duty to inform his daughter.
A magical projection has appeared, taunting me. This must be the mad mage. I should speak to him.
I spooked Rhavil. I need to leave the area around his house before he'll leave it again.
As expected, <<1>> agreed to transport <<2>> for a share of the treasure. Now to get the treasure from <<2>>.
<<1>>'s in no shape to fight the Maormer, so he gave me the location of his buried treasure. I just need to recover it from caves around Horseshoe Island.
Though <<1>> seems to believe his junk is treasure, I'm not sure <<2>> will stick to the original deal, especially since his only share will be some fish bones.
<<1>> refused to take <<2>> to Island. I should let him know the bad news.
The teleportation scroll has seen <<1>> free of this madness. I should leave her realm of rage.
I used the telport scroll to evacuate Merion. I should leave the area.
I managed to evacuate <<1>> with the teleportation scroll. I need to leave <<2>> as soon as I can.
I should search the farm and mill for clues as to what happened here.
Raerana asked me to seek out her uncle, Wilrek Snow-Shod, at the Withered Tree tavern in Riften. He may reward me for saving his niece.
I should look inside the farmhouse for clues.
I found a letter addressed to Raerana hidden between the pages of a book. Its contents could shed some light on the murders.
The letter appears to be from Raerana's secret lover, Rilyn. He mentions a meeting place. I should ask Raerana about this.
Raerana revealed the location of the cave where she and Rilyn meet. I should go there to see if I can find him.
I refused to help Rilyn cover up his crime. It looks like he ran toward Frostmoon Farmstead. I need to follow him there.
Rilyn is clearly mad. He murdered the others and now has plans on Raerana. I need to end this.
A bystander saw some hooligans steal an old man's cane. He asked me to go help him.
I need to investigate the valley in hopes of discovering some clue as to the strange events that occurred here recently.
At the center of the valley sits a giant menhir. Lightning struck the stone as I approached, and the projection of an Altmer appeared. I should speak to her to see if I can learn more.
As I approached the stone of the menhir, the projection of a female Altmer appeared. She needs my help to recover the Walking City. I'll search the valley's cave for the source of the projection.

According to <<1>>, there are portals, or "tears to Oblivion," located near the standing stones surrounding the great menhir in the valley. I can close them simply by touching them; quickly, before the Daedra stop me.

Daedra emerged from the portal to defend the Oblivion tears, but I  succeeded in closing the portals. Now, I need to meet <<1>> in the cave to complete the ritual that she says will save the Walking City.
The portal <<1>> opened brought forth a Daedroth! I need to kill it to save our lives, let alone Falinesti.

Falinesti Summer Site still contains open portals from Oblivion, but the largest one is shut. Whether Falinesti is actually in Oblivion is anyone's guess. I should bid farewell to <<1>> and let her get on with her work.
Once I'm disguised as a Reachman, I can more easily look around their camp.
Rilyn has gone to the farmstead. I think Raerana is in danger. I need to protect her.
I should talk to <<1>>.
Now that Rilyn is dead, Raerana should be safe. I should check on her outside.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I have to defend the scout so she can lead me to the ritual site.
With the Worm Cult taken care of, I should find <<1>>.
I need to speak with Raz so that we can plan our next move.
I should speak with Raz once more to end our business in Mathiisen.
I need to board the Covenant ship and find the defecting officer.
I've reunited Lakhazga with her husband, Moroth. Time to speak once more with Lakhazga.
The chests buried around Horseshoe Island were filled with garbage. I should tell <<1>> the bad news.
I should speak to Advisor Norion in the west warehouse.
I should speak to Watch Captain Astanya at the docks.
I should speak to Steward Eminwe in one of the warehouses to the east.
I should look for the plans inside the warehouse.
I should search for evidence of sabotage in the nearby storage areas.
I need to seek out Advisor Norion by the south end of the docks.
I should enter the warehouse and search for the stolen plans.
I need to seek out Steward Eminwe at a warehouse on the north end of the docks.
I should examine the nearby storage sheds for evidence of sabotage.
I found the plans Advisor Norion spoke of. I should report back to him outside of the warehouse.
I discovered some suspicious salted meats, possibly poisoned. I should return to Steward Eminwe back at the warehouse.
I found the plans Advisor Norion spoke of. I should report back to him outside of the warehouse.
I discovered some suspicious salted meats, possibly poisoned. I should return to Steward Eminwe back at the warehouse.
Watch Captain Astanya has, somewhat rudely, directed me to speak with Watchman Heldil.
I've encountered the Companion warrior <<1>> in the depths of the ruin. He suggested I read the <<2>> to see if there's a clue to the door puzzle.
Raz is worried about being recognized in Mathiisen. He's asked me to meet with one of his agents, Fistalle.
The note on Fistalle's body mentioned the forgemaster. Raz requested I search the forge for additional information.
Malanie appears to lead the Heritance in Mathiisen. I should report this to Raz.
I've joined up with the Orc officer, Lakhazga. She believes the Covenant's first move will have been to set up artillery. We need to destroy the artillery before we head to the lighthouse.
We're inside. I need to find and defeat <<1>>.
Lakhazga and I have done what we can. We should fight our way up to the North Beacon Lighthouse and find her husband.
I should head inside and speak to this criminal.
I've shown up in an unfamiliar place. The Prophet has appeared as a shade; I should speak with him and see where I must go next.
It's done. The Divines have showed me the depths to which Estre has fallen. I should speak to Colaste one last time.
I have all the relics. I'm sure Nenaron will want to know right away.
I should speak to Watchman Heldil.
I need to discover if Fasion's claims are true. I should confront the captain near the manor house.
This is it! If I can foil Captain Astanya's plan, that should keep the Queen safe for another day.
Time to report back to Queen Ayrenn.
I need to give my answer to the Queen about her generous offer.
We made it into the temple. Now to look around and see what's happening in here.
I found Watch Captain Astanya. Time to get to the bottom of this.
Well, that didn't go well. I woke up in a jail cell and Razum-dar is standing outside my cell. I should speak with him.
Lakhazga wants to find the commander of the Covenant forces. She thinks he can be found in the barracks at North Beacon.
Now that I've killed Kerelia Lucullus, I should talk to <<1>>.
To end this plague of dead giants, I need to head to the dais and defeat the Worm Cult Spirithealer.
There are several shrines scattered across Torinaan. All of them will have to be cleansed for the Daedric corruption to leave the site.
The spirits seems to know that the central shrine is the source of the ongoing corruption. I'll be able to end it here.
Colaste ran in just as I defeated the Daedra. She wants to speak to me.
I should watch for this sign Colaste mentioned.
Picking up the axe shard has summoned Ysgramor. I need to speak with him.
Looks like my work here is done. I should speak to the watchman one more time.
<<1>> cannot find a way past the main barricade, and can't fight through the haunted crypts herself.
Fistalle is dead. Perhaps she left behind some information that might be of use to Razum-dar.
I must speak with Defender Two-Blades
I made it into the temple district. Now I need to seek out Battlereeve Urcelmo and the Queen and report what I've learned.
I should allow Battlereeve Urcelmo and Queen Ayrenn to consult.
I uncovered evidence implicating Condalin the Forgemaster. I should report this information to Razum-dar.
Razum-dar suspects that the Canonreeve of Mathiisen may be the other rat mentioned in Fistalle's note. He wants me to sneak into the Reeve's home.
I should follow Battlereeve Urcelmo into the temple.
Razum-dar has asked me to trust him, and do something seemingly foolish. I'm to openly accuse Malanie of treason in front of her men. I'll need to enter the barracks first.
I need to confront Malanie about her involvement with the Veiled Heritance. And hope Raz keeps up his end of the deal.
I woke in a cell under the barracks. Raz, as promised, waits for me outside.
Raz has tasked me with taking on the Forgemaster, Condalin, on my own. I need to leave the barracks and seek him out.
I must find Condalin and destroy him.
I need to find Raz, so that together we might put an end to this treacherous Heirtance cell once and for all.
This is it. Raz and I are going to kill Malanie and put an end to the cell here in Mathiisen.
We've done it. Malanie and Condalin are dead. I should speak again with Raz outside the forge area.

<<1>> asked for my help following through with their plans. If I can take commanders from the Gold Coast mercenaries out and blame it on the werewolves, their forces will be severely weakened, and focused on the remaing werewolves.
I found and killed Varnedo. I need to meet Gorgath in Riften to get paid.
The captain knows something is amiss. I should talk to <<1>> to find out what he wants to do.
Once in Ivarstead, I should check out the Horker's Tusk Tavern. Varnedo might be there or someone might know where he is.
The barkeep Adla claims she saw a Redguard speaking with Akvid Gray-Sky. I should talk to Akvid.
Akvid said Varnedo may be down by the river to the north. It's the only lead I have right now.

I volunteered to help find the crew. She said Tanamo favors the tavern, Anala may be at the Fighters Guild, and Balithil is somewhere in the marketplace. Once I speak to them, I should see if they know where Degail is.
I received a tip that <<1>> could be found near the western shore. I'll look for her there.
I need to travel to Fort Greenwall to try to recover <<1>> from the bandits there.
Now that I have <<1>>, I should return it to Sage Svari at Fallowstone Hall.
I must recover <<1>> from Faldar's Tooth.
Now I need to return <<1>> to Sage Svari at Fallowstone Hall.
I've taken the Obsidian Husk from the Spider Cult. I should return to Defender Two-Blades.

I should enter the barrow and search for clues as to what the Worm Cult is planning in relation to the spirit of Valdurâ€”one of Ysgramor's legendary Five Hundred Companions who is believed to have been entombed here.
Arfanel asked me to rescue wounded Dominion troops and investigate one of the supply buildings near North Beacon.
I need to talk to <<1>>.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I need to defend the scout and get him to the ritual site.
I should talk to <<1>> to let her know it's over.
Watchman Heldil has moved in behind me to arrest Fasion.

Razum-dar indicated that I need to slip past the manor guards in order to get close to the Queen. He suggested I speak to one of his connections, Eshaba, in the market. I need to ask her about a souvenir of the First Auridon Marines.
Once all three lost celebrators are reunited, they will exit the Hall of the Dead on their own.
Only <<1>> is still missing.
<<1>> was found.
<<1>> was found.
<<1>> was found.
Nenaron wants me to find and remove relics from the coffers scattered around Torinaan. He cautioned me to beware the guardians that protect the treasures.
To complete the Trial of the Fang, I need to defeat a Hissmir warrior while under the influence of <<1>>.
Only <<1>> is still missing.
Only <<1>> is still missing.
I summoned Khralek with the help of the Dark Elf spirits. Now it's time to slay him.
I have slain Khralek gro-Vortag. I should return to Idrasa and tell her this.
I must talk to <<1>> again. The portal she opened will allow more Daedra to enter. She needs to realize this is no way to save Falinesti.
Malsia sought to open a portal to the Aetherius. It looks like she succeeded but the portal collapsed on her. Turning the skystones might reopen the portal, enabling her to return.
Malsia is back. I should speak to her.
Now that I've brought back the plant, I should tell <<1>> the good news. <<2>> says she's on the balcony of the Pilgrim's Rest Inn.
A pilgrim is  dying in Ivarstead. A healer named <<1>> thinks she can save him with a rare plant called <<2>> that grows along the steps to the Throat of the World. I should try to track one down.
Once all three lost celebrators are reunited, they will exit the Hall of the Dead on their own.
Once all three lost celebrators are reunited, they will exit the Hall of the Dead on their own.
I need to enter the ruins to begin my search for Kireth Vanos.
The fiercest of the beasts plaguing Nilwen is <<1>>. It makes its lair in a fallen tree south of Nilwen's shack.
Hmm. <<1>> wasn't as fierce as I'd been led to believe. I need to talk to Nilwen to clear this up.
Nilwen asked me to kill a beast called Greatclaw. She claims it killed a man by dropping a tree on him.\n\nShould I look for Greatclaw or report Nilwen in Ivarstead for squatting?
Once again, no great beast. Not sure what Nilwen's game is, but I'm going to find out.
Nilwen insists Cracktooth, a "fierce Goblin," will kill her if I don't intervene.\n\nNot sure if I should seek out Cracktooth or report Nilwen in Ivarstead.
Cracktooth turned out to be a giant. I'm going to wring the truth out of Nilwen this time.
Time to confront Nilwen and claim my reward, if there is one.
I'll talk to Constable Gerrunn to see if he knows about Nilwen.
I've found the rare <<1>> and need to deliver it to <<2>> at the Pilgrim's Rest Inn before it's too late.
I should speak to Telenger at the main camp.
I should now report back to Watch Captain Astanya. She asked me to report to her at the town's upper level.
The watchman wants me to speak with the criminal he has cornered in the house.
Odunn asked me to give this batch of glowflies to his son, Ulfslod, at the dock.
Giruss is in one of the warehouses below the docks of Riften. I should speak to him.
Lodorr's spirit has manifested in the tomb.
Giruss's map pointed to a location North of Riften. I should head there to find Malsia and the stolen artifacts.
I should read Malsia's journal. It might tell me what she intended to do with the artifacts.
The farmer suggests I scatter the hay to drive out the bugs, then catch them for use as fishing bait.
The assassin's note was signed by someone named Giruss. I should go to the docks in Riften and look for him.
I should talk to Giruss.
I gathered the glowflies from the hay. I should let <<1>> know.
Razum-dar mentioned he'd meet me behind Fistalle's house. I should bring him the information I found on Fistalle's body.
<<1>> asked me to help her locate Lodorr's tomb.
<<1>> exploded from his sarcophagus, ready for a fight. <<2>> is unconscious.
<<1>> has revealed herself as an enemy. She must be defeated.
<<1>> is missing. <<2>> suspects a draugr named <<3>> holds it.
I should speak to Watch Captain Astanya at the docks.
<<1>> has been defeated. <<2>> is not celebrating.
<<1>> has been recovered. I should deliver it to <<2>>.
I should try to find <<1>> first.
I should find <<1>>.
I should read <<1>>.
I should read <<1>>.
I should kill <<1>>.
I should gather <<1>>.
<<1>> is still in the shrine to Mauloch and may be wounded. <<2>> asked me to help him.
I'll bring the staff to Fallowstone Hall and see if they know where it belongs.
Cold Cave is kept that way by a dangerous frost atronach inside. At a loss for how to control the creature, <<1>> asked me to eliminate it.
The stone was destroyed. I should speak to <<1>> and see what this means for her.
Now that I've entered the south ruins, I should look for Rolancano's daughter, Palith.
I entered the north ruins. I should find Eranamo, Palith's brother, and speak to him.
Now that we've entered the lower deck of the Tribunal's Spear, we can recover the information.
Eranamo asked to speak with me. I should see what he has to say.
Eranamo asked me to deliver the information to <<1>>. I'll need to leave through the cave on the southwest side of the cove to get to him.
I should watch as Rolancano and his son reunite.
<<1>> wasn't happy to see his son and threatened his life. His daughter asked me to intervene.
Now that Eranamo is dead, I should speak to <<1>>.
Now that Eranamo is gone, I should speak to <<1>>.
There are some Covenant uniforms in a supply building near North Beacon. Arfanel wants me to grab them.
With the help of an ancestor spirit, I've cleansed the shrines of Torinaan. A voice directed me to the center of Torinaan to put an end to the site's corruption.
Colaste claims that the Divines have something more to show me. I should follow her.

Falinesti Summer Site still contains open portals from Oblivion, but the largest one is shut. Whether Falinesti is actually in Oblivion is anyone's guess. I hope I can still talk somes sense into <<1>>.
I should report back to Baham outside of Saltspray Cave.
Vila Theran, the leader of the local Spider Cult, has appeared. I should defeat her before she does the same to me.
I killed the monster. I should speak to <<1>> again.
I should watch and listen as Anenwen confronts Merormo about what happened here.
Razum-dar wants me to meet him at the royal manse.
A Skywatch noble wants to speak to me about something or another.
The Skywatch noble claims to know where I can find Razum-dar. I should follow him.
The Skywatch noble transformed into Razum-dar. Something must be going on here. I should speak to Razum-dar and find out more.
Raz told me about a tavern where the Veiled Heritance has been recruiting new members. I should use his disguise and head there.
I've got the blade I need to prove myself to Palomir. Now to return to the recruiter.
I passed my first test with the Heritance. I need to talk to Palomir once more to continue my initiation.
I must tell <<1>> who I left behind.
All three officers are dead. Hopefully <<1>> made it to her reinforcements.
<<1>> informed me her brother is here, as well. She asked me to find him. She said he was taken to another set of ruins to the north.
I agreed to find Rolancano's daughter, Palith. She should be somewhere in the ruins beyond the nearby cave.
Our work here is done. We need to get out of the ship.
Eranamo gave me a uniform to help slip past the guards outside. We need to get to the Pact ship, enter it, and find the information he gave his allies.
Baham told me to begin my investigation by talking to Tanion, the headmaster of the college. I imagine I could also ask Baham some follow-up questions as well.
After observing the classes, Tanion asked that I also spar with some of his proctors outside the school building.
Tanion asked that I observe two classes within the college's main school building.
Baham came running up, saying she could show me the real version of the college.
I collected kwama cuttle. I should bring it to Orona.
Baham tells me that students at the college aren't treated after they're beaten. She asked me to get some bandages from a student named Nurad and distribute them.
I distributed the bandages and healing supplies Nurad gave me. Time to speak to Baham again.
The ghostly woman was taken to the ruined tower. I should search the tower and see what I can discover there.
Claudie's ghost has appeared nearby. I should speak to her.
I defeated the Daedra and broke the curse. I should tell Athel Baelborne what happened.
Baham reports that the instructors took her friend Ilara. She wants me to talk to the Baandari trader, Zaban, about arming the students while she gathers aid to take back the school.
Baham came running up with some of her fellow students. I should speak to her again.
Baham asked that I rescue Ilara from the Saltspray Cave. I should go there.
I need to fight my way through Saltspray Cave in order to find and save Ilara.
I defeated Tanion and saved Ilara. I should talk to her to make sure she's all right.
Ilara is safe. I should leave Saltspray Cave and report back to Baham.
Athel ran off when his guards attacked me. I should find out what happened to him.
I'm inside the tavern. Now I need to find the Heritance recruiter.
To prove I'm really interested in joining the Veil, I've been asked to obtain a sword from a Royal Guard.
Gorak's commanding officer, Captain Vistra, asked me to keep an eye out for the missing recruit.
Recruit Gorak needs my help to recover the General's dispatch. The Bloodthorn cultists must have stashed it somewhere in their camp.
We recovered the General's dispatch from the Bloodthorn cultist camp. I should head back to Aldcroft now.
As soon as we got back to Aldcroft, Recruit Gorak ran off to deliver the General's dispatch to Captain Vistra. I should check in with her and see if Gorak made it there in one piece.
As soon as we got back to Aldcroft, Recruit Gorak ran off to deliver the General's dispatch to Captain Vistra. I should check in with her and see if Gorak made it there in one piece.
As soon as we got back to Aldcroft, Recruit Gorak ran off to deliver the General's dispatch to Captain Vistra. I should check in with her and see if Gorak made it there in one piece.
I completed my final trial. I should talk to Alandare and find out what happens next.
An assassin told me that I was too late. That Verrik was already on his way to Daggerfall Castle. I need to go to the castle and stop him from assassinating King Casimir.
I'm inside Daggerfall Castle. I need to find King Casimir before Verrik does.
Verrik intends to kill King Casimir of Daggerfall. I need to stop him.
Verrik is dead and King Casimir is safe. I should speak to King Casimir.
I've managed to escape the immediate danger in Elden Hollow. I should talk to the surviving Mages Guild member, <<1>>.
Canonreeve Oraneth has raised an altar up ahead. I should clear a path through the Wood Orcs protecting it so that Bakkhara and her mages can disable it.
Raz may have more information on the situation at hand.
<<1>> and her Mages Guild allies have arrived to dismantle the altar.
I should clear a path through the Wood Orcs to the next altar so that Bakkhara and her mages can render it useless.
Harassed by unhappy customers, <<1>> is at his wit's end. If I convince them to leave, he said he would tell me the way into Belarata.
I should speak with <<1>> and see if there is any truth to his claims.
Some of <<1>>'s wares seem quite dangerous. I should speak with him about gaining access to the ruin.
<<1>> will show me the way into the ruin.
<<1>> has been taken through a barrier into the depths of Belarata. I should look for a way to follow him, by whatever means necessary.
The spirit haunting Belarata is no more. I should speak with <<1>>.
The spirits haunting Belarata have been put to rest. I should speak with <<1>>.
I need to talk to <<1>>
It worked. I have been recruited into the Veiled Heritance. Now for a toast.

I need to find the interrogation transcripts of the captured Pact soldiers in order to discern the traitor among them. Once I've done that, I should free two of the soldiers and leave the traitor to die.
I must tell <<1>> who I left behind.
I must tell <<1>> who I left behind.
I've found <<1>>. I should speak with her.
I need to place the <<1>>s in their proper sconces to activate the Aldmeri device.
The device has been activated. Time to turn it loose on the Maormer.
Recruit Gorak got himself lost again. I should look for him at the Bloodthorn cultist's camp.
<<1>> may be the only person alive that knows how to activate the device. I need to find her.
Tamien asked me to speak to Dame Clarique and convince her to free him so he can rescue the villagers.
I entered Tamien's family home. Now I need to figure out how to cast Merien's White Mask spell to conceal the rescued villagers.
As I completed Merien's spell, a projection of the mage appeared before me. I should speak to him and find out what's going on.
Merien Sellan outlined a plan to stop the Bloodthorn. I should speak to his son, Tamien Sellan, and get his thoughts.
Tamien Sellan wants to stage a rescue rather than let Merien sacrifice himself to stop the Bloodthorn rituals. I agreed to help. Tamien asked that I meet him at one of the houses in the village.
While Tamien attempts to rescue his father, I decided to make sure the Bloodthorn cultists are stopped. I need to head to the docks and burn the Bloodthorn boats.
Tamien Sellan asked me to speak with Dame Clarique while he buries his father. She'll want to hear about the victory over the Bloodthorn.
I cut off the Bloodthorn escape route and made sure they can't transport any more zombies. I should return to the Sellan family home and find out if Tamien rescued his father.
I returned to the Sellan family home. Tamien is inside, beside his father's body. I should speak with him.
I entered the house that the Bloodthorn are using. Tamien hasn't arrived yet, but I should locate the portal to the pocket plane and find Merien.
I entered the pocket plane of Oblivion used by the Bloodthorns as a prison for Merien Sellan. I should find Merien and set him free.
The shade of Lord Velian guards Merien Sellan. I need to eliminate Lord Velian to free Merien Sellan.
I freed Merien Sellan from Lord Velian's torturous imprisonment. I should speak to Merien.
I should use the portal to return to Eagle's Brook.
I returned to the portal. I should enter the portal before this pocket plane collapses.
I made it back, and Merien is with me. I should speak to Tamien, who's waiting for us.
With Tamien's help, I rescued Merien Sellan. I should report to Dame Clarique and let her know what happened.

One of the Lion Guard soldiers told me about a Red Rook bandit they captured trying to sneak into Eagle's Brook. He might know what's going on in the village. I should talk to the bandit and see what he knows.
As soon as we got back to Aldcroft, Recruit Gorak ran off to deliver the General's dispatch to Captain Vistra. I should check in with her and see if Gorak made it there in one piece.
While Tamien goes to the docks to free captured villagers, I need to head to his family's home and prepare the spell.

Dame Clarique refused to free Tamien Sellan. But she urged me to enter Eagle's Brook and find out what's going on in there. Tamien wanted to rescue villagers and send them to his father's house for safe haven. If I find any, I should do the same.
I freed several villagers. Now I should make my way to Tamien's family home and cast the spell to hide the villagers sheltered within it.
<<1>> gave me a crystal, and told me to touch the crystal to arcane cargo scattered around the cove. She cautioned me it might be an unstable reaction.
<<1>> identified three Lion Guards to be targeted. Eliminating these three will send the camp into disarray.
As I completed Merien's spell, a projection of the mage appeared before me. I should speak to him and find out what's going on.
The instructor at the Shad Astula Academy of Magic said that I need to have an invitation. She suggested I talk to the boatmaster at the docks so I can return to Mournhold.
I have answered the riddles. I should speak to Ohmonir and find out what I need to do next.
I completed the test of endurance. I should speak to Varustante now.
I must find <<1>> on the Saintsport beach and see if she'll help Kaleen with her heist.
I must search <<1>> for the crew of the Maiden's Breath. I should start in the larger buildings.
I entered Tamien's family home. Now I need to figure out how to cast Merien's White Mask spell to conceal the rescued villagers.
<<1>> needs to create a key to gain access to the undercroft. I'll have to wait for her to unlock the door if I want to go inside.
Why am I reading my journal when I should be running a race?
While rescuing Captain Erronfaire's crew member, I stumbled upon a Maormer invasion force! I found all of her missing crew. Now I should return to the captain.
Now that I've retrieved the relic, I can give it <<1>>.
<<1>> is going to combine the relic with her own crystal. <<2>> told her that the relic will amplify her crystal's power and lift the curse from Ezduiin.
For my first trial, I must prove my intelligence. I should speak to Ohmonir to begin this trial.
"My life is measured in hours, I serve by being devoured. Thin, I am quick, Fat, I am slow, What am I?" This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.

"Two bodies have I, two joined into one, The more I stand still, the faster I run. I flip on my head, Some watch me with dread. What am I?" This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.

"I say much, but you cannot hear me. I open, but you cannot walk through me. I have a spine, but I have no bones. I shouldn't be judged by my face. What am I?" This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.

"When young, I'm sweet in the sun. When middle-aged, I'm the life of the party. When old, I'm worth my weight in gold. When I'm gone, everyone laments my absence. What am I?" This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.
I should talk to Ohmonir.
"I attend every battle. I attend every duel. My tooth is sharp, My swing is cruel. What am I?" This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.

"Friend to soldiers, guardsmen, and mercs. Scarred from battle, unbowed by hurt. I always face forward when battle is joined. When on the march, I watch from behind. What am I? This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.

"I'm always smiling, but I never laugh. I once loved life, from cat to calf. I'm always staring, but I cannot see. I once held secrets, those given to me. What am I?" This is the riddle I need to solve by selecting the proper item.
My next trial is one of endurance. I need to speak to Varustante to begin the test.
The final trial isa test of strength. I need to speak to Alandare to begin the test.
This final test pits me against other recruits. I need to defeat the other initiates to prove my worth to the Veil.

Lorumel told me where I can find the welkynd stones I need to activate the Aldmeri device. I will need to find the Maormer captain in the Greenwater manse, as well as collect the stones from an old mage's house, and the local tavern.
I should head into the Veiled Keep and discover the leader behind the Veil.
I need to talk to Queen Ayrenn.
I found the leaders of the Veiled Heritance. I need to defeat them.
I discovered that Estre is the Veiled Queen! I should tell Razum-dar about this.
The Queen is about to give Estre a promotion. I need to stop this and reveal Estre's vile secret.
Cracking Last-To-Water's crystal should free him, but may also summon Fatestealer.
The mystery of Direfrost has been solved, and the Direfrost family, both living and dead, have been freed from their icy prisons.
Listening to the Magical Image may help me discern what happened in Direfrost.

Eboric, the last remaining descendant of the Direfrost family, has left Speaking Stones to mark his exploration of the Direfrost Keep. To discover what happened to Eboric and the Keep, I should follow his trail.
Captain One-Eye asked me to find her first mate, Jalan. She sent him to a nearby wreck up the canyon with part of her remaining crew and hasn't heard from him since.
Jalan thinks he can open the door, but it's going to be noisy and draw a lot of attention. I need to keep him safe while he works on the door.
Jalan opened the door and entered the wreck of the ship. I should follow him inside.
First Mate Jalan has been transformed into a skeleton and is attacking me. I must defeat him.
The Lost Fleet's treasure appears to be cursed. Captain One-Eye said she was going to explore the far wreck in the valley. I should find One-Eye and tell her what happened to her crew.
I found Captain One-Eye in the wrecked ship, surrounded by the broken bodies of skeletal sailors. I should speak to her and find out what happened.
I should seek out and kill enemy soldiers.
I have slain 20 enemies of the Dominion. I should return to the Bounty mission board at the Eastern Elsweyr gate to claim my reward.
I spoke to <<1>> and agreed that he should carry out Eranamo's death sentence himself.
I spoke to <<1>> and convinced him to spare his son's life.
I have the storeroom key. Time to rescue Deregor.
I destroyed the arcane cargo using the crystal <<1>> gave me. She promised to meet me on the ship near the ruin.
<<1>> said she must first weaken the barrier around the stone.
<<1>> broke the barrier with her spell and needs me to use the crystal against the stone.

Something is definitely wrong at this tavern. I met a Nord named Bernt, who urged me to speak to his daughter, Nelhilda. It was her late husband who wrote the note. I should be able to find her somewhere upstairs.

Nelhilda says the mead served here is enchanted. The patrons are trapped and their souls were stolen. She says she can disenchant the mead, but she needs a flower called Kyne's Tear. To find the flowers, I need to go to the abandoned shrine nearby.
I found the abandoned shrine. Now I need to locate a runestone of Kyne. The sacred stone should reveal where the magical flowers grow.
I found a runestone of Kyne. Now I should look for old trees where the invisible flowers may grow. Since I have the runestone, the flowers should reveal themselves to me.
I found the flowers that Nelhilda asked for. I should head back to the tavern and give them to her.

Before Nelhilda ran off to drink more mead, she told me to pour a portion of the purifying potion into the three casks of Special Blend. That should remove the dark enchantment that has corrupted the mead.

Kireth Vanos, her brother, and a few other dungeon-delvers are trapped inside the Library of Dusk. Kireth thinks that if I destroy the Daedric lenses set up around the area, I can get the locked doors to open.
A projection of the famed dungeon-delver Kireth Vanos appeared before me. I should talk to the projection.
I destroyed the Daedric lenses and unlocked the door to the gallery where Kireth was trapped. She assures me it's safe now and wants me to meet her inside the ruins.
I'm inside the gallery overlooking the library. Now I should find Kireth Vanos.
Now that I've studied the holding cells and reviewed the prisoner notes, I'm ready to leave the gallery and enter the Library of Dusk.
I should try to find Raynor Vanos first. I need to be on my guard, however, as Kireth thinks there may be illusions or other spells active in the library.
I found the real Raynor Vanos. Now I need to convince him to leave the library.
Raynor won't listen to me and I can't convince him to leave. Kireth told me to find her if he gave me any trouble. Maybe she has an idea about how to snap him out of the spell.
I decided which side to join in this strange game. I should talk to the Observer and let him know my choice.
Raz and I crashed Estre's party. I should explain to the Queen what's really going on.
I should speak to <<1>>.
Landare told me to follow the road northwest of Dawnbreak. I should report to the first Marine I can find.
I need to search Dawnbreak for survivors. I have a list of who I should be looking for.
I rescued people in Dawnbreak. I should head to the manor house and report to <<1>>.
<<1>> is dead. <<2>> should be recovered.
I had a chance to look around and see the abusive conditions firsthand. Time to talk to Tanion again.
<<1>> said the Daedra have attacked again. I should ask <<2>> what she plans to do.
While speaking to <<1>>, one of her Marines arrived with urgent news. I should listen to what she has to say.
<<1>> asked me to search for her patrols. She mentioned they were searching for the source of the Daedra in the woods on the east side of town.
One of the Marines I rescued reported a cave on the northeast side of town. <<1>> went in to investigate herself. I should find the cave and see if I can help her.
<<1>> said Dremora still attempt to summon another wave of Daedra. I need to search the cave, find them, and stop their ritual.
I ended the summoning ritual. Time to head back to the manor house.
An Argonian Skeleton has appeared before us. It has something it wants to say.
An Argonian Skeleton has appeared before us. It has something it wants to say.
An Argonian Skeleton has appeared before us. It has something it wants to say.
One-Eye killed the Argonian Skeleton after the apparition of the Admiral  ordered it to attack. I should talk to her to coordinate our next move.

The Argonian Skeleton's journal holds the secret to finding the Admiral. He hid the journal in his ship, the Golden Era, now part of the skeleton village. Captain One-Eye has gone on ahead to look for the journal. I should meet her there.
I entered the Golden Era's hold. The Argonian Skeleton said he hid his journal somewhere inside. I'll try to find it.
Captain One-Eye came in the doorway. I should speak to her.
Velatosse intercepted me at the cave's exit. I should tell her what's happened.
I decided to allow Velatosse to exact her revenge on Hendil. I should speak to her one final time.
I should speak to Elanwe once more.
I should talk to Lisondor and return his soul to him.
I decided to stop Velatosse from exacting her revenge on Hendil. I need to report Hendil's crimes to Netanwe.
I need to locate the Mages Guild members and talk to them about their role in this game. I might be able to use what I learn to free them.

I need to return to the Observer's Watch, the floating platform above the Cliffs of Failure. I should speak to the Observer and determine what my next steps in this game are as I try to set the Mages Guild members free.
I decided which side to join in this strange game. I should talk to the Observer and let him know my choice.
I decided which side to join in this strange game. I should talk to the Observer and let him know my choice.
I should wait for Nelhilda to craft the purifying potion. When she finishes, I should take the potion.
Elanwe asked me to protect her son. She said I can meet him in the ruins near the entrance to the vault.
Three wards protect the entrance to the castle vault. Sorondil asked that I defeat the undead captains defending them. With the captains defeated, he should be able to lower the wards.
I should leave the vault and speak to Elanwe. What will I tell her?
I've entered the vault with Sorondil. I need to follow closely and protect him as he makes his way to the Rilis helm.
Sorondil took the Rilis helm. The artifact cursed him for his mixed blood and turned him into a werewolf. He must be destroyed.
Kireth wants me to lead her to Raynor. She claims to have a method for freeing her brother from the spell.
Sorondil and I have lowered the wards. We should return to the vault entrance and get inside.
Aera is gone, and I should now leave the crypt and return to the Thane. If any Worm Cultists try to stop me, I'll have to kill them.
I'll need to lead Sorondil back to the area near the castle's vault.
I should speak with Sorondil before we enter the vault.
The death rune will transform me if I use it at a rune circle.
I followed the dog and discovered a corpse. There's a note next to the body. I should read the note.
This Shadow Court Jester has suggested I seek out Estre's mask, which was Relmus's original task. Upon collecting them, I might be able to convince them that Relmus succeeded.
I found and entered the cave. I need to find <<1>>.
I decided to save Angof from the Observer's game. It was the only real choice if I want to defeat Molag Bal. I should talk to Angof and send him to the Hollow City.
I should find Angof in the battlegrounds. Maybe he has a plan for how we can win the game.
To win this contest, I need to defeat the champions of the other two leaders. Angof gave me more seeds. I can plant them in slain enemies to gain allies in this battle.
I defeated the other champions. Now the Observer wants to meet me at the cave entrance that leads to the watch portal.
As I reached the entrance to the Observer's watch, I spotted Juline waiting for me. I should speak to her.
The Observer has changed the rules of the game and thrown another challenge in my way. I need to run the gauntlet in this cave to reach the portal and confront the Observer.
The Observer wasn't at the entrance to the watch. I should enter the cave and use the portal so I can find him.
I defeated the guardians summoned by the Observer, but one more battle awaits. It's time to confront the Observer and end this!
What? I was drugged. I should speak to Palomir and get some answers.
I should follow Sorondil into the castle vault and protect him while he's inside.
I should tell Elanwe something about the fate of her son.
I should use the totem to collect Lisondor's soul from the large soul fire burning here.
Lisondor told me to collect the soul totem from his body. I can use the totem to retrieve his soul.
I collected Lisondor's soul. I should return it to him.
In order to collect Lisondor's soul, I must defeat the jester Falarel in his playroom.
I must journey to the town of Dawnbreak and speak to Canonreeve Sinyon. Queen Ayrenn wants me to make sure the town is safe due to rumors of Sinyon supporting the Veiled Heritance.
I should speak with Razum-dar and see what he has to say.
I've collected all of the missing pieces of the welkynd stone that Gaston needs to contain the Daedra. I should return to Gaston and repair the stone.
I should head to Skywatch and speak to Captain Tendil. He will be able to direct me to Razum-dar.
What? I killed the Observer, but there he is, standing right in front of me. I should speak to him and find out what else he has in store for me.
I decided to save the Mages Guild members from the Observer's game. I should talk to Juline and send them to the Hollow City.
The Observer is dead and this twisted game is finally over. However, he teleported the mages away before he died. I need to use the portal and try to find them.
I should find Thallik in the battlegrounds. Maybe he has a plan for how we can win the game.
To win this contest, I need to defeat the champions of the other two leaders. Thallik gave me his death rune. I can use it to call upon necromantic energy when I face my opponents.
The Observer is dead and this twisted game is finally over. However, he teleported the mages away before he died. I need to use the portal and try to find them.
I defeated the other champions. Now the Observer wants to meet me at the cave entrance that leads to the watch portal.

I decided to save Thallik from the Observer's game. It was the only real choice if I want to defeat Molag Bal. I should talk to Thallik and send him to the Hollow City.
As I reached the entrance to the Observer's watch, I spotted Mim waiting for me. I should speak to him.

The Observer has changed the rules of the game and thrown another challenge in my way. I need to run the gauntlet in this cave to reach the portal and confront the Observer.
I decided to save the Mages Guild members from the Observer's game. I should talk to Mim and send them to the Hollow City.
I should find Kinlady Estre in the battlegrounds. Maybe she has a plan on how we can win the game.
To win this contest, I need to defeat the champions of the other two leaders. Lady Estre gave me her mask of shadows. I can use it to call forth allies in this battle.
I defeated the other champions. Now the Observer wants to meet me at the cave entrance that leads to the watch portal.

What? I killed the Observer, but there he is, standing right in front of me. I should speak to him and find out what else he has in store for me.
I decided to save Lady Estre from the Observer's game. It was the only real choice if I want to defeat Molag Bal. I should talk to Estre and send her to the Hollow City.
As I reached the entrance to the Observer's watch, I spotted Relmus waiting for me. I should speak to him.
I decided to save the Mages Guild members from the Observer's game. I should talk to Relmus and send them to the Hollow City.
The Observer wasn't at the entrance to the watch. I should enter the cave and use the portal so I can find him.

Sir Gregory's wife Vendi is being escorted home by another Knight named Sir Higgens. If I tell Sir Gregory, he might be convinced to abandon his post.
I have agreed to go to Haj Uxith and find out more about the troubles plaguing the city. <<1>> will follow me there.
When we reached the central plaza, Xohaneel was confronted by another Argonian. I should listen to their conversation.
I need to find <<1>> before Marq will listen to me.
I have the brew. Now to find Marq.
I should tell <<1>> that it worked. Marq forgot about being a Goblin and headed back to town.
The prisoners have been freed. <<1>> awaits the news.
I should defeat the bandits guarding Peras' friends and free the captive Bosmers.
Now that Treeminder Xohaneel has finished her conversation with An-Jeen-Sakka, I should speak to her and find out what they expect of me.
I can perform the Haj Uxith tests in any order I choose. I should speak to <<1>> to start the Trial of Spirit or <<2>> to start the Trial of Body.
I entered the Hist sap chamber beneath the north pyramid. Now I need to use the treated wood to overheat the vats.

To complete the Trial of Spirit, I need to place the three gems that represent the spiritual virtues of the Argonians in the statues at the top of the pyramid that correspond with the challenges best dealt with by these virtues.
I overheated the Hist sap vats and completed the Trial of Body. Now I should return to <<1>> and let him know about my success.

Now Xohaneel and An-Jeen-Sakka want me to settle their debate. If I side with the scholars, we will end the Hist's suffering and they will join my cause. If I side with the warriors, the Hist will live and they'll fight with me against Molag Bal.

I am working to complete the Trial of Spirit. I have three amulets that each represent one of the spiritual virtues of the Argonians of Haj Uxith. I need to find the people on the south pyramid who embody these virtues.
I decided to side with the scholars and end the Hist tree's eternal suffering. I need to tell <<1>> my decision.
I decided to side with the warriors and allow the Hist tree to live. I need to tell <<1>> my decision.

An-Jeen-Sakka has challenged my decision to allow the Hist tree to die. To prove that my choice is the correct choice, I need to defeat the warriors' champion. I should go to the challenge grounds to face the champion.
I need to defeat the warriors' champion before they will accept my decision.
I helped settle the debate over the fate of Haj Uxith's Hist tree. I destroyed the vampiric shard, which means the Hist will eventually die. I should talk to Xohaneel before I leave.
I convinced the scholars that my decision was correct and helped settle the debate over the fate of Haj Uxith's Hist tree. I should talk to An-Jeen-Sakka and let him know that the Hist will live.
I found a letter to someone who may be under an enchantment and trapped in the Everfull Flagon. I should find the tavern and see if anyone knows who the intended recipient might be.
Alinon needs to get to the Camlorn Inn to make the antidote. I need to find a way to get him and the rest of the Camlorn Guard inside.
<<1>> and the Worm Cultist are dead. I should meet with Glanir outside of Crimson Cove.
<<1>> needs the Crimson Raiders' rutter, a book containing the sailing routes used to avoid Aldmeri detection, in order to easily intercept and defeat them.
With Alanwe's soul reformed, she is now free from the torment her husband, Nerien'eth, inflicted on her.
I should return to Trelan's camp to make sure Iriana and Shamal got back safely.
With the help of the parts I gathered, Rulorn was able to bring the Dwarven sphere to "life." He seems satisfied with the results.
I should talk with Elanwe near the bridge into Castle Rilis
<<1>> found me in the woods. I should see what she wants this time.
I poured the purifying potion into the casks of mead as Nelhilda instructed. I should talk to Bernt and see if there's anything else I can do to help.
I planted Angof's seeds, I should return to Juline and let her know.
I charged the death rune. I should return to Mim to let him know what I did.
I found the three pieces of Lady Estre's broken mask. I should return them to the shadow.
I've rescued both <<1>> and <<2>> for <<3>>.
<<1>> asked me to find her two assistants, who went missing somewhere in <<Ac:2>>.
<<1>>, a Mages Guild scholar studying the texts in <<Ac:2>>, asked for my help with her current predicament.
I rescued both <<1>> and <<2>>. I should return to <<3>>'s camp and speak with her.
<<1>> was last seen in <<Ac:2>>.
I bought <<1>>'s freedom. I should speak with <<2>> and make sure she doesn't plan to go back on the deal.
I should search the nearby swamp for <<1>>'s belongings. She said they were probably hidden in tree stumps nearby.
I think I've "convinced" <<1>> to forget about her former slave. I should speak with <<2>> before she leaves.
I've agreed to return <<1>>'s stolen property to her. I should speak with her before she departs.
I've collected <<1>>'s things from the dubious hiding spots in the swamp. She ran off almost immediately. I should bring her the trinkets and see what's got her so excited.
<<1>> was by the boat she spoke of previously, but it seems the owner of the boat is here as well. I'll need to talk to both <<1>> and the Dark Elf to decide what to do next.
I gave <<1>> to buy her freedom without stealing from her now-former master. <<2>> probably won't be happy about this turn of events.
I think I've "convinced" <<1>> to forget about <<2>> and leave with her stolen items.
I've agreed to return <<1>>'s stolen goods to her - both the trinkets and her slave, <<2>>.
Something fishy is going on with <<1>>. She ran off when I asked her about the items she had me collect. I should follow her and find out what this is really all about.
The Queen and I discovered a set of crystals blocking one of the doors. We'll each need to destroy one before we can enter the holy site.
The Queen continues to lead the way. I should follow her.
The crocodiles likely made short work of <<1>>'s pack guar. Perhaps her lost ruby is on one of their corpses.
Wades-in-Muck didn't have Teegya's ruby, but she's now following me around, hoping for more berries. I need to keep looking for the ruby. Maybe a crocodile swallowed it.
A crocodile swallowed Teegya's ruby, and I got it back the hard way. I should head back to <<1>> to let her know.
I decided to push back against the Observer and take everyone out of the game. Now I have Angof and the mages at my side. I should speak to Angof and send them all to the Hollow City.
<<1>> asked me to speak to <<2>> about helping in Silsailen.
I decided to push back against the Observer and take everyone out of the game. Now I have Thallik and the mages at my side. I should speak to Thallik and send them all to the Hollow City.
I convinced <<1>> to collect wamasu lightning for <<2>>. I should return to <<2>> and give him the good news.
<<1>> asked me to convince <<2>> to collect wamasu lightning. I should either convince him or collect it myself.
I collected the wamasu lightning. I should return to <<1>> and give him the amulet.
I told <<1>> I'd collect the wamasu lightning. I hope this amulet works.
I just need to speak to Captain Erronfaire and my work for her should be complete.
The dead guar were torn apart. Perhaps <<1>> fared better. I'll use the berries to lure her close. If she has the ruby, we can head back to Teegya.
I decided to push back against the Observer and take everyone out of the game. Now I have Estre and the mages at my side. I should speak to Estre and send them all to the Hollow City.
Now that I've released all the prisoners, I should find <<1>> outside the ruins.
The shards of Alanwe's soul have been freed but now I must face the Daedric creatures, Ilambris-Athor and Ilambris-Zaven, who are keeping the shards of Alanwe's soul from reuniting.
I survived the leap into the Tower of Lies. Now I should look for Skordo. Gwilir suggested that he'd be able to tell me what's going on inside the prison.
Skordo wants me to rescue his three Fighters Guild companions: Sinfay, Borgath, and Vikord. He says they were taken by the ogrims and are being tortured.
I rescued two of Skordo's companions, but the third one was dead when I found him. I should find Skordo and tell him what happened.
The Fighters Guild members have escaped from the Tower of Lies and plan to regroup in the Hollow City. I should find Skordo, who wants to speak to me.
The constable now says he's going to arrest the blacksmith for refusing to supply more weapons. Yet another person he's accusing of betrayal. I should go warn her of what he's planning.
It sounds like <<1>> may be under the influence of some curse. I should go to his house and see if I can find any evidence to support my theory.
The Dremora in the constable's house and this Daedric symbol would seem to confirm our suspicions. I should bring this back to Sabyssa and see what she thinks should be done next.
There's a Khajiiti soldier on the beach of a small island outside of Haven. She may know what's going on.

<<1>> wants to learn the pirates' plan so he can figure where best to strike. If I'm unable to eavesdrop on the pirates and learn their plans, I may be able to kill them and search their bodies for orders.
<<1>> will bring what I found to <<2>>. If all goes according to plan, I will unlock the fort's front gates so the Speaker and his soldiers can make it inside.

The old imperial Aquifer isn't completely deserted. If I can make my way through the aquifer and into the fort, I should be able to open the front gate so the Speaker and his soldiers can make it inside.
The pirates' necromancers have already begun their ritual to animate <<1>>'s dead! I should make my way to the gatehouse so I can let <<2>> and his soldiers inside.
I opened the gate, and <<1>> arrived with his soldiers. I should talk to the Speaker about his plan to stop the pirates' necromantic ritual.
<<1>> will keep the pirates busy in the fort's courtyard. While he does so, I will slip into the Abandoned Fighters Guild and do what I can to stop the necromantic ritual.
The pirate leader and her necromancers are in the middle of a strange ritual. I should stop them before the ritual completes!
The pirate leader is dead and her undead army disintegrated before me. I should inform <<1>> of my success.
The pirate attack on <<1>> has failed. I should inform <<2>> that I defeated the pirate leader and her plan.
<<1>> arrived with <<2>>, one of the Dominion's leaders. It seems he has a plan to retake <<3>> from the pirates. I should speak with some of the refugees to see if they know where he headed.
<<1>> thinks <<2>> has been cursed. I should speak with <<3>> to see if I can lend a hand.
The raiders have broken and are falling back. I still need to give the <<1>> to <<2>>, so he can begin making an antidote for the poisoned Orcs.
<<1>> suggested talking to <<2>>. I should seek her help in questioning the Wood Orcs of <<3>>.
I confronted <<1>>, and she revealed that <<2>> is behind the attacks. I should tell <<3>>.
She suggested I investigate a nearby ruined Imperial tower.
I killed <<1>>. <<2>> is well enough to speak. <<3>> has asked me to bring him the news directly.
<<1>> suspects the "curse" looming over <<2>> is actually poison. I should seek out some items for him to test for traces of poison.
I've found the items for <<1>>. I should give them to him and see if any of them are the source of the poison.
The well water was poisoned with spider venom. I need to collect a venom sac from a broodmother spider in the nearby mine so <<1>> can create an antidote.
I've collected the <<1>> for <<2>>. I should give it to him.
<<1>> is under attack. <<2>> appears to be injured. I should see if he needs help.
<<1>> is under attack. I should help fight off the raiding party.
The refugees said <<1>> was last seen crossing the marsh toward the outer walls of <<2>>. I should see if I can catch up with him.

Skordo says that Overseer Aruz, a powerful Daedra, has a key to a passage that leads up to the next level. We need to get that key. It should be in Aruz's chamber, which is just through the door where I talked to Skordo.
I should search the camp and see if I can determine what happened to the Fighters Guild members who recently occupied the place.
An old Imperial aquifer leads into <<1>>'s fort, where the pirates plan some sort of necromantic ritual. If I can find the aquifer, I can use the secret entrance against them.
I should head into the woods and look for signs of the Fighters Guild members. The journal suggests that I start out by heading west and then southwest.

At a campfire that was still burning, I found one of the Fighters Guild members. He was dead and Faraniel stood over his body. She claims she didn't kill him. I should talk to her and see what she knows.
The best way to save the remaining Fighters Guild soldier is to follow the Shadow Walker runners. But to see these near-invisible Wood Elves, I need to collect the bark of a spriggan.
<<1>> asked me to take her assistant <<2>> with me to search the Hall of Might for <<Ac:3>>.
I found the entrance to a secret room! I should see where it leads.
I should speak with <<1>> to find out what she wants.
It seems <<1>> has been possessed by <<2>>, a Dremora bound to <<Ac:3>>. She used him to steal <<Ac:4>>! I should pursue her.
After reviewing everyone's alibis with <<1>>, it looks like <<2>> has been lying. I should confront her.
I collected spriggan bark, as Faraniel directed. Now I should bring the bark to her so she can tell me how to use it.

If I touch the bark to a wisp of light, I should be able to see the Wood Elf runners. Faraniel told me I could pick up their trail on the other side of the bridge. Hopefully, they'll lead me to the missing Fighters Guild member.
I found the Fighters Guild member. It looked like a lamia was protecting the Khajiit from a gang of Wood Elves. As I battled the Wood Elves, the Khajiit ran off. I should follow and talk to him.
Sergeant Kamu was trying to get into the tower at the edge of this dark forest. Both the lamia and the Wood Elf claim to know how to get inside. I should decide which of the two to ask for help.
Sergeant Kamu was trying to get into the tower at the edge of this dark forest. Both the lamia and the Wood Elf claim to know how to get inside. I should decide which of the two to ask for help.
Sergeant Kamu was trying to get into the tower at the edge of this dark forest. Both the lamia and the Wood Elf claim to know how to get inside. I should decide which of the two to ask for help.
I should give the plans to a deputy in Koeglin Village.
I need to find and release the three crewmembers the slavers are still holding here: <<1>>, <<2>>, and <<3>>. Captain Marck also asked me to kill Captain Angarthal.
I should talk to Captain Marck now.
I should relight the signal fire in the lighthouse.
<<1>> suggested questioning the Wood Orcs of <<2>> to see if anyone appears to be guilty. I should question them, but the mine may hold evidence as well.
I searched the mine and found a knife in a dead spider. I should ask <<1>> the blacksmith if she recognizes the blade.
I confronted <<1>>, and she revealed that <<2>> is behind the attacks. I should tell <<3>>.
It's very odd that <<1>>'s blade would be in a spider in the mine. I should confront her.
I should keep an eye out for the missing inn workers. If I can protect them from the marsh's dangers, they should be able to get to safety.
I sent all the inn's workers to safety. I should inform <<1>>, the inn's cook.
<<1>> asked me to check in with <<2>>, a colleague of his who is exploring <<Ac:3>>.
However, <<1>> seems concerned about something. She asked me to meet with her a short distance from camp.
Research journals remain to be found in Root Sunder.
All researcher journals have been recovered. <<1>> awaits their delivery.
I've created "<<1>>" from the ingredients. If I hope to get paid, I should go to the beach and see if I can find her contact, someone named "O."
The slavers are keeping the sailors locked up somewhere in these caves. I just need to find them and set them free.
<<1>> asked me to find <<z:2>>, <<z:3>>, and <<z:4>>. If I can't locate her stashes, I should check the pockets of any pirates left in the area.
I should look for a chamber with a central welkynd stone to find the door that will lead to Sirdor.
<<1>> is dead. I should check his journal for clues as to what happened to him, and what he was doing here.

Sirdor is dead. The Sirdor I met was actually the jungle spirit trapped within the walls of this ruin. I should retreat to the welkynd stones to escape its trap. According to Sirdor's journal, I can use the stones to free the frenzied spirit.
The welkynd Attunement Stone has separated the spirit of the jungle from the ruins. I should speak to the spirit.
I need to bring <<1>>'s goods to her contact in the Mages Guild.

<<1>>'s contact wasn't in the Mages Guild, but I found a note. If I hope to get paid, it looks like I'll need to mix the ingredients together correctly. If I make a mistake, I'll need to collect new ingredients.
Now that the captives are freed, I should return to the surface and find <<1>>.
Something's happened to the first mate. I should speak to this injured sailor to find out what happened.
The slavers' leader, the infamous Ma'jhad Kha, has taken the first mate the hostage and fled down the beach. I should go after them.
I should search the library for any sign of <<Ac:1>>.
I've found several volumes on the history of <<1>>. They may be the key to opening the bookcase <<2>> has uncovered.
I spotted <<1>> atop the tower. I should speak to him.
<<1>> claims he was cheated in a duel, causing him to lose <<2>> to his brother. I must decide whether to challenge him or try to find another way to settle this dispute.
I met <<1>> in the bottom of the tower. Now I must kill him to end his attacks on <<2>>.
<<1>> has agreed to halt his attacks while I investigate an abandoned Imperial mine to determine if it has valuable resources. I should point out any ore veins I find to <<2>>.
<<1>> confirmed the mine had valuable ore in it. I should return to <<2>> and tell him the good news.
I have decided to challenge <<1>>. I should meet him at the bottom of the tower.
While searching for the aquifer entrance, I spotted <<1>>. I should speak with her and see what she's doing here.
I should return to Ancalin and let her know that her children are at peace.
I have the parts Neetra wanted. I should give her the good news.
<<1>> was last seen heading to <<Ac:2>>.
A strange creature named <<1>> trapped <<2>>'s soul in a chest somewhere inside <<Ac:3>>. I need to find it in order to release him from captivity.
I need to collect a <<1>>, a <<2>>, and a <<3>> from the noble houses in Skywatch.
There's a marker near Vulkhel Guard, Tanzelwil, Phaer, and Castle Rilis.
I should get a frog from someone here at the race.
I should put the frog in the starting basket to begin the race.
My frog has won the race. I should return to <<1>>.
My frog didn't win the race. I should get another one.
I need to search Auridon for four members of the Veiled Heritance and ensure they're dead.
I should return to Egranor in Skywatch, tell him what happened.
The Attunement Stone rests by <<1>>'s body. According to <<1>>'s journal, I will need it if I'm to release Root Sunder, a jungle spirit, from the walls of this ruin.
I destroyed the <<z:1>>, ending the villagers' bargain with Clavicus Vile. I should return to <<2>> and see what became of the villagers.
I preserved the <<z:1>>, ending the villagers' bargain with Clavicus Vile. I should return to <<2>> and see what became of the villagers.
<<1>> and her Mages Guild allies have arrived to stop the ritual. I can continue on to the next ritual site now.
I should defeat the Wood Orcs surrounding the next altar so that Bakkhara and her mages can disable it.
Bakkhara and her mages have neutralized the final altar. I should speak with <<1>> now.
<<1>> and her Mages Guild allies have arrived to disable what might be the last altar. I should wait for them to complete their task.
Something happened after the Canonreeve's altars were disabled. Elden Hollow is no longer safe - I should follow Speaks-With-Lights for a way out.
I found <<1>> trapped in some sort of energy barrier. He thinks I can break the barrier by using a watcher's central eye to interrupt the flow of energy.
Sylvian Herius asked me to kill Imperial Archers to help the rebels.
I killed several Imperial archers. I should let Sylvian know.
Dominion invaders carried off Wideem-Voh and other villagers. They may have been taken to Dominion camps outside of Percolating Mire.
I need to leave this corrupted area.
I need to leave this corrupted area.
I should rescue <<1>> before the cultists sacrifice him.
It seems <<1>> has been possessed by <<2>>, a Dremora bound to <<Ac:3>>. She used him to steal <<Ac:4>>! I should pursue her.
<<1>> used <<Ac:2>> to reunite with her body. Doing so collapsed the entire chamber. I should see if I can recover it before she does.
<<AC:1>> is drained of power. If I can catch <<2>> before she escapes, perhaps it can be restored.
I defeated <<1>>, returning the power she stole from <<Ac:2>>. I should inform <<3>> as soon as I can.
I defeated <<1>>, returning the power she stole from <<Ac:2>>. I should inform <<3>> as soon as I can.
I followed the voice to a dead endâ€”an ancient cave in. The author of the letters, now a ghost, is waiting here. Perhaps I should speak with her and find out what happened so long ago.
I need to try to get it back for him.
I found Sylvian's family heirloom. I should return to the rebel camp.
Vyctoria asked me to travel to Thorn Lodge and bring back any valuables I find.
I found some of the rebels' valuables. I should bring them to <<1>>.
I should go to the Hist tree at the center of the village to meet <<Ac:1>>.
I need to cross into Imperial territory and poison the food that's stored in a house and in the old church.
I tainted the food with Vyctoria's spice. I should return to the rebel side of Cheydinhal and let her know.
As I went to examine the body inside the ritual circle, some kind of magical shield was triggered. I should speak to Aelif.
Aelif has begun her spell. I need to destroy the four crystals that are empowering the barrier while she maintains it, otherwise I will need to start over.
With the barrier down, I can examine the body.
Examining the body triggered a strange noise. I should find out what it was.
I retrieved the Stonechewers' tribal totem. I should take it back to commander at the base of the tower.
I need to raid the Sea Drake camp and free Iriana and Shamal.
I persuaded <<1>> to give me some help with my tasks. He told me to speak to <<2>> for assistance.
I need to infiltrate the Imperial-held part of Cheydinhal and kill one of their lieutenants.
I killed an Imperial lieutenant. I should cross the river and inform Sylvian Herius.
I freed the captured rebel soldiers. I should return to <<1>>.
I should travel to the graveyard on the eastern side of Cheydinhal and free them.
<<1>> saw everything. I should speak to her and find out where <<2>> has fled.
I need to locate the spy and give him the new orders.
I delivered Sylvian's orders. I should let him know.
I should collect any Dwarven parts I see and return them to Rulorn in <<1>> for a reward.
I should collect any Dwarven parts I see and return them to Rulorn in <<1>> for a reward.
I should collect any Dwarven parts I see and return them to Rulorn in <<1>> town for a reward.
I should collect any Dwarven parts I see and return them to Rulorn in <<1>> town for a reward.
The letter speaks of a second page. If it still exists, it must be nearby. I also found a strange piece of metal.
I found the second letter and another identical piece of metal. They seem to fit together to resemble a key of some kind.\n\nI should see if I can find anything the "key" may unlock.
I opened a sealed chest to find a lock of hair. Upon taking it, I heard a voice. It seemed to be leading me down one of the caved-in hallways in the ruins.
I freed the prominent citizens Tamien Sellan asked me to. Now I should leave the mines.
Vyctoria asked me to travel to the estate and destroy the stones.
I destroyed the Shadowed Path's Daedric stones. I should update <<1>> in Cheydinhal.
I should speak with Neramo about Kaleen's heist. He owes me for helping him in Bthzark.
I should find <<1>>'s sword.
It seems <<1>> is ready to face his fears. We should kill the beast together.
I found <<1>>'s sword. I should speak with him.
The Guardian's Eye shattered as Tharayya attempted to take it, and appeared to awaken a group of undead. I should speak with her regarding what to do next.
She asked me to search the ruins of Vahtacen for her and collect any Ayleid items I find.
I found an Ayleid object within Vahtacen. I should bring it to <<1>>.
<<1>> is trapped in the lower level. I should find him and free him.
I might ask one of the soldiers' leaders whether they have additional resources they can offer me.
Tharayya has asked me to remove the immediate threat to her camp. Her aggressors are just ahead.
Neramo requested my help finding some Dwemer crystals outside the ruins of Bthzark.
I found the crystals Neramo wants. I need to deliver them to him at the entrance to Bthzark.
Now that I have removed the immediate threat, I should speak with Tharayya.
Neramo commanded the spider to unseal the door into Bthzark. I should follow him inside to see what the ruin holds.
Neramo asked me to direct the Dwarven spider to repair two generators inside Bthzark.
With the generators repaired, Bthzark springs to life once again. I should meet Neramo to see what else he's uncovered.
Neramo is eager to locate rare Dwemer schematics he believes are somewhere in Bthzark. If I find them, he'll be ecstatic. I should head deeper into the ruins.

Neramo suspects thieves tried to steal the schematics but may not have escaped Bthzark. The chest that held the schematics is indeed empty. I should search further to see if the thieves made it out or not.
Sylvian asked me to deliver these petitions to a shrine west of Cheydinhal.
I delivered the rebels' petitions to the shrine, despite an Imperial ambush. I should let Sylvian know.
Now that I've closed the portals, I should meet Brother Gerard inside the cave.
Tharayya's husband has taken her notes about Volenfell. I should find him and get them back.
Shalidor appeared and told me Valaste has finished translating the first book. I need to find her at the Mages Guildhall.
Shalidor has made preparations to create a portal to the Isles. I should speak to him at the back of the Mages Guild.
I should return to Valaste at the Mages Guild with the book.
I should enter the portal Shalidor created.
Haskill awaited my arrival in the Isles. I should talk to him to see what Sheogorath has planned for me.
I've secured Tharayya's research notes from Quintus Verres. I should return them to her.
Now to check back with <<1>> and tell her I'm heading into the mine.
If I plan to help <<1>> rescue her crew, I'll need to know more about what's going on inside <<Ac:2>>.
I should enter <<Ac:1>> so I can search for survivors.
I should search for survivors who escaped the mutineers.
I heard a voice calling for help. I should investigate and see if it's a survivor from the Albatross crew.

<<1>>, one of the Albatross crew, says <<2>> is forcing the crew through fields of traps toward <<Ac:3>>. While <<1>> heads to the captain, his trained monkey <<4>> can help me disarm the traps on the way to <<Ac:3>>.
I arrived at <<Ac:1>>. I should look around and see what was worth so much to <<2>>.

<<1>> plans to turn his former crewmates into undead sailors! <<2>> asked me to distract the mutineers while she slips into <<Az:3>>. I should kill any mutineers I find on the way to meeting her there.
I distracted the mutineers and met up with <<1>> in <<Az:2>>. I should speak with her about stopping <<3>>'s plans.
<<1>> has shown himself in the middle of <<Az:2>>. I should fight him while his mutineers are distracted by the fires.
Before I killed <<1>> he emerged from the beached ship in the middle of <<Az:2>>. I should search the ship for <<3>>, the captain's wife.
<<1>> was shaken up but otherwise all right. I should find <<2>> and let her know <<3>> is no longer a threat.

The crew of the Albatross have captured all the stragglers. The mutineers are no longer a threat. A grateful <<1>> said <<2>> wanted to speak with me before I left <<Ac:3>>. I should see what he wants.
<<1>> ran off. I should track him down.
<<1>> wants my advice on whether he has what it takes to become a warrior. I should tell him what I think.
<<1>> wants my advice on whether he has what it takes to become a warrior. I should tell him what I think.
I need to explore Vuldngrav to see if I can find the fork that Sheogorath misplaced.
Examining the chest angered the Dragon Priest, Korthor. I need to survive the draugr he's now sending after me.
After surviving the draugr, Korthor beckoned to me. I should seek out his tomb. He may have the fork I'm looking for.
I made it to Korthor's tomb. Time to retrieve the forkâ€”whatever it takes.
Haskill appeared after I obtained the fork. I should see what he has to say.
Haskill is sending me to a place called Vuldngrav to retrieve a â€¦ fork. I should enter the portal he created for me.
Haskill is sending me to a place called Asakala to retrieve the staff. I need to enter the portal he created to get there.
I arrived at Asakala. Now I should speak to Shalidor about this place.
I need to wait for the tomb to open.
With the tomb open, I can now enter and kill Maleel for the staff.
Haskill appeared once I obtained the staff. I should speak to him.
When I returned to the Shivering Isles, Sheogorath was waiting for me. I should speak to him.
Sheogorath wants me to test out his staff on the "people" of the Isles.
I tested out Sheogorath's staff. I should speak to him.
I stepped through a portal to a strange and interesting place. I should talk to Aniel again and figure out what's going on here.
I need to investigate the Goblin cave and see if I find any clues.
