I've come upon a cowering Goblin. Perhaps it can help me find out about what is happening here.
Byz has suggested I search the Goblin dens for the contract between the Toothmaul tribe and the Altmeri woman known as Nelanya.
I need to find Byz again. He mentioned he would be near the chief's den.
Pirondil is here threatening Byz. I should have words with him.
I'm going to try to speak with the Goblin chief, Koth. Perhaps I can convince him that Nelanya's contract is not in his tribe's best interests.
Koth has seen reason and given me the key to Nelanya's sealed chamber. I can confront her and end the threat she poses to Auridon.
The Toothmaul Goblins have renounced their alliance with the Veiled Heritance. I should find Pirondil back at the entrance to Toothmaul Gully.
<<1>>'s sarcophagus must be opened.
<<1>> appears to have finished his evaluation of the items. I should ask him what he's found.
<<1>> has revealed herself as an enemy. She must be defeated.

The Pact's efforts to learn anything about the cult at Vernim have met with little success. Dajaheel wants me to help a Lieutenant Belron by using an ornate globe on the Worm Cultists around Venim Wood, then kill them.
I must return to Belron and give him the globe.
Belron used the globe and Stral appeared. I must talk to the memory of Stral.
Vigrod asks that I accompany Skald Svari in her quest to become the next Sage of Fallowstone Hall.
Find Clues to the Second Riddle
I delivered the crystals to Neramo. The metal rod he found should now control the Dwarven spider. I should watch to see if it works.
Now that we're inside Bthzark, Neramo wants to speak with me.
I should speak to <<1>> at Alcaire Castle.
I must hurry to the Rift and find <<1>>.
I should find my way to the Dwemer structure called the Guardian's Helm. According to Tharayya, there is a lever within that, when pulled, will allow me to travel deeper into Volenfell.
I've found the Guardian's Helm lever. I should speak with Tharayya.
Another door bars my way to the Guardian's Eye, an ancient Dwemer artifact. According to Tharayya, a Dwemer structure called the Guardian's Skull contains a lever that should open the way.
Merric has been kidnapped! Aelif ran up after the battle. I should talk to her to catch her up.
The skulls of three Imperial mages who performed the ritual are scattered around the catacombs. If I want to put <<1>> to rest, I should look for the skulls.
I found the skulls of the Imperial mages who performed the ritual. I should bring them to <<1>>.
I need to find a hidden lever which will allow me to get inside <<Ac:1>>. Once inside, I should match the skulls with the spirits of the Imperial mages to stop the ritual.
I seem to have banished the spirits of the Imperial mages and stopped the ritual. I should speak with <<1>>.
A delver told me that Kireth is in a tent near the entrance to the barrow. Time to go get her.
Narir leads the Companions who saved Raynor from the Worm Cult. He's at the delver camp. He may need help.
I should look for any supplies that are worth recovering.
I've recovered what I could of Sigunn's goods. I should return them to him in Shor's Stone.
I should find Yngrel and kill him.
Yngrel the Bloody is dead. I should speak to Medveig at the crossroads for my reward.
I've offered to help her search. She wants to know what happened to him, whether he is still alive, or has died.
The letter I found was addressed to Helfhild. I should return it to her.
I found some remains in the hills that might be Helfhild's father. There's a letter here as well.
I should let Chief Tazgol know that I decided to keep the relic.
The Bloodthorn Cultists are inside the ruins and have released a spectral army that's wiping out the Orcs. I need to find out how they did it and stop them.
The spirits that haunt these ruins hold the key to getting inside. I need to activate the welkynd stones to summon them and figure out how to open the door.
The door is open. I need to get into the ruins.
The cultists are performing a ritual deep inside the ruins. I need to get there.
I need to speak with Neramo to find out what to do.
I should let Chief Tazgol know that I destroyed the relic.
The crew has strong opinions about the relic. Listening to them should help me decide what to do with it.
I need to decide whether to keep or destroy the relic.
Lerisa's here. I should see what she wants.
Jakarn is here. I should talk to him to see if he can help me.
I need to find the arms caches.
I've found all of the arms caches. I should meet Jilan-dar outside of the caves and see about getting my cut.
I've found the release lever in the Guardian's Skull, an ancient Dwemer structure. I should speak with Tharayya.
Powerful Dwemer constructs are protecting the Guardian's Eye. It seems I must defeat them to claim the Eye.
I've found a rare <<1>>, a potent healing plant. Wounded pilgrims are often tended at the Pilgrim's Rest Inn. I should see if I can use this to help someone there.
I've found the Guardian's Eye. I should take it from its pedestal.
Sir Hughes has fallen into a deep sleep in the infirmary beneath Firebrand Keep's Great Hall. I need to go down and speak with the healer, Odette, about Sir Hughes' condition.
I should go speak with <<1>>
I should ask <<1>> about Mathias.
I should defend <<1>> from the Supernal Dreamers.
Doshia holds Merric in a spell-lock. I need to defeat her to free my comrade.
I should speak with Merric about his kidnapping.
Merric suggested to me that a book Doshia was writing in might contain clues to what this 'Mortuum Vivicus' might be. I should grab it and any notes Doshia may have had before I leave the vault.
Solving the puzzle lowered the barrier prompting a spirit to appear in its stead. Perhaps he can shed some light on <<1>>'s secrets?
<<1>> wants to speak with me before we proceed into the ruin.
I told Enthis that I'd retrieve his silk from Turil, his rival. I need to confront Turil, who is in the inn of Nimalten.
According to <<1>>'s journal, three surrounding welkynd stones must be attuned before the central stone.
I should use the Attunement Stone on the central welkynd stone to free the spirit of Root Sunder.

Thallik Wormfather has retreated into the lower ruins at Arcwind Point. To get past the wards to follow him, a life must be sacrificed. Captain Hrosta has volunteered, or I can perhaps trick a Reachman prisoner into doing so.
The sacrifice is made. I must wait until the circle's victim is devoured.

Someone must be sacrificed to open the door to follow Thallik Wormfather. Though Captain Hrosta offered to sacrifice herself, I've decided to trick a Reachman prisoner into killing himself. There's one in a cage up the mountain.
Someone must die to open the door to follow Thallik Wormfather. Captain Hrosta volunteered, and I agreed it was the only way.
The Reachman prisoner does not suspect anything. I must lead him back to the ritual circle.
I led the Reachman prisoner to the ritual circle. I can trick him into touching the gem and killing himself or I can ask <<1>> to sacrifice herself.
I've traveled through the portal to the Worm Cult's base at Arcwind Point. I should look for Captain Hrosta to find out where Thallik Wormfather went.
I found Captain Hrosta. I should speak to her to find out where Thallik Wormfather has gone.
I need to enter the portal to return to the Shivering Isles.
I need to deliver <<1>> to the Wood Elf camp.
If I want to see the Khajiit hallucinating, as Aniel described, I need to give the stems to Yanabir-ja with some kind of excuse.
Sister Safia asked me to go to the Cave of Dreams on the rise northeast of here. I should look for <<1>> near the cave.
I found <<1>> dead. I should search for clues.
I need to enter the spirit realm to kill Vardan and recover the Ayleid relic. This should stop the Bloodthorn Cult's spectral army.
I need to talk to <<1>>.
I need to use the portal to enter <<1>>.
The officious Dark Elves seem even more anxious than usual. They want all visitors to register at the City Center. I need to talk to Registrar Riivel there.
Registrar Riivel informed me that Almalexia, one of the Three Gods of the Tribunal, has asked to speak to me. I should find her at the Tribunal Temple.
On my way to the Tribunal Temple, I ran into Naryu Virian. It appears that she wants to speak to me.
Naryu warned me that the Maulborn are up to something in Mournhold. I should warn Almalexia when I speak with her.
Naryu warned me that the Maulborn are up to something in Mournhold. I should warn Almalexia when I speak with her.

I spoke to Almalexia, who gave me an enchanted lantern for things I have done to help Morrowind and her people. She also gave me the authority to investigate any Maulborn activity in Mournhold. I should leave the Temple and find Naryu Virian.
Naryu Virian said to meet her at the Flaming Nix, a cornerclub on the east side of Mournhold. I should head over there now.
I have the House Dres key. I should go to the farm outside the city and investigate the house's connection to the Maulborn.
I should search these farmhouses for clues as to where I can find the Maulborn and what they're up to.
I found a trap door hidden beneath a rug in one of the Dres farmhouses and Naryu just arrived. I should speak to her about what to do next.
I need to talk to <<c:1>> about her plans. With the Silvenar possibly in captivity and her city occupied by the Hound, she may need my help once more.
<<1>> needs a lock of hair from a Drublog champion. She will use the lock of hair to disguise me as a Drublog in case <<2>> won't explain why Velyn Harbor was attacked.
I've obtained the lock of hair <<c:1>> needs to disguise me as a Drublog. I should meet her at the chieftain's longhouse.
Now that I'm in disguise, I need to find the shaman at the beach. <<1>> asked me to spy on him and figure out what he's up to.
<<1>> refused to speak with <<c:2>>, confirming her suspicions. She wants to disguise me as a Drublog so I can figure out what the chieftain is hiding.
Roku, the other Drublog Orc I saw in the chieftain's longhouse, wants to speak with me. Perhaps she knows the whereabouts of <<c:1>>.
The shaman mentioned something about a ritual and a vision atop the watchtower on the beach. I should see if I can find out something from the ritual.
After enacting the ritual, a spectral hound addressed me from within a binding circle. If I can keep up this charade of being a Drublog, I may be able to get some information from the hound.
<<1>> confessed that the trap laid for <<c:2>> has already been sprung. She told me if I wanted to save her, I should beseech the shaman of <<3>> for help.
I've broken into the arena in <<1>>, where the Drublog have entrapped <<c:2>>.
I need to talk to <<c:1>> about her next plan of attack. With the Silvenar possibly in captivity and her city occupied by this "Hound," she may need my help once more.
<<1>> is free and has escaped, but at a high price. I should leave <<2>> to mourn his daughter in peace.
With <<1>>'s help, I have a chance at freeing <<c:2>>.\n\nThe shaman said I should meet <<3>> at the entrance to the arena in the center of <<4>> once I am ready to free <<c:2>>.
I need to destroy the four binding totems around <<c:1>> in order to release her.
Selfora is safe now. I should return to the inn and tell Elynisi about her father.
Shalidor is casting the spell to open a portal to the Shivering Isles. I need to wait until he's finished.

The Pact's forces are spread thin. Jorunn has asked me to close the portals to Coldharbour and confront the Cult's leader, Thallik Wormfather. I should speak with the spirit of Valdur, one of Ysgramor's Companions.
I got the impression I might be able to convince Valdur to provide me with additional aid if I can persuade him. Otherwise, I should leave the king's camp and look for the portals I need to close.
I need to enter Trolhetta and lower the Worm defenses.
Now that I've collected all of the relics, I should try to find the captured Spirit Warden Sister Tabakah mentioned.
I went to the chieftain's longhouse, but <<c:1>> is nowhere to be seen. I should speak to the chieftain and see what's happened.
The General's imposter ambushed me! I must defeat him!
With all the statues activated, a ritual orb has appeared at the brazier. I need to activate it to open Maleel al-Akir's tomb.
I should travel to the Grave. It's located below the palace.
Now that I'm inside the prison, I need to find Jakarn.
I found Jakarn's cell. I should speak to him.
I must release Jakarn and help him find his treasure.
I should head to the Goblin mine to help Jakarn retrieve his treasure.
I should talk to Jakarn in the mine.
The treasure lies in a storage room on the upper level of the mine.
I should talk to Jakarn to find out the next step.
I must retrieve Jakarn's treasure.
The headman's guards are looking for Jakarn and the gemstone. I can give the gem either to the guards or Jakarn.
I should talk to Jakarn. He's at the inn.
I should talk to Jakarn. He's at the inn.
I have Jakarn's treasure. I should meet him on the beach across from the mine.
I need to find a <<1>>. I can kill Worm Cultists until I find one, or I can try to intimidate Yngvar to see if he has any better suggestions.
After some prodding, <<1>> remembered seeing the cultists taking a key into a tent in their camp. I must retrieve it.
I need to find out what happened to Raston Vendil. One of the other traders said that Raston was last seen speaking to the Gulakhan, so I should start there.
The Gulakhan suggested that I speak to wise woman Iru-Ahan to see if she'll help me appeal to Farseer Bodani on Raston's behalf.
While speaking to wise woman Iru-Ahan, several agitated ghosts flew by. She believes my presence disturbed the ghosts and wants me to see where they flew off to.
The ghosts surrounded a tent, but the Farseer easily dispersed them. She has Raston Vendil with her. I should speak to her.
The Farseer claims to have had a vision concerning me. She suggested I speak to Raston and get his side of the story before I agree to something she called the trial of the Ghost Snake.
Valaste has discovered where I need to go for my final trial. I should wait for her to open a portal to this Chateau.
With the Green Lady off to confront the Hound in the town of Silvenar, I should search around <<1>> for any sign of <<c:2>> or his capture.
<<1>> may be able to help me solve the door puzzle, if he can overcome the pain of the Worm Cult ritual.
<<1>> fought through the pain the Worm Cult is inflicting and told how to bypass the doors. I must pass through a door under a Whale, then an Eagle, then a Snake.
I need to collect a <<1>>, some <<2>> and a few <<3>>.
I need to talk to <<1>>.
I should speak to <<1>> and give her Daifa's Puzzle Box.
I should check on Treva's Farm and look for someone who can shed light on the chilling note.
<<1>> may have tips on defeating the giant chieftain.
<<1>> gave me <<2>>. He said it may shatter after being blown but should stun a mammoth for a bit.
Jakarn has unlocked the storage room. I should enter and retrieve his treasure.
I must find and kill Skull Crusher, and then find a way to collapse the cavern the ogres are coming through.
Nelanya is dead and the Toothmaul Goblins have renounced their alliance with the Veiled Heritance. I should find Pirondil back at the entrance to Toothmaul Gully.
I've freed Jilan-dar. I should talk to him and hear his proposal.
<<1>> may not like the treasure he received, but he agreed to take <<2>> to Anvil. I should tell <<2>> the good news.
<<1>> refused to take <<2>> to Anvil. I should let him know the bad news.
Rilyn appeared at the secret cave. I should question him about his journal.
Rilyn explained his actions. I've agreed to help keep his secret for Raerana's sake. I need to deliver Frirhild's ring to Guard Jorald and claim I found it on a bandit.
I persuaded Naryu to deal directly with the Dres courier. In return, she asked me to get her a bottle of wine from the cornerclub's cellar.

Naryu thinks that House Dres has a connection to the Maulborn. She wants to gain access to the Dres farm outside the city. We need to get a key from the Dres courier named Thauravil. The first step is to slip a sleeping potion into a bottle of wine.
Courier Thauravil is winding his way through the streets of Mournhold. I should follow him and wait for the sleeping potion to do its job.
Courier Thauravil drank some of the poisoned wine and passed out. I should search him and get his key.
I grabbed a bottle of the House Dres wine. I should take the bottle to Naryu so we can get on with her plan.
I need to follow Naryu and the courier upstairs and wait for her signal.
Naryu subtly distracted the courier. I should steal his key now that he's indisposed.
I slipped the sleeping poison into the wine meant for Courier Thauravil. I should let Naryu know it's been done.
Shalidor was waiting for me on the far side of the portal. I should speak to him.
Sheogorath has appeared before us. I should see what happens.
I should tell <<1>> when I'm ready to help get revenge on the bandits.

<<1>> has become a crocodile. She asked me to help her get vengeance on the bandits by guiding her and helping her to kill their leader. If we become separated, I can use the charm she gave me to call her.

Fighting alongside <<1>>, I killed the leader of the bandits at Dro-Dara plantation. Afterwards, <<1>>  returned to the river. She's fully a crocodile now. I should tell Dro-Dara that she won't be leaving with him.
I must take Ripplestrike's heart back to <<1>>.
Sinmur is dead. Ysgramor and his legendary Five Hundred Companions have emerged from Sovngarde to speak to Jorunn Skald-King.
I should talk to Raston and find out more about what he did to make the Mabrigash so angry.
<<1>> wants me to meet her in Dra'bul. She's going to travel there at supernatural speed, but I have to take a longer road.
Sheogorath seems to be taking my choice in stride. I should wait for him to make his exit.
Courier Thauravil has left the cornerclub with the poisoned wine. I should follow him.
I failed to follow Courier Thauravil. I should return to Naryu and see what she advises.
An Hlaalu apprentice asked me to go to the trading post near the Vale of the Ghost Snake to speak to Telvynni Hadran.
I decided to give the sword to Blaise. King Aphren doesn't deserve forgiveness.
Aera was with the Worm Cult, but she's done serving them. She wants to flee.\n\nI can kill her, try to bring her back to face justice, or let her go.
After being confronted with her crimes, Aera fled. She leaves me no choice. I cannot allow her to escape. I must go after her and kill her.
Aera has rejected all ties with the Worm Cult. I let her go into exile. To keep her safe, I must lie to Thane Fjora and say Aera is dead.
<<1>> wants me to meet her in Dra'bul. She's going to travel there at supernatural speed, but I have to take a longer road.
I should speak to <<c:1>> in <<2>>.
Shazah suggested we head back and speak to Khali.
I should follow <<1>> to meet with one of the Khajiit Champions at Fort Grimwatch.
I should speak to <<1>> and learn more about what has happened at Fort Grimwatch.
I need to escort <<1>> to the ritual sites and protect her while she performs a ritual.
I should keep Shazah safe during her ritual incantations.
I found Shazah's sister, Khali. I should speak to her.
Time to enter the trap door in the Dres farmhouse and see if I can find out what the Maulborn are up to.
The First Mane has gifted me with his blessing. I should speak to Shazah again.
I decided to present Tevynni's suggestion to the Farseer. She'll trade with the Vale and Raston will go free.
Naryu and I climbed down into the cellar beneath the Dres farmhouse. She's anxious to find out what's going on down here. I should ask her what she thinks we should do next.
Something certainly has Naryu concerned. I better follow her down into the sewers.
<<1>> would like me to lead him to <<2>>.
<<1>> marked the hiding spots of the Merethic Society's treasures on my map. I should recover and bring these relics to <<2>>, at the entrance of Rulanyil's Fall.
I've found several of the Merethic Society's treasures, and should return them to <<1>> by the entrance of Rulanyil's Fall.
Recover Hidden Treasure
Recover Hidden Treasure
Recover Hidden Treasure
Recover Hidden Treasure
The <<1>> has been recovered.
The <<1>> has been recovered.
The <<1>> has been recovered.
The <<1>> has been recovered.
Naryu thinks there's a hidden door nearby and wants me to search for it. Apparently, the usually cocky and brave Naryu is afraid of a few alits, so I'm on my own for now.
I found the hidden door that Naryu suggested was down here, but one of the levers that opens it is rusted shut. I need to find some grease to apply to the metal housing if I want to open this door.
<<1>> asked me to search for <<2>> near the Dra'bul wayshrine.

I found <<1>>, but he won't come with me until I retrieve the bag containing goods for him and <<2>> to sell.\n\nHe mentioned seeing pigs, sliding down into water, and vines like teeth over a cave mouth.
I found Feluz's things near the river. Hopefully, this will coax him out of the tree stump where he's been hiding from his wife.
The Guardian's Eye, the Dwemer artifact Tharayya has been looking for, is located in a chamber called the Guardian's Orbit. If I find this chamber, I'll find the Eye.
I should approach General Godrun's bedside to enter his dream.
I entered General Godrun's dreams. Now I must find and defeat the Omen.
Captain Kaleen needs some folks with special skills for a heist she's trying to pull off. She wants me to help her recruit one or more of these folks. If I do, I'm in on the job.
I've decided to ignore Captain Kaleen for the time being and explore the isle of Stros M'Kai for adventure.
Crafty Lerisa's in Saintsport, Jakarn's in the Grave, and Neramo's at the ruin of Bthzark. I need to recruit one or more of them for the heist Kaleen's planning.
I've found Captain Lerisa, who appears to be fine. I should see what her story is.
I found Jakarn in one of Headman Bhosek's prison cells. If I can get him out, he may agree to help with Kaleen's heist.
<<1>> asked me to look for <<2>> at the ancient Dwarven ruin of Bthzark. I need to convince him to join Kaleen's heist.
I met a panicked pirate on the outskirts of town. I should see what he has to say.
I met a strange Altmer near a Dwarven ruin. I should see what he's doing out here.
I must defeat the Omen of Betrayal, lest the Daedric Prince Vaermina trap me somehow.
I agreed to help <<1>> rescue her crew.
Lerisa said to meet her behind the rocks by Helane's ship, after rescuing her crew.
Deregor is free. He asked me to check on Lerisa, who went to confront Captain Helane.
<<1>> has poisoned <<2>>! I must talk to Lerisa to see if any crew remain captive.
<<1>> is dying from an agonizing poison. I can give her the antidote, kill her quickly, or leave the area so she dies slowly and painfully.
<<1>> said she and her crew would meet me on the beach off Saintsport to settle up.
<<1>> said to meet her on the beach off Saintsport to settle up.
I must find <<1>> on the Saintsport beach and collect the favor she owes me.
I should find <<1>> on the Saintsport beach and see if she'll help with Captain Kaleen's heist.
I must find <<1>> on the Saintsport beach and collect the favor she owes me.
<<1>> is never far from her pet monkey, <<2>>. If I find him, I'll find her.
I managed to dissuade <<1>> from continuing the violence. I should speak to him and find out what he plans to do next.
With <<1>>'s death, the violence in Bloodtoil Valley is over. I should speak to <<2>> and find out what will happen to this shrine.
The <<1>> killed <<2>>. I need to learn why.
I was too late to save <<1>>, despite killing <<2>>. I should speak with <<3>> and let him know his daughter didn't survive.
The <<1>> has asked that I dissuade <<2>> from cursing the Drublog. I must choose how to deal with <<2>>.
I killed the chief, but not before she gravely wounded <<1>>. I need to check if she can make it back to the valley.
A strange spirit appeared in the Shrine of Z'en. I should speak to it.
I've been asked to kill <<1>>. <<2>> believes she may be holding his daughter hostage. She should be in her longhouse above the shrine to Mauloch.
<<1>> somehow evaded the Sea Drakes. I should see what she has to say.
<<1>> asked me to find a pirate captain named Lerisa who may be stranded in Saintsport. Because Lerisa is hard to spot, I'm looking for her monkey, Howler.

<<1>> asked me to speak with his daughter, <<2>>, to see if there is a way to stop the bloodshed between the Drublog and Bosmer of Bloodtoil Valley. I can find her in the Bosmer village in Bloodtoil Valley.
Lambur is leading me to the Orc forces at Carzog's Demise.
I'm in some strange pocket within Vaermina's plane of Quagmire. I must approach the shrine and hear what Vaermina has to say.
Vaermina has revealed her true plan. Her ultimate target is King Emeric. I should rush back and warn Abbot Durak.
<<1>> marked the hiding spots of the Merethic Society's treasures on my map. I should recover and bring these relics to <<2>>, at the entrance of Rulanyil's Fall.
I found several of the Merethic Society's treasures, and should return them to <<1>> by the entrance of Rulanyil's Fall.
<<1>> suggested I loot Sea Drake hampers for uniforms, then use them to diguise myself. This will fool most Sea Drakes, but not the alert ones.
I need to kill giant snakes and take their glands for Aniel's plan to come to fruition.
I have everything I need to pull off Aniel's tricks. I should decide whether I want to play the trick on the Khajiit first, or the Wood Elves.
I need to collect glow gust from the wisps on the southern shore and azurite from the mountains to the north to cleanse Azura's Shrine.
<<1>> said the people I rescued would be clever. <<2>> knows something about the ritual book I've just found. Now that I have it in my hands, perhaps she can tell me more.
<<1>> keeps the poison antidote on her nightstand.
I should follow Jakarn.
I need to escape the Grave.
I should talk to Jakarn.
I should talk to Jakarn. He's at the inn.
I should talk to Jakarn. He's at the inn.
I should talk to Jakarn. He's at the inn.
I should talk to Jakarn. He's at the inn.
Vaermina seeks to trap me here in her realm, but perhaps there is some way to escape.
Vaermina wishes to speak to me. I have little choice but to listen.
The Bloodthorn Cultists are in the ruins and have released a spectral army that's wiping out the Orcs. I need to find out how they did it and stop them.
Talk to Jakarn at the inn.
Talk to Jakarn at the inn.
An Altmer woman named Irien is really mad at Jakarn. I could talk to her to find out why.
Aelif knows this crystal setup that blocks our path through the Halls. I need to listen to her instructions and do as she asks.
<<1>> suggested I investigate a crypt in the center of the Breton graveyard.
An ancient Breton spirit resides in this tomb. I should see what she has to say.
<<1>> offered me her Staff of Arkay to wield against the Bloodthorn Cult and their zombies.
The Staff of Arkay is drained of energy. To recharge it, I must disrupt Bloodthorn rituals across the graveyard and collect the motes of energy that result.
I have recharged the staff. Now I need to talk to <<1>> in the graveyard.
I can now use the recharged Staff of Arkay to draw out abominationsâ€”Bloodthorn Cult monstersâ€”that lurk in Oblivion, then destroy them to break the cult's power over the Breton dead.
<<1>> showed me how his kingdom fell to the Seamount Orcs. He also told me of an ancient Ayleid weapon hidden somewhere on the island.
With the Green Lady off to confront the Hound in the town of Silvenar, I should search around <<1>> for any sign of <<c:2>> or his capture.
With the Green Lady off to confront the Hound in the town of Silvenar, I should search around <<1>> for any sign of <<c:2>> or his capture.
With the fort secured, Shazah has asked me to find her sister Khali. I can apparently now pass through the dark fire barrier that previously stopped anyone from entering the temple.
I unlocked the hidden door. I should follow Naryu through the door and meet her on the other side.

Naryu decided she had to warn her partner, Varon, about the situation down here. She also promised to send the Ordinators to help me. In the meantime, I need to find whoever's responsible for activating the protective wards.

I found a mage bound within one of the underground chambers. Before I could set her free or ask any questions, the Maulborn rushed in. I need to survive this assault if I want to find out what's going on.
Almalexia said she was taking Farona, the Maulborn prisoner, to the Mages Guild to have her wounds tended to. I should go there and find out what she knows.

Farona said that a large number of Maulborn soldiers left the sewers before I got there. She gave Almalexia the same information. She also passed on a message. I'm to find an Ordinator to get additional instructions from the Sacred Lady.
I need to speak to an Ordinator.

A dark fire barrier is sealing the entrance to the temple. I was able to pass through the dark fire barrier that lead down here, perhaps I can do the same here? I should touch the barrier to find out.
Sure enough, I was able to disrupt the barrier. Time to head into the temple.
Another barrier blocks our way. I should speak to <<1>>.
Khali thinks that this new barrier won't be disrupted by just a touch. We'll have to find a way to the far side in order to open a way through.
A strange ritual site is sealing shut the door. I need to disrupt the ritual.
We did it! I should speak to Khali again.
Shazah suggested that either she or her sister would be able to hold off any remaining Dro-m'Athra. She wishes me to choose one of them to accompany me into the final part of the temple.
I found the font of darkness that allowed the Dro-m'Athra into the fort. Time to seal it up.
I must use the Staff of Arkay to draw out the abominations.
After defeating the abomination, I should retrieve the staff.
<<1>> followed me into the graveyard. She may be able to help me deal with the Bloodthorn Cult.
Rilyn's letter suggested <<1>> may have been afraid of her parents. A thorough search of the house may reveal more information.
Rilyn's journal reveals that he killed Raerana's family. I must let Raerana know.
Both pranks were played, and Aniel's asked me to follow her.
I defeated the Lava Queen and took the Brimstone Crown to become the new Champion of the Blessed Crucible. I should speak to Talres.
While <<1>> and her troupe get in position on the ship, she's asked me to go with <<2>> and recover the performers' supplies salvaged by the Steel Shrikes.
<<1>> will be waiting for me below the deck of the Steel Shrikes' ship. I should tell her I've recovered her supplies.
High King Emeric asked me to find Captain Ernele in Wayrest and ask if he noticed anything suspicious while he was in Gavaudon.
I found journals offering the Drublog perspective and pieced together parts of Bloodtoil Valley's history. I should give these to the local spinner.
I have accepted Talres Voren's offer and must make my way to the Blessed Crucible.
I should speak to <<1>> about the journal I recovered.
The doors are blocked by barriers. I need to find a way through to continue my search.
<<1>> is going to open us a portal to the Dwemer ruin Doshia apparently visited. I should wait for her to finish.
I need to recover both the prismatic crystal and the Ayleid tome. They are somewhere within the ruins of Mzeneldt.
Sees-All-Colors is going to create a portal to return to the Fighters Guild. I should wait until she's finished.
Jofnir Iceblade appeared before I could go through the portal. I should speak to him and see what he wants.
Feluz was very happy to get his bag of goods and lucky pouch back. He said to talk to his wife, Liane, about my reward.
I returned the bag of goods to Feluz, but not his lucky pouch. He seemed ungrateful. He said to talk to his wife, Liane, about my reward.
Liane saw me give Feluz his lucky pouch, and she isn't very happy about it. I should talk with her before I continue on my way.
Liane was happy with how I handled Feluz. I should talk to her about my reward.
I remember the cavern collapsing and then everything went black. Apparently I survived though. I should speak with Ghashur.
I need to go around the "eternal sentinel's gate" that's visible from the Saintsport lighthouse until I reach a shrine and then go northwest to find the "warrior" landmark.
I need to walk 45 paces south from the warrior statue west of <<1>>.
I need to find the "island of iron faces."  The clues suggest that the landmark is visible from trees southeast of a point 45 paces south of the warrior statue west of <<1>>.
I need to find the "stone ship" by going the direction indicated by the "rocky finger," which should lead "through the broken ship."
Now that I've found the stone "ship" formation west of Saintsport, I need to dig "beneath the leaves in the ship's port" to unearth the buried treasure.
I dug up the treasure chest.  It's time to open it and see what's inside.
I knocked out the support beams, and the cavern is coming down. I should probably run for the exit.
I should look for a key that will free <<1>>. He said to look for it on guards within Cumberland's Watch.
Now that I've got the key, I should return to <<1>>.
I can either kill Rama as was requested or I can collect Rama's sword and take it back to Captain Ernard so he believes the deed was done.
Now that Rama is dead, I should return to <<1>> and give him the news.
I should look for Rama's cousin, Harimal.
I should return to <<1>> and give him the story Harimal and I agreed upon.
Having entered the Blessed Crucible, I must now speak with Talres Voren.
I should read the letter from the buried chest.
Endarre's log spoke of red crystals held by the nearby guardian constructs. Perhaps finding some of them will help me advance.
I must venture into the first Arena and defeat The Pack.
<<1>> is unharmed, but she got split up from <<2>> when they were attacked. I should continue following the trail and see if I can find him along the way.
It looks like the search party was ambushed. As I followed the trail, I spotted <<1>>. I should see if she's all right.
<<1>> suggested searching the nearby camp for clues. Something in the area might indicate where <<2>> is being held.
I found <<1>> and a note from <<2>> which indicates <<3>> is being held in a nearby cave. I should tell <<4>>.
<<1>> wants me to soften up his harassers with a little beating before demanding passage for him. Or, I can try to convince their leader <<2>> to transport <<1>> to Anvil.
<<1>> is injured, but should make it back to the village. Now I just need to escort her back to the village.
I should return the Stonechewers' tribal totem to the Goblin cave north of Cumberland's Watch.
I entered the spirit realm. Now I need to kill Vardan.
With Vardan dead, I should examine the Ayleid relic.
I need to speak with Azlakha to find out what to do.
It seems the Drublog killed and burned the remnants of the Tanglehaven militia. However, I heard someone yelling for help. If there is a survivor, I should find them.
<<1>> is alive! I should speak with her.
I must seek out the Prophet and speak with him.
The Prophet has opened a gateway to Oblivion. I must enter the gateway and rescue Lyris, who was trapped while facilitating our escape from Coldharbour.
I can see Lyris nearby. I need to speak to her.
Lyris has deep regrets about leaving home and never resolving issues with her father. I need to unfetter her from this shackle.
I aided Lyris in overcoming her biggest regret. We should continue on.
Lyris was always made to feel alone everywhere she went. Oblivion seems to have constructed a mockery of an event in her life, where Imperial troops would mock her and steal her armor.
I recovered Lyris's armor and with it a great deal of her confidence. We should continue on.
Lyris has been confronted with a vision of Abnur Tharn on the cliff face.
Lyris has overcome her fears and reclaimed her mighty axe. We need to continue on.
Lyris and I witnessed a projected image of Sai Sahan being tortured.
Lyris and I saw a vision of Sai Sahan being tortured. We need to get back to the Prophet and tell him what we saw.
Lyris's growing terror is being made manifest. We must defeat whatever challenge lies ahead and escape.
Lyris has reclaimed her memories. It is time to escape Oblivion through the portal the Prophet has opened.
Lyris Titanborn is freed from her prison. I must speak to the Prophet.
Neramo is searching for something among these ruins. His helper said I should speak to him if I want to know more. I should look for him near the entrance.
The journal instructed me to find the Argonian's camp, located south of Silvenar along the river. I need to look for further instructions on an alchemy table there.
I've found the Argonian's camp. I should look for further instructions on the alchemy table.
The Argonian's instructions said to find a thunderbug near the river, and drink a potion in order to take control of the creature.
I've taken control of a thunderbug using a strange potion. Now I need to bring it back to the Argonian. I should stick close to the river or I might lose control of the thunderbug.
I brought a thunderbug to the Argonian, and it seems to have taken away the lightning enveloping him. I should talk to him to find out what happened.
I talked to <<1>>, the Argonian once enveloped in lightning. He was thrown into the river after being overwhelemed by a horde of thunderbugs. I should speak to him to make sure he's all right.
I should try to open the ancient coffer and see what's inside.
The Pack has been defeated but I stand accused of cheating. I must now head deeper into the Blessed Crucible to find out what's become of Talres Voren.
Talres Voren is held prisoner for the crime of cheating. I must free him to earn my winnings.
It seems the only escape now is victory. I must defeat the Lava Queen and take the Brimstone Crown.
In order to begin the tour, I should go to the shrine of the Green Lady at the center of Deepwoods and talk with <<1>>.
We've reached the next place important to the Green Lady's history. It's the waterfall outside the village.\n\nWe should be cautious, as there are still werewolves and Houndsmen around.
We arrived at the archery range, where <<1>> will continue the story of the current Green Lady.
I saw the waterfall and heard how Gwaering, the Green Lady, once saved herself and a companion from senche.\n\nThe next place to see is a nearby archery range.
I heard the story of <<1>> and some its the key sites related to Gwaering and her selection as the new Green Lady. I should thank <<2>> for her time.
Shazah has sealed the fort and needs to cast the final ritual at the central tree to drive out the Dro-m'Athra.
Shazah is performing the final ritual to seal the fort. I should wait until her ritual is over.
<<1>> is dead. <<2>> took his heartblood, as instructed by Hircine. I should follow her back to <<3>>.
I should speak to <<1>> when I'm ready to help her with her heist.
<<1>> has revealed what she plans to steal - Bhosek's records of incoming shipments and cargoes. She can sell this to King Fahara'jad for a great deal of money.
The first step in breaking into Headman Bhosek's palace is to acquire a servant disguise.
For a fee, one of Bhosek's servants told me where to get a disguise. I must retrieve it.
I have the clothes to disguise myself as a servant. Now to put them on.
I'm now disguised as a servant. I should be able to enter the palace without issue.
We've landed on the island of Betnikh, the Spearhead's home port. I should talk to Captain Kaleen to ask about her plans.
Headman Bhosek isn't inside the palace. I should ask around to find out where he is.
A servant told me Bhosek is out back with female companions. If I'm to slip anything into his drink, I must do it outside.
Headman Bhosek seems occupied with lady friends. As long as I look like a servant, it should be easy to slip Kaleen's powder into his cup.
I've slipped Captain Kaleen's drug into Bhosek's drink. With luck, he'll pass out soon.
I need Headman Bhosek's key to get into his lockbox.
I have the key to Bhosek's lockbox, which is inside the palace, on the upper level.
Bhosek's lockbox holds the shipping logs Kaleen needs to present to King Fahara'jad's envoy, as incriminating evidence against Bhosek. I have the key to open the lockbox, but now I need to find it.
I found Bhosek's lockbox, but his guard is alert. I need to distract or disable him quietly before I can use the key.
Headman Bhosek's lockbox is no longer guarded. I should take the shipping logs and be on my way.
I have Bhosek's shipping logs, the evidence <<1>> wants to sell. I should find her at the docks.
Captain Kaleen is waiting with King Fahara'jad's envoy. I must give her the shipping logs so we can get paid and leave the island.
<<1>> will handle everything from here. When I'm ready to leave, I should follow her onto the Spearhead.
<<1>> revealed our next stop: Betnikh, a small, Orc-controlled island. I should tell her when I'm ready to sail.
We're bound for the Orc island of Betnikh.
Neramo gave me a Dwemer device that should knock out the guard.
The lockbox guard, Helthar, won't leave his post. Perhaps one of the other servants knows something about him.
Helthar is terrified of fire. If I set a fire, it may drive him away from the lockbox.
I should check the Ayleid warlord's remains to make sure the Worm Cult necromancers haven't raised him.
A ghost rose from the warlord's remains, though it does not appear to be Ayleid. I should speak to it.
Captain Lerisa is a master of disguise. Perhaps she can help with the servant disguise in the palace.
Jakarn is a master thief. Perhaps he can get the key off Headman Bhosek.
Neramo may be able to help me get the shipping logs out of Bhosek's lockbox.
Lyris is unable to leave Oblivion due to sorcery that has separated her memories and made them manifest. I need to help heal her before we can leave.
I should speak with the Silvenar to obtain a wedding invitation.
Dusant suggested I deliver the Dresan Index to his friend, Valinwe, an evoker mage he was supposed to meet in Aldcroft.
I collected evidence that suggests a young woman who was wronged by the Baelborne family now haunts the area. I should report back to Athel and tell him what I learned.
I need to search the library in the Mages Guild in Daggerfall to see if I can find any books that reference ways to summon spirits and communicate with them.
A cloaked man approached me as I perused a book on spirits. He seems to know a thing or two about the subject. I should talk to him.
I need to find a good place within the Themond mine to bury Claudie's old belongings. That should summon her spirit to me.
I should use the totem to see if it will grant me a vision.
I should follow the Bloodthorn Cultist.
The vision shows two Bloodthorn Cultists conversing. I should listen.
The cultists spoke of Ayleid ruins. There may be another vision to observe.
I need to find the Bloodthorn lair and learn more of their plans.
I found their lair. I should try to find Vardan now.
I should listen to Vardan discuss their plans.
I should tell Laganakh of Vardan's plans.
Lerisa has a disguise waiting for me at the entrance to the palace.
I found Lyris's armor. I need to give it to her and see if it helps.
I need to travel to the town of Silvenar to attend the wedding of the Silvenar and the Green Lady.
I selected Khali to hold the Dark Mane. Shazah will be the next Mane. I should speak to her.
I should find Rulorn. He may buy these parts from me.
Rulorn wants me to help him activate a Dwarven sphere that he repaired using the parts I gathered.
I need to finish reporting to Captain Odreth about the mission.
I need to talk to the Silvenar and find out how I can help him enter the city. <<1>> warned me against entering the city but I need to get to him soon.
<<1>> would like me to lead him to  <<2>>.
I need to find Saintsport's "star" to begin the trail of clues left by Captain Izad.
I decided to help <<1>>, I should speak to him in his house.
I need to speak to <<1>> one more time.
I need to speak to Ezzag one more time.
I need to speak to Kalari once more.
Shuzura has instructed me to speak to Tazia to get a few pieces of gold for my troubles. I should speak to the Clan Mother's assistant.
I should report to Captain Odreth.
Shazah told me that there's a kind of dark ward on the temple door. To get inside, we'll have to cleanse several moonlight beacons around the temple grounds.
I think I have everything Ongalion needs. I should return to his camp, and speak with him again.
I cleansed the moonlight beacons around Moonmont. I should work with the Champions to dispel the ward on the temple door.
Shazah cracked the ward open with an impressive display of magic. We should head inside.
I found a locket while fighting the skeletons of the invaders. I think it belonged to Rosalind. Leon said she went to light the signal fire. I should do that next.
Leon Milielle said I could lift the curse by reliving the last moments of his wife Rosalind's life. I should ask him how I should proceed.
There is a rock wall nearby that Lyris has suggested she can break down.
I should head out to <<1>>'s well and see about these rats.
It seems that the well opens up into a cave. A Khajiit is crouched near where I dropped into the water, and hissed for me to speak with her.
Tazia has suggested I might be able to shut down the laboratory and distract the skooma peddlers if I smash their laboratory tables.
I smashed enough tables that this place should burn up quickly. Now I just need to light the fumes that are filling the cave.
This place is filling up with smoke and fire. I should get out quick.
I need to find Andewen and ask her how I can help at the Falinesti Autumn Site.

I was told to destroy the corruption stones in order to gain entry to the root system of Falinesti, the Halls of Ichor. I can find the corruption stones among the caves the great city's roots have left behind.
Now that I've destroyed the stones, I can enter the Halls of Ichor.
I've entered the deeper root system that was left behind by the city of Falinesti. I need to find Telenger somewhere in this mess.
Telenger is at a new camp deeper inside the Falinesti tunnels. I should speak to him there.
Telenger has teleported away, saying that the real trouble is at a Daderic temple he accidentally unearthed. I should try to find where he's gone in the tunnels.
Telenger has a spell to crack the ward on the temple door. I need to protect him from whatever dangers may appear while he casts the spell.
Telenger successfully opened the door to the temple. I should meet him inside.
I need to destroy the source of corruption within the temple.
Mephala seemed to say that Telenger allowed her to claim part of the Falinesti Faithful as new cultists. I should talk to him about the situation.
Telenger will seal the temple and teleport us outside before his spell takes complete effect. I should wait until he's finished.
Now that we're at Telenger's camp, I should speak to him about what happened.
I found the schematics by the remains of one of the unfortunate thieves. I should find Neramo and deliver them.
I should speak with Neramo. I may need to enlist his help in getting off this island.
I agreed to recruit Jakarn for Captain Kaleen's heist. He's trapped in a prison called the Grave beneath Headman Bhosek's palace. First I have to find the entrance.
I collected <<mz:1>> from the Houndsmen. Now I need to talk to <<2>> and find out what the Silvenar needs me to do next.
I defeated the guardian, at least temporarily. The Silvenar can now project his essence into the city. I should talk to his Psijic projection while the interval lasts.
I should let Talres Voren know when I am ready to proceed.
I should speak with Captain Odreth, the leader of the Vinedusk Rangers. He can tell me how I can help his unit out.
I should use Glooredel's admixture to ignite the sap in the Vinedusk houses.

I have primed the houses in the village. Time to meet up with Glooredel and ignite the village. She told me to meet her at her workshop in one of the large bulb houses, near the northwest edge of the village.
I have primed the houses in the village. Time to meet up with Glooredel and light the place.
I need to finish reporting to Captain Odreth about the mission.
Captain Odreth asked me to speak with Glooredel, his unit's alchemical engineer, about their plan to drive the Colovians out of the village.
It seems <<1>>'s fears overcame him. I'll need to kill the beast alone.
I agreed to help <<1>> prove he's not a coward. I should help him find his sword.
Ezzag has asked me to investigate his field and discover who is stealing his crops.
A group of bandits attacked me while I was in the field. They mentioned a cave nearby, and one of them ran off up the nearby trail. I should follow.
I found where the bandits are hiding out. I should explore and see what I can find.
A woman appeared at the far end of the cave and told me to stop fighting her people. I should speak with her and see what she wants.
I think I managed to anger the bandit's leader. She wants me to "see something." I'm betting this is a trap.
It was a trap. I'll have to kill <<1>>.
Jakarn is by the exit to the Grave. I should talk to him.
I should climb up to the upper level of the Grave and exit.
I should talk with Lyris and make sure she is all right.
Aniel has asked me to accompany her while she introduces me to the leaders of the Wood Elf and Khajiit groups at Thormar. She wants me to start with the Khajiit Yanabir-ja.
I need to harvest poisoned stems from the stranglers growing around Thormar.
I offered Kalari my help in understanding what's going on in her house. I should head inside.
Sure enough, the house is full of what seem to be ghosts, but they're not attacking me. I should search the place to see if I can figure out what's going on.
I found a hidden room behind a bookshelf on the second floor! Maybe I'll find some answers in here.
Mathal may be behind this entire "ghost" scheme. Kalari thinks he might be hiding out in Rakhad's old house. I should confront him there.
I found Mathal dead in the middle of some kind of ritual circle. This must be what's causing the "ghosts" to appear in Kalari's house. I need to stop the ritual.
I need to tell Kalari what happened. Or do I? I could just lie to her and tell her Mathal has left town. I need to decide how to approach this.
I should remember to use the Dark Poison on the stranglers before I kill them and harvest the stems.
I defeated Mother Murk. I should head back to the northern wyress camp and tell Sibellec.
I decided to give the ring to Jurak for a cut of his profits. I should talk to <<1>> one more time.
The note said that if I find any Daedric artifacts, Aralyon the Scholar will pay handsomely for them.
I found a Daedric artifact in Knife Ear Grotto. I should take it to Aralyon the Scholar. He's at the Daedric ruins east of Narsis.
I need to fight my way past the dark spirits to retrieve Rid-Thar's ring.

As I walked up on Jurak, I saw him arguing with a priestess of the lunar faith. It seems Jurak isn't a priest at all, but instead is a thief. I should decide how I want to proceedâ€”give the ring to Jurak or to the priestess.
I decided to give the ring to the priestess for safekeeping. I should talk to <<1>> one more time.
General Godrun wants to break through the Ironhand ogres' lines and take the tower up above. He asked me to report to Sergeant Olfin to find out what I should do.
I acquired the ring. I should return to Jurak.
The note mentions a bag of kwama eggs. I should try to find the bag.
I found the bag of kwama eggs mentioned in the note. Now I should leave Lady Llarel's Shelter.
The note next to the body mentioned that the Dark Elf's mother was in Deepcrag Den. I should bring the eggs to her.
I should read the note next to the body of the Dark Elf.
I should speak to a House Redoran retainer named Lladrelo. I should be able to find him at Tal'Deic Fortress.
I should return the vase to <<1>> in <<2>>.
I returned the vase to <<1>>. I should speak to her one more time.
Glooredel gave me the honor of lighting the root network. I should use the torch to ignite it.
Glooredel gave me the honor of lighting the root network. I should use the torch to light it.
Aniel's described some fun tricks we can play on the Wood Elves and Khajiit. To get started, I'll have to gather some poison from Dolirdor's pack and one of the Wood Elf rotmeth barrels.
Now that we have some privacy from Dolirdor, Aniel wants to speak to me.
I must also serve drinks to the crowd of Bandits around the bar.
Aniel wants me to worship Baan Dar before I enjoy the party. I must collect <<1>>s by using the <<2>> on chickens.
I need to talk to <<1>>.
I need to talk to <<1>>.
I've returned to Reaper's March. I should speak to <<1>> in the ruins at Thormar.
<<1>> made it back to the village. I should find out if she needs any more help.
I should look for the owner of the shield. <<1>> is my best bet.
I found the owner of the Nord shield, <<1>>, at the <<2>>. I should return the shield to him.
Aniel has asked me to accompany her while she introduces me to the leaders of the Wood Elf group at Thormar. I should lead her to Dolirdor.
Razum-dar is dead and the circlet destroyed. I should speak to the Centurion.
I should report back to Captain Odreth about the success of the mission.
I should report back to Captain Odreth about the success of the mission.
I need to get those seeds back from the Goblins.
I recovered the seeds. I should bring them to <<1>> in Cropsford.
<<1>> is belowdecks in Captain Helane's ship, in a storeroom. <<2>> said I'd find a key in the back room.
I should find Gugnir in <<1>> and give him <<2>>'s crown.
Gugnir fears <<1>> is preparing to attack <<2>>. Once I kill <<1>>, I should collect his crown as proof.
Verrik is dead and King Casimir is safe. I should speak to King Casimir.
I need to speak to <<1>> to understand what's going on in town.
I decided to help <<1>>, I should speak to him near his barn.
I decided to help <<1>>, I should speak to her near her new house.
The ward is down! Time to enter the vault.
I've destroyed the circlet, as Raz wanted. Senalana has begun to crumble around me. Time to get out of here!

The scouts let me know that Eye of the Queen Razum-dar has led some troops into the vault. To get inside, I'll need to crack a ward on the entrance. I need to return a pair of welkynd stones to this entrance.
I have the stones I need to get past the ward. Just need to place the stones back in the sconces near the entrance.
I'll need to make my way through the vault to find the Queen's agent, Razum-dar.
Raz wants me to get at the circlet, which I need to do by hitting a series of triggers in sequence.
Raz has put a difficult choice on my shoulders. If I destroy the circlet, he'll die. If I take the circlet I'll free him, but he doesn't want that to happen.
Razum-dar is alive and well in the Centurion's campâ€”and he looks very angry. I should speak with him.
Despite what Razum-dar wanted, I've taken the circlet. Senalana has begun to crumble around me. Time to get out of here!
I've found the Queen's agent, Razum-dar! Time to talk to him and figure out what's going on here.
Shazeem was grateful for the return of his belongings. I should speak with him.
The villagers yet to give offerings are <<1>>, <<2>>, <<3>>, and <<4>>. I should speak with them.
Now that I've collected the offerings, I should bring them to Zenithar's shrine in the village.
I should return to <<1>> and let her know I've gathered the offerings and brought them to the shrine.
The bandits in the ruins wouldn't let the brothers pass. They agreed to allow <<1>> to venture into the ruins with the bandits, but he hasn't returned. I've agreed to search the ruins for him.
I found <<1>> near the back of the ruins. He seems to be injured. I should speak to him and see if he's able to walk.
I found <<1>> at the back of the ruins. Now I need to escort him to the entrance.
I found <<1>> at the back of the ruins, collected the plant sap that should help heal <<2>> and escorted <<1>> to safety. I should speak to <<1>> to see what he plans to do next.
I need to speak to Ezzag and find out what is going on.
I should meet with Sergeant Herdor, who will explain more about this operation.
I should follow Sergeant Herdor's instructions as we make our way through the tunnel and into the Colovian camp.
I've been given lease to cause as much damage to the Colovian encampment as posisble. I'm to kill soldiers, light fires, and raise a ruckus.
I should find the Colovian command unit and kill them.
I should follow Herdor and Odreth into the inner chamber in order to ensure that their dead leader's body is unharmed.
With Faolchu dead and the Lion Guard in Camlorn, my job here is mostly done. I should talk to Captain Darien Gautier before I leave.
Now that I've killed the Night Terror, I should free High King Emeric.

I need to get inside the spinners' homes and search for clues to solving their prison-puzzles.\n\nThe Silvenar said I can free them either by solving the puzzles, or killing the spinners, but he'd rather I do the former.

I interrogated some of the bewitchers and learned a little about the spinners. The Silvenar told me to meet him at the base of the Great Tree in the center of the city. Hopefully, he has more information.
<<1>> doesn't want to leave until he has the plant sap. He asked me to look for a plant next to the Ayleid well. I should look for the plant and take its sap.
I got the plant sap. I should return it to <<1>> at the back of the ruins.
I found <<1>> at the back of the ruins and collected the plant sap that should help heal <<2>>. Now I need to escort <<1>> back to the entrance of the ruins.
Captain Kaleen agreed to give me a cut of the profits if I can recruit some useful people to help her with her heist.
Ufgra asked me to gather produce from around Cropsford and bring it to her in the center of town.
I've collected six sacks of produce for Ufgra and should return to her.
I need to find Captain Kaleen at the Screaming Mermaid and convince her to cut me in on her upcoming heist.
I found <<1>> at the back of the ruins and managed to escort him to the entrance. I should speak to <<1>> to see what he plans to do next.
I need a bargaining chip before Captain Kaleen will cut me in on her heist.
High King Emeric asked me to follow him to the throne room.
I need to speak to Ezzag one more time.
I should look for the dead man's sister, Terina. Back in town is the most likely place to start.
Before I purchase his monkey, I should see exactly what Shazeem is offering.
Shazeem loaned me his monkey to prove it can find lost treasure. It's sure eager to show me something.
The monkey ran off to the shore. I should follow it.
The monkey dug up a blade. I should take a closer look.
The blade I found belongs to Shazeem. It seems the monkey is trying to lead me to his lost belongings. I should see what else the monkey can find.
I've recovered Shazeem's belongings. I should let him know what I found.
I should find someone in <<1>> interested in buying <<2>>'s crown.
I need to talk to <<1>> to see what's really going on.
I saw the archery range and heard the story of Gwaering and her friend Ulthorn's close companionship.\n\nWe should return to the village for the last step of the tour.
After learning about Gwaering's childhood prowess, I'm ready to hear the final part of the Gwaering's story.
I need to speak to Kalari once more.
She asked me to travel to Culotte and kill some of the undead I find there.
I thinned the number of dead in Culotte and should inform <<1>>.
The spinners' bonds are broken. I can return to the Silvenar and find out what he needs me to do next. He should be at the base of the Great Tree.
Captain Kaleen is ready to start her heist. When I'm done recruiting, I should look for them at their hideout in town.
I met Nicolene in Captain Kaleen's hideout in <<1>>.
Nicolene said I should look for Crafty Lerisa in Saintsport. Her ship, the Maiden's Breath, crashed there recently.
Nicolene said I should look for Jakarn in the Grave, a prison beneath Headman Bhosek's palace in <<1>>.
Nicolene suggested I look for Neramo at the Dwemer ruin of Bthzark.
I should search the corpse for a clue.
I should search the barracks house for proof.
I need to speak to <<1>> in his house to understand what's actually going on.
I should speak with <<1>> and let her know everything that's happened.
Shuzura mentioned an old cave Rakhad used to use for "projects" when he helped her run the town. Sounds like the perfect place to house a burgeoning criminal empire.
Sure enough, there are shifty-looking folks hanging around in the cave. Time to see if I can find Rakhad.
I found Shuzura's old assistant, the source of all of S'ren-ja's troubles. I need to kill <<1>> to keep the town safe.
I've done what I can for the town. Time to go back and speak to Shuzura again.
I need to decide if Baron Sorick should be left to the mob or turn in to the guard.
When Baron Sorick fled, the peasants downstairs caught him. He's at their mercy. I should speak to one of the people at the inn about what Baron Sorick did.
<<1>> asked me to keep an eye out for her fellow soldiers. Investigating the scene of the attack might yield clues to their whereabouts.\n\nWith any luck I'll find the scout there, as well.
<<1>> is dead and <<2>> is free. Maybe he can shed some light on what happened here.
<<1>> asked me to search the road where the Fists of Thalmor were attacked.

I joined forces with a scout searching for her comrades. She identified several campsites and other areas of interest to our search.\n\nIn her possession are some specially treated arrows that can destroy the undead before they rise.
I should return the item to its rightful owner in Wayrest.
Now that I have firewood, I should travel Crown Point and re-light the flame.
I should return to <<1>> and let her know the tower is lit again.
First, I need to collect some firewood from Bosekus's house.
He died before telling me where she lives, but I should look for <<1>>.
Sir Lanis has requested to speak with me before I leave. I should find him in by the commander's tent.
If I spot any of them, I should kill it and then report back to Ufgra.
I killed a Goblin skirmisher and should let Ufgra know.
Ongalion asked me to search the root, water, and soil samples. He can use these to judge how healthy the site is.
I should travel to the Hedoran estate to see what I can find.
I found an item at the Hedoran estate. I should bring it to <<1>> in Cropsford.
I need to get through this hallway full of traps to get to Razum-dar.
I need to get through this hallway full of traps to get to Razum-dar.
Lambur asked me to investigate Grimfield, Moriseli, and the Carved Hills. Bloodthorn Cultists were seen there after the attack on Stonetooth. I may be able to find out more about their plans.
Nicolene has an urgent message for me. I should see what she has to say.
Chieftain Tazgol has mobilized the Seamount clan and moved to engage the Bloodthorn Cult at Carzog's Demise. Lambur fears they're walking into a trap.\n\nI should tell her what I've found out.

Raz told me there were four triggers to press to access the circlet. The first was the one furthest left, the second was the one furthest right. He didn't know the other two triggers. I'll have to figure those out myself.
Now that I've located <<1>>'s mother, Iriel, I should let her know that her son died opposing the Veiled Heritance in <<2>>.
I've reached Mathiisen. I should ask around to see if anyone knows Vareldur, and who his mother might be.
The altars are cleansed and the array appears to be destroyed. The <<1>> is still here. I should speak to it.
The altars are cleansed. I should return to the array and see if the spirits have escaped.
An Orc on the dock says Lambur may know more about the Bloodthorn Cult assault on Stonetooth Fortress.
Perhaps I should travel to Mathiisen, and try to find this man's mother.
If I lose the disguise Kip gave me, I can find a new one in a Red Rook pack.
I freed the Orc spirits from the curse and they are at peace once more. I should speak to Azlakha about what happened here.
When I picked up the relic, a ghost appeared and called to me. I should speak with her.
I should speak to Angrel one more time.
The lieutenant is injured and <<1>> appears mesmerized by some manner of spirit. It doesn't appear hostile. I should find out what it wants.
Odei asked me to recover his sewing box, pack of silk threads, and book of patterns.
I don't see Odei, but I spotted a Lion Guard soldier looking for someone. I should talk to her.
I don't see Odei, but I spotted a Lion Guard soldier looking for someone. I should talk to her.
I should inform the guards at the manor of the note I found at Ilessan Tower.
I should talk to <<1>> and get some of the food he feeds the Goblin.
Sugar leaf is the secret ingredient in Goblin's Delight. I've offered to collect some in return for a sample of the food.
I've collected enough sugar leaf. I should bring it to <<1>>.
Zich is dead. I should let <<1>> know.
<<1>> has poisoned the Goblin's Delight. I need to place the food on Zich's pallet.
After speaking with <<Ac:1>>, I was transported to a wooded glade. I should talk to <<Ac:1>> and determine what must be done to find the soldiers.
She asked me to hide some of them in a chest on the outskirts of town.
I hid some of Cropsford's books and survived a Goblin ambush. I should let Ufgra know.
<<1>> gave me a bowl of Goblin's Delight. Now I need to find <<2>> so she can add her special ingredient.
I should bring the journal to Odette Vinielle at Glenumbra Moors.
I woke up in the king's bedroom. I should speak to the king.
I should find this Gaireth in Skywatch, and try to collect the reward promised by the inscription.
Three keystones can unseal the way into the ruins of Moriseli. I need to activate each of them before the door will open.
I should bring the note with the healing salves recipes that I found to the nearby Lion Guard Redoubt.
<<AC:1>> offered to lead me to <<2>>, who is being held by a Daedra named <<3>>. Three barriers lie between us. With luck, he'll survive long enough for us to reach him.
A vision of the Daedric Prince Mephala has appeared to us. I should speak to her and learn what's going on here.
Telenger has rushed ahead into the next chamber. I should follow him.
I should leave the Goblin's Delight on the pallet under the bridge.
I placed the poisoned Goblin's Delight, but Zich won't come out while I'm here. I should hide.
I convinced Gelvin to ignore the evidence against Lord Diel and just finish the job so the Daggers can get paid. I'll meet him outside after I give the fifth harpy egg to Lord Diel.
One member of the Daggers did make it back to camp. Lord Diel and his sons have asked me to help Bumnog find the Daggers and finish their job. I should talk to Bumnog and get more information.
I should tell <<1>> about what was really going on in his well.
The last Conduit Stone has been destroyed, and the mage who guarded it defeated. I should speak with Battlereeve Alduril.
I left Do'Krin. I should speak to Azahrr and give her the Claw for safekeeping.
I placed Ehtayah's offerings as she requested. All that remains is to light a candle to memorialize her brother.
I have agreed to help the Altmer forces push the lamias off the Tempest Island shore. There seem to be three nests of them spread across the beach.
I've defeated the lamias on the Tempest Island beach. I should speak to Battlereeve Alduril.
According to Battlereeve Alduril, the lamias are led by a powerful matriarch that has hidden in the caves nearby. I should pursue and defeat her.
I've defeated the lamia matriarch. I should speak to Battlereeve Alduril.

Battlereeve Alduril believes the Maormer are preparing a magical storm to send against the Malabal Tor mainland. I should head deeper into the island to investigate whatever magic the Maormer may be casting and stop them.
I destroyed the abominations and broke the cult's power over the Breton dead. I should find <<1>> and speak with her.
The spirit of <<1>> has appeared nearby. I should see what he has to say.
<<1>> has created a portal. If I touch it I will see past events through the eyes of his enemies, the Seamount Orcs.
I have entered the past in the guise of <<1>>, a powerful Orc. I must speak to <<2>> to learn more about what I'm here to do.

<<1>> told me King Renwic is preparing a spell to destroy the Orcs. I must interrogate the Breton prisoners and find out how to stop him. I should search their belongings for clues as to what they know.
King Renwic plans to summon an undead Ayleid army. To reach him, I must turn two runestones by the door. I must notify War Chief Yzzgol.
To get to King Renwic, I must unlock the door by turning both runestones.
<<1>> waits inside the central room of the ruin, preparing his spell.
I see now through the eyes of Warcaller Targoth. <<1>> seeks great power in an ancient Ayleid ruin. I must learn his fate.
<<1>> found the Ayleid relic he sought but was unable to use it and <<2>> killed him. I should return to the present.
I need to find out how the vision King Renwic showed me pertains to the Bloodthorn plan to conquer the island.
She asked me to kill the Goblin tribe's leader, which should make them less of a threat.
I killed the Goblin chieftain. I should return to Cropsford and let Ufgra know.
The door into the ruins of Moriseli has been unsealed. I should search inside for clues to the source of the risen spirits.
I need to reach the lower chamber of Moriseli, where the necromancer Drusilla uses Targoth's war horn to summon the spirits of his warriors.
I've discovered the necromancer Drusilla in the burial chamber. I need to defeat her to free Targoth from her spell.
Targoth's war horn rests upon an altar here. I must I take it to end Targoth's imprisonment.
Targoth asked that I return his war horn to its place atop his tomb, returning his warriors' spirits to rest. But if I keep the war horn, I might be able to control the spirits.
I returned Targoth's war horn to its rightful place. I should leave the crypts to ensure the spirits are at rest once more.
I decided to keep Targoth's war horn in case we need the spirits to fight the Bloodthorn Cult.
Azlakha says that Neramo has gone ahead to the ruins to seek a way inside. I should look for him at the entryway.
The cave went up in flames and now I find myself outside the cave with Tazia. I should speak to her.
Neramo claims to be able to unseal the door to Moriseli. Once he does, I'll be able to get inside.
I need to speak to <<1>> one more time.
I dealt with the bandits and their leader, one way or another. I should head back to Ezzag and tell him the good news.
I need to speak to Kalari once more.
I need to speak to Kalari once more.
I need to speak to <<1>> one more time.
I should observe the vision of the Bloodthorns at the Ayleid ruins.
I freed the village leaders. I should meet all three at the overlook in the central mountain.
Suronii sent me to find the leaders of the Khajiit and Orc villages. I need to help each to escape to the Overseer's overlook.
I reached the overlook. I should talk to <<1>>.
I need to speak to Ezzag one more time.
There are three tears to close. Mezha-dro will seal the tears if I fight off any Dremora or anything that comes through.
The tears are all sealed. I should speak with Mezha-dro.
Kalari warned me that these ghosts were to be avoided. I should try not to get near them.
Bumnog and I need to find the missing members of the Daggers and help them finish the jobs Lord Diel gave them.
I helped the Daggers finish their jobs and Bumnog wants to talk to me. When we get close to the camp, I should stop and see what Bumnog wants to talk about.

Bumnog let me know that he expects the Daggers to get paid, no matter what Lord Diel is actually up to. I should speak to Lord Diel back at the camp and let him know that his research has been collected.
Granette informed me that her brother was interested in a fishing house on the coast where they first met with Lord Diel. She thinks her brother might be there and asked me to check on him.

I just learned that Lord Diel has orchestrated the entire harpy threat to increase his own profits and reputation. I need to decide whether to convince Gelvin to just finish the job or to reveal Lord Diel's deception.
The Speaker has determined Mane Akkhuz-ri has gone to an outpost called Fort Grimwatch in Reaper's March. I should begin my search there.
I need to speak to Kalari once more.
I need to speak to Kalari once more.
I decided to tell Kalari the truth. She may have an idea of what I can do next to help the town.
I decided to lie to Kalari. She might as well thing Mathal is safe, somewhere. She may have an idea of what I can do next to help the town.
I've defeated the weather mage guarding a strange Maormer artifact before disabling the artifact itself. I should speak to Battlereeve Alduril.
I stopped the ritual. There's a note nearby that may provide more information about this whole sordid affair.
To take the Claw from the depths of Do'Krin, I'll need the blessings of the Bright Moons. I need to save a pair of lunar priests to obtain their blessings.
I have the blessings I need to get the Claw. Time to explore the area.
The First Mane, Rid-Thar-ri'Datta, told me that I'd need to restore the moon altars around the Monastery in order to get to the Claw. The blessings given to me by the high priests should help.
I should enter the Monastery and try to find the Claw.
The spirit of Rid-Thar-ri'Datta has appeared before me. I should speak to him.
I made it to the Golden Claw's resting place. All I need to do now is take it.
I should locate the second conduit, said to be further up the mountain pass, and overload it.
Lyris and I are back in the Harborage. I should speak to the Prophet.
I should head for the summit of Tempest Island to rejoin with Battlereeve Alduril.
I've reached the summit of Tempest Island. I should speak with Battlereeve Alduril.
I need to destroy the final Conduit Stone.
A bound Orc spirit is shackled just inside Moriseli. I should speak with him.
I need to find the Bloodthorn lair and learn more of their plans.
I found the tailor's book of patterns, his threads, and his sewing box. I should look for him at the north end of Cambray Pass and return his tools.
Targoth appeared, freed of Drusilla's spell. I should see what he has to say.
Gelvin, the leader of the Daggers, never returned with the fifth harpy egg, and Lord Diel is extremely angry. I should ask Gelvin's sister, Granette, if she knows where he is.
I need to find Laganakh and tell her the Bloodthorns can now enter the spirit realm.
Atirr asked me to find the <<z:1>> possessed by the Sea Vipers, and meet <<2>> at the entrance to the ruins.
Now that I've recovered the <<z:1>> from the Sea Vipers, I should meet <<2>> at the entrance to the ruins.
I've been asked to rescue Mane Akkhuz-ri whose party was cut off somewhere within the Old Imperial Tunnel.
Mane Akkhuz-ri is returning to Marbruk for reinforcement and suggested that I join Indaenir in trying to determing what the Shade's true motivations might be in ordering the attack on Marbruk.

Indaenir spoke to a torchbug who agreed to lead me to find the remains of cursed Bosmer who are dead but have not been raised. Indaenir hopes they can tell us of the Shade's true motivations. I should follow the torchbug to find the skulls.
The torchbug led me to find the skulls of three Wood Elves who are dead and cannot be raised. I need to bring the skulls to the Stone Table where Indaenir is making preparations to commune with them.

The skulls revealed that the Shade plans to corrupt all of Valenwood, turning it into the "Shadow Wood." To stop the Shade's plans, I must first close the Shadow Rifts through which his influence is spreading.
After closing the Shadow Rifts, I was pulled into the Shadow Wood and taunted by the voice of one of Naemon's Servants. I must confront this Servant of Naemon.
I defeated the Servant of Naemon and escaped from the Shadow Wood. I need to talk to Indaenir to determine what's next.
Indaenir believes there is much more for us to do, but he wants me to return to the forces outside Marbruk and report what we've discovered so far.
I convinced Gelvin to ignore the evidence against Lord Diel and just finish the job so the Daggers can get paid. I'll meet him outside after I give the fifth harpy egg to Lord Diel.
I agreed to help Gelvin deal with Lord Diel. I need to talk to Diel and keep him distracted while Gelvin figures out how to make his lordship pay.

Bumnog managed to snatch a small bag of gems from Lord Diel's camp. It doesn't completely cover the pay the Daggers were promised, but it should be enough to keep them going. I should speak to Gelvin.
Lyris has reclaimed her axe and wants to speak with me.
I placed my frog at the race starting line. Now I need to wait for the race to begin.
I found their lair. I should try to find Vardan now.
My frog has won the race. I should return to <<1>>.
My frog has won the race. I should return to <<1>>.
I need to return to <<1>> to collect my reward.
The last debtor, Captain Marck, is apparently already at the Cloudy Dregs Inn, either talking to S'rashi, or drinking downstairs.
The cultists are able to enter the spirit realm. Time to leave.
I must challenge and defeat three Seamount hunters in the camp south of <<1>>.
I should speak to <<1>> about the Captain's debt.
I've recovered the Green Lady's story from the Hound. I should see if her essence has been corrupted before I leave Valeguard's story-realm.
Now that I know that Estre is the Veiled Queen, I should return to Skywatch at once.
Magula gave me herbs to burn at the shrines around the island. These will enable me to see the visions.
I should speak with Magula back at her longhouse.
After I defeated <<1>>, Yraldar came up and took the dead Orc's head. He wants me to meet him down by the barn.
Queen Nurnhilde wanted me to meet her at the entrance to the crypt. It should be right behind the barracks.

Lord Diel was killed by one of the harpies he was planning to sell on the open market after Gelvin set it free. The Daggers are finished here and they won't be getting paid. I should tell Bumnog what happened.

Bumnog managed to snatch a small bag of gems from Lord Diel's camp. It doesn't completely cover the pay the Daggers were promised, but it should be enough to keep them going. I should speak to Gelvin.
I need to talk to <<1>> in <<2>>.
Return to Khajiit
I died, powering <<1>>'s spell. The image of <<1>> remains. Perhaps I should speak to it.
Lerisa left me a Bloodthorn disguise I can use to sneak past some of the cultists.
I should read the dusty scroll.
I should talk to Khali and prepare for the Two Moons Path.
Marius asked me to collect a wasp husk. Rhea will use it to create an enchanted container in which we can safely capture the poison gas.
I've collected the wasp husk. Now I need to take it to Rhea at the Imperials' camp.
Rhea enchanted the wasp husk and instructed me to ask Marius about their plans.
I'll need to place the enchanted container by the poison gas clouds beyond the camp site.\n\nOnce the gas is contained, I should pick the container back up.
I gave the enchanted container filled with poison to Rhea. She seemed very anxious about what Marius plans.
