I've rescued the scouts. I need to find their leader, Sergeant Galandir, and rescue him.
I rescued Sergeant Galandir. I should talk to him to find out what happened at the Moonhenge.

Sergeant Galandir explained that Captain Ethrel took the rest of the scouts through the portal, which the Daedra have since sealed. I must unseal the portal in order to rescue the Captain and her soldiers.
I used the Daedric portal to enter Coldharbour. I should talk to Captain Ethrel or a member of her squad to find out what happened.

According to the mage, the other members of Captain Ethrel's team scattered when Ethrel was wounded. I need to find them. I should also find the keys to the gateway that leads to this realm's Moonhenge, so that we can close the Daedric portal.
I found the other members of Captain Ethrel's team. I should use the keys I found to unlock the pillars to the gateway that leads to this realm's Moonhenge.
I reached this realm's Moonhenge. The sigil stone is defended by a guardian and crystals. Captain Ethrel's team will take care of the crystals while I fight the guardian.
I reached this realm's Moonhenge. I should take the sigil stone so that the portal can be closed.
The Daedric portal in Moonhenge is sealed. I should tell Sergeant Galandir of my success.
There's a Khajiiti woman at the door to Gonlas' home. Perhaps I should talk to her?

<<1>> seemed shocked to learn of <<c:2>>'s death. She deputized me into <<Ac:3>> guard so I can help pursue the killer. I should examine the notes her guard has assembled of any suspicious activity in the city.
I should see if any of the goods remain.
Sind told me of a woman who apparently works directly for Hadran. She might know where Tand has gone. I should seek out this <<1>>.
Now that I'm finally in <<1>>, I should bring <<2>> the letter.
I've reached <<1>>. Now to find <<2>> and deliver his gifts.
Now that I've reached Cropsford, I should find Hisham and give him the pouch of sand.
The Great Engine overloaded when the Engine Guardian was defeated! I should inform <<1>>.
<<1>> wants to see me. I need to follow <<2>> to his office to find out what he wants.

I need to destroy the three elemental crystals inside the three towers to bring down the magical barrier protecting the entrance to the hall. I also need to collect the gate key from the guarded coffer in the northern section of the ruins.
The captured mages are being held in cells below the Hall of Judgment. I should enter the holding cells and locate them.
I destroyed the elemental crystals and collected the gate key. Now I should meet <<1>> at the entrance to the Hall of Judgment.
I gave the gate key to Malkur. I should follow him into the Hall of Judgment.
The way out has been blocked by a shield spell. The rescued mages can disrupt the spell, but they need time to accomplish that. I should defend them while they work to open the gate.
I have the key to the cages. Now I should free the captured members of the Mages Guild.
The mages cast spells to cause chaos and better cover our escape. I should find <<1>> and the other mages on the road outside the Court of Contempt.
I found the mages on the road outside the Court of Contempt. They've even already opened a portal. I should talk to <<1>> and make sure they're all right.
It's a trap! <<1>> led me into an ambush. I need to defeat his thugs.
Jofnir opened us a portal back to Tamriel! Time to get out of Oblivion.
We've been met by some stern-looking members of the Guild. I should speak with Jofnir.
Countess Hakruba, the head of the council of province generals, is awaiting me.
The countess said that they'd already made up their mind about Merric. I should see what she has to say on the subject.
Merric has been named the new Guildmaster! He's offered to walk me out of the Forge. I should follow him.
It's time to return to the hall where I set out in the first place.
I found Laryaril, Pelidil's spy, badly wounded in the Old Imperial Prison. I should speak to her to find out what happened.

To free Galerion's stamina, I need to recover the energy that was stolen and fed to the slaves. I can either convince the slaves to willingly return the energy, or I can use the Taskmaster's device to destroy them.
I recovered the energy taken from Galerion's stamina. I should talk to the mage's essence and return the energy.
The last fragment of Vanus Galerion's essences is trapped in the Foundry. I need to go there and free the essence of magicka.
Galerion's magicka essence is being used to power the Foundry. I need to unlock the four seals of binding containing the magic that holds him in place.
I released the seals that contained the magic holding Galerion's essence. I should talk to the mage's essence and see if it can break free.
Now that I've collected all of Vanus' essences, I need to find the body of the Great Mage.
According to dead man's journal, the rightmost bridge of Bthzark is secured by traps. The leftmost bridge has wards that will summon constructs unless I sneak past them.
Sheogorath said the tome is mine. I should collect it and return to Valaste.
I'm standing before the Vivicus with the Prismatic Weapon. This is the moment I've been waiting for. I need to destroy Molag Bal's weapon.
<<1>> went ahead to <<2>>. I should meet her there and tell her what I learned of the Dominion's plans.
I should talk to Kireth and see how she wants to approach this.
I should talk to Feluni, the impresario of Thizzrini Arena, to complete my registration in the games.
I should talk to Feluni outside of the arena in order to claim my new title of Summoner Division Champion.
I should talk to Feluni outside of Thizzrini Arena in order to claim my new title as Sorcerer Division Champion.
I should talk to Feluni outside the main arena in order to claim my new title of Swordmaster Division Champion.
I should talk to Feluni outside of Thizzrini Arena in order to claim my new title of Grand Champion of Thizzrini Arena.
Cariel asked me to speak to Kazirra. I can find her in the central part of Arenthia.
Lavinia is dead. I should find Cariel and Kazirra and speak to them.
I collected the Light of Meridia. Now I should speak to the projection of the Ayleid King and see what I should do next.
Before Tzik'nith will tell me the secret to entering the tower, she wants me to recover the stolen lamia eggs from the Wood Elves.
I saw Lavinia's speech to the Arenthians. Cariel told me to head to one of the huts in the market to meet up with the resistance. I'll know it by the statue of a lion at the base of the stair.
I returned <<1>> to Sind, safe and sound. I should speak to Sind again.

Clan Mother Kazirra and Cariel have a plan to destabilize the Colovian hold on Arenthia. Key to this is finding a man named Centurion Gavo and making him talk. I'll have to search the Tower district of Arenthia for correspondence with the Centurion.
I've found a number of letters and notes concerning Centurion Gavo. Kazirra told me to meet up with Cariel behind the titular tower at the back of the district.
Cariel has a plan to catch Gavo unware. She needs me to distract him up in the tower. I'll need to enter the tower and wait for him to arrive.

The Wilderking asked me to seek out the Spinner Maruin at an old abandoned house in Valenwood. There I might learn more about Aranias' true purpose for coming here and what my role in this story should be.
I've discovered the location of Volenfell. I should find this researcher Tharayya and speak to her.
I should follow her trail to Aldunz and investigate further.
I rescued the stolen lamia eggs from the Wood Elf camp. Now I should find Tzik'nith and return the eggs to her.
I should speak with each of the three Division Champions. They can grant me the credentials needed to compete in the Thizzrini Arena.
I have acquired the necessary credentials to compete in the arena games. Now I should talk to the arena's impresario, Feluni, and officially register in the Thizzrini Arena.
I acquired the two shards and they joined to become a single key. Now I need to make my way to the camp at the center of the forest and meet with the lamias.
Queen Fah'jik wants me to use the shard key to open the portal to the council platform. She claims I'll have the help of the lamias when I go to recover her eggs from the Wood Elf elders.
I stepped through the portal. It looks like the lamias have already dealt with the Wood Elves' council of elders. I should speak to the lamia queen and find out what happened.
The lamia queen sent Tzik'nith ahead to open a passage to the tower. I should go northwest and meet up with her.
A projection of King Laloriaran Dynar greeted me as I emerged from the ruined passage. He wants me to collect the Light of Meridia, which he claims can be used to set him free.
I collected the Light of Meridia. Now I should speak to the projection of the Ayleid King and see what I should do next.
Tharayya's journal entries indicate that she traveled to Yldzuun. I should search Yldzuun to investigate further.
I should wait for Gavo to enter the tower.
Gavo has finally arrived. I need to speak with him until Cariel arrives to take him out.
Cariel was able to sneak into the tower and knock Gavo unconscious. I should speak to her about our next move.
I unsealed the Daedric portal. I should enter the Daedric realm and find Captain Ethrel and her scouts.
I should deliver this notebook to <<1>>.
First we must find <<1>>, the mine's owner, and discover what happened to the miners.
We found <<1>> under a pile of Kwama corpses. She said the Dwemer ruins are farther down the tunnels and may have more information about the threat we face.
Tamien recommended I search amongst the ruins for the lost tools. He suggests I bring the tools back to him instead of Stibbons.
Now that I've recovered Lady Laurent's tools from among the ruins, I can choose whether to return them to Tamien or Stibbons.
I've agreed to give the recovered tools to Stibbons. I should speak to him again.
I've agreed to give the recovered tools to Tamien. I should speak to him again.
We found the source of the chaos, the Great Engine, but it is guarded by a monstrous construct. They will both have to be disabled.
<<1>> said <<2>> saved my life. If I want to thank her, I should speak to her about the crew's latest job.
I need to give <<1>>s to the captured slaves around Hadran's camp, so they can escape.
I released the other prisoners from the camp. Now I need to find <<1>>.
I need to release <<1>> from his prison cage.
I rescued <<1>> and he's eager to return to his family. Now I just need to defeat <<2>> to end this.
<<1>> is dead. Now I need to get <<2>> back to his family.
Stibbons suggested I find and speak to Tamien.
The label on the robes indicates they were intended for <<1>> in <<2>>. He might want them back.
I'm in Bruma. Now to find <<1>>.
Kazirra is going to interrogate Gavo and wants me to imprint his confession on the crystal I recovered. I'll need to use the crystal on Gavo.
Now that we have Gavo's confession imprinted, I should speak to Kazirra about what she plans to do with it.

To change the projections scattered around Arenthia, I just have to use the crystal I recovered. It should change the illusions to show Gavo's confession instead of Lavinia's speech. Changing one projection should change the rest.
Lavinia's speech is over, and the Colovians will soon learn the truth about the connection to the Stonefire cult. Cariel wants me to kill General Lavinia, and end their hold on Arenthia.

Kireth is worried that there may be illusions or other spells at work in the library. She suggested that I examine the prisoner notes and look through the windows to determine where the Daedra are holding the scholars.
Before I eliminate <<1>> I need to gather <<2>>s to disguise <<3>> and the other prisoners, to help them escape.
Thorinor wants me to search Shademist Moors for his wife, or some sign that would confirm she is dead.
Thorinor's wife, Elsenia, appeared to me in the moors. I should talk to her.
Elsenia believes she's been "turned." She says there's a story of a Wild Witch in the moors who can create potions to cure anything. I should look for this Wild Witch.
Doralin in Longhaven pointed me to the Wild Witch's hut, near the sea. I should talk to her about a cure for Elsenia's affliction.
I have found Galereth, the Wild Witch. I should talk to her about a potion for Elsenia.
The Wild Witch gave me a potion to cure Elsenia. I should return to her and give her the cure.
Galereth, the Wild Witch, agreed to make a potion to help Elsenia if I provided Hoarvor blood.
I collected the Hoarvor blood that the Wild Witch asked for. I should talk to her about getting a potion for Elsenia.
<<1>> is dead. I should find <<2>> and let him know it's over.
<<1>> knows where the bandits took her son. She told me how to get inside so I can search for <<2>>.
I found Lucius's corpse. He had a note and a key on his body. I should read the note.
Now that I'm in <<1>> I should find <<2>>.

I convinced Erunor to return with his wife Laniriel and the other villagers to the forest realm. I should meet him in the south end of the Shrouded Hollow.

Vanus Galerion wants me to collect vampire blood and use it to mark their lairs. I need to place the blood on the doors to the vampire lairs. This will provide targets for the ritual that he's preparing to perform.
I decided to support Vanus' solution. I should lead him to the ritual sites and defend him while he casts his spells.
I have a limited amount of time in this necromantic form to fill the death rune with the essences of those I slay.
I should travel to <<1>> and speak to <<2>>.
Now that I'm in <<1>>, I need to find <<2>>.
I should talk to the Lunar Champion to determine our next steps.

I should find the other surviving guards within the ruins of Sphinxmoth.

I should free Eliana from her chains.
Now to find <<1>> and deliver the munitions.
Now I should speak to <<1>>.
I should talk to talk to <<1>> to complete my training.

I should light the braziers as quickly as possible to release Vernaus.
I should talk to Veranus.
I should pull the lever to exit the chamber.
I must figure out which panels I need to touch to exit the chamber.
I should talk to Decanus.

<<1>> and <<2>> have different opinions on how to end the vampire threat. Vanus wants to turn the vampires into mindless, docile creatures. Virgar wants to set them free. I need to decide which ritual to proceed with.
<<1>> apparently has something to say, but Vanus doesn't appear to trust her. I should talk to her and see what she wants from us.
I decided to support Virgar's solution. I should lead her to the ritual sites and defend her while she casts her spells.
We returned to the Harvest Heart. <<1>> wants to speak to me before we begin the final phase of the ritual.
We returned to the Harvest Heart. <<1>> wants to speak to me before we begin the final phase of her ritual.
The ritual is complete and the Harvest Heart has been destroyed. I should talk to <<1>>.

Virgar the Red needs my help to complete her ritual. I must destroy the binding totems that Molag Bal uses to control the vampires. They're positioned around the Harvest Heart. Each one destroyed brings Virgar's ritual closer to completion.

Vanus Galerion needs my help to complete the ritual. I must destroy the binding totems that Molag Bal uses to control the vampires. They're positioned around the Harvest Heart. Each one destroyed brings Vanus' ritual closer to completion.
The spirit of the First Mane has appeared before me! I should speak to him.
Rid-Thar told me that I'll need the align the nearby lunar altars before Shazah can crack the second ward. He indicated some kind of carvings on the walls might help me.
<<1>> wanted me to meet him near the Harvest Heart after I placed the blood on the vampire lairs. I should head in that direction.
I should talk to Abnur and finish up with him.
I should ask Veranaus how I can help him.
I should talk to Decanus to see how I can help him.
After we killed a bandit within the burnt farmhouse, Aranias seemed more agitated. I should talk to her to make sure she's all right.
<<1>> waits for me in the town of <<2>>. I should meet him there and tell him what I've learned.
Within the temple at Rawl'kha, the elite of the Aldmeri Dominion have gathered to see the Champions begin the ritual. I should speak to Kauzanabi-jo to get started.
I prepared for the ritual by drinking the moon-sugar elixir. I should speak to either Shazah or Khali to begin walking the path.
Shazah and I have begun her part of the ritual. I should enter the portal that's appeared, and see where it leads.
We walked into a vision of a hut and strange, lurching creatures. Shazah thinks the creatures are supposed to represent victims of the Knahaten flu. We need to fight our way through to move on.
Shazah entered this room expecting to see her vision guide. I should wait and watch to see what happens.
The visions seem to have rattled Shazah. I should speak to her.
More of the visions of Knahaten flu victims have risen before us. Shazah and I will need to survive their attacks to complete the ritual.
We survived. I should speak to Shazah once again.
Shazah's vision journey is complete. We need to return to the Temple Sanctuary.
Kauzanabi-jo has commenced the cleansing ceremony. I should wait and watch.
The Lunar Champions drank the moon-sugar elixir. The priestess wants me to drink as well.
Khali's vision journey is complete. We need to return to the Temple Sanctuary.
We won the day against the vision of the Colovian General. I should speak to Khali once again.
Khali and I must face her mother's killer, the Colovian General Quintilius, in order to complete her ritual.
The visions seem to have rattled Khali. I should speak to her.
Khali entered this room hunting for more Colovians. I should wait and see what happens.
We walked into a vision of crumbling fortifications. Khali thinks the soldiers here are supposed to represent the military forces that slew her mother. We need to fight our way through to move on.
Khali and I have begun her part of the ritual. I should enter the portal that's appeared and see where it leads.
I walked the path with Shazah. I need to speak to Khali to begin her part of the ritual.
I walked the path with Khali. I need to speak to Shazah to begin her part of the ritual.
I figured out how to get the guard away from the ambassador's private quarters.
I figured out how to get the guard away from the ambassador's private quarters.
I've recovered the Ayleid tome. Now I just need to use it at each of the four pillars in the ruins to open the back door into the lower ruins.
I've been asked to enter the ruins to retrieve the stolen relics.
I need to collect essence to deposit within the scarab tile of one of the statues. Shalidor granted me a spell that will help attract the essence to me, but I can only collect four at a time.
I need to collect essence to deposit within the scarab tile of one of the statues. Shalidor granted me a spell that will help attract the essence to me, but I can only collect four at a time.
I have the essence I need to activate the remaining scarab seal. I should make use of the essence I collected.
I've activated the two seals near the front of the ruin. Shalidor may know how I can activate the two rear seals.
I have the essence I need to activate one of the scarab seals. I should make use of the essence I collected.
I convinced Erunor to return with his wife Laniriel and the other villagers to the Wilderking's realm. I should meet him in the south end of the Shrouded Hollow.
I need to activate one of the two seals on the rear statues in the valley.
I should journey to Bruma and let Wardiya know someone is trying to kill her.
I should journey to Bruma and deliver them to Kjakur Gray-Fists.
I should travel to Bruma and find Trelon Valen.
A dying woman told me that one of her fellow temple guards, Eliana, was somewhere else on this floor of the ruin. I should find her.

I saw a part of the story where Aranias' parents said they would bring someone to teach her how to use her power. That part of the story will start soon.\n\nI need to change clothes in the guest room off the great hall and join Aranias in the garden.
Magistrate Sulma says they don't need any assistance, but I can investigate the missing townspeople on my own. I should leave the Hall of Judgment.
Justice Istah is standing outside the Hall of Judgment and he wants to speak with me.
In Bailiff Fakimal's house, I found a note that proves he killed the people who disappeared under orders from a superior. Now, Justice Istah has been locked in the stocks. I should speak to Istah.
Based on the evidence found at Bailiff Fakimal's house, Justice Istah believes that Magistrate Sulma is involved in the disappearances. I should search the Magistrate's house for evidence of this.
Based on the evidence found at Bailiff Fakimal's house, Justice Istah believes that Magistrate Sulma is involved in the disappearances. I should search the Magistrate's house for evidence of this.
Based on the evidence found at Bailiff Fakimal's house, Justice Istah believes that Magistrate Sulma is involved in the disappearances. I should search the Magistrate's house for evidence of this.
I discovered dozens of corpses in the Magistrate's basement. A letter suggests that she and Fakimal were delivering the corpses to the Withered Hand to protect Bergama. I should leave the basement.

I discovered dozens of corpses in the Magistrate's basement. A letter suggests that she and Bailiff Fakimal were delivering the corpses to the Withered Hand to protect Bergama. I should confront the Magistrate.

The Magistrate and Bailiff Fakimal were killing vagrants and criminals and giving corpses to the Withered Hand in exchange for Bergama's protection. The Magistrate agreed to turn herself in. I should speak with Justice Istah.

The Magistrate and Bailiff Fakimal were killing vagrants and criminals and giving corpses to the Withered Hand in exchange for Bergama's protection. I agreed to keep the secret. I should speak to the Magistrate.

The Magistrate and Bailiff Fakimal were killing vagrants and criminals and giving corpses to the Withered Hand in exchange for Bergama's protection. The Magistrate agreed to turn herself in. I should speak with Justice Istah.

Bernt confessed that all of this was the result of his bargain with a Daedric Prince. He thinks that Hautt and Hridi, who were once well-respected, could help him rally the others. He asked me to find Hautt's lute and Hridi's dueling daggers.

I found Hridi's daggers and Hautt's lute. I should give them to Bernt so he can return them to their rightful owners. He thinks it will help restore self-respect and set a good example for the others.
Inside the Flagon, the sobering villagers confronted the mysterious Thane, who revealed himself to be some sort of Daedra. I need to find Bernt and speak to him.
Bernt asked me to deal with the Thane. He is convinced that the Thane keeps their souls in one of the ruined houses near the old well. I might as well start my search there.
Vanus and I need to look around and find the main mechanism powering the Great Shackle before we can attempt to destroy it and end the Planemeld.
Vanus used the door and entered the Great Shackle. I should go inside and meet up with him.
I should follow <<1>> into the Great Shackle.
I should talk to <<1>> when I'm ready to head for the Great Shackle.
I need to protect Vanus Galerion while he casts the spells to weaken the Great Shackle.
I should tell <<1>> I've defeated <<2>>.
I just need to speak to Felari once more. It looks like she wishes to thank me.
A member of the dig appears to be working under a tent. I should speak to her.
A member of the dig is trying to hide from the bandits nearby. I should speak to him.
I should grab the relics from the chest at the dig site.
I should grab the relics from the chest at the dig site.
The time has come for me to defeat <<1>> and help return the Saltwalker Militia to its military roots.
I've defeated Selene. I should speak with Warlock Carindon.
I collected the Light of Meridia. Now I should speak to the projection of the Ayleid King and see what I should do next.
I have been asked to report to Merric. I should find him as soon as possible.
I have been asked to report to Merric, back with the Fighters Guild council. I should talk to him as soon as possible.
I must follow <<1>> to the Staff of Magnus, which waits deep in Marbruk's vault.
I must follow <<1>> to the Staff of Magnus, which waits deep in Marbruk's vault.
I must follow <<1>> to the Staff of Magnus, which waits deep in Marbruk's vault.
I must follow <<1>> to the Staff of Magnus, which waits deep in Marbruk's vault.

The Staff of Magnus in the vault was a fake! <<1>> must know more about the theft.
I arrived in Marbruk too late. The Staff of Magnus is missing, likely stolen by Vicereeve Pelidil. <<1>> awaits me in the Grand Hall to discuss this.
I have returned to the Grand Hall. <<1>> is here, questioning the soldiers on watch.
A herald has entered the Grand Hall with a message.
A herald has announced the arrival of Queen Ayrenn. I should exit the Mages Guild and tell her what has happened.
I must wait for <<1>> to unlock the vault beneath Marbruk.
My first task is to meet <<1>> in the city of Marbruk.
Nethrin told me that he was attacked by bandits calling themselves Dawnmead. He worries that his dig sites near Thormar and Willowgrove may be attacked as well.
I've obtained the relics from the dig site near Willowgrove. Now I should go to the site near Thormar.
I've obtained the relics from the dig site near Thormar. Now I should go to the site near Willowgrove.
Nethrin has arrived at the dig site and wants to speak to me.
Nethrin has arrived at the dig site and wants to speak to me.
I've made it to Claw's Strike. I should find those relics and get them out of here.
I stopped following <<1>>. If I want to reach the Staff of Magnus, I should look for him again in Marbruk's main square.

Captain Ethrel's mage has devised a spell that can destroy this realm's Moonhenge and prevent the Daedra from re-opening the portal. I need to chose someone to stay behind and cast the spell, however.
The Daedric portal in Moonhenge is sealed. I should tell Sergeant Galandir of my success.
Next is the Daggerfall Covenant. Cariel is certain to have some ideas about how to get inside the Covenant lodges. I should speak with her.
I should speak with <<1>> about what exactly she wants done with the books.
I need to locate the three forbidden tomes before someone less capable stumbles upon them.
<<1>> of the Thalmor is looking into the fire. She said the plantation's owners might know more about the matter. I should talk to <<2>>.
Tzik'nith wants me to acquire the two shards that make up the key to the portal. With it, we can access the portal to the council of elders' floating platform, where they hold the lamia queen's eggs.
If I search the recently deceased female bodies, I should be able to identify Zariya by her wooden ring.
I should grab the relics from the chest at the dig site.
A member of the dig is trying to hide from the bandits nearby. I should speak to him.
I should grab the relics from the chest at the dig site.
