The resurrected prince asked me to speak to the last knight that remains at his side, Dame Valyrie. He wants me to tell her what the voice in the crypt said.
The resurrected prince asked me to investigate the royal crypt to see if any of his ancestors have risen as well.
While investigating the royal crypt, I heard a strange voice come from one of the candles nearby. I should see if it was real, and if so, what it has to say.
A voice in the royal crypt says the prince has been resurrected by Arkay himself, so that he may lead an army of undead against his enemies. I should relay this message to the prince.
Dame Valyrie believes the strange blue flames around the crypts are inciting the undead to violence. She gave me some holy water to douse the flames, in the hope that it will pacify the undead.
I've extinguished more of the blue flames with holy water, and I should now meet Dame Valyrie by the south monument, where she thinks she saw someone "skulking around."
It seems that Father Quiston has questions about the prince's "blessed" resurrection. I should speak with Dame Valyrie to find out what happened.

It's become clear that the force behind the undead rising in the graveyard is somehow corrupting the resurrected prince. Father Quiston suggested I use holy water to cleanse the mausoleums to see if that might have any effect on the prince.
Upon entering a mausoleum, the same strange voice I spoke to before announced its presence. I should speak to it and find out what its true intentions are.
I spoke to the strange voice again, and it accused me of betraying the prince. I should finish cleansing the mausoleums and then return to the church.
Now that the mausoleums are cleansed, I should return to the church and speak to Dame Valyrie to find out if it had any effect on the prince.
It seems the priest has somehow angered Prince Adrien. I should watch to see what happens.
The resurrected prince has barricaded himself inside the church. I need to find a way into the church to try to help him. Perhaps Father Quiston knows another way to get in.
I've made my way into the church. I need to find out what's become of the prince.

The resurrected prince is kneeling at the altar in the church and appears to have been possessed by the evil spirit I spoke with before. I should speak with the prince to find out if there's anything I can do.
After speaking with the resurrected prince inside the church, the evil possessing him revealed its true nature. I need to kill it to send it back to Oblivion, where it belongs.
I've destroyed the evil spirit that possessed Prince Adrien. I should speak with the prince now to find out how he feels.
The prince is dead and put to rest. I should talk to Dame Valyrie and see what she plans to do next.
I have unlocked the circlet and should take it, so that I can decide what next to do with it.
I have the Alessian bows, and I need to take them to Silver-Paws to trade for the Baandari's healing poultices.

Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has requested a parley with Queen Arzhela. I will be joining representatives from the Mages and Fighters Guilds to ensure the queen's protection. I should speak with Gabrielle when I'm ready to go.
<<1>> is free to go. Speaking with him may reveal information about Redfur.
I've convinced <<1>> the only way to end this for good is to destroy his creation.
I found <<1>> within the cellar of the old farmhouse. I'll need to defeat him to get to <<2>>.
I offered to help locate <<1>> who may be further in the caves.
I've located <<1>> and should speak to him to be sure that he's all right.
Talks between Queen Arzhela and Imperial Magus-General broke down and fighting broke out. Gabrielle opened a portal and the queen and I escaped back to Evermore. I should speak with the queen.

Talks between Queen Arzhela and Imperial Magus-General broke down and fighting broke out. Gabrielle opened a portal and the queen and I returned to Evermore. I should watch the portal to see if anyone else escaped.
The Hollow Moon informed me that their token is only to be used by the desperate and needy. Their representative indicated that <<1>>, their leader in Redfur, might have some work for me.
I should speak with <<1>>, the person in charge of the Dominion forces at <<2>>.
High King Emeric asked that I infiltrate the garrison through the sewers. I'm to find and activate the controls to open the main gate and allow Emeric to lead our forces inside.
I destroyed the dark anchors in the courtyard and it seems the battle is over; we've retaken Bangkorai Garrison. I should speak with Queen Arzhela.
High King Emeric asked that I infiltrate the garrison through the sewers. I'm to find and activate the controls to open the main gate and allow Emeric to lead our forces inside.
High King Emeric asked that I infiltrate the garrison through the sewers. I'm to find and activate the controls to open the main gate and allow Emeric to lead our forces inside.

High King Emeric leads our forces in the fight to control the main courtyard. In the meantime, he's asked me to assault the barracks, free any imprisoned Knights of Saint Pelin, and attack any Imperial commanders I find.
I infiltrated the sewers and opened the main gate, allowing Emeric to lead his forces inside. I should leave the gatehouse and rejoin the king.

High King Emeric leads our forces in the fight to control the main courtyard. In the meantime, he's asked me to assault the barracks, free any imprisoned Knights of Saint Pelin, and attack any Imperial commanders I find.
The Knights of Saint Pelin I freed in the Barracks asked me to find and kill Commander Attius.
I freed the Knights of Saint Pelin in the barracks and killed Commander Attius. I should rejoin High King Emeric outside.
The king asked me to storm the bridge across the garrison and venture into the royal crypt, where he fears the Imperials may be doing something terrible.
The king asked me to enter the royal crypt, where he fears the Imperials may be doing something terrible.
I entered the royal crypt where the Imperials are summoning Daedra. I should cleanse the crypt of Imperials and Daedra and then kill Battlemage Papus.

I cleansed the royal crypt, but not before Imperial Battlemage Papus was able to complete his dark ritual. I should exit the crypt through the back entrance and rejoin King Emeric as soon as possible.
The Imperials have summoned a Dark Anchor into the courtyard of Bangkorai Garrison. I must defeat the Daedra around the anchor and then destroy the dark anchor itself.

I destroyed the dark anchors in the courtyard and it seems the battle is over; we've retaken Bangkorai Garrison. King Emeric and Queen Arzhela exited through the south gate of the garrison. I should follow suit and talk to the queen.
Verandis should be at Ravenwatch Castle, which is located near the town of Crestshade, to the west of Shornhelm. I should go there and talk to him.
I drank the potion and entered Verandis's memories. In fact, in the memory, I am Verandis. I should try to discover what happened in this memory.
Despite the wyrd's concerns, Wyress Demara agreed to help the Sentinel. I should get the bud blessed at the wyrd camp before they change their mind.

Glanir has learned that an Imperial captain and a Worm Cultist envoy are stationed somewhere in Crimson Cove. He has asked me to help him defeat the captain and the envoy, both important targets for the Dominion.
Now that I have the rutter in hand, I should look for Glanir up ahead.
<<1>> chose death to ensure the alliance is formed. I should watch as she explains her choice to her father.
The Dark Anchor has been banished for now. I should speak with High Ordinator Danys.
We've defeated the vampire lord but at a heavy cost. <<1>> has lost both of his companions. I should speak with him.
The priest didn't respond to Dame Valyrie. She suggested I approach him and find out what he knows about the undead rising here.

The priest is skeptical that Prince Adrien was risen as the result of a blessing from Arkay. The priest has asked me to defeat the dark spirits defiling the monuments in the graveyard and then meet him at the church where he will examine the prince.
I should speak with Sai Sahan in the Harborage to ensure his safety and well-being.
I defeated the dark spirits that were defiling the monuments and I should now meet the priest, Dame Valyrie, and Prince Adrien at the church.
Prince Adrien has accepted that the force that brought him back from the grave is a force of evil and corruption. I should stay and watch the priest return him to rest.
After witnessing me destroy a feral vampire, <<1>> the Nord leader of the group has asked me to meet him at his camp.
I've agreed to assist the vampire hunter I met, but I don't see the rest of his team. I should speak with him further.
Now that everyone is in position to execute the plan, I must activate the blood fountain to draw in the vampires. Hopefully this will cause the vampire lord to reveal himself.
The blood fountain has been activated as per the plan, and they are attacking from all sides. I need to hold my ground.
I brought Puddles back home. Now I should talk to <<1>> and make sure everything is all right.
Now that I have a day-old fish, I should find <<1>> for <<2>>.
I've slain the Mad Architect and freed his prisoners. I should speak with <<1>>.
The grandeya has reclaimed her seat of power in Hallin's Stand, and with so, the city. I should see what she has to say.
I've been asked to get into position to prepare for the execution of the plan. I am to head to the middle of the abandoned settlement.

A group of Dark Elves recently came here to attempt to stop a Dark Anchor, but something happened to them. High Ordinator Danys was sent here by Almalexia herself to look for them and find out what happened. He wants my help finding them.
I found one of the survivors. I should see what she has to say about what happened here.

Danys told me a story about Almalexia and gave me a crystal tear that carries the strength of her fury inside it. I need to empower it by slaying the Worm Cult in Gil-Var-Delle. Then I can use it to destroy the devices known as the Fangs of Chaos.
<<1>>, one of the Vinedusk, appeared out of a portal. He asked me to step through to their base of operations.
I stepped through <<1>>'s portal to what seems to be an old ruin. There doesn't appear to be a way out. A Vinedusk named <<2>> asked me to speak with him.
I've agreed to capture <<1>> and <<2>>, the leaders of the Blacksap remants.  I should leave the prison and meet <<3>>, the Vinedusk Ranger's agent in <<4>>.
I've agreed to capture <<1>> and <<2>>, the leaders of the Blacksap remnants. I should meet with <<3>>, the Vinedusk Rangers' agent in <<4>>.
I've agreed to capture <<1>> and <<2>>, the leaders of the Blacksap remants. I should meet with <<3>>, the Vinedusk Ranger's agent in <<4>>.
<<1>> has collected information on the Blacksap's sympathizers in <<2>>. I should study her journal to secure a meeting with <<3>>, one of the Blacksap leaders.

<<1>> gave me a pair of <<2>>'s rings. I should meet <<3>> at the "Butcher's Ground" outside of <<4>>. If I can trick him into wearing one of the rings, its enchantment will transport him to the Vinedusk's hidden prison.
<<1>> gave me a pair of <<2>>'s rings. I should speak with <<3>> and trick him into wearing one of the rings. If I do, its enchantment will transport him to the Vinedusk's hidden prison.
The ring I gave to <<1>> transported him to the Vinedusk's hidden prison. Before he departed, <<1>> told me his brother <<2>> was hiding in a cave near <<3>>. If I find the cave, I'll find him.
I found <<1>>. I should speak with him and trick him into wearing one of the rings. If I do, its enchantment will transport him to the Vinedusk's hidden prison.
<<1>> sent constructs to attack Dominion soldiers in camps outside of <<2>>. I should help defeat the constructs before the soldiers are overwhelmed.
I defeated the Blacksap's constructs. <<1>> asked me to meet the other Vinedusk near the bridge leading into <<2>>.
I captured the leaders of the Blacksap and defeated the constructs sent to attack Dominion soldiers. I should speak to <<1>> and determine the fate of the Blacksap leaders.
I convinced <<1>> that the Blacksap leaders deserve justice. He will advise the king to give <<2>> and his sons a public trial. I should speak with him and see if there's anything else he needs.
<<1>> seems convinced that <<2>>and his sons will spend the rest of their days in the Vinedusk's hidden prison. I should speak with him and see if there's anything else he needs.
<<1>> has emerged from <<c:2>>, surrounded by a strange radiance. I should speak with her.
I discovered what happened to all three knights and recovered two of the holy relics. I should return to Alvaren in Shornhelm.
My dream-walk through the memories of Verandis Ravenwatch continues. In this memory, I need to accompany Baron Montclair to the top of the Doomcrag to find the Ayleid relic.
Leia has turned into a bloodfiend and asked that I end her pain. I should put her out of her misery before she kills me.
The dream-walk through Verandis's memory of the Doomcrag has come to an end. I should find Verandis and speak to him.

Lothson told me that of all the things they've lost, a necklaceâ€”a family heirloomâ€”was the one that hurt Marien the most. He told me it's likely in the ruins known as Orc's Finger. If I get it back, it might give Marien the strength to go on.
<<1>> asked me to recover a lost relic from the Tomb of Anahbi beneath the headquarters of Jode's Chariot in Redfur. <<2>>, their leader, holds the key to this trap-infested ruin.

The evidence suggests the Dwemeri architect and the Ayleid princess were in love. When Urenenya fell ill, Klathzgar apparently placed her soul into a power crystal inside one of his centurions. I should recover Urenenya's soul gem.
When I smashed her soul gem, the spirit of Urenenya appeared. I should speak to the spirit.
I found the scholar Pelorrah's corpse deep within the ruins. I should examine his final research notes to see what he discovered.
I made it to the <<1>>. I should try to find Marien's necklace.
We've successfully executed the plan, but the vampire lord failed to show himself. I should regroup with the others and speak with <<1>> to determine our next step.

After we fended off the feral vampire attacks in the middle of town, we realized the others had not rejoined us. <<1>> is checking the west gate for <<2>> while I check the east for <<3>>. I should hurry.
I've spotted <<1>>'s body outside the east gate of town. I should take a closer look and determine cause of death.
The plan seems to have had unintended consequences. The Redguard's body is a burnt husk, and <<1>> has returned without <<2>>. I should talk to him to see what he found.
As I spoke to <<1>> regarding our missing comrades, <<2>> reappeared with information regarding the vampire lord.
After discovering the <<1>>'s body, <<2>> appeared to direct us to the vampire lord's lair before running off again. <<3>> and I should make our way there as soon as possible to help him.
<<1>> and I have discovered the vampire lord's lair, but <<2>> has been turned and enthralled. We must destroy them both.
The scholar Pelorrah ventured into the perilous ruins of Klathzgar. I should search for signs of what happened to him.
The antidote worked, and her assistant Stibbons is no longer made of stone. I should talk to her and see what she has planned next.
I should talk to Lady Laurent and find out what she's doing here.
Lady Laurent apparently considers me her new assistant. She's sent me to find where her previous assistant, Stibbons, put her alchemical supplies.
I've retrieved Lady Laurent's alchemical equipment from her camp. I should deliver it to her to get this expedition going.
Lady Laurent wants to complete her studies on the Yokudan ruins, and has asked me to keep a look out for her stolen alchemical reagents. The Goblins probably took them.
Now that her research is complete and I've recovered her reagents, I should ask Lady Laurent what she plans to do next.
I need to take Lady Laurent to her dig site within the Goblin-infested ruins.
I've brought Lady Laurent to the camp at her dig site, and found her "lost" assistant. He seems to have been turned to stone. I should ask her about it.
Lady Laurent has sent me to search around the camp for where Stibbons put her notes.
I've found Lady Laurent's missing notes. I should return them to her.
Lady Laurent's plan is to use the stoneflesh potion on the Goblins. This should provide her test subjects so she can figure out the antidote. I should add the potion to the Goblins' food.
I've dosed the Goblins' food with stoneflesh potion. I should meet Lady Laurent near the hermit she spoke of.
I've found the hermit with Lady Laurent. She and he seem to be arguing. I should speak to him and find out why.
Lady Laurent needs information the hermit has, but he's being a crazy old man. I need to figure out what he wants in return for the information Lady Laurent needs.
Now that Lady Laurent has recovered her notes, I should ask her about her plans for de-petrifying her assistant.
Now that Lady Laurent has the final clue for the stoneflesh antidote, she needs to get her hands on a piece of gargoyle fleshâ€”specifically, the tongue. I should help her by taking one down.
I should follow Lady Laurent back to her ransacked camp.
Lady Laurent has all the ingredients she needs for the stoneflesh antidote. I should see if she needs anything else before making it.
Lady Laurent has to figure out the actual formulation for the stoneflesh antidote, so she's sent me with several formulas to use on petrified Goblins.
The antidote worked, and her assistant Stibbons is no longer made of stone. I should talk to her and see what she has planned next.
Lady Laurent was undismayed by the failure of her antidotes, and believes she has enough information to make a working one. I should wait and see if she's correct.
I've used all the antidote formulations on petrified Goblins. I should let Lady Laurent know that none of them seemed to work.
I defeated <<1>>. His death released <<2>> from a strange trance. I should speak to her.
<<1>> said we need to destroy the stores of seeds the Dark Witnesses have collected to put an end to their plans. I need to find them among the fields.
Adusa wants me to eliminate the dreaded <<1>>. She believes he's encamped to the west of Shornhelm.
I eliminated <<1>>. I should seek out <<2>> at Ravenwatch Manor and let her know the deed is done.
The scholar Pelorrah discovered that Klathzgar was constructing a centurion as a gift to Princess Urenenya. I should search for signs of what happened to the scholar.
Adusa wants me to acquire the list of targets for her. I can find it on someone named Rasaba the Keen. Whether Rasaba lives or dies is entirely up to me.
I acquired the list of targets. I should return to Adusa at Ravenwatch Castle and let her see who the Montclairs plan to assassinate.
We stopped the assassins. I should head outside and speak to Adusa now.
We're inside the castle and ready to defend it against the assassins. I need to make sure that Adusa survives this assault.
With Rohlbert dead, the Montclair forces troubling Shornhelm shouldn't cause many more problems. I should speak to Adusa and make sure the threat has been eliminated.
We're inside the manor house. Now we need to find Rohlbert and end this Montclair threat.
Adusa believes Rohlbert is hiding in the old Montclair Manor, in Shornhelm's upper city. I should meet her in front of the manor house.
Meva told me the group failed to put an end to the Dark Anchor because it was being empowered by strange devices. I should see what Danys has to say about this.

The Dwemeri architect and the Ayleid princess were in love. When Urenenya fell ill, Klathzgar placed her soul into a power crystal within one of his centurions. I should take Urenenya's soul gem back to her family's castle in the Silaseli Ruins.

The Dwemeri architect and the Ayleid princess were in love, and Klathzgar placed her soul into a power crystal within one of his centurions. I've brought the soul gem back to the Silaseli Ruins, and should now smash it to release her soul.
I could talk to Razum-dar once more to ask him what I should do.

I destroyed the dark anchor in the courtyard and it seems the battle is over; we've retaken Bangkorai Garrison. King Emeric and Queen Arzhela are coming down to address the troops. I should listen to what they have to say.

With the Fangs destroyed, the Dark Anchor is now no more powerful than the rest. If I can fight back the invaders brought forth from Coldharbour, I should be able to shut down the Anchor and close the gateway.
Lothson said he and Marien were hoping to start over in Shornhelm. Now that I have the necklace, I should find him in the city.
I should find and read the mysterious tome that Graccus mentioned in his journal. It led him to some kind of treasure, and he left it somewhere in the cellar beneath his mansion.
The note from the bottle has cryptically directed me to find a spy near the main entrance to Pa'alat. But I'm not supposed to mention the note or the spy will have nothing to do with me.
I found a mysterious note inside the suspicious bottle. I should read it and see if it says anything important.
I should talk to Lady Laurent about her plans to rescue her assistant, Stibbons.

<<1>> has agreed to halt his attacks while I investigate an abandoned Imperial mine. If it has valuable resources, he would have no reason to attack <<2>>. <<1>>'s ally will meet with me inside the mine to help inspect the ore.

<<1>> has agreed to halt his attacks while I investigate an abandoned Imperial mine to determine if it has valuable resources. I should speak with <<2>> and see if she's ready to inspect any ore I find.
I should speak with <<1>> near <<2>> if I wish to assist the Vinedusk.
When I freed the hostages, the mayor's wife revealed that Gavendien orchestrated all this to steal a parcel of jewels. I should hurry back to town and warn Constable Agazu so we can try to stop him.
Thanks to the influence of the sleeping draught, Bailiff Sagabar is now passed out in his room. I should go in and search for clues as to where they're holding the hostages.
I should go to the old mill south of town and rescue the hostages. A thug named Bulzog is guarding them.
Bailiff Sagabar is distracted. Now I can slip the sleeping draught into his mug.
Bailiff Sagabar is distracted. Now I can slip the sleeping draught into his mug.

Agazu suggests I find a way to distract Bailiff Sagabar so that I can slip a sleeping draught into his mug. Then I can follow him into his room and search for clues as to where they're holding the hostages.
A disenfrachised mage gave me a trinket I could use to summon a banekin and frighten the bailiff.
It seems that Sagabar has been making advance toward the barmaid. If I could persuade him to go talk to her again, that would provide the distraction I need.
<<1>> killed <<2>> by her own request, and <<3>> is not happy. I should speak to him to ensure the alliance is made.
I've been given a small whistle, which should attract the attention of Xandier the dog. The dog, in turn, should be able to lead me to Ignobert.
I found <<1>>! I should speak to him.
The dog came to me when I blew the whistle. The dog looks upset, though. I should talk to it and try to calm it down.
<<1>> wants me to follow him. Perhaps he'll lead me to <<2>>.
A man on the road asked me to speak to <<1>> about the Reachmen situation in Northglen. He said they've already created a small encampment near the Northglen windmill, just outside of Evermore.
<<1>> has agreed to halt his attacks while I investigate an abandoned Imperial mine to determine if it has valuable resources. I should wait for <<2>> to give me her results.
<<1>> may know something that can help me track his sons. I should attempt to convince him before I leave the prison.

High King Emeric has decided to name a ruler to lead Rivenspire. He asked me to give him a recommendation. I should decide if I think Baron Dorell or Countess Tamrith will make a better ruler for Rivenspire.
I should talk to <<1>> and confirm my choice of Countess Tamrith as ruler of Rivenspire.
I should talk to <<1>> and confirm my choice of Baron Dorell as ruler of Rivenspire.
Aniel wants me to step away from Dolirdor so we can speak in private.
My journey through Verandis's memories continues. I entered the relic chamber. Now I should talk to Baron Montclair and see what happened next.
While I was dousing the blue flames with holy water, Dame Valyrie seems to have found a priest. I should ask her what he said.
I need to climb out of this hole.

My journey through the memories of Verandis continues. We've reached the top of the Doomcrag. The Ayleid relic should be through the doors ahead. I should follow the others inside and see how events unfolded.
The Prophet has called me to the Harborage.
The Prophet has summoned me to the Harborage. I should go there at once.
I should find the first <<1>> and destroy it to release a fragment of Alanwe's soul. I should be careful, as Alanwe mentioned it was under guard.
I've released a shard of Alanwe's soul by destroying the first <<1>>. I should speak with her.
I should find and destroy the second <<1>> to free another shard of Alanwe's soul.
I've found <<1>> at his camp but I don't see the rest of his team. I should speak with him further.
I found a map of the area on the body of a Mages Guild explorer. It mentioned someone named "<<1>>" in a nearby base camp. I should try to find <<1>> and learn what's going on.
I freed Teeba-Ja from captivity, but in order to start a new life, she needs to sever ties with a woman named Brigibeth. I agreed to find Brigibeth and speak to her on Teeba-Ja's behalf.
I spoke to Brigibeth and she seems to have no intention of trying to stop Teeba-Ja from starting a new life. I should meet Teeb-Ja at the chapel in Shornhelm to let her know.
<<1>> has suggested I introduce myself to the rest of his team. I may simply ask him to go over the plan instead.
<<1>> seems quite pleased with the outcome, though Jode's Chariot will also receive a token of <<2>>'s appreciation.\n\nI should speak with him to see if he has anything else for me in Redfur.
When <<1>> offered me my choice of reward, I asked him to call off the Thalmor inspection. I should speak with <<2>> to find out what happens next.
<<1>> has collected information on the Blacksap's sympathizers in <<2>>. Her journal contains her notes on how I can secure a meeting with <<3>>, one of the Blacksap leaders.
I finished helping the priest sanctify the bodies of the dead soldiers. Now I should report to <<1>> and let her know the task is done.

I should enter the grotto and find the inactive wards. Once I'm close enough for them to empower me, I need to kill the bears as a sacrifice. Their spirits will re-empower the wards that will allow the wyresses back inside.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn how she will contact Hircine.
<<1>> will tell me when it's time to cut out <<2>>'s heart as part of their ritual to speak to Hircine.
<<1>>'s heart must be removed as part of their ritual to speak to Hircine.
All the elements are in place for the wyrd's ritual to speak with Hircine. I need to wait with them to see whether it's successful.
As the wyrd's ritual concluded, a voice claiming to be Hircine wanted to speak to me. I should find out what he wants.
I've been placed in a hunting area which looks exactly like Fallen Grotto, and each of Hircine's three aspects is hidden somewhere within it. I need to defeat them to prove myself to him.
I should speak to the Spirit of the Hunt and let it know that I've completed the task.
I need to defeat Brinarch as a final task from Hircine. Then the grotto will belong completely to the wyresses again.
Now that I've completed Hircine's final challenge by defeating <<1>>, I can let <<2>> know the grotto is theirs again.
Now that I've defeated <<1>>, the briarheart must be returned to Hircine to complete the cycle.
I should head to the fork in the road and try to call <<1>>.
I found <<1>>! I should speak to him.
The dog looks upset. I should pet it to calm it down.
<<1>> wants me to follow him. Perhaps he'll lead me to <<2>>.
I need to help the priest locate the bodies of the unsanctified dead soldiers. While the priest offers his prayers of sanctification, I should burn the bodies of the dead soldiers.
I think we're finished sanctifying the dead soldiers. I should talk to <<1>> and see if there's anything else he needs help with.
I should help the priest find the last of the dead soldiers so he can complete the ritual of sanctification.
I've secured a meeting with <<1>>, one of the Blacksap leaders. I should meet <<2>> in the center of <<3>> as she had asked.
Now that the wards are restored, the wyrd can re-enter their temple to Hircine. I should meet them at the altar in the center of the grotto.
Now that I have Puddles' attention, I should return her to <<1>>.
<<1>> asked me to remove <<2>>'s heart as a part of their ritual. Once I'm ready, I need to let <<1>> know.
<<1>>'s heart needs to be placed in the bowl on the altar as part of the wyrd's ritual to speak with Hircine.
Countess Eselde mentioned that the abandoned cistern under Shornhelm could be a shortcut to reach the entrance to Fevered Mews.
I'm back at Beryn and Garth's camp. I should talk to <<1>> and see if he's all right.
I should look for <<1>> in the spider cave. He might be wrapped up in one of the numerous silken cocoons strewn about the cave floor.
<<1>> says the discontent lies with <<2>>'s pledge of assistance to build the embassy, none of which has been forthcoming. He directed me to speak with <<3>> to find out why.
I've been asked to personally deliver a message to the Wood Elf <<1>> in the hope he can help resolve the matter.
<<1>> wanted little to do with me. He said I should speak with <<2>> about the delay.
<<1>> wanted little to do with me. He said I should speak with <<2>> about the delay.
<<1>> assured me she's ordered the Khajiit supplied and their embassy built. She said should I verify the goods she set aside are still in <<Ac:2>> storeroom.
<<1>> assured me she's ordered the Khajiit supplied and their embassy built. Now that I'm in <<Ac:2>> storeroom, I should search for supplies set aside for the Khajiit.
<<1>> hired local workers to provide stone for the Khajiit Embassy. <<2>> wants me to find them at the site of some nearby ruins and learn why there's such a delay.

<<1>> hired local workers to provide stone for the Khajiit Embassy. <<2>> wants me to find them at the site of some nearby ruins and learn why there's such a delay. I should search the ruins for the work party.
The work party was ambushed! As I determined this was no accident, I was approached by a Wood Elf. It seems he wishes to speak with me.
<<1>> was waiting for me at <<c:2>>. It seems <<3>> was seen here not long ago. We should enter <<c:2>> and track her down.
<<1>> believes <<2>> is attempting to smuggle herself out of <<3>>. We should search for her in <<c:4>> and capture her.
I captured <<1>>. <<2>> will bring her back to <<3>>. I should head to the throne room and inform <<4>> of what happened.
I should head to the throne room and inform <<1>> of what happened in <<c:2>>.
I should inform <<1>> of what happened in <<c:2>>.
<<1>> seems relieved this matter has been resolved. The king also mentioned <<2>> wishes to have a word with me. I should speak with him and see what he wants.
Now that I've found all the missing guards, I should return to their camp outside Fort Sphinxmoth to make sure they made it out of the Fort safely.
I should find Gothurg in Shornhelm and give him Grularz's journal.
I agreed with <<1>> that I should not expose <<2>> as the informer. I should return to <<3>> in the upper city to debrief her.
Verandis and I need to head up to the next level of the Doomcrag to find Gwendis, Countess Tamrith, and Baron Dorell.
I should rescue <<1>> before he's eaten by the spiders.
I should talk to <<1>> outside the cave where I rescued him.
We freed Gwendis and the nobles. Darien and Skordo will watch over them. I should talk to Verandis and see what he suggests we do next.
Upon seeing the dead rising, the gravedigger abandoned Prince Adrien's corpse. I've agreed to venture into the graveyard and find it.
I've destroyed the second <<1>>. I should speak to the second shard of Alanwe's soul that I've released.
I should find and destroy the third <<1>> to free another shard of Alanwe's soul.
With the bow in hand, I should return to <<1>> and speak with <<2>>.
<<1>> was waiting for me at <<c:2>>. I should see if he has any more information about <<3>>.
<<1>> requires <<Ac:2>>, <<3>>, and the presence of Conservator <<4>> to function.
I recovered everything <<c:1>> needs to function. I should return to <<2>> and inform him of my success.
I've used all the antidote formulations on petrified Goblins. I should let Lady Laurent know that none of them seemed to work.
Mannimarco appeared once again in the Inner Chamber.
Jowan asked me to bury the ashes of his deceased family members. I should do so with the utmost care and respect.
We buried the Hinault family and listened to Jowan's eulogy. Now I should speak to him and make sure he's doing all right.
I helped Jowan and Mayla bury the remains of their family members. I should be respectful and listen to Jowan's eulogy.
I've destroyed the third <<1>>. I should speak to the third shard of Alanwe's soul that I've released.
I should search for caves east of <<1>>. <<2>> was supposedly headed there.
Mannimarco appeared again. We should confront him and be prepared for his vile tricks.
I've taken the bow, but I should see if the journal scrap might reveal anything about who he was. Maybe someone would want to know what happened to him.
I managed to find <<1>>, but it looks like something got to him first. The bow is mine for the taking.
I learned the name of an Elf that seemed to be partners with the Orc. I should look for <<1>> in <<2>>.
I should approach <<1>> in his throne room and say "the vines are strongest at dusk," which will prove I'm a friend to his throne.
I should enter the cave called <<1>> to prove myself to <<2>>.
I managed to fill the gem at the Ayleid Well. I should return it to <<1>> outside the ruins.
<<1>> gave me a crystal and asked me to make my way through the Ayleid ruin nearby in search of an Ayleid Well. Once I find it, I only need to immerse the crystal in its light to fill it.
I decided to tell <<1>> the truth. She took it as well as could be expected.
I decided to lie to <<1>> to spare her feelings. She didn't seem to be take the news well.
I should find <<1>> and tell her something of her brother. I have a choice, though. I could lie to her and spare her feelings, or tell her the sad truth about his death.
I should tell <<1>> what happened to her brother. I have a choice. I can tell her the truth, or I can lie to her. I don't know which would be kinder.
I've decided to tell <<1>> the truth, and she took it very well. I should speak to her again.
I've decided to lie to <<1>> to spare her feelings, but she doesn't seem to be taking it well. I should speak to her again.

Klaandor's last entry asked that his journal and an amulet be brought to <<1>> in Shornhelm. He said she'd be heartbroken. Maybe it would be kinder just to give her the amulet and not let her know about Klaandor's true fate.
I decided to tell <<1>> the truth and give her the journal and amulet.
I decided to spare <<1>>'s feelings. I gave her the amulet and lied about Klaandor.
I agreed to free her from captivity, but Teeba-Ja says more is needed for her to truly be free. I should speak to her and find out what that is.
Gwendis was waiting for me on the shore. She led me to where Baron Dorell, Countess Tamrith, and the others were hiding. Now I should talk to her and tell her I found a way into the city.
Skordo asked me to locate Darien Gautier. He should be somewhere around the farmsteads. He may have information about what's going on inside the sealed city.
I found Darien inside the Montclair officers' quarters. I should talk to him and discover what he's learned.

Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has captured King Emeric and I must enter the Chamber of Passage to rescue him. I've earned the right to enter the chamber, but I should speak with the Keeper of the Hall first.
Before we attack the Imperials, the king is making a final speech. I should listen to what he has to say.
Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn appeared, killed King Emeric's Lion Guard soldiers and captured the king himself. I should speak to Scout Nadira to ask if she knows where they've taken the king.
Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has captured King Emeric. I should search the Imperial encampment for clues as to what she's planning.

Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has captured King Emeric. Clues I found suggest she's been working to reach a mysterious place in the temple known as the Chamber of Passage. I should enter the temple and search for this place.

Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has captured King Emeric and signs suggest she's taken him to the Chamber of Passage within the Hall of Heroes. I should speak to the Keeper of the Hall to ask what he knows.

To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. To earn Frandar Hunding's blessing, I must place the scrolls on the proper pedestals in his burial chamber.

To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. To earn Divad Hunding's blessing, I must light the four braziers in colors to honor his mother's sacrifice.

To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. To earn Makela Leki's blessing, I must bring her the most appropriate sword for a sword-singer.
The woman urged me to seek out her packmaster in the wild and complete my journey to becoming a werewolf.\n\nIf I wish to be cured, I can also seek out a priest in the city.
I found the packmaster, Songamdir, in the wild. He opened a portal to Hircine's realm. To become a werewolf, I must enter the portal and present myself to Hircine.
I have entered Hircine's realm. I must follow Songamdir's lead.
When Songamdir touched the statue of Hircine, Hircine's voice began to emanate from the stone. I must listen to what he has to say.
Hircine has turned me into a werewolf! He has instructed me to roam his hunting ground and bring down a monster worthy of my new pack.
I have killed a great beast. I must howl to attract my pack, so that we may feast together.
My pack approaches. I must allow them to feed on the fresh kill.
My pack has accepted my tribute. Now I must feast with them to join the pack.
Hircine speaks once more. I must listen to complete my initiation.
I must bow to Hircine's statue to complete my initiation into his pack of werewolves.
I must speak to the priest to complete the purification ritual.
The antidote worked, and her assistant Stibbons is no longer made of stone. I should talk to him and see if he's all right.
Verandis is concerned about something ahead. I should talk to him.
I must search within the Chamber of Passage for signs of where Septima's taken the king.
I must try to rescue the king from Septima Tharn.
Septima Tharn killed the king, and his soul made the journey into the Far Shores. I must enter the Far Shores myself to bring him back.
Septima Tharn killed the king, and his soul made the journey into the Far Shores. I've followed him into the afterlife to find his soul and bring him back.

Septima has lured me into the Far Shores, where I am severed from Coldharbour and cannot escape. The powers in this place have offered me one chance: kill Septima Tharn, and I can take the king's soul back to the Mundus.
I have killed Septima, and the powers in this place will allow me to take the king's soul back to the Mundus.
I must leave the Far Shores and return the king's soul to his body.
I managed to deactivate the portal that was allowing the Covenant forces to invade. I should return to Cirmo and let him know I was successful.
I've been given a wand that can shut down the portal if I can find it within the ruins.
I must curse the symbol of Arkay.
I must curse the symbol of Molag Bal.
I must submit to Lamae Bal, Blood Matron, in the pool in the center of her crypt.
I must prey upon Molag Bal's cultists.
I must talk to the Blood Matron.
<<1>> needs help finding <<2>>, who wandered away after Azei was attacked by a spider.
I've located <<1>> and should speak to him to be sure that he's all right.
Now that I've completed Hircine's initial trial, I can let <<1>> know the grotto will be theirs again once I complete the challenge ahead of me.
<<1>> and I will need to compete in a final challenge. If I win, Hircine will return the grotto to the wyrd. I should talk with my rival and learn more about him.
Gwendis stepped out of the shadows and seems to know something about the smuggler's tunnel. I should talk to her and see what she can tell me.
Freeing <<1>> from the <<2>> may result an attack by the spider which webbed him. I should be ready for a fight, just in case.
I took Sgolag's head. The wanted poster said I should see Curinaire in Elden Root for my reward.
If the Khajiit was on Sgolag's trail, that might have been what led him into this mine. I should search for Sgolag.
<<1>> is being held somewhere in <<2>>.
I should deliver these notes to Nimriell.
I found research notes belonging to Nimriell. I should try to find her in Grahtwood to return them.
I offered to venture into the Burroot Kwama Mine and find Nimriell's notes for her.
I need to search the Nilata surface ruins for captive Imperial soldiers. I can use the ice rune to free them from the webs.
With the Imperial soldiers freed, I can find Captain Gemelle at the Imperial camp and give her the news.

Darien and Gwendis found out about a tunnel that smugglers use to get into Northpoint. Unfortunately, the tunnel is locked and only the smuggler boss, Lagra, has a key. I need to search the coast and see if I can find anything that can help us.
I found the key to the smuggler tunnels, but the ship's captain spotted me. I should speak to her and see if she'll tell me anything else about the tunnel and the way into Northpoint.
Gwendis was waiting for me on the shore. She led me to where Baron Dorell, Countess Tamrith, and the others were hiding. Now I should talk to her and tell her I found a way into the city.
Lyris is conversing with the vision of Sai Sahan.
I need to search the Nilata Ruins for Adeena's twin sister, Izzara.
Adeena's twin sister Izzara needs me to find and destroy focus stones scattered throughout Nilata Ruins. Once they are destroyed, we'll be able to get inside the ruins.
I destroyed all four of the focus stones. I should meet Izzara at the center of the ruins where the spell key is located.
I need to use the talisman that Izzara gave me to unbind the prisoners within the ruins. While it means their death, Izzara says it's the only way to stop the ritual.
The source of the voice turned out to be Najan's missing wife, Adeena. I should speak to her.
After the last captive was put to rest, I heard a voice call out. I should see where it came from.
I should wait for Adeena and Izzara to finish confronting one another.
Adeena and Izzara have accused each other of being the vessel of Anexiel. I must make the choice on whom to use the talisman.
I chose to use the talisman on Adeena. I should wait and see what happens.
Izzara was the vessel for Anexiel. This should have disrupted the ritual, but as Adeena's twin, Izzara served to complete the ritual. I should speak to Adeena about what to do next.
I chose to use the talisman on Izzara. I should wait and see what happens.
I have to kill Anexiel to end this. Izzara believes she can still be defeated while she's just revived in her new form.
Izzara was the vessel for Anexiel. She abandoned Izzara's body upon completion of her ritual. I should speak to Izzara about what to do next.
I have to kill Anexiel to end this. Adeena believes she can still be defeated while she's just revived in her new form.
I should speak to Izzara about what happened and let her know it's over.
I should speak to Adeena about what happened and let her know it's over.
Najan and Izzara started talking when we arrived. I should wait until their conversation is over.
Najan and Adeena started talking when we arrived. I should wait until their conversation is over.
I should speak to Najan.
I should speak to Najan.
I should speak to Najan.
I should speak to Najan.
I should speak with <<1>> near <<2>>. He can open a portal to the Vinedusk's hidden prison.
The Orc said if I wanted to know more about the resistance, I should talk to a woman named Yarah. She's presently on the balcony of the alchemist's shop.

Yarah refused to say anything outright until I've proved myself not an Imperial spy. She said there were weapons stashed in a nearby warehouse, and if I were to steal them from the Imperials guarding it, I could prove my loyalty.
I've stolen weapons from the Imperials in Hallin's Stand. I should bring them to the stablehand Yarah mentioned.

The stablehand said I could find people to give the weapons to in the town square. He disguised them as nondescript packages, so even if the Imperials stop me, they shouldn't be alerted to what I'm up to.
After passing out weapons in the town square, a beggar grabbed my attention. I should see what he has to say.
It appears there's an underground resistance to the Imperial occupation of Hallin's Stand. If I'm interested in helping, I should look for like-minded people in the alchemy shop.
Upon entering the alchemist's shop, a large Orc called out to me. I should ask him what he knows about the resistance.
The beggar gave me a cryptic message to tell Yarah, and also told me where I could find her again.

Dhakir told me of the Imperial's plan to publicly execute the grandeya of Hallin's Stand, and gave me a key that could unlock her shackles. After I brought the key to Yarah, Ufa appeared. I should speak to him.
Yarah has one lead on the identity of the traitor to Hallin's Stand. She asked me to meet with a woman in the tavern and see what information I can get from her.
Qismah didn't want to speak at length about her suspicions out in the open. She asked me to come with her to her home, where we can talk at length.
I've arrived at Qismah's home. I should ask her about her suspicions into the identity of the traitor.
Qismah suspects her own husband might have had something to do with the taking of Hallin's Stand. She's asked me to see what I can find in his office.
Qismah's husband arrived to find me digging about in his personal effects. I should confront him to see if he's really the traitor of Hallin's Stand.

Dhakir, Qismah's husband, said he wasn't the one responsible for the city's betrayal. But he can't divulge any more information, because his daughter is being held captive by an Imperial in order to buy his silence.
After leaving the at-Nimr's home, the same beggar I spoke to earlier found me. I should ask him what he knows about the at-Nimr family.

Dhakir said he can't divulge any more information, because his daughter is being held captive by an Imperial in order to buy his silence. I should find the pavilion where the beggar said she was being held.

Dhakir said he can't divulge any more information, because his daughter is being held captive by an Imperial in order to buy his silence. But if I can free his daughter, he'd be free to tell me whatever he knows.
I've freed Hazzi from the Imperial soldier. I should follow her, since she's probably going straight to her father, Dhakir.

Overwhelmed by the safe return of his daughter, Dhakir told me the Imperials plan to publicly execute the grandeya of Hallin's Stand, and gave me a key to free her. I should take this information to Yarah at the alchemist's shop.
I've lit the watchtowers, and now the people of Hallin's Stand are ready. Ufa is here as well. I should speak to him to find out how he wants to proceed.
<<1>>, <<2>>, and <<3>> caught the traitor after he opened the gates to the Imperials, but it was too late. Now, these guards are hiding somewhere in the city. I need to find them.

According to the soldiers who caught the traitor, <<1>> is in hiding. The only way to root him out would be to use one of his vices - beautiful women.\n\nI should speak to <<2>>, the courtesan the soldier mentioned.
The courtesan was at first unwilling to set a trap for the traitor, but she was startled to see Ufa alive. I should speak to him and see what he thinks we should do next.
Ufa said to prevent bloodshed, we should incapacitate the traitor Maradem before confronting him. He said I could find the means for that at the Mages Guild by speaking to a man named Razin.
<<1>> told me to lace a special bottle of wine with the powder I've brought, so she can serve it to the traitor.
I've obtained the paralyzing powder from the apothecary. I should take it to the Drowsy Owl Inn, where Niha works.
Now that the courtesan has served the traitor the paralyzing agent, I should question him.
I've gotten all the information I can out of the traitor. Ufa's just arrived - I should see what he plans to do next.
Now that the poison's paralysis has taken full effect, Ufa asked me to search Maradem for any information of use.
With the key to the stocks I'll be able to free the grandeya from her bonds in front of the palace. I should go there immediately.
With the key to the stocks I'll be able to free the grandeya from her bonds in front of the palace.
The grandeya, free but weak from her captivity, asked me to light the signal fires atop the two watchtowers to call the citizens to arms.
I've lit the watchtowers, and now the people of Hallin's Stand are ready. Ufa is here as well. I should speak to him to find out how he wants to proceed.
With Ufa guarding the palace entrance, I should be able to enter the grandeya's palace and put an end to the Imperial occupation.
I've found the leader of the Seventh Legion within the grandeya's palace. She seems oddly calm - I should speak to her and find out why.
The Imperial leader was buying time for her lackey, Maradem, to show up. I can put an end to this Imperial occupation by defeating him and slaying Secundus.
Secundus is slain, and with her, the army occupying Hallin's Stand will fall. Even now, Ufa's conscripts are retaking the town. I should leave the palace and see how they fare.
The grandeya has reclaimed her seat of power in Hallin's Stand, and with so, the city. She's addressing the crowd outside the palace. I should listen to her speech.
Ufa's forces are scattering the Seventh Legion, retaking Hallin's Stand. I should ask him how things are going.
I must enter the Crypt of Lamae Bal.
I should talk to Rahaja.
I have the key and know where to find the smuggler tunnels. I should swim back to the coast and head for the cove.
We've located <<1>>, who is trapped in a web. Freeing him may attract the spider who created these large webs, so I should be ready for anything.
I should speak to First Mate Elvira Derre at the Northpoint docks. She should be prepared to offer me passage to Sentinel.
We've arrived at the docks in Sentinel. I should speak with Elvira to find out what's going on.
I should speak to the Arch-Mage again so that he can cast the memory charm on me.
Heads in tow, we can now begin the ritualâ€”so <<1>> can swear her oath to Malacath.
<<1>> is in the <<2>>. He must be defeated for <<3>>'s oath to be fulfilled.
I agreed to help <<1>> find her pet bantam guar, Puddles. But I need to find a day-old fish first. I should talk to Grubdosh or get an old fish from the docks.
We arrived at the vault. I should speak with Sai to see what's next.
<<1>> must now swear her oath to of vengeance to Malacath.
I need to find a courier in Shornhelm before I can begin my investigation. Adusa told me to start at the west gate.
I should follow the courier through Shornhelm to see who he makes contact with. I can't let him out of my sight.
I need to let Baron Dorell know what happened inside the manor. And I need to pass along the orders Verandis projected to me.
The smuggler's tunnel is located in a cave beneath the lighthouse. Skordo suggests we enter the tunnel one at a time so as not to draw any suspicion.
I need to find a building somewhere in Northpoint where we can set up a safe base of operations while we work to liberate the city.
To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. I should speak with the spirit of Divad Hunding.
Izzara needs to weave an enchantment to destroy the spell key. I must wait for her to complete the spell.

The courier tossed a coin into the town square fountain before leaving by the south gate. I could pick up the coin and head back to Adusa, or I could wait to see if the informer shows up to collect the coin.
I picked up the courier's coin from the fountain. Adusa will want to see this. I should return to her where I first spoke to her, in the upper city.
The courier's coin was meant for <<1>>, making him the prime suspect in my investigation. I should search his house for evidence connecting him to the Montclairs.
Adusa found a coded message on the coin. She suggested I speak to her friend Sahil, at the inn. He should be able to decipher the message for me. Then I can find the location of the informer.
<<1>> is the prime suspect in my investigation. I should search his house for evidence that connects him to Montclair.
I found <<1>> trapped in some sort of energy barrier. He thinks I can break the barrier by using a watcher's central eye to interrupt the flow of energy.
We found a safe building to use as our base of operations in Northpoint. I should talk to Skordo and find out what he thinks we should do next.
I need to search the city and find Baron Dorell, Countess Tamrith, and Darien. They were supposed to follow after us. Once I locate them, I need to lead them back to the safe house.

Apostle Marian revealed that the entity in the ruins is a Nereid named Lorelia. She says the Primeval Seekers misled me and have been capturing Rain Disciples. She asked me to find and free the captured disciples.

A watery voice spoke when I took the essence to the essence troughs. The voice spoke of having nearly enough essences for some purpose. The voice also mentioned a nameâ€”Apostle Marian. I should look for this apostle.
To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I've earned the blessings of the heroes' spirits. Now I must simply find the entrance to the chamber.
<<1>> asked me to speak with <<2>>, an expert on <<c:3>>.
I found all of the members of the assault team and sent them to the safe house. Now I should return there so we can plan our next steps.
Everyone seems to have made it to the safe house. I should talk to Skordo and find out what's going on.
Skordo wants to find the source of the sounds the Countess heard coming from the inn. Luckily, Darien acquired the key while he was exploring the city. I need to go upstairs and get the key.

I have the key that unlocks the inn. Now I need to go the inn and see what's waiting inside. If it's survivors, I need to send them back to the safe house. If it's Lleraya, I have to kill her before she can use her magic to charm me.
I should head to <<c:1>> and speak with Conservator <<2>>.
I need to activate both pillars next to <<c:1>>. To do so, I will need to use <<2>>.
<<1>> told me to speak with <<2>> if I wish to join their ranks.
Baron Dorell and I have made it into the inn. Now we need to search the building and see if we can find either Lleraya or any Northpoint survivors.
I could speak to this Haskill person, ask about the place I've come to, before I move on.
<<1>> has attuned me to the past and placed me in the role of <<2>>, one of the elves we observed in <<3>>. I should search <<4>> and discover what his purpose was here.
I have located the <<1>>, the apparent goal that <<2>> was heading for. I should try to destroy it, and anyone that tries to prevent me from doing so.
After I used the Prismatic Weapon to disrupt the <<1>>, it vanished, as Molag Bal's voice echoed in the room. <<2>> has appeared. I should talk to her about what we witnessed.

I should go to the Earth Forge and meet <<1>>. Together we need to follow the ancient instructions we found in <<2>> and create a weapon that can defeat the <<3>>, should Molag Bal attempt to use it against Tamriel again.
The Baron and I found Northpoint survivors hiding in the inn's attic. One of them emerged to speak to us. I should talk to him.
Now that I know Lleraya occupies Dorell Manor and I have a key, I need to go to the manor house and slip inside.
Before I confront Lleraya, I should locate Lord Ellic Dorell and make sure he's still alive.
I've done as Glorthorien wished, and her son has appeared at the falls. I should speak to him and see what he has to say.
I activated the pillars. I should speak with <<1>> and see what I need to do next.
<<1>> told me to place <<Ac:2>> within <<Ac:3>>. Doing so should fully activate <<c:4>>.
<<c:1>> of <<2>> seems to be opening â€¦ something it hasn't done in centuries. I should wait to see exactly what is happening.
<<1>> trapped us and entered <<c:2>>! <<3>> said I should use <<4>> to free myself.
<<1>> emerged from <<c:2>> as a monster! He appears to be filled with rage. I need to stop his rampage before he kills everyone in the room, including <<3>>!
<<1>> is dead. I should speak with <<2>> about her intentions.
<<1>> insists she must enter <<c:2>>, despite the dangers. I should wait for her emergence to see whether she will be ratified, or suffer a similar fate as her brother.
I have arrived in <<1>>. I should speak with <<2>> to learn more about this place.
I located Lord Ellic Dorell. I should talk to him and see if he can tell me what's going on in here.
Lord Ellic has definitely gone mad, but at least he was able to tell me that Lleraya is upstairs. I should go up there and find her.
With the vial of blessed water in hand, I should travel southwest to the falls that overlook Gil-Var-Delle. There I must drip some of the water at the crest of each of the falls.
All of the carnival's performers have what they need to please the crowds. I should inform <<1>>.
I defeated Septima Tharn, rescued the king's soul from the Far Shores, and restored him to life. I should speak with King Emeric about everything that happened.
First I must fill a vial from the waters at the shrine.

Verandis appeared to warn me that I was succumbing to Lleraya's spell. He said she's using a veil, like the one she cast at Lorkrata. I need to head into the basement and see if I can find a way to break her spell.
I was able to use a tear in Lleraya's veil to break free from her spell and see beyond the illusion. Now I need to deal with Lleraya while I have the chance.
Now that Lleraya has been defeated, Verandis has appeared before me as a magical projection. I should talk to him and see what he suggests I do next.
I decided to expose <<1>> as the informer.  I should return to <<2>> in the upper city to debrief her.
I found a codebook in <<1>>'s house in Shornhelm, implicating him as the informer, but <<2>> saw me going through her home. I should explain myself to her.
Before Nyronie left, she told me how I can track the aspects. I can track the wolf by its prints, the bear by crouching and seeking the damage it left behind, and the hunter by finding his camp.
The illusion of the veil has fallen and the nobles are once again visible in the manor. I should talk to Lord Ellic Dorell and see if everyone is all right.

Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has captured King Emeric and taken him to the Chamber of Passage within the Hall of Heroes. To enter the chamber, I must speak to heroes' spirits and gain their blessing. I should begin with Frandar Hunding.

Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn has captured King Emeric and taken him to the Chamber of Passage within the Hall of Heroes. To enter the chamber, I must speak to heroes' spirits and gain their blessing. I should begin with Frandar Hunding.
I should head to <<1>> and speak with <<2>> about <<3>>'s delayed shipment.
I should speak with <<1>> about <<2>>'s delayed shipment.
<<1>> claimed <<2>>'s shipment was dumped outside of town. I can claim it if I can find it.
<<1>>'s missing shipment was infested with kwama from <<2>>. I should bring him what's left of the shipment.
<<1>> asked me to deliver the shipment directly to <<2>>.
It turns out that <<1>> is not only an alchemist, but a hag â€¦ an actual hag. She wants me to put the contents of the shipment in her <<z:2>>.
I must wait for <<1>> to cure me.
I should search Torog's Spite for a letter or something that might show which clan is responsible for the bandits' raids.
To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. I should speak with the spirit of Divad Hunding.
<<1>>, one of the Vinedusk, appeared out of a portal. He asked me to step through to their base of operations.
I should speak with  <<1>> near Cormount to open a portal.
<<1>> said I should speak with her performers to get more details.
I spoke with <<1>>'s performers. Each told me what they need in order to perform for the locals.
<<1>> needs supplies from the docks of <<2>>. I should look for an ornate chest.
<<1>> needs <<mz:2>>. I should search the beaches of <<3>>.

The supplies for the Khajiit Embassy were unusable. I should continue my investigation of <<1>>.
I stepped through <<1>>'s portal to what seems to be an old ruin. There doesn't appear to be a way out. A Vinedusk named <<2>> asked me to speak with him.
I found several Ayleid fragments that might be what Eminaire is looking for. I should bring them to her back at her camp.
<<1>> is dead. I should tell <<2>>.
<<1>>, a Vinedusk Ranger loyal to <<2>>, believes <<3>> may have ordered the attack on the work party before fleeing to <<c:4>>. He asked me to meet him there.
To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. I should speak with the spirit of Makela Leki.
To enter the Chamber of Passage and rescue King Emeric from Imperial Magus-General Septima Tharn, I need the blessing of heroes' spirits. I should speak with the spirit of Makela Leki.
I can either find Rahaja and become a vampire or look for a priest of Arkay and receive the cure.
After learning that the Nereid is only trying to save the lake, I rescued some of her disciples from Primeval Seekers. The Seekers' leader, Herald Kixathi has approached me. I should speak with her.
I delivered the <<z:1>> to <<2>>, a seemingly friendly hag.

Nicolene said Captain Kaleen was meeting a contact named Sigil on the road leading out of Shornhelm. Sigil was supposed to give her more information about Naruk. I should start my search on the road out of Shornhelm.
I found Captain Kaleen's contact, Sigil, off the road. Kaleen is nowhere to be seen. I should see what Sigil has to say.

"Sigil," Captain Kaleen's contact, suggested I speak to the Shornhelm guards. She hopes one of them may have seen Captain Kaleen. I should start with the Gate Captains since they see everyone who comes and goes from the city.

Naruk is with Kaleen and was described as being angry. Kaleen may need my help. Perhaps someone else in town has seen them. I should ask around, starting with people on the streets. Maybe a beggar has seen them.
Naruk and Kaleen entered an abandoned house and did not come out. I should look around inside for any evidence that might lead me to them.
Sigil and I found a trap door in the abandoned house. The trap door is locked, but Sigil has volunteered to get it open.
Sigil opened a trap door and then headed down immediately afterward. She will need help if Naruk is waiting below.
Our search of the abandoned house revealed a hidden basement behind a trap door. Captain Kaleen may be down here, if she's still alive.
Nicolene must have followed us into the basement. I'd better wait to see how this reunion plays out before attempting to speak with Captain Kaleen.
Now that Captain Kaleen is feeling a bit better, I should speak with her. She might be able to tell me where to find Naruk.

Naruk's lackey, Abante, revealed that Naruk has already fled from the hidden basement where I found Kaleen. Kaleen explained that he intends to release poison in the cistern behind the Fighter's Guild in order to poison Shornhelm.
The floodgates are locked. Now, I must destroy the last of Naruk's poison barrels.

I need prevent Naruk from completing his plan to poison Shornhelm and incite old hostilities within the Covenant. To do this, I should seal the cistern gates and destroy the barrels of poison. Then I need to kill Naruk so he can't try again.
Naruk is dead and the plot to poison Shornhelm has been dealt with. I should go to the Dead Wolf Inn and meet up with Captain Kaleen and Nicolene to make sure their aren't any loose ends.
I need to leave Dorell Manor and find Baron Dorell and the others.
<<1>> needs <<mz:2>>. I should search the beaches of <<3>>.
I must wait for <<1>> to cure me.
I must speak to the priest to complete the purification ritual.
<<1>> needs a book on Wood Elf folklore. <<2>> offered to loan out an <<3>> which contains stories of Wood Elf heritage. I should take the book.
I could speak to Aelif some more before we enter the portal to the Earth Forge.
The relic is goneâ€”along with most of the Doomcrag! I should talk to Darien and make sure everything is all right.
From reading Septima Tharn's research notes in her private office in Hallin's Stand, I learned that she is planning something foul at the Hall of Heroes. I should go there next to look for her.
I should search the city of Hallin's Stand for signs of where Septima may be.
I located Septima's private office in Hallin's Stand. I should read the notes on the table to see if I can discern what she's planning.
I should search the cavern for the researchers who went missing here previously.
I've found the remains of both scholars who went missing, and retrieved notes from their camp. I should return to <<1>> with the research.
I must lock the floodgates to prevent flow from the cistern while Nicolene and Kaleen are guarding the winch that flushes the cistern.
Princess Elara has completed the ritual to become the new Viridian Sentinel. I need to return to the altar with Elara.
I should make for the coast to the west and see if there are Ayleid ruins there where the fragments might be found.
If I could find the other pieces, the completed tablet might be worth something to the right person. I should look around for more.
I should see if Eminaire has any interest in the fragments I recovered.
With the horrors of Nilata behind us, it's time to return Najan.
With the horrors of Nilata behind us, it's time to return Najan.
I should find someone who might be interested in reassembling and deciphering this tablet. Scholars and researchers frequent the Ayleid ruins around Grahtwood. I should start with those.
Llotha and I figured out the password and unlocked the lockbox. I should speak to her about what she found inside.
<<1>> needs a book on Wood Elf folklore. <<2>> is looking for something that could fit. I should wait to see what he finds.
Izzara destroyed the spell key. I should speak to her to find out what to do next.
The moon priestess Saifa is being very coy. I should speak to her again to see what she wants me to do.
Now that <<1>> is free from the web, I should talk to him to see what happened to him.
<<1>>, wearing rags and not much else, was near an upper area of the mines. I should ask him whether he's all right.
I recovered <<1>>'s emotions and restored him to health. I should talk to <<2>> to debrief her.
<<1>> is gone, having teleported to somewhere in <<2>>. I should tell <<3>> about what happened to her partner.
I need to find <<1>>. Given her name, I should probably check the tall towers first.
I found <<1>> at the top of a tower. I should talk to her and find out what she's looking for.
I found the <<1>>. I need to meet <<2>> at the <<3>>.
I arrived at <<1>>. I need to give the <<2>> to <<3>>
I gave the <<1>> to <<2>>. I should wait for her to complete the ritual.
<<1>> told me to find the <<2>> to use the magic travel altar. She said it was probably in the southern tower.
Sahun arrived. He asked me to spare his mother. I should speak to him.
I should find her and give her this journal.
I found <<1>> in Barkbite. I should give her the journal.
I should speak with Conservator <<1>>.
I've freed the captured Rain Disciples. I should return to Apostle Marian.
I have been thrown out of Oblivion into a starry realm of light and color. A voice calls to me from ahead.
I must follow <<1>> and retrieve <<Ac:2>> before she uses it to escape.
Something's wrong with the mage. I should follow <<1>> into <<2>> to find out what's wrong with him.
We arrived at <<1>> to find <<2>> turned into iron. I should ask <<3>> for more details.
<<1>> asked me to figure out why <<2>> refuses to leave <<3>>.
<<1>>'s experiments with the <<2>> separated his emotions from his personality.  I can use the <<2>> to enter <<3>>'s "dreamstate" and recover <<1>>'s emotions.
I used the <<1>> to enter <<2>>'s "dreamstate."  To recover <<3>>'s emotions, I must make each emotion feel its opposite to stabilize it.
I successfully recovered <<1>>'s emotions. I should talk to him in <<2>> to see how, or if, he feels.
<<1>> leads an Imperial force that has taken Old Tower. <<2>> believes taking her helmet as a trophy might rally other Covenant troops to retake the position.
When I returned to <<1>>, he was already dead. One of his wives, <<2>>, ended his life with honor while I was slaying <<3>> at the Gates of Craglorn.
The amulet is clearly magical, but I can't discern its purpose. I should look around the area for clues regarding this person's demise.
<<1>> led a force of Imperial troops that took Old Tower and now occupies the Gates of Craglorn. Perhaps I can cast a shadow on their victory.
<<1>> believes taking the helmet of his last foe will retrieve his honor and rally Covenant troops to retake Old Tower.
After defeating Anexiel, a voice whispered to me, and a Daedra appeared. I should speak to it.
After defeating Anexiel, a voice whispered to me, and a Daedra appeared. I should speak to it.
I should speak to the sisters to determine what needs to be done.
I should travel to Bangkorai Pass and look for Scout Nadira.

Pellingare was at a strange altar. Perhaps it holds a clue to opening the door.

We found Master Pellingare in the sewers, though he fled when Yahyif called out to him. Pellingare has locked a door behind him, blocking our pursuit.
I have the heads of <<1>> and <<2>>. I should talk to <<3>> for the next step of the plan.
I must find a suitable location for <<1>> to swear her oath to Malacath.

From reading Septima Tharn's research notes in her private office in Hallin's Stand, I learned that she is planning something foul at the Hall of Heroes. I should go there next to look for her.

I should see if I can find Sir Dubroc and his men in Jackdaw Cove.

I need to find Commander Ahla at Bangkorai Garrison and notify her of what's going on.
I should read the mage's letter to get clues about the names and professions of the four group members.
By consulting my notes, I should be able to deduce the names and professions of each of the Blacklight Raiders. I should then speak with Llotha to find out if I'm right.

I should investigate <<1>> and see if there is any truth to <<2>>'s tale.

I've done what <<1>> asked, and should talk to him about my initiation into the Undaunted.

Duke Renchant is planning to hand Evermore over to Imperial control. Imperial spies are already in the city, preparing to seize control. I need to inform the queen. Her handmaiden, Glarikha, hopes this will convince her to take action.
I should read the gravestones for more clues to the names and professions of the four members of the Blacklight Raiders.
I should bring the book Vindication for the Dragon Break back to Gahgdar.

My dream-walk through the memories of Verandis Ravenwatch continues. It seems that the secret of the first memory concerns some kind of Ayleid relic that Reezal-Jul found. Now that the second memory has begun, I should speak to Verandis.
The Sister of Waves has appeared. I should speak with her.
One of the Nereid Sisters has appeared. I should speak to her.
The Sister of Waves waits up ahead. I should find her.
I have found the other Nereid Sisters, and agreed to help them defeat the lamia queen. The Sisters will meet me at the queen's lair. I should head there and speak with the Sister of Floods once more.
Verandis has experienced some kind of hole in his memories. I need to explore this memory and see if I can discover the moments that he lost.
I learned that Reezal-Jul had secret information concerning the healing stone, including Ayleid texts he translated. I should talk to Verandis and tell him what I saw in his memory.
I should speak with Sai Sahan in the Harborage.
Cadwell's portal has taken me to the Ebonheart Pact. I will have to make my way through Stonefalls, Deshaan, Shadowfen, Eastmarch, and finally the Rift.
I experienced another alliance in its entirety and should return to Cadwell. Perhaps he'll have more for me to do.
Cadwell has prepared the Light of Meridia within the Harborage that will allow me to travel to another alliance. I should activate the Light to investigate more of the world.
Cadwell's portal has taken me to the Aldmeri Dominion. I will have to make my way through Auridon, Grahtwood, Greenshade, Malabal Tor, and finally Reaper's March.
Cadwell's portal has taken me to the Daggerfall Covenant. I will have to make my way through Glenumbra, Stormhaven, Rivenspire, the Alik'r Desert, and finally Bangkorai.
Cadwell's portal has taken me to the Aldmeri Dominion. I will have to make my way through Khenarthi's Roost, to Auridon, Grahtwood, Greenshade, Malabal Tor, and finally Reaper's March.

I experienced the final alliance in its entirety and should return to Cadwell.

After defeating Uela, the crows she once enthralled descended upon her. One of them called out to me to speak to it.
I should go to <<1>> and see if they need any help.
