Before I head out to meet with Count Carolus, Astara asked me to talk to Mirabelle. She has information that might be of use to me when I meet with the Count.
Astara ordered me to go to Kvatch to meet up with Tanek. Then we can determine how to demonstrate the Dark Brotherhood's true power to the Grand Sermonizer and her followers.

I need to kill Akatosh Sermonizers in the streets of Kvatch, being careful to avoid guards and witnesses. The death of her priests should draw out the Grand Sermonizer so that Tanek can find her hiding spot.
Tanek discovered that the Grand Sermonizer has taken refuge in her family's estate outside the walls of Kvatch. I need to travel to her estate and find a way inside.
We entered the estate where the Grand Sermonizer is hiding. I should look around and see if I can determine what's going on here.
The Grand Sermonizer is alone in the interrogation hall. Now's our opportunity to complete our mission and assassinate her for speaking out against the Dark Brotherhood.
The Grand Sermonizer vanished, but she left behind the assassin she tortured to death. I should stand aside and let Tanek investigate the scene.
Some sort of spell has paralyzed Tanek. It's a trap! I need to defend Tanek until he can throw off the effects of the spell.
The Grand Sermonizer disappeared before I could finish her off, but Tanek still suffers under her spell. I should make sure he's all right before I chase after the Grand Sermonizer.
Kor arrived to help Tanek. He ordered me to finish the mission and chase down the Grand Sermonizer. I need to follow her escape route before she gets away.
I found the Grand Sermonizer's escape tunnel that runs beneath the estate. I should follow after her and try to catch her before she gets away.
I caught up to the Grand Sermonizer and her cadre of Order of the Hour soldiers. Let the final battle begin!
The Grand Sermonizer is dead. I should return to the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary and report what happened to Astara.
Astara needs to hear about what happened at the Grand Sermonizer's estate. I should tell her what happened to Brother Cimbar and about the warrior in black armor.
Kor helped Tanek make it back to the Sanctuary, though Tanek was badly injured by the Grand Sermonizer's trap. Tanek has asked to see me. I should check on him.
Tanek recovers under the watchful eyes of Kor and Hildegard. I should wait for them to finish their visit.
Tanek sent Kor and Hildegarde away and asked to speak to me privately. I should find out what he wants.
Tanek will recover, given rest and time. I should see if there's anything else he needs before we consider the Grand Sermonizer situation dealt with.
I reached Kvatch. Now I should talk to Tanek and determine how we're going to proceed.
Walks-Softly wants me to take the amulet so we can leave the mansion.

I found two items that could be the keepsakes Walks-Softly was looking for. I should meet  <<1>> in the family quarters of the mansion and see if there's anything else he wants to steal from Anais Velmont.
Governor Fortunata is dead and Count Carolus's contract has been fulfilled. I should return to the Sanctuary and let Astara know what happened here.
I should return to the Sanctuary and tell Astara what we learned about the Black Dragon.
I should talk to Astara and find out what she thinks we should do about Primate Artorius and the Order of the Hour.
I made it inside the Jarol Estate. Now I need to locate my quarry, the noble Quintus Jarol.
I should return to Speaker Terenus at the Anvil Lighthouse and tell him that the noble he wanted me to kill is dead.
I need to find the Black Door and gain entry to the Gold Coast Sanctuary of the Dark Brotherhood.
I gained entry to the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary. Now I should find Astara and talk to her about what they expect of me.
Kor suggested we start our search at Anvil's Great Chapel of Dibella. Hildegard often goes there to pray and contemplate the Divines.
Kor suggested we talk to the worshipers to find out if any of them saw Hildegard in the chapel recently.
I found out that a woman saw Hildegard talking to Chanter Nemus near the Akatosh shrine. I should let Kor know and ask him if he discovered anything that can help us locate Hildegard.

A very worried Kor thinks that Hildegard may have gone back to where he first found herâ€”the wilderness of Skyrim. While he checks at the docks, he wants me to talk to the caravan master to see if she arranged travel there.
Hildegard told the caravan master about Kor, and she recognized him. She's agreed to take us to the Jerall Mountains in Skyrim, where she took Hildegard. I should talk to her when we're ready to go.
We arrived in the Jerall Mountains of Skyrim. Now we need to track Hildegard and find her before the Silver Dawn hunters kill her.
I tracked Hildegard to a camp that's overrun with Silver Dawn hunters. I should deal with these hunters before I continue to search for Hildegard.

The Silver Dawn has apparently been tracking Hildegard, too. They reached this spot and set up a camp. A surviving member of their hunting party suggested that her trail continues to the south. I should hurry and find Hildegard.
I watched as Kor calmed Hildegard and got her to change back into human form. I should talk to her and find out what this was all about.
I let Hildegard know what I think of her actions. It's time for us to return to Anvil.
I should talk to Kor and make sure he gets Hildegard safely back to the Sanctuary.
I should return to the Sanctuary and let Astara know what happened.
Hildegard was tricked by Chanter Nemus for some unknown reason, but Kor and I were able to keep her safe. I should let Astara know what happened.
I should find her in an Outlaws Refuge.
I think the caravan master helped Hildegard leave Anvil, but I can't get a straight answer out of her. Maybe Kor can convince her to help us. I should stand back and let him give it a try.
Kor mentioned the Silver Dawn. I should talk to him to see what he found out.
I should return to the Sanctuary and tell Astara what transpired at the Enclave of the Hourglass. I should also turn over the journal I recovered from the Black Dragon.
I should go to Anvil Castle and find out who Governor Fortunata ap Dugal wants me to kill.

In order to carry out Governor Fortunata's contract, I first have to find a way to get inside Castle Kvatch. She suggested getting a key to the gatehouse from the castellan or I can talk to one of the officers at the gate and try to gain entry there.
I'm inside Castle Kvatch. Now I need to locate and murder Commander Marcus Scipio, leader of the Order of the Hour.
I murdered the commander of the Order of the Hour. Now I need to find Count Carolus and tell him what happened to Commander Scipio to complete this contract.
It appears that Speaker Terenus came in response to the Count's Black Sacrament ritual. He wants to speak with me.
My new contract calls for the death of Governor Fortunata. I should meet Mirabelle at Anvil Castle and see if she has any advice on breaching the Pirate Queen's defenses.

I need to reach Governor Fortunata's private pantry on the upper level of the castle and put poison in her favorite wine. Mirabelle suggests I use the secret passages to get around. I can find an entrance wherever I see a red drape over an alcove.
The wine decanter has been poisoned. Now to let Governor Fortunata know that I killed Marcus Scipio and see if I can get her to drink to her good fortune.
I have the Daedric treasures, but my window has expired. <<1>> is waiting to lead me back to <<Ac:2>> from here. Hopefully the haul is still worth something to someone.
I have the treasure, but my window has expired. <<1>> is waiting to lead me back to <<Ac:2>> from here. Hopefully the haul is still worth something to someone.
I have the treasures, but my window has expired. <<1>> is waiting to lead me back to <<Ac:2>> from here. Hopefully the haul is still worth something to someone.
I should talk to Speaker Terenus and see if there's anything else he needs me to do.
Tanek was sent ahead to scout out the heavily fortified Cathedral in Kvatch and try to find a way inside. I should travel to Kvatch and meet up with him.
Tanek found a way into the catacombs that lie beneath the Cathedral. I need to explore these catacombs to find a way to enter the Cathedral proper.
While exploring the Cathedral Catacombs, I encountered a <<1>>. It blocks the way ahead so I need to kill it to proceed.
The <<1>> is dead. Now I can continue exploring the catacombs until I find a way into the Cathedral above.
A group of Order of the Hour warriors has cornered Grazda, one of my Brotherhood sisters, in the chamber ahead. We'll need to defeat them and their leader before we can proceed.
The way into the Cathedral is just ahead. Time to go upstairs and find Primate Artorius.

Hildegard was tricked by Chanter Nemus and then set upon by the Silver Dawn. It was all some sort of elaborate trap, but we don't know what motivated the chanter. I need to either offer Hilde words of encouragement or scold her to teach her a lesson.
I found a way into the Cathedral of Akatosh. Now I need to deal with Primate Artorius and make him pay for his transgressions against the Dark Brotherhood.
Now that <<1>> has been defeated, I should finish him off once and for all.
I should return to the Sanctuary and let Speaker Terenus know everything that occurred at the Cathedral.
Hildegard was tricked by Chanter Nemus for some unknown reason, but Kor and I were able to keep her safe. I should let Astara know what happened.
I could speak with <<1>> before I leave and see if she has any advice.

It seems that the best way to get the attention of the Dark Brotherhood is to kill an innocent person in cold blood. If I'm going to do this, I should go to Anvil on the Gold Coast and see if they think I'm worthy to join them.
Green-Venom-Tongue is arranging transportation for us to his former Sanctuary. When I'm ready to depart, I should meet him near the gates of Anvil.

I met up with Green-Venom-Tongue in Anvil. He arranged for an Argonian tracker named Shazara-Ta to transport us to his former Sanctuary. I should climb aboard her cart when we're ready to make the trip.
After traveling by horse and cart to Blackwood and then by boat up the river, we've reached the vicinity of Green-Venom-Tongue's former Sanctuary. Now I should follow him to the exact location.
We passed through the Black Door and into the old Sanctuary. I should talk to Green-Venom-Tongue and find out how he thinks we should proceed.
Green-Venom-Tongue burns resin from the Hist. He claims the fumes will allow us to see truths hidden in the ruins. We should search the Sanctuary and see what the fumes reveal.
Green-Venom-Tongue wants to use the last of the resin fumes to see if any signs of Lyra remain around the shrine of Sithis. He said to approach the shrine and see what is revealed.

We saw through the resin fumes how Lyra completed her mission to purge this Sanctuary and then received a new contract that took her to Kvatch. I should talk to Green-Venom-Tongue to see if we've learned everything we can here.
We saw reflections of what occurred here. Lyra was the Black Hand's instrument in purging this Sanctuary. I should talk to Green-Venom-Tongue and see what he thinks we should do next.
I must travel to the Aldmeri Dominion base in the Imperial City and meet with the commanding officer, General Nedras, for a briefing.
The Drake of Blades whispered for me to meet her nearby. I should go speak with her.
I should conclude my conversation with the Drake of Blades.
I must travel to the Ebonheart Pact base in the Imperial City and meet with the commanding officer, General Nesh-Tan, for a briefing.
The Drake of Blades whispered for me to meet her nearby. I should go speak to her.
I should conclude my conversation with the Drake of Blades.
I must travel to the Daggerfall Covenant base in the Imperial City and meet with the commanding officer, General Aklash, for a briefing.
The Drake of Blades whispered for me to meet her nearby. I should go speak with her.
I should conclude my conversation with the Drake of Blades.
I couldn't find Amelie, but a courier approached me. I should see what the courier wants.
The half-naked Nord said that he met the Khajiit woman who paid him to deliver the letter to Velsa in Rawl'kha. I should travel to Reaper's March and see if I can find this mysterious Khajiit.
The half-naked Nord said that he met the Khajiit woman who paid him to deliver the letter to Velsa in Evermore. I should travel to Bangkorai and see if I can find this mysterious Khajiit.
The Su-Zahleel tribal elders have been taken deeper into the ruins. I must hurry if I want to keep Tree-Minder Na-Kesh from sacrificing them.
I must destroy Exulus the Wispmother and retrieve pauldrons from the fallen warriors of Arkay in Hrota Cave.
Cleric Arvina may know more about the enemy I face. I should consult him in Anvil's Mages Guild before I enter the cave.
I destroyed Exulus and retrieved the pauldrons of the fallen Arkay warriors. Now I should meet Cleric Arvina in Anvil's Mages Guild and claim my reward.
I need to go to Garlas Agea to find and destroy <<1>>. I should also take any company ledgers I come across during my search or seize them from company functionaries in order to complete the job.
<<1>> is dead and I collected several ledgers containing the transactions of the Gold Coast Trading Company. I should find <<2>> to collect my reward.
The contract names <<1>> as the contact person. He may have additional information helpful for claiming this bounty.
I need to clear the excavation site of the source of the trouble and recover abandoned artifacts unearthed from the dig.
Finia Sele posted the bounty. I can find her in Kvatch's Market Square. She might have useful information about what obstacles I may face.
I recovered the relics and cleared the dig site of threats. I should return to Kvatch and speak with Finia Sele to claim my reward.
I defeated one of the best gladiators and conquered the challenge of the Kvatch Arena. I should speak to <<1>> to claim my prize.
I must defeat one of the best gladiators and conquer the challenge of the Kvatch Arena to claim a significant victory purse.
Codus ap Dugal, master of the Kvatch Arena, may be able to tell me more about what I may face in this contest.
I should tell Astara what transpired at the Enclave of the Hourglass.
Tanek will recover, given rest and time. I should see if there's anything else he needs before we consider the Grand Sermonizer situation dealt with.
I can take the initiative and kill additional Sermonizers to drive the Brotherhood's message home. That should impress Astara.
I should speak to <<1>> now that she is freed and back in charge.
I need to travel to Knightsgrave and follow Green-Venom-Tongue into the ruins to make sure he's able to complete the kill.

I should listen to Green-Venom-Tongue and help him figure out how to open the door that leads deeper into the ruins.
The doors leading deeper into the ruins have been opened. I should follow Green-Venom-Tongue and help him hunt down the Black Dragon.
The chamber ahead might contain a clue as to where the Black Dragon is hiding. I should explore it.
Two minotaurs smashed through the wall. I'll need to defeat the minotaurs before I can follow after Green-Venom-Tongue and proceed with the hunt for the Black Dragon.
Green-Venom-Tongue reached the Black Dragon before I could get to him. She killed him. That's one more death I owe her for. Now I have to finish this on my own.
The Black Dragon has decided to send her shadow forms against me. I need to defeat them before I can continue my hunt for the Black Dragon.
I defeated the Black Dragon's shadow forms. Now I can resume my hunt for the Black Dragon.

I tracked the Black Dragon to an even more ancient ruin beneath the ruins of Knightsgrave. It appears the Order of the Hour built its original headquarters atop a temple to the Dragon God of Time. Now we can have our final confrontation.
I defeated the Black Dragon and the Wrath of Sithis has claimed her soul. Now I need to find my way out of these ruins.

Razum-dar seems to be hunting the Sweetroll Killer, too. He suggested we meet at his hide-out above the enchanter's shop and discuss a plan of action.

Razum-dar thinks the messengers delivering notes throughout Kvatch might be connected to the Sweetroll Killer. He wants me to meet him outside so we can track the messengers and see what their notes have to say.

The notes contain background information on the targets, but not who commissioned the research. Each note provides a code phrase at the bottom. If I can figure out how to break the code, I might be able to find the recipient of these messages.
Naryu and Raz have agreed to work together to track the Sweetroll Killer down. I should meet them in Anvil, where most of the current targets have gone to hide. We'll plan our next move there.
Now that we're all in Anvil, I need to talk to my allies and come up with a plan to catch the Sweetroll Killer.

While Naryu and Razum-dar gather the killer's targets and get them to Engar's Hostel for safekeeping, they asked me to talk to Reman Mevavius at the Gold Coast Trading Company and find out what else he knows about the killer.

Reman was somehow involved with the Sweetroll Killer. He was using me to eliminate the killer and hide his involvement. But the killer found out and killed him instead. I should meet Naryu and Raz at Engar's Hostel and tell them what I learned.
The Sweetroll Killer has a farmhouse southeast of Anvil. I should head out and meet Naryu and Raz there.

I should confer with Naryu and Razum-dar about what to do with the Sweetroll Killer.

Before a Grand Gladiator will face me, I must survive lower tier fights against shackled gladiators and Order of the Hour soldiers. Also, I may need to wait for the fight to start.
I have all the reagents mentioned in the grimoire. I should use them to summon the leader's spirit from within his ritual circle, and then I should speak to the spirit.
I killed a Dremora imposter posing as the General. I should search the General's body for proof of his death.
I lit a fire to keep <<1>> from freezing. Now we can discuss the Worm Cult.
I found Velidreth's Lair. I must slay her to end the threat of the Silken Ring and discover the fate of Hides-the-Ashes's traitorous mentor, Tsatva-Lan.
I must find the lair of Velidreth, the Lady of Lace.
I must kill Velidreth's top assassin, <<1>>.
Switching the lever opened the North Gate. I should explore that wing of the Cradle.
I unlocked the remaining gate, and witnessed Tsatva-Lan's treachery. I should regroup with Hides-the-Ashes in the Central Chamber to discuss our next move.
I discovered a switch. I should pull it to open one of the blocked gates.
My progress is blocked by two locked gates. I must find a way to progress deeper into the Cradle of Shadows.
I need to find cursed <<z:1>> sought by collectors. I should defeat the toughest creature within to break the curse.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I need to place <<z:1>> around the ruins to bind the restless spirits. I should also find and defeat whatever woke them in the first place.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I need to place <<mz:1>> within the crypt. I should also find and defeat any creature that would seek to destroy the wards.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I need to place <<mz:1>> within the crypt. I should also find and defeat any creature that would seek to destroy the wards.
I need to place <<mz:1>> within the crypt. I should also find and defeat any creature that would seek to destroy the wards.
I need to collect <<Cmz:1>> from the ruin. I should also defeat the toughest Dwarven creature I can find.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I need to place <<mz:1>> within the crypt. I should also find and defeat any creature that would seek to destroy the wards.
I need to retrieve <<Cz:1>> from the ruin. I should also defeat the toughest Daedra that has been summoned.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I need to retrieve <<mCz:1>> from the ruin. I should also defeat the toughest Daedra that has been summoned.
I need to retrieve <<Cz:1>> from the ruin. I should also defeat the toughest Daedra that has been summoned.
I need to retrieve <<mCz:1>> from the ruin. I should also defeat the toughest Daedra that has been summoned.
I need to retrieve <<Cz:1>> from the ruin. I should also defeat the toughest Daedra that has been summoned.
I need to retrieve heirlooms stolen by the Red Rook Bandits. I should also defeat their leader.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
A small Daedric creature told me to go to the Vulkhel Guard Mages Guild. It must be one of Tharn's servants.
A small Daedric creature told me to go to the Daggerfall Mages Guild. It must be one of Tharn's servants.
I discovered a shadowy cave network full of Mephala's servants and horrifying beasts. I must fight my way through the darkness to find the exit.
Velidreth is dead, but Tsatva-Lan has not answered for what he has done. I should speak to <<1>> about what she intends to do with him.
I delivered the reagents <<1>> requested. I should speak with her.
<<1>> wants me to bring her some reagents. The pumpkin and guts should be easy to find, but I must also gather the "<<2>>" from the strongest creature in any "dangerous delve" outside of Cyrodiil.
I gathered the reagents she requested. I should speak with <<1>> about her witchmother's brew.
Everyone who has taken on the dangers of the Sanctum Ophidia have been defeated. Though the Scaled Court controls the caves, I must enter the Sanctum and slay the Serpent.
I've defeated the Celestial Serpent and returned him to his prison within the Apex Stone. The Scaled Court of Sanctum Ophidia has been scattered. I should speak with Atildel.
I've defeated the Celestial Serpent and returned him to his prison within the Apex Stone. The Scaled Court of Sanctum Ophidia has been scattered. I should speak to Turuk.
I've been defeated by the forces of the Celestial Serpent in Sanctum Ophidia. I need to report to Turuk Redclaws.
The witchmother I summoned doesn't seem hostile. I should speak with her and see what she wants.
I need to rescue a bantam guar mascot from the skooma ring in Claw's Strike. I should also defeat their leader to crush their spirits.
I need to pull multiple levers to cool a Dwemer furnace. I should also defeat the creature guarding it. Once I have done so, it should be safe to retrieve a <<z:1>> from the furnace.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I restored the Warrior's Apex Stone, but the Serpent told me that he has trapped the Warrior in a mortal form. I should tell the Star-Gazer researcher what I've learned.
The Thief told me I should visit the Lord, Lady, and Steed Mundus Stones in Craglorn to imbue the amulet with their power.

Touching the Mundus Stones gave me visions of the Thief, who told me that the Warrior had gone mad because the Serpent's followers have poisoned his Apex Mundus Stone. I need to reach the inner ruins of Kardala and restore the Warrior's Apex Stone.
I've reached the Ruins of Kardala beneath the temple. I should search for the chamber that houses the Warrior's Apex Stone.
After making it through the sealed door, I found the Warrior's Apex Stone. I should be able to use the blessings of the Lord, the Lady, and the Steed to restore the Apex Stone.
The Herald begged me to aid Craglorn against these threats. He has prepared a horse and carriage to take me there. I should board the cart when I'm ready to travel to Craglorn.
I learned that the Star-Gazers could be found in the observatory which overlooks Belkarth. Maybe I can find Hara there.
I found Hara in the Star-Gazer's headquarters in Belkarth. She may be able to tell me more about events in Craglorn, as well as the Star-Gazers.
Hara asked me to join the Star-Gazers and aid her in unraveling the problems facing Craglorn. I must agree to help her before we can proceed.
I agreed to join the Order of Star-Gazers and aid Craglorn. I must now undergo their initiation ritual.
I have been accepted as a Star-Gazer. I must complete my initiation by speaking to Hara.

Erold told me about an amulet of the ancient Nedic high priests that allows the bearer to access the chamber where the Apex Stone rests. I need to travel to the Dwemer ruin of Mtharnaz to find this amulet.
The Thief suddenly appeared before me after Tarish-Zi was vanquished. I should speak with her.
I should meet Titus at Buried Sands. He claims there's something we'll need from there before we can proceed.
I met up with Titus at Buried Sands. He says there is an ancient burial chamber somewhere inside that we need to find.
I helped Titus Valerius find the burial chamber. I should see what he has to say about it.

In order to retrieve the other two royal seals, we need to find out where the other members of Tarish-Zi's royal guard were buried. To do so, Titus suggests we head for Rahni'Za, a monk's school which houses a grand library.
I reached Rahni'Za, the School of Warriors. The library should be around here somewhere.
I should look around and see if I can help Titus find the book that will tell us where the royal guards were laid to rest.

We discovered the locations of the tombs of the other two members of Tarish-Zi's royal guardâ€”Tahmin and Riza. While Titus prepares for our attack on the royal crypt, I must track down the remaining royal seals.
I have the royal seals we need to enter Tarish-Zi's royal crypt. I should head there and meet with Titus.
With the door open before us, all that remains is to enter the crypt and confront Tarish-Zi.
Tarish-Zi stands before us. Defeating him is the only way to diminish the threat of his army of Anka-Ra.
Titus Valerius offered to help me stop the Anka-Ra if I free him from his binds.
I retrieved the amulet Erold sent me after, and now a mysterious celestial figure resembling a thief has appeared. I should hear what she has to say.
Hermaeus Mora revealed secret information concerning the origins of the Anka-Ra, but he refuses to reveal more unless I bring him an offering. I should ask Ibrula what he means.
I defeated Shada. I should return to Sali'ma and tell him of my success.
I should enter Shada's Tear and find the leader of the researchers, Sali'ma.
The Thief suddenly appeared before me after Tarish-Zi was vanquished. I should speak with her.
I should speak with Erold at the Star-Gazer observatory.
I defeated Abelazar of the Scaled Court. I should return to the entrance of Rahni'Za to let Fada at-Glina know that things have been resolved.
I need to complete three trialsâ€”Arena, Air, and Martial Knowledgeâ€”before I can access the final trial and find the betrayer.
The three trials are complete. Now I need to find my way into the final trial through the library and defeat Abelazar the betrayer.
I found the seals to activate the beams and open the temple door. Now I should go to the center of the ruin and enter the temple.

The first trial of Rahni'Za involves gaining entrance to the school. If the flames of the braziers are not lit, I'll need to defeat gargoyles in order to light the flames and gain entrance to the school.
On entering Rahni'Za, I encountered the spirit of a former initiate. I should speak to him and see if he has any other information about the trials.
Abelazar the betrayer has been defeated. I should speak to Master Timen's spirit outside of the Trial of the True Path before I leave Rahni'Za.
I should talk to the leader of the researchers, Sali'ma, about the strange things that have been happening in the ruins.
Sali'ma believes that the waters are being corrupted by nereids in the crypt and city wings of Shada's Tear. I should explore those wings and find a way to stop the corruption.
Ibrula believes that the Daedric Prince of Knowledge, Hermaeus Mora, possesses secret knowledge about how to defeat the Celestials. I should approach his statue and speak to him.
When I underwent the Star-Gazers' ritual, I was transported to an otherworldly realm! A strange woman has appeared before me. Perhaps she can tell me what's going on.

The woman claimed to be the constellation of the Thief. She asked me to aid her and the Star-Gazers in resisting the Serpent, a powerful being known as a Celestial. Though I must return to Tamriel, I shouldn't reveal this encounter to others.

The Trial of Air has something to do with a hidden path across the tops of the school buildings. Zabeth mentioned that it was only visible when special sands are thrown on it. Maybe some of the thralls are carrying sand that I can use.
The temple door is sealed. I should look for a way to activate the beams that open the temple door.
I entered the temple. Ibrula wishes to speak to me. I should hear what she has to say.
I'm inside the temple. Now I should find Hermaeus Mora's shrine. Ibrula says it's located in the deepest part of the temple.
I freed Nahlia. Ralai has joined us. I should talk to her.
I need to find the mad researchers so I can save Nahlia.
I should read the scroll on the altar and use the prayer wheel to unlock the door deeper into the city wing.
I unlocked the door. I should follow Ralai deeper into the city wing to find Nahlia.
I should find Nahlia and free her.
I freed Nahlia. I should talk to her and see what she learned about the mad researchers.
I defeated Yamanu-ko. I should tell Minerva what happened.
I should enter the Elinhir sewers and find Minerva Lauzon.
I entered the sewers. Now I should find Minerva Lauzon.
I found Minerva Lauzon. Now I should talk to her.

Minerva told me that the Arch-Mage Yamanu-ko is responsible for the devastation in Elinhir. She is in the Apex Tower, which is being warded by her apprentices in the surrounding towers. I should go to the towers and destroy the wards.
I need to destroy the wards protecting the Apex Tower.
Sara cast a barrier spell on the core to stabilize it. I should take her portal out of the staff and meet her outside.
I destroyed the wards. I should meet Minerva at the base of the Apex Tower and talk to her.
I made it to the base of the Apex Tower. I should wait while Minerva dispels the ward.
The ward has been taken care of. Now I should enter the Apex Tower and locate Yamanu-ko.
I should defeat Yamanu-ko and end the threat to Elinhir.
I found a strange gem in the Dwarven ruin of Mtharnaz. I should bring it to Hermaeus Mora at the Seeker's Archive.
I found a Dwemer lexicon in the ruins of Rkhardahrk. I should take it to Hermaeus Mora in the Seeker's Archive.
I found a stone with unusual letters carved into it in Zalgaz's Den. I should bring the rubbing of the letters to Hermaeus Mora in the Seeker's Archive.
I need to return to the Star-Gazer Observatory and speak with Hara once more to see what we need to do next.

The Thief spoke of Kelmen Locke, a sorcerer who may know something about the atronachs. He was captured by dangerous mercenaries who plan to turn him over to the Serpent. They are holding him in Haddock's Market.
I found Kelmen Locke being held by Greycloak mercenaries at Haddock's Market. I should talk to him about taking control of the atronachs.
Kelmen Locke has given me a gem that will allow me to bind three of the monarch atronachs. He believes they will be able to tell us how the Celestial Serpent gained control of the atronachs.
The monarchs confirmed that there is a fourth atronach, created by the Serpent. I should talk to Kelmen Locke about this news.
The Serpent has created an atronach that draws on the powers of the other three. I should find and defeat the monarch air atronach, created by the Serpent.
I defeated the Serpent's monarch air atronach. I should speak to Kelmen Locke.
I defeated and bound the monarch atronachs. I should meet Kelmen Locke at the summoning site.
I should use the foci at the ritual site to consult with the monarch atronachs about the Serpent's plans.
Sara needs the staff's magicka to power a spell to gain access to its core. We should gather three types of infusions from staff shards scattered in the Spellscar.
We have given Sara the three infusions she needs. She can now open the staff.
Sara opened a portal to the core of the staff. I should follow her inside and help her stabilize it.
I entered the core of the staff with Sara, and am now in a magical vortex populated by floating staff shards. We should make our way to the core on the far side of the vortex.

Sara needs to disconnect the crystals from the core so she can cast a barrier spell to contain its growth. However, I need to protect her from the core's magical feedback as she disconnects the crystals.

Before he left, Nhalan gave me a book that he believes contains a way to reverse the effects of the water in its early stages. I should go back to the researchers' camp and see if anyone can use it to help the afflicted researchers.

Titus Valerius was familiar with the name Reinhold's Retreat, and even told me that the ruin lies beneath the city of Belkarth. I need to meet Titus and Kelmen at the lake just south of Belkarth to see if we can work out a way to get inside.
I met up with Titus and Kelmen at the lake. I should see what Kelmen has to say about figuring out a way inside this ruin.
Kelmen senses some sort of residual energy emanating from specific parts of the ruins. He suggested I look around and see if I can work out a way to manipulate the stones to reveal a passage inside.
We managed to work out the riddle of the guidestones and unlock the pathway into Reinhold's Retreat just below the surface of the lake. I should head inside and see what Hara wanted us to find here.

We entered Reinhold's Retreat, the mysterious ruin Hara mentioned before she disappeared. I don't know exactly what Hara wanted me to find here, but I should search for anything that might provide a clue.

The Scaled Court infiltrated Reinhold's Retreat before we arrived and are present in great number. I discovered one of their leaders deep within the ruin. I should put a stop to whatever it is she plans to do.

I located the Thief's Apex Stone. It's under attack by the magic of the Serpent's Corruption. Not only that, but Hara appears to be captive, along with the stone. I need to stop whatever is happening here and save Hara before it's too late.

Madleena mentioned the Thief's Apex Stone when she attacked us. Kelmen believes it's possible the stone has been hidden here all this time, which suggests the Scaled Court are here to corrupt it. I should find the stone and stop them.
After successfully thwarting the Serpent's attempts to take the Apex Stone, I discovered that Hara was the Celestial Thief all along. I should speak with her to see what she has to say.

Nhalan told me that he opposed the bargain the Nedes made with Shada and was punished for it. His spirit can't rest until Zal'ik, the general who made the deal with Shada, is slain. I should try to find Zal'ik.
I saw a vision of Zal'ik creating a barrier in the crypt to keep the Yokudan invaders out. The barrier is defended by a flesh atronach. I should defeat the flesh atronach.
I defeated the flesh atronach that protected Zal'ik's barrier. I should speak to Nhalan before proceeding deeper into the Burial Grounds.
Nhalan told me to find Zal'ik and defeat him in order to release Nhalan from his imprisonment.
I found Zal'ik within the crypt. I should find a way to awaken Zal'ik and defeat him.
I defeated Zal'ik. I should speak to Nhalan and determine if there is anything else I need to do.
I should talk to Nhalan to learn more about him and the curse.
I defeated the nereids that were corrupting the waters in the city and crypt wings of Shada's Tear. I should return to the research camp.
I should talk to Sali'ma about ending the corruption in Shada's Tear.
Sali'ma believes that the leader of the nereids, Shada, is the ultimate source of the corruption. He believes she is in the third wing of the city. I should go there and find Shada.
I should listen as Kelmen Locke talks to the summoned monarchs.
Sali'ma believes that the leader of the nereids, Shada, is the ultimate source of the corruption. He believes she is in the third wing of the city. I should go there and find Shada.
I found Shada. I should defeat her and end the corruption of Shada's Tear for good.

An unseen force seems to have attacked and abducted Hara, who cryptically mentioned something called Reinhold's Retreat before she vanished. I should speak to Titus and see if he knows anything about it.
I should talk to Sara Benele to learn more about the Mage's Staff.
With the braziers lit, I must now defeat the guardian outside in order to enter the school.
I completed the Trial of Fire. I should now be able to enter the school of Rahni'Za.
I reunited the aspects of the Mage with the Lost One. It's now up to them to resist the Serpent's corruption. I should tell Star-Gazer Trilion what happened.
The Mage's aspect gave me a relic called the Seeker's Sight, but the gems that power it have been scattered across Craglorn. I need to gather these gems to power the relic.
I should talk to Ahlora about the Seeker's Sight.
Now that the Seeker's Sight is whole, I need to find magical anomaly points in Craglorn and defeat the guardians to charge the gems.
I recovered the gems that power the Seeker's Sight. I should meet with the aspects of the Mage at the winery near Belkarth to determine what I need to do next.
Now that I've charged the Seeker's Sight, I should meet the Mage's aspects at the Star-Gazers' Observatory.
I entered the Star-Gazers' Observatory and spotted Hara with the aspects of the Mage. I should talk to her and let her know what I've done.
I should place the Seeker's Sight in the star map and observe what happens.
Nazdura told me that Hara wants to speak to me in her quarters on the upper level of the Star-Gazer's Observatory. I should make my way there.
The Seeker's Sight has shown us where we can find other aspects of the Celestial Mage. I should talk to Ahlora about our next steps.
I need to locate the other aspects of the Celestial Mage.
Now that I've gathered other aspects of the Celestial Mage, I should meet Valla and Ahlora at the winery outside of Belkarth.
I arrived at the winery. I should talk to Valla.
Valla told me that the Lost One abides near the Mage's Apex Stone, beneath the city of Elinhir. I can reach the Mage's Apex Stone through the city's sewers.
The Seeker's Sight can help me locate the Mage's Apex Stone within these sewers. I should use it to find my way.
I arrived at the Mage's Apex Stone. Now I must defeat the Lost One so that the Mage can be made whole.
I should talk to the High Elf and see what she has to say.
Someone in Craglorn may have a better idea where I can find Hara and the Star-Gazers.
I should talk to the Thief to learn where to find Kelmen Locke.
I should enter the Crossroad Tavern in Belkarth and seek out these strange High Elves the Star-Gazer told me about.
I located the High Elves, but they're talking to another Star-Gazer. I should wait to speak to the High Elves after they finish talking.
The High Elves claim to be aspects of the Celestial Mage. They have offered to show me what happened to them. I should watch and learn.
I witnessed events as they transpired between the Serpent and the Celestial Mage. I should talk to Valla and find out what it all means.
To gather energy from the shards, we must kill all the monsters surrounding them.
I dealt with Safa's traitorous acolytes as she asked. Now they won't be able to lend their power to the Scaled Court. I should return to Dragonstar and inform Safa that the deed is done.
I agreed to track down and slay Safa's three traitorous acolytes and stop them from serving the Scaled Court. I should be able to find them at Scaled Court enclaves throughout the region.
The caravan master, Scattered-Leaves, believes his abducted guards were taken into the Valley of Scars. I should search for them there.
The leader of this band of Iron Orcs, a cruel taskmaster called Gulzog the Butcher, fed the captured caravan guards to his trolls. I need to make him pay for this outrage.
I defeated Gulzog the Butcher and gathered the personal belongings of some of the captured guards. I should return to Scattered-Leaves and let him know what happened to the guards.
I burned the Scaled Court standards and mounted Agganor's helmet on a pike. I should return to Lashburr and let him know that I avenged him.
I need to gather some personal effects from the remains of the guards so that Scattered-Leaves can give them to their families to remember them by.
I defeated Arnoth and set back the Scaled Court's plans in Skyreach Hold. I should go to Dragonstar and let Nendirume know what transpired in there.

I discovered that a Scaled Court exarch, Arnoth, is experimenting with nirncrux to make himself more powerful. What started as a test to assist the Scaled Court's leader, Regent Cassipia, is now just a power grab by Arnoth. I need to stop him.
Now that I collected the infusions, I should meet Sara.
I must now mount Agganor's helmet on a pike so that the old shaman can know vengeance.
Shaman Lashburr wants me to find the standards of the Scaled Court throughout the valley and burn them to ash.

The first component used in the alchemical process to create the mantikoras comes from the scorpion matron and her nests, deep in the cave called Fearfangs. I need to find the scorpion matron so we can kill her and destroy her nests.

Regent Cassipia is waiting at the progenitor mantikora's lair for my help. We must destroy the beast and the Scaled Court members guarding it so that no additional mantikoras can be created. If there are any prisoners there, I should also free them.
I should talk to Regent Cassipia near Dragonstar, now that we've crippled the Scaled Court's ability to make more mantikora.
I should meet Little Leaf in Ilthag's Undertower. The entrance is in the ruined tower atop the nearby hill.

I met up with Little Leaf in Ilthag's Undertower. She tried to convince someone named Ilthag Ironblood to stop training trolls for the Scaled Court's army, but he wouldn't listen to reason. Now she wants me to step in.
To further disrupt the Iron Orcs' ability to build a troll army, I need to find the Valley of Scars. I should head out and meet Little Leaf there.

Now that I've reached the Valley of Scars, I need to locate and kill Runescriber Kulth and Armorer Uthik. The runescriber works on the west side of the valley, while the armorer's forge is located on the east side.
Now that I'm inside the Exarch's Stronghold, I need to locate Braadoth's throne room. Little Leaf says it's deep inside the complex.
Exarch Braadoth is dead and the process the Iron Orcs were using to empower the trolls has been disabled. I should meet Little Leaf outside and make sure she's all right.
I need to enter Skyreach Hold and find out what the Scaled Court is up to in there.
I entered the wamasu den and slayed the wamasu eggbearer. I should find Regent Cassipia near the town of Dragonstar and let her know that I accomplished the task she sent me to do.
Now that I'm inside the ruins of Skyreach Hold, I should explore and learn more about what the Scaled Court is doing here.
I put an end to Exarch Arnoth's schemes. I should exit these ruins and head for Dragonstar.
Now that I've burned the Scaled Court standards, Lashburr wants me to find the vile shaman Agganor, kill him, and take his helmet.

To further disrupt the mantikora creation process, Regent Cassipia has directed me to find a nearby wamasu cave. Inside the cave, I'll find a wamasu eggbearer and its nest. I need to destroy the creature and its eggs.
I agreed to enter Skyreach Catacombs to try to discover the source of the dark force that has disturbed the dead.
I entered Skyreach Catacombs. Crusader Dalamar believes the source of the darkness that disturbs the dead's rest can be found in the Lower Catacombs. I need to find my way there.

I defeated the Gravelord and the Fallen Kings. That seems to have unlocked the door leading to the Lower Catacombs. Now I can descend into the depths and find the source of the darkness that haunts these ruins.
If the source of the darkness permeating these catacombs truly is the legendary necromancer Virmaril, I need to run a gauntlet of undead to reach him.
To reach Virmaril the Betrayer, I need to defeat these spirits to disrupt the soul ward that seals the door.
I reached Virmaril the Betrayer. He keeps talking about taking my soul. I have to confront him and defeat him.
Virmaril the Betrayer has been destroyed. Now I should find my way out of Skyreach Catacombs.
I should tell Crusader Dalamar what happened within Skyreach Catacombs.
Little Leaf and I have entered Exarch Braadoth's throne room. Now we have to put an end to the Iron Orc chief and to his troll guardian, Kurzoth.
Ilthag Ironblood won't be training any more trolls. I should talk to Little Leaf now and see what else we have to do to stop the Iron Orcs from building an army of super-powered trolls.
I agreed to take Kelmen's place in the ritual. I should meet Titus and the Thief at the Howling Sepulchers.
I've entered the Howling Sepulchers. Now I need to find and enter the Sanctum of Farsight so we can help the Thief with her ritual.
Titus and the Thief have begun the ritual. The Thief wants me to light the fires atop the pedestals in order to complete the ritual.
The Thief's ritual is complete. Now I should observe the vision shown to us through the use of the farsight ritual.
I need to meet the Thief at Loth'Na Caverns. Then we can find Regent Cassipia and stop her from becoming the Exalted Viper.
I entered the Loth'Na Caverns and caught up with the Thief. She plans to sneak ahead and meet me at the top of the rise. I should follow after her.
A bridge of Aetherial energy now spans the chasm. I should cross over the bridge and enter Skyreach Temple.
Now that I'm inside Skyreach Temple, I need to find Regent Cassipia and stop her before she transforms into the Exalted Viper.
Now that the Exalted Viper has been defeated and we're back in Belkarth, I should talk to the Thief.

The ritual worked. It showed us Regent Cassipia, the apparent source of the magical disturbance. She killed Kelmen when he tried to stop her. I should talk to the Thief and see what she has to say about all this.
I emerged from the ruins of Skyreach Pinnacle. I should speak to Mederic Vyger and make sure the prison wards have truly been restored.

I agreed to help the former Scaled Court scholar, Mederic Vyger. I need to enter Skyreach Pinnacle and clear a safe path before Mederic can come inside and cast the spell to reestablish the prison wards.
Now that I'm inside Skyreach Pinnacle, I need to clear a safe path for Mederic Vyger.
Mederic Vyger has begun to cast his spell to reseal the imprisoning wards. I need to protect him from the creatures emerging from the summoning circles until the wards are restored.
We accomplished what Mederic set out to do and restored the wards that seal the summoning circles. Now I should find Mederic outside and discuss what transpired in here.
The summoning circles have been resealed, but the creature Mederic calls "the fell beast" remains free. I need to defeat it so that Mederic can seal the final ward.
I have been sent to find Regent Cassipia's seneschal, Little Leaf. I should talk to her and offer my assistance.
I found Little Leaf's friend, Regent Cassipia, in Dragonstar. I should talk to her and find out what this is all about.
The threat of the Exalted Viper has been defeated. The Thief has opened a portal back to the Star-Gazer's observatory. I should use it and meet her there.
I defeated Skarath and found the Warrior's sacred weapon. I should deliver it to Titus so that his connection to the Warrior will be restored and he can make the journey home.
I need to travel to Belkarth and find Titus near the Star-Gazer's observatory.
I need to find Titus Valerius. The Warrior thinks he went north, in search of his wife's grave. That's where I should start my search for the time-lost warrior.
I found Titus. He seems distraught. I should speak with him.
The Warrior has appeared to me again. I should speak to him.

The Warrior has instructed me to track down War-Sworn, a sacred blade meant to be carried by the Warrior's chosen champion. An Iron Orc called Skarath currently possesses it. I should search the ruins to the southwest and recover the blade.
I need to travel to six prayer markers located within Craglorn's most dangerous caves and tombs to learn the six virtues.
I completed Ranev's pilgrimage. I should return to the Gray Menhir to determine if I have found favor with the Stars.
I need to travel to the Gray Menhir, located to the southwest of Dragonstar, and prepare for my pilgrimage.

With the armorer and runescriber dealt with, Little Leaf wants to confront the chief of the Iron Orcs, Exarch Braadoth. She says that his abode is deep within the cave system known as the Exarch's Stronghold, in the northern reaches of the valley.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I need to recover relics stolen by the Atanaz tribe. There's a creature the tribe reveres. I should defeat it to stop the Atanaz's raids.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should destroy the toughest creature I find. I also need to retrieve a hidden package. I should determine the correct cacheâ€”the others are trapped decoys.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I have agreed to descend into the Cradle of Shadows. To be truly Undaunted I must destroy <<1>>, <<2>>, and <<3>>.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I have purged the Silken Ring from the Cradle of Shadows, I should find <<1>> in my alliance's capital city.
I should destroy the toughest creature I find. I also need to retrieve a hidden package. I should determine the correct cacheâ€”the others are trapped decoys.
I should destroy the toughest creature I find. I also need to retrieve a hidden package. I should determine the correct cacheâ€”the others are trapped decoys.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should destroy a Dark Anchor in Stormhaven.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed a Dark Anchor.
I should destroy a Dark Anchor in Rivenspire.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed a Dark Anchor.
I should destroy a Dark Anchor in Alik'r Desert.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed a Dark Anchor.
I should destroy a Dark Anchor in Bangkorai.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.
I should destroy any Dark Anchors I find while I'm there.

I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.
I should destroy any Dark Anchors I find while I'm there.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.
I should destroy a Dark Anchor in Reaper's March.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed a Dark Anchor.
I need to defeat whoever summoned the Daedra in <<1>>. I should also gather <<z:2>> from the Daedra themselves or the people who summoned them.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I should go talk to Eoki's love, Sun-in-Shadow. I'll likely find her working in Tel Naga.

Sun-in-Shadow believes that Magister Therana's Mouth, Eraven Onthim, possesses a letter that could reveal what Therana is looking for in Zaintiraris. I should search his chambers in the Council House for the letter.
I found out what Magister Therana seeks in the Daedric shrine, Zaintiraris. I should return to Sun-in-Shadow to plan our next move.
I need to make my way to the Daedric shrine, Zaintiraris.
A complex puzzle-ward blocks the entrance to Zaintiraris. I should search the grounds to find some way to unlock the door.
I found a key that will unlock the central chamber in Zaintiraris shrine. The finger bone of Saint Felms should be found in that area.
I retrieved Saint Felms's finger bone from Zaintiraris. I should take it to Magister Therana at Tel Branora.
I need to convince Magister Therana to support Sun-in-Shadow's appeal for emancipation.

Magister Therana provided a document that supports Sun-in-Shadow's bid for emancipation, and encourages the Council to bestow upon her the rank of House Hireling. I must take it to Therana's Mouth, Eraven Onthim.
Eraven will have Sun-in-Shadow called before the council. I can go up to the Council Hall to witness her change in status.
A council emissary called Sun-in-Shadow to the council audience chamber. I should speak to her before she faces the Telvanni Council.
The Telvanni Council is preparing to free Sun-in-Shadow. I should speak to her before the council makes their pronouncement.

I defeated the progenitor mantikora, freed the prisoners, and crippled the Scaled Court's ability to make any more of these hybrid monsters. I should follow Regent Cassipia and make sure we're done here.
In order to lift a deadly curse, I need to return the cursed relics to their altars. I should also defeat the Daedra behind the curse.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I need to light the pyres to anger the draugr. I should defeat the toughest draugr I can find while the pyres are lit.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
Canon Llevule remained behind at the Andrano Ancestral Tomb after the attack. The priest asked me to go to the tomb and help Llevule complete their mission for Lord Vivec.
I located the Andrano Ancestral Tomb and found Canon Llevule. I should talk to him and determine how I can help him complete his mission for Lord Vivec.
We're inside the Andrano Ancestral Tomb. Now I need to escort Canon Llevule to the summoning chamber so that he can call forth his ancestor and we can ask Lord Vivec's questions.
I should wait while Canon Llevule summons the spirit of his ancestor.
Now that we got the answers to Lord Vivec's questions, Canon Llevule wants me to meet him outside the tomb to discuss what we learned.
Canon Llevule asked me to meet him at Vivec's Palace in Vivec City. I suppose I shouldn't keep the priest or Lord Vivec waiting.
Lord Vivec has asked to speak with me. I should talk to him now.
Lord Vivec didn't learn what he had hoped from the divination ritual. I should talk to him and see what he needs me to do next.
I should read the letter I received just before I boarded the ship.
Another passenger aboard the ship decided to strike up a conversation. It's only polite to listen to what he has to say.
The ship ran into some rocks as we approached land and I lost consciousness. Now I'm awake and in some kind of cell with my hands bound. There's a Dark Elf here and she wants to talk to me.
Naryu explained I was captured by slavers. She hinted at an escape plan but wants to test my combat skills first.
Now that I showed her that I can fight, Naryu wants to tell me her escape plan. I should talk to her again.
Naryu gave me two tasks. She wants me to obtain slaver gear for protection and the key to the gate that leads to the docks. I should look around and try to find these items.
I acquired some gear from the slavers. I should equip the gear in case I run into any trouble.
I found the gate key. Now I need to acquire a set of slaver clothes.
I acquired gear from the slavers. Now I need to find the key that opens the gate to the docks.
I collected the items that Naryu wanted. Now I should return to the slave barracks and see if we're ready to make our escape.
The slavers saw Naryu's signal and are on their way. I gave Eoki the gate key and he took the other prisoners to the docks. Now Naryu is waiting for me on the overlook. I should go talk to her.
I combined the fire salts and kindlepitch to create a fire bomb. Now I should meet Naryu and get aboard the slaver ship.
The Seyda Neen guard thinks I might be a slaver. I should talk to Governor Salvi and explain what happened.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
A massive spider has descended from the shadows to block my progress. I must kill this <<1>>.
I discovered a second switch. It might help me gain access to the rest of the Cradle's ruins.
<<1>> presented me with another challenge: deface the Altar of Adoration and slay the Lady of Lace.
I need to pick <<z:1>>. I should find them within the ruins.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
I should eat <<z:1>> just before I enter battle with the bandit leader.
Zabeth claimed that there is a book for each trial which were required to complete the Trial of Martial Knowledge. I should look for these books and collect them.
Zabeth mentioned that there is a place in the library for each of the books. I should go there now that I have found some books.
To complete the Snow Bear Plunge, I must leap into the freezing water from three places in Eastmarch. First, I should head to Cub's Tumble.
To complete the Snow Bear Plunge, I must leap from Cub's Tumble into the freezing water below.
To complete the Snow Bear Plunge, I must leap into the freezing water from three places in Eastmarch. Next, I should head to Horker's Drop.
To complete the Snow Bear Plunge, I must leap from Horker's Drop into the freezing water below.
To complete the Snow Bear Plunge, I must leap into the freezing water from three places in Eastmarch. Finally, I should head to Dead Man's Fall.
To complete the Snow Bear Plunge, I must leap from Dead Man's Fall into the freezing water below.
I should return to <<1>> and let her know I completed the Snow Bear Plunge.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
Now that I've found the sand Zabeth mentioned, I should begin the trial. The bag that the sand was in had an inscription that mentioned using it near some lions.
I need to use the Sands of True Sight to reveal the hidden paths, which are marked by lion statues. Zabeth mentioned that the path went over a school building, too.
I need to find and recover <<c:1>> from <<Ac:2>>.
I should return the relic to <<1>>.
I should speak with Nazdura in Belkarth. She should know what's going on.
I need to find and recover <<1>> from <<2>>.
I should return the relic to <<1>>.
I need to find and recover <<1>> from <<2>>.
I should return the relic to <<1>>.
I must explore the ruins to find Tsatva-Lan and his second-scale, Geel-Ma.
I need to find and recover <<Ac:1>> from <<Ac:2>>.
I should return the relic to <<1>>.
I need to find and recover <<1>> from <<2>>.
I should return the relic to <<1>>.

I need to find and recover <<1>> from <<c:2>>.
I should return the relic to <<1>>.
I need a key to gain access to the mine. The mine's foreman, Nox, carries one that I could pickpocket. Benar also keeps one under guard in the Rethan manor house.
I must search the mine for any evidence of wrongdoing.
According to a document I found, an alchemist named Gavros is conducting vile experiments in a Daedric shrine deep within the mine. I should explore this ruin.
I found Gavros. He appears to be in poor condition. I should talk to him.
I discovered the secret of Vassir-Didanat's success and acquired the Daedric formula that made it possible. I should report my findings to Malur Rethan.

I gave Malur a summary of the mine's condition, as well as the scroll containing the Daedric formula. While he reports these findings to a Hlaalu councilman, I must track down Benar and detain him until Hlaalu constables arrive.
Councilor Rayveth urged me to kill Malur to resolve the situation in the Vassir-Didanat mine. I must track the corrupt businessman to his residence in Balmora and end his vile scheme.
I decided to give the Daedric scroll to Rayveth. I should talk to him to receive my reward.
I should destroy any Dark Anchors I find while I'm there.
I should tell <<1>> I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.
I gained access to Zaintiraris shrine. I need to find a way into the shrine's central chamber. The relic is most likely there.
She said I should travel to <<1>> and speak with <<2>>.
I should speak with <<1>>, the Festival Chief of <<2>>.
I must retrieve the contents of three locked chests within a short amount of time. I will need lockpicks to open the chests.
I retrieved a unique coin from each of the locked chests. I should present them to <<1>>.
I should return to Eastmarch and speak with <<1>>.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should look for Stromgruf's witch. He thinks she's probably somewhere back the way he came. He suggested I might be able to follow the trail of bottles she threw at him as he fled.
I followed Stromgruf's trail and located his "witch," Nerise Venim. I should talk to her and get her side of the story.

Nerise Venim isn't a witch. She's an alchemist who knows a few spells. She hired Stromgruf to escort her safely to Vivec City when the pair were beset by Goblins. Nerise asked me to find the Goblins and recover her stolen pack and sword.
I located the Goblin camp. Now I should look around and see if I can find Nerise's stolen pack and sword.
I recovered Nerise Venim's stolen possessions from the Goblins. Now I should return to Stromgruf and find out if Nerise has released him from her spell of holding.
Apparently, Stromgruf was drunk and tired when he accused Nerise Venim of being a witch. Here she comes now. I should talk to her and return her pack and sword that I recovered from the Goblins.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I acquired a key. I should use it to gain access to the mine.
Llonas asked me to inquire about purchasing Tirwin from Faras and discover what it would take for her to part with her slave.
<<1>> demands <<2>>s for Tirwin. I should inform Llonas of what I learned.
I finished collecting shells for Llonas, but a High Elf appeared as I was leaving. She wants to talk.

I met Tirwin and she expressed her desire to escape from Faras and Llonas both. She's asked me to steal her Servitude Obligation from Faras for her. Alternatively, I already have the shells Llonas needs. Perhaps I should speak to him about all this.
I agreed to continue with Llonas's plan to obtain Tirwin's freedom. Now I only need to complete the slave deal with Faras.
I stole Tirwin's Servitude Obligation. She'll be happy to hear that. I just need to deliver it to her.
I completed the transaction for Tirwin with Faras. Llonas has arrived, with Tirwin in tow, to take the contract. I don't know what he's planning, but my part in this ends when I hand it over to him.
I gave Tirwin the <<1>>, but it looks like she wants to say something to me before she departs. I should speak to her.
Llonas loaned me a nix hound he's trained to sniff out <<1>>s. When the creature points to the location of a shell, all I have to do is dig.
To complete the Lava Foot Stomp, I should dance at the Watch House Inn, located in Davon's Watch.
To complete the Lava Foot Stomp, I should dance at the Fish Stink, located in Davon's Watch.
To complete the Lava Foot Stomp, I should dance at the Ebony Flask, located in Ebonheart.
To complete the Lava Foot Stomp, I should dance at the Hlaalu House, located in Ebonheart.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
If I encounter other New Life celebrants participating in the Lava Foot Stomp, I should dance with them to impress the tavern crowds.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
To participate in Mud Ball Merriment, I should first head to <<1>> and throw mud balls at anyone who looks too stuffy to enjoy themselves.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
To participate in Mud Ball Merriment, I should throw mud balls at the Alliance ambassadors. They can be found in <<1>>.
I defeated Savarak and thwarted House Hlaalu's attempt to claim Vos and Tel Mora for themselves. I should return to Tel Mora and inform Llayne of our success.
I completed all of Mistress Dratha's tasks. I should talk to her to receive my reward.
I should travel to <<1>> and speak with <<2>> about the Signal Fire Sprint.
I should speak with <<1>> in <<2>> about the Signal Fire Sprint.
To complete the Signal Fire Sprint, I should light the warning fires around <<1>> before <<2>> finishes the count.
I should speak with <<1>> about the Signal Fire Sprint.
I should return to Eastmarch and speak with <<1>>.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
Llayne suspects that the truth about Savarak's sudden wealth and power may be hidden away in his manse. I must break into his house and search for any evidence of corruption.

Savarak admitted to mistreating the people of Vos. He noted that Mistress Dratha's Mouth, Llayne Sadri, is fomenting unrest from inside the tower, Tel Mora. I should talk to her to get her perspective.
Nerandas revealed that House Hlaalu conspired with Savarak to poison Mistress Dratha. Apparently, the source of her illness lies at the base of Tel Mora's fungal growth. Now I just need to find it.
I found the malignant growth at the base of Tel Mora. I must show it to Llayne so we can plan our next move.
Llayne urged me to show the malignant growth to a local herbalist named Menwendel. She might know how to heal the towering mushroom and reverse the toxin's effect.
Menwendel's nursery appears to have been ransacked. I should speak with Gray-Skies to see if he knows anything about the attack.
I found the coastal hideout where Nerandas and the Black Snails took Menwendel. I should look for the herbalist.
I found Menwendel. I should see what she has to say.
I found Nerandas. Now I should deal with him.
I killed Nerandas. Now to find a clue to the toxin's location.
I collected a sample of the Nerandas's fungal toxin. I should deliver it to Menwendel in Tel Mora. She'll need it to brew an antidote for Dratha.
I arrived in Tel Mora. I should talk to Menwendel.

According to Mistress Dratha, the Stones of Cold Fire are hidden away in seven Daedric shrines: Ashalmawia, Bal Ur, Esutanamus, Kushtashpi, Ramimilk, Yansirramus, and Tusenend. I must seek out these shrines and claim one stone from each.
I retrieved all seven Stones of Cold Fire. Now I must deliver them to Mistress Dratha in Tel Mora.
In order to use the Stones of Cold Fire, Mistress Dratha needs me to weaken a Dremora hidden away in the realm of Oblivion. I should go through the portal to find this Daedra.
I arrived in Oblivion. I must defeat the vile Dremora, Xykenaz.
I defeated Xykenaz. I should enter Mistress Dratha's portal and return to Nirn.
To complete the Castle Charm Challenge, I must entertain the people of <<1>>. I should perform in the Old Goat Inn.
To complete the Castle Charm Challenge, I must entertain the people of <<1>>. I should perform in the castle square.
To complete the Castle Charm Challenge, I must entertain the people of <<1>>. I should perform in the castle throne room.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.

I should return to Eastmarch and speak with <<1>>.

I should return to Eastmarch and speak with <<1>>.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.

I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
I need to collect <<m:1>>. I should also extract Archmage Camaano's liver from his corpse.
I should return to <<1>> at the Undaunted Enclave and tell him I've completed his challenge.
I should tell <<1>> I've completed his challenge.
If I wanted to help more, I could also donate gold to the <<1>> in Grahtwood.
To assist the Fish Boon Feast, I should fish for <<1>>, <<2>>, and <<3>> at a New Life Fishing Hole in Shadowfen. I could also trade for fish with friends, or buy them from guild traders.
I should speak with <<1>> in <<2>>.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
I should return to Eastmarch and speak with <<1>>.
To celebrate the Stonetooth Bash, I should travel to Stonetooth Fortress and speak with <<1>>.
To celebrate the Stonetooth Bash, I should speak with <<1>> at Stonetooth Fortress.
To celebrate the Stonetooth Bash, I must collect food for <<1>>. I should seek out creatures such as wolves and rabbits for <<2>> and wasps for <<3>>.
To celebrate the Stonetooth Bash, I should deliver the food I collected to <<1>> in Stonetooth Fortress.
To celebrate the Stonetooth Bash, I should feast with <<1>>'s clan! I should sample everything.
To celebrate the Stonetooth Bash, I should belch as loud as I can.
I should return to Eastmarch and speak with <<1>>.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
I should enter the nearby cavern to search for Khartag and the missing slaves.
I entered the cavern at Khartag Point. I must try to find the three slaves Nakhul mentioned, then find Khartag.
Khartag succumbed to his wounds and perished in the cavern. I should return to Nakhul and deliver Khartag's final words.
If I encounter other New Life celebrants at the Stonetooth Bash, I should show my appreciation by belching at them.
I should speak with <<1>> about celebrating the New Life Festival.
Eoki might know more about which farmers are willing to sell. I could also make inquiries on my own.
Apparently, a farmer named Barys Rendo may be willing to sell his plot. I should talk to him.

The farmer, Barys Rendo, agreed to sell me his land, but not before I find his son, Seythen. According to Barys, Seythen probably lost his way inside the Daedric ruin, Esutanamus. I should go to the ruin to look for him.
I found Esutanamus. I must find Seythen and urge him to return to the Rendo family farm.
Barys was out looking for his son and met up with him. I should talk to him and settle the purchase the Rendo farm plot.
I must find a way to retrieve the land deed from Jinrisa. According to Sun-in-Shadow, Jinrisa probably hid the document in the Tel Naga Adept's Hall.
It seems that a wizard named Jinrisa engineered the plot to steal the deed from me. I should tell Sun-in-Shadow that Jinrisa acquired the Rendo's farm.
Someone named Mertis purchased the deed to Barys Rendo's property before I returned from Esutanamus. I should track this imposter down.
I retrieved the deed. I should give it to Sun-in-Shadow.
Sun-in-Shadow urged me to deliver the deed to Magister Firuth on her behalf. Hopefully he'll furnish me with a writ of endorsement, encouraging the council to elevate Sun-in-Shadow to Retainer.
Sun-in-Shadow wants me to offer the deed to the property near Vos to Master Firuth. In exchange, she wants him to sponsor her to the rank of House Telvanni Retainer.
Master Firuth agreed to Sun-in-Shadow's terms and gave me a writ of endorsement in exchange for the land deed. I should take the writ to Sun-in-Shadow.
I should deliver Firuth's writ of endorsement to Sun-in-Shadow.
I should find Sun-in-Shadow's new home and talk to her about her plans to rise further in the ranks of House Telvanni.

In order to heal the Tel Mora mushroom and Mistress Dratha, Menwendel will need a sample of the Hlaalu conspirators' toxin. She also urged me to deal with Nerendas. Killing him should scatter his forces, but I'll have to find him first.
I killed the vile Overseer Torvayn. Now, I must gather testimony from the prisoners.
The Scarlet Judge disappeared through a secret passage in Ules Manor. I should see where this passage leads.
The Scarlet Judge fears that Marshal Hlaren's Iron Hounds will wreak havoc on Suran if we move too quickly. I must raid the mercenaries' camp to sew discord and confusion in the ranks.
I dealt a heavy blow to Marshal Hlaren's Iron Hounds. I should seek out the Scarlet Judge in Suran to plan our next move.
A Nord constable approached me on the streets of Suran. I should see what she has to say.
Marshal Hlaren's henchmen have captured and imprisoned the Scarlet Judge. I must find a way to gain access to the prison.
I acquired a key to the Suran jailhouse. I must infiltrate this prison and find the Scarlet Judge.
Now that I'm inside the prison, I should find the Scarlet Judge.

I agreed to take on the mantle of the Scarlet Judge. Unfortunately, the Judge's regalia has been confiscated by the prison's overseer, Warden Libo. I must travel to the Warden's hunting camp to steal it back.
I arrived at Warden Libo's hunting camp. Now I must find the Judge's regalia.
I became the Scarlet Judge. Now I should return to Suran and find Constable Gretga to plot our next move.
I found the evidence Marshal Hlaren confiscated from the Scarlet Judge. Now I must find the marshal herself.
I found Marshal Hlaren and her co-conspirators. It's unlikely that the marshal will come quietly. I should be prepared to end her dirty dealings with lethal force.
Marshal Hlaren must have hidden the evidence she confiscated in the mine. I should search any areas used for storage as I explore the mine.
All the incriminating evidence is accounted for. I should give it to Constable Gretga.
Marshal Hlaren is dead and her co-conspirators are in chains. I should find the former Scarlet Judge, Melar Sadus, and inform him of our success.
I killed Farwen and banished Galgalah, who was occupying her body. Theyo half-expected this outcome, but he's glad Farwen's sacrifice wasn't in vain. I should speak to him again before we part ways.
I should travel to Missir-Dadalit Egg Mine in order to kill excess kwama and defeat the kwama warrior guarding the queen.
I can talk to <<1>> for more information
I should travel to <<1>> in Vivec City to collect my reward.

Tilenra asked me to talk to Menaldinion. Perhaps I can convince him to apologize to Tilenra and stop posting slanderous bills around town.
Tilenra plans to exact her revenge on Menaldinion by using a mysterious potion. She asked me to gather up a vital ingredientâ€”a lichen that grows at the base of the emperor parasol mushrooms.
Tilenra's potion worked perfectly. Menaldinion fled from the cats, sneezing all the while. I should talk to Tilenra about what to do next.
Menaldinion agreed to apologize. I should tell Tilenra that a public apology is forthcoming.
I should return to <<1>> in my Alliance capital and tell her I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.
I should return to <<1>> in my Alliance capital and tell her I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.
I found the ghost hunters at the haunting site. I should speak to Theyo and see what he needs me to do.
I should travel to the caldera north of Balmora in order to collect mushroom samples and defeat the nix-ox.
I can talk to <<1>> for more information.
I should travel to <<1>> in Vivec City to collect my reward.
Maj al-Ragat is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I should return to <<1>> in my Alliance capital and tell her I've destroyed the Dark Anchors.

As expected, Menaldinion has no intention of apologizing for his rude behavior and libelous advertisements. I should talk to Tilenra to discuss her next move.
I gathered the lichen from an emperor parasol. I should meet with Tilenra near Menaldinion's clinic.

Farwen will be vulnerable while setting up her wards of protection against malicious spirits. I need to escort her to the locations she indicated would be best to set them up and prevent any hostile ghosts from interfering with her work.
Galgalah snatched Farwen away before the final ward was set. I completed the ritual in her stead, but the other ghost hunters need to know she is in danger.

Theyo says we need to capture a spirit in the service of Galgalah and interrogate it. I need to destroy the roaming spirits until I find one powerful enough that its essence remains intact. When I have that, I should bring it to Theyo.
We summoned the defeated spirit, but it refuses to talk to anyone but me. I'll have to question it.

Apparently, Tilenra's mysterious potion is a potent cat lure. Given that Menaldinion is violently allergic to cats, things should get interesting. I need only pour the mixture over the High Elf's plants and observe the results.
Maj al-Ragath is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Galgalah resides in an ancient fortress near a lava path under a stone bridge. I need to search the area to find him.
Galgalah has lured me here to take my body. I must destroy him.
I killed Farwen and banished Galgalah, who was occupying her body. I need to get back to Theyo and let him know what happened.
I should speak with him at Bangkorai Gate.
Lord Vivec asked me to talk to Archcanon Tarvus to receive instructions on what I need to do next. I should be able to find Tarvus in the Archcanon's office.

Lord Vivec requires a Blessing Stone to perform a ritual of divination. Archcanon Tarvus suggested I borrow one from the ziggurat still under construction in Vivec City. I need to head over there and talk to the Overseer.
The passage to the Blessing Stone chamber collapsed. I need to clear the passage and rescue the workers before I can retrieve the Blessing Stone.
Now that the passage is clear and the workers are free, I can retrieve the Blessing Stone for Lord Vivec's ritual.

Archcanon Tarvus wants me to participate in the divination ritual. He told me to stand in position as the third corner of the ritual triangle and place the Blessing Stone when I'm ready for him to begin the ritual.
I deactivated the Dwarven resonator and saved Gnisis' egg-hands. I should get back to Foreman Lathdar in Gnisis and catch him up on all that's happened.
The egg-mine's foreman, Lathdar, is keeping an eye on things near the mine entrance. I should speak to him.
I encountered a mysterious, masked warrior. I should speak with him.
A frantic Dark Elf requested my aid in saving his father from marauding bandits. I should hurry to this innocent's defense.
I should travel to the <<1>> in Craglorn and learn what happened to the mages.
The Celestial Thief appeared before me at the <<1>> in Craglorn. I should speak with her.
The egg-hands trapped within the mine are acting strangely and refusing to come out. I must enter the mine to determine what's causing their erratic behavior.
A string of groundquakes have opened a breach in the mine's wall. The sound appears to be coming from that direction. I should delve deeper to find the source.
I deactivated the Dwarven resonator and saved Gnisis' egg-hands. I should get back to Foreman Lathdar in Gnisis and catch him up on all that's happened.
I should look for her near Dragonstar.
Maj al-Ragath is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Maj al-Ragath is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Glirion the Redbeard is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.

Maj al-Ragath presented me with another challenge: invoke the Scroll of Glorious Battle and slay the Whisperer in her empowered state.
Glirion the Redbeard is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I retrieved the Blessing Stone. Now I should return to Vivec's Palace and present the stone to Archcanon Tarvus.
