The caves led to a Reachmen camp on the opposite side of the cliffs near Karthwatch. I need to find the captive civilians in the camp.
A captured woman called out for help when she saw us. I should speak with her to find out more.
Helsi told me the Reachmen took the townsfolk into the western tower and the Warleader has the key. I need to retrieve it in order to find the remaining captives.
I found the tower key. I should enter the tower and free the captive townsfolk.
I've freed the captives of Karthwatch, but Bjora is still missing. Helsi speculates that the Reachmen need her for a special purpose. I should see if I can find her.
I found Bjora alone at the base of an ancient briarheart tree. I should see if I can speak with her to find out what's going on.
Hafskjar caught up with me while I talked to Bjora. I should see what he has to say.
Hafskjar believes the witches are using foul mind magic to convince Bjora to serve them. Disrupting the rituals may allow us to save her in time.
Hafskjar believes killing the witches will free Bjora. I should go to the tree and check on Bjora.
Bjora has been freed of the Icereach witches' spell and returned to Fenrar's camp. I should meet the rest of the survivors there.
Rasir's cure worked on one of the afflicted. I must track him down to locate the remaining doses of the cure.
I freed Edjar's pack. Now I should find him and Lyris south of the work camp and let him know I upheld Fenn's part of their bargain.
Hafskjar fears the witches turned Bjora to their cause with foul mind magic. I need to kill the nearby witches to release their spell.
I found Tranya badly wounded. I should talk to her to find out what happened.
Skor chased Rasir through the Grotto. I need to get inside to follow them.
I need to locate Rasir and save him from Skor.
Rasir is alive. I should speak with him to assess his condition.
There are wounded refugees inside the Grotto. I should give them the cure so they have a chance to survive.
Edjar showed us how to get into Tzinghalis's tower, but the way ahead is blocked by a Dwarven door. I need to figure out how to open it before we can rescue Fennorian.
We unsealed the Dwarven door. Now to search for Fennorian.
We entered a netherroot garden full of Dwarven machines that spray a poison mist. I need to shut down those machines before we can cross the chamber and continue our search for Fenn.
The laboratory contained some of Exarch Tzinghalis's research, but then we heard Fenn's tortured scream. We need to find him.
We searched Tzinghalis's laboratory and netherroot garden. Now we need to keep going so we can find Fennorian.
We killed Exarch Tzinghalis. Now I need to find a way to release Fennorian from that terrible machine.
We found Fenn, but before we can help him, we need to kill Exarch Tzinghalis.

Fenn explained that Exarch Tzinghalis and Rada al-Saran would often go into Tzinghalis's sanctum to discuss strategy. We should search it for any information about the Gray Host and what they may be planning.
I need to bring the map and the communique back to the Blue Palace. Lyris and Fenn will meet me there.
Fenn is free, but the torture he endured seems to have taken a toll on him. I should talk to him and give him the flask I found in his Dusktown lodgings.
I convinced the guard to let me enter, so I should go inside before the auction ends.
The auction has already started. I should talk to the Broker about the lute.
I arrived too late. Someone already won the lute at auction. Luckily, the broker identified the winner as an obnoxious drunkard. I should look for this inebriated buyer.
I should tell Leiborn I have the Petraloop.
I obtained the Petraloop. I should return to Leiborn at the Bards College and inform him of my success.
I obtained Petraloop from the auction and Leiborn request I display it properly. I should place it on the podium where it belongs.
I reviewed the sonnet, Nel's Hidden Loves. I should talk with Leiborn to learn about the remaining missing instruments.
I should talk to Leiborn and collect my reward
I should find out more about the auction from Leiborn.
We stopped Essenia and rescued Adusa. All that's left is to meet with Gwendis back at our original meeting place to ensure everyone is all right.
I revealed Overseer Urlvar's deception to Elle. I should speak with Claudina about our success.
Talk to the buyer's servant to collect the Petraloop.
Phebe asked me to set up a few spirit traps in the area and gave me a list of specific locations that her mentor, Claudina, marked.
Go to Collector's tower and steal the instrument.
The lute already sold at auction. I need to figure out a way to acquire the instrument. I could negotiate with the buyer, or take it by less legal means.
The settlement's leader, Elle Bitterblade, seems to have lost her patience for Claudina and Phebe. Perhaps I can smooth things over by delivering news that the traps are complete.

I met the two ghost hunters, Claudina Ildene and Phebe Peronard. They seem to be intent on helping the miners rid this place of evil spirits. I've been asked to help set up spirit traps around Blackreach in order to capture them.
I should look around to see if I can find any sign of the caravan or what might have happened to it.
I found a ruined caravan and some suspicious items. I should meet up with Captain Hingrid at the overlook and report on what I found.
I should report my findings to Captain Hingrid and see how she wants to proceed with the investigation.
Ena keeps a number of camps across the overlook. I should search around and see if I can figure out where she's gone.
Captain Hingrid wants me to investigate the location Ena mentions in her letter. I should see if I can find any sign of Ena at her camp by the waterfall upriver.
Reachmen overrun the camp. I should see if Ena is in the camp.
Now that I set her free, I should talk to Ena White-Eye and find out what she knows.
I need to warn Captain Hingrid about the Reachmen's planned attack.
Ena returned to town, but something's wrong. I should talk to her and find out what.

I need to gather kindlepitch and fire salts from the garrison barn. With those ingredients, I can make explosives to seal the side entrance bolt holes before the Reachmen can use them to attack the garrison.
I stopped the Reachmen's plot to destroy the bridge at Dragon Bridge. Now I should check in with Captain Hingrid.
I should talk to Phebe about the traps.
Elle asked me to investigate the place where the missing town guard was last seen. Hopefully, there will be some kind of clue to his whereabouts within.
It seems the whistle might have attracted something after all. There's strange rattling coming from the second floor. I should investigate.
The mysterious rattling basket held only a cat and a note.  I should see if this letter has any information we can use.
I gathered the kindlepitch and fire salts. Now I can use them to make explosives and seal the side entrance bolt holes before the Reachmen can use them to attack the garrison.
I closed both bolt holes to prevent the Reachmen from attacking the garrison. Now I need to find the main entrance to the smuggler caves behind the waterfall.
I need to defuse the Reach explosives before Vund can collapse the caverns. I should also try to rescue Ena's partner, Ulang, if I happen to see him.
I stopped the Reachmen's plot to destroy the bridge at Dragon Bridge. Now I should check in with Captain Hingrid.
We discovered a way into Greymoor Keep's undercroft. Gwendis and I should hurry inside before Lady Essenia discovers us.
We entered Greymoor Keep. Now we must begin our search for Gwendis's sister, Adusa-daro.
Gwendis and I discovered a vault filled with vampiric prisoners, but no sign of Adusa. I should speak with Gwendis about our next course of action.
Gwendis urged me to find a mechanism that will allow us to free the vampiric prisoners. I should try to find a way up to the balcony overlooking the pens.
I found the release mechanism. Pulling the lever should free the prisoners below.
I should talk to the prisoner, Arlof. Hopefully he has some useful information about Adusa's whereabouts.
Arlof informed us that Essenia took Adusa to a laboratory for further experiments. Apparently, it lies somewhere beyond the Blood Queen's arboretum.
We discovered a secret door hidden behind a bookshelf. We should move through this hidden passage to continue our search for Adusa.
Gwendis asked to speak with me. I should talk to her before we go any further.
Lady Essenia waits deeper inside the laboratories. I need to deal with her. Hopefully, she hasn't already inflicted a terrible fate upon Adusa.
The contents of the letter point to a possible location for the missing town guard, Captain Ageran. I should tell Claudina what I discovered, since Phebe was scared off.
Claudina and I need to investigate the location mentioned in the note.
I should try using the Spirit Warding Whistle that Phebe gave me to see if it gets the attention of whatever is in the cave.
Using the whistle elicited a strange noise from inside the cave. I should investigate further.
Investigating the location in the note led us to Captain Ageran's body and Overseer Urlvar. We need to find out what Overseer Urlvar knows.
Whatever killed Captain Ageran can't have gone far. I should see if I can track it down.
We examined the witch pikes set up around the perimeter of the temple. I should talk to Fennorian and discuss what we learned.
Whatever killed Captain Ageran definitely went down into the mines. We should follow it.
Claudina and I overheard Overseer Urlvar talking to a vampire. It appears the two of them are working together. I should talk to Claudina about what to do next.
I made it into Overseer Urlvar's office. I should look around to see if I can find anything incriminating.

The note I found proves that Overseer Urlvar is working with a vampire. It also seems to suggest that the vampire is the one responsible for the missing miners. I should talk to Claudina and tell her what I discovered.
I need to locate the vampire before he goes into hiding again.
wWe've spotted the vampire, but he's moving fast through the mines. We need to follow him without being seen.
The vampire keeps turning into a strange mist to evade us. I should talk to Claudina and see if she has any ideas about how to catch him.
I extinguished all the Reachmen's ritual pyres. I should inform <<1>> of my success.
I should enter Shadowgreen and extinguish the Reachmen's ritual pyres.
I need to find and extinguish the Reachmen's ritual pyres in the Shadowgreen before they can succeed in their plans.
I should find Gwendis and speak with her.
I told Alwyn that her ancestor shouldn't be held responsible for his lover's betrayal. I should speak to her about what she intends to do with his remains.
If I have anything else to discuss with Lyris, I should do it now before we go to see the queen.
Lyris wants me to meet her in Solitude so that we can present what we found at Kilkreath Temple to Queen Gerhyld.
I should head to the Blue Palace and meet up with Lyris before we present ourselves to Queen Gerhyld.
I found a medallion among the shattered glass beneath a broken window the assassin may have escaped through. I should show the medallion to Lyris and see what she makes of it.
Lyris wants to confront High King Svargrim and try to get him to listen to reason. I should follow her.
Lyris intimidated our way into High King Svargrim's chamber. Now we need to talk to him and convince him of the danger posed to his kingdom by the Icereach Coven.
High King Svargrim refuses to believe us. He thinks this might be a trick perpetrated by Jorunn the Skald-King. He demanded we leave and Lyris obliged. I should follow her.
Princess Svana approached us as we exited Svargrim's chamber. I should speak with her.
Old Mjolen's divination spell requires the following reagents: deathbell and wolf bones. I can find both in the bog around Morthal.

I reached the assassin's hideout just as he was about to finish off Fennorian. Luckily, the assassin decided to flee rather than deal with the both of us. I should check on Fenn and make sure he's all right.
Fenn asked me to search the assassin's hideout for clues he left behind. I should take a look around.
I found a map and a few documents left behind by the vampire assassin when he fled. I should discuss their contents with Fennorian.
I should follow the map and meet up with Lyris at the entrance to the mine.
Lyris, Fennorian, and I need to explore the old mine and see if we can find any sign of the vampire assassin.
We followed scaffolding down into the depths of the mine and found a massive cavern. I should talk to my companions about this place.
Fenn spotted the vampire assassin and a coven witch. He's going to follow them while Lyris and I destroy the witch pikes they set up in preparation for their harrowstorm ritual.

Lyris and I agreed to split up and investigate the mining town for signs of the vampire assassin while Fenn searches the cavern outside the town. I should speak to a few of the locals and find out what's going on down here.
Other than learning that Dusktown is part of the Bitterblade Mining Consortium, I didn't find out much. No one's seen the vampire assassin, though. I should see if Lyris discovered anything.
We need to meet up with Fenn on the far side of town and see what he's learned during his scouting.
Fennorian spotted the queen's assassin and a coven witch flee into a nearby Dwarven ruin called Kagnthamz. He asked me to meet him and Lyris there. I should head inside and wait for them to catch up.
Now that Lyris and Fenn have arrived, we should search the ruins for the vampire assassin and his coven witch ally.
Sister Tharda is performing some sort of ritual and she isn't alone. Fenn wants to observe the event for a moment before we act.
The witch's ritual caused a werewolf to emerge from a stone husk. The werewolf and the vampire departed, but left the witch to stop us. We need to kill Sister Tharda.
We killed Sister Tharda, but the werewolf and vampire got away. Lyris and Fenn ran off in pursuit. I should go after them.
I need to catch up with Lyris and Fenn and see if they spotted the vampire and the werewolf that were talking to Sister Tharda.

While Lyris and Fenn take another look at the Icereach witch's ritual site and those stone husks, I need to return to Solitude and let Princess Svana know that we killed the assassin who murdered her mother, the queen.
Svana wants to know more about the Icereach Coven and the threat they pose to her kingdom. I should tell her what I know.
Phebe's whistle worked. Claudina and I need to follow the vampire.
I recovered the Karthald Crown. I should present it to Magister Fridelja and tell her what happened to the jarl.
Phebe's spirit whistle might affect the vampire. I should use it and see if it helps us locate him.
The trapdoor led into the mines, which are off limits to us. Staying out of sight will make it easier to investigate.
I need to sneak into Overseer Urlvar's office to find evidence of him working with the vampire. To do that I, either need to steal his key or pick the lock on the door.
The vampire ran into a nearby cave. I should investigate and see if I can find any proof of Overseer Urlvar's plot within.
I found a list of targeted victims in the vampire's hideout. This should be enough proof for Elle. I should find her and present this evidence.
Elle won't believe us without proof. I should show her the evidence we collected.
We finally cornered the vampire assassin who killed the queen. Time to make him pay for his crime.
The queen's assassin is dead, but the Icereach witch Fenn saw is still at large. The assassin called her Sister Tharda. We should continue searching the ruin and try to find her.
I should talk to Alwyn now that we've recovered all of Jarl Hagridden's scattered remains.
I told Alwyn that her ancestor bears some responsibility for what happened to his soldiers, even if he didn't betray them himself. I should speak to her about what she intends to do with his remains.
Svana is reflecting on our battle with Svargrim on the battlements of Castle Dour. I should speak to her now that the threat has passed.
Svana asked me to check on Lyris and Fennorian. We left them in the courtyard of Castle Dour to hold out against a horde of harrowfiends while we faced Svargrim. Hopefully, they survived.
Lyris and Fennorian survived their battle with the harrowfiends. I should see how they fared.
Jorunn the Skald-King, High King of Eastern Skyrim, has arrived at the gates of Solitude. It's unclear what his intentions are. I should head to the gates and see what the commotion is about.
Lyris asked me to talk to Jorunn the Skald-King and try to peacefully solve this diplomatic situation.
I need to report Fennorian's progress on the elixir to Svana. She said she would be holding a gathering in the Blue Palace courtyard. I should meet her there.
I should speak to Svana so she can begin her ceremony.
Viggol's wife, Telline, asked me to find Viggol and keep him safe. I should hurry to catch up to him.
I found Viggol in the caverns with his dog. I should speak to him.
Viggol survived the creatures pursuing him. I should speak to him.
I joined Viggol's adventure. He plans to find a group of missing miners. His dog, Pickle, picked up a trail of some kind. We should follow him.
This looks like where the miners set up camp. I should look around for more clues as to what happened here.
I found a journal from one of the miners. It looks like the miners were being hunted by something, perhaps the creatures from the rumors? I should tell Viggol what I learned.
We should follow Pickle and see if he can pick up another trail that might lead us to the missing miners.
We've reached a collapsed bridge leading to an old Dwarven ruin, but there doesn't appear to be a way across.
Pickle is on Viggol's trail. I need to stay close.
Pickle found one of the wounded miners. I should speak with him about what happened to the others in his group.
Pickle picked up Viggol's trail again. I should follow.
I found Viggol. I should tell him what I learned.
Viggol wants to find us an escape route out of Lightless Hollow. My job is to locate the other miners and free them. We'll meet up when we're both finished.
I found the captured miners in a pen. I should free them.
Viggol has a way to get the locked door open. I need to be ready to pull the lever when he gives the signal.
We managed to escape, but more of the creatures attacked and Viggol stayed behind to hold them off. Right now, I should focus on getting out of the mine.
We escaped Lightless Hollow, but Viggol didn't make it out. I should talk to Telline and tell her what happened.
I need to tell Telline what happened to Viggol.
Viggol survived Lightless Hollow. I should talk to him and ask him how he managed to escape.
I found the entrance to the stronghold and ventured inside. There is no sign of the captain or the Silver Comorant's crew. They must be held deeper within the ruins.
I need to find Jarl Hagridden's bones and belongings.
Leiborn asked me to post handbills announcing the salskap. I should find good locations for them.
I posted the handbills Leiborn gave me. Now, I should return to the Bards College.
I posted the handbills for the salskap. I should inform Leiborn.
I might need a tool to help me navigate the cliffs and crevasses of the Unhallowed Grave. I should look around to see if I can find a grappling bow.
We found more dead priests and pilgrims near the entrance to Kilkreath Temple. I should talk to Fennorian and find out what he thinks happened here.
I advised Chief Urzikh to invoke the Blood Price and take Mazog's tusks as punishment.

Overseer Thulsgreg refuses to stop blocking the mine entrance. The chief threw his wife, Mazog, in a cage for not revealing the location of the mine key. I should talk to Overseer Thulsgreg and get his side of the story.
A Solitude soldier arrived. He demanded that I tell him what Brondold said to me. I should talk to him.
I should examine the papers Brondold gave me. Hopefully, they'll tell me what he was involved in.

I learned that Brondold was supposed to meet someone at the stables outside town, that he noticed suspiciously marked crates at the docks, and that he left cryptic directions to somewhere. I need to investigate further to learn what all this means.
I should head to Solitude so I can report on the Icereach Coven's activity to the city authorities.
Swordthane Uthlet offered to look the other way so that Svana and I could get a bottle of Arkay's sacred oil for Fennorian's elixir.
We reached the entrance of the Undergrove, deep in the Midnight Barrow. It's time to go inside and test Fenn's elixir.
I should enter Midnight Barrow with Alwyn to retrieve her ancestor's remains.
We need to find an appropriate spot within the Undergrove to test Fenn's elixir.
Overseer Thulsgreg believes the accident is a result of the chief's alchemical mining methods. He asked me to speak to Mazog in her cell to learn more, and possibly help them convince the chief.
I found Mazog's cell. I should see if I can convince her to reveal the mine key's location.
Mazog won't tell me where to find the key until I help the clan. I need to check her game traps and bring any meat I find to the workers.
Mazog hid the key at the top of the watchtower. I should retrieve it and bring it to Chief Urzikh.
I should bring the meat to the camp.
I did what Mazog asked. I should return to her to see if she'll reveal the key's location.
Svana hasn't been able to convince her father. I should talk to the high king and see if I can get him to listen to reason.
I acquired the mine key. I should bring it to Chief Urzikh and see if it helps to resolve the conflict between her and Thulsgreg.
A traveler from Karthwatch told me that monsters overran the town after a terrible storm. She mentioned a survivor name Fenrar set up camp outside town. I should ask if he needs help with the rescue.
Something terrible has happened inside the Blue Palace. I should talk to Lyris.
Lyris asked me to look around for clues about the assassin. How did they get in and out of the palace? Anything to connect them to the Icereach Coven? I should see what I can find.
The chief unlocked the mine. I should follow her and Thulsgreg inside.
There are miners trapped farther inside the mine. I should find them and help them to safety.
One of the trapped miners revealed the location of a cave-in that's blocking other survivors from escaping. I should see if I can locate this cave-in and help.
I found the cave-in location. Chief Urzikh and Thulsgreg are already here. I should talk to the chief and see what she plans to do.
The chief asked me to find ingredients to make her special stonemelt solution.
I need to use the stonemelt solution to dissolve the rubble blocking the passage.
The mine's foreman, Mugha, might have information about what really happened. I should see if I can find him.
With the rubble cleared, I can continue searching for survivors.
We explored deeper into Verglas Hollow. I should keep investigating.
I found Mugha. He's injured, but alive. I should speak to him and find out what he knows.
I need to craft the supplies specified by my contract.\n\nOnce I've crafted them, I need to deliver them to any writ turn-in site.
I've placed the requested supplies into the crate. All that remains is to sign the manifest.
I need to craft the furnishing specified by my contract.\n\nOnce I've crafted it, I need to deliver it to any writ turn-in site.
I've placed the requested furnishings into the crate. All that remains is to sign the manifest.
I need to craft the supplies specified by my contract.\n\nOnce I've crafted them, I need to deliver them to any writ turn-in site.
I've placed the requested supplies into the crate. All that remains is to sign the manifest.
I need to craft the supplies specified by my contract.\n\nOnce I've crafted it, I need to deliver it to any writ turn-in site.
I've placed the requested supplies into the crate. All that remains is to sign the manifest.
I need to craft the provisions specified by my contract.\n\nOnce I've crafted them, I need to deliver them to any writ turn-in site.
I've placed the requested provisions into the crate. All that remains is to sign the manifest.
I found the two remaining miners dead. One of them dropped some kind of instructions. I should investigate further.
I should exit Midnight Barrow and bring Alwyn her ancestor's remains.
I should wear the disguise Leiborn provided to avoid unwanted attention.
There don't seem to be any more survivors. Overseer Thulsgreg is nearby. I should speak with him.
Overseer Thulsgreg encouraged me to clear a path up ahead to a secondary exit so he and Mugha can leave safely.
I cleared the way for Mugha and the others. I should exit the mine and meet them outside.
We made it out of the mine. Overseer Thulsgreg wants to speak to me, most likely concerning Mazog.
I need to accompany Hamvir into Chillwind Depths so we can gather the ingredients required to make the elixir to heal his sister.
I need to help Hamvir find a chillwind mushroom, deep lichen, and an unfertilized chaurus egg.
Now that we gathered all the ingredients, I need to bring them to Hamvir's camp outside Chillwind Depths.
I should talk to Hamvir and give him the ingredients we gathered in Chillwind Depths.
I should find Priest Bavian in a nearby cave and see how I can help the priests and pilgrims of Kilkreath Temple.
Lady Ninetha insists on approaching Freiwen despite the danger. Old Mjolen plans on casting a ritual to break the curse. I should wait until she tells me when to use the locket.
Priest Bavian needs a moment to say a prayer for Acolyte Eivina. I should meet her outside of the Pilgrims' Lodge.
I need to tell Chief Urzikh what I learned in the mines.
I advised Chief Urzikh to free Mazog.
I should speak to Svana about the death of her father.
I need to go to the Temple of the Divines in Solitude and see what the situation is. According to the soldier, the Gray Host has taken the temple and sealed it off.
Swordthane Uthlet seems to have more information about the situation in the Temple of the Divines. I should talk to him.
The note directed me to talk to <<1>> in Solitude for more details.
I should ask <<1>> who I need to speak with to accept a job.
<<1>> suggested I could find snowberries in the necessary amounts along the Frozen Coast. I need to gather and add them to his tonic.
I drank the Tonic of Giant Strength, but the results were not as expected. I need to inform <<1>> that his formula still needs improvement.
I should enter Chillwind Depths and search for any tribal artifacts to be found there.
I found tribal artifacts in Chillwind Depths. I should deliver them to <<1>> in Solitude and claim my reward.
I need to search the barrow for jars that contain the preserved organs of ancient Nords.
I collected preserved organs from the barrow. I should return to <<1>> to claim my reward.
Steal the Petraloop.
I need to gain entry to the Sapphire Society auction. Wearing the disguise and saying the passphrase Leiborn provided should help me blend in.
I placed the traps in the areas specified. I should let Phebe know I'm finished.
Bribe the buyer for the Petraloop.
I should find Tranya, the leader of the werewolf group.
I found Tranya. I should talk to her.
I found a necklace that I believe belonged to Nelfthea. I should bring it back to Magreta to confirm if the dead woman I encountered was indeed her.
I should travel to the Frozen Coast to search for Nelfthea's whereabouts.
I found a necklace that I believe belonged to Nelfthea. I should bring it back to Magreta to confirm if the dead woman I encountered was indeed her.
I made it through the outer courtyard and into the inner courtyard. Now I need to find a way into the keep.
Fennorian wants to discuss what we just heard. I should talk to him.
Lyris and I encountered a Nord name Hrolt. Is he one of the people that was lured to the inn? I should talk to him while Lyris keeps watch.
I need to enter Nchuthnkarst and find Raynor Vanos.
I should check in on Raynor to learn more about what is happening here.
The way forward might be too dangerous for Raynor and Kireth to pass through safely. I need to clear a way through the passages ahead.
I should speak with the strange individual we found in the ruin.
I must find the components Thaddeus mentioned in order to repair the unstable Dwarven machine and hopefully bring back Kireth and Raynor.
I acquired the components. Now, I should return to Thaddeus and inform him of my progress.
I need to tell Thaddeus what I found.
Thaddeus needs my help to repair the machine.
Thaddeus wants me to activate the Dwarven machine to stop the unstable magic and return time to normal.
Thaddeus is gone. I should speak with Kireth.
Svana heard her father scream out in pain. We need to find him and see what's happening.
Svana and Fenn caught up to us. I should listen to what Svana has to say.
Fennorian opened the way. Now to ascend to the keep's upper levels.
Svana wants to speak with me. I should meet her at the Blue Palace.
Now that the I should meet Tranya and the other refugees.
I should check on Thaddeus and see if Kireth and Raynor have returned.

Princess Svana wants us to keep looking into the threat to Western Skyrim. To start, she wants us to figure out where the queen's assassin fled to after he left the palace. I should look for anyone who saw him.
Lyris met me at the city gate. I should tell her what I learned.
There's a wounded man inside the cave, but no sign of Rasir. I should talk to the man and ask him what happened here.
I should search Dragonhome for the talking doll's personal effects. Once I have them in hand, I can use them to break the spell.
I freed the woman trapped inside the doll. I should talk to her and make sure she's unharmed.
Now that I have all the doll's personal effects, I should locate the altar she mentioned and break the spell.
I should place the doll's belongings on the altar. Hopefully this ritual will free the soul trapped inside the doll.
Svana asked to meet with me. I should go to the Lonely Troll and speak to her.
I found a body buried in the snow that is probably Nelfthea's. I should take something back for Magreta to identify.
I combined the snowberries to <<1>>'s tonic. Now I need to drink it and observe the results.
I should talk to Neramo and give him the components I retrieved.
The captain doesn't seem to be at the Khajiit's camp. I should search the area for clues.
I should enter the Scraps with Neramo to begin our search for the Dwemeric items he requires.

According to Neramo, taking control of dormant Dwarven spiders should allow us to collect the power nodes he needs. We can find these spiders in scrap piles throughout the ruin. We must also find the master scepter.
I should meet Neramo outside of the Scraps and turn over the items I gathered for him.
I arrived at the Frozen Coast. I need to search for signs of Nelfthea's whereabouts.
I found signs that Nelfthea went to defend against an attack on the Frostbite Raiders. One of them told me he saw her struck down by a Giant where they landed, to the northeast.
Yrsild says her grandfather entered the ruins weeks ago and never returned. I should keep an eye out for him as we explore Labyrinthian.
Keldnyr is dead. A series of notes lie scattered beside his body. I should read them. They may provide some clues as to what is going on here.
I should speak with Yrsild about what I found in her grandfather's notes.
Keldnyr's notes suggest that lighting special warding braziers around Labyrinthian is integral to keeping the Dragon Priest Morokei sealed away in his tomb. We need to ensure they are lit.
With the three outer flames lit, Yrsild and I must now enter Labyrinthian's underground passages to find the final brazier.
We must find and ignite the final warding flame in Labyrinthian.
We lit all the warding flames, but the final one burns blue and cold. Something is clearly wrong. I should speak to Yrsild and see what she thinks.
Yrsild believes that the only way to settle things in Labyrinthian is to enter Morokei's tomb. Once inside, we may be able to seal the ancient Dragon Priest away for good.

We arrived in Morokei's tomb to find the ones responsible for tampering with the warding flames inside. Yrsild and I need to seal Morokei away to prevent him from escaping, and to keep this stranger from stealing the Dragon Priest's power.
We succeeded. Morokei is sealed away once more. I should finish my business with Yrsild.
I found Claudina and Phebe outside the office. I should tell them what I learned from Elle.

I met the Overseer of the Bitterblade Mining Consortium. He says his wife hired a pair of ghost hunters to investigate the area after a few miners went missing. Apparently, they're doing more harm than good, and could use a talking to.

Lyris suggested I talk to Fennorian about the vampire who killed the queen and see how his research on the harrowstorms has progressed. He should be with a clever woman in the marshes northwest of Morthal. I should find him there.
Fennorian told me that Old Mjolen is an expert at divination and suggested I show her the medallion I took from the assassin. I should speak with her.
I've destroyed the witch pikes on my side of town. I should find Fenn and ask if he has any new information on where the vampire assassin and coven witch may have gone.
I gathered the reagents that Old Mjolen requires. I should take them to her.
We successfully sealed Morokei away once more. I should speak to Yrsild outside Labyrinthian.
Rigurt asked me to meet him at Jarl Morryn's hunting lodge where the meeting will take place.
I met Rigurt at Jarl Morryn's hunting lodge, where the jarl waits outside. I should wait for them to finish speaking.
I need to help Rigurt settle a feud between Thane Hraldi and Thane Svyne and secure their presence at the talks so Rigurt and Jarl Morryn can discuss a treaty with them.
I should track down Thane Hraldi.
I found Thane Hraldi fishing by a steam. He doesn't seem interested in speaking with Rigurt. I might have better luck.
We need to find a special mushroom inside Chillwind Depths that will serve as bait for Old Hjaalsdottir.
As it turns out, Old Hjalsdottir is a horker. I should talk to Thane Hraldi about this outcome.
I should find Thane Svyne and see if he can be convinced to attend the meeting.
I found Thane Svyne. Rigurt wants me to try talking to him.
I need to help Rigurt prepare the meal for Thane Svyne. I should follow Rigurt's instructions for cooking the boar.
I should see if Thane Svyne will attend the meeting now.
Rigurt and I convinced the thanes to set aside their feud and meet to discuss a treaty with Eastmarch. I should go to Jarl Morryn's hunting lodge and let her know.
I need to tell Jarl Morryn that the thanes are planning on attending a meeting with her and Rigurt.
Rigurt and I managed to get two thanes from Western Skyrim to meet with Jarl Morryn about a treaty with Windhelm. I should see if Rigurt needs anything else from me.
I found a letter from Ena, asking someone named Ulang to meet her at a waterfall upriver. I should take this back to Captain Hingrid.
Havil sent me to find Old Mjolen, a clever woman who might know about the undead around Morthal. She lives north in the wilderness.
I found Old Mjolen's hut. I should speak to her.
I must kill Lord Falgravn and his invaders to take back the island of Kyne's Aegis.
I repelled the vampire and Giant invasion, and killed their leader, Lord Falgravn. I should settle my business with Thane Ogvar.
I repelled the vampire and Giant invasion, and killed their leader, Lord Falgravn. I should settle my business with Thane Ogvar.
I repelled the vampire and Giant invasion, and killed their leader, Lord Falgravn. I should settle my business with Thane Ogvar.
I must kill Lord Falgravn and his invaders to take back the island of Kyne's Aegis.
I must kill Lord Falgravn and his invaders to take back the island of Kyne's Aegis.
I recovered an Amulet of Bats from Lord Falgravn's corpse. I should bring it to Thane Ogvar.
I recovered an Amulet of Bats from Lord Falgravn's corpse. I should bring it to Thane Ogvar.
I recovered a Bloodstone Chalice from Lord Falgravn's corpse. I should bring it to Thane Ogvar.
Tyrvera said I should speak to Captain Lilmyra about a plan to defend Kyne's Aegis.
I should find a boat on the docks in Solitude and travel to Kyne's Aegis.
Gwendis and I encountered a dead end in what appears to be an aged library. We should search the room for any way to progress further into the keep.
I found the key to Havil's farmhouse. I should check inside to make sure he's safe.
We discovered Essenia's secret laboratories. I should search the area for any sign of Adusa.
Lady Ninetha appears distraught from hearing that her daughter is dying. I need to ask Old Mjolen if there is anything we can do to stop the curse.
Now I should head to Kilkreath Temple so that Priest Bavian and I can look for High Priest Varkour.
Chief Urzikh asked me to gather the ingredients used to make her stonemelt solution.
I gathered the ingredients. I should assemble them in the order listed in the instructions Chief Urzikh provided.
I caught up to Arkasis in one of his testing chambers. There he unveiled one of his newest creations: the Stone Behemoth. I have no choice but to destroy it.
Arkasis escaped the testing chamber after the destruction of the Stone Behemoth. Gwendis suggested I chase after him while she guards the rear and investigates his testing chamber.
I killed Arkasis with Gwendis's help. I should talk to her about what comes next.
I found Arkasis in his main laboratory. He sealed himself in some huge device and doesn't intend to come out peacefully. I must end his insane experiments through force.
Gwendis believes that Stone Garden lies just ahead, through a chasm in these Blackreach caverns. She asked me to take the lead and watch for ambushes.
I found the entrance to the Stone Garden, but there is an enormous werewolf on guard. I need to kill Exarch Kraglen before I can enter.
Gwendis unlocked the entrance to the Stone Garden while I dealt with Exarch Kraglen. Now that we have access, I should explore farther inside.
I entered a Blackreach cavern and found Gwendis scouting the area. I should speak to her.
I need to complete Stone Garden.
I defeated my foes in Stone Garden.\n\nI should find <<1>> in my alliance's capital city.
<<1>> presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Arkasis the Mad Alchemist.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Gwendis returned and told me that Talfyg managed to escape her. Gwendis needs a moment to recover while I push ahead in search of Lady Thorn.
While in search of Lady Thorn I encountered a Daedric monster called Vaduroth that blocks the path. I must kill it to continue my hunt for Lady Thorn.
Talfyg turned into a Bloodknight and blocks the way to Lady Thorn. I must kill him to proceed.
I killed Lady Thorn and ended the threat of her Thorn Legion. I should talk to Gwendis and discuss what is next.
Gwendis caught up with me. She discovered that Lady Thorn is in the Cathedral Great Hall which should be farther ahead. I should continue forward.
I agreed to help Gwendis stop Lady Thorn. I should make my way into the castle so she can enter with Talfyg from the side.
A massive death hound named Dread Tindulra blocks the entrance to the castle. I must kill it to get inside.
A Blood Twilight materialized and aided in Talfyg escaping Gwendis's watch. Gwendis chased after. I must kill the Blood Twilight and pursue them.
I entered Castle Thorn and found Gwendis talking to a captured vampire. I should speak to her.
I defeated Talfyg in the statuary garden. Now I need to go to the Grand Cathedral to kill Lady Thorn.
I found Lady Thorn in the Grand Cathedral. Now is my chance to kill her.
I need to complete Castle Thorn.
I defeated my foes in Castle Thorn.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Lady Thorn.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I should speak to Lyris about what we found in the Ratway.
I defeated the Sea Giant and recovered the scouts' intelligence. I should return to <<1>> to claim my reward.
I need to kill the Sea Giant and gather intelligence left by the fallen scouts.
It looks like this chamber has been turned into a laboratory of some sort. I should look around and see if I can determine its purpose.
Evska asked me to check on her friends Koth and Lisalda, who were attacked by ice-covered wolves. They can be found in Morthal.
I've found Koth and Lisalda. They appear non-responsive. I should speak to Lady Reddharn.
An Orc hiding near the farm called me over. I should talk to him and see what he wants.
Now I should go to the Hall of the Dead and see if Swordthane Uthlet and the other people that took shelter there are all right.
I found Swordthane Uthlet and Jarl Reddharn at the Hall of the Dead. I should speak to them about what transpired in Solitude during the harrowstorm.
Svana came to meet Jorunn the Skald-King, but she asked to speak with me first. I should talk to her.
Svana asked me to check on Fennorian at the Mages Guild and see how the harrowstorm elixir is coming along.
I found Fennorian and Old Mjolen at work on the elixir in the Mages Guild. Fennorian seems eager to share some discovery with me. I should speak to him.
Svana's gathered survivors for a moment of mourning. She asked for my report before she begins the ceremony.
Lyris hired a cart to take us to Eastmarch and the Grinning Horker inn. I should hop aboard the cart so we can begin the journey.
Lyris Titanborn is ready to travel to Eastmarch and follow the trail of the Icereach Coven witch I encountered in Riften's Ratway. I should meet her in Riften at once.
I need to search the catacombs and find High Priest Varkour and the relic called Meridia's Brilliance.
Narsis Dren asked me to find his journal. Apparently, it contains the location of a powerful incantation capable of reversing the illusion spell.

According to Narsis's journal, the legendary illusionist, Maelmoth, separated his incantation of reversal into three parts and hid them throughout Solitude. I must use the bottle's notes to locate all three parts of this powerful incantation.
I gathered all three parts of Maelmoth's incantation. I should return to Narsis Dren and dispel the illusion.
I successfully cast Maelmoth's spell and freed the boastful historian, Narsis Dren, from the illusion spell. I should talk to him about what he plans to do now.
Narsis Dren urged me to acquire Maelmoth's last journal from the Mages Guild librarian in Solitude. Apparently this text contains a riddle that could lead us to the ancient mage's greatest treasure.
The Mages Guild librarian let me borrow Maelmoth's final journal. I should deliver it to Narsis to see if he can make sense of it.
According to Narsis, Maelmoth's journal entry points to a meditation grotto near Kilkreath Temple. I should make my way to this hidden grotto. Narsis will meet me there.
We found an ancient puzzle in Maelmoth's grotto. Narsis thinks that if we solve the puzzle, it may lead to Maelmoth's treasure.
Shortly after solving Maelmoth's puzzle, a scroll appeared. I should read it to see if it contains any additional clues.
I read Maelmoth's scroll. I should discuss its contents with Narsis Dren.
Narsis believes that Maelmoth's scroll indicates we'll find our next test at Kyne's Shrine. Narsis will meet me there.
I must solve this sconce puzzle to discover the next step in Maelmoth's elaborate test. The scroll we discovered in the grotto should provide all the clues I need.
As soon as I solved the sconce puzzle, another scroll appeared. I should read it.
This new scroll contains another obscure clue. I should talk to Narsis. He might be able to make sense of it.
Narsis believes the scroll points to a rocky precipice southwest of Morthal called Sabre Cat's Leap. I should make my way there. Narsis will join me soon.
Narsis helpfully illustrated the consequences of getting this puzzle wrong. I must choose the correct door to proceed. The scroll I recovered at the braziers likely contains the clues I need.
Walking through the correct door magically teleported me to another locationâ€”and another scroll. I should read Maelmoth's next clue.
Reading the final scroll seems to have opened the ruin, Folgunthur. I should deliver the good news to Narsis.
I should enter Folgunthur and discover what secrets await inside.
I found the key to Maelmoth's Mysterium. Now we can finally discover the ancient mage's secrets.
According to Maelmoth's tome, the nearby bottle is the product of his life's workâ€”an illusion capable of instantly transforming people who touch it. I should talk to Narsis.
I should deliver the bottled Narsis Dren to Deem-Vilax in Solitude, along with Maelmoth's journal. Perhaps she'll know what to do with him.

Maelmoth's trail ended in disappointment for Narsis Dren. Despite the lack of mysteries and treasures, Narsis is confident that he can weave it all into a profitable tale. I should return the journal to Deem-Vilax in Solitude like I promised.
I need to find ingredients for Rigurt so he can prepare Thane Svyne a meal.
I acquired both ingredients Rigurt needs to cook Thane Svyne a meal. I should find Rigurt and let him know.
I should investigate Mor Khazgur mine and see what caused the collapse.
I should meet Lyris at the cart outside of town.
I destroyed Maxten Favrete's Frost Focus, releasing Captain Mavvok. I should meet him back at his ship, the Silver Cormorant.
A garrison soldier suggested I find her superior, Captain Hingrid.
I found Captain Hingrid. I should talk to her.
There is a switch that Narsis wants me to pull. He thinks it will reveal one of Maelmoth's secrets.
Ena explained that the Reachmen plan to destroy the bridge that gives Dragon Bridge its name. I should return to the garrison and warn Captain Hingrid.
Phebe gave me her spirit warding whistle. I should use it while she spreads the salts.
It appears that we've done everything we can for poor Karthwatch. I should ask Svana what she wants to do now.
When I locate a harrowstorm, I must destroy the witch pikes and gray reliquary in order to disrupt the harrowstorm rituals.
I disrupted one of the harrowstorms. I should return to <<1>> to report my success.
I should explore the mine and see if I can locate any survivors.
Apparently, Essenia's experiments turn vampires into powerful beasts called bloodknights. If we don't hurry, Adusa may wind up as one of them. We must continue our search.
Narsis beat me to the shrine, but seems to be struggling with Maelmoth's next puzzle. I should talk to him.
Aerolf asked me to speak with Eyfja in Morthal and Hautgerd in Dragon Bridge about their encounters with the Pale Man.
Eyfja and Hautgerd witnessed their loved ones being murdered and abducted by the Pale Man on the northern coast of Haafingar. I should return to Aerolf and tell him what I've learned.
Aerolf asked me to gather draugr parts to use as bait for the Pale Man. One place I can find draugr is Dead Man's Respite.
I gathered enough parts to assemble a draugr body. I should look for Aerolf on the northern coast of Western Skyrim.
I found Aerolf on the northern Skyrim coast. I should see if he has prepared the necrotic mixture he mentioned, and if he believes the nearby cave to be the Pale Man's lair.
Aerolf gave me sharpened bones to assemble the draugr parts. I must place the bait corpse on a primitive table in the Pale Man's lair.
The bait corpse is assembled. I must sprinkle the necrotic potion on it to entice the Pale Man to come out.
The Pale Man emerged from its lair. I need to kill it before it slinks away.
The Pale Man is dead. Aerolf asked me to search its lair for any sign of its victims. I may find such signs on my way back out of the cave.
I gathered a number of trinkets the Pale Man must have taken from its victims. I should show these trinkets to Aerolf.
Aerolf thanked me for killing the Pale Man and avenging his brother. I should speak to him one last time before I leave.
I found Narsis examining an array of mysterious doorsâ€”undoubtedly another of Maelmoth's puzzles. I should talk to Narsis about how to tackle this next challenge.
Once I told Aerolf what I'd learned, he asked me to follow him inside his small farmhouse.
Aerolf consulted a map of Skyrim and marked the spots where Eyfja and Hautgerd encountered the Pale Man. I need to speak with him about what he found.
I need to leave Deepwood Vale and find the road to Solitude. Fennorian wants me to warn the city while he continues his investigation.
Narsis did not bother to read Maelmoth's book and is convinced that the beautiful bottle is worth taking. I should observe the outcome of this folly.
Viggol used some kind of grappling tool to get over the chasm. Pickle and I need to find some way around.
I should enter Dragonhome and search for the doll's personal belongings inside.
Skeg told me that the other miners were captured and dragged further into Lightless Hollow. Pickle and I need to meet up with Viggol and then track them down.
I should talk to Verita Numida and tell her I'm ready to join the Antiquarian Circle.
Now that I familiarized myself with the antiquarian's art, I should let Verita Numida know that I'm prepared to start my explorations of Tamriel.
A soldier arrived with a report of trouble in the city. I should listen to what he has to say.
I should seek out the ancientist, Verita Numida, at the University of Gwylim's North Annex in Solitude to find out more about the Antiquarian Circle.
Verita Numida encouraged me to touch a nearby scrying tool called the Antiquarian's Eye. If the object allows me to attune to it, Verita will grant me membership in the Antiquarian Circle.

I successfully attuned to the Antiquarian's Eye and proven my aptitude. Now I can join the Antiquarian Circle and begin the search for ancient relics. I should talk to Verita to make my membership official.
Yvara asked me to make rubbings of reliefs found at two Dragon mounds.
I gathered the rubbings Yvara requested. I should bring them to her.
From the rubbings I brought back, Yvara found another mound she wants to investigate in person.  She asked me to meet her there and protect her while she casts a spell.
Yvara asked me to escort her to the Dragon mound. I need to deal with any hostile creatures or bandits we encounter.
I need to escort Yvara to the center of the Dragon mound and deal with any hostile creatures or bandits we may encounter.
Yvara asked me to guide her back safely to the road.
Yvara asked me to visit her at the Antiquarian Circle in Solitude. She says she can pay me there.
I made it to the Antiquarian Circle's headquarters. I should speak to Yvara to get my reward.
Yvara isn't confident her theory about the Dragon mounds is correct. She asked for my advice.
I encouraged Yvara to trust her research and her instincts about her theory. I still need to collect my reward, though.
I advised Yvara to be cautious about making claims without evidence. I should speak to her to collect my reward.
Old Mjolen believes the origin of the necromantic curse lies at Kjenstag ruins, east of Morthal. I should investigate the ruins for clues.
I arrived at the Kjenstag Ruins where Mjolen believes the curse began. I should look around for documents that explain Maxten's magic.
I must activate the Antiquarian's Eye and attempt to scry the location of a bottle Gabrielle buried nearby.
The Antiquarian's Eye revealed the location of Gabrielle's bottle. Now I just need to find it. It looks like it's nearbyâ€”somewhere in the courtyard.
I found the bottle's resting place in the courtyard. Now, I must excavate the site and retrieve it.
I successfully excavated the bottle and completed my introduction to the antiquarian's art. I should speak to Gabrielle.
I obtained Maxten's ritual items from the Kjenstag Ruins. I should bring them to Old Mjolen at the Whispering Axe Tavern in Morthal.
I found Yvara. I should speak to her about what's next.
We reached the critical part of the healing ritual. Mjolen says I should use the locket now.
Yvara investigated the outside of the Dragon mound. I should speak to her about where we go next.
Yvara's spell is complete. I should ask her what needs to be done next.
I should speak to Yvara about our next steps.
Yvara is ready to complete her spell. I should watch over her while she casts.
Makob says roaming undead on the farm trapped Havil inside his house. I need to take the key from one of the undead farmhands and check on Havil.
I found Rada al-Saran protected by a magical barrier. I should speak with him.
We destroyed one of the gray reliquaries that appeared to be part of the harrowstorm ritual. I should talk to Svana and make sure she's all right.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I need to kill the werewolves and encourage the goats they stole to return to their home pasture by feeding them berries provided by the goatherd.
I recovered the stolen goats and killed the werewolves who took them. I should report my success to <<1>>.
Gerval, the goatherd, is still in Solitude awaiting his pleas for help to be answered. I should speak to him for more details on my assignment.
Phebe says we need to perform a ceremony to summon the spirits within the mining office. I should enter the building and see if I can help.
I should speak to one of the miners.
I need to open the gate to the Temple of the Divines so that Svana and I can reach the top of the Tower of the Wolf.
I freed the miners. Now I need to get them out safely. I should figure out where Viggol went.
I need to find proof of Skreg's dishonorable conduct and defeat him to erase the stain of the Circle of Champion's honor.
I found proof of Skreg's cheating and defeated him in combat. I should return to <<1>> to collect my reward.
I should speak to <<1>> for more information about my task.
Rasir's journal reveals that he completed the cure and headed to a nearby cavern to test it. I should tell Tranya what I know.
I spoke with the man Telline hired to find her husband. He refused to join Viggol on his adventure. I should find the entrance to the mine and talk to Telline herself.
I found a High Elf woman near the mine's entrance. She must be Viggol's wife. I should speak to her.
Tranya asked me to speak to the refugees who segregated themselves inside the grotto to keep from getting sick. She hopes they may have some clue to where Rasir went.
Rasir apparently had his notes on him when he went missing. I should see if I can pick up his trail.
I am tasked with destroying the Shademother and cleansing the pools of corruption she has created in the area.
The Shademother is dead and her corruption cleansed. I should return to Solitude for my reward.
If I want more information about the Shademother, I can talk to <<1>>.
I need to head to the Shadowgreen to gather their bark.
I gathered spriggan bark from the Shadowgreen. I should report back to <<1>> for my payment.
A wounded man called to me. He may need assistance. I should speak to him.
I should go to Solitude and look for the Skald-King's agent.
I should travel to Solitude in Western Skyrim and speak to Felande about the inn room located within the Lonely Troll.
Felande has offered me a free inn room at the Lonely Troll in Solitude. I should speak to her to learn more about the offer.
I've agreed to become Felande's newest tenant. I should speak to her to finalize the deal.
I need to use the Dissonance Apparatus on several Dwarven constructs in the Scraps and recover a heartcog from the ruins.
I tested the Dissonance Apparatus and recovered a heartcog. I should return to <<1>>.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I need to smash the urns and observe how the freed spirits react.
I destroyed several umbric urns in Midnight Barrow. I should claim my reward from <<1>>.
I found the entrance to the Mor Khazgur mine. Chief Urzikh and Overseer Thulsgreg are arguing outside it. I should talk to Chief Urzikh to learn more.
I must wipe out the vampires at their feeding ground and perform a consecration on their victims with an anointed relic of Arkay.
I should speak to <<1>> for more information about my task.
With the vampire feeding ground destroyed and their victims consecrated, I can return to Solitude for my reward.
Chief Urzikh says there are still three people missingâ€”the mine's foreman included. Our priority is to locate them first, and then see if we can discover the truth of what really happened here.
I should make my way to the basement of the Gwylim Annex in Solitude to find Gabrielle Benele. Apparently, she can teach me how to use the Antiquarian's Eye.
I should speak to <<1>> for more information about my task.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I need to wait and watch Old Mjolen study the cursed samples I brought to her.
Old Mjolen completed her study of the cursed samples. I should speak to her about the results.
I found Viggol standing by a large door. I should speak with him.
Viggol found a way to unlock the door. I need to pull the lever.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about my task.
I need to destroy the Dwarven colossus as well as the piles of Dwarven scrap nearby so there's no chance of the construct somehow repairing itself.
With the Dwarven colossus and Dwemer scrap destroyed, I can return to Solitude for my reward.
We caught up to the cart, but the pilgrims are unresponsive. I should search their crate and see if they were transporting any of the smuggled funerary urns.
The crate was empty except for remnants of dust and ash, but it bore the same mark as the smuggled crates in Solitude. I should tell Fennorian what I found.
When I locate a harrowstorm, I must destroy the witch pikes and gray reliquary in order to disrupt the harrowstorm rituals.
I disrupted a harrowstorm. I should return to <<1>> to report my success.
We found a map and a Gray Host communique in Tzinghalis's sanctum. I should talk to Lyris about our next steps.
I should make my way to the courtyard of Greymoor Keep. Gwendis believes we might find an alternate route into the castle there.
Leiborn mentioned that the sonnet named Nel's Hidden Loves holds clues for finding the College's stolen instruments. I should read it as he suggested.
The assassin killed a woman in the street then headed for the Hall of the Dead. That's the next location where I should look for a witness.
High Priest Ingurt identified the assassin as a vampire and said he was headed for the city gate. That's the next location where I should look for a witness.
Old Mjolen completed her divination spell. I should ask her what comes next.
Old Mjolen enchanted the Icereach Medallion so that I can use it to track the vampire assassin. I should use it and see where it leads.
The medallion showed me a vision of the vampire assassin and a small camp. The magic indicated that I should go to the west to find it.
We tracked the vampire assassin to a camp where he killed another victim. I should use the enchanted medallion again and see where it leads.
The medallion showed a vision of a cave west of the camp. I should head there now and search the cave.
I should speak with the recently freed Heiruna.
Jarl Morryn says the meeting with the local thanes won't happen because of a feud between them. I should talk to Rigurt about what to do next.
After hearing about Thane Hraldi's plan to catch Old Hjalsdottir, Rigurt ran off and told me to meet him in Chillwind Depths. I should head there to meet him.
I found Rigurt in Chillwind Depths. I should speak with him.
Rigurt and I found the bait mushroom. I should return to Thane Hraldi to see what Rigurt plans to do with it.
I should wait to see what Rigurt's plan is.
Rigurt attracted a large creature. Thane Hraldi thinks it's Old Hjaalsdottir. I should chase after it before it gets away.
We need to search the barrow and find out what the Reachmen are doing here.
I should talk to <<1>> in Daggerfall. She can tell me more about the Undaunted.
Pickle led us to a body in the caves. I should investigate and see what happened to this person.
I found a chitin blade in the victim. I should talk to Viggol about this.
I should enter the ancient ruin of Labyrinthian.
Captain Ageran is dead. Overseer Urlvar told us to stop investigating and then ran off. I should talk to Claudina about what to do next.
I should speak to <<1>> to learn more about the guild listings mentioned in the note.
I should review the guild listings to see if there might be a group of adventurers with goals and interests similar to mine.
I should speak to <<1>>.
According to the note I found nearby, Kelbarn gathered mining samples for Ingfred the Tall in Dusktown. I should pick up the samples so I can deliver them there.
I should talk to Ingfred the Tall about my payment.
I found Ingfred the Tall in Dusktown. I should deliver the mining samples and tell him Kelbarn is dead.
I got the mining samples. I should take them to Dusktown and let Ingfred the Tall know what happened.
I should read the note next to the body.
I read the letter.  <<1>> was collecting mining samples for <<2>> in Dusktown. I should get the ore she found.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>>. I should let him know <<2>> is dead and hand over her mining samples.
I gathered the mining samples. I should deliver them to <<1>> in Dusktown.
I should read the letter next to her body. It might have useful clues.
I read the note, and discovered that Reeh-La collected ore samples for <<1>> in Dusktown. I should bring them back to him. There might be a reward.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>>. I should give him the samples and let him know about the dead Argonian.
I took the ore samples Reeh-La gathered. I should deliver them to  <<1>> in Dusktown.
A scrap of paper lays near Reeh-La's body. I should read it for any clues.
According to the note, <<1>> was investigating <<2>> while posing as a prospector. I should gather his samples to deliver to Dusktown.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>>. I should deliver the mining samples and hear what he has to say.
I gathered <<1>>'s mining samples. I should  find <<2>> in Dusktown and get his side of the story.
There is a bloodstained note next to the body. It may contain a clue as to what happened here.
I freed the prisoners. Now I should meet up with Gwendis and the prisoner to find out what he knows about Adusa.
I must drain the life from Molag Bal's cultists.
I must manipulate the minds of Molag Bal's cultists.
I must prey upon Molag Bal's cultists using my horrifying new form.
The author of the note, Angrar, is in Morthal. I should head there to find him.
I need to find Angrar and return his note to him.
Thane Svyne doesn't seem to want to speak with us. I should talk to Rigurt about what to do next.
Farethor won't give me the boar meat until I acquire a delicacy called kiviaq for him. I should head to a giant camp to acquire it.
I must journey deeper into this ruin in search of prey.
I should wait for Thane Svyne to try the food.
I found Ena, but she's tied up. I should untie her before I speak to her.
The writer of this letter wants me to take some rock samples to <<1>>  in Dusktown. I should collect the bag.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>>. I should deliver the samples and Adanzda's message.
I have the mining samples and the letter. Now I need to find <<1>> in Dusktown.
There is a strange letter here. Perhaps I can learn something from reading it.
I found another piece of Rasir's journal. I should see if I can find any more.
Narsis and I entered Folgunthur, only to encounter another locked door! I must find a key that will grant us entry to Maelmoth's Mysterium.
Predictably, the bottle unleashed a spell on Narsis, turning him back into a bottle. I should pick him up and decide what to do with him.
I should speak to the talking doll.
I should pick up the talking doll and put it in my pack.
Rasir gave me instructions to find the spot where he hid the cure. I should follow his clues.
Tranya told me she would take the injured Rasir back to the Grotto. I should meet her there.
Remarkably, Adusa survived Essenia's ritual and the resulting blast of arcane energy. I should talk to her to see how she fares.
We stopped Essenia's experiments and rescued Adusa. All that's left is to rendezvous with Gwendis back at our original meeting place to ensure everyone is all right.
I should take the list of components so I know what to look for.
Svana and I need to reach Svargrim at the top of the Tower of the Wolf in Castle Dour.
I found Angrar. I should speak to him about the note.
I need to go to Chillwind Depths and help Hamvir save his poisoned sister.
I acquired the kiviaq. I should speak with Farethor.
Mugha says two miners were seen with Mazog just before the explosion. I should try to find them.
I need to travel to the Imperial City and find my alliance's base.
I arrived in the Imperial City. I should sign my name in the Volunteers' Ledger.

To reach the Imperial City, open the |cFFFFFFAlliance War|r interface and navigate to the |cFFFFFFCampaigns|r section. From there, choose an Imperial City campaign you wish to join and select |cFFFFFFEnter Campaign|r!
Rasir hid the remaining doses of the cure. I should follow his notes in order to find them.
Now that I have the key, I should find the door to the catacombs and open it.
I need to locate the vampire before he goes into hiding again.
We stumbled upon a wounded man inside Labyrinthian. He appears to know Yrsild and may hold the answers as to what's happened here. I should speak to him.
I obtained the key to Havil's house. I should enter and see if I can find him.
I killed Dread Tindulra and cleared the path into Castle Thorn. I should explore inside to discover what I can of Lady Thorn's plans.
I should find Lyris in Solitude and speak to her.
Lyris arrived. I should tell her what I learned from Edjar. I should also make sure Edjar has told me everything I need to know to rescue his pack mates.
I should find Leiborn at the Bards College in Solitude.
A courier delivered a message from Fennorian. I should read it.
I found Rasir, wounded but alive. I should talk to him to see what he knows.
I found Rasir's cure. I should take it with me.
Tranya caught up to me. I need to tell her what I know.

We discovered Maelmoth's "deepest mysteries"â€”a pile of dusty, unremarkable junk. Narsis Dren pointed out a nearby tome. I should read it. Perhaps it can shed some light on Maelmoth's bizarre collection.
Hafskjar believes killing the witches will free Bjora. I should go to the tree and check on Bjora.
I should go talk to the bottle's manservant.
I must leave the tunnels and return to the Blood Matron.
I arrived back at Rebel's Retreat. I should talk to Arana about what happened at the Library of Arkthzand and what we learned there.
We defeated Nathari and rescued Bradan and the surviving members of the Ghostsong clan. I should talk to Arana and determine our next course of action.
Arana suggests meeting with Bradan, a werewolf from her estranged clan, at a place called Hroldan Ring. I should find the meeting spot and see if Bradan can get us a meeting with Nathari.
I found Bradan at Hroldan Ring. I should speak with him about the Ghostsong clan witches.
We learned from Bradan that Nathari led the Ghostsong clan to Lost Valley Redoubt, where she promised them some grand revelation. Arana wants to talk to her sister, so we need to go to Lost Valley.
The redoubt appears to be overrun with Gray Host troops. We need to reach the entrance to the ancient barrow and try to find the Ghostsong clan.
I reached the Nord barrow above Lost Valley Redoubt. Arana says the entrance is somewhere nearby. I should search for it.
Arana opened the concealed door that leads into the ancient Nord barrow. Nathari and the Ghostsong clan should be down in the caves below the barrow. I should go inside and look for them.
We found Arana's sister, the witch Nathari, but she's already sacrificed members of the Ghostsong clan. While Arana sees to the dead, I should talk to Nathari.
Nathari is somewhere in the lower barrow, ready to sacrifice the rest of the Ghostsong clan to awaken the Dark Heart. I need to find her and try to put a stop to this.
We found another sacrificed member of the Ghostsong clan. There's a note beside this one. I should examine it.
We need to reach a ritual cavern called the Dark Descent and stop Nathari before she can sacrifice the rest of the Ghostsong clan.
We entered the section of the lower barrow known as the Dark Descent. Now to find Nathari and stop her before she sacrifices the rest of the Ghostsong clan.
Nathari retreated deeper into the caverns to continue her sacrifice of the Ghostsong clan and wake the Dark Heart. I should go after her.
Arana and I have found a large pit at the bottom of the Dark Descent. Nathari has gathered her clan here. I should look for an opportunity to confront Nathari.
We must confront Nathari to stop her from awakening the Dark Heart. I should help Arana stop the ritual.
We defeated Nathari and stopped the Dark Heart from fully awakening. Now we need to find Bradan and any other Ghostsong clan survivors.
Arana and I found Bradan imprisoned with several other Ghostsong clan hunters. I should talk to him.
The historians at Bangkorai Garrison might know more about the Gray Host. I should travel there with Gwendis.
I need to meet with Gwendis, a member of the Ravenwatch, to find out more about the Gray Host.
Scholar Laurette Diel is an expert on Bangkorai Garrison battles. I should speak to her and see what I can learn about the Gray Host's defeat in the ancient past.
The Imperial army recently attacked Bangkorai Garrison. Scholar Diel's fellow scholars fled with the aid of a Pyre Watch warrior. I should talk to Gwendis about what we need to do next.
Gwendis suggested I look for Scholars Cogline and Indouz, who headed for Evermore, while she looks for Scholar Jeanard, who headed for Kerbol's Hollow.

I found Scholar Indouz and Scholar Cogline. They survived thanks to the efforts of the Pyre Watch warrior, who is still missing. She was last seen retreating into the Crypt of the Exiles. I should check for her there.
I found the Pyre Watch warrior in the Crypt of the Exiles. I should speak with her.
I need to escort the Pyre Watch warrior, Shelaria, safely out of the Crypt of the Exiles. Then I can speak with her at length about the Gray Host.
I escorted Shelaria safely out of the Crypt of the Exiles. I should ask her what she knows about the Gray Host's defeat in the First Era.

Shelaria says history suggests someone survived the Gray Host's defeat and fled to Viridian Watch after the fateful battle. I should meet Gwendis back at Bangkorai Garrison and tell her what I learned.
Gwendis and I need to head to Viridian Watch to see if we can uncover any clues about the mysterious Gray Host survivor.
Gwendis and I need to search Viridian Watch for more of these sigils and, if possible, follow them to the place where the Gray Host survivor found refuge.
Gwendis and I discovered a long abandoned room where a Gray Host survivor hid after the battle at Bangkorai Garrison. I should search for clues.
Gwendis sounds concerned. I should speak to her about the signet I found.

Gwendis recognized the signet. She says her mentor, Count Verandis Ravenwatch, had one just like it. She asked me to meet her at Ravenwatch Castle in Rivenspire so we can investigate this matter further.
I found Gwendis waiting in the courtyard behind Ravenwatch Castle. I should speak to her.
To avoid drawing attention, Gwendis wants to use a secret entrance to enter Ravenwatch Castle.
We successfully entered Ravenwatch Castle. I should follow Gwendis to the cellar, where Verandis stored his possessions.
Gwendis wants to see if we can find a signet similar to the one we acquired at Viridian Watch. She's sure she remembers seeing Verandis with one. I should search the cellar for it.
I discovered a secret door. It's locked, but Gwendis believes she can open it using the signet we found at Viridian Watch. I should wait while she attempts to get inside.
We found a secret study in the castle cellar. We should search for any evidence that connects Verandis to the Gray Host, or that exonerates him of any involvement.
I found a letter from Rada al-Saran to Verandis Ravenwatch. It confirms Verandis was a member of the Gray Host. I should speak to Gwendis about this.

The letter from Rada al-Saran invited Verandis to visit him at an island castle and provided a map. Gwendis suggested our next step is to investigate this castle. She asked me to meet her at the cart outside.
I should speak to Gwendis one last time before we travel to the secret Gray Host island.
Bradan and the remaining Ghostsong clan hunters have agreed to join Arana's fight against Lady Belain and the Gray Host. I should meet them back at Rebel's Retreat to plan our next move.
I should meet Verandis at the sprawling Dwarven ruin across the river from the exit out of Bthar-Zel.
I found Verandis at the Dwarven ruin. I should speak to him.
The main door leading into the Dwarven ruin is locked. I should around the building and see if I can find another entrance nearby.
Verandis wants to know what I learned from the note I found. I should talk to him and let him know.
Verandis wants to explore the other side of the structure. I should head to the north side of the library and look around.
I found more of the Gray Host pentarch's research and an eerie black shard. I should discuss these items with Verandis.
We made it inside the Library of Arkthzand. I should ask Verandis if he has any ideas on how we locate Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain.
Verandis suggests we explore deeper into the library to search for Rada al-Saran, Lady Belain, and the source of the dark energy that seems to be powering the void portals.
Our progress through the library has led us to a dead end, but Verandis spotted a door higher up in the vast chamber. I need to find a way to reach it.
I used the void portals to reach the door on the upper level of the chamber. Now we should enter it and continue our hunt for Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain.

I found another note from the Gray Host pentarch. Apparently, he discovered that the apparatus still functions and it can be manipulated by rotating the large void crystals set within the pedestals. I should let Verandis know what I found.
Verandis wants to free the shade that used to be a Gray Host pentarch so we can question him. To do that, I need to rotate the void crystals and realign the dark energy flowing through the apparatus.
I set the tortured shade free. Verandis wants me to question the creature.
The shade spoke in riddles. I should discuss what the tormented creature told me with Verandis.
We need to continue our pursuit of Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain. Verandis wants to find them before they reach this so-called Dark Heart.
We located Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain. They're in the chamber below us. I should listen in on their conversation.
I should talk to Verandis and discuss what we just heard in the exchange between Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain.

According to Lady Belain, a Reach witch prophecy is somehow involved in their plan to awaken the Dark Heart. Verandis wants me to return to Rebel's Retreat and see what Arana can tell us about the topic.

Lady Belain wants Nathari and the Ghostsongs to awaken the Dark Heart of their prophecy. Arana needs to get inside the Lost Valley barrow to stop Nathari from doing something terrible. We need to make our way to the barrow entrance.

Arana wants to know what the letter I found in the Gray Host camp has to say. I should talk to her and let her know that it appears Nathari is working with Lady Belain for some reason related to the dark prophecy.
The sigils lead to what Gwendis believes is an entrance to the Gray Host hideout. Once she finds a way inside, we can investigate.
I should talk to Count Verandis Ravenwatch and let him know Ard Caddach's response.
Arana is returning to prepare her rebels for war. I should find Verandis and determine what we should do next.
Gwendis told me I can find Verandis in Markarth, in Understone Keep. I should talk with him.
Rada al-Saran's forces are gathering to the north of Markarth, near Bthardamz. Verandis asked me to investigate and discover the Gray Host's plans.
I heard Rada al-Saran addressing his forces as I approached the Gray Host camp. I should try to find him.
Lyris and Fennorian confronted Rada al-Saran as I approached, but the Ashen Lord and his commanders escaped without a fight. I should speak to Lyris and Fenn about what they're doing here.
Rada al-Saran escaped, but Fennorian intercepted a coded communication important to the Gray Host. We should bring it to Verandis in the orrery chamber of the Library of Arkthzand in Blackreach.
I should talk to Verandis about the Gray Host's intercepted message and what it means for us.
The coded letter directed Verandis to three different locations. I should investigate each site in order to determine more about Rada al-Saran's ultimate plan.

I recovered an Oblivion stone from the sundered land in the Reach, the Nighthollow Testament, and an unassembled keystone. I should return to the orrery chamber and see what Verandis makes of all this.
Despite the others badgering Verandis about his past, I need to show the count what I found and see if these items help us get closer to determining Rada al-Saran's plans.
Verandis said that Rada al-Saran has a hidden laboratory somewhere in the Library of Arkthzand, but he hasn't been able to pinpoint it. He asked all of us to help him search for it.
Verandis thinks he can stop the Darkstorm, but he needs to enter Rada al-Saran's sanctuary realm to do so. I should ask him how we can do that.
The notice directed me to talk to <<1>> in the Reach city of Markarth for more details.
I should ask <<1>> how I go about picking up one of these daily jobs.
Gwendis asked me to meet Verandis at Nighthollow Keep, an ancient vampire fortress in Blackreach. The Dark Heart may be hidden somewhere inside.
I met Verandis on the way to Nighthollow Keep. I should talk to him.
As we search Nighthollow Keep, Verandis wants me to look for personal objects that he can use his auramancy on to get impressions of what happened here and how it relates to the Dark Heart.
I wandered into an old study in Nighthollow Keep. I should search it for something Verandis can use to attempt to draw a memory from.
I found a damaged insignia of some sort in the keep's study. I should ask Verandis whether this is a suitable target for his auramancy.
Verandis thinks he can coax a memory from the emotional aura clinging to this insignia. I should observe anything that appears.
The memory conjured from the insignia showed Lady Belain and another Nighthollow vampire talking about drinking from the Dark Heart. I should see what Verandis thinks of this revelation.
