Verandis wants me to continue to explore. While the magic he cast on the damaged insignia might reveal more memories, he wants me to find an undamaged one. He also suggested the place may contain void portals that will help me navigate the keep.
I found a relatively undamaged portion of the keep. It looks like a noble's personal chamber. I should search the area for objects that Verandis can cast his auramancy upon.
I should watch and see what memory Verandis can draw from the insignia with his auramancy magic.
I observed another Nighthollow memory conjured by Verandis's aurumancy. I should talk to Verandis about this latest memory.
Verandis and I learned that the Nighthollow vampires accessed the Dark Heart through a passage they called the Dark Halls. I should continue to explore the keep in search of this passage.
The way is open. Now to explore the Dark Halls and see if we can find the Dark Heart.
Verandis wants me to use the intact insignia and see if it opens the way to the Dark Halls.
It appears that when the Dark Heart began to slow many centuries ago, Lady Belain took the last of the power for herself. I should talk to Verandis about this.
The lift took me to an overlook across from the Library of Arkthzand. The orrery dome is now glowing. I should talk to Verandis.

We reached the chamber containing the Dark Heart, but Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain are already here. While Verandis attempts to stop Rada al-Saran, I need to keep Lady Belain's Nighthollow minions away from him.
Verandis and I found a small shrine deep in the Dark Halls. The personal items left here seem to be good candidates for his auramancy. I should watch whatever memory Verandis is able to reveal.
The Dark Heart has awakened. I should talk to Verandis and find out what we should do now.
I need to follow Verandis and leave the Dark Heart chamber.
I should meet Gwendis at Ravenwatch Castle and let her know I'm ready to travel to the secret island called Grayhome.
Gwendis and I need to travel to the secret island of Grayhome, using the map on the back of Rada al-Saran's letter to Verandis. The journey begins with the cart waiting for us at Ravenwatch Castle.
We arrived on the secret Gray Host island. I should speak to Gwendis and find out what she wants to do now.
Gwendis wants to survey the island for traps and wildlife before we approach the castle. I should follow her.
We discovered an odd-looking crystal. When Gwendis approached, it pulsed. I should ask her what she thinks about this.
Gwendis believes I successfully deactivated the first crystal. She thinks she sees more up ahead. I need to deactivate those as well before we can safely enter the castle.
When I deactivated the last crystal, there was an audible rumble. We should check the front door and see if we can enter the castle now.
We entered the ancient Gray Host castle. I should talk to Gwendis about where we should begin our search.
I must drink the dream-walk potion mixed with a vial of Verandis Ravenwatch's blood so I can experience Verandis's memories of this place and discover the truth of his connection.
My journey through Verandis's memories begins. I arrived at the castle. The steward instructed me to speak with Verandis's fellow exarchs while his study is prepared.
My journey through Verandis's memories continues. As Verandis, I spoke with both Exarch Ulfra and Exarch Tzinghalis. Now, I need to seek out Rada al-Saran.
My journey through Verandis's memories continues. The steward moved Verandis's personal belongings to the study prepared for him. I should find it and see what clues it might hold.
My journey through Verandis's memories continues. I entered Verandis's study. Now I should read Verandis's journal. Maybe they will give me more insight into his connection to the Gray Host.
I attempted to read Verandis's notes, but could not. I heard Gwendis call out to me from the real world. I should find the dream-walk potion in the dream and drink it to wake up.
I exited the dream-walk. Now I should tell Gwendis what I learned about Verandis and his ties to the Gray Host.
In Verandis's memories, there was a journal in his study. I need to find the same study in the present and see if the ancient journal is still there.
Verandis's journal mentions a ritual involving stone husks. Apparently, when he attempted the ritual on a mortal, it drove her mad. I should tell Gwendis what I learned.

Gwendis wants to use Verandis's ritual to try to resurrect a member of the Gray Council so she can interrogate them. I need to find the reliquary Verandis filled with some of his life essence and hid in the armory.
I found Verandis's reliquary. Now I should meet Gwendis in the ritual chamber.
Gwendis prepared all elements of the ritual while I gathered the reliquary. I should do whatever she tells me to complete the ritual.
The ritual seems to be working. I should get ready for whatever happens next.
The vampire we resurrected is mad with hunger. Gwendis and I must subdue him before he kills us both.
I should give Gwendis and Verandis a moment to catch up.
I should head out of the ritual chamber and see what Count Verandis has to say.
I should speak to Count Verandis Ravenwatch and learn what I can about all that transpired.
I should speak to Gwendis about everything we learned during our investigation.

Now that we finished investigating the Gray Host and Verandis's connection to them, I need to give Gwendis and Verandis time to catch up and figure out our next move against Rada al-Saran. I should see if she needs anything else in the meantime.
I disrupted the witch matron's ritual, and freed her captives. Now I should claim my reward.
I should find the witch matron and disrupt her ritual. I also need to rescue any Reachfolk she plans to sacrifice.
I need to find and retrieve the talismans worn by the Wildblood warriors.
I gathered the Wildblood talismans that <<1>> requested. I should deliver them to him and claim my reward.
When I locate a harrowstorm ritual site, I need to destroy the witch pikes and gray reliquary in order to disrupt the harrowstorm ritual.
I disrupted a harrowstorm ritual. I should return to <<1>> to report my success.
When I locate a harrowstorm ritual site, I need to destroy the witch pikes and gray reliquary in order to disrupt the harrowstorm ritual.
I disrupted a harrowstorm ritual. I should return to <<1>> to report my success.
I found an undamaged insignia in the Nighthollow suite. I should ask Verandis to try his auramancy magic on this new insignia.
I reactivated the orrery and opened a gateway through the Void. Hopefully, it will lead to Rada al-Saran's sanctuary realm.
I emerged from the gateway into a strange Oblivion realm, but I'm alone. I should see if Lyris and Verandis made it through as well.
Gwendis wants me to get to the orrery chamber in the Library of Arkthzand and offer my assistance to Verandis.
I heard Lyris nearby. She sounded like she was in trouble. I should find her.
I reunited with Lyris in Oblivion, but Verandis wasn't with her. We should search for him.
Lyris and I spotted the Darkstorm forming in the distance. There's a good chance that's where we'll find Rada al-Saran, and possibly Verandis as well.
Verandis defied Rada al-Saran and was nearly killed. I need to protect Verandis and end Rada al-Saran's existence once and for all.
Rada al-Saran is dead. Verandis is attempting to take control of the Darkstorm. I should wait for him.
Verandis opened a gateway to the orrery with the power of the Dark Heart. Lyris and I should return there while we still have the chance.
Lyris wants to talk to me. I should speak to her.
Lyris suggested I head back to Markarth to confirm our suspicion that the lives lost to the Dark Heart have been restored. She'll meet me there.
Lyris and I have discovered that Verandis resurrected the lost souls of Markarth, returning the people killed by the Gray Host to life. I should talk to her about this development.
I should be able to use the strange shard we found to propel us through the void portals. With any luck, we can use them to find a way into the Library of Arkthzand.
With the last ward dispelled, I should head through the door and try to find the Dark Heart.
We located Rada al-Saran's hidden laboratory. There are many experiments left inside. I should speak to Verandis about it.

Verandis claims to understand how Rada al-Saran's experiment is intended to work, but he still doesn't understand the purpose. He believes Rada intended for him to repeat his work to discover what his true aims are. Verandis needs my help to succeed.
To complete the Vateshran's Rites, I must clear the three wings that each represent a Daedric Prince, what the Reachfolk refer to as the great spirits. Once I defeat every enemy, I may move on.
I overcame the challenges of the Vateshran's Rites. I should talk to the Rites Matron to receive my reward.
<<1>> gave me a whistle and told me to use it to summon <<2>>. She said if I find <<2>>, I might find <<3>>, too.
I should make sure Bolfalgar and Snowy can get back to Hiretta on their own before I take my leave.
<<1>> came running as soon as I blew the whistle. I should praise <<1>> and tell her she's a good girl so she'll trust me.
<<1>> wants me to follow her. Maybe she'll lead me to <<2>>.
The wards around Karthwasten have been restored. I should speak with <<1>>.
Apprentice Fialyn asked me to speak with Shaman Ulvoch. She wants him to explain the ward restoration process, after he approves of my presence.
Shaman Ulvoch asked me to help Apprentice Fialyn gather materials to present as offerings at the wards. I need to gather willow branches, moon-touched stones, and cicada husks.
Gwendis thinks this crystal might be part of some sort of ward protecting the castle. She's seen something like this before. She asked me to try to deactivate the crystal.
I gathered the various materials for the offerings. Now to take them to the wards and place them while Apprentice Fialyn says the prescribed words.
I need to go to an Undaunted Enclave in Elden Root, Mournhold, or Wayrest to find out more about what they want me to do for a cut of their plunder.
I should finish my conversation with the Undaunted liaison.
Adusa-daro wants me to meet her down below in the Dwarven ruins so we can find Kathad. The lift should descend into the cavern that houses the ruins of Reachwind Depths.
I should talk to Adusa-daro and ask about her plan for entering the Reachwind Depths Ruins.
Adusa wants me to find an old sluice gate and use that to get inside the ruins the locals call the Reachwind Depths.
I entered the Dwarven ruins. Now I need to find a place where I can observe Adusa-daro's confrontation with the leader of the Lothid clan, Boss Trenlor.
I found a place that overlooks Boss Trenlor's court. I should observe as Adusa talks to him.
Boss Trenlor had Adusa-daro tossed into the Deep Tombs. Adusa said that if that happened, it would be up to me to find her and rescue her.
I found Adusa-daro in the Deep Tombs. I should talk to her.
Adusa-daro wants to search the Deep Tombs and locate Kathad. I should help her find him.
We found Kathad in a storage chamber with another vampire. Adusa wants me to talk to him.
Kathad refuses to leave until he helps Freyleth accomplish her plan to overthrow Boss Trenlor and provide a new direction for the Lothid clan. I should talk to Freyleth and learn about this plan.

Kathad won't leave until he's sure the clan has a new leader. I agreed to help Freyleth accomplish her plan by acquiring a mushroom that grows in the Blinds, the caverns beneath the Deep Tombs. She can use the mushroom to weaken Boss Trenlor.
This huge section of the Blinds seems the likely place to find a darkcap mushroom. I should look around.
I gathered the darkcap mushroom for Freyleth. Now I need to find the lift that leads to the servant's quarters so I can meet Kathad and Freyleth.
Adusa wants to talk before we meet with Kathad and Freyleth.
I found the lift that Freyleth mentioned. I should use it so I can meet her and Kathad in the servant's quarters.
We found Kathad and Freyleth in the servant's quarters. I should talk to him.
Kathad gave me a disguise so I can blend in as one of Boss Trenlor's servants. I should put it on before I leave this chamber.
Now that I'm wearing the disguise, I need to sneak past the clan vampires and reach Boss Trenlor's court so I can drop the darkcap mushroom into his chalice of blood.
Now that I reached Boss Trenlor's court, I should place the darkcap mushroom in his chalice of blood.
I placed the darkcap mushroom in Boss Trenlor's chalice of blood. Now I should take the chalice and present it to him.
I should give the chalice of blood tainted with the darkcap mushroom to Boss Trenlor.
I should wait and see what the blood tainted with darkcap mushroom does to Boss Trenlor.
Freyleth lied to us. The darkcap mushroom didn't weaken Boss Trenlor. It killed him! I should talk to her and get an explanation.
After Freyleth tricked us into poisoning Boss Trenlor and took over the Lothid clan, Adusa left in disgust. I should meet her outside.
I helped Adusa-daro convince Kathad to leave the Lothid clan. I should talk to her.
Verandis has asked me to go to Markarth and warn Ard Caddach. Instead of fighting back against the Gray Host, he needs to fall back and deny as many lives as possible to the Dark Heart.

I should let Bradan know that the Gray Host wants a fight. They want to kill everyone to feed the Dark Heart. He needs to make sure Markarth's defenders work to keep everyone alive and not try to die in a blaze of glory.
Now that I reached Understone Keep, I should find Ard Caddach and let him know the true purpose of this assault on Markarth.
Now that I brought Bradan up to speed, I need to go to Understone Keep and convince Ard Caddach and Arana that we need to deny the Dark Heart as many deaths as we can.
Ard Caddach explained that Arana chased Lady Belain back into Nchuand-Zel. I should try to catch up to them and help the witch-rebel defeat the ancient vampire.
I entered the undercity of Nchuand-Zel. Now to find Arana and help her deal with Lady Belain.
I found Arana, but she appears to have been seriously wounded. I should talk to her.

Arana was seriously wounded in her battle with Lady Belain, but she thinks she sensed the presence of another keystone in the Nchuand-Zel vaults below. I need to find that keystone so I can enter the orrery chamber in the Library of Arkthzand.
I located the Nchuand-Zel Keystone, but it's protected by ancient Dwarven wards. I need to figure out a way past the defenses so that I can get the keystone and enter the Library of Arkthzand.
Now that I have a keystone, I can access the orrery inside the Library of Arkthzand. I should head there and make my way to the orrery chamber.
I reached the Library of Arkthzand and met Verandis, who has been seeking a way into the orrery chamber. I should tell him about the keystone I acquired in Nchuand-Zel.
It's time to use the keystone I acquired in Nchuand-Zel and enter the orrery chamber in the Library of Arkthzand.
We killed Lady Belain, kept the Dark Heart from devouring all of Markarth, and scattered the Gray Host. But Rada al-Saran escaped. I should ask Verandis what we should do now.
I should finish up my conversation with the Undaunted liaison.
We entered the orrery chamber to find Rada al-Saran doing something to the arcane machine. We need to try to stop him.

While Verandis and Gwendis attempt to stop Rada al-Saran and whatever he's doing with the orrery above, Lady Belain teleported me down below into the chamber with the Dark Heart. She's drawing power from it. I need to stop her while I still can.
With her dying breath, Arana opened a portal to return me to the orrery above. She said that Verandis needs my help. I should hurry through the portal.
We powered down the orrery. I should let Verandis know what transpired in the Dark Heart chamber below.
We defeated Lady Belain, but I heard Arana call out in pain. I should check on her.
Verandis has asked me to return to Markarth and tell Ard Caddach that Belain has been defeated. I should go to Understone Keep and talk to the ard.
Now that I'm back in Understone Keep, I should let Ard Caddach know what transpired in Blackreach.
<<1>> asked me to meet her in Karthwasten so she could present me to her master, Shaman Ulvoch.
I arrived in the village of Karthwasten. I should speak with <<1>>.

The sentry mentioned that the ard's soldiers have been called back to Markarth because Caddach feels the rebels are a bigger threat to the city than the Gray Host. I should explore east of the city and see what I can learn.

I learned that the rebels may be gathering in the foothills east of Markarth, that someone named Arana may be their leader, and that the rebels are hunting the Gray Host. Now I should go to Understone Keep and find Verandis.

I should approach the throne and share what I learned with Ard Caddach, the Despot of Markarth. Hopefully, this conversation will help us gain a better understanding of the Gray Host's plans for the region.
Ard Caddach asked me to speak to his advisor, Lady Belain. He wants me to help her find the rebel leader Arana before he agrees to meet with Count Verandis.
Lady Belain wants me to search for Arana and the rebels in the foothills to the east of Markarth. A favor for a favor, as she said.
I need to tell Count Verandis what I learned about the rebels and the Gray Host.
I came across an encampment that may belong to Arana's rebels. A sentry noticed me and called out. I should talk to him.
Tayfaern, a member of Arana's rebels, wants me to investigate a few Gray Host stockpiles and tell him what they're storing there. If I perform this favor, he might introduce me to Arana.

The Gray Host stockpiles contained gray reliquaries and witch pikes. I also found a letter that mentioned a gathering circle, northwest of Valthume Barrow, where a spy meets with the Gray Host. I should investigate before I return to the rebel camp.
As I prepared to leave the ruin, the rebel witch, Arana, appeared. I should speak with her.

A note in the gathering circle confirms that Lady Belain is working with the Gray Host, and Arana revealed that Belain is also a vampire. I need to go to Valthume and observe a meeting between her and the Gray Host leader.
I arrived at the barrow called Valthume. Now I need to find Lady Belain and the Gray Host leader.
I found Lady Belain speaking to the leader of the Gray Host. I should observe from the shadows to learn their plans.
Rada al-Saran, the leader of the Gray Host, sensed my presence. He requested that I follow him. This might be my only opportunity to see what he has to say.
I should return to Ard Caddach's throne room in Understone Keep to tell Count Verandis and Ard Caddach what I learned about Lady Belain and the Gray Host's plans.
I should inform Count Verandis about what I learned before I speak to Ard Caddach.
I may not return from this trek into the Void. I should speak to my companions before I depart.
I met Arana at the path leading into Lost Valley. She found a Gray Host scout who she thinks Bradan dealt with on his way inside. I should talk to her.
The Dark Heart released its energy as we returned and we suddenly found Arana among us, alive and well. I should speak to her.
I need to find the tools the Thornroot shamans use to turn their captives into briarhearts and destroy them.
I destroyed the Thornroot shamans tools. I should return to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I should find the lair of the Thornroot clan's hagraven matron and take her totem.
I retrieved the hagraven matron's totem. I should return this to <<1>>.
I should go to Understone Keep in Markarth to inform Ard Caddach of Rada al-Saran's death.
Braden told me Ard Caddach is holding an audience in his war room. I should find him there to tell him about Rada al-Saran's death.
Ard Caddach wants me to attend an address that he and the other leaders of Skyrim will give to the people of Markarth. I should find him in his audience chambers.
Ard Caddach wants to speak with me before he and the leaders of Skyrim announce their intentions to cooperate.
Ard Caddach appears to be hosting a moot with the rulers of Eastern and Western Skyrim and they reached some kind of agreement. Ard Caddach wants to speak with me.
I completed the three wings of Vateshran Hollows. I must now enter the Champion's Circle and complete the final challenge.
We need to find Nathari before she sacrifices any more of the Ghostsong clan members.
The offerings have been placed at the wards. I should return to Karthwasten and inform Shaman Ulvoch that everything is ready for him to perform the restoration ritual.
Despite leaving Verandis behind in Rada al-Saran's sanctuary realm, he's appeared to speak with me. I should find out how he was able to return.
I must enter Gloomreach and gather the mushrooms.
I gathered the mushroom samples that <<1>> asked for. I should return to Markarth.
I should enter Gloomreach and gather samples of the fungal mold that the Gloomspore animals produce.
I gathered the fungal mold samples in Gloomreach. I should return it to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I need to find and destroy the mage's strange egg.
I destroyed the egg the crazed mage posessed. I should return to <<1>> and claim my reward.
Shaman Ulvoch requested that I present myself at the ritual pyre to complete the negotiations with the spirits.
Something went wrong during the ritual. I should speak to Shaman Ulvoch and find out what we need to do next.
The note next to the Ghostsong clan hunter contains the final words of Senan. He died fighting instead of allowing himself to be sacrificed. I should inform Arana.

Verandis suggested that a local scrap dealer named Nolovan might be able to help us get a lead on the Arkthzand Keystone. While I find him in the southeast section of the city, Verandis plans to meet with Arana and the rebels.
Now that I'm inside Nolovan's Scrap House, I should ask the proprietor about the Arkthzand Keystone.
Nolovan thinks I may be able to find the Arkthzand Keystone in the ruins of Bthar-Zel. He has a map, but I need to buy it or complete a simple job for him to obtain it.
As I was leaving the scrap house, Gwendis of the Ravenwatch showed up. I should talk to her.
Gwendis told me that Verandis made contact with Arana's rebels. She wants me to join him at the Reachfolk's main encampment, Rebel's Retreat.
I should talk to Shaman Ulvoch now that the offerings have been placed at the wards.
Shaman Ulvoch doesn't know why the ritual failed, but suspects it might have something to do with the ritual pyre itself. I need to try and find a clue as to what went wrong.
I arrived at Rebel's Retreat. Verandis wants me to talk to Arana. I should speak to her.

Arana intends to conduct a ritual to seek the blessing of Hircine for our alliance. I need to gather the components she needs for the ritualâ€”a briarheart seed, a hagraven's eye, and bright river-shale.
I gathered the ritual components as Arana requested. I should return to Rebel's Retreat and deliver them to her.
I found the components of a plant at the ritual site. I should report my findings to Apprentice Fialyn.
Apprentice Fialyn thinks the source of the corrupted plant may lie in the Sanuarach Mine beneath Karthwasten. We need to go into the mine and investigate.
Apprentice Fialyn and I made it inside the mine and found the corrupted plant. I should speak with her about what we should do next.
I should place the components into the fire to begin Arana's ritual.
The map I acquired in Markarth indicates that three locations hold the secret to finding the entrance to Bthar-Zel. Arana and I should go to these locations and look for clues.
I think Arana may have figured out how to interpret the map. I should talk to her.
Arana told me where to find the entrance to Bthar-Zel. I should make my way to the hidden entrance.
Arana and I must enter Bthar-Zel to look for the Arkthzand Keystone while Verandis and Gwendis search another section of the ruin.
We located the entrance to Bthar-Zel, but it appears to be locked behind some sort of elaborate lock. I must solve this puzzle to enter the Dwarven ruin.
We entered the Dwarven ruin of Bthar-Zel. Verandis and Gwendis went off to search on their own. Now Arana and I need to see if these ruins really contain the Arkthzand Keystone.
Fialyn wants to burn all traces of the plant. We also need to destroy support pillars to secure the mine and make sure the Gray Host can no longer use it to farm the plant.
The plants are destroyed and the mine has been damaged enough to make it unusable by the Gray Host. I should return to Karthwasten so the shaman can complete the ritual of restoration for the wards.
I should speak with Shaman Ulvoch and tell him that it should be safe to perform the restoration ritual now.
As before, Shaman Ulvoch asked me to present myself at a pyre during the ritual. Hopefully now that Apprentice Fialyn and I destroyed the corrupted plants, the ritual will be successful.
It seems the restoration ritual was a success. I should talk to <<1>>.
I should continue my search for the Arkthzand Keystone in Bthar-Zel.
Verandis and Gwendis encountered Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain. Unfortunately, I'm too far away to intervene. I should watch to see what happens.
We exited Bthar-Zel, but Lady Belain wound up with the Arkthzand Keystone. I should talk to Arana and see what she thinks we should do now.
Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain snatched the keystone away from Verandis and Gwendis, which triggered some sort of alarm. Now I must fight an enormous Dwarven automaton to escape Bthar-Zel.
Gwendis found a way into the Gray Host hideout. I should follow her.
Gwendis and I need to search for clues inside Viridian Watch about the Gray Host survivor.

Gwendis found strange sigils that can only be seen by vampires and werewolves in Viridian Watch. This must be a clue to where the rumored survivor found refuge. I should speak to Gwendis about the sigils.
Verandis felt a great pain and says that Rada al-Saran is drawing on the power of the Dark Heart. We have to get to the orrery chamber as fast as we can.
I found Rada al-Saran in the orrery chamber. He seems to be performing the same ritual we just did but on a grander scale. I must try to stop him.
We succeeded in recreating whatever it was Rada al-Saran did here. It seemed to have had a profound impact on Verandis. I should speak to him about what he discovered.
<<1>> led me to <<2>>. I should talk to him and make sure he's all right.
Now that we solved the problem here in Gloomreach, I should speak to Psijic Calis about what happens next.
Psijic Calis asked me to accompany him to investigate the strange plant life inside the cave.
At the entrance to the Dark Halls Verandis conjured an old memory of Rada al-Saran and Lady Belain discussing the Dark Heart. I should talk to Verandis about this latest memory.

Verandis and I have found the passage to the Dark Halls, but the way is blocked by powerful magic. Verandis wants to try to draw a memory from this location with his auramancy. I should watch and see what happens.
We need to transport the relic back to Artaeum before it causes more damage. I should deactivate any of the Dwemer Amplifiers I see.
I need to reactivate the orrery to open the gateway to Rada al-Saran's sanctuary realm.
Psijic Calis identified pockets of tonal disturbance inside the cave. We need to contain these disturbances before they get any worse.

Verandis encouraged me to begin my investigation by speaking with the nearby Reach sentry. She might give me an idea as to what type of information Ard Caddach would consider important enough to meet with us about.
Verandis is wrestling with the Darkstorm, but he hasn't dispelled it. I should speak with him.
The arsonist responsible for destroying the Grand Archive seeks the same book as Eveli. To continue my pursuit, I must eliminate Captain Geminus.
Eveli chased after Pyroturge Encratis to reach the book's location before he does. I should go after them.
With Pyroturge Encratis's death, Eveli has the book she came here to collect. I should speak to her.
I found Pyroturge Encratis. I should kill him before he can remove the book that Eveli pursues.
Eveli asked me to scout ahead in the villa for any trouble. I should enter through the sewer grate and explore the grounds.
In my search through Black Drake Villa I discovered an enormous Minotaur blocking the path. I need to kill Kinras Ironeye to contiunue forward.
I entered the Grand Archive. I should explore it with Eveli to find the book she seeks.
I should talk to Eveli Sharp-Arrow about what she's doing at Black Drake Villa.
I need to complete Black Drake Villa.
I defeated foes in Black Drake Villa.\n\nI should find <<1>> in my alliance's capital city.
<<1>> presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Pyroturge Encratis.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I found Taskmaster Viccia, but there is no sign of Drathas's father. I should kill the Taskmaster to keep searching.
Lyranth caught up to let us know that the captives were taken to a Mehrunes Dagon shrine further ahead. I should move past the Lava Caves to find it.
Lyranth was taken by Baron Zaudrus. I should look for her in the Mehrunes Dagon shrine.
We killed Baron Zaudrus and rescued Drathas's father. I should talk to Lyranth about my promised reward.
The path is blocked by the Molten Guardian. I should kill it to continue ahead.
Lyranth suggested I clear the way so Drathas can continue the search for his family. I should move deeper into the mine.
We found Drathas's uncle in a pit of where other prisoners were being held. I need to kill Oxblood the Depraved so we can continue on.
Before Drathas's uncle died, he told us someone named Baron Zaudrus took the remaining prisoners. We should continue deeper in search of Drathas's father.
I should talk to Lyranth and see what she is doing in The Cauldron.
Lyranth is being held in some sort of prison. I should work with Drathas to free her.
Lyranth has been freed and Baron Zaudrus is performing some sort of ritual. I must stop him.
I need to complete the Cauldron.
I defeated my foes in the Cauldron.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: activate the challenge banner when fighting Baron Zaudrus.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I should speak to Count Verandis and see what kind of information he suggests I seek out.
I stopped the ritual and retrieved the remaining notes. I should claim my reward.
I need to stop the Reach clan's witch matron from performing the dangerous ritual. I should also recover any notes of hers I can find so that the Stonehands can destroy them.
I disrupted the witch matron's ritual and closed the void tears.I should return to Markarth for my reward.
I need to locate the witch matron and put a stop to her activities. I should also close any tears in the area with the charm the Stonehands gave me.
I destroyed the unusual Dwarven construct and verified the rod makes Dwarven spiders docile. I should return to Markarth and claim my reward.
I need to find the cave where the Dwarven construct is and destroy it. I should also use the Dwarven rod on any Dwarven spiders I see to render them docile.
I destroyed the unusual Dwarven construct and the odd beacons it put down. I should return to Markarth and claim my reward.
I need to find this odd Dwarven construct and destroy it. I also need to locate any beacons it put down and destroy them as well.
I destroyed the odd Dwarven construct and collected the scrap it distributed. I should return to Markarth and claim my reward.
I need to find the Dwrarven construct and destroy it. I should also retrieve any scrap it leaves behind.
Lyris and I heard Verandis arguing with Rada al-Saran. We need to reach them in the center of the Darkstorm.
I need to search the Blinds, the caves beneath the Deep Tombs, to find the darkcap mushroom that Freyleth needs to weaken Boss Trenlor and accomplish her plan.
I should find Adusa-daro near the old Dwarven lift and find out more about what she needs help with.
I located Adusa-daro. Now I should talk to her and ask her about Kathad and the Lothid clan.
Lyris and I made it back to the orrery chamber. Gwendis and Fennorian are waiting to welcome us back.

I rescued Medone's clan and punished the Thornroots by burning their briarheart tree. The Hillhunter clan is safe now. I should speak with Medone to learn the fate of her clan before leaving Briar Rock.
I agreed to help Medone by rescuing her people from the Thornroot clan. The survivors of Medone's clan are held in cages in the Briar Rock Ruins. I should free all the captives I can find.
I freed all the captured members of Medone's clan. All that remains for me is to burn down the briarheart tree the Thornroot clan uses for their rituals.
I rescued Medone's people and burned the Thornroot clan's briarheart tree, preventing them from turning more Reachfolk into enslaved briarhearts. I should talk to Medone before I leave the area.
There's nothing more to accomplish here. Arana and I should make our way out of the ruins of Bthar-Zel.
I found Arana. I should see if she's willing to become Ard Caddach's counselor.

Arana agreed to act as Ard Caddach's counselor and will give him her answer herself. She informed me that a friend has travel a very long way to personally thank me for my deeds. I can meet them in a room to the rear of Understone Keep.
I participated in the Old Life ceremony. I should return to <<1>>.
I'm interested in this Old Life ceremony, I should talk to <<1>> for more information.
I should talk to <<1>> to find out where this new Old Life shrine is located.
I need to perform the Old Life remembrance ceremony at an Old Life shrine. <<1>> marked one on my map of <<2>>.
I can perform the Remembrance ceremony at the shrine by writing a message to someone deceased, lighting a candle, and then burning the message in the candle's flame.
I need to go to the Reachwind Ritual Site and meet Lyris Titanborn.
Near the Reachwind Ritual Site, I spotted an Orc rifling through the pockets of a dead Gray Host vampire. I should talk to him and see what he knows about Lyris Titanborn.
An Orc that Lyris saved from a band of Gray Host vampires said she found a letter that directed her to Valthume. I should head there and see if I can catch up with her.
On the way to Valthume, I spotted a Reachfolk taking her frustrations out on another dead Gray Host vampire. I should talk to her and find out if she saw Lyris Titanborn.
A Reachfolk at Valthume said she sent the "blond giant" and the "handsome Redguard" to Hroldan Ring to talk to a vateshran. I should look for Lyris there.
I found Lyris Titanborn at Hroldan Ring. I should talk to her.

Lyris asked me to go to Gloomreach and help Sai Sahan look for the third letter between the vampire leaders of the Gray Host. He thinks it contains clues to a connection between Rada al-Saran, a Reach hero, and Sai's martial tradition.
I found a concealed chamber hidden in the depths of Gloomreach Cavern. I should see what's inside.
Sai Sahan entered the concealed chamber after I recovered the third letter he and Lyris were looking for. I should talk to him.
Lyris thinks she knows what the song is trying to tell us. I should ask her if Sai Sahan knows what he needs to do next to claim his spirit sword.
I examined the strange vegetation. I should speak to Psijic Calis and find out what he thinks is going on here.
Psijic Calis believes he can sense Master Pythis's magic here. I should look around to see if I can find any clues he might have left behind.
It looks like this gathering circle has seen recent use. There's a letter on the table. I should read it.
Chief-of-Chiefs Cannear asked me offer my blessing to Eslyn and Madearn. I should find them in the handfasting cave to the north of Hroldan Ring.
I went to the handfasting cave to offer the couple a blessing, but Eslyn and Madearn weren't there. I should see if I can locate any clues as to where they may have gone.
Eslyn and Madearn left a note for the chief-of-chiefs that suggests they abandoned the handfasting and ran away. I should let Chief-of-Chiefs Cannear know.
Chief-of-Chiefs Cannear asked me to find Eslyn and Madearn and convince them to return to Hroldan Ring. She suggested I search north of Hroldan Ring for them.
I found Eslyn and Madearn. I should speak with them.
Eslyn and Madearn think if they find a way to end the feud between their clans, they won't need to go through with the handfasting. We need to find a vateshran to learn more about the feud's origin.
I found the camp, but the vateshran is nowhere to be seen. The intended couple thinks he's been captured by the Thornroot clan and taken into the nearby ruins. I need to search the ruins to find him.
I found the vateshran tied up in Briar Rock Ruins. I should free him.
Vateshran Barth wants me to guide him out of the Briar Rock Ruins to safety.
Now that I safely escorted the vateshran out of the ruins, I should speak with him.
Vateshran Barth agreed to tell me more about the origin of the Six-Ford and Eagleseer feud. I should meet him back at his camp to speak with him further.
I made it back to the vateshran's camp. I should speak with him about the feud now.
Eslyn and Madearn think they can resolve their clans' feud by repairing an ancient heirloom, the Lover's Coil. I should search the Karthspire Lea for a fragment of it.
I made it to Karthspire Lea. I should look around for a fragment of the Lover's Coil.
I found the fragment of the Lover's Coil just as Madearn appeared at Karthspire Lea. I should speak with him.
Madearn wants me to find Eslyn. I should head to Faolan's Ire where she went to search for the other fragment of the Lover's Coil.
I found Eslyn, but she needs help recovering the Lover's Coil fragment at Faolan's Ire. It's currently inside a Giant's camp. I should see if I can retrieve it.
I retreived the Lover's Coil fragment from the Giant camp. I should let Eslyn know.
I should meet Eslyn, Madearn, and Vateshran Barth near Hroldan Ring.
Now that Chief-of-Chiefs Cannear knows the story of the Lover's Coil, I should speak with her and inform her of Eslyn and Madearn's plan to end the feud in lieu of the handfasting.
I decided to support Eslyn and Madearn and not force them to go along with the handfasting, despite objections from Chief-of-Chiefs Cannear. I should speak to Eslyn and Madearn about my decision.
I should watch Eslyn and Madearn present the restored Lover's Coil to their clans at Hroldan Ring.
The clan chiefs weren't convinced by Eslyn and Madearn's appeal. I should speak with Vateshran Barth about the future of the Six-Ford and Eagleseer clans.
I decided to convince Eslyn and Madearn to go through with the handfasting. I should speak with them about my decision.
I should watch Eslyn and Madearn complete the handfasting rite at Hroldan Ring.
Eslyn and Madearn completed the handfasting rite, ensuring an end to their clans' feud. I should speak with Vateshran Barth about the future of the Six-Fords and Eagleseers.
I should watch Eslyn and Madearn complete the handfasting rite at Hroldan Ring.

Eslyn and Madearn nearly completed their handfasting, but Madearn decided he could not break his vow to Drisene and both clans have resumed their feud. I should speak with Vateshran Barth about the future of the clans.
I located Master Pythis's journal. I should speak to Psijic Calis about what it contains.

We found the third letter, but it didn't provide the details Sai Sahan needs to understand how Faolan Red Eagle helped Rada al-Saran regain his Shehai. I need to go to Red Eagle Redoubt and find a vateshran who may know more of the tale.
At Red Eagle Redoubt, a vateshran noticed me and asked what I seek. I should talk to her.
Lyris and Sai arrived at the redoubt. I should let them know what the vateshran told me.
I need to find the cave beneath the redoubt. Lyris and Sai will meet me after she talks to the vateshran.
Lyris thinks the dense foliage may be hiding the secret we came to this cave to learn. I should burn it away.
Lyris thinks she understands what the ancient song is trying to tell us. I should talk to her.
I found the Undaunted Enclave. There's an Undaunted liaison here. I should speak to her.
I need to perform the Old Life remembrance ceremony at an Old Life shrine. <<1>> marked one on my map of <<2>>.
I located Chieftain Faorin in the tower at Briar Rock. I should talk to him.
Arana performed the ritual, binding the Ravenwatch and her rebels together in the battle against the Gray Host. I should speak with her about what comes next.
I need to perform the Old Life remembrance ceremony at an Old Life shrine. <<1>> marked one on my map of <<2>>.
I need to perform the Old Life remembrance ceremony at an Old Life shrine. <<1>> marked one on my map of <<2>>.
I need to perform the Old Life remembrance ceremony at an Old Life shrine. <<1>> marked one on my map of <<2>>.
I need to perform the Old Life remembrance ceremony at an Old Life shrine. <<1>> marked one on my map of <<2>>.
I can perform the Remembrance ceremony at the shrine by writing a message to someone deceased, lighting a candle, and then burning the message in the candle's flame.
I can perform the Remembrance ceremony at the shrine by writing a message to someone deceased, lighting a candle, and then burning the message in the candle's flame.
I can perform the Remembrance ceremony at the shrine by writing a message to someone deceased, lighting a candle, and then burning the message in the candle's flame.
I can perform the Remembrance ceremony at the shrine by writing a message to someone deceased, lighting a candle, and then burning the message in the candle's flame.
I can perform the Remembrance ceremony at the shrine by writing a message to someone deceased, lighting a candle, and then burning the message in the candle's flame.
I should stand back as Arana performs the ritual.

After waiting for a rescue that didn't come, Falkfyr headed west from the Dwarven door to search for high ground. I should start by searching for any prominent overlooks west of the northern door into Blackreach.
Falkfyr made it safely to a good vantage point, where he left another parchment note. I should read it and see where he went next.

Low on provisions, Falkfyr was forced to venture into the chaurus-infested wilds and make for the river to the north. He needed to find a safe place to refill his canteen. I should search the riverbank for another note.
I found another note from Falkfyr in the shadow of a dwarven platform. I should read it to see where he went next.

Falkfyr found water. He also learned that the chaurus would leave him alone if he was smeared in chaurus ichor. However, he still lacked food, so he headed to the nearby ruins to forage. I should look there next.
I found another of Falkfyr's notes outside the Dwarven ruins. He made it this far, at least. I should read the note and learn what happened next.

Falkfyr failed to find food in the Dwarven ruins, and he was forced to eat Blackreach mushrooms to survive. Luckily, they didn't poison him. Refreshed, he set off for a grove of fungal trees to the south. I should look there for his next note.
Falkfyr left another note in an odd grove of fungal trees. I should see what it says.

Falkfyr's latest note was a jumble of strange words and phrases. Perhaps eating mushrooms affected his mind. The note mentioned something he called the Great Oom off to the south. I may find out more if I head in that direction.
I found yet another note left by Falkfyr. This one lies at the base of one of Blackreach's giant mushrooms. I should read it and see if it offers a clue as to where Falkfyr went next.

Falkfyr's latest note was odd and disturbing. A steady diet of Blackreach mushrooms clearly affected him, but he mentioned a new home to the north â€¦ and treasure. I should see if he left something behind.
I found one last note, an abandoned backpack, and a skeleton, likely Falkfyr's. Hopefully, this last note will offer some insight into the state of his mind at the end.

Falkfyr's last notes were the ravings of a madman. He seemed to believe that he was a spore and that he would grow into an oom. Despite his grim fate, there may be treasure and other spoils left in his pack. I should see what I can find.
Another member of the Order came to Psijic Calis's aid. The two of them safely secured the relic. I should speak to Psijic Calis now that the danger has past.
I need to craft the supplies described in my contract. Once crafted, I should deliver them to <<1>> at the New Life Festival camp.
I gave the crafted supplies to <<1>>. All that remains is to complete our transaction.
I need to craft the supplies described in my contract. Once crafted, I should deliver them to <<1>> at the New Life Festival camp.
I gave the crafted supplies to <<1>>. All that remains is to complete our transaction.
I need to craft the supplies described in my contract. Once crafted, I should deliver them to <<1>> at the New Life Festival camp.
I gave the crafted supplies to <<1>>. All that remains is to complete our transaction.
I need to craft the supplies described in my contract. Once crafted, I should deliver them to <<1>> at the New Life Festival camp.
I gave the crafted supplies to <<1>>. All that remains is to complete our transaction.
I should go to the Reach and look for Count Verandis Ravenwatch.
Ard Caddach asked me to find Arana and see if she's willing to serve as his counselor. She's somewhere in Understone Keep.
Another magical barrier guards the end of the Dark Halls. I should use the intact insignia to dispel it as I did at the entrance to this passage. The Dark Heart must be close.
I removed the keystone's protective wards. Time to take it and go to the orrery chamber in the Library of Arkthzand.
According to the note I found, <<1>> was trying to bring a sacred relic to <<2>> in Markath. I should pick up the relic so I can deliver it there.
I should talk to <<1>> and see if there's a reward for returning the sacred relic.
I found <<1>> in Markarth. I should deliver the sacred relic and tell him <<2>> is dead.
I retrieved the sacred relic. I should take it to the shrine in Markarth and let <<1>> know what happened to his apprentice.
I should read the note next to the body.
According to the note I found, <<1>> stole a sacred relic that was supposed to be delivered to High Shaman Glynroch in Markarth. I should pick up the relic and take it to him.
I should talk to <<1>> and see if there's a reward for returning the sacred relic.
I found <<1>> in Markarth. I should deliver the sacred relic to him and tell him that Apprentice Layren is dead.
I retrieved the sacred relic. I should take it to the shrine in Markarth and let <<1>> know what happened to his apprentice.
I should read the note next to the body.
Angair told me to find his clan mate Caddgarn in Vateshran Hollows if I wish to perform the Rites. I should go there and speak to him.
I should find Caddgarn in the Vateshran Hollows and speak to him about taking the Vateshran's Rites.

According to the note I found, <<1>> stole a relic sacred to the Reachmen from Apprentice Egvarn before he could deliver it to High Shaman Glynroch in Markarth. I should search his pack for the relic.
I should talk to <<1>> and see if there's a reward for returning the stolen relic.
I found <<1>> in Markarth. I should deliver the stolen relic and tell him know Apprentice Egvarn is dead.
I recovered the stolen relic. I should take it to the shrine in Markarth and let <<1>> know what happened to Apprentice Egvarn.
I should read the note next to the body.
Words are carved into stone pillars in the cave. I need to clear more of the foliage so Sai and Lyris can read the next verse of the song.
Words are carved into stone pillars in the cave. I need to clear more of the foliage so Sai and Lyris can read the next verse of the song.
There should be one final verse to the song in the cave. I should burn the dense foliage to reveal it.
Lyris and Sai arrived at the cave. I should talk to Lyris.
I gathered the Dwarven scrap. I should return to Markarth and deliver it to Ardanir.
I should travel to Bthardamz and gather Dwarven scrap for the Wayward Guardians.
I need to travel to Bthar-Zel to gather enchanted silver ore for the Wayward Guardians.
I gathered enchanted silver ore from Brhar-Zel. I should return to Markarth and deliver it to Ardanir and the Wayward Guardians.
I need travel to the Library of Arkthzand in Blackreach and gather gemstones from the Dwarven constructs that patrol the grounds.
I gathered the gemstones for Ardanir and the Wayward Guardians. I should return to Markarth and deliver them.
I need to descend into Nchuand-Zel and gather Gray Host sigils by defeating Gray Host forces.
I gathered the Gray Host sigils. I should return to Markarth and deliver them to Ardanir to show him I was successful.
Ardanir asked me to travel to Nighthollow Keep and find scrolls dealing with Nighthollow magic and the tome that will help translate their ancient language.
I gathered the Nighthollow scrolls and a tome from Nighthollow Keep. I should return to Markarth and deliver them to Ardanir.
I need to travel to the Shrine of Lorkh at the Lost Valley Redoubt and use the water from the Karth to cleanse the site.
I cleansed the Shrine of Lorkh in the Lost Valley Redoubt with the pure water of the Karth. I should return to Markarth and let Ardanir know it's done.

Ardanir asked me to descend into the Arkthzand Cavern and rescue Reach exiles that have been captured by the blind creatures that live down there. According to a scout, the camp is near an underground river.
I rescued two of the missing exiles, and retrieved a necklace from a third exile who was already dead. I should return to Markarth and let Ardanir know.
This area seems to be some sort of containment chamber. A shade is imprisoned within a strange apparatus at the center. I should take a closer look.
I arrived in Understone Keep. Now, I should speak with Sentry Bodfe. Hopefully she'll give me permission to speak with Ard Caddach.
Verandis returned to Understone Keep. I should speak to him. Perhaps he learned something more from his study of the orrery.
Nathari told me that there are more Ghostsong clan members below, ready to be sacrificed to awaken the Dark Heart. I should talk to Arana.
Lyris asked me to meet them outside the cave. She wants to discuss what we learned with Sai in private.
I asked Eslyn and Madearn what more they know about the feud between their clans. I should listen to what they have to say.
Verandis wishes to speak with me outside the Bthar-Zel ruins in Blackreach. He believes he knows where Lady Belain and Rada al-Saran took the Arkthzand Keystone.
Arana wants to talk to me at Rebel's Retreat. She may have information concerning the dark prophecy that Lady Belain talked about at the Library of Arkthzand.
I need to return to Understone Keep in Markarth and talk to Verandis.
I should tell Ard Caddach about all that I discovered. Hopefully, we'll find out where he stands on the coming conflict with the Gray Host.
I retrieved the Symbol of Uricanbeg from the minotaur's lair. I should deliver it to High Shaman Glynroch at the Shrine of the Hunt-Father in Markarth.
I need to go to Lost Valley Redoubt and find Apprentice Orla and the remaining symbol of Hircine.
I found Appentrice Orla, but it looks like she's been wounded. I should talk to her and see if she found the Symbol of Uricanbeg.

Apprentice Orla was injured trying to reclaim the Symbol of Uricanbeg. She asked my help to retrieve it, but warned me that a powerful minotaur guards it at the tower on the rise. I should fight or sneak my way past to find the sacred relic.
We used the shard to navigate the void portals to the upper terraces of the library. Now to see if the door on this level can be opened so we can get inside.
I arrived in the Announcement Hall. Arana wants to speak with me before the rulers of Skyrim make their announcement.
Rada al-Saran vanished after using the orrery. I should speak to Verandis about what happened.
Lyris and I have discovered that Verandis resurrected the lost souls of Markarth, returning the people killed by the Gray Host to life. I should talk to her about this development.
The Dark Heart has awakened and is rising upward, but Rada al-Sraran and Lady Belain have gotten away. I should check on Verandis.
Verandis has more he wishes to share with me. I should speak to him in Understone Keep.
I have rescued all the members of Medone's clan I could find outside. They told me that their chieftain Faorin is imprisoned within the tower, I should find him.
The ancient orrery is still operating at full power. Verandis told me to run to the far platform and throw the switch. It will take all of us to stop the machine.
To complete the Vateshran's Rites, I must clear the three wings that each represent a Daedric Prince, what the Reachfolk refer to as the great spirits. Once I defeat every enemy, I may move on.
I overcame the challenges of the Vateshran's Rites. I should talk to the Rites Matron to receive my reward.
I completed the three wings of Vateshran Hollows. I must now enter the Champion's Circle and complete the final challenge.
Nolovan provided me with a map that may lead us to the keystone. Now I should exit the scrap house and find Verandis.
I should go to the shrine at Glenbridge and find Lady Clarisse Laurent.
Lady Laurent asked me to meet her at the hut near the Glenbridge shrine so she could show me what happened to her manservant, Stibbons.
I should talk to Lady Laurent about the curse that has affected her manservant, Stibbons.
One of the Stibbons duplicates is missing. Lady Laurent wants me to track it down and return it to the hut while she keeps the other duplicates contained.
I located the missing Stibbons duplicate, but it exploded into so much goo. I should return to the hut and let Lady Laurent know what happened.
Lady Laurent wants me to talk to the shrine's priest and see if she knows how to break the curse that created duplicates of the manservant, Stibbons.
I need to meet Lady Laurent in the xanmeer near the Glenbridge shrine.
Now that we're inside the xanmeer, I should talk to Lady Laurent and see how she thinks we should proceed.
To open the door, I need to command a Stibbons duplicate to move to and stand on the floor plate in the alcove. Simple commands work best, such as "follow" and "stay."
The floor plate seems to have done something, but it didn't open the door that Lady Laurent expected it to. I should talk to her and see how she wants to proceed.

Lady Laurent has sent me with a Stibbons duplicate to find a way to open the main doors. She expects I'll need to use the duplicate to activate another floor plate switch. I should look for the blue fire and make sure Stibbons follows me.
I activated a number of floor plates and an ancient switch in the south wing. I should return to the first hall and see if that opened the main doors.
Lady Laurent wants me to explore the north wing and find more floor plates for the Stibbons duplicates to stand on. I should look for the blue fire and make sure Stibbons follows me.
I activated a number of floor plates and an ancient switch in the north wing. I should return to the first hall and see if that opened the main doors.
I returned to the first hall. I should talk to Lady Laurent.
Stibbons is trapped inside the sorcerous voriplasm. I need to find a way to take down the shield and get him out of there.
I rescued Stibbons and broke the curse. The sorcerous voriplasm is destroyed. Now I should return to the first hall with Lady Laurent and her manservant.
Stibbons is free and the sorcerer has been destroyed. I should speak to Lady Laurent in the Glenbridge Xanmeer.
Lady Laurent and I need to make our way to the sorcerer's chamber to save Stibbons and undo the curse.
The messenger delivered a letter from his mysterious patron. He referred to her only as the Dread Lady. I should read the letter and see what this Dread Lady wants with me.
I arrived at the location marked on my map. I should enter the delve and see if I can find Lyranth somewhere inside.
I came upon the Dremora known as Lyranth, who appears to have been trying to get information out of a Daedric cultist. I should talk to her and find out what this is all about.
Lyranth wants me to explore the annex, deal with any additional protective wards I may find, and loot any caches inside the complex.
I removed the protective wards on the Imperial caches and discovered three intriguing items: a map, a schematic, and a sealed scroll. I should take them back to Lyranth and show her what I found.

Lyranth opened a portal that should get me close to the location marked on the Grahtwood map, the Ayleid ruin called Ne Salas. While she tries to unravel the mystery of the Emperor's scroll, I should investigate the ruin.
Eveli Sharp-Arrow suggested I look for the Imperial cache and clear a path while she escorts the Wood Elves she's been helping to safety.
This annex appears much larger than the one we found in the other ruin. Plus, it's crawling with Daedric cultists! I should look around and try to find a way to the Imperial cache.
Somehow Eveli was able to break the ward even after the amulet failed. Lyranth arrived, but she wants me to see what's inside the cache before I talk to her. I should search it.
Now that I'm close to Elden Root, I should find the camp where Eveli said we could meet her contact.
Now that Beragon has deciphered the coded scroll, I should discuss the contents of it with Eveli.

The letter claims to be from a Dremora who calls herself Lyranth. Says she needs my help. That the fate of the world depends on it. When I read the letter, it magically marked a location on my map. I should travel to this location and find Lyranth.

The letter claims to be from a Dremora who calls herself Lyranth. Says she needs my help. That the fate of the world depends on it. When I read the letter, it magically marked a location on my map. I should travel to this location and find Lyranth.

The letter claims to be from a Dremora who calls herself Lyranth. Says she needs my help. That the fate of the world depends on it. When I read the letter, it magically marked a location on my map. I should travel to this location and find Lyranth.
We defeated Vandacia and the Waking Flame, and we stopped Mehrunes Dagon from claiming a portion of Blackwood for the Deadlands. I should talk to Eveli about what comes next.
I should discuss plans with Eveli before I go inform the Ambitions.
Before I head out to gather allies to defend Fort Redmane, I need to tell Sombren and the twins about our plans.
I need to go to Leyawiin and see if Captain Rian is willing to send the Ivory Brigade to help defend Fort Redmane. In addition, if I know anyone else who can help, I should attempt to recruit them.
Recruit Commander Axius
Recruit Brigadine Lieutenant Viria
Recruit the Three Winds
I gathered allies from other parts of Blackwood. Time to speak to Eveli and see how our defense of Fort Redmane is shaping up.
It seems we're ready to defend Fort Redmane and protect the Ambitions. I should report to Governor Keshu and see where she wants me for the coming battle.
Governor Keshu asked me to guard the Ambitions and serve as the fort's last line of defense. I should head inside before Vandacia and his cultists arrive.
As I entered the fort, Captain Rian and Eveli began discussing the current situation. I should listen in.
Vandacia's forces are opening portals to assault the courtyard, as expected. I need to support Captain Rian and the Ivory Brigade while Eveli escorts the Ambitions to the guardhouse.
Now that the courtyard is secure, I should join Eveli and the Ambitions at the guardhouse.
Vandacia's forces have infiltrated the guardhouse! I must help Eveli defeat the invaders. But where are the Ambitions?
Eveli and I cleared the guardhouse, but the Ambitions ran to the west. I should try to find them.
I need to find Sombren and the twins. They ran west, deeper into the guardhouse. I should follow after them.
I found the Ambitions in the inner bailey. I need to defend Sombren and the twins from any attack.
I need to defend Sombren and the twins from Vandacia's forces as we make our way through the inner bailey.
Vandacia killed Destron and used the released energy to begin to merge Fort Redmane with the Deadlands. Sombren and Calia fled into the fort's keep. I should follow them.
I followed Sombren and Calia into the keep, but it's already occupied by Vandacia's forces. We'll need to deal with them before we can proceed.
Sombren thinks he can use Eveli's book to stop Vandacia and Mehrunes Dagon. He needs me to find Vandacia and keep him busy until he's ready. We think Vandacia went to the courtyard.
We found Vandacia in the courtyard of Fort Redmane, along with his master, Mehrunes Dagon. I need to keep him busy until Sombren can drain his energy and we can actually defeat him.
We defeated Vandacia and the realms are separating once more. I should listen to what Mehrunes Dagon has to say before he is pulled back into the Deadlands.
We defeated Vandacia and saved Fort Redmane. I should follow Sombren and Calia outside, though I might want to talk to Eveli and Elam before I go.
Now that the battle is over, I should check on Sombren and Calia.
I made sure Sombren and Calia were all right. Now I should check in with Eveli and report to Governor Keshu.
The remaining councilors have gathered in Leyawiin Castle for their own protection. I should ask Councilor Lovidicus about the coded documents Eveli and I recovered from Councilor Jirich and Sophus.
Councilor Lovidicus suggested Eveli and I speak with Keshu the Black Fin in Gideon. She may know what natural landmark the term ojel-bak refers to. I should tell Eveli what we need to do.

We learned more about the origin and purpose of the Ambitions, even if we didn't get the twins the training they needed to control their power. The danger is momentarily diverted due to whatever Xynaa did to them. I should report to Governor Keshu.
Councilor Jirich was attacked and she died shortly after I found her. But Eveli Sharp-Arrow has arrived. I should talk to her.
In her rage and grief, Calia just wiped out the cultists! She's close to losing control, but at least Eveli has caught up to us. Sombren's trying to calm her down. I should listen.
Elam Drals of the Dark Brotherhood thinks the owner of Amnis Manor is in league with Vandacia. I should enter the manor and look around.
We found three of the Ambitions. I should meet Eveli at the governor's mansion and discuss our next steps.
I should return to the village and talk to Nuxul.
I agreed to investigate the feud between the Imperial soldiers and the Argonian tribe as a neutral party. I need to speak to the Imperial prisoner and find out what he knows.
I should speak with Heem-Jas now that things are resolved.
The invitation said I could speak to <<1>> to have an official bout with King Boar, but it also suggested I could just show up an participate. I should head to Hammerdeath Arena either way.
I defeated King Boar in the arena. I should see <<1>> for my reward.
I agreed to help search for the Golden Anvil. I should enter Zenithar's Abbey.
Arbitrator Gavos Douar is finally freed from his wrongful imprisonment and the Golden Anvil rediscovered by the Resolutes of Zenithar. I should speak to Daluion about what comes next.
I spoke with the Imperial lieutenant. Now Olik wishes to speak to me.
Heem-Jas and I need to pick up the investigation where the Imperial lieutenant left off. Hopefully, we can find clues and determine what's actually going on here.
We found a large spill of ritual dye. It looks as though someone ran through the spill. We should follow the footprints to see if they lead us to another clue.
We reached a large totem. Heem-Jas seems worried about something. I should speak with him.
Heem-Jas believes this totem is a lure and the magic of it caused creatures to emerge from the swamp. We need to destroy it.
I tried to destroy the lure, but it didn't work. I should speak to Heem-Jas about what to do next.
Heem-Jas believes that we must speak with Naheesh Nurwul about how to destroy the lures. I need to return to the tribe and speak with her to see what she knows.
I should speak with Naheesh Nurwul about what Heem-Jas and I discovered. She may know how to destroy the lures.

Naheesh Nurwul says we need to enter the xanmeer, Xal Irasotl, in order to destroy the lures. To do so safely, we need the help of the Imperials. I need to speak to Brigadine Lieutenant Viria to see if he will agree to this.
Naheesh Nurwul gave me a ward to open the door to Xal Irasotl. I should head there while Naheesh Nurwul and Brigadine Lieutenant Viria gather their people.
Now that we have access to the xanmeer, we need to explore and find the source of the lures while we wait for Naheesh Nurwul and the Imperials.
Heem-Jas and I found Olik attempting to destroy one of the totems. I should speak to him.
Naheesh Nurwul arrived with Argonian warriors, as well as Imperial soldiers. I should speak with her about our next steps.
Heem-Jas and I need to disable the lures from here while the Imperial soldiers disable them from above.
Heem-Jas and I disabled the lures underground inside the ruins. We need to get back to the others above ground to see if we were successful.
I need to speak to Naheesh Nurwul to see if we were truly successful.
I need to search the manor for any clues connected to Vandacia or the Order of the Waking Flame.
I found a letter, part of an invitation, and an empty wardrobe. I should talk to Eveli and figure out what all this tells us.
Since we don't know where the event is yet or how to get there, we need to follow up on the place where Vandacia may have recently visited. I need to go to the Salvitto Estate near Blackwood Lake.
I arrived at the Salvitto Estate, but the place is crawling with Waking Flame cultists. I need to look around and see if we can figure out where Vandacia is or where his event is taking place.
We caught up to Gracian Salvitto. Now we should speak to him.
I should consult with Eveli and discuss what we learned from Gracian Salvitto.
I need to travel to Leyawiin. Eveli will deal with Salvitto and meet me there.
I arrived in Leyawiin. Now to talk to Eveli and see what we should do next.
I should head to the Leyawiin docks and attempt to board the ship mentioned in the invitation, the Calamity.
I need to find a berth to rest in while the Calamity completes its voyage to the location of Vandacia's special event. Before that, I could talk to the other passengers if I want.
Now that we boarded the Calamity, I should talk to Eveli and see what she thinks of the accommodations.
The ship has arrived at its location. I should find Eveli and talk to her.
It appears that the ship somehow brought us to Mehrunes Dagon's Oblivion plane, the Deadlands. Apparently, Vandacia has a keep here. I need to get inside and see what's going on here.
We made it into Vandacia's keep. I should talk to Eveli and discuss our next move.
We need to search the keep and find out what Vandacia has brought his supporters here to see. If he has captured one of the remaining Ambitions, we need to set them free.
We found a prisoner chained up in the depths of the keep. I should talk to him and find out who he is and why he's here.
I need to get the key to unlock Sombren's chains. It should be somewhere in Kynreeve Dezerog's chamber in the northwestern portion of the keep.
I acquired the key to set Sombren free from his chains. I should get back to him.
The ceremony has already started! We need a diversion to rescue Sombren. I will need to place these reekers around the room and then signal Eveli.
I placed the reekers and Eveli fired her arrows. Now clouds of noxious fumes have sent the nobles into a panic. This is the perfect opportunity to set Sombren free.
Vandacia sent a Dremora to recapture Sombren. I need to defeat this creature while Lyranth opens a portal for us.
Lyranth created a portal to transport us back to Nirn. I should enter the portal.
Lyranth's portal dropped us right outside of Gideon. I should talk to Sombren and make sure he's all right.
Governor Keshu has secured the twins in the Temple of Dibella in Gideon. I should take Sombren there so he can meet them.
I interrurpted Baron Zaudrus's ritual, but he ran off with the lockbox Lyranth seeks. I need to kill him to retrieve it.
While Eveli investigates Councilor Jirich's manor, I need to warn two other councilors, Councilor Sophus and Councilor Faleria, about the threat on their lives.
While Eveli investigates Councilor Jirich's manor, I need to warn two other councilors, Councilor Sophus and Councilor Faleria, about the threat on their lives.
I encountered Councilor Sophus's wife. I should ask her about her husband's whereabouts.
Before I report to Captain Rian or take Sophus's sealed scroll to Councilor Lovidicus, I need to meet Eveli Sharp-Arrow at Councilor Jirich's manor in Leyawiin.
Eveli and I need to go to Leyawiin Castle and speak to Councilor Lovidicus about what we know so far.
Councilor Jirich's records include an order from Emperor Leovic. I should talk to Eveli about this discovery.
Councilor Sophus went out for a walk with his dog Chaero. I should try to find them.
Captain Rian Liore is waiting outside the legate chambers. I should fill him in on what Eveli and I learned.
Councilor Faleria told me that Councilor Jirich kept secret documents in a hidden compartment in her nightstand. I should investigate there.
I found Councilor Sophus's body and another Dark Brotherhood note. I should talk to his wife and see if I can learn anything else about what happened here.
I uncovered several clues about the history of Zenithar's Abbey. I should discuss them with Daluion.
Daluion suggested I check the directory at the bazaar to determine the shops of the three merchant lords mentioned in the documents we recovered.
The directory noted the location of all three merchant lords' shops. I should investigate them for more information regarding the anvil's potential location to see where the trails lead.
I acquired all of the sigil keys needed to open the magically sealed adytum. I just need to unlock it.
Daluion believes we can begin restoring the Golden Anvil through a show of good, honest labor and trade before Zenithar. He asked me to place my hand on the anvil when I'm ready to begin.
We discovered an anvil within the adytum, but it's seen better days. I should take a closer look with Daluion.
Nuxul suggested that I start by speaking to the first Windâ€”Elossi, the Sudden Gust. I should find her in a hut to the south.
We entered Elossi's home and at first it seemed empty. Then she appeared from nowhere and demanded to explain myself. I should speak to Elossi and ask for her help.
I should search for Elossi's daggers. She said they aren't far, but I should be careful during my exploration, as there may be dangers lurking nearby.
Elossi met me out by her cache. I should give her back the weapons I found.
Elossi gave me a vague idea of where to find Meer-Ta, a companion of hers in the Four Winds. I should make my way to speak with him.
I found Meer-Ta in his cavern home. I need to explain what is happening at the village and entreat his help.
Meer-Ta was not receptive, and it doesn't look like he will join the fight. Still, he gave us directions to find Otumi-Ra, the last member of the Winds. I should go find him.
I found Otumi-Ra at his hut. Snoring on the ground. He looks a bit worse for wear. I should try to rouse him if I can.
Otumi-Ra isn't stirring. I should talk to Nuxul and see if he has some idea on what to do next.
Nuxul mentioned a pungent seed that might help wake Otumi-Ra. I should seek them out and collect several to bring back.
Hopefully I gathered enough of the waking seeds for now. I need to return them to Otumi-Ra's hut, where Nuxul is waiting for me.
I should check in with Nuxul to make sure these are the right seeds and that we have enough of them.
Nuxul said that I can just wave these under Otumi-Ra's nose, which should wake him up.
Otumi-Ra is awake and on his feet. Now I need to explain what is happening back in the village.
I followed Otumi-Ra. Now I should talk to him.
Otumi-Ra challenged me to a drinking contest to test my strength. I need to figure out the right order to drink these in, or he won't accompany us into combat.
I completed the challenge. I should check in with Otumi-Ra and ensure he will join the village's cause.
Otumi-Ra asked me to issue a challenge to Meer-Ta by flying his sash on the cliffs above his hut. I should find a good spot so that Meer-Ta can see it.
Now that the banner is placed, I should make my way back to the Stonewastes village and meet with Nuxul and the Winds.
It appears a small army waits to assault the ruins. I should check in with Nuxul to discuss the plan.
It is time to enter Stonewastes Keep, and bring down Warlord Naxhosa.
I should talk to Elossi and see if she needs any help.
Otumi-Ra seeks to knock a large pillar down on a set of siege weapons! He asked me to help him shove the pillar down.
I found Meer-Ta. I should talk to him.
I destroyed the Idol of Xulunaht and rescued Jela's friends. I should speak with Jela.
Jela and I need to enter the xanmeer, Xi-Tsei, to rescue members of her tribe from the Sul-Xan's ritual and to destroy the Idol of Xulunaht.
Jela's friends are safe. I should speak with her about what she wants to do next.
I need to destroy the Sul-Xan's Idol of Xulunaht to keep them from ever using it again.
I destroyed the Idol of Xulunaht. I should meet Jela outside.
Meer-Ta has joined the fight. He found a group of enchanted weapons that must have been used to kill Satul-Sa. He asked me to find a Binding Word, so that he can undo the enchantment.
I found the Binding Word. I should return it to Meer-Ta.

With the siege weapons destroyed, the prisoners freed, his weapons disenchanted, and his army under assault, Naxhosa's grip on the keep is about to break. I should destroy his war banner at the top of the keep to signal his fall to his followers.
I defeated Naxhosa. I should return to the village and meet with my allies.
I found Councilor Lovidicus in Leyawiin Castle. I should speak with him.
While Councilor Lovidicus sends for a scribe to decipher the Imperial code in the documents I gathered, he asked me to travel to Fort Blueblood and convince Councilor Abor to return to Leyawiin.
I should present myself to the Fort Blueblood commander before I attempt to locate Councilor Abor.
We entered the watchtower and found Councilor Abor dead. Murdered! I should look around and see if I can figure out what happened here.
I should discuss the clues we found in the watchtower with Eveli Sharp-Arrow.
A Borderwatch scout told me that I should talk to Commander Axius, commander of the garrison, to learn more about the situation.
First, I need to infiltrate Borderwatch. Commander Axius recommended doing so via a sewer drain in the wilderness near the fortress.
I infiltrated the sewers below Borderwatch. I should work my way up to the keep.
I heard a voice cry out in the sewers below Borderwatch. I should investigate it.
I found one of the infiltrators that was sent into Borderwatch to rescue the hostages before I arrived. I should speak with her.
Erilthel asked me to help her find Seeks-the-Dark, who lured the Painted Eye away while she was told to escape. We should search the sewers for him.
I found Seeks-the-Dark locked up. I should talk to Seeks-the-Dark about what happened while Erilthel works on freeing him.
Seeks asked me to work to free the hostages while he acts as a distraction and Erilthel guides them through the sewer. Seeks suggested a group was taken to the southwest guard tower of the fortress.
One of the hostages at the southeast guard tower, Calixto Tunifus, has something to tell me. I should see what he knows.
I learned that the Painted Eye is holding a group of hostages in Borderwatch's smithy. I should find and save them.
One of the hostages at the smithy, Shanil-Tee, wants to talk about the Painted Eye. I should see what she knows.
I learned that the Painted Eye is holding a group of hostages in Borderwatch's stables. I should find and save them.
One of the hostages at the stables, Otten, is practically clinging to me in fear. I should talk him down and see if he knows of anyone else still held captive.
Otten is too terrified to escape without help and asked me to escort him to safety. I should lead his group to the sewer.
Seeks-the-Dark approached our group as we made it to the sewer. I should see what he wants.

After informing Seeks that the Painted Eye still have an Ayleid scholar as a prisoner, Seeks admitted that the Thieves Guild sent him for an Ayleid relic. He suspects that's why the Painted Eye is here as well. Seeks asked me to free the scholar.
The Painted Eye is attempting to seize a powerful and dangerous Ayleid artifact hidden beneath Borderwatch's chapel. I need to get the key to unlock the crypt, which is in the commander's quarters.
I have the key to the crypt. With it, Seeks and I may be able to beat the Painted Eye to the Ayleid relic hidden beneath Borderwatch.
The Painted Eye has already made it to the Ayleid ruin beneath Borderwatch. I need to catch up with them.
Seeks-the-Dark and I have found the Painted Eye's leader attempting to claim the dangerous relic in the Ayleid ruin. We have to find a way to stop her.
We stopped the Painted Eye from claiming the relic, but the catastrophic end of the ritual triggered a cave-in. I need to escape the ruin before it collapses.
I should inform Commander Axius that the situation at Borderwatch has been dealt with.
Search For Clues
Seeks-the-Dark, Erilthel, and I have made it out of the Ayleid ruin beneath Borderwatch. I should talk to them about what happens next.
Bastian said that the Dark Elf who knocked him out dropped something by the nearby shack. Maybe there's a clue here. I should look around for it.
I rescued Quistley Silvelle from Deepscorn Hollow, but what to do with him? Bastian says he has an idea that should satisfy Larz-Tul. He's going to strike a deal with Tenarei.
Lyranth departed, certain that this mystery concerning Leovic's secret and the Ambitions of Mehrunes Dagon has just begun. I should talk to Eveli and see what she thinks about all this.

I found a contract between Tenarei Vels and a criminal in Leyawiin. It appears that Bastian's assailant is also looking for Quistley Silvelle in Deepscorn Hollow. I should talk to Bastian about the contract I found.
At first glance, this appears to be a deserted cavern. There's no sign of Tenarei Vels or Quistley Silvelle, so there must be more to this place. I should look around more.
I agreed to help Bastian retrieve Quistley Silvelle, but it appears that the Dark Elf Tenarei Vels is also looking for him. This should be interesting. Time to go down into Deepscorn Hollow.
The invitation says we need formal attire to attend this mysterious event. Eveli suggested we visit Percius Loche, the tailor here in Leyawiin.
