I freed Privette from the pen and she fled Breakwater Cave with Moric. I should meet them outside.
I found Moric and Privette safely outside Breakwater Cave. I should talk to Moric about my payment.
We defeated Valkynaz Nokvroz, rescued the Anchorite, and ended the threat of the cataclysts and the Incarnates. I should speak with Lyranth and let her know what happened in the volcano.
I should go to the docks in Gonfalon Bay and talk to Lady Arabelle Davaux.
Lady Arabelle asked me to investigate the inn, the lighthouse, and the shallows to see if I can find any information regarding the missing ships and their cargo.
I should go to Death's Valor Keep to see if the grave robber's story is true.
Now that Sir Nathain's skull is stowed away safely, I should head into Death's Valor Keep.
The altars Sir Nathain asked me to pray at are somewhere in this keep. It shouldn't take too long to find all of them.
I recovered every item Sir Nathain hid while he was alive. Now I need to bury them back at the graveyard outside the keep. I should make my way there.
We safely came ashore no worse for wear. I should speak to Louna to receive the reward she promised.
I need to meet Jakarn at Sareloth Grotto so we can track down the stolen medallions.
I learned that a mysterious band of rogue knights doused the lighthouse flame and recruited salvagers to watch for shipwreck survivors. I should report my findings to Lady Arabelle.
Lady Arabelle asked me to track down Guild General Quentyn and Guild Magister Valessea. They went to visit a local druid named Ryvana.
I found Druid Ryvana, but there's no sign of the guild delegates. I should speak with her.
Druid Ryvana told me General Quentyn and Magister Valessea ventured to the southwest in search of rogue knights that have been robbing travelers. I should find them.
I found Guild Magister Valessea hiding in the woods. I should speak to her and find out what happened.
Valessea told me the Ascendant Order captured Guild General Quentyn, but she might have a way to track them. I need to meet Valessea back at Druid Ryvana's hut.
I should speak to Valessea about finding out where the rogue knights took Guild General Quentyn.
Valessea scried the location of a medallion Guild General Quentyn wore. But before we follow Quentyn's trail, we need to report back to Lady Arabelle.
Valessea's scrying spell indicated Guild General Quentyn was taken to the old crypts under Abhain Chapel in the northeast part of High Isle. I need to meet the others there.
We entered the crypts beneath the abandoned Abhain Chapel. I should search for signs of Guild General Quentyn or the Ascendant Order.
We found some Ascendant Order propaganda, but no sign of Guild General Quentyn yet. We should continue searching.
We discovered that the captains of Lady Arabelle's three missing ships are being held in the crypts south of the large burial chamber. We need to find them.
We found the captains, but the Ascendant Order is trying to stop us from rescuing them. I need to defend Lady Arabelle and buy Jakarn time to free the captains from their cell.
While Jakarn gets the captains to safety, Lady Arabelle and I must continue the search for Guild General Quentyn.
We caught a glimpse of Guild General Quentyn speaking with the Ascendant Lord and the Ascendant Magus. It sounds like he's decided to join them but we still need to reach Quentyn.
Guild General Quentyn struck a deal with the Ascendant Magus and turned on us! The Magus ordered him to eliminate Lady Arabelle. I have to stop Quentyn.
We were forced to kill Guild General Quentyn. I should leave the crypts and speak with Lady Arabelle outside.
I should talk to Lady Arabelle about what we learned in the crypts and what we should do next.
Lady Arabelle told me to meet her at Mandrake Manor, her townhouse in Gonfalon Bay. We need to find out what the captains can tell us about what happened to their ships.
Fasaria said that Zenithar favors those who increase their skills, complete challenging tasks, recover lost antiquities, or make a trade with the local vendors. I should complete one of these tasks.
Lady Arabelle asked me to speak with Captain Kaleen and get her account of what happened to the alliance vessels.
Now that I arrived back at camp, I should speak with Lady Arabelle.
To complete the Albatross trial, we need to enter the castle catacombs. I should talk to Isobel about what to do.
We set out to complete the Oaken Order trial, to find the elder wizard and retrieve his staff. I should find Isobel at a wayshrine to the east of the castle.
I met Isobel on the road. Perhaps she knows more about what we face up ahead in our quest to complete the Oaken Order trial.
For the Order of the Albatross, we need to retrieve a legendary lute, said to be lost in the catacombs beneath the Castle. I should meet Isobel in the chapel. The door to the catacombs is there.
To win the Tourney, Isobel will need to complete three trials, corresponding to the three knightly orders of the Sapphire Coast. I should ask her about the trials before us.
We need to find the wizard Erlibru's home, apparently a family friend of Isobel's. He should be the key to completing the Oaken Order trial.
To complete the Albatross trial, we need to enter the catacombs. Isobel asked me to see if one of Commander Jourvel's aides has an extra key.
To complete the trial of the Iron Knot we need to find the long-lost hilt of the blade Redheart. Isobel suggested we start by researching the Dufort family legacy in the castle library.
I found some information about the first Baron Dufort. I should talk to Isobel. Perhaps it will help us to resolve the Iron Knot trial.
Isobel believes the baron fell wielding Redheart at an old holdfast. We should make our way to the ruin if we're going to resolve the Iron Knot trial.
We successfully completed the trial of the Oaken Order. I should talk to Isobel.
We successfully completed the Order of the Albatross trial. I should talk to Isobel.
We successfully completed the trial of the Iron Knot. I should talk to Isobel.
Isobel and I have completed all three tourney trials. I'll meet Isobel near the tourney pavilion and we can discuss how we are to present the trophies to the three knightly orders.
I need to present Redheart's hilt to Dame Orlfeth the Valiant, the captain of the Iron Knot.
The Gilded Lute must be presented to Sir Melflen Le Fleury of the Order of the Albatross.
The Staff of the Wild Woods is to be presented to Dame Odelia Ambloc of the Oaken Order.
I should speak to Knight Commander Jourvel.
Isobel has more than proven herself in the Sapphire Tournament. I should watch as Knight Commander Jourvel bestows Isobel's knighthood.

Isobel won the Sapphire Tourney at Castle Navire and freed her friend Aurelia Jourvel from a difficult situation. Isobel is now a full knight and wants to broaden her experience with travel and adventure before settling into any knightly order.
I met a chatty noble who told me about a brewing scandal involving the knight commander's daughter. Sounds like she has a friend looking to help her out. I should seek her out at Castle Navire.
Lady Arabelle asked me to give the Mages Guild medallion to Arch-Magister Delric. He just arrived at the camp.
Ilyes asked me to accompany him in Ghost Haven Bay. I should enter the bay.
Ghost Haven Bay is full of smashed ships and scattered debris. I should search for clues that his ancestor was here.
I found some evidence that Ilyes's ancestor likely met her end in Ghost Haven Bay. I should talk to Ilyes about it.
Ilyes says there a supposed to be a huge cavern where ships would hide farther down Ghost Haven Bay. He suspects that's where we'll find his ancestor's treasure. I should head that way.
I entered Ghost Haven Bay's giant cavern. Ilyes suggested surveying the place from a nearby vantage.
A ghostly woman confronted us while we searched a camp in the cavern. She recognized Ilyes's necklace. I should speak to her.
Vanisande Maul revealed the ghosts here are cursed never to truly die. I should search for clues on how to undo the curse in the pirate fleet's lost logs.

The commodore's diary suggests that the deep druid idols and tome would keep him and his fellows immortal if they were protected. I should search for them around Ghost Haven Bay and destroy them to break the curse.
I destroyed all the deep druid idols and the tome. The curse should now be undone. I should speak to Ilyes about it.
I informed Ilyes Maul that the curse has been undone, to he and his ancestor's relief, but it seems to have made the cavern unstable. We should leave before we find ourselves buried.
Ilyes Maul and I made it out of Ghost Haven Bay. I should talk to him about what happened.
I made the baked apples Amminus Varo requested for his offering to prove my worth to Zenthar. I should return to him and see what else is required for the offering.

Titus asked that I locate sensitive documents. If I find any enemy documents among them, I should retrieve them. If I come across any allied documents, I should destroy them. He also wants me to rescue his partner Nari from the Dreadsail pirates.
I dealt with the scattered documents and rescued Nari. I should speak to Titus about it.
When Arch-Magister Delric put the medallion on, a strange magical reaction killed him. I should speak with Valessea about what happened.
Valessea asked me to place the Fighters Guild medallion on the worktable in the camp while she prepares a dispelling powder to nullify the dangerous magic.
Valessea finished preparing the dispelling powder. I should talk to her and find out what she needs me to do.
Valessea says the dispelling powder will counteract the dangerous spell placed on the medallions. I should take the powder from the worktable.
I have the dispelling powder. Now I need to get to Windhelm and find Jakarn at the Palace of Kings.
The other aspirants appear to have failed the Oaken Order trial. We should look closely at the pillars near the magic barrier to avoid the same fate.
I arrived in Windhelm. I need to find Jakarn at the Palace of Kings before he delivers the altered medallion to Jorunn the Skald-King.
I entered the Palace of Kings and a soldier demanded to speak with me. I should ask if she's seen Jakarn.
Isobel asked me to find three items that might help us to bypass the barrier in the Oaken Order trial.

Captain Kaleen told us Dockmaster Arnauld colluded with the Ascendant Order to capture shipwreck survivors at the Shallows. Lady Arabelle wants to go talk to him. I should meet her at his house west of the docks.
Dockmaster Arnauld doesn't seem to be home, but it looks like he left in a hurry. I should look for evidence that might tell us what happened here.

We found evidence that Dockmaster Arnauld was taken by the Ascendant Order. We also found a note that confirms he was paid by the Order to overlook their smuggling and salvaging operations. I should speak to Lady Arabelle.

Lady Arabelle believes that a noble may be funding the Ascendant Order. She wants to speak with Lord Bacaro Volorus at his estate, Steadfast Manor, to see if he knows of anyone who opposed the peace talks. I should meet her there.
I met Lady Arabelle and Lord Bacaro at Steadfast Manor. It sounds like Lord Bacaro is worried about some retainers. I should talk to him and see if I can help.

Two retainers employed by Lord Bacaro and the Society of the Steadfast are missing. With the recent attacks, the Ascendant Order might be involved. I need to look for their wagon on the road south of Steadfast Manor, between there and Castle Navire.
I found the retainers' wagon. It looks like it was attacked. I should search the area and see if I can figure out what happened.
I found one retainer dead beside the wagon, but tracks leading away from the site suggest another may have survived. I should follow the tracks and see if I can find the second retainer.
The tracks appear to lead into a cave by the beach. I should head inside and see if I can locate Lord Bacaro's retainer.
I see bodies ahead. It appears I'm too late to save the retainer, but I might be able to learn something if I search the area.
I should report to Lord Bacaro and tell him what became of his retainers.

The dockmaster's abduction and the attack on the retainers suggest that someone with wealth and power is funding the Ascendant Order. Lady Arabelle believes that might be a noble. By attending a banquet at Castle Navire, we can question a few.
I should speak to Lady Arabelle before I depart to Castle Navire.

I arrived at the banquet at Castle Navire. I should speak with Duchess Elea Dufort, Count Damard Dufort, and Viscount Jonne Mornard. One of them may let slip something that will help us unmask the Ascendant Order leaders.
Jakarn appeared at the banquet, disguised as one of the waiters. It looks like he wants to speak with me.
Jakarn offered to create a distraction so I could search the castle. He asked me to request that the bard perform the song Stagger and Sway at the banquet.
Jakarn distracted the castle guards. I should enter the lower part of the castle while they aren't looking.
I slipped into the lower halls of Castle Navire. According to Jakarn, Duchess Elea keeps materials related to her investigation of the Ascendant Order here. I need to find them.
I found Duchess Elea's notes on the investigation, but it sounds like the castle is under attack! I need to find another way back to the courtyard.
I made my way back to the courtyard. I should look for Lady Arabelle and Lord Bacaro to make sure they're all right.
I found Lady Arabelle and the others. I should speak with her.
Lady Arabelle wants to meet at her home in Gonfalon Bay to discuss our next move.
We examined the barrier blocking our path. I should talk to Isobel about our next step in the Oaken Order trial.
Lady Arabelle has a friend who can transport us to Amenos. We're going to speak to Captain Basrush, who sails aboard a prison transport ship from the Dufort Docks.
I should speak to Lady Arabelle in the courtyard behind Mandrake Manor.

Lady Arabelle wants to discover where the Ascendant Order plans to meet. Reports indicate that the Order is active near Mistmouth Cave, on the northern shore of High Isle. She wants me to meet her there to investigate.
Lady Arabelle and I rescued Duchess Elea and returned to Mandrake Manor to inform Lord Bacaro about the impending attack. I should talk to Lady Arabelle about what happens next.
While I was aiding the alliance leaders inside All Flags Castle, it looks like Lady Arabelle and the rest of my allies handled the Ascendant Order forces outside the walls. I should talk to her.
Jakarn told me Lady Arabelle has a plan to rescue the missing royals. I should go to Mandrake Manor and hear her out.
I found the items Isobel asked for. Hopefully they will allow us to bypass the barrier in the Oaken Order trial.
To advance in the Oaken Order trial I should ask the elder Elibru for the Oldwood Staff.
Success! Elibru invited us to pick up the staff, which completes the Oaken Order trial. I should grab it.
Captain Danylva led me to the invitation medallion. I should use the dispelling powder on it.
I dispelled the deadly magic on the invitation medallion. I should let Captain Danylva know it's safe to present to the Skald-King now.
I ran into a High Elf named Lendanor who told me he saw Louna collecting trash. She plans to make a raft and float over to Whalefall. I should search the western shore to find Louna.
Louna persuaded me to join her and rescue her brother. I should take the raft she made and join her at Whalefall.
Louna and I docked safely on Whalefall. It doesn't appear anyone saw us land. We should move inland and search for any clues about Anton's location.

Louna and I found a sign welcoming visitors to Whalefall. Apparently Jailer Mannick runs the game of hunting prisoners. It also lists the names of six important guest hunters. I should discuss this with Louna.
Louna suggested we head north toward the winner's stage mentioned on the welcome sign. We should go farther inland while searching for Anton.
We found Anton tied to a post at the north of the island. I should free him quickly so that we can escape Whalefall.
After leading Louna and Anton safely through the island, I should hurry and meet them at the raft to leave.
Captain Danylva told me Jakarn went to Auridon. I should check the Skywatch docks for him.
I arrived in Skywatch. I need to search for Jakarn.
I found Jakarn. I need to update him on the situation and tell him the medallions are dangerous.
The medallion is on the table nearby. I should use the dispelling powder on it.
Valessea appeared as a projection and seems distressed. I should speak with her and find out what's wrong.

Valessea is unable to contact Lady Arabelle. She discovered that the medallion Lady Arabelle carried is traveling to High King Emeric's retreat, Sword's Rest Isle, and chartered a boat for Jakarn and I to get there. I should head to the docks.
We arrived at Sword's Rest Isle, but there's no one here. Jakarn thinks this is suspicious. We should look around and see if we can determine what's going on.
The blade belonged to the first Baron Dufort. If we're going to complete the Iron Knot trial we need to research his past.
We ran into one of Isobel's competitors in the Tourney, Aspirant Langley. He denied us passage on our quest to complete the Iron Knot trial. I should talk to her about our options.
To complete the Iron Knot trial we have to get around Aspirant Langley. Isobel remembers another path she used to use to climb the rise when she was young.
We found the path on our quest to complete the Iron Knot trial. The tome we read mentioned an old ruin where we should find the hilt to Redheart. Just have to find the ruin, now.
I found the ruin where the old Duke lost his life. Now it's just a matter of finding the sword hilt for Redheart and we can claim victory in the Iron Knot trial.
We found Redheart's hilt! I should follow Isobel away from the tower.

I got the key from one of the knight commander's aides. Time to unlock the catacombs and complete the Albatross trial. Isobel said to meet back at the catacomb door on the lower floor of the Castle Navire Chapel.
The lute, our goal in the Albatross trial, could be anywhere in these catacombs. We should search the area.
It seems that one of Isobel's competitors in the Albatross trial, Aspirant Mortens, has locked himself in a small crypt. I should talk to him.
The aspirant's fear of spiders has him too rattled to continue in the Albatross trial, so we left him his sword while we continued our search for the Gilded Lute.
We found the Gilded Lute of Sir Brenvale for the Order of the Albatross! The bard knight met a tragic end, and now we need to make our escape from this gloomy place.
I should talk to Cynric one last time.
Lady Arabelle wants me to talk to Captain Basrush and convince her to transport Jakarn and I to Amenos without being noticed.
Captain Basrush agreed to take us to Amenos. I should board her ship, the Shackled Guar.
I freed Cynric and he offered his gratitude. I can begin the Trials of Worth to earn Lady Garick's Sacred Shield. I should enter Garick's Rest and start the first trial.
Though Dame Madach lost her life, Sir Rayan and I destroyed the bloodmage's phylactery and survived the spire. I should see how the new knight is doing.
Aspirant Mortens is hiding in a small crypt with the door locked behind him. We need to search for his sword in exchange for the key to get into the oldest parts of the catacombs.
We retrieved Aspirant Mortens' sword. I should speak to him and retrieve the key to the old crypts.
I should head inside the spire and find what awaits us within.
The squire and I need to search the spire to find Dame Madach.
We found Dame Madach. I should talk to her.
Rayan believes the best place to look for bones is the statuary gardens hall, to the northwest. We should make our way there.
Somewhere among the statuary we need to find a usable ancient bone for this mystical weapon.
Somewhere within the prison warrens is an old executioner's stand. Rayan believes a block will work as the head for this unusual hammer.
The waters around the spire must have something to do with turning the bloodmage's power against itself. We need to find the water mill southeast of the tower.
Dame Madach is fighting the bloodmage! I should see if I can lend some assistance.
Rayan, newly knighted by the late Dame Madach, wants to put an end to the bloodmage. I should help him find Bloodmage Cassel's phylactery.
We made it to the bloodmage's inner chambers. I need to use the bone hammer we spent so much time creating to destroy the phylactery.
Sir Rayan and I have destroyed Bloodmage Cassel once and for all. He said he'd be leaving the spire and returning to shore. I should meet him there.
It seems the Ascendant Order is attacking the keep. We need to get inside and stop them.
I entered the keep. I should look for any signs of Lady Arabelle, High King Emeric, or the Ascendant Champion.
I destroyed the corrupted coral and freed Veslyn along with the surviving prisoners. I should return to Sergeant Brusic and see if the escapees made it out of the Coral Cliffs all right.
We arrived on Amenos. Jakarn should be here somewhere. I should look around and try to find him.
I found Jakarn in the Amenos prison stockade. I should talk to him.
We found Lady Arabelle. I should speak with her.
Lady Arabelle has a plan to deal with the mage while I engage with the Ascendant Champion. I need to enter the courtyard and prepare for battle.
Lady Arabelle and Jakarn will deal with the Ascendant Order mage. Now, I need to take on the Ascendant Champion.
We defeated the Ascendant Champion. Now I should talk to Lady Arabelle and make sure she's all right.
Knight Commander Jourvel knighted Dame Isobel Veloise and agreed to grant her boon. She wishes to speak to us in her office.
I entered Garick's Rest to find Amunara ordering some hirelings to start working. She noticed me and asked if I'm another worker. I should talk to her to find out what she wants here.
I should enter the Coral Cliffs to see if I can find out what happened to the Veslyn and her prisoners.
I need to search the Coral Cliffs for any signs of Veslyn or her prisoners.
I found a Sea Elf just inside the Coral Cliffs. She looks frightened. Maybe she'll talk to me and tell me what's going on.
Jakarn wants me to explore the jungle and look for the missing royals. He heard that the Green Serpent gang has placed a bounty and they may have a camp north of the jungle gate.
I located the Green Serpent gang's camp. I should look around and see if anything here points to the location of the missing alliance leaders.

Amunara told me she wants the sacred shield to improve her necromantic abilities. She plans to break down the fortress walls to get around magical wards protecting it. I should hurry to the first trial so I can win the shield.

The druids are using their magic to infuse the pirate's life force into the coral outcroppings. Chyrisnia asked me to destroy the coral and save the survivors. Veslyn, if she's still alive, will be in a cage with the remaining prisoners.

I learned the following things at the Green Serpent camp: One of the alliance leaders has been captured; a map showed where the gang is searching; and a big cat has been giving them trouble on the northeast shore. I should head there.
I found a Senche-raht on the beach. I should talk to her.
I need to go to the locations Druid Audrine marked on my map and help her cleanse the corruption spreading throughout Stonelore Grove.
A nature spirit calling itself the Evergrowth took control of Druid Audrine in order to speak to me. I should listen to what the spirit has to say.
Druid Audrine seems to be herself again. I should talk to her and see what she knows about the Evergrowth.
Druid Audrine asked me to meet her in the village at the center of Stornelore Grove. She wants to tell her druidic circle elders what we discovered.
Druid Audrine is telling the elders of her druidic circle about her encounter with the Evergrowth. I should listen in.

The circle elders didn't seem quite convinced about the claims made by the Evergrowth. Druid Audrine wants me to meet her at the ritual circle right outside the village to determine our next course of action.
I met Druid Audrine at the ritual circle as she requested. Now I should talk to her and see how she wants to proceed.

Druid Audrine wants my help to investigate the Stonelore Grove village and see if we can find proof that one of the circle's druids is responsible for the unbalance causing the corruption. I should look around and ask questions.

Druid Audrine and I discovered evidence that a druid is responsible for the unbalance that has caused the corruption. We need to present our evidence to Archdruid Agathie, who should be in the northern section of the grove.
The druid involved in all this appears to be Archdruid Agathie! She disappeared before we could confront her, but the Evergrowth has once again taken control of Audrine. I should talk to the spirit.

The Evergrowth explained that its darker aspect, the Allwither, is responsible for the corruption. It apparently took control of the archdruid and is using her to spread its decay. The spirit asked us to inform the elders.
The Evergrowth took over Druid Audrine again. I should speak to it.

The circle elders don't seem happy about it, but they gave Audrine and I permission to enter the Undergrove and do as the Evergrowth requested. I should talk to Druid Audrine before we enter the Undergrove.
Druid Audrine said that the entrance to the Undergrove is in the northern part of Stonelore Grove. I should find the entrance and head inside.

Several magical wards bind the Evergrowth to the grove. According to the spirit of the grove, we need to destroy these wards so that it can defend itself against the Allwither. We need to find the wards and destroy them.
There's one last ward in place at the Undergrove's central chamber. I need to go there and destroy it.
I made it to the Undergrove's central chamber. I should destroy the final ward and set the nature spirit free.
We freed the Evergrowth and it restored balance to the grove. Now we should return to the village and talk to the circle elders.
I should talk to Druid Audrine and make sure the grove is safe now.
I started the Trial of Perseverance. I must fight my way through a room full of enemies to unlock several doors and make my escape. I should pass this trial so I may continue.
Ember needs my help restoring the protective wards placed around Tor Draioch. The first of which is in the meadow.
With the protective wards reset and working again, I should meet Scout back at Tor Draioch's tower.
I should speak to Ember about everything that happened.
I should speak to Ember about what I learned and also see if she found a way to curtail the motes.
I found Caska on the beach and now we're searching for Queen Ayrenn. If she can pick up the queen's scent, she thinks she can lead me to her.
Caska thinks she found the queen's trail! I should follow her.
Cynric congratulated me on passing the first trial and told me of special tablets that will appear after each trial I pass. I should read this first one.
Now that I read the tablet, I should talk to Cynric.
The second test is the Trial of Wits. Cynric told me I'd find it shortly after going through a cave system. I should head through the cave to find the next trial.
Armin Demalle suggested I start by speaking with Steadfast Manor's afflicted patients and one of the healers. He recommended I talk to Erebil Vules, Milagi, and Mender Teliel to gather information.
I spoke to Mender Senna, one of the healers at the manor. She suggested I find Armin Demalle and ask him about this malady. I can find him at the manor's southern gate.
I went to the manor's southern entrance and found a soldier there. He looks like the person Mender Senna said I should talk to.
I overheard Armin Demalle arguing with someone about access to the manor's dispensary. I should talk to Armin to find out what's going on.
I need to find a way into the dispensary. It's currently locked.
I should look around the dispensary for anything that might shed light on what Mender Roslenn was working on.
I found Mender Roslenn's journal in the manor's dispensary. I should examine it.
Mender Roslenn's notes indicate that the affliction troubling the soldiers could be vampiric in nature. I should tell Armin Demalle what I found.
I found Armin Demalle waiting outside the dispensary. I should speak to him about what I found.
Mender Roslenn's notes make it clear she left the manor to gather harpy feathers. Armin Demalle thinks I should search for her around the nearby harpy nests.
The backpack contained harpy feathers. It seems likely that Mender Roslenn either fled into the cave or was dragged inside. I should search the cave.
We found Queen Ayrenn. I should speak to her.

Before we find High King Emeric and Prince Irnskar, Queen Ayrenn asked me to gather some items she needs for a ritual. She wants to clear the storm so that the rescue ship can reach us more easily. She needs me to find a claw, a feather, and bones.
Queen Ayrenn appeared after I found the last of the items she requires for her ritual. I should speak to her.
Queen Ayrenn marked the location on my map where she last saw High King Emeric. She said she'd catch up after she prepares the items for her ritual to aid with our rescue.
I reached the spot, but there's no sign of High King Emeric. Just some slain Green Serpent gang members. Queen Ayrenn arrived though, so I should talk to her.
While Queen Ayrenn goes to retrieve Caska, she asked me to follow a trail of dead Green Serpents into a nearby cave. I should search the cave for any sign of High King Emeric.
I found High King Emeric. I should speak to him.
I should meet my allies near the old coin fort. It lies to the west of the Coral Cliffs, near the north-center of the island.
I delivered the letter for Adistair, so I should return to him and see if he'll grant my request.
I located my allies near the old coin fort. Caska wants to talk to me about something. I should see what she wants.
High King Emeric agreed to be my prisoner, Now to see if this ruse will get us inside the old coin fort.
High King Emeric will draw out the sentries at the gate. I need to follow his lead.
Now that I'm inside the inner keep, I need to find Prince Irnskar.
I found Prince Irnskar. I should speak to him.
Prince Irnskar heard that the leadership of the Ascendant Order is somewhere inside the fort. We should try to find the Ascendant Lord and the Magus.
The Ascendant Magus is speaking with his superior, the Ascendant Lord. I should listen to what they say.
The Ascendant Order has mustered to attack us. I need to defend Prince Irnskar.
I need to find a way outside so I can signal the ship.
I need to defend Queen Ayrenn while she calms the storm so the ship can safely reach shore.
The signal is lit. Now I need to get down to the shore and find Queen Ayrenn and High King Emeric.
We rescued the alliance leaders and escaped the Green Serpent's lair. Now to board the ship and leave Amenos.
I escaped Amenos and the alliance leaders are safe. Time to return to Mandrake Manor and report in to Lady Arabelle.
Jakarn says that Lady Arabelle has a task for me. I should go to Mandrake Manor and talk to her.

I need to investigate the three sites marked on the map I found at Castle Navireâ€”the Dufort Shipyards, Stonelore Grove, and a cave near Tor Draioch. Jakarn, Captaiin Kaleen, and Valessea will meet me at the sites.
I learned what I could from the locations marked on Duchess Elea's map. I should report back to Lady Arabelle at Mandrake Manor and give her the information.
Lady Arabelle sent me to Shipwreck Shoals to respond to Captain Tsuzo's message that requested help. I should go there and find him.
I reached Shipwreck Shoals. Now to find Captain Tsuzo.
I found Captain Tsuzo. I should speak to him and see what sort of help he needed.
Captains Tsuzo found the wreckage of his ship, Kamal's Bane. His ship was carrying Prince Irnskar of Skyrim. I should search the wreckage for any clues as to what happened to the prince.
I found a survivor among the wreckage. I should speak to her.
Islinne told me that Prince Irnskar saved her from the sinking ship, but he was washed toward the island of Amenos. I have to inform Lady Arabelle.
I need to update Lady Arabelle about what Boatswain Islinne told me at Shipwreck Shoals.
I made it to the Trial of Wits. Cynric said there's a four-part story on tablets in the room that I'll need to use to light four braziers to pass the trial.
We retrieved the Prowler. Now I should speak with Captain Jimila.
I found a vampire imprisoned in the cave. She's asking for help. I should speak with her.
The vampire Seraphyne is a victim of Master Healer Viralaine's mad experiments. She promised to help save Roslenn by giving me her blood if I release her. I should get the vial of blood.
I have the components I need to make the cure. I should create it at the alchemy table nearby.
I created the cure. I should use it on Roslenn to wake her.
The cure worked on Mender Roslenn and woke her up. I should talk to her.
Jakarn said Lady Arabelle wants to see me to discuss what we learned on Amenos. I should meet her at the courtyard behind Mandrake Manor.
Captain Jimila has lost track of her quartermaster, Oblan. They split up to search for the Prowler, but he never returned. I should look for him along the beach.
After speaking with Quartermaster Oblan, I was approached by a Breton named Adwig. I should speak with him.
In order to free Oblan, I should find the items that Adwig asked me to.
Lady Arabelle wants to search Mistmouth Cave. We need to find a clue as to where the Ascendant Order gathering will take place, as well as anything else that speaks to their plans.
Lady Arabelle wants to talk about what we discovered in Mistmouth Cave.

We found clues in Mistmouth Cave that show where the Ascendant Order plans to meet. Lady Arabelle believes the evidence points to the dungeons beneath Castle Navire. I should meet her at the cemetery east of the castle.
I found Lady Arabelle at the entrance to the Navire Dungeons. I should talk to her about our next steps.
Now that the meadow protection ward is restored, I need to find the next protective ward in the glade and restore that one as well.
The last protection ward that needs to be restored is nearby in a cave. I should make haste there.
I passed the Trial of Wits and unlocked the door to exit. I should exit through it.
Since I passed the Trial of Wits, a second tablet has appeared for me to examine. I should read it.
Cynric was magically pulled away after I read the tablet, and it sounds like he's in trouble nearby. I should find him.
Amunara attacked Cynric but vanished before I could help. Cynric looks injured. I should check to see if he's all right.
I made it to the reading room, so it's time to search for the key to the hidden passage. Cynric mentioned he thinks it's under a rug.
I found the key to the hidden passage, I should find the passage now. Cynric said it was on the top level of the gardens.
I found Cynric and the passage. I should enter it to make my way to the third trial.
I made it to the Trial of Constitution and found Cynric. I should talk to him before starting.
I need to unlock and reach the exit door alive to pass the Trial of Constitution.
I need to set the traps around Tor Draioch while she tackles the issue of the livestock.
Lady Arabelle came prepared with Ascendant Order disguises for Jakarn and I. I need to put on the disguise before we try to infiltrate the meeting.
Now to enter the Navire Dungeons and try to find the location of the Ascendant Order meeting.
An Ascendant Order sentry stands guard at the door. I should show him the summons to gain admittance.
The sentry accepted my summons. Now I should go to the Ascendant Order meeting and see what I can learn.
I found the meeting of the Ascendant Order leaders. I should listen to their discussion.
The Ascendant Order knows the alliance leaders are at All Flags Islet! The Ascendant Lord directed the Ascendant Magus to launch an attack. I should follow the Magus.
I found an underground river beneath the Hall of the Order. There are some boats and documents here. I should investigate.
Now that I satisfied his request, I should speak with Adwig.
Now that Oblan is freed, I should speak with Jimila to see how she plans to get the Prowler back.
Jimila and I will go into the hills that overlook the cove to see if we can locate the Prowler within.
What Cynric says is the final tablet appeared now that I passed the the third trial. I should read it before talking to Cynric.
I need to meet Cynric at the Shield Hall. He said I can find it if I just follow the hallways after the third trial. He also said he's certain we'll run into Amunara.
I successfully trapped Amunara using her censer. I should speak to Cynric and recite the pass phrase to drop the wards.
I should meet up with the others to coordinate our plan to retrieve the Prowler.
I recited the pass phrase successfully. Now the wards are down and I can finally enter the Shield Hall.
I should talk to Captain Jimila to find out what she has in store for the plan.

Captain Jimila explained her plan. I should lead Quartermaster Oblan to an overlook so he can get a good view of the Sea Elves's ship. Then when I give the signal, he can loose an arrow and set the ship ablaze.
I should board the Sea Elf flagship.
The next part of the plan entails me placing kindlepitch at various points on the Sea Elf flagship that will help create a diversion. Then I need to find the key to unlock the Prowler.
With the kindlepitch set up on the Sea Elf flagship, I should signal Quartermaster Oblan so he can ignite it with an arrow to create a distraction.
Now that the Prowler is unlocked, I should navigate us out of this cove.
Ember made enchanted traps to lure and trap the errant motes. I should grab the pack of traps to place them around Tor Draioch.
Now that the mote traps are set up, I need to talk to Ember about what else we need to do to get Tor Draioch back to rights.

Ember gave me something called the Spoon of Undo that will turn the animals around Tor Draioch that were affected by the magic back to normal. I also need to use it on Huldressa, who was turned into a guar.
The Ascendant Magus appeared. This is my opportunity to see what he has to say. I should talk to him.
I returned to the camp, and should speak with Meryline.
The Ascendant Magus revealed himself to be Count Damard Dufort, but he also told me that Lady Arabelle is in danger. I must delay my pursuit of him in order to rescue Lady Arabelle!
I found Lady Arabelle. Now that she's safe, I should tell her who the Ascendant Magus is and what his plans are.
Lady Arabelle believes that Count Damard plans to launch his attack from the docks of Castle Navire. I should meet her and Jakarn there before the count sets sail.
Now that I'm aboard the Silver Swan, I need to find Duchess Elea.
I should ask Duchess Elea about what happened and about her brother, Count Damard.
Duchess Elea told me Count Damard gave Steward Hercian a letter, and that the steward left it in the cabin in his rush. I should search the cabin for the letter.
We found Count Damard's letter to Steward Hercian. I should talk to Lady Arabelle about what we learned.
Meryline needs an escort to the camp outside Brokerock Mine. It isn't far, we should make our way there.
I should return the scepter to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I got Rigurt's scepter of office back from the innkeeper. I should give it back to him.
<<1>> can't pay last night's tab by himself. We need to confront <<2>> and <<3>> and ask them to pay their shares of the bill.
Rigurt thinks he might have lost the scepter at the inn where he was drinking last night. I should start there.
<<1>> certainly remembers Rigurt. I should ask her about the missing scepter.
I found Rigurt, <<1>>, and <<2>> at the Ancient Anchor. It sounds like they settled their bill, so I should ask <<3>> about the scepter.
I found a discarded backpack by the entrance to a cave. I should see what's in it.
After walking a short distance, Meryline and I reached the Brokerock Mine Camp. I should speak to Meryline's father, the overseer of the mine.
Meryline's father, Overseer Barthel, asked me to look into a lost supply caravan and see what happened to the guards he sent to escort it to the mine.
We found the missing caravan, but it was attacked and all the guards are dead. Meryline's kneeling in front of the body of a guard, I should talk to her.
Mender Roslenn said she may be able to cure Seraphyne's vampirism. I should talk to Seraphyne and decide what can be done.
I freed Mender Roslenn and Seraphyne from Master Healer Viralaine's secret laboratory. I should return to Steadfast Manor and find Armin Demalle.
Mender Roslenn, Seraphyne, and I confronted Master Healer Viralaine about his horrible experiments. I should talk to Armin Demalle.
Meryline asked me to find some supplies from the caravan while she sings a song to put her friends' spirits to rest.
I collected the supplies. I should talk to Meryline and see if there's anything else we need at this site.
Huldressa and the livestock are back to normal. I should meet back up with Ember inside Tor Draioch's tower.
I should speak to Ember about what we should do next.

Ember needs a book called The Mirrored Way that's locked in Magister Irin's arcane library to finish her counterspell. I need to help her get the book while she deals with any magic protections Magister Irin has in store for us.
I got The Mirrored Way. I should give it to Ember so she can finish her spell.
Ember wants to cast her counterspell at a ritual circle near Tor Draioch. I should meet her there.
Ember needs to cast her counterspell. I need to help her by lighting the ritual fires while she finishes her casting.
The counterspell seems to have worked. Ember wants to return to Tor Draioch and make sure everything returned to normal. I should meet her there.
Ember's teacher, Magister Irin, is back. He wishes to speak with me about what happened.
It sounds like the innkeeper has Rigurt's scepter, but she says he didn't pay his bill last night. I should talk to <<1>>.
We reached the Navire Docks, but there's no sign of the Ascendant Magus. Steward Hercian insists Count Damard is not here and refuses to let us proceed. I should speak with him.
Steward Hercian suddenly retreated. Lady Arabelle thinks we need to reach Duchess Elea's flagship, the Silver Swan, before anything terrible befalls the duchess.

Meryline is heartbroken at the carnage she saw at the caravan site and stayed behind to finish her song for her fallen friends. The mine still needs the supplies in order to fight the Hadolids, I should deliver what I salvaged there.
The notice directed me to talk to <<1>> in the north-central district of Gonfalon Bay for more details.
I should ask <<1>> how I go about signing up for one of these daily jobs.
Overseer Barthel was dragged into the mines by the Hadolid's attacking force. Meryline ran into the mine. I should follow her inside.
I followed Meryline into Brokerock Mine. Overseer Barthel must be in here somewhere. I should look around and see if I can find him.
Talk to Meryline
Meryline heard some voices calling from behind a collapsed tunnel. It looks like we can squeeze through and find out where the sound is coming from.

Meryline refuses to leave the injured guards and prisoners in the mine. She surmised that her song might be able to keep the creatures at bay while I administer aid to the injured. We will need to work quickly.
We found a partially collapsed room with some injured guards and prisoners inside, but Meryline's father isn't with them. I should speak with her and find out what she wants to do.
Meryline says the Hadolids are starting to turn away from this room, I should speak with Yvelle and see if she's feeling better.
Yvelle mentioned that she heard the sounds of someone fighting the Hadolids deeper within the mine. I should go further and see if I can find Overseer Barthel.
Search for Evidence
Search for Evidence
Search for Evidence
Meryline heard her father's voice in the mines and took off for a side room. I should stay close to her and see how he's faring.
Meryline had an idea to place the resonance crystals throughout the mine. We need to get to the lower sections and place the crystals.
Meryline wants to talk to me. Her father just asked me to get rid of the Hadolids inside the mine, I should see what Meryline wants before I leave the supply room.
We beat Marcelle to the extraction point. Now to talk to Valentyn and give him the Daybreak Gem.
Marcelle gave me a rare vintage of Dufort Red to use as a bribe. She says that Jailer Omdil loves the stuff and will let me into the stockade if I present him with the wine.
The jailer I bribed suggested I check the head jailer's office inside the Jailers' Keep if I want to find the status and location of a prisoner. I should head there now.
Now that I'm inside the Jailers' Keep, I need to find the head jailer's office.
Now that I'm in the head jailer's office, I need to find any records that will tell me the location and disposition of prisoner Valentyn Dantaine.
The head jailer's ledger indicates that Valentyn is somewhere in the prison stockade, ready to be processed. I need to find him before they process him and banish him to the jungle.
I haven't found Valentyn in the stockade yet, but another prisoner called me over. I should speak to her. Maybe she can help me find Valentyn.
I stole a valuable locket from the jailer's footlocker. Now to place it in Yvara's bedroll as Garwilith demanded.
I placed the jailer's valuable in Yvara's bedroll as Garwilith asked. Now to talk to her and get her to tell me Valentyn's whereabouts.
Garwilith said she helped Valentyn escape into the caldera. She said he wanted to reach a spot beyond the big tree and near where the waterfall plunges down. I should go find him.
I finally found Valentyn. I should talk to him.

I found Valentyn, but before we head to Marcelle's extraction point, he wants my help finding two keys he needs to open a hidden vault. I agreed to help, so I should head to the west and south portions of the jungle to find the keys.
We now have all three keys necessary to open the vault. Time to use the keys to unlock the hidden door.
Valentyn and I opened the vault using the three keys that belonged to the Systres Sisters. Time to head inside.
We entered the vault. Now to help Valentyn find the Daybreak Gem.

Someone knocked us out and we woke up in a locked chamber. Valentyn's wife, Marcelle, is on the other side of the locked gate, taunting her husband. I should talk to her and find out what's going on here.

Marcelle left us locked in this chamber while she absconds with the vault's treasure. We need to get out of this cell. Valentyn wants me to take his hammer and chisel and use them to find a way out of here.
Valentyn's hammer and chisel allowed me to break open a weak part of the wall. Now to get out of here.
Valentyn and I escaped from the locked chamber. I should talk to him to see how he wants to proceed.
Valentyn never told Marcelle about the Daybreak Gem, so he thinks she would have ignored the large, non-precious stone. He wants to find it and beat Marcelle to the extraction point.

Meryline said she has a plan to deal with the Hadolids. If we place the resonance crystals in their entrance to the mine, then they might hear her song and leave. We just need to find the entrance first.

We found the room that the Hadolids are using to enter into the mine. Meryline is getting ready to play a song to get the Hadolids to leave. I should place the resonance crystals around the room so she can use them to empower her song.
Meryline's performance drove off a number of the Hadolids. She told me to meet her back at the Brokerock Mine Camp.
All the dignitaries have gathered at Gonfalon Palace. I should speak with Lady Arabelle before she addresses the crowd.
I should go to Mandrake Manor and speak to Lady Arabelle about her plan to save the alliance leaders from the Ascendant Order assault.
Lady Arabelle asked me to inform Lord Bacaro about how we defeated the Ascendant Magus at All Flags Islet. I should be able to find him at Steadfast Manor.
I am tasked with laying siege to Dreadsail Reef, and finding and stopping Fleet Queen Taleria.
I defeated Fleet Queen Taleria. I should report this to Admiral Galvendier.
I defeated Fleet Queen Taleria. I should report this to Admiral Galvendier.
I defeated Fleet Queen Taleria. I should report this to Admiral Galvendier.
I am tasked with laying siege to Dreadsail Reef, and finding and stopping Fleet Queen Taleria.
I am tasked with laying siege to Dreadsail Reef, and finding and stopping Fleet Queen Taleria.
I claimed the Fleet Queen's Talisman. I should bring it to Admiral Galvendier.
I claimed the Fleet Queen's Talisman. I should bring it to Admiral Galvendier.
I claimed a Coral Heart from the Fleet Queen. I should bring it to Admiral Galvendier.
I am to board the Lofte Empyrean and report to Purser Ashcroft.
I am on board the Lofte Empyrean and need to report to Purser Ashcroft.
A skiff at High Isle will take me to the Lofte Empyrean.
Jakarn told me that Lady Arabelle needs to see me at Mandrake Manor. I should go check in with her.
I traveled to Steadfast Manor. I should deliver Lady Arabelle's message to Lord Bacaro.

Upon hearing the news that the Ascendant Magus was defeated and the alliance leaders are safe, Lord Bacaro decided to throw a celebration to commemorate our victory. He asked me to inform Lady Arabelle at Mandrake Manor.
I found Lady Arabelle at Mandrake Manor. I should talk to Lady Arabelle about Lord Bacaro's plans.
Lady Arabelle agreed with Lord Bacaro's plan to hold a celebration. She asked me to go speak with the alliance leaders and invite them to the gathering at Gonfalon Palace.
The alliance leaders agreed to attend Lord Bacaro's celebration. I should head to the palace in Gonfalon Bay and report to Lady Arabelle.
The party seems to be getting started, but Jakarn wants to talk to me before I head inside. I should speak to him.
Lady Arabelle wants me to go find Captain Kaleen at the Gonfalon Bay harbor and see if she knows where Nereid's Song might be hidden. We need that ship to reach All Flags Islet.
I rendezvoused with my allies at the cove, and Nereid's Song is docked below us. I should talk to Captain Kaleen and see how she wants to commandeer the vessel.
I cut the mooring lines and the others are aboard Nereid's Song. Now I should get aboard so we can set sail for All Flags Islet.
Nereid's Song reached All Flags Islet without being challenged, just as we hoped. But the Ascendant Order attack on the island is already underway. We need to find a way into All Flags Castle.
We found Valessea and a few wounded sentries in All Flags Castle, but the alliance leaders aren't here. Lady Arabelle wants to talk to me about the situation.
Ascendant Order knights attacked the castle and the alliance leaders scattered. I need to locate the alliance leaders and get them to Memorial Hall where they'll be safe.
I found Queen Ayrenn in the museum of All Flags Castle. She faces a swarm of vulk'esh. I need to help her defeat the creatures.
I helped Queen Ayrenn fight off the vulk'esh burrowing in from underneath the castle. Now I must convince her to seek the protection of Memorial Hall.
Queen Ayrenn told me that Prince Irnskar is fighting on the castle's battlements. I need to find him.
I found Prince Irnskar fighting Ascendant Order knights on the battlements. I should help him defeat them.
I helped Prince Irnskar deal with the Ascendant Order knights on the battlements. I should talk to him now.
Prince Irnskar won't leave the battlements until we defeat the attacking Ascendant Order ships. I need to clear the west dock of enemies so he can utilize the ballista without interference.
The docks of All Flags Castle are clear. I should call for Prince Irnskar to target the Ascendant Order warships with the ballista.
Now that Queen Ayrenn and Prince Irnskar are on their way to Memorial Hall, I should help High King Emeric in the castle's courtyard.
High King Emeric asked me to help defeat the druids feeding power into the storm. I need to disrupt their ritual.
With the help of the alliance leaders, I defeated the Ascendant Magus. Time to see how things stand outside the castle walls.
I found the Daybreak Gem. Now to let Valentyn know and exit the vault.
We made it out of the vault. Now to get to the extraction point before Marcelle so we can escape from the jungle of Amenos.
Ember and I need to go to Skywatch to meet up with an old contact of hers, a baker named Brisha. He might have information about one of Ember's vanished friends.
I found Brisha beside a merchant cart in Skywatch. Ember wants to keep watch, so I should speak with Brisha myself.

We got Jhaka out of Pulk, though clearly his health has suffered. Ember is optimistic that he will recover fully in time. Learning more about the mercenaries Jhaka described may lead to finding the others as well.
Ember and I need to travel to Marbruk in Greenshade to speak with Jhaka.
Ember and I located Jhaka. I should speak with him about his new lead.
We found Silverslip, though she is much changed. Still, Silverslip is the only one who saw a strange glyph that may eventually lead us to Song.
The letter warning Jhaka and Silverslip to be careful investigating came from a merchant named Izbadd. Ember wants to go to Evermore to speak with him and find out what he knows.
Ember spotted Izbadd at the tavern. I should speak with him and figure out what he knows.
We found Song and learned the dark secret of her family and the Emerald Eye. Song is free and Ember has accomplished her long held desire to learn the fate of her friends from her days in Skywatch.
I should talk to Ember about the information Brisha provided.
Brisha said he heard about a Pahmar said to be working at the Gateway Inn in Sadrith Mora. Ember and I need to head there to track down this lead.
I don't see a Pahmar in the immediate area. I should ask around the inn about the tip.
We need to find the jeweler, Varvisi Uleni, and get a bracelet from her if we are to get any information from the owner of the Gateway Inn.
Osithos kept his word, such as it is. He sold Jhaka to bandits, who last he heard, were headed to Pulk. Ember and I need to go there to investigate.
We need to explore Pulk and locate Jhaka. One big Pahmar among bandits should't be hard to find.
Jhaka is obviously weak and ill. I should talk to him to make sure he is well enough to make it out of this place.
Jhaka is determined to be free of the bandits and Pulk and will stick with us as we escort him to safety.
I should talk to Ember about the situation before we head into Pulk.
Now that we're outside of Pulk, I should speak with Jhaka while Ember heals him.
I should enter the Firepot to begin searching for the scoria and for Tarrinore.
We got the bracelet, we should return it to Osithos at the inn.
It seems like Ember has a plan to get the bracelet the inn owner wants. I should talk to her.
Ember wants to turn me into a monkey so I can distract the jeweler. While I do that, Ember will steal the bracelet from her. I need to do this quickly before the spell wears off.
I found Tarrinore and collected all the shed scoria, including the large pile that Tarrinore was excited about. I should meet Vinilsare outside the cave.
Ember got the bracelet from the jeweler. I should talk to her.
Jhaka tracked down a former captain of the mercenary group, Kestrin's Blades. Apparently, he's living in Betnikh now. Ember and I need to go there and question him.
We found Guruz. Now it's time to find out what he knows.
Ember says she can mix up a concoction that will sober up Guruz quickly. We need to search for a sour algae bloom.
I administered a cure for the ailing <<1>> and obtained <<2>>'s release. I should meet them back at the Ancient Anchor Inn.
Ember's tonic worked. Guruz is sober enough to talk. I should ask him about the Skywatch job from years back.

Guruz says that after the mercenaries kidnapped Ember's friends, they gave Silverslip to a group of vampires dwelling in the Shrine of the Black Maw, in Shadowfen. We need to go there to continue our search.
Guruz said that Kestrin's Blades handed a Wood Elf girl over to vampires near Black Maw. Ember and I should go there to search for any sign of her.
Ember noticed Silverslip's journal inside the shrine. I should read it to see if there are any clues inside as to her whereabouts.
Now that we're outside, I should talk to Silverslip about what I read in her journal.
You can search for apples around the festival grounds or trade with other players for them. Grocers in towns also carry apples.
Izbadd asked us to track down an estranged uncle from Song's family to see what he knows about her whereabouts and the Emerald Eye. I should discuss this with Ember before deciding what to do next.

We need to look for Song's estranged uncle, Azamel, in Sentinel. Izbadd's information says that he was ousted from the Emerald Eye's family business, so he might be willing to provide some information.
We found Azamel. Time to see if he'll talk to me about the Emerald Eye and Song.
Azamel whispered to us that we should follow him. He might be nervous about being overheard. Ember and I should follow him so we can speak further.
Azamel led us to an Outlaws Refuge in Sentinel. I should speak with him and find out what he knows.
Azamel gave us a good deal of information about the Emerald Eye and Song. I should discuss these findings with Ember.
We should look around the camp. There may be something here that can point us to Song.
The journal described that the entrance to where the Emerald Eye is keeping Song will be marked by a tomb door different from the others inside the necropolis. We need to find that tomb and enter it.
Ember and I need to destroy the confinement wards erected inside in order to get to Song. I should do this quickly.
The Emerald Eye relic is destroyed and Song's father is gone. I should speak with Song and make sure she is unhurt.
Song needs a moment to collect her thoughts. I should speak with Ember in the meantime.
I found a journal detailing where the Emerald Eye is holding Song. I should discuss this with Ember.
A strange magic related to the Emerald Eye relic dragged Song into another room. We need to get in there and save her.
I found some clues about the source of the ritual that cursed the pirates. I should discuss what to do next with Ilyes Maul.
All that's left is to destroy the deep druid tome that is the source of the commodore's ancient spell. I should go to its altar and burn it.
Aurelia sent the letter from the island of Stros M'Kai. If we're going to figure out who stole the signet ring, we should meet up with her at the Screaming Mermaid inn.
I should speak to Isobel one more time, to get her final thoughts on our adventure.
The commander should be in her offices in the Knight's Wing of the castle. I should find out why she reached out to Isobel.
Aurelia has apparently gone off on some kind of quest. The knight commander is concerned for her safety. The commander suggested we start by searching Nilsmon Booklover's bunk in the castle barracks.
To find out what this is all about, we have to speak to Knight Commander Jourvel at the Ancient Anchor Inn, in Gonfalon Bay.
We found Knight Commander Jourvel at the Ancient Anchor. I should speak to her.
Dame Jourvel has a letter she recently received from Aurelia. I should read it.
It seems everything has turned out for the best. I should speak to Isobel one more time.
Aurelia is upset, in a bad state. I need to chat with her to see what happened.
Aurelia struggled with the thief and managed to slice open his pack. We should attempt to follow his trail by looking out for dropped stolen goods.
The conman made it to the docks. Perhaps someone in the area knows where Kiv was headed.
Kiv Lindres made for the Morrowind port of Seyda Neen, so that's where we're headed too. We should ask around town to see if anyone has seen him.
We met one of Kiv's past associates. She told us he left some belongings inside the tavern. They might contain a clue as to where he's gone.
Julles Laurdon is at at the Temple of the Divines. We should talk to him.
Kiv is in Belkarth, meeting someone named Goldleaf. Hopefully we can corner Kiv and get the ring back from him.
Nilsmon might be somewhere on the docks at Gonfalon Bay. We should see if we can find him there.
We found Nilsmon! Time to see if he's seen Aurelia recently.

According to Nilsmon, Aurelia left Gonfalon Bay with Captain Marso, the merchant captain friend of Isobel's we met on Stros M'Kai. We need to find out where his ship was headed. One of the shipping clerks may know something.
We got the seathorn to Halz and he gave us the stolen wine for Elzugoth. Now to find out where Captain Marso's ship was headed.
Captain Marso and Aurelia were bound for Northsalt Village, in the northern area of Rivenspire. We should follow after them.
We found Captain Marso, who has been injured in a fight with pirates. Aurelia is nowhere to be seen. Let's see what he has to say.

Aurelia was snatched as Captain Marso's first mate tried to escort her to safety. The mate said the pirates put Aurelia in a boat and rowed southeast, along the coast. I should trace the coastline to find her.
Aurelia is unharmed and excited about the information she's found. I should speak to her.
Aurelia has been found, but wants to stay in Rivenspire to continue her investigation. I should see how Isobel wants to go forward.
I should speak to Isobel about what we found in Nilsmon's bunk.
I should see how Isobel feels about the Commander's request.
Her last letter to her mother said that Aurelia was in Fell's Run. Back to Rivenspire we go.
I found Aurelia, alive and well, having an urgent conversation with a friend in the Fell's Run Inn. I should speak with her.
To free Captain Marso, we must brave the dangers of Obsidian Scar. He should be within the dungeon somewhere, held by brigands.
Isobel and I must return to Fell's Run and let Aurelia know we found Marso. The captain should be close behind.
Aurelia's mage friend, Ennic, seems very upset. We should find out why.
Aurelia was dragged off at knifepoint by Vetitia Marcott, the one who received the funds stolen from Veloise Mercantile. They apparently headed north, toward the Orc's Finger ruins.
Aurelia and Marso are safe. I should speak with Isobel about all of this.
Balki was hired to find a map fragment. I should search his backpack to see if he acquired it before he died.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>> on the Dufort Shipyards. I should deliver the map fragment and inform him that <<2>> is dead.
I got the piece of the map mentioned in Balki's instructions. I should take it to the Dufort Shipyards and let <<1>> know what happened.
I should read the note next to Balki's body.
Ferone was hired to find a map fragment. I should search her backpack to see if she acquired it before she died.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>> on the Dufort Shipyards. I should deliver the map fragment and inform him <<2>> is dead.
I got the piece of the map mentioned in Ferone's instructions. I should take it to the Dufort Shipyards and let <<1>> know what happened.
I should read the note next to Ferone's body.
According to the instructions I found, <<1>> was looking for a piece of map for <<2>> at the Dufort Shipyards. I should find the map so I can deliver it there.
I should talk to <<1>>.
I found <<1>> on the Dufort Shipyards. I should deliver the map fragment and inform him <<2>> is dead.
I got the piece of the map. I should take it to Dufort Shipyards and let <<1>> know what happened.
I should read the note next to Rhadh's body.
I was able to dig up a chest at the location the map led me to. I should take it.
I found the lost treasure. I should return to  <<1>>.
I should take the reassembled map to Shipwreck Shoals and attempt to locate where the Scourge of Sentinel's treasure is hidden.
There is a festival for Zenithar, the God of Commerce and Toil, happening in Belkarth. I should talk to Amminus Varo about it.
Maybe the historical plaques in Monument Lighthouse will reveal something that will help Stibbons and I lift the islet's curse. I should read them.
Now that the worst of this is over, I should talk to Stibbons about my payment.

As I left to follow Lady Laurent, the ghost of Janne Emarie flowed into me, but she doesn't seem to mean me any harm. Now that I arrived at the big tree near the center of the islet, I should talk to Lady Laurent.
The ancient sea captain mentioned Port Sargo, which Stibbons tells me is the old dock on the eastern shore of All Flags Islet. I should see if there are any clues concerning this curse there.
Lady Laurent, speaking as some ancient sea captain, said she needed to keep a rendezvous at the big tree. I should follow Lady Laurent and see what happens.

After we examined the historical plaques and determined that the master builder who constructed the All Flags memorial was the ancient sea captain's brother, Tobin Moorcroft, Janne's ghost emerged from me. I should talk to her.
Lady Laurent regained her senses enough to suggest we check the historical plaques inside the lighthouse for some clue as to how to break the curse.
The ghost of Janne Emarie thinks the curse began at the islet's inn. I should head over to Monument Inn and see what I can learn there.
The ghost of Janne Emarie entered the deserted inn. She seems to be caught up in another memory of the past. I should talk to her and see what I can learn.
We found Julles Laurdon in Wayrest. Kiv had him fooled as well. I should check in with Isobel to see what she thinks.
The ancient sea captain mentioned setting sail from Port Sargo. Maybe the plaque at the old dock contains some information about him or his ship. I should examine it.
Lady Laurent arrived, but it appears that the ancient sea captain is back in control of her body. He addressed me as Baron-Admiral Bendu Olo. I should talk to him.
Stibbons says the tools needed to add a name to the plaques are buried in the graveyard. I should search for them there.
Stibbons says this spot looks familiar. I should search here for Tobin Moorcroft's hammer and chisels.
Now that we have the tools, I should go to the Memorial Garden.
We finally got the ancient sea captain to reveal his nameâ€”Captain Renwic Moorcroft! But his brother Tobin seems to have possessed Stibbons. I should talk to him.
Goldleaf was supposed to meet Kiv beneath the Crossroads Tavern in Belkarth. The entrance to the basement is along the side of the building. Finally! We can confront the swindler.
Kiv told us the ring was near a twin spire of rock north of Ogondar's Winery. If he's telling the truth, we should find Isobel's family ring there.
After quite the adventure, we found Isobel's ring. I should speak to her.
I need to place Captain Renwic Moorcroft's name on the memorial plaque to end this curse.
I should talk to Stibbons and see if he thinks the curse is over now.
We added Captain Renwic's name to the memorial and Lady Laurent seems to be back to her old self. I should talk to her.
According to the dock worker, Kiv sailed for Seyda Neen on the island of Vvardenfell. I should speak to Isobel and see what she wants to do now.
It seems that Squire Rayan has an idea. I should follow him and see what he has on his mind.
Based on his poetry and the rum at his bunk, Isobel thinks we should look for Nilsmon at the Ancient Anchor Inn, Gonfalon Bay.

Elzugoth, a shipping clerk, can tell us where Marso's ship was headed, but she wants a favor in return. We need to find some seathorn and bring it to a thief named Halz in exchange for some stolen wine.

I need to find Lady Laurent and see if this curse is as bad as Stibbons has claimed. He says she's become a different person. He says she's been possessed by an ancient sea captain and that I'll find her on the southern shore of the islet.
We found Lady Laurent. I should talk to her.
I arrived at Lady Arabelle's camp. I should speak with her and give her the medallions.
Captain Basrush suggested I dress the part of a prisoner to avoid suspicion. I should put on the disguise.
We reached the mill. Now I just have to get it turning again.
We've found the smithy. We should find the means to complete the weapon inside. Time to head in.
We arrived at the blacksmith's shop. I need to assemble the hammer using one of the workbenches.
Now that I have the hammer assembled, I need to imbue it with the water we siphoned from the bloodmage's heart.
We have the imbued hammer! Now to take it into the tower and confront the bloodmage.
We've entered the tower. Squire Rayan and I need to find Dame Madach.
Dame Madach has been badly wounded. I should speak with her and check on her condition.
Aurelia wants to keep investigating, to figure out what Kiv's scheme here in Rivenspire was about. I should let Isobel know there's been a change in plans.
Captain Marso is a little worse for wear, but alive. We need to get him out of here.
We made our escape from Obsidian Scar. I should talk to Captain Marso.
We found Aurelia. She appears to be unharmed. Time to get her free.
We found Captain Marso in a cage within Obsidian Scar. We need to get him out of here.
Isobel's idea worked, and the barrier is down. We need to search the wizard's home for the Oldwood Staff, or for the wizard himself.
Jakarn told me that Lady Arabelle needs me to help her investigate the Ascendant Order. I should meet her at Mandrake Manor.
High King Emeric thinks we might find a clue as to where they're keeping Prince Irnskar somewhere in this camp. I should look around.
High King Emeric will give me the signal to attack.
I must defeat the Green Serpents at the gate.
Lady Arabelle said she will deliver the invitation medallion to High King Emeric. I need to go to Lady Arabelle's camp in Vvardenfell to talk with her afterward.
Magister Irin didn't seem very upset about the magic that recently plagued Tor Draioch. Ember will probably be relieved, I should speak with her.
I located Quartermaster Oblan, I should speak with him at once.
It seems I passed the Trial of Perseverance. Cynric said I can exit the test through the unlocked door.
All three of the protection wards around Tor Draioch are restored. I should speak to Ember about what to do next.

Ember is worried about the magical motes around Tor Draioch. Apparently, some are becoming malevolent. She's asked me to head to Tor Draioch's tower to search Magister Irin's things for information about the motes themselves.
In order to play Tales of Tribute, I need to speak to the Gonfalon game-baron, Master Razhamad. I can find him in the Gonfalon Gaming Hall.
I should talk to the local game-baron, Master Razhamad.
I should challenge Brahgas to a game of Tribute so I can learn the game's fundamentals. He offered to lend me a deck of cards to play with.
I played my first game of Tales of Tribute and learned the basics. I should return to Master Razhamad and inform him of my success.
Master Razhamad encouraged me to challenge Brahgas to a game of Tribute so I can learn the basics. I'll find him in the beginners lounge of the Gonfalon Gaming Hall.
Now that I'm in the passage, I should head to the Trial of Constitution.
I passed the Trial of Constitution and earned the right to proceed. I should exit now.
Captain Jimila recommended I find the Sea Elf pirates' stash of kindlepitch.
Captain Jimila recommended that I grab a crate of kindlepitch.
I located the Prowler in the cove. Now I should speak with Captain Jimila.
If I want to learn more about the card game, Tales of Tribute, I need to speak to someone named Brahgas in Gonfalon Bay.
The Evergrowth has appeared one final time. I should talk to it.
I should return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I should return to Muranji in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I can find my first challenger in the city of Daggerfall, in Glenumbra.
I can find my first challenger in the city of Skywatch, in Auridon.
I can find my first challenger in the city of Davon's Watch, in Stonefalls.
I can find my second challenger in the city of Shornhelm, in Rivenspire. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my second challenger in the city of Marbruk, in Greenshade. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my second challenger in the city of Stormhold, in Shadowfen. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I should return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I can find my final challenger in the city of Wayrest, in Stormhaven. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my final challenger in the city of Windhelm, in Eastmarch. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my final challenger in the city of Elden Root, in Grahtwood. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I should return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I should confront the Eldertide theurges and retrieve the dark geodes they've excavated from Lord Felipe's land.
I defeated the Eldertide theurges and recovered three dark geodes. I should return to Parisse Plouff in Gonfalon Bay.
I introduced myself to the Gonfalon chapter's major players. I should return to Master Razhamad and let him know.
I read the final tablet, now I should talk to Cynric about how to claim the Sacred Shield.
I found Sorinne having a tense conversation with Brahgas. I should introduce myself to Sorinne and find out what she can teach me about Tales of Tribute.
It's time to play some Tribute! I should challenge one of the novices in the Gonfalon Gaming Hall to increase my experience. I'll need to win to show my skill to Sorinne.
Kishka urged me to track down Brahgas outside the Gonfalon Gaming Hall. He might have a bit more information about the club to share.
I found Brahgas. I should speak with him.
I should enter the pirate cove.
Now that I'm in the Shield Hall, it's time to claim the Sacred Shield.
I should begin by speaking with Brahgas and Sorinne in the Gonfalon Gaming Hall about the benefits and opportunities of Roisters Club membership.
Sorinne encouraged me to talk to Kishkaâ€”a Khajiit who offers daily challenges to Tales of Tribute players. I should go speak with her.
I should hurry and board the Prowler to meet up with the others.
Now that I have the key in my possession, I should unlock the Prowler.
I agreed to go to Death's Valor Keep and recover the skulls of the fallen knights.
I recovered the skulls of some fallen knights from Death's Valor Keep. I should give them to Wayllod and collect my payment for completing the job.
I should tell Master Razhamad about our chapter's victory.
Ember said her spell has been set. I should follow her, to see if it goes off.
The tournament will begin shortly. I should go to the beginner's lounge in the Gonfalon Gaming Hall and talk to my fellow players.
Our first tournament opponents will arrive any moment. I should look for them outside the Gonfalon Gaming Hall.
It appears that our first opponents are members of the Wayrest Chapter. I should speak with their leader so we can begin the tournament.
I made my way to the tavern in Daggerfall. Now, I need to challenge and defeat my first opponent.
I won my first match. Now, I need to travel to the Dead Wolf Inn in Shornhelmâ€”the capital of Rivenspireâ€”to defeat my next opponent, Cecile Nevim.
I defeated the two junior members of the Wayrest Chapter's Tribute team. Now, I need to travel to the Cloudy Dregs Inn in Wayrest to face their leader, Chief Novice Varnauld Broch.
I won the Tales of Tribute Novice Tournament! I should return to Gonfalon Bay to meet with my teammates and inform Razhamad of my success.
I met Lady Arabelle near the entrance to Mistmouth Cave. I should speak to her.
I must destroy the Sable Knight and cleanse any pools of dark magic I find nearby.
I destroyed the Sable Knight. I should return to Gonfalon Bay and report to Parisse Plouff.
I need to find Huldressa and use the Spoon of Undo on her.
My fellow players seem happy to see me. I should talk to Brahgas about how he and Sorinne fared in the tournament.
If I want to collect the reward the Club is offering, I need to challenge and defeat another player through the Group & Activity Finder.

If I want to improve the reward the Club is offering, I need to challenge and defeat another player through the Group & Activity Finder. Or, I could return to Marunji in Gonfalon Bay for a victor's purse.

If I want to improve the reward the Club is offering, I need to challenge and defeat another player through the Group & Activity Finder. Or, I could return to Marunji in Gonfalon Bay for a patron's purse.
I should return to Muranji in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I should return to Muranji in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I must kill the faun lord Wildhorn, and retrieve the signet rings of noble hunters Wildhorn slaughtered.
I killed Glemyos Wildhorn and recovered the signet rings of three dead hunters. I should report back to Parisse Plouff in Gonfalon Bay.
Wayllod provided a vial of reagents that the mage wants me to sprinkle in the lava pools inside the Firepot cave system. I should enter the Firepot and distribute the reagents.
I sprinkled the reagents. Now I should return to Wayllod and collect my pay.
I helped High King Emeric disrupt the storm ritual. I should tell him to seek shelter in the Memorial Hall.
I need to use Lady Arabelle's invitation medallion to get past the wards and enter Memorial Hall.
I should speak to Isobel, and see what she plans to do next.
Garwilith will tell me how to find Valentyn, but not until I steal something from Jailer Zalzay's footlocker and place it in inmate Yvara's bedroll.
I need to enter Memorial Hall and meet up with High King Emeric, Queen Ayrenn, and Prince Irnskar.
Apparently Kiv was to meet with a Julles Laurdon in Wayrest, near a Temple of the Divines.
When I locate a volcanic vent, I must disrupt the forces causing it to erupt and then defeat them to prevent catastrophe.
I disrupted one of the volcanic vents and prevented it from erupting. I should return to Druid Peeska to report my success.
Julles and Galedra are trying to convince Goldleaf Kiv is bad news. We should speak to this newcomer to see if he knows where we can find the thief.
We cornered Kiv and although he put up a fight, it was no contest. Quite a few people want to talk to him, but Isobel needs that family ring back, so we'll deal with him first.
Genalda marked a few locations on my map where I might find the ingredients she and Hilgrim need for their new drink. I should track the ingredients down and gather them.
I gathered the ingredients that Genalda and Hilgrim need for their special drink. I should return to them and speak with Genalda to tell her the good news.
House Dufort wants the crates of supplies that were stolen by the Hadolids destroyed. I can find them scattered throughout Breakwater Cave.
I destroyed the crates of House Dufort supplies that were stolen by the Hadolids and taken to Breakwater Cave. I should return to Wayllod and collect my payment.
