After asking around, I learned that a healer named Roslenn is missing. She works in the dispensary, and is the only healer capable of easing the affliction's effects. I should find Armin Demalle to tell him what I learned.
I defeated Serpent Caller Vinsha, and recovered the serpent eggs. Time to return to Gonfalon Bay and turn them in to Parisse Plouff.
I must defeat Serpent Caller Vinsha, and retrieve any serpent eggs I find.
Talk to Ennoc
I completed my first official game of Tales of Tribute! I should tell Sorinne and see if she has anything else to teach me.
Druid Jend wants to investigate each of the active volcanic vents. In order to do so, I need to find an animal at each and catch it so Druid Jend can use it to commune with the nature spirits.
Druid Jend asked me to meet him at the largest of the active volcanic vents. There, he intends to prepare a ritual that will calm the vents and render them safe once more.
I gathered prisoner documents from the bodies of prisoners who died on Whalefall. I should take them to Wayllod and collect my pay.
I accepted a job to go to Whalefall and find out what happened to the prisoners that were sent there.
I defeated the Ascendant Order fanatics and freed three prisoners. I should return to Parisse Plouff in Gonfalon Bay.
I must defeat the Ascendant Executioner and the Ascendant Harrower, and free their prisoners.
I killed the Hadolid matron and harvested several brine glands. I should return to Gonfalon Bay and report to Parisse Plouff.
Adwig asked me to collect his pack at an encampment along the shore.
I must find find the molting grounds, kill the Hadolid matron, and harvest brine glands from molting Hadolids.
I need to release the attuned torchbug Druid Jend gave me into the volcanic vent so it helps power the ritual.
Now that the ritual is complete, I should meet up with Druid Jend and make sure the volcanic vents are no longer a threat.
I found a pair of gloves near the harpy nests. They might have belonged to Mender Roslenn.
It looks like Mender Roslenn came this way. The trail continues to the west. I should keep looking.
I found Seraphyne's blood vial. I should examine the master healer's notes. They might be valuable evidence against him.
I returned to Steadfast Manor. I should confront Master Healer Viralaine with what I found.
I should talk to Master Razhamad about the upcoming tournament. I can find him in the Gonfalon Gaming Hall.
Isobel doesn't know why the knight commander wants to speak with her, but she feels obligated to find out why. She should be in her office off the Knight's Wing at Castle Navire.
The first leg of the tournament takes place in Glenumbra's capital: Daggerfall. I should travel to the Rosy Lion tavern and challenge my first opponent, Fabermund Notte.
Apparently, I'm the first member of the team to return to Gonfalon Bay. I should check in with Master Razhamad and inform him of my victory.
According to Razhamad, Sorinne received a letter that visibly upset her. I should have a look around the gaming hall to find out if anyone saw where she went.
Raenobi mentioned that Sorinne might be down by the docks. I should check the docks around the gaming hall to see if I can find her.
I found Sorinne on the docks. I should speak to her before the tournament begins.
We found Aurelia, tied up by some of the scoundrels who attacked Captain Marso. I should free her and find out what happened.
I need to find and destroy the crates containing the uniforms of the three alliances. They should be somewhere in Shipwreck Shoals.
I found the stolen crates of alliance uniforms and destroyed them. Now I should return to Wayllod and collect my payment.
I should return to ther Gaming Hall and meet with Brahgas. Our opponents will arrive soon.

We discovered that we must play the Elden Root Chapter this round. Their leader, Raenobi, has history with Sorinne and is responsible for her distress. I should talk to this Khajiit to accept her challenge.
The first leg of the tournament will take me to Auridon. I should make my way to the Skywatch Market to meet my first opponent.
I found my first opponent in the Skywatch Market. I need to beat him in Tales of Tribute before I can move on to the next match.
My second opponent waits in the city of Marbruk in Greenshade. I need to challenge her and win to move on to the next round.
I defeated Raenobi! Sorinne is preparing to challenge Raenobi herself. I should talk to my teammate before I leave.
I won enough games to challenge Raenobi in the final intermediate match. I must travel to Elden Root and defeat her.
I triumphed in the intermediate round! I should return to Gonfalon Bay and celebrate with my teammates.
Apparently, I'm the first member of the team to return to Gonfalon Bay. I should check in with Master Razhamad and inform him of my victory.
To destroy the tower's heart, we need to assemble the weapon Squire Rayan spoke of. I should find the first part in the statuary hall, within the spire's gardens.
I've found the entrance to the warrens. Now to head inside.
The waterwheel is once again turning. Rayan says we can assemble the weapon at the smithy to the southwest of the tower.
We successfully commandeered Nereid's Song. Now to set sail for All Flags Islet.
I need to collect druidic ritual components from the druids of the Eldertide Circle.
I gathered druidic ritual components from the Eldertide Circle in Coral Cliffs. I should deliver these to Wayllod and collect my pay.
When I locate a volcanic vent, I must destroy the forces causing it to erupt and defeat them to prevent catastrophe.
I disrupted one of the volcanic vents and prevented it from erupting. I should return to Druid Peeska to report my success.
I acquired a key to the catacombs for the Albatross trial. The entrance is within the chapel, where Isobel said to meet her.
I should disembark from the burning Sea Elf Flagship before it is engulfed in flames.
I should go over the evidence we found with Druid Audrine.
High King Emeric and I found a clue as to where the Green Serpents are keeping Prince Irnskar. We should leave the cave and regroup with Queen Ayrenn to discuss our next steps.
I should speak with Master Razhamad on the upper floors of the Gonfalon Bay Gaming Hall to receive my final reward.
We met up with Queen Ayrenn and Caska. Now High King Emeric wants to speak with me.
Master Razhamad encouraged me to find Sorinne and Brahgas and wish them good luck prior to our next match. I will probably find Sorinne near the Kynareth statue in Gonfalon Bay.
I found Sorinne. I should speak to her before the tournament begins.
I need to find Brahgas and talk to him before the tournament begins. Sorinne told me to look in the alleys by the docks.
Our opponents will arrive any moment. I should return to the Gonfalon Bay Gaming Hall to meet the chapter we'll face in the final round.
The statue out in the bay just broke apart! The earthquake must have damaged it. I should talk to Captain Tsuzo and ask him what he saw.
Our final opponents will be the Morrowind Club. I should speak to their leader, Teliv, to begin this round.
The first leg of the tournament begins in Stonefalls. I should head to Davon's Watch and meet my first opponent there to begin.
I must defeat the first Tribute player in Davon's Watch if I want to progress in the tournament.
I should talk to Druid Audrine and make sure the grove is safe now.
Felande has offered me a free inn room at the Ancient Anchor Inn in Gonfalon Bay. I should speak to her to learn more about the offer.
I've agreed to become Felande's newest tenant. I should speak to her to finalize the deal.
I should travel to Gonfalon Bay in the Systres Isles and speak to Felande about the inn room located within the Ancient Anchor Inn.
Lady Arabelle and I need to warn Lord Bacaro about the impending attack on All Flags Islet. I should return to Mandrake Manor.
I should speak to the talking skull.
Sir Nathain Galien said he needed to accompany me into the keep. I should pick up his skull and put it in my pack.
With the tournament starting, I should check the opponent listing in front of the Tribute club to see who I will be facing off against.
My next opponent arrived in Stormhold. I need to defeat them for a chance to advance in the tournament.
I ran into Sorinne while looking for my next opponent. I should talk to her and see why she's here in Stormhold.
I defeated my first two opponents. Now, it's time to return to Gonfalon Bay to discover who I'll play next. With any luck, I might learn some useful information about Brahgas's bet, too.
It appears that Master Razhamad made some sort of deal with Teliv. I should speak to him and find out what's going on.

I must defeat my chapter companion, Brahgas, in a game of Tribute in order to move on to the final match against Teliv Fels of Mournhold. Master Razhamad insists that the only way to save Brahgas is to beat him. I cannot hold back.
I defeated Brahgas and Teliv took him into custody. I should talk to Sorinne before I set out for the final match in Mournhold.
Brahgas's fate, the fate of the gaming hall, and the tournament title hang in the balance! I must go to Mournhold and face off against the current champion, Teliv Fels.
The chapter celebration has already begun! I should check in with Brahgas to see if he's recovered from his encounter with Teliv.
I defeated Teliv in the final match, freed Brahgas, and safeguarded Master Razhamad's gaming hall. I should return to Gonfalon Bay to celebrate my victory with my chapter-mates.
The next leg of the tournament takes place in Shadowfen. I should make my way to the Coin Brothers' Corner Club in Stormhold to meet my next opponent.
Sir Nathain asked to be placed on top of his headstone, I should put him there.
Sir Nathain won't rest until the items we found in the keep are buried in the graveyard, I should put them in the open grave.
There's a pile of dirt next to the open grave, I should fill the grave and bury the items for good.
I should seek out Master Razhamad in the upper floors of the Gonfalon Bay Gaming Hall to receive my final reward.
I came upon Cynric Ginise bound with magic emanating from an old censer. He doesn't seem particularly comfortable, despite being a ghost. I should extinguish the censer to release him.
We found Jhaka, but he's locked in a cage. I should free him before we speak further.
I found Captain Kaleen near the harbor. I should talk to her about Lady Arabelle's plan to steal Nereid's Song and see what she knows about hidden coves along the coast.
Captain Kaleen believes Nereid's Song is hidden at Jheury's Cove, on the west coast of High Isle. I should meet her and the others there.
Guruz is blind drunk. Ember says she has an idea on how to sober him up so we can hopefully get some useful information out of him.
I found enough of the sour algae Ember needs to make her tonic. I should speak to her about the next steps.
I should grab the tonic Ember made. It's on the beach where we found the sour algae.
Rhadh didn't seem to have the map fragment in his possession. His instructions said it could be found hidden in a wreck on Whalefall. I should head to Whalefall and look for it.
I should return the treasure to <<1>> at the Dufort Shipyards.
Captain Kaleen asked me to cut the mooring lines and keep the Ascendant Order knights busy while she and the other deal with the crew.
We need to get back to Guruz and give him this tonic. Hopefully it will sober him up enough to talk to us.
I need to talk to Ember about her old friend, Silverslip, and the part she played in the disappearance of Ember's friends.
The Ascendant Magus somehow broke through the magical wards and is attacking Memorial Hall. I need to defend the alliance leaders from this attack.
The Ascendant Magus threatens to bring Memorial Hall down on top of us. The only chance to save the alliance leaders is to go out and face him directly.
Azamel told us about the last known campsite of the Emerald Eye. It is in Easterly Aerie in the Alik'r Desert. Ember and I need to go there and see if we can find any information about Song.
The Emerald Eye is supposedly holding Song inside the Motalion Necropolis. We need to go there and rescue her.
Master Razhamad wishes to speak to me about continuing my training in the game of Tales of Tribute. I need to return to the Gonfalon Bay Gaming Hall and speak to him there.
I've returned to the Brokerock Mine Camp, and Overseer Barthel has beckoned me over. I should speak to him and see what he has to say.
I untied Anton from the post, although he didn't seem especially apologetic. The island still crawls with hunters, so we still aren't safe. I should escort them to safety.
Kiv's victims, Julles and Galedra, have come up with fitting punishments for the scoundrel. I should speak with them and decide what his fate will be.
Isobel wants to give the ring back to her parents. They live in a townhouse near the port in Gonfalon Bay.
The ring is safely back home at the Veloise townhouse. I should speak with Isobel.
Isobel wants to introduce me to her parents! I should follow along.
Amunara is making one last ditch assault on the castle and the Shield Hall ward. I should use her own censer to trap her.
The next tournament is about to begin. I need to travel back to Gonfalon Bay and speak to Master Razhamad to get all the details.

Aurelia received a threat telling her to stop her investigation or Marso would be killed. He's being held in Obsidian Scar, a dungeon filled with fearsome brigands. We'll need to head in if we're going to free him.

Cynric told me about his plan to use Amunara's censer against her. He then told me about a hidden path around the blocked door to the third trial, but I need to go to the library's reading room and get the key to unlock it first.
The final tournament of Tribute is about to begin. I should travel back to Gonfalon Bay and speak to Master Razhamad.

Both Isobel and Aurelia seemed to feel better about their friendship. Aurelia wanted to return to High Isle and suggested we stop by if we are back in the area. She will be at the Ancient Anchor with Marso.
I should return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I can find my first challenger in Vivec City, in Vvardenfell.
I can find my first challenger in the city of Rimmen, in Northern Elsweyr.
I can find my second challenger in the city of Shimmerene, in Summerset. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my second challenger in the city of Solitude, in Western Skyrim. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I should return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I can find my final challenger in the village of Stonelore Grove, on High Isle. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my final challenger in the settlement of Amenos Station, in High Isle. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I can find my final challenger in the city of Leyawiin, in Blackwood. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
I should return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
Looks like the princess detective is well and truly safe. I should speak to Isobel to see how she feels.
Captain Eshmadin suggested I take the reassembled treasure map to help in my search.
Aurelia hoped that Isobel would come to see her and Marso in Gonfalon Bay. I should ask how she's doing now that things have settled down.
I should return to Marunji in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
If I want to collect the reward the Club is offering, I need to challenge and defeat another player through the Group & Activity Finder.

If I want to improve the reward the Club is offering, I need to challenge and defeat another player through the Group & Activity Finder. Or, I could return to Marunji in Gonfalon Bay for a victor's purse.

If I want to improve the reward the Club is offering, I need to challenge and defeat another player through the Group & Activity Finder. Or, I could return to Marunji in Gonfalon Bay for a patron's purse.
I should return to Muranji in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
I should return to Marunji in Gonfalon Bay and claim my prize.
Captain Jimila has something urgent to tell me. I should speak with her.
Louna thinks we should look for Anton at the winner's stage at the north of the island. I should make my way through the island in search of her partner.
We've acquired a bone for the hilt of the hammer. Squire Rayan suggests we head for the prison warrens on the north side of the tower. There we can find a suitable head for the weapon.
I can find my first challenger in the city of Riften, in the Rift.
I can find my second challenger in the city of Sentinel, in Alik'r. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
The final match is about to begin. I need to go to Mournhold to challenge Teliv and end this.
Before the final match, I should speak to Master Razhamad to learn the details of what this match is all about.
I found the magister's assistant near Tor Draioch. I should speak to her.
I should talk to Sir Rayan.
There seems to be a lot of going on with this signet ring, and Isobel's past. I could speak with her to learn more about this situation.
The slayer has come to Skyrim seeking one vampire in particular. In the meantime, he's identified a few places where the Gray Host are enacting rituals of some kind. I should review his map.
I should check in with Mel Adrys one more time.
I need to use Valentyn's hammer and chisel to knock on the walls until I discover a weak spot we can use to get out of here.
Chefs can sell you the recipe for Baked Apples.
Several of the Striking Locales in Western Skyrim have been co-opted for Gray Host rituals. The hunter has asked me to clear one out.
After ending a Gray Host ritual, the hunter appeared nearby. Mel Adrys wants to talk.
The dungeons of the north still house powerful champions of the Gray Host. Mel Adrys wants me to hunt down and slay one of their number from a public dungeon or delve in Western Skyrim or the Reach.
Archdruid Devyric sealed the Dais of Rootspeak. Druid Laurel said she can break the seal, but she needs me to destroy the trellis sentinels in order to weaken the magic.
The Spirit of Root has been corrupted and Archdruid Devyric captured Druid Laurel. I need to defeat the Corruption of Root and rescue Druid Laurel.
I should speak to Druid Laurel in <<1>>.
Archdruid Devyric is taking Druid Laurel to the Dais of Skytremor. I have to rescue Druid Laurel before Devyric finds the Stonelore seed.
Archdruid Devyric and the Firesong Druids are after the Stonelore sacred seed. I should follow them and stop them before they get it.
Archdruid Devyric corrupted the Spirit of Stone. I should help Druid Laurel defeat the Corruption of Stone so she can cleanse it.
Archdruid Devyric ran into the Deeproot after he corrupted the Spirit of Stone. I should follow him.
I saw some druids get killed by another druid. I should check with Druid Laurel, one of the survivors, and see what's going on.
I need to complete Earthen Root Enclave.
I defeated foes in Earthen Root Enclave. I should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Archdruid Devyric.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
The hatch led down into a subterranean Dwarven station, flooded with muck and seawater. Dhulef found some books he wants to investigate. I should explore deeper within while searching for clues.

Dhulef caught up to me with news that he found schematics of this Dwarven station. The passageway he wanted to follow was blocked by mud. He suggested I follow a conduit to find another entrance. I should continue exploring the tunnels.
I defeated the lich in the central core of Graven Deep. Dhulef found a book on a dead body as he joined me. I should talk to him to find out about the book and receive my reward.
Dhulef led me down a natural tunnel in search of a way to the Dwarven station's central room. We found an enormous skeletal behemoth. I should kill it so we can proceed.

Dhulef told me that he came here in search of information about the voyage of the Druid King from High Rock to the Systres Archipelago. He wonders if the storm is related to the Druid King somehow. I should search the island for clues.
We found a hatch of Dwarven design at the top of the island. However, a powerful Hadolid blocks my path. I should dispatch the Euphotic Gatekeeper to continue my search.
I killed the Euphotic Gatekeeper and cleared the way for Dhulef and I. I should enter the Dwarven hatch and explore what's inside.
I need to complete Graven Deep.
I defeated foes in Graven Deep. I should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting <<1>>."
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
The hunt continues. I should return to Mel Adrys' camp and see how things are going.
Perhaps Mel has more information on the vampire he's seeking. I should speak to Mel Adrys.
The vampire hunter is intent on quieting one of the harrowstorms that still plague this region. Mel Adrys wants me to seek out and work with him to to disrupt a harrowstorm in progress.
I should speak to Mel Adrys. Surely by now he has a lead on this vampire he's been hunting.
The hunter has found his prey. Mel Adrys awaits me at the lair of the Pale Worm, a vampire lord with a surprising connection to his past.
A trail of vampiric energy will lead me to the Pale Worm's lair.
This is it. Mel and I must put an end to Niras Adrys, the Pale Worm.
Archdruid Devyric found the Stonelore seed. I have to kill him to keep the seed out of the Firesong Druids' hands.

I sampled the local dishes at the Gonfalon Gaming Hall. Now I need to visit fishing holes and scenic viewpoints around High Isle and Amenos to see which should be included on Philien Visour's tour. He marked spots I need to survey on my map to visit.
I should tell Philien Visour what I discovered on my tour of High Isle and Amenos.
Philien Visour asked me to begin by sampling a few dishes of Systres cuisine here in the Gonfalon Gaming Hall.
I set the mote traps. Now I should meet Ember by the livestock pens.
Prince Irnskar leapt down to confront the Ascendant Order. I must follow him.
I visited the fishing holes and scenic viewpoints and sampled the cuisine as Philien Visour requested. I should return to him at the Gonfalon Gaming Hall and let him know what I thought.
I should look for Philien Visour at the Gonfalon Gaming Hall in High Isle and see what sort of help he needs for his new business.

I found a frightened man being chased by some kind of strange mote. He told me there are strange motes causing trouble around Tor Draioch and that he's worried for the magister and his assistant that live there. I should check on them.
Druid Laurel received a letter from Dhulef, asking her to rendezvous with him at the Mines of Khuras in Glenumbra. I should meet Druid Laurel there to begin the search.
I met Druid Laurel and Dhulef in the Glenmoril Wyrd camp. I should talk to Druid Laurel and see what she wants to do about Frii and the Firesong.
Druid Laurel received a letter from Dhulef, asking her to rendezvous with him at Ilessan Tower in Glenumbra. I should meet Druid Laurel there to begin the search.
Druid Laurel received a letter from Dhulef, asking her to rendezvous with him at Ebon Crypt in Glenumbra. I should meet Druid Laurel there to begin the search.
I met Druid Laurel at the location Dhulef mentioned in his letter. Now we just need to find him.
I found Dhulef and he looks safe. I should speak to him and see what he's found.

Dhulef found a tablet engraved with a symbol Druid King and two other symbols he doesn't recognize. We need to go to the Beldama camp to meet with Wyress Tola to see if she can tell us more about the tablet.
The Beldama Wyrd camp was attacked by the Firesong Druids! I should speak to Wyress Joslin and find out what happened here.
The Beldama Wyrds have been keeping track of a few Firesong camps that recently appeared nearby. I should search them for information about what they want and where they might have taken Wyress Tola.
I found some information about the Firesong presence in Glenumbra and where they might have taken Wyress Tola. I should return to the Beldama Wyrd camp and inform Druid Laurel.
I need to tell Druid Laurel about what Dhulef and I found at the Firesong camps.
We arrived at the spot marked on the Firesong map and there's a cave here. I should go inside and search for Wyress Tola and Archdruid Michiel.
I entered the cave. I should search for Wyress Tola and Archdruid Michiel.

The Firesong Druid, Archdruid Michiel, performed a ritual that desecrated this site before we could stop him. He left when we arrived. I should speak to Wyress Tola and see what she can tell us about what happened here.

Wyress Tola revealed this site was consecrated by the wyrds and the Druid King to bind a nature spirit. She believes the archdruid desecrated this place to take control of the spirit for the Firesong. I should talk to Druid Laurel about our options.
Wyress Tola opened a portal to Bangkorai that will deposit us not far from the wyrd camp, which is located southeast of Evermore. Once we get there, we should seek out Wyress Sorcha.
I arrived at the Glenmoril Wyrd camp. There seems to be some tension over Druid Laurel's presence. Maybe I can do something to smooth things over by talking to the elder wyress.
We reached the entrance to the ancient Glenmoril ritual site, but we were too late to save Wyress Sorcha. We need to go inside and find Archdruid Michiel before he can complete his ritual.
We entered the ancient Glenmoril ritual site. Now to find Archdruid Michiel and put an end to the Firesong's plans.
Archdruid Michiel finished his ritual and started waking the ancient nature spirit. I need to kill Archdruid Michiel before he can claim the spirit for the Firesong.
The nature spirit seems confused. I should try to speak with them.
Druid Laurel suggested we talk about our next steps back at the Glenmoril Wyrd camp. Dhulef created a portal for us, I should head there.
Raz wants me to distract a pair of thugs that are tailing him. I should search the tavern for a way to distract them so he can slip away unnoticed.
I managed to throw off the thugs tailing Razum-dar. I should find him outside, near the tavern.
I found Razum-dar outside of the tavern. I should talk to him.
Razum-dar suggested we tail the thugs to find out who they're working for. We should watch for them to leave the tavern.
Raz wants to follow the thugs and see if they lead us to whoever they're working for.
Raz thinks he knows who hired the thugs. I should speak to him to learn more.

Raz thinks the pirate Redblade has hired a local crime boss to throw the spy off the scent. He asked me to meet him at Yves Grandvache's gambling parlor, which is in a set of rooms inside Vastyr's Outlaws Refuge.
Razum-dar is somewhere in this gambling parlor. I should find him so we can figure out our next move.
The fixer Yves Grandvache is in the patrician suite, an area reserved for winners and their guests. Raz suggested I try winning a card game to gain access.
It's time to enter the patrician suite and confront Yves Grandvache.
I'll have to find a back way into the patrician suite. Raz mentioned something about looking for a ladder or ramp.
Only by confronting Yves Grandvache can Razum-dar and I learn where to find Redblade.
Razum-dar and I found Yves Grandvache. We should eavesdrop on the fixer and see what we can learn.
We found the pirate Redblade! Time to enter the fray and confront them.
Redblade has escaped and the crime boss has called his guards. I should find a way out of the gambling parlor.
I should check in with Razum-dar about what we learned in the patrician suite.
Razum-dar stole a number of documents from Yves Grandvache that might indicate where the Aquilarios Bequest is hidden. He needs my help to look through them.
I've discovered the location of the Aquilarios Bequest in Yves Grandvache's notes. I should head to Fauns' Thicket and hopefully stop Redblade from claiming their prize.
I should search Fauns' Thicket for the entrance to the sea cave. Within, we may just find Redblade and the Aquilarios Bequest.
I found the entrance to the sea cave. Time to head inside and confront Redblade.
Somewhere within the sea cave should be Redblade and the Aquilarios treasure. I need to search the area.
I found Redblade's crew in the midst of excavating the shipwreck. I should talk to Razum-dar about our plan of attack.
Razum-dar wants to collapse the cavern, denying anyone the chance to claim the Aquilarios Bequest. He needs me to destroy pillars around this cavern using alchemical charges.
The sea cave is collapsing! I should make my escape.
I should speak to Razum-dar about the Aquilarios Bequest.
Hierot seems pleased with my efforts and eager to start his survey. I should speak to him and receive my payment.
Hierot says that he'll meet me in the cave. Once inside, we can search for the lava fissure and the crystal he saw. I should go into Embervine cave.

Hierot believes the crystals put here by the Firesong Druids caused the lava fissures to open. He wants me to smash them all so that lava doesn't flood the Embervine caverns. I should find and destroy them.
I destroyed all the druid crystals and stopped the lava from flooding the Embervine caverns. Now Hierot can complete his job. I should meet him outside, though, to complete mine.
I need to travel to Glenumbra and meet with Druid Laurel.
Dhulef and I reentered the Dwarven station and began exploring deeper. He wants to find the central room to understand the lair's purpose. I should continue exploring.
We found the central room and discovered a lich residing within. I should kill the lich so that Dhulef can learn what he needs to know about this Dwarven station.
We destroyed the druid crystals. I should talk to Hierot and finish up our business.
Inside Embervine, Hierot wants me to find the druid crystals. He says the first one he saw was in the southeast portion of the cave.
I can find Coral Cliffs in the northern part of Amenos.
Lady Arabelle asked me to check in with the Alliance Leaders at Gonfalon Palace and convince them to wait just a little longer for the peace talks to begin.
Lady Arabelle has received the antidote and now knows what we knowâ€”that Lord Bacaro is the Ascendant Lord and leader of the Ascendant Order. I should talk to her about what happens next.

Lady Arabelle wants to keep the remaining items of the Druid King's regalia out of Lord Bacaro's hands. While she goes to retrieve the one held by the Stonelore, I need to check on the one in Count Stefan's possession.

With Frii's help, I defeated Lord Bacaro and stopped the volcano from consuming the entire archipelago. Now to talk to Lady Arabelle and make sure there aren't any more threats lurking around the islands.
Lady Arabelle sent Za'ji to request my help in finalizing security measures for the peace talks. I should meet her at her manor in Gonfalon Bay.
I should talk to Count Mornard and discuss our options for rescuing Sir Stefan from the Firesong Circle.
Archdruid Ellic told me that Sir Stefan wants to see me at Castle Mornard. I should go and talk to him.
Sir Stefan Mornard wants me to look into Sea Elf activity on the southeastern shore of Galen. He wants me to investigate a nearby fort, a druid village, and an isolated cove.
We found Silverslip. She asked Ember and I to meet her outside so we can talk further.

I found Lord Bacaro at the docks in Gonfalon Bay, preparing to go to Galen with the Society of the Steadfast. I should ask him if he's ready to let Lady Arabelle begin the peace talks before he departs.

Lord Bacaro received information that the Ascendant Order is using the Dufort Shipyards to advance their plot against the peace talks. I should investigate and determine if Duchess Elea lied to us about her involvement.

I discovered evidence that the Ascendant Order has commandeered the Dufort Shipyards, but nothing to confirm Lord Bacaro's suspicions concerning Duchess Elea. I should return to Mandrake Manor and inform Lady Arabelle of this development.
I returned to Mandrake Manor to find out that Lady Arabelle has been bedridden by some mysterious malady. I should head upstairs and talk to her.

I checked the fort, the village, and the cove. I learned that the Dreadsails are after a relic guarded by the Eldertide Druidsâ€”and the Firesong Druids may be involved. I should return to Vastyr and report to Sir Stefan Mornard.
I should talk to Sir Stefan Mornard and tell him what I learned about the Dreadsails and their alliance with the druids of the Firesong Circle.
The meeting of the Draoife is about to begin. I should meet Druid Laurel and Sir Stefan Mornard in the Draoife Dell.
I found my way to the gathering of the Draoife. Archdruids from the Stonelore, Eldertide, and Firesong Circles are debating recent events. I should listen.

Archdruid Orlaith of the Firesong Circle betrayed the Draoife and summoned her Dreadsail allies to attack! They killed most of the archdruids, but Rahval and Ellic are still alive. I must protect them.

I managed to defend Archdruid Rahval and Archdruid Ellic, but the other archdruids of their circles were killed. Sir Stefan and Druid Laurel pursued Archdruid Orlaith deeper into the dell. I should follow them.
Archdruid Orlaith has taken Sir Stefan Mornard captive and ordered her champion, Druid Branagh, to make sure no one follows her. I need to deal with him.
I defeated the Firesong champion, Druid Branagh, but Archdruid Orlaith got away with a captiveâ€”Sir Stefan! There's nothing more I can do here. It's time to leave the dell.
I need to return to Vastyr and tell Count Leonard Mornard about the capture of Sir Stefan.
Sir Stefan Mornard is here with Lord Bacaro. Sir Stefan should know how I can help fight off the Sea Elf raids.
The map we found in one of the Firesong camps indicated a spot in Hag Fen, on the northeast coast of Glenumbra. We need to head there and see if we can find Wyress Tola before it's too late.

Lady Arabelle has been poisoned! She asked me to investigate the mysterious package she received and find out where it came from. I should examine the note and the bottle of wine, as well as talk to Druid Ryvana.
I examined the note and the bottle of poisoned wine. Now I should tell Lady Arabelle what I noticed and see if she has any suggestions on our next course of action.
Captain Samara asked me to talk to her second-in-command, Apprentice Taz, for more details.
I completed all three trials. I need to speak to Captain Samara and give her the items she asked me to recover.

After telling Lady Arabelle what I discovered when I examined the note and the wine bottle, she suggested I talk to Philian Ashcroft, a proprietor of fine goods. He keeps a shop in Bayside Artisans here in Gonfalon Bay.

A courier arrived at the castle and tried to deliver a large shipment of wine that Duchess Elea claims she didn't order. I should locate the courier near the jousting tents and see what they can tell me about who hired them.
I found the courier. Now to talk to them and ask them who actually hired them to pick up the wine and deliver it to Castle Navire.
I arrived at Druid Ryvana's workshop. I should talk to her and find out if she has an antidote for Lady Arabelle yet.
I need to go to Garick's Rest to investigate who hired the courier to deliver the tainted wine to Castle Navire and to help Druid Ryvana find samples of the plants used to craft the poison.
We found a door leading into the dungeons beneath Garick's Rest. I need to look around and see what we can find.
I should review the clues we uncovered with Druid Ryvana.
We need to explore this garden and gather samples of the plants that Druid Ryvana thinks were used to make the poison that has incapacitated Lady Arabelle.
I found an unusual stone disc in an ornate box. I should show it to Druid Ryvana and see if she knows what it is.
We need to determine why armor meant for the Society of the Steadfast wound up in the hands of the Ascendant Order. I need to go to Steadfast Manor and talk to Captain Marguerite.
We received an ultimatum from Archdruid Orlaith. I should talk to Sir Stefan and tell him what Frii and I discovered at Ivyhame.
Galen is safe now that the threat of the Firesong and Dreadsails has been dealt with. Sir Stefan says it's time for him to take up the mantle of his father. I should ask him how he feels about that.

Captain Marguerite gave me the key to the Steadfast Manor cellars and asked me to investigate how the Ascendant Order was able to get in there to rob the society. The door is on the path toward the dock to the north of the manor.
Druid Ryvana and I entered the Steadfast Manor cellars. Now to look around and see if we can find any connection between the druid runestone and the Ascendant Order.
The Firesong are already headed to the second ritual site. Wyress Matilde told me that it lies somewhere deep within a path called the Sunken Road. We should hurry if we want to save Wyress Sorcha.
Placing the runestone disc into a recessed space in the sconce revealed a hidden entrance. I should investigate.
The hidden door opened onto ancient caves and tunnels beneath Steadfast Manor. I should see what's down here.

A journal written by Lord Bacaro and a genealogy of his family's bloodline points to two conclusions: Lord Bacaro is the Ascendant Lord and he believes he's a direct descendant of the Druid King Kasorayn.
Druid Ryvana wants me to examine the ancient carvings before she explains what she thinks they mean to me.

Druid Ryvana and I discovered that Lord Bacaro is the Ascendant Lord. He plans to take the Druid King's regalia and proclaim himself the new Druid King. We need to return to Mandrake Manor, give Lady Arabelle the antidote, and tell her this news
Now that I'm back at Mandrake Manor, I need to talk to Lady Arabelle and tell her the truth about Lord Bacaro.
Za'ji brought me a message from Lady Arabelle. She wants me to come to Mandrake Manor in Gonfalon Bay and discuss plans for stopping Lord Bacaro, the Ascendant Lord.
I need to find Druid Laurel and Frii. They should be in or near to Glimmertarn, the Stonelore village to the north of Vastyr.
I decided to save Joslin from the curse. I should talk to her and see that she's all right.
Octin is waiting to the north, near a sacred tree. I should meet him and collect the sap.
I found Octin. I should speak with him so he can identify which tree to take the sap from.
Druid Fenas determined that an aspect of the curse is that we can only lift it from one of its victims. I need to decide to save either Joslin or Octin while Fenas keeps the ritual energy flowing.
I decided to save Octin from the curse. I should talk to him and see that he's all right.
Octin thinks the sacred tree is nearby. I should find it and get some sap for the druid.
I have the sap Octin and Joslin need. I should talk to Octin and see what he thinks we should do next.
We need a fire shard to break the curse. Druid Fenas told me where there were lava pools and fire shards, I should meet Joslin near Embervine.
I made it to the lava pools. I should talk to Joslin and go about retrieving a fire shard.
The fire shard is too hot to touch, but Joslin gave me a freezing spell which can cool the shard enough to pick up. I should use it.
The fire shard is cool enough to pick up now. I should retrieve it and head back to Joslin.
I have the fire shard. I should talk to Joslin and see what we need to do next.
Joslin, Octin, and Druid Fenas are waiting outside Fauns' Thicket. I should take the fire shard and the sacred tree sap there.
The ritual to break the curse must be performed in Fauns' Thicket, where Joslin and Octin found the tablet. I should head inside.
The first step in the ritual is to ignite the fire shard. I should do that now.
We finished the ritual, but Joslin and Octin still seem to be cursed. I should talk to Druid Fenas and find out what we did wrong.
Druid Fenas marked the location where he wants to perform the ritual to break the curse on my map. I should go to that spot and meet the druid and the others there.
I reached the spot where Druid Fenas wants to perform the ritual. I should talk to him and see what he needs me to do.
I reached Glimmertarn. I should talk to Druid Laurel and deliver the unfortunate news about Archdruid Rahval's death and the loss of the sacred seeds.
Druid Laurel told me that Frii can sense the sacred seeds. I should talk to Frii and see if they can lead us to Archdruid Orlaith and the seeds.
Frii senses the sacred seeds in the direction of the rising sun, at a place they called Ivyhame. I should meet Druid Laurel and Frii there.
I spoke to Frii. I should speak with Druid Laurel to see what she wants to do next.

I need to complete the three trials. I need to recover a tablet of Dragon-slaying knowledge in the Stitches and bring it to Apprentice Taz, retrieve a Dragon Defense Force banner from inside a dungeon and retrieve a Dragon heart after slaying one.
I found Lady Arabelle in the courtyard of Mandrake Manor. I should talk to her.
I found Count Stefan Mornard in Mornard Castle. I should talk to him and secure his help when the Ascendant Lord makes his next move.
I warned Stefan Mornard but there has been no sign of the Ascendant Order on Galen. I should return to Lady Arabelle at Mandrake Manor.
I arrived at Castle Mornard to some sort of commotion. I should talk to Count Stefan and find out what happened here.
I completed all three trials. I should return to Captain Samara to report my progress.
Sir Stefan Mornard asked me to find Druid Laurel in the Vine District, the druid section of Vastyr. He wants me to get her permission to attend the Draoife with him.
I found Druid Laurel in the Vine District. I should talk to her about attending the meeting of the Draoife with Sir Stefan.

Knights wearing the armor of the Society of the Steadfast ransacked the castle library. Could it have been the Ascendant Order using the armor stolen from Steadfast Manor? I should accompany Count Stefan and investigate.
I defeated the Corruption of Stone. I should explore the area.
The library has clearly been ransacked. I should look around and help Count Stefan see if the Druid King's crown is still on the premises.
The imposter knights ransacked the library and found the hiding place. The Druid King's crown has been taken. I should talk to Count Stefan about what we should do.
While Count Stefan assembles his knights and tries to recruit Captain Siravaen to our cause, I need to go to Glimmertarn and check on Druid Laurel and the Druid King's staff.
I arrived at Glimmertarn but there appears to have been some sort of incident. I should talk to Druid Laurel and find out what happened here.

Bacaro tricked Druid Laurel into giving him the staff. Now Bacaro stole all the regalia and has proclaimed himself to be the new Druid King. He commanded Frii to follow him to Y'ffre's Path and Lady Arabelle went after them. I need to follow, too.
I completed all three trials. I need to speak to Captain Samara and give her the items she asked me to recover.
Taz has an additional knowledge challenge for me, and asked me to speak with him.
We discovered a newly revealed door into Y'ffre's Path. Druid Laurel suspects Lord Bacaro is responsible for opening it. We need to continue our search for him and Frii.
I found Lady Arabelle inside the ruins. I should talk to her and find out why she's just standing there.
Sir Stefan came to Glimmertarn to find me. I should speak with him.
Count Mornard asked me to speak with the archdruids of the Eldertide and Stonelore Circles. He thinks they may know where to look for Sir Stefan. I should find them by the bridge east of the city.

Archdruid Ellic believes the Dreadsails are holding Sir Stefan and Druid Niraya in a ruined keep in the northwest. He also said that the Eldertide seed is hidden there. I should head to Castle Tonnere and enter through the cave below the bluff.
I encountered Captain Siravaen on my way to the ruins of Castle Tonnere. I should see what she's doing here.
Captain Siravaen hopes my attempt to rescue Sir Stefan will provide her with a chance to kill Sealord Nalos. I should find the sea cave Archdruid Ellic told me about and enter the castle dungeons.
Sir Stefan Mornard is somewhere in the old castle's dungeons. I must find him.
I found Sir Stefan in a cell beneath Castle Tonnere. I should talk to him.
Sir Stefan's cell is secured by an exceptionally strong lock. I need to get the key from the Dreadsail jailor, Goriadh.
I retrieved the key to Sir Stefan's cell from the jailor. I should return to the cell and set him free.
I freed Sir Stefan from his cell. I should talk to him about our next step.
Sir Stefan hopes to retrieve the Eldertide Circle's sacred seed before the Dreadsails find itâ€”and he doesn't want to leave anyone in the hands of Sealord Nalos. We need to find Druid Niraya.
We found Druid Niraya. The Dreadsails forced her to reveal the location of the Eldertide seed. I should talk to her about getting to the seed first.
Druid Niraya told us that the Eldertide seed is hidden in a shrine beneath an ancient tree in the castle's upper courtyard. I need to get to the courtyard.
I reached Castle Tonnere's upper courtyard. I should look around for the ancient tree Druid Niraya told me about.
I found the entrance to the Eldertide Circle's shrine beneath the ancient tree, just where Druid Niraya said. The sacred seed should be somewhere inside.
I entered the ancient grotto beneath the tree. Now I should look for the sacred seed.
We found the Eldertide seedâ€”but the Dreadsails are already here! Captain Uldiss won't surrender the seed without a fight.
We defeated the Dreadsails in the ancient Eldertide shrine. Now to retrieve the sacred seed.
I rescued Sir Stefan Mornard and Druid Niraya, and I retrieved the sacred seed of the Eldertide Circle. Time to leave this place.
Captain Siravaen gave us a warning about an imminent attack on Vastyr. I should talk to her and get more information.
I need to return to Vastyr and give the Eldertide seed to Archdruid Ellic.
We found the druid crystal, floating above a lava fissure. I should speak to Hierot so we can decide what to do about it.
Archdruid Rahval is nearby, in Vastyr's Vine District. I should speak with him about securing the aid of the Stonelore Circle in defense of the city.
Archdruid Rahval asked me to travel to Glimmertarn in the north and inform Druid Laurel of the plan to bring the Stonelore Druids to Vastyr to help protect the city.
While Druid Laurel stays with Lady Arabelle and helps her disarm the trap she's standing on, I need to continue searching for Lord Bacaro and Frii.
Lord Bacaro has summoned some sort of nature spirit. I need to stop it from leaving this chamber.
We defeated the summoned creature but Lord Bacaro got away and took Frii with him. I should talk to Lady Arabelle.
Wyress Matilde said the ancient ritual site was somewhere deep inside the Sunken Road. I need to explore this place in order to find it and track down the Firesong and Wyress Sorcha.
I arrived in Glimmertarn. Now to speak to Druid Laurel and tell her about the plan to move the Stonelore Druids to Vastyr to help protect the city.
I found the path that Druid Laurel told me about. Now to follow it to the cove and retrieve the everflame torch.

Quen wants me to hunt down Umindior. He claimed to have information about the relic that could help us find it. Quen marked on my map the last place she saw him. I should go there and begin my search.
I found Umindior asleep in a Sea Elf's quarters. He seems safe, if quite drowsy. I should rouse him and learn what he knows about the relic.
Umindior appears exhausted and didn't recognize that I wasn't who he expected. He won't wake and help me with the relic. He mentioned a water bucket nearby. I should use it to rouse him.
After pouring a bucket of cold water over his head, Umindior finally awoke. Although he appears annoyed, at least he can answer questions. I should talk to him about finding the relic.

While Umindior was sidetracked, he learned that two Sea Elves activated the relic. A sea witch named Minahel locked them in a cell. I should find them and see if they can tell me about the relic's location.

I found the imprisoned Sea Elf couple in a cell on the beach. They're acting flirtatious, even to complete strangers. The one named Ellorien called me over to talk. I should ask her about the relic's location.

Laniwys said they had found druidic healing chambers. The Sea Elf pair attempted a ritual and somehow triggered the relic. It's affecting all the Sea Elves in one way or another. I should find the chamber and investigate.
We should look around this old ritual site and see if we can learn anything more about the relic. Maybe how to deactivate it.

We searched the ritual caves and learned that Minahel has a plan to dampen the relic's effects. We just have to find it. Umindior thinks Quen might know how to proceed. I should go northwest to their camp and consult with her.
I reached the camp. Now I should talk to Quen.
Quen has a plan to get information out of the young Sea Elf, Veshin, who is quite taken with her. I should collect the blue-backed siltcrabs that Quen asked for.
I found the blue-backed siltcrabs. I should find Quen and give the crabs to Veshin.
I should talk to Quen to see what she wants to do next.
Quen asked me to find silverbloom, a plant that Sea Elves consider a delicacy. They should be near some trees in the cliffs above.
I should give the silverbloom to Veshin and ask him about the sea witches and the relic.
Quen has a plan for Veshin. I should watch her in action.
Quen suggested we split up again. I should find the magic-infused cloth that Minahel the shaman leader ordered the Sea Elves to make.
I should talk to Quen and hand over the druid relic to complete this job.
The ancient nature spirit has awakened. I need to help Druid Laurel release them from their binds.
Druid Laurel thinks we might learn something by examining the stone carving in this chamber. I should take a closer look.
I examined the stone carvings in the chamber. I should talk to Druid Laurel and see what she makes of the images in the stone.
The summons directed me to a Khajiit named Captain Samara in Northern Elsweyr.
I need to retrive the everflame torch from the Dreadsail pirates that stole it.
Now that I retrieved the everflame torch, I need to meet Druid Laurel at Veil's Bluff to the west of Glimmertarn.
Druid Laurel prepared the beacon. I need to ignite it with the everflame torch.
I retrieved the everflame torch. I should speak to Druid Laurel before we ignite the beacon.
Now that the beacon has been ignited, we should return to Glimmertarn and help Druid Laurel get her people ready to depart for Vastyr.

Druid Laurel believes that Lord Bacaro plans to call forth the powerful spirit of Mount Firesong to aid him in his plan to conquer Tamriel. I should return to Castle Mornard and let Count Stefan know what happened.
I need to enter Y'ffre's Path and start to look for clues regarding the whereabouts of Elder Pitof's wife.
Now that the Chronicle has been silenced, I should check with Elder Pitof and make sure everything is all right in Y'ffre's Path.
Archdruid Rahval has arrived at Glimmertarn. I should speak with him.
Archdruid Rahval asked Druid Laurel and I to check on Frii and the sacred seed. They should be sheltering in a cave called Clohaigh, located east of Glimmertarn. I should head there now.
I found the entrance to Clohaigh. I should speak to Druid Laurel before we head inside.
Druid Laurel saw Firesong Druids enter the cave. We need to head inside and find Frii and the Stonelore seed.

Druid Laurel and I found strange markings depicting Frii on the standing stones inside Clohaigh. We need to continue our search. When we locate Frii, maybe they can explain the meaning of these drawings.
Druid Laurel says I need to turn both druid stones to dissipate the ward and open the door.
We opened the door. Now to go inside and find Frii.
Frii looks unharmed. I should speak with them.
Frii agreed that I should take the Stonelore seed and present it to Archdruid Rahval. I should retrieve it now.
I need to return to Glimmertarn and give the sacred seed to Archdruid Rahval.
I should speak with Archdruid Rahval and give the seed to him.
I should talk to Sir Stefan about what we should do next.
Frii opened the sealed door. Now to see what's calling to them from inside.
I found Count Stefan and Captain Siravaen in the Castle Mornard kitchen. I should talk to Stefan and tell him what happened at Y'ffre's Path.
Count Stefan asked me to try to convince Captain Siravaen to help us against Lord Bacaro and his Ascendant Order and druid allies. I should talk to her.
Count Stefan said he would gather his knights and meet me at the docks in Vastyr. I should head there as soon as I can.
We met Lady Arabelle at the docks. Za'ji's ship is ready to sail. Time to climb aboard and travel to Y'ffelon.
We gathered some clues in Y'ffre's Path. I should discuss what they mean with Elder Pitof.
We arrived on Y'ffelon. I should talk to Lady Arabelle before we move deeper into the island.
The journal we found mentions that the Chronicle's spirit motes descended on a Firesong Druid and forced them to go toward the waterfalls. We should search there for more information.
I met up with Druid Laurel and Frii near Ivyhame. I should speak with Druid Laurel about our plan.

Frii senses the sacred seeds somewhere in Ivyhame. Laurel suggested we examine the door to the ancient strongholdâ€”a door that hasn't been opened in centuries. That may be where Archdruid Orlaith has taken the seeds.
Archdruid Orlaith tried to enter Ivyhame but the door refused to open. Before we could act, she returned to the Firesong island of Y'ffelon. I should talk to Frii about what we should do next.
Frii wants a closer look at the door Archdruid Orlaith was interested in.
Frii believes we can gain entrance to the Ivy Throne where Archdruid Orlaith failed. They asked me to find druid stones around the vale. We need to activate them before Frii can open the sealed door.
We found a Firesong Druid under the influence of the Chronicle's spirit motes. Elder Pitof is restraining the druid so I can talk to them.
Lanazha said Kiko can repeat the riddles for me. I should talk to the bird.
Kiko the bird told me two riddles. I wonder where they lead?
I solved the riddles and found two buried fragments. I should check in with Lanazha about them forming a key.
Kiko gave me another riddle when I showed him the key. I should solve it and seek the final treasure.
I found the Gloomlantern. I should surprise Lanazha with it in Vastyr.
I need to give the Gloomlantern to Lanazha and get my share for helping her recover the treasure.

Lord Bacaro's Ascendant Order, consisting of rogue knights and druids loyal to him, guards the main path into Mount Firesong. While our allies draw their attention, Lady Arabelle and I need to find another way to get in.
We found an opening in the mountain. It may be a way inside. I should enter the cave and make sure.
We found a way into the mountain. Now to find Lord Bacaro.
Firesong Druids seem to be using Frii to awaken the spirit of the volcano. I need to rescue them.
We entered the door in the hillside. I should talk to Frii and find out if they know where we should go next.

Druid Henyra of the Firesong said she needed to defend the Chronicle before she broke out of Elder Pitof's restraints. She ran under the waterfall and through a door. I should talk to Elder Pitof about what happened.
Frii wants to explore this place and follow the song that only they can hear. We should look around.
A message from an apprentice of the last Druid King urged Frii to go to the Ivy Throne. I should accompany them.
Another vision directed Frii toward a door in the wall. I should follow them inside.
The vision wants Frii to mix some sort of elixir. I should talk to them about this.
Frii asked me to gather the three herbs from the garden as the elder in the vision instructed.
I gathered the herbs. Now to place them in the cauldron as Frii instructed.
Frii says that the elixir is ready. I need to drink from the cauldron so that we can see what Elder Aiven waited centuries to show us.
I'm inside Elder Aiven's memory, experiencing a time in the distant past. I should speak with Druid King Kasorayn.
Druids who serve the Allwither are attacking the Temple of Y'ffelon. The Druid King asked me to escort him to the ritual chamber.
We reached the temple's ritual chamber. I should speak with the Druid King to see what he needs me to do next.
Elder Verline told me to align two druid stones above the ritual chamber to summon the light of the moons.
Elder Verline struck down the Druid King as the ritual was completed! I should speak with Kasorayn and see if he's all right.
Druid King Kasorayn is gravely wounded. He asked me to gather the three sacred seeds.
I gathered the sacred seeds. Now to go to the center of the chamber and help the Druid King summon the guardian.
The Firesong Druid entered the Chronicle's tunnels. We should follow her and see if we can find Elder Gwenaelle somewhere inside.
Frii says they can get us out of this chamber before the lava rises and overtakes us. I just need to defend them long enough to do whatever it is they have planned.
The spirit of the mountain has fallen under Lord Bacaro's command and has created avatars to stop me. I need to defeat these manifestations of the mountain's fury before I can reach Bacaro.
The volcano erupted, but the surrounding islands were spared. It's time to return to Vastyr.
Somehow, Frii returned me to the Perfect Pounce. I should tell Lady Arabelle what happened inside the mountain.
Elder Pitof and I saw a vision when I examined the muse-mouth plant. It seemed to be a recent event and not a story from the distant past. We should continue to search for Elder Gwenaelle.
Druid King Kasorayn asked me to help summon Urdiir the Guardian. He told me to look for a mote of light in the Temple of Y'ffelon.
The memory-vision has ended. I should talk to Frii about what we saw.
We learned why the Druid King's regalia were transformed into the sacred seeds and that a powerful guardian watches over Kasorayn's tomb in the Temple of Y'ffelon. We should find Druid Laurel.
We found Druid Laurel's staff and signs of a struggle. I should pick it up and hang on to it for her.
I should speak with Frii about what happened to Druid Laurel.
I should return to Vastyr. I need to tell Sir Stefan what I learned in Ivyhame and deliver the news of Druid Laurel's disappearance.
We found a room with a view of a massive, root-covered orb. Elder Pitof said it was the Chronicle. I should talk to him and find out what I'm looking at.
The Chronicle showed us another vision of the attack on Y'ffre's Path. Whatever happened in the past, Elder Gwenaelle is still in danger. We should keep looking for her.
I found the magic-infused cloth. I should meet Quen at the entrance to the sea witch's sanctum on top of the cliffs.
I should talk to Quen about the medallion we found. She may have recognized it.
I should cover the relic with the magic-infused cloth.
The old druid relic is covered with the sea witch's magic-infused cloth. We should take it and get out of here before others come looking.
There's a door from this area of the caves. We should get out of this place and talk outside.
We found the relic, dampened its effects, and escaped the sea witch cavern. I should talk to Quen and make sure the job's complete.
Just as we located Elder Gwenaelle, we watched as she transformed into a forest wraith before our very eyes. I should check on Elder Pitof. He seems pretty upset.

The Chronicle turned Elder Gwenaelle into a forest wraith in an effort to create defenders to protect it. Elder Pitof hopes he can convince the Chronicle to turn her back. We just have to find her first.
The Chronicle asked me to help stop it from creating more forest wraiths. It wants me to pour Y'ffre's rain on its roots.

The Alliance Leaders seem eager to begin the peace talks, but they grow tired of the delays. I should find Lord Bacaro at the western docks in Gonfalon Bay and ask him if he's ready to let Lady Arabelle begin the peace talks.
I should discuss our findings with Umindior. He sure seems tired.

Philian Ashcroft of Ashcroft's Fine Goods and Imports sold a large order of wine to the seneschal of Castle Navireâ€”including bottles of the vintage used to poison Lady Arabelle. I need to go to Castle Navire and find Duchess Elea.
I found Duchess Elea in the knight commander's office while the rest of the castle undergoes repairs. I need to ask her about the evidence that suggests that she's working with the Ascendant Order.
I planted the seeds as Druid Edaen directed. Now I should check with her and find out if she thinks that's enough to keep the Faun herd safe from the wolves.

Duchess Elea claims no connection to the Ascendant Order and says she received a gift similar to the one that poisoned Lady Arabelle. She said I could examine it. It's in the knight commander's private chamber.

The note and the bottle of wine appear similar to the gift that Lady Arabelle received, including the fact that the wine smells faintly of garlic, which indicates the presence of the poison. I should talk to Duchess Elea.
I should go to the docks in Gonfalon Bay and talk to Lady Arabelle Davaux.
I should talk to Quen and plan our next move.
Quen wants to find Umindior and plan our next steps to get that relic. I should return to their camp.
We returned to camp after Quen's romantic picnic, but Umindior is nowhere to be found. Looks like he left a note. I should read what he wrote.
Veshin has a key to the sea witch's sanctum. I should take it off him while he's asleep, thanks to Quen's knockout potion.
I need to enter Fauns' Thicket to plant the seeds that Druid Edaen provided me with.
Druid Edaen marked the locations where she wants me to plant the fast-growing seeds. I should travel to each one and do as she asked.
The shaman keep to themselves in a series of caves at the back of this cove. I have a key we took from Veshin, so we should be able to slip inside.
Quen spotted something, a piece of jewelry. I should grab it.
We entered the shaman caves. I should look around and find the relic.
I should talk to Quen and hand over the druid relic to complete this job so she and Umindior can return to the Thieves Guild.
Druid Ryvana and I found Captain Marguerite at Steadfast Manor. I should ask her about the crates of armor we found in the Ascendant Order's hideout.
I found plenty of giant sunflowers and killed Timbershade the forest wraith. I should report back to <<1>>.
I need to kill Timbershade the forest wraith and collect sunflowers in the clearing.
The notice directed me to talk to Arbaud Cedmaine in the city of Vastyr for more details.
I should ask Arbaud Cedmaine how I go about signing up for one of these daily jobs.
Quen wants to split up to quickly cover more ground. One of us needs to find Umindior while the other starts searching for the relic. I should ask her which task she wants me to do.
Druid Fenas is helping Joslin and Octin figure out how to break the curse. I should talk to him and see what needs to be done.
I found several radiant cores within Embervine. I need to return them to Juline Courcelles to collect my reward.
I need to travel to Embervine on the eastern coast of Galen.
I sketched several examples of natural phenomena in Embervine. I should return to Juline Courcelles for my reward.
I need to reach Embervine. It's on the eastern coast of Galen.
I captured several critters in Faun's Thicket. I should return to Juline Courcelles to collect my reward.
I need to make my way to Fauns' Thicket. It should be northwest of Vastyr.
I should return to Juline Courcelles with the kingsblood blossoms so I can collect my reward.
I need to travel to Fauns' Thicket on the western coast of Galen.
I placed all of the handbills around Llanshara. I should return to Juline Courcelles to claim my reward.
I entered Llanshara. Now I need to place the handbills around the settlement.
I have placed the trail markers in Y'ffre's Path. I should return to Juline Courcelles to collect my reward.
I need to make my way to Y'ffre's Path, a druidic site located in the center of Galen.
I should talk to Druid Ryvana about the meaning of the ancient carvings.
I need to travel to Llanshara on the northeast coast of Galen.
I need to kill Timbershade the forest wraith and rescue the captive hirelings.
I killed the forest wraith and released the captive hirelings. I should return to <<1>>.
I need to kill Timbershade the forest wraith and gather three radiant phoenix moths within the forest.
I defeated Timbershade the forest wraith and gathered some radiant phoenix moths. I should return to <<1>>.
I need to defeat the chimera and recover the druidic relics used to empower it.
I defeated the chimera and recovered the druid relics. I should return to Druid Gastoc.
I need to defeat the chimera and gather samples from the senche, wamasu, and gryphon heads to heal the victims.
I killed the chimera and found components from the senche, wamasu, and gryphon. I should return to Druid Gastoc.
I need to defeat the rampaging chimera and check on Stonelore shrines in the area.
I restored the shrines and killed the chimera. I should return to Druid Gastoc.
Lady Arabelle tasked me with inviting Count Stefan Mornard, Druid Laurel, Druid Ryvana, and Za'ji and Caska to the peace talks. I should go speak with them.
I invited everyone Lady Arabelle requested to attend the peace talks. Now I should meet her on All Flags Islet.
I made it to All Flags Islet. I should head into All Flags Castle and speak to Lady Arabelle.
Lady Arabelle informed me that the alliance leaders want to speak with me before the peace talks get underway. I should go downstairs and talk to them.
Count Stefan Mornard asked everyone to enter the Reception Hall. I should head there now.
Count Stefan wants to speak to me. I should see what he wants.
Lady Arabelle wishes to speak to me before the speech. I should talk to her.
I learned of the hunter's crusade from a paper notice, which directed me to a camp near Karthwatch in Western Skyrim.
Now that I'm in Fauns' Thicket I should be on the lookout for wispleaf blooms. Placing the lures nearby should attract critters for me to capture.
Sir Stefan asked me to find Frii and explain what we need them to do. Frii said they would meet me in the Vine District.
Sir Stefan convinced Captain Siravaen to help us rescue the captives the Firesong Druids are holding on Y'ffelon. I should talk to the captain when I'm ready to board her ship.

Captain Siravaen will bring her Gilded Blades to the defense of Vastyr, but only if I help her get her ship back. Sir Stefan said she's waiting for me near the docks of Castle Tonnere somewhere along the western shore.
I found Captain Siravaen. I should speak with her.
Captain Siravaen wants me to free her ship, the Mad Maiden, while she liberates her trapped crew. I need to make my way down to the docks to accomplish this.
I need to destroy the four moorings holding the Mad Maiden to the docks and lower the harbor chain before we can set sail.
Captain Siravaen and her crew are aboard the Mad Maiden. I should talk to her and see if we're ready to sail to Vastyr now.
We arrived in Vastyr but the siege of the city has already begun. I need to make my way to Sir Stefan and join in the battle.
Sir Stefan wants to find his father, whose somewhere inside the city. We need to fight our way through in order to locate him.
The archdruids and their seeds are apparently targets of the Dreadsails. Count Mornard saw Archdruid Ellic flee into the old druid tunnels to the east earlier. I need to find him.
I found Archdruid Ellic surrounded by Dreadsails pirates. I need to save him.
Now that Archdruid Ellic is safe, I should speak with him.
Archdruid Ellic lost his sacred seed to the Dreadsails. While Sir Stefan escorts him to the cathedral, I need to find Archdruid Rahval. Hopefully, he still possesses his sacred seed.
I ran into Sealord Nalos while searching for Archdruid Rahval. I should end the threat of the Dreadsails leader now.
Now that Sealord Nalos is dead, I can continue to search for Archdruid Rahval.
Captain Siravaen suggested I return to Castle Mornard and check on Sir Stefan, I should head there now.
I need to go to Glimmertarn, the druid village north of Vastyr, to meet with Sir Stefan Mornard.
I arrived in Glimmertarn. Now I should find Sir Stefan and talk to him.

We saw Archdruid Orlaith take the sacred seeds from both the Eldertide and Stonelore Circles before she killed Archdruid Rahval and the cathedral collapsed. Sir Stefan ran toward the destruction. I should follow him.
Sir Stefan is waiting for me at Vastyr's docks. I should find him and let him know that Frii is willing to go along with his plan.
It's time to board the Mad Maiden and sail for Y'ffelon. There's a small boat at the dock, waiting to take me to the ship.
I woke to the sounds of battle! I need to go up on deck and help fend off the attack.
The Mad Maiden is grappled by a Firesong ship. I should make my way to the enemy ship alongside ours.
Captain Siravaen asked me to keep watch for more enemy ships.
Two more enemy ships are closing in on us. I must signal the crew to prepare our ballistas.
Captain Siravaen ordered me to come forward and take charge of the bow ballista.
A new wave of boarders are storming the Mad Maiden. I must defeat them before they seize control of our ship.
A ballista on the enemy ship is ready. I need to fire on the last attacking ship.
I drove off the approaching ships and defeated the Firesong commander. Captain Siravaen wants to speak with me.
The commander of the Firesong ship grappling the Mad Maiden is ready to stop us. We won't get free until I defeat him.
Captain Siravaen told me to go below so we can resume our voyage to Y'ffelon.
We landed on Y'ffelon. Sir Stefan wants to speak with me before we proceed with his plan.
While Sir Stefan heads for the temple, he asked me to go east and free the captives from Vastyr. I should search for them in that direction.
I located the some of the captives. I should free them.
Dhulef told me Archdruid Orlaith took Druid Laurel and Frii to the Temple of Y'ffelon. I should make my way to the temple and try to find them and Sir Stefan.
I found the entrance to the Temple of Y'ffelon. I should head inside.
I found Sir Stefan inside the Temple of Y'ffelon. He wants to speak with me before we continue.
Sir Stefan believes Archdruid Orlaith and Frii are in Druid King Kasorayn's Tomb, which is said to lie at the heart of the temple. We need to get past any Firesong guards and enter the tomb.
We found Druid Laurel. I should set her free.
Druid King Kasorayn's Tomb lies in the heart of the Temple of Y'ffelon. I should make my way inside and look for a chance to stop Archdruid Orlaith.
I should wait until Frii awakens the ancient guardian before I attack.
Frii unleashed Urdiir the Guardian upon the Firesong Druids. Now's my chance to take the battle to Archdruid Orlaith and put an end to her dangerous plans.
We defeated Archdruid Orlaith. The remaining Firesong surrendered to Frii, who now holds the Druid King's reforged regaliaâ€”the crown, staff, and gauntlet. I should speak to Frii.
Dhulef found us and opened a portal to Vastyr. I should use it to return to the city.
Now that I have found Embervine, I need to look for the various natural features Juline wants me to sketch for her.
I need to find Marcelle, somewhere on Amenos Station, to see what kind of help she requires.
I reached Fauns' Thicket. I should search the area for kingsblood blossoms.
Elder Pitof gave me a vial of Y'ffre's rain, purified water which can shrink the bloated muse-mouth plants and stop them from spewing spirit motes. I need to pour the water on the plants.
I cleared the cloud of spirit motes. Now I should wait for Elder Pitof to handle the vines blocking the way ahead.
Elder Pitof cleared away the vines on the door. Time to continue searching for Elder Gwenaelle.
A Telvanni Matriarch was here, then vanished. A massive nix-ox emerged to defend the anomaly. I should kill Roksa the Warped so Saresea has the opportunity to contain the anomaly.
The distortion is destabilizing. I should watch Saresea's attempt to contain it.
I returned back to my time. Saresea managed to end the temporal distortion's effects. I should talk to her to receive my reward.
Matriarch Lladi Telvanni has waited for decades. She predicted we'd arrive and protects the temporal distortion. I should defeat her so Saresea can try once more to contain it.
Saresea wants to split up to cover more ground in our search. She suggested I go north towards a tower at the town's center. I should search through Bal Sunnar for the temporal distortion.
We found the temporal distortion's source. Kovan Giryon seems to know who we are, and stands between us and the distortion. I should kill Kovan Giryon to reach it.
Kovan Giryon is defeated, but the distortion is destabilizing. I need to watch as Saresea contains the temporal distortion.
I need to talk to Saresea.
I need to complete Bal Sunnar.
I cleared out Bal Sunnar and preserved time.\n\nI should find <<1>> in my alliance's capital city.
<<1>> presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Matriarch Lladi Telvanni."
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
<<1>> is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.

Lord Bacaro has proclaimed himself the Druid King and used Frii to awaken the spirit of the mountain. We need to find him and stop him before he unleashes the power of the volcano and destroys the archipelago.

We ran into another room filled with a deadly cloud of spirit motes. I should douse the bloated muse-mouth plants with Y'ffre's rain as I did before to clear the air enough for Elder Pitof to cross the chamber.
I cleared the cloud of spirit motes. Now I have to wait for Elder Pitof to remove the vines blocking our way forward.
Elder Pitof cleared away the vines from the door. Time to continue our hunt for Elder Gwenaelle.
Lord Bacaro has proclaimed himself the new Druid King and taken a portion of the mountain spirit's power for himself. I need to stop him before the volcano erupts and destroys the archipelago.
I defeated Lord Bacaro, but the volcano is still about to erupt. I should talk to Frii and see what they think we can do.

Frii asked me to help bind them to the mountain so that they can take the place of the spirit and calm the volcano before it fully erupts. I need to form a ritual circle with the sacred crown and gauntlet.
The second step in the ritual is to heat the sap with the fire shard's flame. I should do that now.
The final step is to apply the heated sap to the broken tablet so that the tablet becomes whole again. I should do that now.
Now that I am at Y'ffre's Path I should place the markers along a likely path through the ruin.
Druid Laurel asked me to meet her at the Telling Stone, a landmark north of Vastyr, before attending the Draoife.
I found Druid Laurel and Sir Stefan Mornard at the Telling Stone, along with a strange being called Frii. I should talk to Druid Laurel.
Now that I'm inside Embervine, I need to find the radiant cores scattered around the area.
I returned to Fauns' Thicket with the fire shard and the sacred sap. I should talk to Druid Fenas and find out what we need to do next.

Elder Pitof thinks he found the transformed Gwenaelle, but the Chronicle is angry. It won't listen to any druid right now. So Elder Pitof asked me to speak to it and convince it to stop what it's doing.
We entered the Chronicle's tunnels. I should search for Elder Gwenaelle.
We found a muse-mouth plant. Elder Pitof sensed that it has a story to share with us. He wants me to examine it.
Dhulef brought me a message from Sir Stefan. He wants to talk to me at Castle Mornard as soon as possible.
I arrived at Castle Mornard. I should speak with Sir Stefan.
Elder Pitof told me about the Chronicle, which appears as a glowing orb surrounded by massive roots. We still haven't found Elder Gwenaelle, though, so we should keep searching.
We found another muse-mouth plant. I should examine it to see what the Chronicle wants to show us.
I returned to Vastyr and made my way to Castle Mornard. I need to tell Count Mornard what happened at the meeting of the Draoife.
The temporal anomaly shifted us through time. The tower appears newly built. However, the anomaly isn't here. I should leave the tower and search for its new location.
We entered a period some time in the past. Saresea suggested we split up to search for the anomaly's new location. I should explore Bal Sunnar to find the anomaly.
We moved through time once again, this time to the future. Saresea's attempt at containing the anomaly exhausted her. I should find the anomaly so she can try containing it one last time.
Saresea continues to fight the temporal anomaly and attempt to contain. I should watch her final attempt.
I finished planting Druid Edaen's seeds. I should meet with her and Mohair outside Fauns' Thicket.
When I locate a volcanic vent, I must disrupt the forces encouraging it to erupt and defeat them. This will keep the vent from erupting.
I disrupted one of the volcanic vents and prevented it from erupting. I should return to Druid Aishabeh to report my success.
We need to look around Clohaigh for any clues that will lead us to Frii.
I should take the Society of the Steadfast supplies to Lord Bacaro Volorus, and then find Sir Stefan Mornard.
I should speak with Lord Bacaro Volorus of the Society of the Steadfast.
I should make my way to the city of Vastyr on Galen in the Systres Archipelago.
Seems that Umindior was captured. We may find him along with the relicâ€”as well as some angry sea witches.
Druid Laurel gave me the pouch of soil that Frii prepared and asked me to meet her at the overlook north of Glimmertarn, by a beautiful tree.
I arrived at the tree on the overlook north of Glimmertarn. Druid Laurel asked me to sprinkle the soil from the pouch around the base of the tree to honor Frii's request.
When I sprinkled the soil in the tree bed, something magical happened. I should talk to Druid Laurel so I can understand what I just witnessed.
I should talk to Lady Arabelle and see what she needs from me.
When I locate a volcanic vent, I must disrupt the forces encouraging it to erupt and defeat them. This will keep the vent from erupting.
I disrupted one of the volcanic vents and prevented it from erupting. I should return to Druid Aishabeh to report my success.
We need to search this area and find Frii.
