Kiko's first riddle is: "This half sleeps beneath the shade, in tangled roots of tunneled glade. A stream of fire cuts the trees, yet south of home for he who sees."
Kiko's second riddle is: "The second piece is within reach, between vaster shores and wind-wracked beach. Craft approach with spade in hand, eye the cauldron and turn the sand."
The two buried pieces I found seem to make a key. Maybe Kiko knows something about it?
We found Umindior. He was captured by Minahel, the leader of the Dreadsail sea witches. We need to free him and then get to the relic.
Lanazha wants to toast before I hand over the treasure and get my reward. I should drink with her.
Lanazha wants me to meet her at the tavern in Vastyr with the Gloomlantern.
Druid Laurel told me there's a path down to Broken Oar Cove. I should head east toward the shore and find it.
We're ready to sail for Vastyr. Captain Siravaen told me to go below decks and then we'll be on our way.
We found Count Mornard, I should speak with him about the status of the battle.
I returned to Vastyr. Now I should tell Sir Stefan what we learned in Ivyhame and what happened to Druid Laurel.
Frii summoned a wind vortex to carry us out of the caldera. I should use it to escape before the rising lava overtakes us.
The Druid King wants me to help Elder Verline with the ritual. I should speak to him.
Frii summoned another wind vortex. I should use it to escape the rising lava.
I need to find Lord Bacaro and try to stop him before the spirit of the volcano destroys the archipelago.
I uncovered plans to steal <<1>> 's dragon frog. I should inform him of the danger so that he can protect himself and his beloved friend.

Chef Rhazeez needs me to gather vulk'esh meat, volcanic reaper peppers, and a local brandy for his signature dish. The meat and peppers can be found in the wilds of Galen, but I'll need to seek out the brandy at the Jaded Ornaug Tavern.
I gathered all the ingredients Chef Rhazeez asked for. I should return so that he can proceed with cooking his signature dish.
Frii has become the spirit of Mount Firesong and is doing what they can to quiet the volcano. I need to get out of here.
I should meet my allies at Castle Mornard.
We found a room filled with spirit motes. I should talk to Elder Pitof and see if he knows how to disperse the cloud.
I need to retrieve Jocien's ring from his skeleton that washed up on shore.
I should speak to Frelene Rane and deliver her husband's ring to her.
Count Mornard has summoned me to Castle Mornard. I should go and see what he wants.
I freed the Mad Maiden. I should make my way to the ship's deck and meet with Captain Siravaen.

We rescued the captives held on Y'ffelon and stopped the threat of Archdruid Orlaith and the Firesong Circle. What to do with the Druid King's regalia is still an open question.I should speak with Sir Stefan about what they decided.
I should reconnect with Mel. He's returned to his encampment, and I should follow.
Galen is safe now that the threat of the Firesong and Dreadsails has been dealt with. Sir Stefan says it's time for him to take up the mantle of his father. I should ask him how he feels about that.
Using the riddle clues, I was able to uncover the locked chest that held the Gloomlantern. I should talk to Lanazha and show her what I found.
The note references a Redguard trader named <<1>>, apparently staying in Vastyr. I should find and warn him that his dragon frog has drawn attention.
Sir Stefan wants me to come to the castle. I should go and talk to him.
Lady Arabelle sent Za'ji to request my help in finalizing security measures for the peace talks. I should meet her at her manor in Gonfalon Bay.
Lady Arabelle sent Za'ji to request my help in finalizing security measures for the peace talks. I should meet her at her manor in Gonfalon Bay.
Lady Arabelle asked me to sail to Vastyr to talk to Count Stefan Mornard in order to secure his help when the Ascendant Lord makes his next move against the peace talks.
Sir Stefan arrived in Glimmertarn and wants to speak to me. I should see what's so important that he left Vastyr when the Dreadsails attack is imminent.
Sir Stefan is digging through the rubble of the collapsed cathedral. I should speak to him and what I can do to help.

The siege of Vastyr appears to have ended with the death of Sealord Nalos and the betrayal of Archdruid Orlaith. Sir Stefan asked me to find Captain Siravaen and convince her that we still need her help.
I found Captain Siravaen. I should talk to her.
Lord Bacaro of the Society of the Steadfast wishes to speak to me before I meet with Sir Stefan. I should talk to him.
I need to travel to Vastyr and find Jocien's wife, Frelene.
The captives I found told me there are more people to rescue to the southeast.
I found Dhulef with more captives from Vastyr. He wants to speak to me.
I found Frelene Rane. I should speak with her.
Before I go check the location beneath the cliffs of Garick's Rest, I should meet up with Druid Ryvana at her workshop.
One of the clues we uncovered mentioned a garden used by the Ascendant Lord's druid alchemist. We should locate that garden and see if we can get samples of the plants used to create the poison.
I gathered all the ingredients Chef Rhazeez asked for. I should return so that he can proceed with cooking his signature dish.
Sir Stefan is at Castle Mornard. I should speak with him there.
I should take the Society of the Steadfast supplies to Lord Bacaro Volorus, and then find Sir Stefan Mornard.
Lord Bacaro advised me to speak with Sir Stefan Mornard, who is leading the response against the Sea Elf raids. Sir Stefan should know where I can help the most.
Sir Stefan Mornard is here with Lord Bacaro. Sir Stefan should know how I can help fight off the Sea Elf raids.
I made some sort of agreement with Hermaeus Mora to help save his realm of Apocrypha and thereby also protect Nirn. I should talk to Leramil about how to do that.
I completed the three tasks Leramil appointed to me on behalf of Hermaeus Mora. I should speak to her about what's next.
I should speak with Curate Gadayn about what happened here in Necrom Abbey.
I took the soul gem from Master Shelreni's sanctum and rescued Meln the Mouthless. Now I should talk to the spirit and find out how he can help us save Apocrypha and Nirn.
Torvesard came to Apocrypha to examine three secret tomes related to lost dreams, a Black Book, and a pact between the Daedric Princes. I should talk to Scruut about all this.
I told Leramil what occurred in the memory inside the Eye of Mora. There's still a chance to save reality if we work together. I should talk to her about that.

Using a rite from Meln's Black Book and the restored statue of Vaermina, Torvesard and Blightcrown opened a way into Apocrypha. Now Vaermina has entered Mora's realm, wearing the body of Master Shelreni. I should talk to Leramil.
Curate Gadayn says that Leramil wants a word with me. I should speak to her before Gadayn starts his speech.
I encouraged the workers to stay on at Anchre Egg Mine and help rebuild. I should talk to Cindieth to hear her thoughts and receive my reward.
Now that I'm outside of Camonnaruhn, I should talk to Ashur.
I destroyed the corrupted scrolls in Quires Wind and discovered the fate of Cipher Sabinius. I should return to Cipher Agrushna and collect my reward.
Ysgild and Vorm are waiting for me outside of the Disquiet Study. I should speak to Ysgild and see if we can return Vorm to his normal form.
I descended the Apogee of the Tormenting Eye and found Zirokh once again. I should tell him of my success.
I should talk to Solni Nrayn and complete the delivery.
The tincture was in fact a poison that killed Oathman Llaro the moment he drank it.
I should talk to Naryu and see how she feels about the resolution of the writ.
I should speak to Leramil and see what she thinks we need to do next.
Tyss remains committed to rebuilding the Remants. I should speak with her about my reward.

Nilphas Drethan and the Painted Eye are no longer a threat to the laboratory of Kemel-Ze. Protus stayed behind to deal with the last of the stragglers, but after all the Painted Eye are gone, Kemel-ze will be closed for good.
Morian is finally free from the confines of the feral gallery. I should talk to him and see how he's doing after being exposed to another Known Thing.
I should speak to Cipher Huzmargo.
I helped Hezehk retrieve the missing secret and complete his task. I should speak with Hezehk to collect my reward.
It seems that returning the Atlas broke the cycle of torture that bound Meenai-Shai and the Morbid Observer to the Cloisters. I should speak with Meenai-Shai and conclude our business.
I have decided to give Eilirsu-dro the real Talisman of Saint Vorys. The Eye of Baan Dar has returned to the hands of the Baandari, and the replica is in Rilasi's hands to return to the shrine.
I should talk to Dacia about her decision to stay with Nathyn at Tel Dreloth.
I should ask High Ordinator Boryn how I go about signing up for one of these daily jobs.
I should return to Ordinator Tandasea and claim my reward.
I chose not to warn Garalo about the prism. He was corrupt already. He deserves to have the prism and the curse that comes with it.
Thaddeus wants to study the restored glyphic. In the meantime, I should talk to Ogle about our strange adventure.
I helped mercenary Sharp-as-Night track down Reynila Treviri, but her death left him with more questions than answers. I should seek my reward and ask Sharp what he's planned next.

Sharp and I found a secret lair belonging to Sondivel Ulres. Inside, we faced a magical projection of the wizard himself as he tried to take control of Sharp using a strange metal called tyranite calx. I saved Sharp and we escaped to safety.

Sondivel, clued in to our location from the resonance of the tyranite calx, has kidnapped Dimik-ei. He's promised to free all his slaves if he can just get Sharp back. Sharp and I need to figure out how to move forward in light of this offer.
My journey with Sharp has led to this moment. I helped him learn more about his broken past and see to the end of Sondivel Ulres. I should check in with Sharp and see how he's feeling.
Traveling with Azandar has been very interesting. He proposed continuing our collaboration and wants to adventure alongside me. I should speak to him one more time about his notion.
I should talk to Azandar about what occurred in the Lost City of Na-Totambu.
I should speak to Azandar about what occurred in Nchuleftingth.
With the adversary banished and the Fateweaver Key cast into the sea, I should speak to Azandar about our adventure one last time.
Now I should talk to Leramil and let her know what happened inside Hermaeus Mora's memory.
Druid Laurel spotted a door protected by the ward on the other side of this large chamber. We need to find a way to dispel the ward before we can continue our search for Frii.
I found the cave at the bottom of the bluff. Archdruid Ellic said an entrance to the Castle Tonnere dungeons is inside. I should make my way into the cave and see what I can find.
We freed Umindior. I should follow him to the relic's location.
Dhulef told me that Sir Stefan needs to see me. I should go to Castle Mornard to speak with Sir Stefan.
Leramil provided one of Hermaeus Mora's Books of Forbidden Secrets. She said if I read the book, it will lead me to the secret entrance to the Emerald Glyphic Vault.
All the druid stones have been activated. I should lead Frii back to the sealed door in the hillside.
Now that the druid stones have been activated, Frii believes they can open the sealed door. I should give them a chance to try.
Reading from the Book of Forbidden Secrets revealed glowing runes. I should follow them to find the secret entrance to the Emerald Glyphic Vault.
An Infernium has nested atop the sarcophagus containing the Itinerant Staff. I need to defeat the Infernium before I try to retrieve the staff.
We recovered the Itinerant Staff. Mazandi said she opened a portal back to Scrivener's Hall. We should return and bring the staff back to Keshargo.
I should speak to Keshargo in Scrivener's Hall.
Valinna's going to kill Keshargo for standing in her way. I can't let that happen.
Keshargo said that there's a hidden latch in this bookcase that opens a secret door to Scrivener's Hall.
Valinna told Riftmaster Naqri not to let anyone through the rifts. He's loyal to Valinna and won't let us through unless I defeat him.
Now that Riftmaster Naqri no longer stands in our way, I should follow Keshargo to the Deadlands Rift.
There's an old Khajiit talking about a hidden latch in a bookcase. I should talk to him and see what he's looking for.
I need to complete Scrivener's Hall.
I defeated foes in Scrivener's Hall.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Valinna."
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
I followed the glowing runes and a strange portal revealed itself. It should lead to the Emerald Glyphic Vault. I should enter the portal.
The portal deposited me into some sort of complex. I should look around and locate the Emerald Glyphic.
One of Hermaeus Mora's cultists guards the Emerald Glyphic, and he seems to have been expecting me. I should talk to him.
I should take the Emerald Glyphic before I return to Leramil the Wise.
I acquired the Emerald Glyphic. Now I should use the petrified tentacle talisman to open a portal and return to Leramil the Wise.
I should return to Leramil the Wise and talk to her about what else I need to do.
Now I need to talk to some of Hermaeus Mora's faithful and learn the location of the Shrine of the Golden Eye. Leramil says we need to go there to use the Emerald Glyphic and its counterparts.
Our last possibility for locating the Shrine of the Golden Eye rests with a follower named Naraheida. I need to go to her camp and talk to her.
I arrived too late. Naraheida was murdered, too. But the Hermaeus Mora cultist from the glyphic vault, Dralys Athren, is here. I should talk to him.
Dralys and Leramil gave me riddles that point to two different locations in Claw's Strike where the Shrine of the Golden Eye can be accessed. I should go there and decide which entrance to use.
I entered the Shrine of the Golden Eye. Now to find Leramil and see what we're supposed to do with the glyphics.
Dralys was the traitor after all. I need to kill him and get the glyphics he took from Leramil.
I killed the traitor Dralys. Now to take the Onyx and Umber Glyphics.
Now that I have the glyphics, I should talk to Leramil.
The Daedric Prince of Fate, Hermaeus Mora, appeared. I should talk to him.

Hermaeus Mora says we need an agreement to protect both his realm and Nirn from either of us doing anything underhanded. He wants me to use the glyphics and sign some sort of contract. I should use the glyphics and see what happens.
I used the glyphics and signed the contract, then Hermaeus Mora departed. Now I should use the portal Leramil opened and leave the shrine as well.
Za'ji showed up outside Castle Navire with a message for me. I should talk to him.
Lady Arabelle asked me to assist Druid Laurel. I should talk to her and find out what she needs me to do.
Now that I finished assisting Druid Laurel, I should go to Mandrake Manor on High Isle and see what I can do for Lady Arabelle.
The Chronicle wants me to pour the remaining water on the spirit orb to finally end the troubles at Y'ffre's Path.

I did as the Chronicle asked and destroyed the corrupted spirit. In return, it transformed Elder Gwenaelle back into her original form. I should talk to Elder Pitof and make sure everything is all right.

Rilasi urged me to start by questioning individuals at the shrine and the Baandari camp nearby. They could provide information vital for stopping the theft. Investigating the shrine and the camp might turn up some useful clues as well.
I questioned all relevant individuals and found all the clues I could around the shrine and Baandari camp. I should return to where I met Rilasi to tell her what I discovered.
The Lark of Rosgard escaped into the Sailenmora crypts under the Shrine of Saint Vorys. Rilasi thinks we can catch him. I should head into the crypts with Rilasi.
Rilasi and I entered the crypts beneath the Shrine of Saint Vorys. We must continue our pursuit.
Rilasi thinks the Lark of Rosgard is nearby. I should search for him.
The Lark of Rosgard says he's stolen the real Talisman of Saint Vorys, which somehow ended up in the Sailenmora Crypts. I should speak to Rilasi to understand what happened.

Unbeknownst to High Priest Trilam, Rilasi swapped out the real talisman for a replica to try and fool the Lark. Based on what I discovered, Rilasi and I think the Lark may be headed to the Baandari camp with the real talisman. I should go there now.
Someone ransacked the Baandari camp. I should search for clues on what happened here.
Shadeya and her mercenaries are holding Eilirsu-dro's family hostage in the Old Sailenmora Outpost nearby. The Lark has a plan to rescue them. I should head into the outpost.
The Lark of Rosgard appeared at the Baandari camp, looking confused. I should speak with him about what happened here.
Shadeya is holding the hostages somewhere in the Old Sailenmora Outpost. Per the Lark's plan, I should track her down to bargain with her.
Shadeya wants to exchange her hostages for the Talisman of Saint Vorys. I should speak to her and keep her talking.
Shadeya ran off once she realized she'd been tricked. I should rescue Eiliru-dro's family members before anyone else gets hurt.
I released all the hostages. I should leave the outpost and make sure everyone made it to safety.
The Lark of Rosgard met me outside the outpost. I should speak with him.
I have decided to return both the real and replica talismans to Rilasi so she can destroy the replica and see the relic returned to the shrine.
A passing pilgrim told me of a strange investigation happening at the Shrine of Saint Vorys in Sailenmora. I should journey to see what's happening there.
A thief has declared his intent to steal the Talisman of Saint Vorys from the shrine in Sailenmora. I should speak to someone familiar with the situation.
Sharp suggested I start my search by speaking to his associate Harn Orenvi in the Necrom Outlaws Refuge.
Harn Orenvi told me that Reynila called on an old friend in Necrom, a fence named Deredrien. I should go to Deredrien's place and see what information she can give me on Reynila.
Deredrien the fence isn't at home. I should look for clues as to her whereabouts or any information on Reynila.
Reynila's letter to Deredrien mentions she was staying in a campsite across the river from the old Sailenmora outpost. I should let Sharp know what the letter says.
Sharp wants to speak with me before we head to Reynila's campsite.
Sharp and I are headed to search Reynila's campsite. Sharp thinks we should be ready for a fight.
The first step toward stopping the Painted Eye from ransacking Kemel-Ze is finding the entrance. I should look for it.
I spotted Nilphas Drethan talking to a construct. He might have information I can use. I should talk with him.
Nilphas Drethan said he will be able to drive the Painted Eye out of Kemel-Ze. I was just about to leave when the Factotum Nilphas said was broken started talking. Maybe it can tell me more.
Protus seems like it has a lot to tell me, but its missing components are stopping it from speaking clearly. I should retrieve the components it's missing so it can begin repairing itself.
I retrieved the components Protus needs to repair itself. I need to head back and give them to Protus.

Protus thinks the Painted Eye and Nilphas Drethan are working together. Protus used to be able to control the security measures in Kemel-Ze, but it needs Mnemonic Fragments to regain that function. I should help Protus gather what it needs.
I gathered the three major Mnemonic fragments. I should talk to Protus and see what else we can do to stop the Painted Eye.

Protus believes Nilphas Drethan is working with the Painted Eye to break into the Inner Laboratory. According to Protus, they're after the Clockwork Probabilis. We have to get there before the Painted Eye or, as seems more likely, Nilphas Drethan.
Nilphas Drethan took control of the Clockwork Probabilis. Protus said this machine could wreak havoc on Nirn. I have to stop Nilphas Drethan by any means necessary.
I defeated Nilphas Drethan. I should ensure the Clockwork Probabilis isn't too damaged from our fight.
Sotha Sil, or a projection of him, appeared and started talking about mnemonic fragments. I should speak to him and find out what's going on.
Sotha Sil's projection vanished and Protus wants to talk to me. After what happened, I should see if the Factotum knows anything more.
Tyss told me to enter the Remnants' keep through a cave to the north. I should head there and enter the Cenotaph.
Tyss told me there are some old traps the Remnants weren't able to set up during their escape. We should use them to slow the Dreamcarvers.
Tyss and I armed the traps under the Cenotaph. They should help clear out Dreamcarver invaders. I should talk to Tyss and learn about our next steps.
Tyss mentioned sensing something from the center of the keep. We should head there to investigate.
The Dreamcarvers are performing some large scale magic. We should try to put a stop to it.
We stopped the first ritual. Maybe the Dreamcarvers left something that could inform us of their plans.
It looks like the Dreamcarvers want something from the Remnants. Maybe Tyss has further insight.
It seems there are more rituals going on in the keep. We should stop the rituals before they accomplish their goal.
It looks like Tyss might have learned something. I should talk to her.
Tyss believes the Dreamcarvers are targeting the Remnants' pact with Hermaeus Mora. We need some relics to repair their damage.
We need to stop the Dreamcarvers' final ritual before we can go about repairing their damage.
We need to hurry and place the relics as directed so we can inspect the Remnants' pact for damage.
The relics opened a pathway. We should hurry before the portal closes.
The portal revealed that the Remnants' pact is in a bad state. We need to fix it before the Dreamcarvers achieve their goal.
I dispatched Uxunath and ensured the safety of the Crux. Tyss seems confused about the state of this space we're in. She wants to examine the book at the center. I should join her in reading it.
When the Dremora, Plokun, crashed on Nirn, his Daedric creatures fled. He asked me to recover his compass and whistle so I can find and retrieve the creatures.
Plokun's menagerie has finally been safely transported to Fargrave with the successful completion of his spell. I should speak with Plokun to see if he needs anything else.
Zirokh handed me a rune that hums with energy. He said I can use it to close the Dremnaken portals and reactivate the shrine's protective wards. I should ascend the Apogee to begin my work.
I ascended the Apogee of the Tormenting Eye. I should secure its relics, close Dremnaken portals, then reset the protective wards.
I gathered the relics, closed all the portals I found, then activated the shrine's protective wards. I should return to the Apogee's entrance and tell Zirokh of my success.
I should enter the Anchre Egg Mine in order to help Cindieth perform her audit.
To assist Cindieth with her audit, I need to help her inspect the kwama pens, search the egg mine and try to find the overseer, and note the current condition of the kwama queen.
The mine suffered a major setback, but Cindieth completed her audit. We should exit the mine.
Overseer Ulfengar managed to escape the mine with the few surviving egg tenders. I should speak with him and figure out what the future holds for the miners.
I encouraged the workers to leave Anchre Egg Mine in search of safer working conditions elsewhere. I should talk to Cindieth to hear her thoughts and receive my reward.
Ashur said Luaffyn Romavel is in Camonnaruhn. The sooner I enter the smuggler's den, the sooner I can free those Argonian soldiers.
I must free the captive soldiers and find a way to draw out Luaffyn Romavel.
I freed the soldiers and lured Luaffyn Romavel out of hiding. Ashur fulfilled his writ, and he's waiting for me outside Camonnaruhn.
Keshargo hid the Itinerant Staff somewhere in the Deadlands. He says there's a rift deeper in Scrivener's Hall that will lead us there.
Keshargo said the Itinerant Staff is hidden in a sarcophagus. Zilipif knows the precise location and Mazandi is along to help. I should follow the watcher to where we need to go.
Keshargo wasn't in the study to meet us. Mazandi said we should go and look for him.

Valinna captured Keshargo and is making him lead her to the Itinerant Staff. He's lying though and convinced her that he hid it in the Spiral Skein. I should go through the rift after them and rescue Keshargo before Valinna realizes his scheme.
Leramil the Wise asked me to find Redrith Cistern in the wilds of the Telvanni Peninsula. There I can learn more about the threat facing Hermaeus Mora.
I found the old ruin of Redrith Cistern. Now I need to pour the ink Leramil gave me into the water.
When I poured the ink into the water I summoned Hermaeus Mora! The Daedric Prince of Forbidden Knowledge wants to speak with me.

Hermaeus Mora instructed me to find Leramil the Wise in the city of Necrom, at a place called the Necrom Bindery. There I begin my mission to discover the identity of the conspirators threatening his realm.
I found Leramil the Wise in an abandoned book bindery in the city of Necrom. I should speak to her about the tasks I need to accomplish.

Leramil sees three paths that will reveal the threat to Hermaeus Mora. One leads to Necrom Necroplois, one to Tel Rendys, and one to Alavelis. I need to follow each thread of fate to unmask the conspirators.
Leramil the Wise asked me to find Menos Cistern in the wilds of the Telvanni Peninsula. There I can learn more about the threat facing Hermaeus Mora.
I found the old ruin of Menos Cistern. Now I need to pour the ink Leramil gave me into the water.
When I poured the ink into the water I summoned Hermaeus Mora! The Daedric Prince of Forbidden Knowledge wants to speak with me.
Leramil the Wise asked me to find Ulvano Cistern in the wilds of the Telvanni Peninsula. There I can learn more about the threat facing Hermaeus Mora.
I found the old ruin of Ulvano Cistern. Now I need to pour the ink Leramil gave me into the water.
When I poured the ink into the water I summoned Hermaeus Mora! The Daedric Prince of Forbidden Knowledge wants to speak with me.
Curate Gadayn asked me to begin by investigating the ship Prelate Faram arrived on. Necrom's port master at the harbor might be able tell me more about the Stormwing.
I should find Tyss with the remaining Remnants to see how I can help.
Port Master Ulene won't let me board the Stormwing alone. I can either find her missing assistant or try to persuade her to let me check out the vessel.
I found Port Master Ulene's assistant, Port Agent Randas. He fell ill after inspecting the Stormwing. I should return and let her know what happened.
Prelate Faram arrived in Necrom aboard a ship called the Stormwing. I should go aboard and look for clues concerning the prelate or where he sailed from.

Keshargo's too injured to continue on this journey. He'll meet us back in the study after we retrieve the Itinerant Staff in the Deadlands. Mazandi and Zilipif are waiting for me to go through the rift.
Plokun said that his compass will give me the location of his missing Daedric creatures. I should use it so I can track them down.
With Plokun's compass activated I can now find and return all of his lost Daedric creatures. I should find each of them and use his whistle to send them back to him.
I explored several sites around the Telvanni Peninsula, learning about the conspiracy against Hermaeus Mora. I should return to Necrom so I can discuss my findings with Leramil the Wise.
The port master agreed to let me board the Stormwing. I should search the vessel for anything suspicious.
It seems the prelate might actually be a Peryite cultist called Blightcrown. I need to warn Curate Gadayn.
I returned to Curate Gadayn at the Necrom Necropolis. I should talk to him about what I found aboard the Stormwing.
Curate Gadayn thinks he knows a way we can get into the Necropolis without alerting the imposter prelate or his attendants. I need to meet him in a tunnel on the west side of the Necropolis.
The Dreamcarvers plan has failed. I should follow up with Tyss to discuss her plans.
I met Curate Gadayn at a rarely used door into the Necrom Necropolis. I should head inside.
We gained access to the Necropolis chapel. Now we need to locate Abbot Ilvel.
Inside the chapel, we found strange censers emitting foul vapors that has made the keepers ill. I need to destroy the censers and examine any other evidence I can find here.
I destroyed the censers in the chapel, but evidence we found indicates that the abbot is also in danger. I need to go to his chambers at once.
Abbot Ilvel is delirious with fever. I must destroy the censer that's sickening him.
I destroyed the censer, but Abbot Ilvel remains delirious. I should talk to Curate Gadayn and see if he knows anything about what the abbot mentioned in his delirium.
Curate Gadayn needs to stay with the abbot. He told me to take the catacombs key and search for Blightcrown in the deepest part of the Necropolis.
I spoke to Cipher Huzmargo and he needs me to watch his back while he investigates the Rectory. Our first stop is the Corporea Secretus.
I should reset the magicka focus. With luck, it will stabilize this section of the Rectory.
Cipher Huzmargo seems very disturbed by the waking body we encountered in the Corporea Secretus. He thinks we can find answers about what caused it in the Rectory Archives.
I should speak to Cipher Huzmargo.
After limited success in the archives, Cipher Huzmargo wants to examine the Esoterica Corporea. Some machinery there might help us understand what's happening to the chorus.
The bodies in the Esoterica Corporea are in distress. I should reset the magicka focus here to settle them down.
Cipher Huzmargo seems to have a theory about what's happening in the Rectory. I should speak with him about it.
According to Cipher Huzmargo, there's only one way to identify the rogue mind destroying the chorus: I must enter the chorus myself. To do that, I must place my body in the somnambulum.
I found the rogue mind's pact. I should inspect it and see what it reveals.
In order to locate the Daggerfall Devil I need to follow his trail of shed memories.
I followed the trail of memories. Now, I just need to find the Daggerfall Devil's mind.

Leramil gave me a spell scroll that should help me search the stacks of books in Cipher's Midden for information pertaining to the relic, the rite, and the dream that Torvesard, Vaermina, and Peryite seek. I should use it as I search.
I should return to Leramil's study so we can compare notes about what we uncovered from the stacks of Cipher's Midden.
Now that I entered Leramil's study, I should talk to her and tell her what I found while searching the stacks in Cipher's Midden.
Scruut told me that Leramil the Wise is waiting for me at the ruined bookshop in Necrom. I should meet her there.
I found Leramil on the balcony of the Necrom Bindery. I should speak to her and see what she has to say.
Fathoms Drift is a graveyard of lost ships. We should look there for clues as to the fate of Naanurrel and the Opulent Gale.
Landolvel and I need to search Fathoms Drift for clues as to the fate of his ship, the Opulent Gale, and of Landolvel's father.
Naanurrel's spirit sent us back to where I first encountered Landolvel. I must return to the brazier outside Fathoms Drift.
I should talk with Naanurrel to learn more about the agreement to save his son's life.
I need to burn all three of Naanurrel's belongings to complete the ritual, as the old captain wishes.
I should enter the Disquiet Study and help Ysgild return her brother to his normal form.
I should find this Nord who was going to investigate the Disquiet Study and speak to her.

Vorm's cryptic clue hinted that Ysgild needs to gather their family's favorite books. Ysgild prefers adventure books, Vorm enjoys scientific tomes, and their mother was an avid reader of histories. We can find the books in the study.
I should leave the Disquiet Study. With the books in hand, we may be able to return Vorm to his normal form.
I should meet Meenai-Shai inside the Sidereal Cloisters.
A ghostly Dremora appeared right after Meenai-Shai was killed. I should speak with her.
Meenai-Shai returned from the dead. He told me he needs to return one of his books to the Calamitous Gallery. I should try to help him navigate the gallery unharmed.
Meenai-Shai died again before we were able to return the book, I should talk to the Morbid Observer to see what to do next.
I should return the book, Portents of Celestial Bodies, to its proper place in the Calamitous Gallery.
Returning the book caused a projection to appear within the room. I should investigate it.
After hearing the voice of Hermaeus Mora, a portal opened up. I should take it to get back to the main hall.
Meenai-Shai is back and says he needs to return one of his books to the Loggia Infinitum. I should try to guide the hapless Argonian to his destination.
Meenai-Shai died before we were able to return the book. I should return the Encyclopedia Praedictionem to its proper place.
Returning the book caused a projection to appear within the room. I should investigate it.
After hearing the voice of Hermaeus Mora, a portal opened up. I should take it to get back to the main hall.
Meenai-Shai is back and says he needs to return one of his books to the Empyrean Ascent. I should try to keep him alive once again, but the odds are apparently not in his favor.
Returning the book caused a projection to appear within the room. I should investigate it.
I should speak to the Morbid Observer about what transpired here.
Meenai-Shai and an unknown stranger traced the Sigil of the Great Eye. The Morbid Observer believes I should do the same.
Tracing the sigil opened a pathway to the Divinatory Forums. I should see what is inside.
I need to explore the area and look for another book.
I should continue on to the Divining Overlook to return the Atlas Obscurum to its rightful place.
Returning the book has caused a projection to appear within the room. I should investigate it.
I should see what occurs after exploring the scene at the Divining Overlook.
I should return the Atlas Obscurum to its rightful place.
Meenai-Shai died before we were able to return the book. I should return Fathomless Gaze to its proper place.
A note directed me towards the Sidereal Cloisters in the Endless Library.
After arriving at the entrance to the Sidereal Cloisters, I encountered an Argonian Cipher who is seeking my attention.
It appears that the Daggerfall Devil's mind sought shelter in a memory vault. I need to follow it.
I found what's left of the Daggerfall Devil's mind. I need to destroy it.
I destroyed the remnants of the Daggerfall Devil's mind. I should leave the chorus before I get stuck inside it.
I returned to my body in Apocrypha. I should talk to Cipher Huzmargo.
Now that I have the key, I should enter the catacombs. The door is through the chapel and to the north.
The catacombs are crawling with Hidden Kindred cultists. I need to find Blightcrown and stop him from taking a relic called the Fulcrum Obscura from Prior Durdryn's tomb.
While the Hidden Kindred got away with part of the relic they sought, the Fulcrum Obscura, I recovered the other half. I should return to the abbot's chamber and let Curate Gadayn know what happened.
Curate Gadayn managed to wake Abbot Ilvel from his fever. He wants to talk to me.
Leramil suggested heading toward the center of the tower's grounds to see what we can find.
Leramil and I found a Telvanni master with a band of mercenaries searching for something in Tel Rendys. I should talk to Master Shelreni.

Before anything else, Leramil asked me to find a hidden vault and acquire the Emerald Glyphic. She opened portals to the three locations she knows of that contain an entrance to the vault. I should choose a portal and find the vault.
Master Shelreni seeks a way into Tel Rendys. She's willing to let Leramil and I attempt to breach the tower's defenses and suggested we start at the old Tel Rendys Hall.
Leramil and I entered the old Tel Rendys Hall. I should search for a way to access the tower from here.
I found Dusksaber mercenaries in the old hall. One lies dead in front of a door sealed by a magic ward. I should ask the remaining mercenary what happened.
The strange lens revealed which object in this chamber dispels the ward protecting the door. I should deactivate it.
I dispelled the ward. The way is now clear. I should continue exploring this old hall.
Leramil provided one of Hermaeus Mora's Books of Forbidden Secrets. She said if I read the book, it will lead me to the secret entrance to the Emerald Glyphic Vault.
Reading from the Book of Forbidden Secrets revealed glowing runes. I should follow them to find the secret entrance to the Emerald Glyphic Vault.
Leramil provided one of Hermaeus Mora's Books of Forbidden Secrets. She said if I read the book, it will lead me to the secret entrance to the Emerald Glyphic Vault.
Reading from the Book of Forbidden Secrets revealed glowing runes. I should follow them to find the secret entrance to the Emerald Glyphic Vault.

To locate the hidden entrance to the Infinite Panopticon, I must sprinkle dust of conjunction on three cairns while Gadayn then synchronizes the relic to them. Then Leramil can use the cairns to identify the entrance.
We finished activating the cairns. Now to return to Leramil so she can complete the ritual.
Leramil completed the ritual, but it looks like it took a lot out of her. I should check in with her and see if she learned anything important.

The ritual that Leramil performed indicated that both the entrance to the Infinite Panopticon and the stolen half of the Fulcrum Obscura are in the northwest reaches of Apocrypha's Chroma Incognito. I should go there and look for them.
Upon reaching the location indicated by the ritual, I met Leramil near a glowing portal. I should talk to her before approaching the portal.
We need to enter the Infinite Panopticon and locate Hermaeus Mora's enemies before they find the secret they have come here to unearth.
We entered the Infinite Panopitcon. I should look around and see if the Hidden Kindred have made it inside.
Folsi gave me a letter and a phrase that will identify me to her Dark Elf contact. I should go find the contact under a green mushroom inside the Tel Huulen tower in Ald Isra.
There's a Dark Elf by a green mushroom inside Tel Huulen. I should determine if she's the contact I'm supposed to deliver this letter to.
While Naryu keeps watch at Tel Huulen, she asked me to talk to Aki-go in the servants quarters to the west and investigate the Dres camp to the south of town.
I checked in with Masters Sulis and Foves. Naryu said she wants to search through local kagouti nests for clues. I should head north to the nests and meet up with her.
Naryu and I found a kagouti nesting site outside Ald Isra. This is likely the place the spy uses to relay messages. I should look around and see if they left anything recently.
The portal in the old hall led to the tower of Tel Rendys. Leramil believes we'll find what we're looking for in the sanctum at the top of the tower.
I reached the top of Tel Rendys and found the spirit of the tower's owner, Meln the Mouthless. The ghost wants to speak to me.
I found the physical remains of Meln the Mouthless, a signet ring, and a letter from Master Shelreni's Mouth. I should talk to Leramil.
Leramil the Wise asked me to pursue Master Shelreni. She told me to go to Ald Isra and seek out Mouth Vabdru in the tower of Tel Vara. He represents Master Shelreni at the Assembly of Masters.
I found Master Shelreni's mouth, a Khajiit named Vabdru. Several other mouths confronted him about Shelreni's recent actions. I should speak with him.
Mouth Vabdru says I need a Tel Baro insignia to enter Master Shelreni's tower. I should look for one in his officeâ€”and maybe see what else I can find.
Mouth Vabdru told me I would find the entrance to Tel Baro tower inside a cavern northeast of Ald Isra. I should make my way to Master Shelreni's tower and find a way inside.
I need to make my way into Quires Wind to find the strange scrolls Cipher Agrushna wants me to destroy.
I need to burn the scrolls corrupting Quires Wind. Then I need to find Cipher Sabinius and make sure he doesn't have any more scrolls.
I burned the corrupted scrolls and found Cipher Sabinius dead. He had one unused scroll with him. I should return to Cipher Agrushna.
A malignant corruption fills the interior of the infinite tower. I should look around and try to find the source.
Leramil thinks we can track Blightcrown and Torvesard by following the trail of the portion of the Fulcrum Obscura relic they stole from Necrom. I should follow her tracking spell.
To cross this chamber and continue to follow the trail of the Fulcrum Obscura, Leramil says we need to distract the Guardian Gaze that watches over the location.
The Guardian Gaze is distracted. Now to continue exploring the Infinite Panopticon until we locate the Fulcrum Obscura.
We entered another one of the Panopticon's Halls of Secrets. I should look around and see if I can find Blightcrown, Torvesard, or the Fulcrum Obscura.
Torvesard and Blightcrown stepped into an Eye of Mora, searching for the memory of the dream they seek. We need to follow them.
It looks like Master Foves was the true source of the information Guitot passed to the Dres. I decided to tell Master Sulis the truth so he can deal with Foves.
I finally made it to the Eye of Mora, but lost Leramil somewhere along the way. Now that I'm here, I should follow Blightcrown and Torvesard into the eye.
Despite Torvesard's warning, I need to follow him and learn why this memory is so important.
I saw the memory of when Hermaeus Mora erased the memory of all reality. But what was forgotten? I should continue to explore and look for Torvesard.
As Torvesard restores the shattered statue of Vaermina, followers of the Prince of Dreams rush to attack me. I need to defend myself.
Hermaeus Mora arrived but he seems upset that this memory has been changed. He wants to talk to me.

Hermaeus Mora says there's still a chance to preserve reality, provided Leramil and I work together to keep Torvesard from revealing any more of the forgotten secret. I should use the portal he opened to return to Leramil's study in Cipher's Midden.
I reached the Tel Baro Cavern, Master Shelreni's stronghold. Now I need to find the entrance to the tower.
The tower of Tel Baro is sealed with a magic ward. I must find a way to dispel it.

As Mouth Vabdru explained, the entrance to Master Shelreni's tower is locked while the four wards are in place. I need to use the Tel Baro insignia to dispel the wards and unlock the way into the tower.
I dispelled the the four magical wards sealing the tower of Tel Baro. I can enter the tower now.
I made it into Master Shelreni's tower. Now I should ascend the tower and search for Meln the Mouthless.
Master Shelreni left Tel Baro, providing an opportunity to rescue Meln the Mouthless. I should speak with the spirit.
Meln the Mouthless believes I can foil Master Shelreni by stealing the soul gem she used to trap him. I should take the gem.
With Meln's help, I located and destroyed the censers of corruption. I should talk to Leramil and determine our next steps.
Harn Orenvi agreed to give information on Reynila's last known location if I deliver flowers for him.
I delivered flowers at the request of Harn Orenvi. I should meet up with him at the tavern and get information on Reynila.
According to Cipher Huzmargo, I should search the chorus for the rogue mind's pact. This powerful quasi-document will help us pinpoint our quarry's location.
I should escort Ogle into Underweave and help him locate his master's fated glyphic.
I should follow the path of the fated glyphic using the Watchling's Sight that Ogle bestowed on me.
The fated glyphic's path is confused by many other trails. I need to talk to Ogle about what we should do.
A strange mortal traveler appeared before Ogle and I. He seems to know about our mission. I should speak to him.
Thaddeus is also after Mora's fated glyphic. He can help us locate it, but asks that we first shut down the nemesis looms in the nullifactory. I agreed to help.
We deactivated the last nemesis loom. Thaddeus says the fated glyphic should be somewhere in the refuse and debris at the bottom of Underweave's nullifactory.
I found the shattered remains of the fated glyphic in a pile of refuse, but Thaddeus appears unconcerned. I should ask him about it.
Ogle's fated glyphic was fractured. Thaddeus believes that if we take its remains to the Heart of Underweave, he will be able to reform it. I should get the remains of the glyphic.
Sharp plans to scout ahead and find Reynila's campsite across the river from the old Sailenmora outpost. I should head there and look for Sharp.
Sharp noticed a name in common on the notes we found: Mevei Andros, supposedly located in Ald Isra. I should meet Sharp in Ald Isra to find Mevei Andros for information on Reynila's whereabouts.
The note near Deredrien's body is from a mysterious figure called the Reformer, who is also after Sharp. I should talk to Sharp to see what's next.
Sharp and I found Mevei Andros. I should ask her about Reynila and warn her about the notes we found regarding her and Reynila.

Mevei confirmed that Reynila is an operative working to free slaves from the Reformer, a powerful and dangerous Telvanni magister. I should meet Sharp on the island of Gorne so we can find and help Reynila.
Scruut suggested searching Alavelis to find survivors or learn more about what the cultists want here. I should look around.
Scruut and I found a surviving miner hiding in Alavelis. I should speak to her.
I have the key to the laboratory caverns, but Dacia wants to talk to me before we proceed.
Dacia says there's a key to the Tel Dreloth laboratory caverns in the top floor of the main tower. I should find the key with Dacia.
Dacia believes we can find a key to the laboratory caverns on the top floor of the main tower. I should make my way there and find the key.
I should return to the Necrom Bindery in the Telvanni Peninsula and see if Curate Gadayn has learned anything new about Master Shelreni or the rite she plans to cast from Meln's Black Book.
I rendezvoused with Curate Gadayn and Scruut in the Necrom Bindery. I should talk to Gadayn and find out what news he wants to share with me.
Meln the Mouthless materialized and claims we need his help if we're going to infiltrate the Masters Conclave. I should talk to him and see what he suggests.
Leramil arrived just as Dralys took his leave. She said she finished deciphering the encoded letter. I should talk to her and find out if it revealed anything important.
Dacia and I have the key to the lab. We should take the portal pad to the cellar and enter the lab to rescue Nathyn.
Something's gone wrong in the caverns below Tel Dreloth. I should search the caverns with Dacia to find out what's going on.
Dacia and I finally found another person in the caverns. I should speak to Tun-Shei about what happened here.
A magical projection of Sathile Dreloth appeared before me and Dacia. I should speak with Sathile.
I found research notes from Sathile Dreloth and a letter that says it's from Dacia. I should talk to Dacia about what she thinks.
Tun-Shei says one of Sathile's experiments escaped containment and nearly killed him. I should speak to Dacia about what we just learned.
Dacia and I were confronted by a magical projection of Sathile Dreloth. I should talk to Dacia about what we just heard.
We've almost made it to the isolation tower, which means we're close to rescuing Nathyn.
Reynila's camp was compromised by mercenaries. Sharp spotted a trail heading away from the campsite. We should follow it.
We've made it inside the isolation tower. I should find Nathyn so we can rescue him.
We found Nathyn Dreloth, but he warned us to stay back from the wards keeping him isolated. I should talk to him to understand more.
We've been discovered by Sathile Dreloth. I should talk to her about Nathyn and Dacia.
Dacia has a choice to make going forward. I should talk to her about her decision.

Meln believes he can walk me through the creation of an enchanted cloak to hide my connection to Hermaeus Mora before we enter the Telvanni Masters Conclave. To do this, I need to go to his tower, Tel Rendys.
I found Sharp on the island of Gorne. I should talk to him before we head to the caves on the southwest side of the island to try and find a secret entrance to the smuggler's tunnels there.
Sharp and I are searching for a secret entrance to the smuggler's tunnels in the caves on the southwest side of Gorne.
Reynila was injured and made her way through the nearby door. We need to get to her.
Reynila looks to be in her last moments alive. I should talk to her and see if anything can be done.
Dimik-ei seems lost without Reynila, but she recognizes Sharp. I should talk to Sharp about what comes next.
Reynila succumbed to her injures, leaving Dimik-ei to fend for herself. I should talk to her to see if we can help her.
Ultimately, I gave the logbook to Landolvel. With it he may strike a new bargain with Hermaeus Mora that would save both himself and his father, though at the cost of his own memories.
Ultimately, I gave the logbok to Naanurrel. With it he will complete the intended arrangement with Hermaeus Mora and pay the price for saving his son's life.

Hermaeus Mora intervened when we burnt the items. The Daedric Prince modified his bargain, so that Landolvel could revive Naanurrel at the cost of all memories of his father. I must give the logbook to one of them to complete the pact.
Miner Sadalas told me the villagers were enslaved in their sleep and forced to build an arch in the mine. She doesn't know where everyone else is, but suggested we check the village inn.
Garalo prepared a boat to take us to the island of Gorne. I should board the boat when I'm ready.
I landed on Gorne with Garalo. He thinks we should begin by finding Dreynis, the mage who resides here.
Garalo said to find him in the middle of the estate once I collected the glowing notes pages. I should meet him there.
I found three piles of research that Garalo Givyn asked for. I should talk to him to see if anything is missing.
Garalo has a plan to reveal whatever Dreynis has hidden in the manor's rotunda. I need to place the arcane foci gems he gave me on the balcony.
I followed Dreynis into a hidden study inside the estate. He seems more composed than before. I should talk to him.
Dreynis suddenly appeared when Garalo opened a portal in the rotunda. He fled into Garalo's portal. Garalo told me to follow him.
I warned Garalo about the prism's corrupting influence. He decided to keep it locked away. After all, Dreynis's notes seem to be more than enough to advance his career.
Dreynis warned me of the prism's effects. I need to decide whether to tell Garalo the whole truth, and save him from the prism, or let it corrupt him the way it did Dreynis.
It appears that the Hidden Kindred cultist turned the Green Glass Inn into some sort of a base of operations here in the village. I should search for clues about their intentions here.
In the Green Glass Inn I found several clues about the Hidden Kindred and their intentions in Alavelis. I should talk to Scruut about what we learned.
Scruut and I learned the Hidden Kindred built a gateway to Apocrypha in the glass mine of Alavelis. I should go investigate.
I entered the glass mine of Alavelis. I should look for the gateway the villagers were forced to build here.
Sharp and I arrived to find Reynila at the mercy of more of the Reformer's mercenaries. We need to help her fight them off.
Dacia has a choice to make, and she wants to know what I would decide if I were in her place.
I should talk to Dacia about her decision to work for Sathile again and search for a cure for Nathyn.
Scruut activated the gateway and opened a portal to Apocrypha. I should use the portal and see where it leads.
Hezehk tells me that he needs to find his mirror first. Apparently, it can help track down the Voidprowlers. I should meet him where the attack occurred, at a set of steps to the south.
Hezehk wants me to search for his mirror and any items the Voidprowlers may have when they attacked. I should look around the area for anything out of place.
I found Hezehk's mirror on a table, and picked up a scrap of fabric, an empty satchel, and a soggy notebook. I should give them to Hezehk in case he can use them to track the Voidprowlers.
I gave Hezehk his mirror and he used it to track the Voidprowlers. They went south to the Obscured Forum. I should join Hezehk there to recover his secret.
When we arrived at the entrance to the Obscured Forum, several dead Daedra littered the ground. One is still alive, but severely wounded. I should talk to her to find out what happened.
Voidprowler Dys told me that her clan leader went inside the Obscured Forum. He has Hezehk's secret with him. I should enter the enormous library and search for him.
I entered the Obscured Forum with Hezehk. I should search the massive library for Voidprowler Zavaal and recover the stolen secret.
This facility is far larger than Hezehk expected. I should speak with him before continuing further.
Using his magical mirror, Hezehk caught a glimpse of the clan leader inside the Obscured Forum. I should continue to look for him and the missing secret.
With the reagents, Hezehk will perform his spell from the Great Hall of Secrets. I should enter the hall now.
I found Voidprowler Zavaal's dead body crumpled on the ground. There's a note next to him. I should read it to see if it's Madam Whim's secret.
Sharp and I learned that Federo fled to Tinkerer Tobin's Workshop in Eastmarch. We should travel to Eastmarch to see if he's still there.
We found Federo living rough in Eastmarch. I should talk to him.
Mevei agreed to help us help Federo. I should take the forged identity papers that Mevei made.
Sharp and I acquired clothing and forged identity documents for Federo to start a new life away from the Telvanni Peninsula. Federo said he'd meet us in the Outlaws Refuge to make the exchange.
Now that we unearthed the cache, we should investigate its contents.
Federo's cache gave us a lot of information. I should talk to Sharp about what I learned from reading.

Federo's cache of information gave enough information for us to find the location of a secret lab belonging to Sondivel Ulres. Sharp and I should head to the bridge to the Dwarven ruins near Gnisis in Vvardenfell and seek the hidden key.
Sharp and I are seeking the key to the hidden lab of Sondivel Ulres, the Reformer. I should talk to Sharp to discuss what comes next.
Sharp's tracking spell led us to the hidden key to the Reformer's secret lab. I should take the key.
Sharp and I made it inside the secret lab of the Reformer. It seems deserted, but we should seek out any information or useful items that will help us learn more about the Reformer's whereabouts.
Sharp is being magically restrained by the Reformer. I should smash the strange metal acting as a conduit and save Sharp.
Sharp seems rattled by what just happened in the Reformer's lab. We need to leave the lab and get to safety.
I should talk to Sharp about what happened inside the Reformer's lab.
I recovered all of the escaped Daedric creatures from across Blackwood. Now I should return to Plokun.
Scruut senses that the invaders have headed south. I should follow their trail and see where they're going.
The trail led us to a wounded mortal scribe outside a place called the Tranquil Catalog. I should ask him what happened here.
Scruut believes Vaermina's servants are searching the Tranquil Catalog for the location of the secret they want to steal from Apocrypha. We need to go in and stop them.
The clan leader did not have the missing secret. I should talk to Hezehk to find out what he thinks.
Hezehk is going to attempt an old spell to locate the missing secret. I should gather the reagents he asked for to perform this spell.
I should speak with Hezehk prior to him performing his finding spell in an attempt to locate his missing secret.
While Hezehk performs his finding spell I should go down into the Great Hall and be ready to locate his missing secret.
Hezehk has located the missing secret, I should gather it for him.
I gathered Hezehk's missing secret. Now I should speak with him.
After performing his summoning spell Hezehk is weakened and asked that I take the secret into the intake room.
I found Hezehk in the room with the Intake Maw. It told us that we'd receive a boon for knowledge. I should deposit the secret to get Mora's boon.
After delivering Madam Whim's secret, the Intake Maw delivered the Boon of Mora. I should collect it for Hezehk.
Hezehk left me alone in the Obscured Forum after I recovered the Boon of Mora. I should leave and join him outside to hand over the Boon.
Dacia noticed some papers scattered around this room. I should see if any of them can give us more information about what happened in the caverns.
Sharp and I were surprised to find Mevei Andros in Windhelm. It seems like she's the document forger we were looking for. I should talk to her about securing a new identity for Federo.
Federo needs new clothing to help him start his new life as a courier for the Antiquarian Circle. Sharp and I should search Windhelm for something inexpensive.
The portal to the Pool of Inquiry has been unsealed by the invaders. I should go through the portal and follow them.
I need to go to three different shrines, each dedicated to a different aspect of Hermaeus Mora, in order to replenish the sacred tears and use the waters of scrying in the Pool of Inquiry.
I gathered three sacred tears from the manifestations of Hermaeus Mora. Now I must place them in the pool to access the waters of scrying.
I placed the sacred tears of Hermaeus Mora in the pool, opening a portal to the Tranquil Archives. Whatever the invaders seek is on the other side.
The Pool of Inquiry led us to a place Scruut calls the Tranquil Archives. We must find and confront the invaders.
I found Kynreeve Ryl and Torvesard examining a glyphic in the archives. Torvesard departed, but Kynreeve Ryl stayed behind to face me. I need to defeat him to get to the glyphic
The books archived in the glyphic were mostly erased of the information they once held. I should talk to Scruut and see if she can make sense of what remained.
Now that we're finished in the Tranquil Catalog, it's time to leave.
Sharp has a tracking spell that should help us find the key to Sondivel's lab. I should follow the tracking critter to find the key.
Sharp and I have the key to the Reformer's laboratory. It's time to head inside.
Plokun has been reunited with his menagerie. I should speak with him.
Plokun needs my help to complete a teleportation spell to send his creatures to Fargrave.
Dimik-ei is waiting for Sharp in the swamps north of Alten Corimont in Shadowfen.
Sharp and I found Dimik-ei. She said something about recovering Sharp's lost memories. I should talk to her to get more information.

Dimik-ei thinks she can use magic to recover Sharp's memories using a sample of tyranite calx. She believes we can find some nearby in Broken Tusk, but I should also see what Sharp thinks about all of this.
Sharp wants to speak before we enter Broken Tusk. I should talk to him.
We should search inside Broken Tusk for a sample of tyranite calx to bring back to Dimik-ei.
I should speak to Dimik-ei before we start the test of returning Sharp's memories to him.
Dimik-ei instructed me to touch the tyranite calx. Once I do, I'll enter one of Sharp's forgotten memories.
I should wait for Dimik-ei to set up the tyranite calx.
Sondivel has taken Dimik-ei captive. He says he will release her and all his slaves if Sharp returns to his possession. I should talk to Sharp about what happened.
I must enter Vanton's mind and defeat a nightmare creature named Ansuul the Tormentor before she takes control.
I entered the mind of Warlock Vanton and defeated the nightmare creature Ansuul the Tormentor. I should speak with Wizard Twelvane to see if this contains the nightmare.
I entered the mind of Warlock Vanton and defeated the nightmare creature Ansuul the Tormentor. I should speak with Wizard Twelvane to see if this contains the nightmare.
I  entered the mind of Warlock Vanton and defeated the nightmare creature Ansuul the Tormentor. I should speak with Wizard Twelvane to see if this contains the nightmare.
Wizard Twelvane should be the caretaker of this Dreamstone. I just need to give it to her.
I should give Wizard Twelvane the Whispering Dreamstone.
I should give the Dreamstone to Wizard Twelvane. Hopefully she and the Mages Guild can keep it contained.
I should give Wizard Twelvane the Dreamstone. She knows more about it than I do and can hopefully keep what happened to Warlock Vanton from happening again.
I should give Wizard Twelvane the Whispering Dreamstone. I don't know if Ansuul the Tormentor is inside it. But, if she is, the Mages Guild is better equipped to keep her contained.
Scholar Arlance knows more about what's going on. I should talk to him in Warlock Vanton's Tower.
<<1>> created a portal to take me directly to <<2>>.
Naryu wants me to provide an update to Master Sulis about our investigation into the identity of the spy.
Curate Gadayn and I slipped into the Necropolis through the cellar. We need to reach the chapel and find Abbot Ilvel.
The door to the Necropolis chapel is locked. I need to find a way inside.
Sharp says Mevei has a lead on how to find the Reformer. We're going to meet her outside the inn in Rawl'kha in Reaper's March.
We found Mevei, accompanied by Federo. I should speak to Mevei.
Mevei and Federo have tracked down one of Sondivel's slavers to a new hideout in the Ayleid ruins of Senalana. I should relay the plan to Sharp before we head out.

One of Sondivel's slavers is hiding out in the ruins of Senalana. Supposedly, the secret entrance to her hideout is marked with a starflower. I should search for a starflower in the ruins of Senalana.
We should see what information we can take from Elistrenne Starflower about Sondivel's whereabouts.
I arrived at Tel Rendys and Meln materialized. I should talk to him about how to locate the components needed to create the cloak of omission.
Meln buried the component we need in caches throughout the tower grounds. He wants me to use his ghost sight to locate the sigils he placed. The caches are buried beneath them.
Meln said I can find one of his workbenches near his tower. We can assemble the components we unearthed there.
Meln told me to place the components we gathered on the workbench so he can guide me through the creation of the item. He says it will help get me into the Telvanni Masters Conclave.
Meln wants to talk to me about the cloak we just created. I should see what else he wants to tell me.
Now to put on the cloak of omission and see if it works the way Meln hopes.
With Meln's cloak of omission, I'm ready to head to Ald Isra and enter the tower hall to attend the Telvanni Conclave of Masters.
Before I can enter the conclave hall, I need to present myself to the sentry and invoke the statute that Meln suggested.
The sentry allowed me to pass. Now to enter the assembly antechamber and find Curate Gadayn.
Meln thinks he can help us get past the magister's ward. I should follow his instructions so we can warn the masters.
Curate Gadayn appears stuck in a conversation with Mouth Elar. Meln suggests we distract the mouth so we can converse with Gadayn in private.
With Meln's help, I disabled the wards. Now to enter the main hall.
Magister Gothren refuses to take the threat posed by Master Shelreni seriously. I need to find out where they're holding Shelreni and reach her before something terrible occurs.
We found the room where they were holding Master Shelreni, but it's empty. There's a vial on the table that Meln wants me to examine.

Master Shelreni used some sort of dream potion to take control of Master Marena and headed for the conclave. I need to go to the masters private hall to the north and try to stop whatever she's planning.
Meln believes we can get through the warded door to stop Magister Shelreni. I should follow his instructions.
Master Shelreni unleashed a wave of power and knocked me out. I came to and Magister Gothren wants to talk to me. I should speak with him and learn what happened after I blacked out.
Master Shelreni took Master Marena captive and escaped through this portal. I should use it to follow after them.
I entered the portal and followed Master Shelreni to a cavern of some sort. I should look around and figure out where I am.
A chamber in the cavern ruins might hold a clue as to where Master Shelreni has gone. I should look around.
I need to find and retrieve kwama eggs from the Anchre Egg Mine.
I gathered the kwama eggs as requested, and will deliver them to Ordinator Tilena to claim my reward.
I need to search Camonnaruhn, find the missing supplies, and bring them back to Necrom.
I recovered the missing merchandise. I should return to Ordinator Tilena and claim my reward.
I should head to Quires Wind and find the materials Sotha Sil seeks.
I retrieved the materials from Quires Wind. I should return them to Ordinator Tilena.
I must enter the Disquiet Study and reclaim the temple secrets Hermaeus Mora acquired from this faithless scribe.
I reclaimed the temple secrets that Ordinator Tilena asked for. I should return to Necrom and speak with her.
I should enter Apogee of the Tormenting Eye and gather Dremnaken teeth.
I gathered the Dremnaken teeth in Apogee of the Tormenting Eye. I should return to Ordinator Tilena and claim my reward.
I need to gather ship manifests around Fathoms Drift.
I collected the ship manifests around Fathoms Drift. I should return to Ordinator Tilena and claim my reward.
Master Shelreni must be deeper inside the ruins, where the restored statue of Vaermina is located. I need to find her.
I reached the restored statue. Shelreni, Blightcrown, and Torvesard have started the rite. I need to stop them and free Master Marena.
Meln wants me to close and take his Black Book. That should end the last remnants of Shelreni's rite.
I recovered the Black Book but Master Shelreni and Blightcrown aren't finished yet. I should wait and see how they react to the situation.

We saved Master Marena but Blightcrown killed Master Shelreni to complete the sacrifice. Now Vaermina inhabits her body and has access to Apocrypha and the location they've been searching for. I should return to Necrom and inform Leramil.
Sondivel Ulres, the Reformer, has a new hideout inside the Forgotten Crypts in Deshaan. I should head there with Sharp so we can find Sondivel and rescue Dimik-ei.
Sharp has cast a tracking spell to help us locate the secret entrance to Sondivel's lair. I should follow the torchbug he summoned to lead us to the secret entrance.
Sharp and I have found the entrance to Sondivel's lair. It's time to go inside and confront Sondivel.
Sondivel ordered his mercenaries to kill me and fled. Sharp and I should track him down.
Sondivel Ulres has nowhere to run. I should defeat him with Sharp's help.
Sondivel Ulres is dead. Sharp has asked me to burn his research notes, destroy the tyranite calx, and help free the remaining slaves kept captive here.
Sharp and I have destroyed Sondivel Ulres' slaving operation. It's time to leave this place and meet Dimik-ei in Narsis.
We finally put an end to the Reformer, Sondivel Ulres, and the experiments he carried out on his slaves. Sharp wants to speak to me. I should hear what he has to say.
To continue the experiment, Azandar wants us to travel to his sanctum sanctorum. It's apparently in the center of town at Skywatch, in Auridon.
We made it to his sanctum. Time to talk to Azandar about what his plan is.
With the bobbin attached, now we need to complete a scrying ritual and seek out some more of his frayed fates.
I helped Azandar to form the arcane bobbin. I should speak to him to see about adding the bobbin to the Fateweaver Key.
The scrying ritual indicates frayed fates have appeared in Kozanset in the Alik'r Desert, Azandar's home town. I should head into the desert to see if we can find them.
With Azandar at my side, I need to search the tiny town of Kozanset to find his frayed fates and sew them up with the help of the Fateweaver Key and the arcane bobbin.
Azandar consulted the Fateweaver Key and believes there's still at least one more frayed fate near Kozanset. He thinks we should head north out of the settlement towards a set of old ruins.
Azandar and I once again witnessed that strange frayed fate we saw back at Fathoms Drift. It ran off toward the Lost City of Na-Totambu. We should search for the frayed fate within.
I should search the Lost City of Na-Totambu to find Azandar's dangerous frayed fate.
I dealt with the frayed fate in the Lost City of Na-Totambu. I should leave with Azandar.
I should talk to Azandar about what occurred in the Lost City of Na-Totambu.
Azandar wants to modify the fateweaver key by creating what he's calling an arcane bobbin. I can do so using a stencil in which he's already inlaid a spell. I need to find the stencil, first.
Azandar asked that I imbue the arcane stencil with magicka. I can do that at the magicka font within the sanctum.
Azandar said I need to gesture at his flesh atronach Gubbins with the stencil in order to create the bobbin or spool.
The stencil has downed Gubbins, but Azandar has asked me to rummage around in the goop it drew forth. The bobbin should be in there, somewhere.
Sharp wants to speak with me before we proceed. I should hear what he has to say.

Sharp is going to use a tracking spell that will help us find the secret entrance to Sondivel's lair using tyranite calx. I need to set a fragment of the metal down in Sharp's ritual circle so he can proceed.
I discovered the frayed fate that Azandar and I met in Apocrypha, draining energy from another one of Azandar's fates. Perhaps the Fateweaver Key can stop it.
Someone named Torvesard fled with part of the Fulcrum Obscura and Blightcrown left behind a diseased monster. I need to destroy the foul creature.
I should investigate the tomb and see what Torvesard and Blightcrown left behind.
Azandar believes a Daedric creature will know where to find his former associate. To summon the Daedra he needs a tome in the eastern part of Cipher's Midden. I should meet him there.
I should speak to Azandar about how he intends to find one book in these stacks.
Azandar said he'll cast a spell that should find the tome he's looking for. I need to stay close to the old arcanist.
We acquired the book, no thanks to that tomeshell. Time to talk to Azandar about the contents of the book.
I gathered the Seeker talon and the expunged tomedust. Time to meet up with Azandar at the ritual altar he mentioned.
Azandar managed to banish another one of those frayed fates as I approached. Time to find out what we need to do in order to talk to this Tem.
First need to find the tomedust I acquired from the Cipher's Midden expungatory.
Tem told us that Martina Abor has a lab of some kind at the Underweave. Azandar wants me to meet him there.
We need to find the Heart of the Underweave, where the entrance to Martina's sanctum can be found.
We made it into Martina's sanctum. I should search the room for clues as to what happened here.
I defeated Vro-Kuul-Sha the Deepreaver and recovered the personal effects that were left behind. I should claim my reward from Ordinator Nelyn
I need to journey into Apocrypha, defeat Vro-Kuul-Sha the Deepreaver, and recover the personal effects of warriors Vro-Kuul-Sha has defeated.
I defeated the Walking Nightmare and found the researcher's lost notes. I should return to Ordinator Nelyn and claim my reward.
I need to find and confront this Walking Nightmare and recover its victim's research notes.
I defeated Valkynaz Dek and saved several captives. I should return to Ordinator Nelyn to claim my reward.
I need to go to Apocrypha, defeat Valkynaz Dek, and free his captives.
I survived my encounter with the Prime Cataloger and collected several molts from the tomeshells that follow it. I should talk to Ordinator Nelyn and get paid for my efforts.
I need to find the Prime Cataloger in Apocrypha and retrieve the molted husks from several of its tomeshell parasites.
I defeated Runemaster Xiomara and gathered the arcane residue. I should return to Necrom and collect my reward from Ordinator Nelyn.
I should go to the last known location of Xiomara in Apocrypha. I can also collect arcane residue from his victims.
I defeated Corlys the Chainmaker and placed mystic trackers on his caravans. I should return to Ordinator Nelyn for my reward.
I need to visit the encampment of Corlys the Chainmaker, defeat him, and place mystic trackers on his caravans.
Azandar believes our first step should be to scry for more frayed fates. That means a return trip to his Skywatch sanctum, in Auridon.
Azandar has asked me to assist him in performing the scrying ritual. I need to light the beacons.
We should discuss the frayed fates we located.
The first frayed fate we located was near Ebonheart in Stonefalls. Azandar suggested we head to the city to start looking.
Our first frayed fate of the day lies somewhere near the city of Ebonheart. I should follow the tracking magic of the Fateweaver Key to find it.
The frayed fate near Vivec's Antlers has been drained of energy. I should talk to Azandar about this.
Azandar seems rattled, but wants to travel to the site of the other frayed fate we located. It's near the ruins of Ilayas in Malabal Tor.
I should search Ilayas with Azandar to locate the frayed fate in the area.
Azandar used runic magic to open a portal to the location of his adversary. We should follow to see where it leads.
Azandar believes the adversary is inside Nchuleftingth, in what he calls the Ametric Interval Chamber. I should pursue the adversary.
With Azandar, we need to traverse Nchuleftingth to reach the Ametric Interval Chamber.
I found the chamber, where the adversary is draining a pair of frayed fates! I need to dispel the frayed fates before the adversary can drain them completely.
The adversary left Nchuleftingth, threatening to harm Azandar after amassing more power. Azandar wants to leave Nchuleftingth and speak outside.
I should speak to Azandar about what occurred in Nchuleftingth.
To find the fates frayed from Azandar's fateline, we have to try Martina's scrying technique. The arcanist asked that I meet him at his chambers at Cipher's Midden.
We found Martina's research, even if it wasn't the way Azandar wanted. I should talk to him about what we need to do next.
We found the frayed fate identified by the scrying ritual. We should observe it.
I should talk to Azandar about the unexpected appearance of this adversary.
Azandar told me the Fateweaver Key should reveal threads which lead to the frayed fate we seek. I just need to follow them through the Drift to find our way.
Azandar is fascinated and somewhat unnerved by the appearance of this adversarial fate. He wants to meet back in Cipher's Midden, giving him time to collect his thoughts.
We located the fraying fate in Ilayas.
We stepped from the portal to find ourselves on the island of Vvardenfell, outside the Dwemer ruin of Nchuleftingth. I should talk to him about what this means.
Azandar thinks anchor objects from his past will allow him to destroy the adversary. A mystic tome at Quires Wind, in Apocrypha, should be able to tell us what we need to procure.
I should search Quires Wind for the magic tome, which Azandar calls the Unraveling Palimpsest.
I acquired the Palimpsest. I should talk to Azandar about how we can use it to deal with the adversary.

This is it. Azandar believes we can destroy the adversary using items from his past. We need to find a bloodstone in Balmora, a sacred text from the observatory near Belkarth, and a research rebuttal from the library at Shad Astula.
Azandar and I found his sanctum sealed by the adversary. I need to talk to him about what to do next.
We created the runeform needed to destroy the adversary. We still need to find him, so Azandar wants us to return to his sanctum sanctorum to scry for the adversary's location.

The adversary has taken control of Azandar's sanctum and is attempting to use its resources to take Azandar's place. We need to go to Entila's Folly. Within is a side passage we can use to enter the sanctum sanctorum.
Within Entila's Folly a passageway will allow us to enter the sanctum sanctorum. We need to find the entrance.
We need to enter the passageway, which will allow us to reach the sanctum sanctorum and sidestep the magical defenses the adversary has put in place.

We need to use the anchor items to construct some kind of runeform. But Azandar wants to consult with the Daedra Tem in order to do it. To talk to Tem, we need to reach the ritual circle below the Mages Guild in Riften.
Finally, we're face to face with the adversary and we have the tools we need to destroy him. Time to end this.
With the Fateweaver Key burned out, Azandar wants me to throw it from the cliff's edge to ensure he's never tempted to restore this powerful relic.
Now that the Fateweaver Key is destroyed, I should talk to Azandar.
Morian said we'd need sleep potions from the gazebo nearby to get the bristleback lords to sleep. If we don't do this, he says they won't let us see Cipher Frielvi.
I found the gazebo Morian mentioned. I should gather the sleep potions and take them to the skyway.
Morian mentioned that animals he called bristleback lords stand between us and Cipher Frielvi. He wanted me to drop the potions on them to put them to sleep.
To find out where Vaermina is headed, we need to communicate with Master Shelreni's spirit. I should talk to Meln and see if he can help us with that.
I need to go to Tel Baro so Meln can help us locate the spirit of Master Shelreni. Curate Gadayn will meet us there.
The bristlebacks are asleep and Morian seems excited. He wants to talk. I should go make sure there's nothing else to worry about.
Tel Baro is locked tight, but Meln is confident Master Shelreni has other ways to get into the tower. I need to look around for another way to get inside.
We found another entrance into the tower and Meln was able to circumvent the protective ward. I should head inside.
After learning all I could from the Ald Isra servants and at the House Dres camp to the south, Naryu wants me to return to Tel Huulen and update Master Sulis about our investigation.
Morian believes we can find Cipher Frielvi in her study. I should escort Morian there.
The door to Cipher Frielvi's study is buried in rubble. I'm going to need to clear this out before I can get past. Morian said something about needing a spider to do it.
