Morian's pointing at the book inside the firepot spider enclosure. He says the spiders have all the answers, what if he's right? The only way to find out is to read the note.
Firepots are incredibly volatile. I should remove one from the firepot spider.
This firepot contains enough power to obliterate the rubble keeping us from finding Frielvi. I should set it down carefully near the rubble.
The firepot is set next to the rubble blocking our way. The only thing left to do is ignite it.
Both Meln and Gadayn sense a presence in Master Shelreni's study. I should see if I can make contact with her spirit.
The spirit of Master Shelreni manifested and Gadayn calmed her. I should attempt to talk to her and see if she can tell us where Vaermina took her body.
Master Shelreni said Vaermina took her body into the Infinite Panopticon. I need to return to Necrom and let Leramil know about this.
Morian said we'd need a boom to clear the rubble and he was right. The firepot obliterated the debris in our path. I hope Cipher Frielvi's in her study like Morian says she will be.
Cipher Frielvi is injured on the floor. She looks pretty bad. I should talk to her and see what happened.
I should tell Leramil what we learned from the spirit of Master Shelreni.
We know Vaermina seeks something in the Infinite Panopticon. I should return to the entrance we found earlier and see if we can locate it again.
Leramil opened a way into the Infinite Panopticon. Now we should enter and look for Vaermina and her allies.
I need to search the Infinite Panopticon for Vaermina and her allies.
I should talk to Scruut before we enter the Eye of Mora.

Scruut insists that we ignore Blightcrown and do what we came to doâ€”destroy Master Shelreni's mortal body and expose Vaermina. She believes that may help restore her connection to Hermaeus Mora so the Prince can help us.
We entered the Eye of Mora. I should look around and try to find Vaermina. She must be somewhere in this memory.
Scruut thinks that this memory has been hidden inside a dream. I should talk to her about what that means.

Vaermina has hidden the true memory behind an illusory dream. I need to use Meln's ghost sight to spot flaws in the illusion and identify them for Scruut so she can break through them and reveal the true memory.
Hermaeus Mora broke into the memory, causing Vaermina to flee. I should listen to what he has to say.
Hermaeus Mora wants me to follow Vaermina into the core of Apocrypha, a place he called the Mythos. I should follow her.
I followed Vaermina into a place Hermaeus Mora called the Mythos. He wants me to stop the Prince of Dreams from obtaining three glyphics he used to hide the secret. I should look around.
I heard Vaermina nearby. I need to forge ahead and find her.
Vaermina and Torvesard are up ahead, trying to open a locked door. I need to stop them.
Vaermina sent a corrupted champion to delay me. I need to defeat it quickly.
Hermaeus Mora arrived and drove Vaermina and Torvesard away. He wants to speak to me.
I observed the contents of the glyphic. Hermaeus Mora wants to talk to me again.
Cipher Frielvi told me how to help Morian escape. I should talk to him so he knows what to do.
The barrier keeping Morian in the gallery is weaker in the Forbidden Exhibit. Morian said it wasn't too far.
We're in the Forbidden Exhibits. The barrier keeping Morian here should be weak somewhere, I just need to figure out how we can use that to help Morian escape.
Seekers have a ward surrounding a portal out of the gallery. I should ask Morian how we're supposed to get to the portal now.

Morian wants to unleash the Known Thing on the Seekers and use that to open the way to the portal. Known Things are incredibly dangerous and could cause us a lot of mental harm. I should be cautious when I do this.
I don't remember what happened after I opened the Known Thing, but Morian's behaving even more strangely. The portal is undefended though, we should go through it before the Seekers recover.
Hermaeus Mora offered to submit himself to our agreement with a contract. He summoned strange glyphics with the power to bind him to his word.
Hermaeus Mora offered to submit himself to our agreement with a contract. He summoned strange glyphics with the power to bind him to his word.
Hermaeus Mora offered to submit himself to our agreement with a contract. He summoned strange glyphics with the power to bind him to his word.
I completed the three tasks Leramil appointed to me on behalf of Hermaeus Mora. I should speak to her about what's next.
I should speak with High Ordinator Boryn in the city of Necrom to get more details.
I found Naryu inside Tel Huulen. I should follow up with her to complete the writ.
I should talk to Naryu and see how she feels about the resolution of the writ.
I found the entrance into Kemel-Ze. I should look around and see if I can find Nilphas Drethan.

The conflicting magic in the chamber has splintered Leramil's portal spell and deposited us in a different layer of reality. I need to find her scattered portals and follow them back to the Eye of Mora.
I have all the major Mnemonic Fragments Protus told me it needed. We should return to the place where I found Protus to finish Protus's repairs.
I should find Solni Nrayn in Necrom and deliver her parcel.
I have Meln the Mouthless's soul gem. I should leave Tel Baro.
My first task is to find Leramil the Wise. She waits for me in the city of Necrom, on the Telvanni Peninsula.
I found Leramil the Wise in Necrom. I should talk to her about why I was summoned here.
Dusksaber Uleni gave me a strange lens she found near the sealed door. Maybe it will help me determine a way to dispel the ward that seals the door.
Leramil thinks we can find out more about the relic, the rite, and the dream at Cipher's Midden in Apocrypha. She asked me to meet her there.
I arrived at Cipher's Midden. I should speak to Leramil.
Master Shelreni appeared and got away with both Meln's Black Book and Meln himself. I should consult with Leramil about what we should do next.
Leramil thinks we need more information. She asked me to search the sanctum of Tel Rendys.
Scruut appeared as I finished searching the stacks. I should speak to her.
The tomeshell dove into another pile of books, but seems to have shed the book it was using. I should grab it for Azandar.
I should meet Leramil the Wise in Cipher's Midden to discuss our next course of action.

While Leramil attempts to locate Vaermina and Torvesard, she tasked me with tracking down Blightcrown and finding out how he's spreading the corruption. I should start by investigating Cipher's Midden.
The corruption has definitely taken hold in Cipher's Midden. Hopefully by destroying the censer, things here will improve. I should return to Leramil's study and tell them what I found.
Leramil and Scruut seem to be adversely affected by the corruption spreading throughout Apocrypha. While Gadayn tries to help Leramil, I should check on Scruut.
Torvesard appeared and offered a way to stop the corruption spreading throughout Apocrypha. I should talk to him and hear what he has to say.

Torvesard revealed that Blightcrown has entered the Mythos, the very core of Apocrypha. I need to meet him and Leramil at the location he marked on my map so we can find a way into the core of Apocrypha.
I arrived at the location and Leramil needs my help with a ritual to open a path into the Mythos. I should do as she directs me.
The way to the Mythos is open. I should enter it and look for Blightcrown.
I entered the Mythos. Now to look around and try to find Blightcrown, Vaermina, or the Hidden Kindred.

Blightcrown has driven huge manufactories into the core of Apocrypha. These giant versions of his censers of corruption are spreading the debilitating plague throughout the realm. I need to disable the eastern manufactory by destroying its crystal.
I disabled two of the corruption manufactories, but Meln senses a third one somewhere up ahead. I need to find it and disable it as well.
Blightcrown stands before me. Time to end his threat once and for all.
Leramil and Scruut arrived and opened a portal. I need to enter it to reach Vaermina, who's still inside the body of Master Shelreni and seeking the next glyphic.
Vaermina should be nearby, wearing the body of Master Shelreni. I need to find her and destroy the mortal shell she wears.
Vaermina, the Prince of Dreams and Nightmares has possessed the body of Master Shelreni. I need to destroy the body of Master Shelreni to expose Vaermina and defeat her.
Torvesard acquired the second glyphic before I could stop him. I should leave the Mythos and consult with Hermaeus Mora.
I emerged from the Mythos and Hermaeus Mora wants to talk to me about what happened with Vaermina and Torvesard. I should see what he has to say.
I entered the Eye of Mora and seem to be in a memory of Hermaeus Mora. The Dremora, Torvesard, is here. He wants to talk to me. I should see what he has to say.
The book Azandar sought has been claimed by a tomeshell. I need to chase after it if I'm going to get it for him.
I returned to Leramil's study in Cipher's Midden. Now I should talk to Leramil.
Balver says that I will find the bull netch musk gland near Kemel-Ze, fungal blooms from a shroom beetle around Tel Dreloth, and a plant called the volcanic stinkhorn east of Sailenmora.
I gathered the ingredients. I should deliver them to Retainer Balver in Ald Isra.
Balver asked me to deliver the tincture personally to Oathman Llaro.
The tincture was poison, of course. I warned Oathman Llaro not to drink it. He said he would deal with Retainer Balver appropriately.
I found a chamber in the Alavelis glass mine that contains an arched gateway. I should look around to see if the Hidden Kindred left any clues behind.
We found the instructions to activate the gateway to Apocrypha. I should talk to Scruut and see if she can cast the invocation.
Next I need to present the Seeker talon into the ritual mix.
Finally, I should pour out the black ichor Azandar procured to completed the summoning ritual.

Thanks to the tome we know we need a Seeker talon and expunged tomedust to summon Tem. Azandar's marked my map. I should be able to find a Seeker talon in a nearby plant, and the tomedust at the Cipher's Midden expungatory.
I believe Tyss has made her decision to withhold the truth of the pact from the other Remnants. I should talk to her about my reward.
I followed Meln's instructions and the components turned into a glowing cloak. I should take it.
We banished Vaermina from Apocrypha. Now Hermaeus Mora wants me to enter the vault and make sure the second glyphic is secure.
I extracted Gadayn from his conversation with Mouth Elar. Now I should follow Gadayn to a place where we can speak freely.
Gadayn led me to a side chamber where we can talk privately. I should speak to him now.
I need to travel to Stormhaven to speak with Leramil the Wise.
I should go to the ritual dais.
Tyss and I discovered that the book at the center of the Crux is as empty as the room itself. I should leave through Tyss's portal and talk to her outside.
We entered the assembly hall. Meln manifested and wants me to talk to Magister Gothren. I should deal with this at once.
Hermaeus Mora instructed me to return to Cipher's Midden and check on my allies before tracking down Torvesard.
Now that I'm back with my allies at Leramil's study, I should tell them what happened.
Mouth Vabdru agreed to help me find Master Shelreni in exchange for a favor.
According to Tlaxalt's note, someone asked her to take the Numinous Grimoire Volume 1 from Cipher's Midden, then meet them to read it together. I should take the book.
The note I found near Cipher Tlaxalt mentions Cipher Plautis. I should ask if there's a reward for returning this volume of the Numinous Grimoire.
I found Cipher Plautis in Cipher's Midden. I should deliver the Numinous Grimoire and tell her Tlaxalt is dead.
I acquired Volume 1 of the Numinous Grimoire. I should take it to Cipher's Midden and turn it in to Cipher Plautis.
I should read Cipher Tlaxalt's note. Perhaps it will shed some light on this mystery.
It appears someone asked Cipher Dreyla to take the Numinous Grimoire Vol. 2 from Cipher's Midden, then meet to read it together. I should take the book.
Cipher Dreyla's note mentioned Cipher Plautis. I should talk to her. There may be a reward for returning a volume of the Numinous Grimoire.
I reached Cipher's Midden and found Cipher Plautis. I should tell her about Dreyla's death and return the Numinous Grimoire.
I have volume 2 of the Numinous Grimoire. Perhaps the cipher mentioned in Dreyla's note will know what to do with it. I should find Cipher Plautis.
I should read the note next to Cipher Dreyla's body. It might be a clue as to what happened here.
Cipher Nelfynn's mysterious collaborator asked her to bring the Numinous Grimoire Vol. 3 to Fathoms Drift. I should retrieve the book.
Cipher Nelfynn's note mentioned Cipher Plautis. There might be a reward for returning this volume of the Numinous Grimoire to Cipher's Midden.
I found Cipher Plautis in Cipher's Midden. I should tell her about Cipher Nelfynn and the volume of the Numinous Grimoire I retrieved.
I retrieved Volume 3 of the Numinous Grimoire. I should take it to Cipher's Midden and find the cipher mentioned in Cipher Nelfynn's note.
I should take a look at the note next to Cipher Nelfynn's body.
Cipher Akacirn isn't home. I should look for clues about his location, or his plans.
I destroyed Akacirn's body before he could complete the Numinous Rite. I should return to Cipher's Midden and tell Cipher Plautis what happened.
I found Cipher Akacirn's ritual site in the Apogee of the Tormenting Eye. This is my chance to destroy his body and put an end to his madness.
I found a letter from someone called Uldazaan in Cipher Akacirn's chambers. I should go see this Heresy-Keeper and find out what he knows about Akacirn.
I located Akacirn's Ritual Site. Now I should enter and locate him.
I should return to Cipher Plautis in Cipher's Midden and tell her that Akacirn has been dealt with.
Cipher Plautis suggested I begin my search in Cipher Akacirn's hidden chambers within Quires Wind.
I found Uldazaan in Chroma Incognito. I should talk to him about Akacirn and his plans.
I need to assist Azandar with this summoning ritual. I should stand ready as he begins the incantations.
The ritual worked! Tem, the Omen of Destiny, has been summoned to our ritual site. Time to ask the Watcher where we can find Martina Abor.
Now that the key has been modified, Azandar believes we can use it to track down frayed fates and return them to the flow of the universe. He wants my assistance scrying for one of these fates.
With Martina's research and Azandar's resources, we might be able to find a way forward in his studies. I should ask him what our next step will be.
I must defeat the Herald's Seekers in the southern Telvanni Peninsula to gather their Daedric ichor. I'll need it to open a gate to Bastion Nymic.
I gathered enough Daedric ichor. I need to find the gate that leads to Bastion Nymic and activate it.
The gate is open. I should use it to travel to Bastion Nymic in Apocrypha with a group of allies.
The Herald is protected by a magical ward. To overcome the barrier I must first defeat the champion of Peryite.
I defeated the champion, opening the way to Bastion Nymic's most dangerous foe. I must defeat the Herald to save the bastion.
The note I found said the creatures originated from a shore north of Gideon. I should go there to investigate.
We made our way to the place called the Underweave. I should talk to Azandar about what we need to do here.
Our scrying ritual pointed at a strange nexus of dead ships called Fathoms Drift. I should meet up with Azandar near the entrance.
I need to find Uxunath.
Scruut and I entered the Tranquil Catalog. We need to find the invaders who headed for the Pool of Inquiry.
We entered the Pool of Inquiry but something's wrong. Scruut wants me to look around and find tears of some sort.
I defeated Kynreeve Ryl of the Dreamcarvers. I should examine the glyphic and see if I can learn what Torvesard sought in this place.
The glyphic held memories of three books. Torvesard found something important here. I should examine them.
Sharp wants to travel to Federo's home in Sadrith Mora. I should accompany him to see if we can get information on the Reformer.
Federo's home was unlocked and appears abandoned. We should take a look around.
Sharp and I learned that Federo fled his home to meet a contact in Eastmarch. I should talk to Sharp to see what comes next.

Federo agreed to give us all the information he has on the Reformer in exchange for forged identity papers and new clothing. Sharp and I are headed to a supposed document forger in Adept's Retreat in Windhelm.
I should talk to Azandar about what we need to do here.
A lot just happened. I should talk to Azandar and see what he thinks of this situation.
Thanks to the Lark of Rosgard, I have both the real and replica versions of the Talisman of Saint Vorys. I should decide which talisman is going to the temple.
Something appeared and seemingly absorbed Azandar's frayed fate. The arcanist wants me to use the Fateweaver Key on the runes he cast.
Hermaeus Mora wants me to examine the Glyphic of Lost Memories to make sure it hasn't been damaged. I should do that now.
I cleared Hermaeus Mora's foes from Bastion Nymic. I should leave this place and return to Necrom.
I need to place the book as directed.
We found a sample of tyranite calx. It's time to return to Dimik-ei.
I am experiencing one of Sharp's memories as though it were my own.
Scruut noticed a fate anomaly at a place north of Cipher's Midden called the Prismatic Iris Shore. She thinks it may be the glyphic that Torvesard stole. I need to go there and see what I can find.
I reached the Prismatic Iris Shore as Scruut instructed, but there's no obvious sign of Torvesard. Meln suggests using his ghost sight to look around. I should take advantage of his assistance.
I found Torvesard, but it appears he already opened the glyphic. I should listen to the memory stored within.
Sondivel the Reformer kidnapped Dimik-ei. I should listen to what he has to say so we can get her back.
While experiencing one of Sharp's forgotten memories, something went wrong. I should search for Dimik-ei.
Torvesard departed but left the glyphic behind. I should examine it and hear more of the memory.
Hermaeus Mora appeared. I should talk to him about what I just learned.
We should enter Broken Tusk to search for a fragment of tyranite calx.
I should talk to Scruut about what's involved in inscribing a new entry in the Chronicle of Apocrypha.
I need to listen to Scruut's ceremony and then I should talk to Curate Gadayn.
Curate Gadayn asked me to accompany him and Leramil back to Necrom so he can return the Fulcrum Obscura.
I arrived in Necrom. Now to head to the Necropolis and meet up with Curate Gadayn and Leramil.
Hermaeus Mora confirmed that he erased the memory of the Daedric Prince Ithelia from existence. I should return to Cipher's Midden and check on my allies. Scruut said to meet them in Ciphers Hall.
Before I check in with the others, Meln wants to talk to me. I should see what he has to say.
Dreynis agreed to share his research, if we can find it. He said his notes are scattered about the island, but he enchanted them to glow so he wouldn't lose them. I should look around.
We found the location of Sondivel's new hideout. Sharp and I should meet with Mevei and Federo at the arranged spot outside of Arenthia and relay what we discovered.
We found Mevei and Federo outside Arenthia. I should tell Mevei what we discovered from Elistrenne Starflower.
I should return to Ordinator Tandasea and claim my reward.
I must defeat the Herald's Seekers in the northern Telvanni Peninsula to gather their Daedric ichor. I'll need it to open a gate to Bastion Nymic.
I gathered enough Daedric ichor. I need to find the gate that leads to Bastion Nymic and activate it.
The gate is open. I should use it to travel to Bastion Nymic in Apocrypha with a group of allies.
The Herald is protected by a magical ward. To overcome the barrier I must first defeat the champion of Peryite.
I defeated the champion, opening the way to Bastion Nymic's most dangerous foe. I must defeat the Herald to save the bastion.
I cleared Hermaeus Mora's foes from Bastion Nymic. I should leave this place and return to Necrom.
I should return to Ordinator Tandasea and claim my reward.
I must defeat the Herald's Seekers in the Endless Library region of Apocrypha to gather Daedric ichor. I'll need it to open a gate to Bastion Nymic.
I gathered enough Daedric ichor. I need to find the gate that leads to Bastion Nymic and activate it.
The gate is open. I should use it to travel to Bastion Nymic in Apocrypha with a group of allies.
A magical ward protects the Herald. To overcome the barrier, I must first defeat the champion of Peryite.
I defeated the champion, opening the way to Bastion Nymic's most dangerous foe. I must defeat the Herald to save the bastion.
I cleared Hermaeus Mora's foes from Bastion Nymic. I should leave this place and return to Necrom.
I should return to Ordinator Tandasea and claim my reward.
I must defeat the Herald's Seekers in Apocrypha's Chroma Incognito to gather Daedric ichor. I'll need it to open a gate to Bastion Nymic.
I gathered enough Daedric ichor. I need to find the gate that leads to Bastion Nymic and activate it.
The gate is open. I should use it to travel to Bastion Nymic in Apocrypha with a group of allies.
A magical ward protects the Herald. To overcome the barrier, I must first defeat the champion of Peryite.
I defeated the champion, opening the way to Bastion Nymic's most dangerous foe. I must defeat the Herald to save the bastion.
I cleared Hermaeus Mora's foes from Bastion Nymic. I should leave this place and return to Necrom.
Scruut says that the reality of Apocrypha is out of balance. I should head to the Necrom Bindery and rendezvous with Leramil to discuss our options.
I reached the Necrom Bindery. Now I should talk to Leramil and determine what we can do to stop Vaermina.
Hermaeus Mora opened a portal and told me to meet my allies at Cipher's Midden.
I destroyed the body of Master Shelreni. Now Vaermina has transformed into a terrible nightmare creature. I need to destroy it.
The power of the Black Book has been called forth. I should direct it against Vaermina.
Hermaeus Mora has come in response to my use of the Black Book. Together we can end this. I need to utilize the power of the Black Book once again.
The note I found next to the dead Cipher said to go to the Feral Gallery.
I found the Feral Gallery. There is a man there who yelled something about wanting to leave. I should talk to him, he might have more information on what is happening inside.
The scrying ritual seems to indicate a location somewhere in the Alik'r desert. I should talk to Azandar about our next step.
We sewed two of Azandar's frayed fates back into the universe. I should talk to him to see what we need to do next.
Time to check in with Azandar before getting down to business.
I recovered the fated glyphic after it was restored by Thaddeus's spell. I should meet him and Ogle outside of the Underweave to complete this task.
According to Cipher Huzmargo, I need to find a magicka focus somewhere inside the Corporea Secretus.
After resetting the focus, one of the bodies in the Rectory began walking and talking, then suddenly died. I should ask Huzmargo about what this means.
Ganthelen seems surprised to find me and Sharp at Federo's place. I should talk to her.
Federo gave us the location of a cache of information he buried on the Reformer. We need to travel to the location he marked on my map to find the cache.
I should work with Cipher Huzmargo to learn more about what's befallen the Rectory Corporea.
I entered the Rectory's Chorus and I see a cognitive avatar of Huzmargo, who is watching over me from Apocrypha. I should speak with him.
Cipher Huzmargo wants to talk to me about the pact forged between Hermaeus Mora and the Daggerfall Devilâ€”a serial killer and true identity of the rogue mind.
I must go to Sondivel Ulres.
I must talk to Sondivel Ulres.
I am experiencing one of Sharp's memories as though it were my own.
Even though I knew the tincture was in fact a poison, I gave it to Oathman Llaro, killing him the moment he drank it.
The trail of footprints from Reynila's camp led to Deredrien's corpse. I should investigate the nearby note.
I must take the bucket.
Torvesard wants to talk to me. I should hear what he has to say.
I must defy Sondivel Ulres.
We followed the threads fate and found what we were looking for. Something seems to be wrong, though. I should investigate.
Scruut says Vaermina and her allies passed through the portal ahead of us. I should enter the portal and follow them.
The portal deposited us in a section of the Panopticon that feels extremely ancient and long abandoned. I need to look around and try to find Vaermina and her alllies.
I need to search the Infinite Panopticon for Vaermina and her allies.
Hermaeus Mora appeared and asked to speak with me. I should talk to him before we enter the Mythos.
I did as Leramil asked and helped with her ritual. Now I should return to her and see if the path to the Mythos has opened.
We reached the Eye of Mora, but Hidden Kindred cultists stand in our way. We need to defeat them to pursue Vaermina.
It seems I arrived just in time for a celebration in honor of the reopening of the necropolis. I should talk to Curate Gadayn about what's going on here.
I disabled the huge manufactory that was spewing corruption in the eastern Mythos. Now I should head to the western side and see how Scruut and Gadayn are doing.
We reached the western Mythos to find Curate Gadayn and Scruut under attack. I need to help them.

Blightcrown has driven huge manufactories into the core of Apocrypha. These giant versions of his censers of corruption are spreading the debilitating disease throughout the realm. I need to disable the western manufactory by destroying the crystal.
We found a starflower marking the door to the hideout of one of Sondivel's slavers. I should head inside with Sharp and see what information we can take from her on Sondivel's whereabouts.
We uncovered Tredecim's true identityâ€”the spy is Alam Guitot. Naryu returned to Ald Isra to find him. I should meet her inside Tel Huulen.
With the anchor items acquired, I should ask Azandar what he needs to do with them.
I should wait as Azandar summons Tem and assist with the ritual if he needs me.
I should go to Fathoms Drift to retrieve the Numinous Grimoire that Cipher Nelfynn left there.
Plautis mentioned Akacirn had a secret dwelling located in Quires Wind. I should locate the entrance to his dwelling.
I should talk to Naryu and see how she feels about the resolution of the writ.
I should make my way to Alavelis and look into the miner's story. Daedric cultists certainly sound like something that may be connected to the threads of fate I'm supposed to investigate.
I found a strange creature on the outskirts of Alavelis. It might know something about what happened here.
I need to go to the Necropolis of Necrom and find Curate Gadayn. He should be able to tell me what's going on.
After I spoke with Master Sulis, Master Foves approached and asked for my attention. I should go see what he wants.
I found Cipher Akacirn's ritual site in the Apogee of the Tormenting Eye. I need to stop his ritual.
Leramil the Wise asked to meet me at Tel Rendys. I should head there now.
Tem instructed me to place the anchor items into the ritual flame to construct the runeform.
Uldazaan the Heresy-Keeper was happy to tell me Cipher Akacirn intended to perform his ritual at a hidden location inside the Apogee of the Tormenting Eye. I should go there at once.
I should watch Magister Faras conduct his ritual.
Something has gone wrong. I should speak with Tralise.
Meln suggested I use the Black Book against Vaermina. It's worth a try.
Azandar seems down. He said he wants some fresh air and created a portal to get us out of the Sanctum.
Vorm excreted a sheet of parchment that bears a crudely rendered map. This map likely indicates where we should look to find the three books we need. I should pick it up.
I should seek out Cipher Agrushna near Quires Wind and offer her my assistance.
I should talk to Scruut about what's involved in updating the Chronicle of Apocrypha.
Dreynis the mage appeared. I should speak to him and see if he'll share the research Garalo is looking for.
I should travel to Necrom in the Telvanni Peninsula and speak to Felande about the inn room located within the Mourner's Solace Inn.
Felande has offered me a free inn room at the Mourner's Solace Inn in Necrom. I should speak to her to learn more about the offer.
I've agreed to become Felande's newest tenant. I should speak to her to finalize the deal.
I reached the entrance to the Glyphic Assemblage. The fated glyphic's path continues inside.
I entered a place called the Glyphic Assemblage. I should continue to follow the path of the fated glyphic.
I need to stop Master Shelreni from completing the rite and sacrificing Master Marena. I also need to deal with an aspect of Vaermina that's defending the site.
Master Malkhest said our best lead to finding Tho'at Replicanum and her nymic is by following the maligraphies. He also said they attacked him, so I should be prepared for a fight.
One of the more powerful maligraphies dropped a fragment of Tho'at Replicanum's nymic. If one maligraphy has this fragment, then others will hold more.
Master Malkhest's theory about the maligraphies dropping pieces of Tho'at Replicanum's nymic is correct. He's going to keep researching Tho'at while I continue the search for the fragments.
There's one fragment of Tho'at's nymic left. Which means we're close to being able to summon her. I should keep fighting the maligraphies.
I defeated Tho'at Replicanum. I should talk to Master Malkhest to see what he wants.
I completed the ritual by burning the items as Naanurrel instructed but the logbook didn't burn. I should discuss this with Landolvel.
Hermaeus Mora has changed the bargain, now wanting us to choose between Landolvel's memory of his father or his father's mortality. I should choose carefully when deciding who to give the book to.
While Curate Gadayn gathers his thoughts for the speech the abbot asked him to give, I should tell Leramil what happened with Torvesard and the second glyphic.
I need to take the fractured remains of the fated glyphic to the Heart of Underweave. Its entrance is somewhere to the southeast.
I found Ogle and Thaddeus waiting for me at the entrance to Underweave. Thaddeus wishes to speak to me.
Thaddeus used the power of the Heart of Underweave to turn back time and repair the fractured glyphic. I need to take the restored glyphic while Thaddeus maintains his spell.
I found Ogle and Thaddeus in the Heart of Underweave. Thaddeus instructed me to place the fractured glyphic on the Heart's altar so he can restore it.
It seems the ritual to release their father worked, but Tralise was injured in the process. I should speak with her.
Tralise gave me a list of powerful Telvanni relics to acquire. With them, she can perform a ritual to release her father from this curse.
Leramil asked me to help align the portal that's almost open. I should do that.
Dacia and I were warned to turn back by Tun-Shei, but Dacia won't stop until we find Nathyn. I should accompany Dacia to keep her safe from the afflicted test subjects.
Dacia and I found notes that suggest Nathyn might be in danger of one of Sathile's experiments. I should keep searching the caverns with Dacia.
I dropped the potions from the skyway and the bristlebacks are asleep. I should find Morian.
Master Shelreni is about to kill the Telvanni masters. I need to stop her.
I acquired the relics. Now I should return to Tralise so she can perform her ritual.
I should talk to Tralise and let her know I acquired the relics she needs for the ritual.
Tralise needs one more relic for the ritual, an ancient phylactery kept in Apocrypha. I can find it within Bastion Nymic.
I acquired Magister Nisfarik's Phylactery from Bastion Nymic. Now I should return to Tralise and give it to her.
Tralise and Yensa have started the ritual. I should assist them.
I should meet with Meenai-Shai and the Morbid Observer in the Main Hall.
Morian has caught up to me and wants to talk about how I should use the sleep potions I've collected.
We used the Runeform of Unmaking to rip the adversary from Azandar's fateline. Now my companion wants me to destroy the Fateweaver Key by burning it out in the magicka font nearby.
The pages could be anywhere on the Telvanni Peninsula or even Apocrypha. Once I collect a few, I can package them into a bundle for proper handling.
Now that I gathered the pages and formed them into a bundle, I need to decide who to give the pages to.
Hermau Mora directed me to enter the Vault of the Glyphic of Lost Memories and make sure the glyphic is still secure.
We returned to the Necrom Bindery. Now to find Leramil and tell her what happened.
We have the nymic and Master Malkhest found the best place to use it to summon Tho'at Replicanum. When he does that, I need to defeat her.

We have a completed version of Tho'at Replicanum's nymic. The only thing left to do is find a place where we can summon Tho'at. I should keep fighting through different wings of the archive while Master Malkhest searches.
The fate anomaly should be close. I need to look around and find it.
I defeated Tho'at Replicanum. I should talk to Master Malkhest to see what's next.

A copy of Tho'at Replicanum lurks somewhere in the Infinte Archive. In order to summon her, I have to first defeat a number of powerful maligraphies and collect nymic fragments like I did the first time I was here.
I defeated 20 enemy Arcanists. I should return to the bounty board at the Eastern Elsweyr gate to claim my reward.
I should seek out and kill enemy Arcanists.
I should seek out and kill enemy Arcanists.
I defeated 20 enemy Arcanists. I should return to the bounty board at the Southern High Rock gate to claim my reward.
I should seek out and kill enemy Arcanists.
I defeated 20 enemy Arcanists. I should return to the bounty board at the Northern Morrowind gate to claim my reward.
The adversary is weakened and Azandar has cast the Runeform of Unmaking he learned from Tem. I need to trigger the runeform in order to rip the adversary from Azandar's fateline.
Filer Pix told me to find Filer Myx in the Infinite Archive.
I need to talk to Filer Myx in the Infinite Archive.
A library-city in Apocrypha called the Infinite Archive is under attack from its own books. I should find Master Malkhest and see if he needs help.
Now that we're all at Beragon's townhouse, I should talk to Leramil about what we learned.
We learned that Nantharion is the leader of the Recollection, that Ithelia seeks the Outcast Inn, and Feldagard Keep is in danger. I should discuss this with Beragon.
We recovered the three relics once used to defeat Itheliaâ€”the Skein of Secrets, Abolisher, and the Lamp of Clarity. I should talk to Beragon about what we should do next.
We defeated King Nantharion at Miscarcand. I should check in with Beragon to see what else he thinks we need to do here.
At the townhouse, I met with my allies and spoke to the leaders of Skingrad and Vashabar. Now I should talk to Beragon about all we accomplished in West Weald.
We completed the ritual and created a new relic, the Mirror of Truth. I should talk to Leramil and see how she's doing.
I returned to Beragon's townhouse. Now I should speak with Leramil.
I should talk to Leramil about all that happened and see what she's thinking.
Leramil is waiting to speak with me. I should talk to her.
We carried out the Rite of Propagation and the village is celebrating. I should check in with Laeni to see how the couple is doing.
I should talk to Mizzik now that we solved the murders and found the missing Weatherleah Estate fortune.

Leramil sent me here to investigate and I wound up working with Tribune Alea to close a Daedric portal and foil an invasion of Skingrad. I should talk to Tribune Alea and make sure the threat here has been contained.
I informed Leramil that the threat hanging over the inn came from Ithelia herself. However, it's now over. I should hand her the Lamp of Clarity and find out about my reward.
I should talk to Beragon and give him the wildburn seed I recovered from the ruins.
<<1>> was petrified by the trap protecting the Emblem. With luck, it should be temporary. I should take the Emblem to Narsis Dren's assistant, Elfbetta, at her southern camp.
I helped Fennorian rescue victims from the winery at Valente Vineyards and destroyed the alchemical laboratory of Lord Gallio Valente. I should talk to Fennorian about my reward.
I should talk to Tribune Alea and figure out what to do with the sword we acquired, Abolisher.
I should talk to Maerenah and see if the threat of the Terror of the Weald is truly over.
I gathered ten pages, I should hand them over to Destozuno now.
I should gather any pages that I come across in the Infinite Archive.
I found and freed the Aetherial shards in Silorn using the Aetherial Alarum. I should speak to Toutis Mido about my reward.
<<1>> is grateful for my help in protecting the town of Leftwheal. I should speak with her about next steps.
I should talk to Orissa and give her the wine I recovered from Legion's Rest.
I should talk to Lepida Russus and give her Haldain's possessions as the note in the journal requested.
I halted the ritual by collecting all the ritual items and burning the bodies the necromancers were using. I should meet with Priest Faric outside.
I retrieved what I could of Grander Nemarcet's stolen dowry. I should return it to him and tell him the truth about the brigand who robbed him.
I helped Legionary Calvo Dorso reach the bell tower and signal for reinforcements. Now I should talk to Captain Dromius about my reward.
I found Captain Abitius and two legionaries interrogating a Recollection soldier. I should talk to her and claim my reward.
The Goblins seem to be placated now that Pim has the totems. I should speak to her to finish helping out.
I found the pages that Destozuno needs to reconstruct the book, Fynboar the Resurrected. I should give them to her next time I see her.
Destozuno doesn't know where the scattered sheaves of paper ended up in the Infinite Archive. I should keep an eye out for any that I see as I explore the archive.
I finally have all the bookbinding supplies I need. I should give them to Destozuno next time I see her.

I need to find lockboxes throughout the Infinite Archive. Once I have enough bookbinding supplies, Destozuno will have the thick thread, a book cover, and a sharp knife that she needs to bind the loose pages to the finished book.
I should find the Journal of the First Remnant.
The Herald is protected by a magical ward. To overcome the barrier I must first defeat the champion of Vaermina.
The Herald is protected by a magical ward. To overcome the barrier I must first defeat the champion of Hermaeus Mora.
The Herald is protected by a magical ward. To overcome the barrier I must first defeat the champion of Vaermina.
The Herald is protected by a magical ward. To overcome the barrier I must first defeat the champion of Hermaeus Mora.

A magical ward protects the Herald. To overcome the barrier, I must first defeat the champion of Hermaeus Mora.
We found notes concerning this ruin, a statue, and Master Shelreni's deal with Torvesard and Vaermina. I should discuss the contents of these notes with Curate Gadayn.
I found Leramil the Wise in Necrom. I should talk to her about why I was summoned here.
I need to seek out Master Faras, a Telvanni wizard.
Nahlia is going to return to the Mages Guild and get their advice on what to do next. I should speak to her about her plans.
I should search Legion's Rest with Orissa Dellinoi for Lazen and the stolen Blue Aedral.
I should search Fyrelight Cave and retrieve what I can of Grander's stolen dowry.
Leramil learned that the threads of fate have begun to fray in three different placesâ€”a sure sign that Torvesard is at work. We need to investigate each site and try to determine what he's up to.
I should find Leramil the Wise in the Outlaws Refuge of Wayrest, Elden Root, or Mournhold. She can tell me what we must do to stop Torvesard.
I recovered the crates of Blue Aedral along with a note detailing the plot to ambush Orissa's caravan. I should meet her outside and share what I discovered.
Scruut wants me to try to restore the Daedric relics at three locations she marked on my map. I need to take the relics and meet my allies in the Telvanni Peninsula, West Weald, and Apocrypha.
I restored the three Daedric artifacts. I should return to Beragon's townhouse to see what Leramil and Scruut think we should do next.
I returned to Beragon's townhouse. Now I should speak with Leramil.

Leramil and Scruut think I can use the Echonir to reveal lingering memories at the Loom of the Untraveled Road. These memories may point us to where Ithelia has gone. I should use Leramil's portal to travel to Fargrave.
Now that I returned to Fargrave, I should make my way to the Loom of the Untraveled Road.
I reached the Loom. Now to use the Echonir and see if there are any lingering memories to reveal.

Ithelia, now full of rage and power, plans to take control of Apocrypha and make it her own realm. We must somehow change her from this destructive course, so we need to return to Beragon's townhouse and consult with Scruut.
We returned to Beragon's townhouse. I should talk to Scruut and tell her about the memory and the idea Leramil and I discussed.

Scruut has an idea to create a relic that might help Ithelia change. To create it we need something tied to Ithelia. Scruut suggested I go to the ruins at Ceyond and find the Primordial Shattered Titan.
I need to search the ruins of Ceyond to locate the Primordial Shattered Titan.
I need to defeat the Primordial Shattered Titan in order to acquire one its fragments to use to create the relic Scruut told me about.
With the Primordial Shattered TItan destroyed, I need to gather a fragment of the creature to take back to Leramil and Scruut.
I should let Leramil know what happened to Curate Gadayn.
Everything has been placed in the ritual circle. The next step is to assist Leramil with the ritual.
I recovered most of the dowry items, which should please Grander Nemarcet. Although, he might be unhappy to learn that his prospective bride was the brigand who robbed him.
Toutis gave me a tool called an Aetherial alarum and told me he'll show me how to use it to retrieve the shards once we're inside Silorn. I should lead the way.
I should seek out the remaining four Aetherial shards in Silorn and gather them to return to Toutis.
I gathered the five Aetherial shards for Toutis. I should meet him outside Silorn for my reward.
<<1>> needs to find the will <<2>> the dog stole during his investigation at Weatherleah. I should follow the tracks.
I found Betu with Chef Edric. I should grab the will while the dog is distracted.
I should talk with Chef Edric now that I've secured the will.
Aquilia Verres informed me that her late aunt's will is missing and that I should speak to Mizzik Thunderboots if I wish to help.
I need to speak to Tribune Alea Idolus to begin my search for the missing legionaries. I can find her in the Rustwall Estate's courtyard. I should head there now.
Tribune Alea seems impatient to find her missing legionaries. She wants us to search the nearby manor house for clues to where everyone went. I should enter the manor and take a look around.

I found evidence of a fight in the manor house. We also discovered a letter saying that cohort Captain Leronus had a plan to hide the remaining soldiers and staff. Tribune Alea ran off to the barracks to find the captain. I should go join her.
I entered the barracks and found Tribune Alea near the dead body of Captain Leronus. She found a letter on the captain. I should read the letter and see what it contains.

We found a letter from someone named Gaius that warns of danger to Rustwall Estate. It says that the staff would hide in nearby catacombs, and he has the key. I should talk to Tribune Alea about this information.
<<1>> flagged me down requesting aid on behalf of Leftwheal. I should find the town's leader, <<2>>, to get a grasp on the situation.
<<1>> saw townsfolk still trapped amid the rubble and a series of rituals to summon in more attackers. She asked me to deal with the Recollection and free the injured townsfolk.
I found <<1>> with the rescued townsfolk. I should let her know that we addressed the imminent threat.
I stopped the Recollection's ritual in Leftwheal. I should meet up with <<1>> outside the town walls to inform her of our success.
We need to search Groundskeeper Gaius's home and find either him or the catacomb key.

Groundskeeper Gaius confirmed that the legionaries and staff hid in the catacombs for safety from the mysterious attacks. He stashed the key, but drew me a map so I could find it. I should grab the map to begin my search.
Tribune Alea and I entered the Rustwall gardens. I should look for the statue where Gauis hid the key.
We reached the statue that Gaius marked on his map. I don't see an obvious place where he could've hid the key. I should search the statue for a hiding place.
Now that we have the catacombs key, I should unlock the catacombs and search for the missing legionaries and estate staff.
We entered the catacombs, but haven't found any legionaries or estate staff. Tribune Alea wants us to push forward anyway. I should search the catacombs for signs of survivors.
We found the Daedric portal. I need to destroy the portal anchors to close the portal and keep more Daedra from flooding in.
I found Axeborn Khurga being crushed by a large construct. I need to kill it and Anthelmir, before it's too late for Khurga.
I killed the Trellis Guardian and Anthelmir, but Khurga didn't survive her injuries. I need to find Dulzush Forgefire, the last remaining leader, so that she doesn't suffer the same fate.
I defeated Aradros and rescued Dulzush Forgefire. I should talk to Bazrag now.
I found the leader of the Recollection. I need to kill him to finally rescue Dulzush and liberate the Oathsworn Pit.
Bazrag said that we needed to find Black-Glove Garm. I don't know where the Recollection is keeping him, but Bazrag seems to think he's still in the Lodge of the Fist.
I found Black-Glove Garm just as a Recollection warrior threatened him. Garm looks injured, he needs my help.
Garm mentioned that Axeborn Khurga needed our help more than he does now that Packmaster Rethelros is dead. I should search for her in the Lodge of the Axe.
Bazrag knows what's going on with the Oathsworn Pit. I should talk to him.
I need to rid Oathsworn Pit of Recollection invaders.
I defeated foes in Oathsworn Pit.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Aradros.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
The scroll marked four locations inside the Watch where the signal fires must be ignited. I should find and ignite them to alert the Legion.
I recovered the will. I should hand it to <<1>> and tell him about my conversation with <<2>>.
<<1>> asked me to help out with the investigation. I should meet him at the manor to talk to the family about the will.
<<1>> is revealing the will to the family. I should stay and hear what it says.
<<1>> wants to speak to me in private about the contents of the will. He asked me to join him in the study.
<<1>> asked me to read the will myself and see if I can solve the riddle.
The will mentions a dog several times as an important hint. I should see if there are any clues in the study that relate to <<1>>'s dog.
I found a note behind the painting. I should show it to <<1>>.

<<1>> fears <<2>> met with the author of the note and fell victim to foul play. But Mizzik was told <<2>> was found dead in her library, alone. Mizzik suggests we speak to the members of the household who were present when she was found.
I learned from the family that <<1>> was found by <<2>>. I should ask him what he saw at the crime scene.
I should look around the library and see what I can discover regarding the death of Lady Weatherleah.
I found some interesting clues in the library that suggest the scene was staged. I should talk about this with <<1>>.
The clues I discovered suggest the killer escaped through the window. I should investigate the window exterior.
I found Betu outside the library. He seems to be tracking a trail. I should follow him!
I found the body of <<1>> on the ground by a memorial. I should examine the scene.
I found a note on the body along with foul-smelling tea and a tainted tankard. I should talk to <<1>> about this.
I should speak with the imposter Uriel Weatherleah without revealing what we discovered at the site of the memorial.
The imposter Uriel is accusing <<1>> of killing <<2>>. I should question <<3>> and see if her story has changed.
<<1>> is certain <<2>> could not have brought the tea that day. She accused <<3>> of poisoning the tea, and murdering <<2>> to cover up the crime. I need to speak to <<3>>.
<<1>> reveals that Pelena finished brewing the tea for <<2>> that day, countering <<3>>'s claim that she was not there that morning. I should investigate the scene where they met for tea.
I found letters revealing correspondence between <<1>> and an assassin named <<2>>. It suggests they conspired to murder <<3>>. I should show this to <<4>>.

<<1>> thinks <<2>> meant to confront <<3>> about the letters during tea before she was poisoned. <<3>> was present for her death and aware that Uriel is deceased. I heard a scream downstairs! I should investigate.
The imposter Uriel has been murdered. I should investigate his body.
I need to search the pantry for the remedy that might help Betu recover.
I ignited all four signal fires in Varen's Watch. I should leave through the gate and talk to Captain Abitius.
I should ask <<1>> how I go about signing up for one of these daily jobs.
I should speak with <<1>> in the city of Skingrad to get more details about these jobs.
I need to find and gather venom crystals from crystaljack wasps in Legion's Rest.
I gathered the venom crystals from crystaljacks. I should return to <<1>> to claim my reward.
I defeated Spinner Urthrendir and burned the illusory mushrooms in Fall's Glade. I should report back to <<1>>.
I need to find and defeat Spinner Urthrendir in the forest overgrowth of Fall's Glade, which lies southwest of Skingrad. I should also burn any mushrooms growing in the glade to disrupt his ritual.
I helped defeat a Mirrormoor incursion. I should return to <<1>> to report my success.
I need to retrieve tool packs on loan from the West Weald Legion that I should be able to find throughout the Haldain Lumber Camp.
I recovered the abandoned tool packs from Haldain Lumber Camp. I should deliver them to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I should find Captain Abitius and tell her that I ignited the signal fires at Varen's Watch. The scroll mentioned she had set up a camp nearby.
Fennorian wants to start our investigation on the grounds of the estate. I should help him search the vineyard.
After talking to an injured field hand, checking out the vineyard's new grapes, and examining a dead death hound, Fennorian wants to talk about what we may have learned.
Fennorian wants to investigate the auction next. We're posing as an invited vampire and his guest, using the invitation that Fennorian took from another vampire.
Fennorian and I made it inside. I should speak to Fennorian before we investigate further.
Fennorian suggested we split up and mingle with the guests at the pre-auction party. I should question the guests without arousing too much suspicion.
I talked to several guests at the event. One of them knows Fennorian. I need to let him know before the auction starts.
Fennorian advised me to enter the manor and search Lord Gallio Valente's office while he has a discussion with Lady Ursilia Valente.
Torvesard's trail led us to shrines dedicated to the Daedric Princes Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala. He appears to be searching for ancient relics. I should confer with Leramil about our next move.
Leramil believes that we'll need to consult with a Dark Elf scholar to figure out what exactly Torvesard is looking for. She instructed me to meet her in Vvardenfell at the Shrine of Azura.
We met the Dark Elf Gadayn in Vvardenfell. I should speak with him about our mission to find and stop Torvesard.
Curate Gadayn was unfamiliar with any relics Torvesard might be seeking, but he suggested visiting the monks at the monastery of Holamayan.
Abbot Andor met us at the entrance to Holamayan Monastery. I should see if he knows anything that could help us locate Torvesard.
Abbot Andor suggested that the answers we seek may be hidden in the library of Holamayan Monastery.
The strange relic Leramil gave me recognizes the presence of a memory associated with the Forgotten Prince. I should use the Echonir to see what it reveals.
The memory revealed by the Echonir highlighted an ancient book. I should examine it.
The book we found in the library of Holamayan indicates that a long-lost shrine of Hermaeus Mora may be what we're looking for. I should consult with Leramil and Gadayn about our next step.
Neither Leramil nor Gadayn knows where this lost shrine is hidden. Perhaps one of the monks here at Holamayan can point us in the right direction.
We learned the lost Shrine of Inevitable Secrets lies near the ruins of Anudnabia. Now we just need to find the place.
The Echonir revealed the existence of another memory in this area. We should use the relic to see what the memory contains.
It looks like the lost shrine lies beneath the waters of the Inner Sea. I should speak with Leramil.
Leramil assures me she has a spell that can help us reach the Shrine of Inevitable Secrets, even though it sank into the sea long ago.
I found Lord Gallio Valente's office. I should search around for evidence concerning the true purpose of this auction.
Fennorian found me in Lord Valente's office. I should talk to him and tell him what I uncovered.
Fennorian wants to head downstairs to find the alchemical laboratory in the winery. He wants to make sure this is the last batch of Vesper Valente.
I need to search the winery and locate Lord Gallio Valente's alchemical laboratroy.
Fennorian and I discovered some of the servants used in Lord Gallio Valente's experiments. I should speak to Fennorian about what we can do for them.
Fennorian believes he can brew a counteragent to reverse the effects of Gallio's experiments. I need to find waxflower petals, Imperial oak tannins, and grape pulp for him in the winery.
I found the ingredients Fennorian asked for. I should return to him so he can craft the alchemical counteragent to save the captives we found.
The counteragent is currently distilling. I need to wait for Fennorian to finish preparing it for use on the victims of Lord Gallio Valente.
Fennorian made a counteragent to help the victims of Lord Gallio Valente's experiments. I should pour it on on them.
Fennorian's alchemical counteragent worked. I should speak to one of the victims to learn more about what happened to them.
The alchemical laboratory should be in the caverns through the doors to the south of where we helped the caged victims. I should head in and find the laboratory.
To destroy the laboratory, Fennorian suggests I turn the flame valves under the fermentation vats all the way up. That will increase the pressure and cause them to explode.

Fennorian and I destroyed Lord Gallio Valente's laboratory and the mushroom crop responsible for cultivating the grapes used to create Vesper Valente wine. We should leave the winery and meet outside.
Thanks to Leramil's magic, we can walk along the bottom of the sea! Now we just need to make our way to the sunken shrine.
We located Hermaeus Mora's sunken shrine. Now we should use the portal and make our way inside.
The ancient shrines Torvesard visited across Tamriel somehow led him to this demiplane connected to Hermaeus Mora's lost shrine. He must be here somewhere. I need to find him.
With the relic he recovered from Boethiah's shrine, Torvesard was able to open a portal to the heart of Hermaeus Mora's domain. We have to follow him!
Torvesard found his way to the Mythos, the very heart of Hermaeus Mora's realm. We need to stop him before he reaches the glyphic containing the secret of the Forgotten Prince's fate.
Torvesard found the last glyphic that holds the secret of Ithelia's fate. He seems to have triggered a powerful memory.
I defeated the glass mantikora, but Torvesard made good use of my delay. I need to find him before he opens the Glyphic of Shattered Reflections.
A strange Daedra of glass appeared to confront us! We must defeat it if we have any hope of stopping Torvesard from reaching the glyphic he seeks.
Torvesard learned that Ithelia, the Forgotten Prince, is imprisoned in the Mythos. He found a portal to the site of her prison. I should follow.
The prison of the Forgotten Prince is empty! Somehow Ithelia has already escaped, but Torvesard is still here. Perhaps he can explain what happened here.
I should speak with Leramil about what happened here.
Leramil suggests regrouping in Grahtwood. I should meet her there.
Now that I'm inside Varen's Watch, I need to search the rubble piles for any Reachfolk trinkets I can find.
I gathered Reachfolk trinkets from Varen's Watch. Now I should return to <<1>> to claim my reward.
Haldain's journal said that his belongings can be found at his workbench nearby. I should take them.
Haldain's sister, Lepida Russus, has a room at the Fertile Respite in Skingrad. If I make my way there, I can fulfill Haldain's last wish.
I found Lepida Russus. I should let her know what I found in Haldain's Lumber Camp.

The note found on Uriel's imposter was written by Chef Edric and reveals Pelena's involvement in Uriel's death. Now that Betu has recovered Mizzik suggests we follow him in the hopes that he can track Pelena.
I tracked <<1>> into the tunnels below the manor. I should apprehend her before she escapes.
I  stopped  <<1>> from murdering any more victims. I should talk to <<2>> about our next steps.
<<1>> brought me a piece of treasure. I should examine it to see if it holds any clues.
I found what appears to be Lady Weatherleah's missing fortune. I should investigate the area.
I found a letter from <<1>> revealing her suspicions about <<2>>. She intended to leave the estate to her staff and dog, <<3>>. I should bring these findings to her niece, <<4>>.
I should show <<1>> the letter from <<2>> I discovered alongside the missing fortune.
Now that I'm inside Fort Colovia, I need to find and burn crates filled with the misprinted gala invitations.
I burned the crates of misprinted gala invitations. Now I should return to <<1>> for my reward.
I need to look for tharrikers inside Fyrelight Cave and recover claws, fangs, feathers and eggshells from the creatures for study.
I gathered tharriker claws, fangs, feathers, and eggshells from Fyrelight Cave. Now to bring them to Commandant Salerius so the Legion can study them.
I should investigate the ruins of Nunungalo for any dangers, hazards, or structural problems the Legion should be aware of.
I investigated Nonungalo as requested and should deliver my findings to Commandant Salerius so I can claim my reward.
I need to enter Fort Colovia through the side passage so I can find the communique, the bell tower key, and the cohort payroll.
I need to search Fort Colovia to find the communique containing the proper chime sequence, the bell tower key, and the cohort payroll.

Now that I have the communique, the bell tower key, and the cohort payroll, I need to climb to the top of the bell tower and ring the chimes in the proper sequence to alert the rest of the Imperial Legion.
Now that I'm inside the bell tower, I need to climb to the top and ring the bell in the proper sequence to alert the Legion.
Legionary Calvo volunteered to stay behind and keep ringing the bell until Legion reinforcements arrive. I should exit Fort Colovia and report back to Captain Dromius Terrus.
I should tell Captain Dromius Terrus about what happened inside Fort Colovia and turn over the cohort payroll I recovered.
Leramil opened a portal to Apocrypha. I should enter the portal and travel to the realm of Hermaeus Mora.
Now that we're in Apocrypha, I should use the Skein of Secrets and see if I can pick up Ithelia's trail.
The Skein of Secrets revealed a path. I should follow it and see where it leads.
The Skein of Secrets led us to a hidden passage. I should see what awaits us deeper inside.
At the end of the hidden passage, Hermaeus Mora spoke to me and opened a portal into the Mythos. I should enter the portal and continue to search for Ithelia.
I found <<1>> tending to a few townsfolk at the entrance to Leftwheal. I should speak with her about what has caused this destruction.
I defeated Stri the Fate-Eater and recovered the equipment of the fallen egionaries. I should return them to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I need to find and defeat Stri the Fate-Eater and recover any Legion equipment left behind by the legionaries who were last sent on this mission.
I defeated Fang and Talon and destroyed the training supplies at the Goblin camp. I should report my success to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I need to head northwest of Skingrad to Centurion's Rise and find the Goblin camp. Once there, I need to slay the guard tharrikers, Fang and Talon, then destroy the training supplies.
I defeated Hessedaz the Baleful and recharged the sentry spheres. I should report back to <<1>>.
I need to find and defeat Hessedaz the Baleful at Fortune's Bluff and recharge the rune-covered sentry spheres protecting the area.
I defeated the Recollection leaders and retrieved some Recollection communiques. I should return to <<1>> and claim my reward.
I need to locate the Recollection camp and defeat their leaders meeting there. I should also retrieve any information I find at the site.
I defeated Oakenclaw and put up the warning bulletins. Now I should report back to <<1>> and collect my reward.
I need to find and defeat Oakenclaw and place warning bulletins in the area.
I met Leramil and Gadayn at Holamayan Monastery, but the place appears to be sealed tight.
The memory revealed by the Echonir showed the ancient priests meeting by the shore of the sea. I should see where the trail leads.
Innkeeper Brynmir seems excited to try out his personal drink making machine. I should follow his instructions carefully to prepare the perfect Sage's Dream.

The influence of Ithelia, Daedric Prince of Paths, appears to be causing strange disturbances throughout West Weald. Leramil pinpointed three specific sites I should investigate: Ostumir, Rustwall, and Elenglynn.
Leramil told me to rendezvous at Beragon's townhouse in Skingrad to share information with the retired adventurer turned scribe.
I should find Leramil the Wise in the city of Skingrad and talk to her.
We made our way to the Mythos, the most ancient section of Apocrypha. Now we need to make our way to Hermaeus Mora's private sanctum and aid him against Ithelia's assault.
In following Ithelia's trail, I came across the residual energy of a memory. I should use the Echonir to reveal it.
The Skein indicates that the Mirrormoor wards are somewhere hidden in the levels above the entrance to the private sanctum. I need to find them and destroy them.
With the wards destroyed, I should now be able to enter Hermaeus Mora's private sanctum.
Toutis is ready to show me how to use the Aetherial alarum. I should speak to him.
Toutis said I should use the Aetherial Alarum near the Aetherial shard, then pay attention to the surrounding pylons to identify a pattern.
Toutis is going to show me how to retrieve Aetherial shards using the Aetherial alarum. I should find a shard for his demonstration.
I should look for Amuarel before I leave Fyrelight Cave, to see if she has anything she wants me to relay to Grander.
Now that we made it into Hermaeus Mora's private sanctum, we need to find Ithelia.
Ithelia and Torvesard have incapacitated Hermaeus Mora. I need to find a way to stop Ithelia before it's too late to preserve reality.
After a grueling battle, I weakened Ithelia enough to create an opening. Now I need to use the Mirror of Truth and show her how the power of the Loom has corrupted her.
The Mirror of Truth granted Ithelia a moment of clarity, a chance to reflect on her actions. I should speak with her and convince her to stand down before reality becomes too damaged to restore.
I convinced Ithelia to stand down and give up her powers to Hermaeus Mora. I should observe her and Torvesard as she surrenders to the Prince of Forbidden Knowledge.
Torvesard has taken the power of both Hermaeus Mora and Ithelia for himself. I need to defeat him before he gains full control of all that power and becomes unstoppable.
Hermaeus Mora wants us to enter the portal and go to Ithelia's prison so we can finally put the dilemma of the Forgotten Prince to rest once and for all.

Ithelia indicates that her prison is only a temporary solution. She is a Daedric Prince, and her power will always find a way to restore her. I should talk to her and see if we can find a different solution.
I need to talk to Hermaeus Mora and see what he thinks of Ithelia's solution.
We exiled Ithelia and ended her threat to our reality. Now I should use the portal and rendezvous with my allies in Beragon's townhouse.
The treasure <<1>> brought me may belong to Weatherleah Estate's missing fortune. I should follow him to see where it was found.
Bazrag and I found the Oathsworn Vault blown open and ransacked. It seems odd that the Recollection would take the time to do this. I should look into what they were after.
Bazrag said he wanted to stay behind to look for the Staff of Many Paths. He told me to keep looking for Dulzush Forgefire.
Maerenah wants us to start at Tham's Tavern, inside the town of Sutch.
Maerenah asked me to search Tham's Tavern. We're looking for survivors or for any messages that Tham may have left for her to find.
Maerenah and I found a note from Tham, a tattered cloak, and a bloodied sword. I should talk to her and see if she has an idea about what happened here.
Maerenah's friend Tham left a note pointing to possible survivors hiding from vampires in the town's bank vault. We should head there and see what we can find.
Maerenah and I found survivors inside the bank vault. I should speak to Rosalyn, one of the survivors, to find out more.
Now that I have the key, I should open the bank vault and see what's waiting inside.
Maerenah wants to follow Grivier's trail and see if he can point us to where Balandrus, the Terror of the Weald, is hiding.
Maerenah and I followed Grivier's trail, but all we found were some dead bloodfiends and a scrap of paper. I should examine the paper and see if it's pertinent.
Maerenah and I learned that Grivier made a deal with the Terror of the Weald to betray the townsfolk to save his own family. I should talk to Maerenah and see how she wants to proceed.
Maerenah and I need to go to the stables to find Grivier and see if he's still alive.
Maerenah and I found Grivier bound in the stables. I should speak to him.
Grivier thinks that Balandrus, the Terror of the Weald, is gathering an army in the mine and stockpiling weapons around town. I should talk to Maerenah about how she wants to proceed.
In addition to killing Balandrus, Maerenah thinks we should destroy his stockpile of weapons. To do that, we need to find something explosive in Rosalyn's alchemy shop.
Maerenah wants me to grab alchemical oil and combustion canisters from the alchemy shop. We can combine those to create a simple explosive to destroy the Terror's weapon stockpiles.
We need to locate and destroy the weapon stockpiles that the vampire gang have placed around the town.
Maerenah says it's time to enter the mine on the east side of town and find Balandrus, the Terror of the Weald.
Maerenah suggests we destroy the bloodfiend dens where Balandrus is assembling his army before we deal with the Terror himself.
We found Balandrus and his lieutenants. It's time to put an end to their attack on Sutch.
We defeated Balandrus, the Terror of the Weald. Maerenah saw her friend Tham flee before the battle. We should head outside and try to find him.

I need to enter Nonungalo to stop the necrotic ritual by removing the ritual items from the ruins and burning the bodies fueling the spell. The dead necromancer outside the ruins left behind a journal which may hold some clues.
Inside Nonungalo, I need to burn the bodies fueling the spell and gather the ritual items. This will stop the undead necromancers.
I halted the ritual by gathering the ritual items and burning the corrupted corpses. Priest Faric asked me to meet him outside the ruins.
The Blind summoned a Mind Terror who has been controlling everyone I've fought in the Hall of Barons. The Darkshard won't stop sending enemies after me until it's dead.
The Blind and her Blind Path cultists are still making good headway through Bedlam Veil. It sounds like she's getting closer to her goal. I'll have to hurry if I want to stop her.
I should speak to Fa-Nuit-Hen.
I found the Blind just before she was able to retrieve the Echonir. Killing her will stop her and the Blind Path from getting what they came here for.
I should follow the Blind Path through Bedlam Veil. Maybe then I can reach the Blind.
The Blind is somewhere ahead, but she left a Shattered Champion in my path. I can't keep chasing the Blind until the Shattered Champion is dead.
The Blind is somewhere in the Hall of Barons. I should make my way through it and find her.
I should talk to Fa-Nuit-Hen and see what's happening in their realm.
I need to complete Bedlam Veil.
I defeated foes in Bedlam Veil.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
<<1>> presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting The Blind.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Beragon wants me to use the Skein of Secrets so I can see the locations where he thinks King Nantharion has been using the Staff of Many Paths.
Legionary Caepio told me Beragon wants to speak with me about King Nantharion's threat to West Weald. I should go to Beragon's townhouse in Skingrad and talk to him.
The Skein of Secrets revealed two locations. I should talk to Beragon about how to proceed.
I should investigate the locations revealed by the Skein of Secrets and report back to Beragon about what I discover.
The Skein of Secrets revealed a new site where the Staff of Many Paths has been used. Beragon wants me to meet him there.
I should explore the dungeons beneath the old fort. There may be another wildburn seed here.
King Nantharion isn't here, but I found more wildburn seedsâ€”and an Echonir memory. I should destroy the seeds and observe the memory.
Beragon wants to talk to me about the Echonir memory we observed beneath Fort Dirich.
Beragon told me he recognized the name Ithelia and Nantharion mentioned: Miscarcand. However, the ancient city has been lost for ages. I should use the Skein of Secrets to locate our foes.
Beragon wants to start by visiting the Wood Elf town of Vashabar. He hopes to consult with a greenspeaker there about the wildburn seed we found in Ostumir.
Beragon suggested we show the wildburn seed to Greenspeaker Darolith in Vashabar. I should find her and show her the seed.
Beragon wants to warn King Nantharion that some of his followers might be connected to the Recollection before we head out to investigate the cart Greensinger Darolith told us about.
Beragon and I reached King Nantharion. Beragon wants me to warn him about the Recollection. I should talk to him.
I should look for the covered cart east of Leftwheal that Greenspeaker Darolith told me about. If it contains more wildburn seeds, we need to destroy them.
I found another wildburn seed. This one looks charged and ready to sprout. I need to destroy it before that happens.

I destroyed the wildburn seed, but it's obvious these Recollection forces were expecting us. If a Recollection spy is working in Vashabar, King Nantharion is in danger. I should talk to Beragon about our next move.
I found Beragon near Hoperoot. He told me that the gate sentries were hostile to him and Tribune Alea, but the tribune has a plan to get inside. She's waiting for me near the gate.
Tribune Alea called to me. I should go meet her.
Tribune Alea distracted the sentries. Now's my chance to slip into Hoperoot undetected.
Beragon thinks King Nantharion is likely on one of the tree-fort's upper platforms. I need to find a way up and look for the king.
Recollection fighters in King Nantharion's new settlement can't be good. I need to reach the king.
Tribune Alea wants to talk to me about the Echonir memory we just observed. I should speak to her.
I need to continue my search for King Nantharion. He must be somewhere higher in the tree-fortress.
We found King Nantharion talking to Greenspeaker Sorilen. They don't realize we're here. I should listen in on their conversation.
King Nantharion is the leader of the Recollection! He's heading to the throne room with Greenspeaker Sorilen to prepare a new wildburn seed. I need to stop him.
King Nantharion ordered Greenspeaker Sorilen to prevent me from interfering in his wildburn seed ritual. I need to defeat her.
I fought my way past Greenspeaker Sorilen. Now I need to destroy the seed before King Nantharion completes his ritual.
Stopping the ritual unleashed a wildburn eruption right here in Hoperoot. I need to escape!
We narrowly escaped from Hoperoot before the wildburn destroyed it. Beragon wants to speak with me before we leave. I should talk to him.
We learned a lot about the Recollection at Hoperoot. We should return to Beragon's townhouse in Skingrad to regroup and plan our next move.
I should talk to Beragon about what we learned at Hoperoot so we can plan our next move.

Scruut brought me a plan from Hermaeus Mora to use the Daedric relics created to defeat Ithelia to heal the tears her presence caused in the fabric of reality. I need to take the relics to West Weald, the Telvanni Peninsula, and Apocrypha.
The Daedric relics were placed and the spell was cast. The reality tears have been repaired and existence has been preserved. I should now return to Beragon's townhouse and check in with Leramil.
I returned to Beragon's townhouse and was greeted by Tribune Alea. She says I need to go out on the balcony and talk to Beragon about some urgent matter.
Scruut tells me that Hermaeus Mora wants to talk to me one final time. I should step through the portal she opened.
Hermaeus Mora finished with Leramil and sent her away. I should talk to him now.
I concluded my dealings with Hermaeus Mora. Ithelia is now truly a Forgotten Prince once more. I should return to Beragon's celebration.
Beragon believes King Nantharion and Ithelia have discovered the Ayleid ruin of Miscarcand buried beneath Vashabar. We need to get to Vashabar now.
I met Beragon and a wounded legionary outside the door to an Ayleid ruin. I should talk to Beragon about what happened here.
It appears that Ithelia and King Nantharion opened a long-lost door to Miscarcand. I need to follow them inside and stop them from awakening the ancient city's Ayleid well.
Beragon and I entered the lost city of Miscarcand. We need to catch up with Tribune Alea and find King Nantharion or the Ayleid well he's looking for.
We caught up to Tribune Alea in Miscarcand. I should talk to her.
The passage ahead is blocked by rubble. I should try to use Abolisher to create a portal.
I used Abolisher to open a portal past the blocked passage. I should go on through.
We need to continue searching Miscarcand for King Nantharion or the ruined city's Ayleid well.
I found a lingering memory within Miscarcand. I should use the Echonir to see what it reveals.
Shardmarshal Vargas appeared while I was observing the memory and trapped me inside! I need to find a way out.
I found a portal that might lead me out of this memory, but it's closed. Maybe I can use Abolisher to open it again?
I used Abolisher to open a new portal. That's my way out of this ancient memory.
I escaped the memory Shardmarshal Vargas tried to trap me in. I need to continue the search for King Nantharion.
I discovered another lingering memory within Miscarcand. I should use the Echonir to observe it.
We heard Beragon calling, but there's a locked gate and a rubble-filled passage between us. I should open a portal with Abolisher.
We reached the Well of Miscarcand. King Nantharion is filling the Staff of Many Paths with energy the well. I need to stop him before he fills the staff and unleashes a massive wildburn.

I defeated King Nantharion, but Shardmarshal Vargas used the power in the staff to fully restore Ithelia's power. I should return to Beragon's townhouse in Skingrad and discuss the implications with my allies.
Leramil the Wise appeared in Beragon's townhouse. She wants to speak with me.
Leramil told me she believes the Recollection is searching Niryastare for a relic created by the Daedric Prince Mephala. Beragon and I must retrieve it before they do. I should meet him at the ruins.
I arrived at Niryastare. I should locate Beragon and speak with him.
Beragon suggested scouting the area around Niryastare to find the best way into the ruins.
Beragon and I found more than one way into the stockade surrounding Niryastare. I should talk to him about which entrance he thinks we should use.
Beragon believes we'll find stairs down to Niryastare's vaults in the middle of the stockade. Or we could try another way to get in.
We entered Niryastare's subterranean halls. The Skein of Secrets is hidden somewhere in here. I should keep exploring.
We discovered a vault door protected by a darkened crystalâ€”a great welkynd stone. I should speak with Beragon about how we get past the door.
Beragon believes the long-dead great welkynd stone can be restored using lesser stones. We should look around for crystals that fit in the sockets of the Ayleid apparatus.
There seems to be a strange glow in the air. Beragon thinks the Lamp of Clarity might reveal something here.
I returned to Beragon's townhouse. I should talk to him about what I learned at Hastrel Hollow and Terthil Farm.
The Skein of Secrets now shows a new locationâ€”Vashabar! I should talk to Beragon about this development.
I used the Lamp of Clarity to reveal a lesser welkynd stone. I should return to the darkened great welkynd stone and see if it fits into one of the sockets.
The lesser stone restored a glimmer of light to the great welkynd stone. I should locate and retrieve the three remaining lesser stones.
