I decided to tell Captain Dartorius that Legionary Ulrath survived and was leaving the Legion. I should give his report to the captain and collect my pay.

Zerith killed Moon-Singer Talbira because he was afraid to lose Ravith. This secret guilt has not only endangered Cantor Krin'ze, it threatens the entire Khajiiti afterlife. I should talk to Zerith about how we fix this.
The Gryphon's power has amplified the altar, and another Wing of the Scholarium has been restored. I should speak with Votary Nahlia.
That's strange, the Fable of the Gryphon is missing its pages. As I picked it up, Votary Llaren and Julian approached me. Perhaps they know something about this.
Llaren mentioned an incident where the Fable of the Gryphon was vandalized. Votary Nahlia is trying to follow up with notes Ulfsild left behind. I should seek her out in the east wing.
Nahlia found an echo that might shed light on how to proceed with entering the Wing of the Gryphon. It's just nearby.
Nahlia saw a fox running about the Scholarium with pages in its mouth. It dropped one when she confronted it. I should read the fable page she recovered from the fox.

I have one page of the Fable of the Gryphon. Thankfully, its annotations tell me exactly where I'm meant to go to find the first set of wards. I can use the fable page in my pack as a guide for where to go.
I'd just gathered the first fragment of the Gryphon's key when a strange fox appeared and spoke. I should see what the talking fox wants.
With the first key fragment collected, I continue my journey for more Gryphon wards. I should use the fable as a reference to see where to search next.
The wards are dispelled and the second key fragment has been revealed.
With the second key fragment collected, I continue my journey for more Gryphon wards. I should use the fable as a reference to see where to search next.
The wards are dispelled and the third key fragment has been revealed.
I collected the fragments and formed the key to the Gryphon's door. To enter the Wing of the Gryphon, I should make for the final location indicated in Ulfsild's annotations.
I've opened the doorway into the Wing of the Gryphon, where I've found the Luminary itself apparently frozen. I should speak to the Fox to learn what happened here.
The Gryphon has asked that I place the Fable on a dais near a door. This will connect the path from his wing back to the Scholarium once more.
The Wing of the Gryphon is connected back to the Scholarium. I should speak to the Gryphon again to learn what comes next.
The Gryphon wants me to complete a few safeguard challenges to prove my commitment. I should review the challenges he's set out.

To prove my worth, the Gryphon has presented me a number of safeguard challenges. I need to complete three from the list. I can decide which tasks I wish to take on to prove myself worthy of the Luminary's power.
I've completed the safeguards set out by the Gryphon. Time to return to the Luminary and see what comes next.
I opened the Wing of the Gryphon and amplified the Scribing Altar with the power of the Gryphon. I should speak to Nahlia.

The Gryphon wants to protect the Scholarium by enacting a ritual he and Ulfsild designed before the library was taken. The Fox has apparently come up with a plan to gather the magic we need to see this task done.
The Fox and I have made off with creatia from three Daedric Princes. I should talk to the Gryphon and pass him my ill-gotten gains.
It sounds like the Gryphon resented the loss of the Scholarium. I should talk to Nahlia to get some more context and see what our next move might be.

The Fox and I are supposed to steal powerful magic called creatia from three Daedric Princes. I should seek out the Fox at Dawnbreak in Auridon, Rootwater Grove in Greenshade, and Faldar's Tooth in the Rift.
Torvesard appeared and wants to speak with me. I should see what he has to say.
Torvesard appeared and wants to speak with me. I should see what he has to say.
Torvesard appeared and wants to speak with me. I should see what he has to say.
I should ask Leramil the Wise what she knows about what the Skein of Secrets revealed to us.
Zerith wants to ask Cantor Krin'ze if she knows anything about High Cantor Viti's intentions in contacting us. We're set to meet her near Dune in Reaper's March.
Zerith wants to ask Cantor Krin'ze if she knows anything about High Cantor Viti's intentions in contacting us. We found her near Dune in Reaper's March. I should speak to her.

Cantor Krin'ze isn't sure about High Cantor Viti's motivations in contacting us. She suggested asking around the town of Pa'alat for more information on Viti as well as the possibility of an Inquisitor presence nearby.

Cantor Krin'ze isn't sure about High Cantor Viti's motivations in contacting us. She suggested we ask around the town of Pa'alat to see what they know about Viti or the possibility of an Inquisitor presence nearby.

Zerith and I asked around Pa'alat and discovered that the Inquisitors seek High Cantor Viti in order to blame the Twilight Cantors for the spread of the Rajaska. We should head to her camp southwest of Pa'alat and see what more we can learn.
Zerith and I found places to hide to witness the exchange between High Cantor Viti and the Grand Inquisitor. I should eavesdrop on their conversation to learn more about this situation.
I should search for the bear cub, starting at the site of the attack.
I rescued Burnbiscuit the bear cub. Now to reunite him with Count Calantius.
I should investigate the wreckage.
To completely destroy Lord Gallio Valente's ability to make more Vesper Valente, we need to set fire to the mushroom planters and burn the mushrooms to cinders.
I should speak with Legionary Luther about what I found
Legionary Luther gave me treats for Burnbiscuit. I should follow the trail of apples to find him.
It seems High Cantor Viti knew we were listening. We should emerge from our hiding spots and talk to her.
High Cantor Viti wants to see Zerith's powers of redemption. In exchange, she's offered information on the location of Ravith-morna I should talk to Zerith to see what he thinks about this.

Zerith and I have helped show High Cantor Viti that the Hidden Moon can redeem the souls of fallen Khajiit and clear their paths to Azurah's Crossing. I should talk to High Cantor Viti about the information she promised us.
Zerith seems amenable to High Cantor Viti's request to demonstrate his power in Orcrest. I should travel with him to Orcrest in Northern Elsweyr.
High Cantor Viti says our destination is a cellar under the town hall in the upper section of Orcrest. I should fight my way through the town with Zerith and find the cellar.
Zerith and I defeated Grand Inquisitor Arsalan. We can now proceed with calling forth the spirit of High Cantor Viti's sister, Eifa.
Grand Inquisitor Arsalan ambushed us in Orcrest! It doesn't look like we can reason with him. I should help Zerith fight him off.
Zerith wants to speak before we enter the hidden shrine in Predator Mesa.
I should search Predator Mesa with Zerith to find the hidden lair of the Rajaska.
We discovered the lair of the Rajaska. I should fight alongside Zerith to stop their ritual and defeat Ravith-morna.
Zerith and I stopped Ravith-morna's ritual and captured her with Cantor Krin'ze's help. I should work with Zerith to confront Ravith-morna.
Ravith-morna escaped after revealing to Krin'ze that Zerith killed Moon-Singer Talbira. I should leave this place with Zerith. We have much to talk about it seems.
Belienne asked me to look for the facet of her despair near a river south of Skingrad.
Belienne's final facet turned a woman into a pig. I should speak with Belienne to help her decide what to do now.
I should listen to what Ulfsild's echo has to say about the Gryphon and their wing.
I found Belienne's despair sitting by the river. I should speak with her.
Belienne's despair asked me to bring her some flowers to try to lift her spirits. She saw some growing by the river.
I gathered the river flowers. I should deliver them to Belienne's despair.
The flowers gave Belienne's despair enough motivation to return to her primary self. I should speak with Belienne and learn what other facets are still missing.
I should feed the bear cub the treats.
Leramil needs a moment to process what happened to Curate Gadayn. Meanwhile, I should give the fragment to Scruut and discuss our next steps.
I should return with the bear cub to Legionary Luther.
The wards are dispelled and the first key fragment has been revealed.
The Fox gave me the next page of the Gryphon's fable. I should read it to continue my journey.
Belienne became overwhelmed with despair after merging with her facet. She asked me to search for her delight in Stonechip Tavern in Ontus.
I discovered Belienne's delight drinking in Stonechip Tavern. I should speak with her.
I should drink with Belienne's delight to see if I can convince her to return to Belienne.
Belienne's delight and I passed out after drinking the West Weald Wallop. Belienne reclaimed her delight while we were unconscious. I should speak with her to see what she wants me to do next.
Belienne thinks the facet of her fear is hiding somewhere. She suggested I look for her fear in a ruin or cave to the southwest of Ontus.
Belienne's fear is terrified of me. She ran deeper into the ruins. I should follow her to make sure she doesn't get hurt.
Belienne's fear is trapped in a spiderweb. I should rescue her.
I calmed Belienne's fear and convinced her to return. I should speak with Belienne and learn which facet is still missing.

Belienne thinks her final facet is her vanity. It's somewhere in Dawnwood, and Belienne is worried it may cause trouble for the Wood Elves. I should meet her in Vashabar to capture the facet of her vanity.
I found Belienne being accused of a crime she didn't commit. I should speak with her to learn more about the situation.
Belienne asked me to speak with her facet to understand what happened.
Belienne's final facet turned a woman into a pig. I should speak with Belienne to help her decide what to do now.
I gathered the second fragment of the Gryphon's key, and the Fox appeared again. I should see what it wants.
The Fox dropped a page from the Fable of the Gryphon by a "large cat" near the canal in Riften. I should find it and claim it.
Scruut suggested I gather the Daedric relics from Beragon's townhouse. Even though they have been depleted of energy, she says Hermaeus Mora has foreseen that I will need them.
Hyacinth and Snapdragon are nowhere to be found, but there's definitely signs of a struggle. I should talk to Tanlorin to see what they want to do.
I gathered the third fragment of the Gryphon's key, and the Fox appeared again. I should see what it wants.
The Fox gave me the final page of the Gryphon's fable. I should read it to learn the location of the Gryphon's door.
The Gryphon was frozen by Ulfsild before the Scholarium was lost. If I'm going to speak to the Luminary I'll have to free him from this magic by dispelling Ulfsild's ward.
The Gryphon has been freed. I should speak to him about earning his favor and advancing my studies of Scribing.
I should talk to Legionary Luther about the cub.
The injured Ceythalmor agent said we might find a clue as to where Hyacinth went in their captain's quarters. We should search it for any pertinent information.
Tribune Alea and I followed Legionary Caepio's route to escape the caverns underneath Rustwall. I should speak to Tribune Alea and learn what she thinks of our adventure.
I helped Tribune Alea discover the fate of her missing cohort and stop a planned invasion of Skingrad. I should talk to Tribune Alea and make sure the threat here has been contained.
Ithelia has entered the portal and walked the Many Paths to the reality of her exile. Now I should use Abolisher and destroy the portal, assuring she can never return to our reality.
Tanlorin believes that the etched disk I found is one of Hyacinth's devices. They said I should toss it in the fire to see if it will reveal any information.

I followed the voices of Beragon and Greenspeaker Sorilen until they led me out of the ruins. I exited to find Beragon standing alone. I should talk to him about his friend and the wildburn seed I gathered.
I've placed the key and restored the Altar of Scribing to its full potential. I should speak to Nahlia one last time.
There's an echo from Ulfsild near the entrance to the Wing of the Crow. The Crow wants me to listen to Ulfsild's message before we begin.
Ulfsild's echo mentioned I could enter the final trial with allies. As I finished listening, Nahlia approached. I should talk to her, and ask her to join me.
I spoke to the two family friends, and one of them suggested I find and speak with <<1>> for another perspective. He's near the center of town.
Nahlia has agreed to accompany me into the Wing of the Crow. It's time to head inside.
The first chamber in the Wing of the Crow is a strange space filled with magic and littered with echoes left behind by Ulsfild. I should listen to them to see what they have to say.
I listened to the three echoes left behind by Ulfsild. I should speak with Nahlia about what I heard.
The echoes appear to be pointing at a book. Yet another riddle? I should read the book and decipher its puzzle to proceed.
A door appeared after solving Ulfsild's echo puzzle. I should proceed inside to continue the trial.
The Crow was waiting for me beyond the door. I should talk to her to see what comes next.
The Crow told us that to move forward I'll need to solve a puzzle. I should talk to Nahlia, who loves puzzles, about how to proceed.
The Riddle of Luminary Flames will require me to set all the braziers ablaze by carefully choosing which ones to light. I can refer to the riddle for hints
Nahlia and I solved the Riddle of Luminary Fires. We should continue through the gate to see what comes next.
Nahlia and I came across a chasm looking down into the Labyrinthian maze, but no way down or across. The Fox appeared, offering his aid. I should speak to him.
The Fox is going to guide us over the chasm. I'll need to use focal points to break any wards I find so he can sniff out the way forward.
We made it across the invisible pathway with the help of the Fox. We should continue on to see what comes next.
We made it through the maze and arrived to find the Crow. I should speak with her.
The Crow asked for a demonstration of our power. I should defeat Aut'arioth, Inheritor's Bane to showcase what I've learned in restoring the altar.
I defeated Aut'arioth, Inheritor's Bane. I should speak to the Crow.
The Crow revealed her original form to me and Nahlia. I should speak to her.
At the townhouse, I met with my allies and spoke to the leaders of Skingrad and Vashabar. Now I should talk to Beragon about all we accomplished in West Weald.
Now that the relics have been stored safely, I should talk to Beragon.
Zerith and I reached Khenarthi's Rise. Zerith senses Cantor Krin'ze nearby. We should search for her and find out what she's doing here.
I should talk to Zerith-var.
The spirit of Moon-Singer Talbira appeared and instructed us to repair and restore Khenarthi's Rise. I should speak to Zerith about how we go about such a task.
Zerith and I were instructed by the spirit of Moon-Singer Talbira to bring order to Khenarthi's Rise to reveal our path forward. I should search the ruins with Zerith and see what we can do.
Zerith and I did what we could to restore the training grounds of Khenarthi's Rise. We should return to Cantor Krin'ze and see if we can talk to her now.

Cantor Krin'ze had a revelation about Zerith's tie to Ravith-morna while she communed with the spirits in Khenarthi's Rise. I should speak to him about her notion that he has to apply Azurah's lesson of forgiveness to himself.
Zerith opened a portal to where Azurah directed him to find Ravith-morna. I should enter the portal with Zerith and Cantor Krin'ze and go to Star Haven Adeptorium.

We arrived to Star Haven Adeptorium, but the Inquisitors made it here before us. It doesn't seem like they fared well against Ravith's Chorus, but Cantor Krin'ze seems particularly upset. I should talk to her before we rush in.
Cantor Krin'ze suspects the Inquisitors brought the Twilight Cantors to Star Haven Adeptorium and now they're in trouble. I should work with Zerith to search for them.
Zerith-var, Cantor Krin'ze, and I are ready to enter the portal to the Great Darkness, where Ravith-morna works to awaken her moon beast.
Zerith-var, Cantor Krin'ze and I entered the portal to the Great Darkness. Now we need to find our way to Ravith-morna.
We found Ravith-morna. I need to work with Zerith and Cantor Krin'ze to defeat her.
Zerith and I banished the moon beast. I should listen while Zerith converses with Ravith, her spirit purified.
I should enter the portal back to Nirn with Zerith and Cantor Krin'ze.
Zerith seems to have fulfilled Azurah's purpose in sending him to this day and age. I should speak to him about what comes next.
We appear to be trapped in Ithelia's ancient prison. I found an anomaly in the mirrored walls. Leramil suggests I use the Lamp of Clarity to reveal what is hidden here.
The Lamp revealed a path through the walls. I should follow it and find a way to escape the prison.
Beragon was trapped in an alternate reality of the Many Paths. He thinks we need to continue exploring this maze of mirrors to find a way out.
The final key to the altar is with Ulfsild at her final resting place. I should enter the portal that Nahlia made.
I should take the key to the Scholarium to use at the Scribing altar.
Nahlia and I witnessed Ulfsild's final message and retrieved the final key to the altar. I should speak to Nahlia.
Nahlia made a portal for us to return to the Scholarium. I should return to the Altar of Scribing and place the key to unlock the altar's full potential.
I've placed the key and restored the Altar of Scribing to its full potential. I should speak to Nahlia about what comes next.
I found Tribune Alea trapped just beyond a mirror like Beragon was. I should use the Lamp of Clarity to lead her back to our reality.
We found the passage to Khenarthi's Rise. Now to head to the ruins.
Solving her puzzle revealed a focal point in my trial. I should use it and break any wards I see, that might allow me to move forward.
Leramil and I arrived in Apocrypha. She wants to talk to Hermaeus Mora first. I should listen to their exchange.
Leramil wants to speak to me before we head out. I should talk to her.
During our search, a legionary quietly got our attention from behind a grate. I should talk to the legionary and see what information he can provide.
Hooke said he has a plan to to save Valenia from Marcan's grasp. I should speak with him.
Hooke was able to save Valenia while I distracted Marcan Caelum, but Valenia was seriously injured. I should speak with Hooke.
Valenia died at Marcan Caelum's hands before we could save her, but the rest of the Scarlets survived. I should speak with Hooke.
I need to meet Tribune Alea at Beragon's townhouse in Skingrad and talk to Beragon.
I found the couple in an overgrown ruin. I should tell them the good news about the Rite of Propagation.
I rescued Belienne's fear from the spiderweb, earning her trust. I should talk to her.
We enetered the Sutch Depository. We should look around for survivors.
According to the fable, our search for the Indrik starts in Auridon. I should meet the Crow at the standing stone of the Lady.

Greenspeaker Darolith explained that the wildburn seed is a corrupted greenspring seed. She sensed strange energy within the seed, possibly Daedric in origin. I should talk to Beragon about what we just learned.
Belienne's delight asked me to acquire a cask of West Weald Wallop.
I acquired a cask of West Weald Wallop. I should pour a round for myself and Belienne's delight.
I should go and meet Tanlorin outside Toothmaul Gully.
I have the map that Groundskeeper Gaius drew to lead us to the location of the catacombs key. It points to a statue in the nearby gardens. I should find the gardens and look for the statue.
Scruut wants me to return to Beragon's townhouse in Skingrad and consult with Leramil on our next steps to stop Ithelia and preserve reality.
Innkeeper Brynmir was waiting for me in the inn's cellar. I should give him the ingredients I gathered so he can prepare the Sage's Dream.
As a show of favor, the Indrik has given me its sigil, a representation of its re-commitment to the Scholarium. I need to gather the sigil if I'm to learn more about Scribing.
With the Indrik's sigil in hand I should return to the Scribing Altar. Infusing the altar with the power of the Indrik will enhance my connection with scripts and grimoires around the world.
I should talk to Beragon and give him the wildburn seed I recovered from the ruins.
Now that I made our report to Commander Merian, I should talk to Tribune Alea.
I should talk to Tribune Alea and figure out what to do with the sword we acquired, Abolisher.
I gathered the wildburn seed. Now I should follow after Beragon and catch up with him.
I should talk to Fennorian and make sure we accomplished everything we set out to do at the Valente Vineyards and Winery.
I returned to Skingrad. Beragon wants to have a word with me. I should speak to him.
Nahlia came up to me as I was listening to the Ulfsild's Hidden Echo. She wants to speak with me.
I found Ulfsild's notes at Dov-Vahl Shrine. I should share what I found with Nahlia.

We recovered a fragment of the titan, but Trovesard appeared and used a reality tear to attack me. Curate Gadayn saved me, but was consumed by the tear. I need to take the fragment back to Beragon's townhouse and let Leramil know what happened.
I found a letter on a dead Ceythalmor agent. I should speak with Tanlorin and see what they think.
The Dragon deemed my riddle worthy, and agreed I had completed her trial! I need to claim her sigil as reward.
With the Dragon's sigil in hand I should return to the Scribing Altar. Infusing the altar with the power of the Dragon will enhance my connection with scripts and grimoires around the world.
I informed Leramil that the threat hanging over the inn came from Ithelia herself. However, it's now over. I should hand her the Lamp of Clarity and find out about my reward.

Ithelia gained control of her powers thanks to the Sage's Dream. She dismissed the shadowy echoes and removed the tangle of fate from the inn. Then she disappeared. I should go tell Leramil what occurred here.
I discovered a location where Abolisher can be used. I should see if I can open a portal to get us out of here.
I found Tribune Alea Idolus trapped by enemies emerging from a portal. I need to find a way to close the portal.
Laeni and Clendagal enacted the rite, and the village gave them permission to wed. I should talk to Laeni to see how she's taking the news.
As a show of favor, the Netch has given me its sigil, a representation of its re-commitment to the Scholarium. I need to gather the sigil if I'm to learn more about Scribing.
With the Netch's sigil in hand I should return to the Scribing Altar. Infusing the altar with the power of the Netch will enhance my connection with scripts and grimoires around the world.
I defeated King Nantharion but Shieldmarshal Vargas took the Staff of Many Paths and used it to draw power from the well and give it to Ithelia. I should observe what happens next.
The Gryphon will make use of the stolen creatia to enact his ancient rite. I should watch the ritual unfold and then claim the sigil of the Luminary's power.
With the Gryphon's sigil in hand I should return to the Scribing Altar. Infusing the altar with the power of the Gryphon will enhance my connection with scripts and grimoires around the world.

Legionary Ulrath wrote a report on the events that led to the death of the soldiers under Captain Dartorius's command. He left it for someone to find, but asked me to take it back to the captain. I should look for it.
Pim said she knows what Jerntann is doing. I should talk to her.
Placing the lavender in the bowl revealed the entrance to the new Malabal Tor Greenhouse. We should enter the greenhouse.
I should seek out Constable Yabren in the graveyard outside the town of Ontus if I'm interested in the job.
We entered the Sutch Mine. We need to find and collapse the bloodfiend dens deeper inside.
Scruut has asked that I speak with her.
I found Ithelia waiting for me at her seat by the fire. I should give her the Sage's Dream so she can regain control of her powers and stop endangering the inn.
Maerenah suspects that another bloodfiend den can be found deeper inside the mine. We should find it and collapse it as well.
Now that we know where Snapdragon is, Tanlorin wants to reach out to Hyacinth. They think Hyacinth will know a way to safely get us to Sunhold.
Nahlia and a group from the Mages Guild has returned to the Scholarium. I should find her and see how her meeting with the Guild went.
I need to talk to <<1>> about my victory over Lord Hollowjack
I need to locate and rescue the three Haunted claimed by Lord Hollowjack.
The entrance to Khenarthi's Rise lies in Weeping Wind Cave in Reaper's March. I should search there with Zerith for an entrance to the ruins.
I should speak with <<1>>.
I rescued the three Haunted from Lord Hollowjack's clutches. Now I should return to <<1>>.
I need to talk to <<1>> about what I learned.
I need to face Lord Hollowjack in his realm of Detritus.
The memory shows Ithelia cornered by Hermaus Mora. I should observe what happens next.
Tribune Alea and I closed the Daedric portal while Legionary Caepio found us an exit. I should head outside and talk to Tribune Alea.
Snapdragon's secret message said she went to meet Hyacinth alone near the Bone Orchard, at an old Garland Ring meeting site. We should head to Grahtwood and try to catch up with them.
I should search the archive for a Marauder to kill.
I killed a Marauder. I should look for Esalinwe in the Index Chamber and let her know.
I need to enter the Archival Wings.
I should find Cantor Krin'ze in southern Reaper's March and learn more about her request.
I encountered a spirit cat along the trail to Moonmont, just like Cantor Krin'ze suggested. I should approach the cat and show it I mean no harm.
Somewhere within the passages of Crimson Cove, the Ceythalmor hold Hyacinth prisoner. We should search the cove for Tanlorin's captive friend.
We found the Ceythalmor base in Crimson Cove. Now to find Hyacinth.
It seems Wisteria is the traitor. We found her torturing Hyacinth for information. We need to defeat her Ceythalmor agents before we can save him.
I need to speak to Gandrinar to get a better understanding of what kind of help he wants from me for their book about the Ayleids and the Daedra.

Gandrinar tasked me with searching for five Ayleid remnants across West Weald. I need to combine them into a bundle once I find them before I can give him the remnants.\n\nRelics are more likely to be found in dangerous places or on deadly foes.
I assembled a bundle of Ayleid remnants for Gandrinar. I should return to him so that he can study them.
I should search the archival wings for Fabled to kill.
I killed the Fabled for Esalinwe. I should find her in the Index Chamber and let her know.
I need to enter the Archival Wings to find the Fabled.
Cantor Krin'ze spoke of a Rajaska turning her fellow Twilight Cantors into dro-m'Athra. I should proceed deeper inside Claw's Strike and confront this Rajaska with Zerith-var.
I broke the ice trap and freed the High Elf. I should talk to them and find out what's going on.
Tanlorin wants to update their friend Hyacinth about what happened to Wisteria and Oleander. I should meet Tanlorin at the Garland Ring greenhouse in Greenshade, near Serpent's Grotto.

Zerith-var seems confident that his Hidden Moon training can save the Twilight Cantors inside the Vile Manse. He asked for my help in saving them. I should search inside the Vile Manse for the lost Twilight Cantors.
We entered the Ceythalmor prison in Sunhold. We should look for any information about their operation here and where they're holding Snapdragon.
I should talk to Zerith-var about what we encountered beneath the Vile Manse.
I should search the area for a ring growing on an islet near the ruins of Belarata.
We found the tunnels beneath Southpoint. We should search them for any sign of the Ceythalmor or Hyacinth.
We encountered Wisteria at Hyacinth's greenhouse, but a magical barrier prevents us from attacking her. I should take this opportunity to speak to her and try to understand why she betrayed the Ring.
Prime Sorcerer Vandorallen isn't going to let us through and he isn't going to stop aiding Cato Albus. I can't leave him alive.

Cato Albus kidnaps and kills alliance soldiers to use the pain of their deaths to turn noble families against the alliances. I can't allow this plot to continue. I have to find Cato Albus and stop him for good.
I defeated the Atronach and Lucilla was able to catch up to Cato Albus. I should speak with her now.

Cato Albus summoned a powerful Atronach before retreating and placing a ward on the door behind him. Lucilla needs me to fight the Atronach while she works on breaking the spells keeping us from Cato Albus.
The entrance to the fortress lies ahead. There's no other way to find what the Albuses are up toâ€”and stop themâ€”than entering the Exiled Redoubt.
Cato Albus's executioner kills the prisoners to further the Albuses cause. I won't be able to leave this room without defeating Executioner Jerensi first.
Killing prisoners is a large portion of the Albus's plan, but I don't know why they're doing that. Lucilla thinks our answers lie deeper within the redoubt. We need to keep exploring to find them.
I shouldn't rush in to the Exiled Redoubt. Lucilla Caprenia knows more than I do. Talking to her is the best way I can find out exactly what's going on.
I need to complete Exiled Redoubt.
I defeated foes in Exiled Redoubt.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
<<1>> presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting <<2>>."
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Noriwen the Gryphon Tamer guards the main gate into the monastery. She needs to be defeated if we hope to stop Orpheon the Tactitian from getting his hands on the Elder Scroll.
Sister Chana Nirine and Khafdeed plan to flank Orpheon in the Scroll room. They're taking a hidden passageway there while I fight through the last of Orpheon's army in the upper monastery.
I defeated Orpheon the Tactician and kept the Elder Scroll out of his hands. I should speak with Sister Chana.
While Sister Chana Nirine and Khafdeed look after the scroll, I need to ensure Orpheon the Tactician is defeated so he can't retrieve the Elder Scroll.
Sister Chana said the fastest way to get to Orpheon would be to travel through the tunnels. She knows this area better than I do. I should follow her advice.
Garvin the Tracker stands between us and the rest of Lep Seclusa. I won't be able to advance farther until I defeat him.
More of Orpheon the Tactitian's army lies between us and the Elder Scroll. I have to fight through them to make it farther into the monastery.
Sister Chana Nirine is waiting for reinforcements in Lep Seclusa. She has more information on Orpheon the Tactician and his army.
I need to complete Lep Seclusa.
I defeated foes in Lep Seclusa.\n\nI should find Urgarlag Chief-bane in my alliance's capital city.
Urgarlag Chief-bane presented me with another challenge: plant the Undaunted Banner before fighting Orpheon the Tactician
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
Urgarlag Chief-bane is waiting to speak to me once again in my alliance capital.
We reached the greenhouse in Greenshade. Now to look around and see if Wisteria came here as Hyacinth suspected.

Tribune Alea Idolus expressed confusion over how the Daedra got inside. She also wondered about who leads this Daedric assault. I should join her search of the keep's barracks to find out how the enemy got in.
I should seek out Adept Irnard to learn more about this magical anomaly and the Votary's call for aid. He should be at the location marked on my map.
We reached Snapdragon's cottage in Firsthold. We should look for Snapdragon and the research she compiled regarding the Ceythalmor and her hunt for the traitor.
We arrived at Snapdragon's cottage only to find the smell of burnt paper lingering in the air. I should talk to Tanlorin.
There are burnt pages on the floor and the cottage has been ransacked. I should look to see if anything survived this apparent attempt to destroy Snapdragon's research.

Tanlorin can sense a connection between Snapdragon and this seemingly blank piece of paper. They think there's a message hidden on the page. I need to find flower petals and oil to make an ink wash, which should reveal the invisible message.
I gathered the necessary ingredients to create the ink wash. I should mix them together at the alchemy worktable.
I should use the ink wash on the blank sheet of paper and see what happens.
Success! The ink wash revealed a message from Snapdragon hidden on the blank paper. I should talk to Tanlorin about what it said.
Apparently nothing survived the attempt to destroy Snapdragon's research. There's no sign of Snapdragon, and all that remains is a blank piece of paper. I should talk to Tanlorin.
We found the remains of Moon-Singer Talbira. Zerith instructed me to examine her remains so he can invite her spirit to talk to us.

Snapdragon wants us to meet her and pick up her research on the traitor at a cottage in Firsthold. She thinks her research can help us identify the Garland Ring traitor. We should head to the cottage.
As I approached the cave, a man shouted out, apparently in some distress. I should see what happened, perhaps I can help.
I should make my way to Fyrelight Cave.
I can find my final challenger in the city of Skingrad, in West Weald. Alternatively, I could return to Kishka in Gonfalon Bay for a lesser prize.
Now we know Ravith-morna's plan and location. Zerith opened a portal to Predator Mesa, where she hides in a shrine to Namiira. I should enter the portal to pursue her.
We arrived at High Cantor Viti's camp, but Zerith senses someone else approaching. He suggested we find a place to hide.

We revealed our presence prematurely and the grand inquisitor fled before we could confront him. But it seems that High Cantor Viti knew we were eavesdropping and isn't pleased that we let the grand inquisitor see us. We should talk to her.
High Cantor Viti wants to witness Zerith's powers of redemption as practiced by the Order of the Hidden Moon. I should listen to their exchange on this matter.

The etched disk revealed that Hyacinth is a prisoner. If what we saw is to be believed, he's not the traitor. He was taken to meet the real traitor at Crimson Cove. I should talk to Tanlorin to see what they want to do.

Zerith and I reached the town hall cellar in Orcrest. We need to find a clear space where he can open a portal for High Cantor Viti and Cantor Krin'ze to join us. Then we can explore the cellar and find out what this is really all about.
High Cantor Viti led us to the inner cellar beneath the town hall in Orcrest. I should speak to her to find out why she brought us here.
High Cantor Viti just ran deeper into the cellar below Orcrest's town hall. We should follow her.
Zerith needs me to help him guide Eifa's soul back to her remains so he can invite her forward and direct her to Azurah's Crossing. I should help dispel the darkness that clouds her path.
Eifa, the spirit of High Cantor Viti's sister, says she needs to speak with me and Zerith. I should see what she wants.
Tanlorin received a letter from a bank clerk in Marbruk. Snapdragon apparently left a locked coffer behind in their name. We should go to the bank and see what's inside the coffer.
I should speak with the bank clerk about the letter Tanlorin received, and the coffer Snapdragon left to them.
The clerk gave us a key to Snapdragon's coffer. I should open it and see what she left for Tanlorin.

Snapdragon made a copy of her research journal, a thorough investigation into the Garland Ring's own members. Included are notes about places in Greenshade Wisteria frequented. I should talk to Tanlorin about this.
Zerith is ready to face Ravith-morna. We plan to bring in Cantor Krin'ze and High Cantor Viti only when the time is right. I should enter the shrine to Namiira in Predator Mesa.
Zerith and I found the shrine to Namiira hidden beneath Predator Mesa. Now we need to locate Ravith-morna.
Ravith-morna escaped after revealing to Krin'ze that Zerith killed Moon-Singer Talbira. I should talk to Zerith and find out why he didn't tell us about this.
I destroyed the Loom of the Untraveled Road. I should observe what Ithelia does next.
Lucilla and I made it into the Exiled Redoubt. Lucilla pointed out that the gate in the Entrance Hall was locked, so we need to find a different way around to find the Albus Family.
We found another bottle of Shimmerene Rose near the Labyrinth. We should see if Tanlorin can conjure a glimpse of another one of Wisteria's memories.
The memory Tanlorin manifested at Echo Pond revealed the Ceythalmor's true goalâ€”they plan to assassinate the Proxy Queen of Alinor. I should talk to Tanlorin.

Tanlorin believes that through their connection to Wisteria, they may be able to open a portal directly to her location at Dusk Keep. We should head to the Hyacinth's greenhouse. Tanlorin will need Hyacinth and the Gardener's help to do this.

The Gardener arrived, revealing that he is the Proxy Queen's uncle. He assured her that he can explain everything, but that first we must return to the Gardener's greenhouse. We can use his portal to get there.
We found Wisteria behind a magic barrier, preparing a ritual to teleport herself and her agents to the Alinor Royal Palace.
I need to find and destroy the second Mirrormoor ward to open the way to Hermaeus Mora's private sanctum.
The High Elf said if I break them out of the ice they'd be willing to pay me for helping them. I should smash the ice to earn my reward and find out more about what's going on here.
Zerith and I found Cantor Krin'ze in some sort of trance. I should see if I can learn more about what happened to her.
We defeated Torvesard. I should observe Ithelia and ensure she surrenders her powers to Hermaeus Mora as she agreed.

We need to find where Ravith-morna has fled to before she enacts her plan. I should pour the remaining moon-sugar water we found in Khenarthi's Rise into the ritual basin to assist Zerith in his efforts to find her.
I assisted Zerith with a ritual to help us find Ravith-morna. I should listen to where Azurah guides him.
Zerith and I found High Cantor Viti in Star Haven Adpetorium. I should speak to her and see if she can help us locate any other surviving Twilight Cantors.
High Cantor Viti told us there are other Twilight Cantors currently being threatened by Ravith's Chorus. Zerith and I need to save them.
Zerith and I saved the surviving Twilight Cantors from Ravith's Chorus. Zerith felt a pull from his moonclaw to the south side of Star Haven Adeptorium. We should search there for Ravith-morna.
Zerith and I saw a large tear open in the sky over Star Haven Adeptorium. I should ask him what this means.
Zerith says Ravith-morna has opened a tear in the planes in order to send her moon beast to Azurah's Crossing. We need to get closer and find Ravith-morna.
We defeated Ravith-morna, but were too late to stop the moon beast from being summoned. Together, Zerith and I can banish it. I need to help him.
We found notes that detail the interrogation of Snapdragon. They mention that she has been taken to a cell in the lower dungeon.
We found Hyacinth being interrogated by Ceythalmor agents. We need to save him from his captors.
Moon-Singer Talbira's spirit apparently now resides within Cantor Krin'ze. I should speak to Zerith about what this means for us.
I defeated the Atronach and Lucilla was able to catch up to Cato Albus. I should speak with her now.

After telling Skordo what happened and turning over Merric's sword and shield, I snapped Prince Azah out of his paralyzing depression. I should talk to him one more time before we go after the Worm Cult.
Prince Azah received conflicting reports about Merric's location. He wants me to choose a location to search, either Malabal Tor, Eastmarch, or the Alik'r Desert.
Guildmaster Merric's notes describe his investigation into the attacks on the Fighters Guild. Apparently, he planned to assault a camp of the attackers to the northwest. I should look for him there.
Guildmaster Merric's notes describe his investigation into the attacks on the Fighters Guild. Apparently, he planned to assault a camp of the attackers to the north. I should look for him there.
Guildmaster Merric's notes describe his investigation into the attacks on the Fighters Guild. Apparently, he planned to assault a camp of the attackers to the north. I should look for him there.
The camp where Merric was headed has been decimated. The guildmaster isn't here, but there's a wounded man in strange armor. I should talk to him and find out what happened here.
The camp where Merric was headed has been decimated. The guildmaster isn't here, but there's a wounded man in strange armor. I should talk to him and find out what happened here.
The camp where Merric was headed has been decimated. The guildmaster isn't here, but there's a wounded man in strange armor. I should talk to him and find out what happened here.
Guildmaster Merric left one member of the enemy camp alive to pass a message to Prince Azah. He won't give it to me until I get him some mistscrub leaves to ease his pain.
Guildmaster Merric left one member of the enemy camp alive to pass a message to Prince Azah. He won't give it to me until I get him some mistscrub leaves to ease his pain.
Guildmaster Merric left one member of the enemy camp alive to pass a message to Prince Azah. He won't give it to me until I get him some mistscrub leaves to ease his pain.
I collected enough mistscrub leaves for Razawir. I should take them back to him to find out what happened with Merric at the camp.
I gathered enough mistscrub leaves for Razawir. I should take it back to him so he can tell us what he knows.
I collected enough mistscrub for Razawir. I should take it back to him to learn where Merric went.
Guildmaster Merric is on his way to the Mages Guildhall in Shornhelm. It seems likely that the Worm Cult is planning an attack on the Mages Guild meeting, and we need to get there and help them.
I don't know what this coded message is about. But it seems I should investigate.
We overheard a few adepts from the Mages Guild discussing the recent arrest of Lirinisse, also known as Snapdragon. We should ask them for more information.
As we were searching the camp, Tanlorin was able to manifest a memory of Wisteria, giving us a glimpse of her time at this camp. I should talk to Tan about what this means.
Skordo and I found Gabrielle Benele and Prince Azah outside the Shornhelm Mages Guild, but the Worm Cult attack is already underway. I should talk to Gabrielle and let her know what we learned.
The Worm Cult attacked the Mages Guild underground sanctum in Shornhelm. Merric ran down to help defend the sanctum. I should go down there to assist him.
I entered the Mages Guild's underground sanctum with Prince Azah. We should search for Merric while taking out any Worm Cult forces we encounter along the way.
I gathered up Merric's sword and shield, and I found a note describing the location of a Worm Nest, a Worm Cult lair. I should talk to Prince Azah and show him the note.
The Proxy Queen seems to have some specific thoughts about the attack. I should listen to what she has to say.
The Elder Scroll is close, but we still need to get there to ensure the scroll doesn't fall into Orpheon's hands.
The Gardener asked me to burn a bouquet of flowers as part of a ceremony. I should grab the bouquet he prepared.
I've won a match! I can re-enter the fray and win again for a greater reward. Alternatively, I could return to <<1>> for a lesser prize.
I've won yet again! I can re-enter the fray and win again for a greater reward. Alternatively, I could return to <<1>> for a lesser prize.
I should return to <<1>> for my reward.
I should return to <<1>> for my reward.
A projection of the man who has been speaking to me has appeared inside my cell. I should talk to him.
The Prophet told me to escape my cell and find a woman named Lyris Titanborn.
I met Skordo in Eastmarch and now we're investigating the report that Guildmaster Merric was spotted in the area. Skordo suggests we search to the east.
Our search led us to an abandoned camp that Skordo thinks Guildmaster Merric used. I should examine the papers left in the camp.
I decided to search in the Alik'r Desert. Skordo tells me the rumors placed Merric west of us. I should head in that direction to look for the guildmaster.
Our search led us to an abandoned camp that Skordo thinks Guildmaster Merric used. I should examine the papers left in the camp.
I decided to search in Malabal Tor. Skordo tells me the rumors placed Merric north of us. I should head in that direction to look for the guildmaster.
Our search led us to an abandoned camp that Skordo thinks Guildmaster Merric used. I should examine the papers left in the camp.

Razawir finally revealed the Worm Cult plans. How they seek revenge against the Fighters Guild, the Mages Guild and all of Tamriel. And how their leader Mezamma is meeting with Magister Andrelo. I should talk to Skordo about everything we learned.
The cultist told us that his leader Mezamma has business with a Magister Andrelo in Windhelm, at the Cold Moon Inn. I should head there and speak with the magister.
I arrived at the Cold Moon Inn. I should search the inn for Magister Andrelo.
I found Magister Andrelo. I should talk to her and ask her about the Worm Cult or if she's seen Guildmaster Merric.

Magister Andrelo described an encounter with a strange woman and how her apprentice saw the magister board a coach to Shornhelm even as he was helping her into the inn. She told Merric and he went after the coach. I should let Skordo know.

We saw Guildmaster Merric battling the Worm Cult and their leader, a Daedra named Mezamma. He destroyed some strange device that Mezamma called a soul reaper and was injured in the blast. I need to follow Prince Azah and reach Merric.

When Guildmaster Merric destroyed the soul reaper, the resulting explosion killed him. Prince Azah, clearly devastated by the loss of his mentor, asked me to search the area and gather Merric's weapons.
Before we head to investigate the Worm Nest, Prince Azah wants to go to the Fighters Guild and tell Skordo about what happened to Guildmaster Merric.
We arrived at the Shornhelm Fighters Guild. I should let Skordo know what happened to Guildmaster Merric and hand over Merric's sword and shield.

Razawir finally revealed the Worm Cult plans. How they seek revenge against the Fighters Guild, the Mages Guild and all of Tamriel. And how their leader Mezamma is meeting with Magister Andrelo. I should talk to Skordo about everything we learned.
The cultist told us that his leader Mezamma has business with a Magister Andrelo in Vulkwasten, at the Tall Trunk Tavern. I should head there and speak with the magister.
I arrived at the Tall Trunk Tavern. I should search the tavern for Magister Andrelo.
I found Magister Andrelo. I should talk to her and ask her about the Worm Cult or if she's seen Guildmaster Merric.

Magister Andrelo described an encounter with a strange woman and how her apprentice saw the magister board a coach to Shornhelm even as he was helping her into the inn. She told Merric and he went after the coach. I should let Skordo know.

Razawir finally revealed the Worm Cult plans. How they seek revenge against the Fighters Guild, the Mages Guild and all of Tamriel. And how their leader Mezamma is meeting with Magister Andrelo. I should talk to Skordo about everything we learned.
The cultist told us that his leader Mezamma has business with a Magister Andrelo in Sentinel, at the Sisters of the Sands Inn. I should head there and speak with the magister.
I arrived at the Sisters of the Sands Inn. I should search the inn for Magister Andrelo.
I found Magister Andrelo. I should talk to her and ask her about the Worm Cult or if she's seen Guildmaster Merric.

Magister Andrelo described an encounter with a strange woman and how her apprentice saw the magister board a coach to Shornhelm even as he was helping her into the inn. She told Merric and he went after the coach. I should let Skordo know.
I should to travel to Davon's Watch, Daggerfall, or Vulkhel Guard when I'm ready to meet up with Prince Azah.
I have killed <<1>> and saved <<2>>. I should speak with <<3>> about what comes next.

We received a message from Vanus Galerion, warning us that the Worm Cult is amassing forces on the island of Solstice in preparation for a massive attack. I should talk to Prince Azah about our next steps.
Gabrielle Benele appeared to announce that Vanus Galerion, leader of the Mages Guild, wants to talk to us. I should head outside and meet with him.

After some discussion, we agreed to meet at a cove on Rivenspire's northern coast. We hope to find the Worm Cult nest as described in the note I discovered. I should head to the area and begin my search.
After some searching, I found an entrance tucked away between some rocks. I should lead Skordo, Vanus, and the others into the Worm Cult lair.
We entered the lair and our hunt for Mezamma has begun. I should search the Worm Cult nest for Mezamma and any information about the soul reapers.
We entered a flooded chamber inside the Worm Cult nest. Vanus senses illusion magic nearby. I should find the source so we can see what it hides.
We found a journal that was protected by strong illusion magic. Hidden journals often contain useful information. I should read the journal to learn its secrets.

I read a journal of experimentation notes from someone who developed the soul reapers. I learned they siphon souls to a different location, and how I can destroy them. I should continue my search of the Worm Cult lair.
Vanus Galerion and I witnessed one of the Worm Cult's soul reapers in action. A cultist killed a captured mage and the device pulled out the victim's soul. I should talk to Vanus about what we saw.
As we searched, Vanus sensed more illusion magic nearby. It may hide more useful knowledge. I should find the source of the illusion magic.
Vanus and I found the illusion magic's source and he dispelled it with ease. It revealed a hidden scroll. I should read the scroll to learn what I can from it.
We read a scroll written by Mezamma, the leader of this group of cultists. It described a plan to take the soul of every living person on Tamriel. I should continue my hunt for the evil Daedra.
We found the bodies of the Fighters Guild members and what looks to be Skordo's sword. I should pick it up to confirm.
Vanus wants to see the sword we found. I should talk to him.
Vanus believes Skordo's in danger. We need to find and rescue him.
Mezamma tricked us and kidnapped Vanus. Skordo is injured and on edge. I should talk to him.
Prince Azah figured out that Mezamma's next target is the Earth Forge, a secret Fighters Guild location. While he and Gabrielle try to rally the Three Alliances, Skordo and I need to go stop Mezamma.

Skordo and I need to search the Earth Forge for Mezamma. Skordo's afraid she's using her illusion magic to impersonate him, which is how she infiltrated this secret location. Along the way, I should destroy any soul reapers I find.
We found Mezamma. Now to destroy her and send her back to Oblivion for all the things she's done.
I stopped Mezamma and avenged those who fell by her hand. Gabrielle arrived and wants to talk to me. I should see what news she brings.
Gabrielle asked me to go to Stirk and convince my alliance's ambassador that the Worm Cult threat is real and that we all need to work together. Her portal will take me to the island.
We arrived on Stirk. Now to find my alliance's ambassador and try to talk some sense into them.
After trying to convince the alliance ambassadors that the Worm Cult threat is real, Vanus Galerion's staff started glowing and reacting to my presence. Gabrielle suggests that I examine it.
When I touched Vanus' staff, a projection of Vanus appeared. I should talk to him.

While we learned important information at the Worm Nest, we also lost Skordo's Fighters Guild comrades and Vanus Galerion was captured. Gabrielle opened a portal to the Shornhelm Mages Guild. I should use it.
Prince Azah responded to a summons to the Mages Guild and is demanding to know what transpired at the Worm Nest. I should talk to him.
I should talk to my alliance's ambassador and try to convince them that we all need to work together to defeat the new Worm Cult threat.
I should talk to my alliance's ambassador and try to convince them that we all need to work together to defeat the new Worm Cult threat.
I should talk to my alliance's ambassador and try to convince them that we all need to work together to defeat the new Worm Cult threat.
Gabrielle Benele informed me that Prince Azah wants to launch an assault against the Worm Cult nest we learned about. I should meet him at the Shornhelm Fighters Guild and hear his plan.
I should talk to Prince Azah and make sure he's ready to take the fight to the Worm Cult. They need to pay for Merric's death.

After telling Skordo what happened and turning over Merric's sword and shield, I snapped Prince Azah out of his paralyzing depression. I should talk to him one more time before we go after the Worm Cult.
I decided to follow up on the report of Merric spotted in Malabal Tor. I should head there and rendezvous with the Fighters Guild scout.
I decided to follow up on the report of Merric spotted in the Alik'r Desert. I should head there and rendezvous with the Fighters Guild scout.
I decided to follow up on the report of Merric spotted in Eastmarch. I should head there and rendezvous with the Fighters Guild scout.

After telling Skordo what happened and turning over Merric's sword and shield, I snapped Prince Azah out of his paralyzing depression. I should talk to him one more time before we go after the Worm Cult.
We arrived at the Earth Forge. I should talk to Skordo and see how he wants to handle the situation.
I need to speak to Abnur Tharn about our next course of action. I can find him back at the Mages Guild.
